Drain potatoes well and add them to the oil mixture. Toss with olive oil mixture. Spread the potatoes on a sheet pan. Roast for 30 minutes until potatoes are tender. Sprinkle with cilantro and serve. ; name: roasted potatoes with rosemary and sea salt ; ingredients: red potatoes, extra virgin olive oil, sea salt, ground black pepper, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary ; preparation:

name: sauted mushrooms with garlic and lemon juice ; ingredients: lemon juice, soy sauce, sugar, olive oil, butter, garlic paste, mushrooms ; preparation:Stir together lemon juice, soy sauce, and sugar. Set aside. In 12-inch nonstick skillet, heat butter, olive oil, and garlic over medium-high heat until butter melts. Add mushrooms and saut, stirring until golden brown and butter has been absorbed. Add lemon mixture to mushrooms, stirring until sauce is absorbed. ; name: romaine salad with avocado and oranges ; ingredients: oranges, lemon juice, olive oil, dijon mustard, salt, romaine lettuce, scallions, avocado ; preparation:With a paring knife remove the skin and pith from the oranges. Working over a large salad bowl to catch the juices, cut out the orange segments. Set aside. Add the lemon juice, oil, mustard, and salt to the juice, whisking to blend. Add the lettuce and scallions, tossing well. Add the avocado and toss gently to combine. ; name: instant pot asian pork chop ; ingredients: pork chops, olive oil, low sodium soy sauce, honey, garlic cloves, sesame oil, ginger, sriracha sauce, black pepper, hoisin sauce ; preparation:Heat instant pot on saute. Once hot, add the oil. Place the pork chops in the oil and brown both sides. Add the rest of the ingredients, close the lid, and pressure cook on manuel for 12 minutes. Let the instant pot do a natural pressure release. ; name: asian chili pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, sweet chili sauce, soy sauce, fresh orange juice, green onion, fresh ginger, sesame seeds, honey, vegetable oil ; preparation:Mix all the ingredients except the oil in a large plastic zip lock bag, mix well so the meat is coated. Place in the fridge for at least 2 hours or overnight. Remove pork from marinade -save marinade. Heat oil in a skillet and saute the pork over medium high heat for 3 minutes, flip and continue cooking for another 3 minutes or until the pork is nicely browned on both sides. Pour in the marinade cook for an additional 3 minutes or until the sauce has thickened. ; name: green beans with garlic sauce ; ingredients: oil, green beans, soy sauce, garlic, honey, ginger ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: honey glazed sesame tuna ; ingredients: honey, soy sauce, fresh lemon juice, whole grain dijon mustard, water, horseradish, canola oil, tuna steaks, toasted sesame seeds ; preparation:In a small bowl whisk together first five ingredients and set aside. Crush sesame seed with a motar and pestle, then spread evenly in a pie plate. Coat the tuna steaks with the crushed seeds. In a large non stick skillet, heat oil over med high heat, and cook tuna steaks 3-4 minutes per side, until golden and just cooked through. Transfer tuna to serving plates. Add honey glaze to hot skillet and simmer one minute, then pour over tuna. Serve with jasmine rice. ; name: vietnamese dipping sauce vegan nuoc cham alternative ; ingredients: soy sauce, rice wine, garlic, lemongrass, ground cinnamon, bird chile, peanut oil, sugar, salt ; preparation:Combine soy sauce and rice wine in a small bowl. Place garlic and lemongrass in a mortar and pound into a paste. Add garlic mixture to soy mixture. Stir in cinnamon and chile. Stir in oil, sugar and salt and mix well. Store refrigerated in a tightly-covered container for up to 3 days. ; name: pan fried brussels sprouts with sriracha honey and lime ; ingredients: brussels sprout, sriracha sauce, honey, lime juice, salt, olive oil ; preparation:

name: bermuda johnny bread caribbean ; ingredients: sugar, flour, salt, baking powder, egg, milk, butter ; preparation:Mix sugar, flour, salt, and baking powder. Add egg and milk and mix until batter consistency. Melt butter in frying pan. Spoon a third of the batter into the pan. Fry on low heat until brown. Turn and brown the other side. Repeat twice with the remaining batter. Split bread in half and serve with plenty of butter and jam. ; name: date walnut scones ; ingredients: self raising flour, table salt, caster sugar, dates, walnuts, lemon, milk, cream, eggs, plain flour ; preparation:Prehaeat fan forced oven to 180c. Sift the flour, salt and sugar into a bowl. Add the dates, walnuts and lemon zest & mix lightly. Make a well in the centre of the mixture and set bowl aside. Whisk the milk, cream and the eggs in a seperate small bowl and pour the milk mixture into the flour mixture. Using your finger. Press dough lightly using finger. Gently roll out the dough until 2-3cm thick then using a 5-6cm scone cutter cut the dough into rounds. Place rounds on a non stick baking tray and brush each round with a little milk. Bake scones for 20 minutes or until golden. Serve warm with favourite topping. ; name: basic crepes ii ; ingredients: eggs, flour, milk, butter, salt ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a blender. Whirl one minute. Scrape down and blend 15 seconds more. Refrigerate at least one hour before making crepes. Heat a lightly greased 6 inch skillet. Remove from heat. Spoon in 2 tbsp batter. Lift and tilt skillet to spread evenly. Return to heat. Brown on one side only. To remove, invert pan over paper toweling. Repeat with remaining batter. ; name: drop scones ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, butter, egg, milk, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Grease or spray a large cookie sheet. Stir together dry ingredients including the sugar. Cut butter into flour mixture. Add raisins, stir to mix well. Beat egg in measuring cup. Add milk to make 1 cup. Stir into flour. Drop roughly tablespoon size scoops on cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes. ; name: rooster cookies sugar cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, salt, flour ; preparation:Cream together the butter and sugar. Beat in 1 egg, add salt and flour. Mix all ingredients are well blended. Chill dough for 3-4 hours before rolling. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Roll out and cut. Bake about 8-10 minutes or until barely colored. Cookies can be frosted and decorated or eaten just plain. ; name: almond poppy seed muffins ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, milk, vegetable oil, eggs, almond extract, poppy seeds ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease, spray, or placed liners in muffin tins to hold 24 muffins. Combine flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Add milk, eggs, oil, and almond extract. Whisk until smooth. Gently stir in poppyseeds. Fill muffin tins and bake for 25- 30 minutes. ; name: duimpjes dutch cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, flour, salt, baking powder, milk, almonds, anise seed ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Cream butter and sugar together until light and fluffy. Sift flour, salt and baking powder together. Add alternatively with the milk to the creamed mixture. Add almonds and anise seed. Mix thoroughly. Drop from a teaspoon onto a baking sheet. Bake for 12 minutes or until golden. ; name: anisbroetli aniseed biscuits ; ingredients: eggs, icing sugar, kirsch, anise seed, salt, plain flour ; preparation:

name: any fruit fast fat free cobbler ; ingredients: white sugar, flour, skim milk, baking powder, salt, fruit ; preparation:Combine all of the ingredients except the fruit in a bowl. Pour it into an 8x8 pan coated with cooking spray. Add the fruit right on top. The crust will come up over the fruit and cover it. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 40 minutes. ; name: penzey s chocolate chip kisses ; ingredients: egg whites, cream of tartar, salt, vanilla extract, red food coloring, superfine sugar, mini chocolate chip ; preparation:Preheat oven to 250. Beat egg whites, cream of tartar, and salt on high speed until peaks form. Add vanilla extract and food coloring. Gradually add the sugar, beating until stiff. Gently fold in chocolate chips. Drop by scant teaspoons onto a greased cookie sheet about 2 inches apart. Bake at 250 for 25 minutes. The kisses will be chewy on the inside and slightly brown on the botom and will retain their pink color. ; name: peanut brittle ; ingredients: sugar, white corn syrup, dry roasted salted peanut, butter, vanilla, baking soda ; preparation:In 2 quart microwave safe bowl stir together the sugar & corn syrup. Microwave on high for 4 minutes. Stir in peanuts and microwave on high for another 4 minutes. Add butter & vanilla, stirring well. Microwave on high for additional 2 minutes. Stir in baking soda until light and foamy. Quickly pour mixture onto a lightly greased cookie sheet or slab marble. Let cool for 1 hour - break into pieces and store in tight container. ; name: cow pattie cookies ; ingredients: white sugar, butter, milk, cocoa, salt, vanilla, oatmeal, coconut ; preparation:Boil the first five ingredients for 5 minutes. Then add the last three ingredients. Stir. Remove from heat. While hot, drop by spoonful onto waxed paper. ; name: chockful of nuts brittle ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, corn syrup, salted nuts ; preparation:Combine butter, sugar and corn syrop in a large saucepan. Using a wooden spoon, stir and cook over medium heat until smooth and bubbly. Cook, covered for one minute. Add nuts, increase heat to medium-high. Cook uncovered, stirring constantly until syrop is a warm golden color. Line a cookie sheet with foil and lightly butter. Pour mixture onto pan, spreading as thin as possible. Cool until hard. Peel from foil and break into bite-sized pieces. ; name: mom s cracked sugar cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, flour, cream of tartar, baking soda ; preparation:Cream butter & sugar. Mix in egg. Mix in flour, cream of tartar & baking soda till well combined. Drop tablespoon size balls in sugar, roll to coat. Place 12 cookies on a parchment lined cookie sheet, do not flatten. Bake at 350 for 10 - 15 minutes. Slide parchment with cookies onto wire rack to cool. Store in airtight container. ; name: basic seven minute frosting and or peanut butter frosting ; ingredients: egg whites, granulated sugar, water, white corn syrup, salt, vanilla ; preparation:In the top bowl of a double boiler off the heat, combine all the ingredients except the vanilla. Beat the mixture for about 1 minute to mix thoroughly. Rest the bowl over simmering water over medium heat and whisk constantly for 7 minutes, or until frosting shows stiff peaks and has tripled in volume. Lift the pan off the water and whisk vigorously until frosting has cooled and is thick and glossy. This stays at its fluffiest if you first whisk together the peanut butter and about a cup of frosting. Then fold in the rest of the frosting gently with a rubber spatula. ; name: homemade corn syrup substitute simple syrup ; ingredients: white sugar, water, cream of tartar, salt ; preparation:

name: chocolate brownie waffles ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, eggs, milk, cooking oil, semi-sweet chocolate chips, unsweetened cocoa, walnuts ; preparation:Grease and preheat waffle iron. Combine flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, chocolate chips, cocoa, and walnuts in a large mixing bowl. In a small mixing bowl, combine egg yolks, milk, and cooking oil. Add the liquid mixture to the dry mixture. Stir until combined, but still lumpy. In a small bowl, beat the egg whites until stiff peaks form. Gently, fold the egg whites into the lumpy batter. Pour the batter onto the iron and bake until done. For an even more sinful treat, top with whipped cream, fresh strawberries or raspberries, chocolate sauce and chopped nuts. ; name: chocolate chip waffles low fat and healthy ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, egg whites, nonfat milk, vanilla, chocolate chips ; preparation:Sift dry ingrediants in one bowl, and, using a fork, lightly beat the wet ingrediants in a serapate bowl. Add the dry into the wet and add the chocolate chips, mixing until just combined. Pour into a preheated greased waffle iron, and i cook mine for 3-4 minutes with my waffle iron. This recipe yeilds 4 square waffles for me. These freeze well. ; name: double chocolate dream cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking cocoa, baking soda, salt, butter, brown sugar, granulated sugar, vanilla extract, eggs, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Combine flour, cocoa, baking soda and salt in a small bowl. Beat butter, brown sugar, granulated sugar and vanilla extract in until creamy. Beat in eggs for about 2 minutes until light and fluffy. Gradually beat in flour mixture. Stir in morsels. Drop by rounded tablespoon onto ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until cookies are puffed. Cool on cookie sheets for 2 minutes. Remove to wire racks to cool completely. ; name: martha s soft baked chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, dark brown sugar, unsalted butter, light corn syrup, eggs, vanilla, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Whisk together flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt. In a large bowl, using an electric mixer, beat sugar, butter and corn syrup until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs and vanilla. With mixers on low, gradually add flour mixture, beating just until combined. Fold in chocolate chips. Drop dough by tablespoons onto two baking sheets, 2 inches apart. Bake until cookies are no longer shiny - 10-12 minutes. Let cool two minutes and transfer to wire rack. ; name: yummy bars ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, butter, baking powder, eggs, semi-sweet chocolate chips, nuts ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Combine crust ingredients in small bowl and blend well. Press into bottom of ungreased 9x13 baking pan. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, or until lightly browned. Remove from oven to cool slightly. Increase oven temp to 375. In medium bowl combine 1 cup brown sugar, 2 tbsp flour, baking powder and eggs. Blend well. Stir in chocolate chips and nuts. Pour topping evenly over crust, spreading lightly, if necessary. Bake at 357 for 13 to 18 minutes or until deep golden brown. Cool completely before cutting into bars. ; name: to die for nut bars ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, brown sugar, baking soda, salt, butter, mixed nuts, milk chocolate chips, caramel ice cream topping ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine flours, brown sugar, baking soda and salt. Cut in butter until mixture resembles course crumbs. Press into a greased 15x10x1-inch baking pan. Bake at 350 degrees 10-12 minutes or until golden brown. Quickly spread nuts and chocolate chips over crust. Combine caramel topping with 3 tablespoons flour. Drizzle over nuts and chocolate chips. Bake 12-15 minutes longer or until golden and bubbly. Cool and cut into squares. ; name: slap yo mama pancakes ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, eggs, milk, water, vegetable oil ; preparation:Sift flour and baking powder together. Add remaining ingredients to flour mixture. And whisk togetether until smooth. Add to hot griddle or heavy skillet and cook until golden brown. For the small family or just smaller batches recipe can be done in half, and will make approx 9 small pancakes. ; name: chocolate chip banana cake ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking soda, salt, bananas, vegetable oil, eggs, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: pat s baked beef ; ingredients: steaks, cream of mushroom soup, barbecue sauce, water, onion ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 350 put beef in bottom of 13x9 in baking pan. Mix bbq sauce, mushroom soup and water together. Pour over beef. Place sliced onion on top. Cover and bake for 90 minutes. The gravy is very good on mashed potatoes. ; name: crock pot slow cooker beef strips in mushroom gravy ; ingredients: steak, dry onion soup mix, mushroom soup, water, green capsicum, herbs, spices ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except meat in crock pot. Add meat. Cover and cook on low for 6 - 8 hours. Before serving, thicken gravy with flour or cornstarch mixed with a little water. Just before serving add 1 cup sour cream to gravy and stir well. Serve over noodles. ; name: the best potato soup ; ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, cream of celery soup, carrots, onion, celery, evaporated milk, potatoes, water, butter ; preparation:Saut vegfies in butter. Add water. Boil potatoes. When potatoes are cooked, drain and add milk and soups. Pour water and veggies inches. Mesh together. It is better not to mesh completely--leave it a little chunky. ; name: fillet bubbly bake ; ingredients: fish fillet, cream of mushroom soup, onions, lemon juice, cheese, water ; preparation:Cut the frozen fillets in four portions. Place in a shallow greased casserole. Mix the mushroom soup, onion, lemon juice and water and pour over the fillets. Top with grated cheese. Bake in hot over for 20 minutes or until done. ; name: three step stroganoff ; ingredients: boneless round steak, vegetable oil, cream of mushroom soup, water, onion soup mix, sour cream, cooked noodles ; preparation:Slice round steak into thin strips and stir-fry in oil until no longer pink. Stir in soup, water and onion soup mix. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes. Stir in sour cream, heat through. Serve over noodles. ; name: quick and easy tuna noodle casserole ; ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, elbow macaroni, water, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, peas ; preparation:Boil noodles. Then strain. Mix in cream of mushroom soup and tuna. Pour into casserole dish. Sprinkle cheese of top. Bake at 350 until cheese is melted. Let cool and serve. ; name: macaroni and cheddar cheese beef bake ; ingredients: macaroni and cheese mix, butter, milk, ground beef, onions, cream of mushroom soup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Prepare mac and cheese according to directions on box. Brown beef and onion with salt and pepper to taste. Mix macaroni and cheese with beef and add milk and cream of mushroom soup in buttered casserole dish. Bake uncovered for 25 minutes. ; name: oven roast beef ; ingredients: sirloin tip roast, dry onion soup mix, cream of mushroom soup, water ; preparation:

name: black olive mayonnaise ; ingredients: garlic cloves, pitted black olives, flat leaf parsley, mayonnaise, fresh lemon juice, salt, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Place the garlic cloves into the bowl of a food processor and pulse until finely chopped. Add the olives and parsley and pulse again until the mix is almost a puree. Add the mayonnaise, lemon juice and salt and pulse until just combined. With the processor running, add the olive oil in a stream. Pour into a bowl and chill until ready to use. Great served with sandwiches, over toast, flatbread, pita chips, etc. ; name: shrimp provencal over rice ; ingredients: olive oil, large shrimp, mushroom, garlic cloves, tomatoes, lemon juice, salt, pepper, fresh parsley, cooked rice ; preparation:In 12-inch skillet over medium heat, in 2 tablespoons hot oil, cook shrimp stirring frequently, until shrimp turn pink, about 3 minutes. Remove from pan and set aside. In same skillet, in remaining tablespoon of hot oil, add mushrooms and garlic and cook until mushrooms are tender, about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add tomatoes, lemon juice, salt, and pepper and cook 3 minutes more. Return shrimp to skillet and heat through. Sprinkle with parsley and serve over rice. ; name: fashoulakia greek green bean side dish ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, fresh parsley, of fresh mint, fresh dill, garlic cloves, green beans, salt, black pepper, stewed tomatoes ; preparation:Heat oil in a stockpot over medium-high heat. Add onion. Saut 3 minutes. Add herbs and garlic. Saut 4 minutes. Add beans and remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 30 minutes or until beans are tender. ; name: griddled marinated eggplant with feta and herbs ; ingredients: eggplants, olive oil, lemon, juice of, garlic clove, feta cheese, flat leaf parsley, cilantro ; preparation:Heat a griddle or frying pan until very hot. Brush the egggplant with a little oil and griddle or fry in batches until soft and cooked through. Arrange eggplant on a platter. Mix together the lemon and garlic with 5 tbsp olive oil and some seasoning, and drizzle over the aubergine. Let the flavors meld together for 5 minutes, then scatter the feta and herbs over and serve. ; name: scampi shrimp skewers ; ingredients: shrimp, margarine, olive oil, garlic cloves, dry white wine, fresh parsley, lemon peel, ground black pepper, green onions, sweet red pepper ; preparation:If your shrimp is frozen, thaw before using. Peel shrimp leaving tails intact and devein. In a small saucepan using medium-high heat, melt margarine or butter and oil. Add garlic and cook for 2 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in wine, parsley, lemon peel, and ground pepper. Set aside. Using 6-inch long appetizer skewers thread shrimp, green onion, and pepper pieces and brush with garlic mixture. Grill the shrimp and vegetable skewers on a grill rack directly over medium heat for approximately 6 to 8 minutes or until shrimp turns pink. Turn once and brush with garlic mixture halfway through grilling. Serve immediately. ; name: creamy tomato sauce for pasta ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, tomato sauce, salt, fresh ground pepper, cream cheese, pesto sauce, parmesan cheese, cream, fresh basil ; preparation:Heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut crushed garlic for 1-2 minutes. Stir in tomato sauce. Add salt, pepper, and pesto. Add cream cheese and stir or whisk well until fully melted. Stir parmesan cheese until melted. Add cream and stir well. ; name: roasted spiced carrots ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, sugar, ground cumin, kosher salt, ground cinnamon, carrots, white raisins, lemon, juice of, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well. ; name: veal pizzaiola ; ingredients: olive oil, veal scallopini, butter, garlic cloves, chopped tomatoes, oregano, salt & pepper, white wine, parsley ; preparation:

name: the never enough mushroom vegetarian gravy ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic clove, white button mushrooms, portabella mushrooms, white wine, salt, ground black pepper, bay leaf ; preparation:Heat the oil in a 5 quart pot on medium heat. Add the onions and saute until caramelized, about 20-30 minutes, stirring and scraping the bottom of the pot occasionally. Add garlic, if using, and saute 2 minutes, or until softened. Pour in 5 cups water, bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes. Blend with an immersion blender. Add the mushrooms, wine, salt, pepper, bay leaf and 2 cups water. Bring to a boil, occasionally pushing the mushrooms into the liquid. Reduce heat and simmer 45-60 minutes, or until of desired thickness. Remove bay leaf and adjust seasoning, if necessary. I also added some fresh chopped thyme before serving. ; name: old fashioned cream of broccoli soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, sliced mushrooms, broccoli, flour, salt and pepper, chicken broth, light cream, red wine ; preparation:Melt butter in large sauce pan. Saut vegetables in butter until tender. Sprinkle with flour, salt and pepper. Stir in well. Add chicken broth and cream. Cook until thick and comes to a slow boil. Stirring frequently. Add wine and correct salt and pepper to taste. ; name: dom s stuffed mushrooms ; ingredients: mushroom, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, egg, seasoned bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, parsley, soy sauce, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Remove stems from mushrooms, and set caps aside. Chop mushroom stems. Heat olive oil in a skillet, and brown onions and garlic. Add mushroom stems, and brown over low heat. In a bowl, combine onion mixture with egg, bread crumbs, cheese and parsley, and mix well. Stuff mushroom caps with mixture. Place mushrooms on a baking dish. Add soy sauce and water to the bottom of the dish. Cover with foil and bake for 10 minutes. Remove foil and continue baking until golden brown. ; name: chili crusted salmon with roasted potatoes ; ingredients: chili powder, brown sugar, salt, potatoes, green onions, olive oil, ground black pepper, salmon fillets ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. In small mixing bowl, combine chili powder, brown sugar, and salt. In 13 x 9 glass baking dish, toss potatoes with onion, olive oil, pepper, and 1 tbsp of the chili mixture until evenly coated. Cover with foil and roast 20 minutes. Meanwhile, use remaining chili mixture to coat salmon fillets. Place on top of potatoes, skin side down, and roast uncovered 10-12 minutes, or until fish flakes easily and potatoes are tender. ; name: chilli jam ; ingredients: yellow onions, butter, chilies, sugar, garlic powder, soy sauce, salt ; preparation:In a heavy bottomed pan, fry onion in butter on low for about 15 mins, stirring frequently. Dont let them brown. Add chilli and garlic and continue cooking for another 15mins. Add sugar, stir for about 15 mins, allowing the mixture to brown slightly. Turn off heat, but keep stirring so it doesnt burn. Keep in fridge. Havent worked out the storage time yet. Didnt last long enough. ; name: mountain breeze tomato soup ; ingredients: tomatoes, celery, onions, brown sugar, coarse salt, butter, flour, white pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:Cook tomatoes, celery and onions for 2 or 3 hours until soft enough to be pressed through a cone sieve. Add sugar, salt and butter. Using a couple cups of soup mixture, stir into flour to make paste. Add paste and seaoning back to mixture. Bring to a boil, stirring often. Ladle into sterile quart jars. Cap and seal. Water bath for 20 minutes. ; name: low cal zucchini and mushroom frittata ; ingredients: zucchini, white mushrooms, garlic cloves, onions, egg whites, salt, pepper, chili powder, cayenne pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:Spray a non-stick skillet with fat-free, calorie free non-stick cooking spray. Saut onion and garlic for 3 minutes. Add zucchini and saut for 3 minutes. Add mushrooms and continue to saut all of the veggies until soft. In a large bowl, whisk eggs, salt, pepper, chili powder, cayenne pepper, and garlic powder until the eggs become slightly puffy. Drain vegetables and add to egg mixture. Fold veggies into egg whites and pour back into the skillet. Cook on medium for 8 minutes. Place a plate on top of the skillet and flip the frittata. Slide uncooked side down back onto skillet and cook for another 8 minutes. If you like the top to be crunchy, place the frittata under the broiler for an additional 10 minutes. ; name: pareve green bean casserole ; ingredients: margarine, onions, white mushrooms, flour, soymilk, garlic powder, salt, pepper, french style green beans, french-fried onions ; preparation:

name: shakshouka ; ingredients: onion, olive oil, garlic cloves, eggs, sweet red pepper, tomatoes, sweet paprika, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Saut the onions and garlic until soft in about a tablespoons of olive oil, flavoured with a grind of black pepper. This will take about 8 minutes. Meanwhile, grate the tomatoes using the coarsest grater you have. Add the tomatoes, peppers, paprika and mix well. Season to taste. Cover and simmer on a very low heat for 25 minutes. After 25 minutes, break the eggs on to the surface of the tomato mixture. Cover and cook for 4 minutes or until the eggs are done to your liking. Some cooks like to break the egg yolks and swirl them into the tomatoes. ; name: tomato basil tortellini soup ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, chicken broth, diced tomatoes, cheese tortellini, fresh basil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Over medium heat cook garlic in oil until fragrant. Stir in broth and tomatoes. Bring to a boil. Add tortellini, reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes. Stir in basil, salt and pepper. Simmer for 3 minutes longer. ; name: garlic piperade soup ; ingredients: garlic cloves, onions, sweet pepper, olive oil, tomatoes, beef stock, bread, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Blanch the garlic in boiling water for thirty seconds. Run under cold water and drain. Peel and slice the cloves of garlic. Cook the onions and peppers in the oil for ten minutes until the onions are golden and the peppers are soft. Add the garlic and tomatoes. Cover the pan and cook over low heat for thirty minutes. Pour in the broth and bring to a boil. Tear the bread into large pieces and add to the boiling soup where it will disintegrate and thicken the broth. Adjust the amount of bread and broth to the desired thickness of the soup and salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot with grated cheese if you wish. ; name: broccoli california style 1958 ; ingredients: broccoli, oil, garlic clove, onion, dried cayenne pepper, water, salt ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet. Add garlic, onion, and pepper. Cook until onion is tender, stirring occasionally. Remove pepper and discard. Add broccoli, water and salt. Cover and simmer until tender-crisp, 12-15 minutes. ; name: linguine with red pepper sauce ; ingredients: cooking spray, olive oil, sweet red peppers, garlic clove, fresh basil, balsamic vinegar, salt, black pepper, linguine, basil sprig ; preparation:Coat a nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Add oil. Place over medium heat until hot. Add sweet red pepper and garlic. Cook, uncovered, 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Set aside, and cool slightly. Place pepper mixture in container of an electric blender or food processor. Add chopped basil and next 3 ingredients. Cover and process until smooth, stopping once to scrape down sides. Cook pasta according to package directions, omitting salt and fat. To serve, top pasta with pepper sauce. Garnish with basil sprigs, if desired. ; name: cilantro lime chicken ; ingredients: garlic, cilantro leaves, black peppercorns, sugar, limes, thai fish sauce, light soy sauce, sunflower oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Make the marinade of garlic, cilantro, ground peppercorns, sugar, lime juice, fish sauce, soy sauce and sunflower oil. Blend well. Place chicken breasts with marinade in a shallow dish or resealable plastic bag, coating them well, and set in the refrigerator at least 1 hour and no more than 2, turning them from time to time. Preheat a ridged griddle pan or heavy non-stick frying pan and cook the chicken for 7-8 minutes each side until the chicken is cooked through. Serve hot or cold, garnished with cilantro leaves. ; name: rachael ray sourdough croutons ; ingredients: garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, butter, sourdough bread, coarse black pepper, parmesan cheese, fresh thyme ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Heat garlic and oil over low heat and melt butter into the oil. Place the bread in a large bowl and toss with garlic oil and butter. Season with pepper, parmesan and thyme. Spread croutons evenly on baking sheet and bake until crisp and golden. ; name: roast teriyaki broccoli ; ingredients: broccoli, garlic cloves, teriyaki sauce, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil flavored cooking spray ; preparation:

name: pineapple fudge ; ingredients: sugar, brown sugar, crushed pineapple in juice, sweetened condensed milk, corn syrup, salt, butter, marshmallows, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:In 2-quart saucepan, combine sugars, pineapple, condensed milk, corn syrup, salt and butter. Cook to 238 degrees on a candy thermometer, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat. Add marshmallows and vanilla. Stir together to melt marshmallows. Beat until mixture is heavy and creamy. Add pecans. Spread in buttered 8 x 8 x 2-inch pan. Cool until firm. Cut into squares. ; name: butterscotch oatmeal bites ; ingredients: miniature marshmallows, butterscotch chips, peanut butter, butter, cheerios toasted oat cereal, raisins, flaked coconut ; preparation:In heavy saucepan, combine marshmallows, butterscotch chips, peanut butter, and butter. Cook and stir on medium-high heat until melted. Remove from heat. Stir in cheerios, raisins, and coconut. Drop by bite size pieces onto wax paper. Let stand for 10 minutes. ; name: amish lime salad ; ingredients: marshmallows, milk, lime gelatin, cream cheese, crushed pineapple, salad dressing, whipped cream ; preparation:Melt the marshmallows and milk in a double boiler. Pour that mixture over the gelatin, stirring it until the gelatin is dissolved. Stir in the cream cheese until it dissolves. Add the pineapple and cool the mixture. Add salad dressing and whipped cream and chill until firm. ; name: christmas trifle ; ingredients: crushed pineapple, bananas, red maraschino cherry, green maraschino cherry, eggnog, vanilla instant pudding mix, angel food cake, whipped cream, walnuts ; preparation:Drain pineapple, reserving juice. Dip bananas in juice, drain and discard juice. Set aside pineapple, bananas, three red cherries and three green cherries. In a bowl, whisk the eggnog and pudding mixed for 2 minutes or until slightly thickened. Place half of the pudding in a 4 quart serving or trifle bowl, layer with half of the bananas, pineapple, cherries, cake cubes and whipped topping. Repeat layers. Garnish with walnuts and reserved cherries. Serves 16-20. ; name: pecan coconut sweet potaotes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, brown sugar, flaked coconut, pecans, pure vanilla extract, salt, ground cinnamon, butter, miniature marshmallow ; preparation:Place sweet potatoes in a 3-qt. Slow cooker coated with cooking. Spray. In a small bowl combine the brown sugar, coconut, pecans,. Vanilla, salt and cinnamon. Sprinkle over sweet potatoes. Drizzle. With butter. Cover and cook on low for 5-6 hours or until potatoes are tender,. Sprinkling with marshmallows during last 5 minutes of cooking time. ; name: remarkable fudge ; ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, marshmallow cream, vanilla, nuts ; preparation:Butter side of heavy 3-quart pan. Combine sugar, milk & butter. Cook over medium heat to 236f, stirring frequently. Remove from heat & add chocolate, marshmallow cream, vanilla & nuts. Beat until chocolate is melted & blended. Pour into pan. ; name: dutch oven pineapple upside down cake ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, pineapple slices, maraschino cherries, pineapple cake mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven according to instructions on cake mix. Melt the butter over medium high heat in the iron skillet. Remove from the heat and sprinkle the brown sugar evenly to cover the butter. Next, arrange pineapple rings around the bottom of the pan, one layer deep. Place a maraschino cherry into the center of each pineapple ring. Prepare the cake mix by mixing the mix, water, oil and eggs together, substitute some of the pineapple juice for some of the liquid in the directions. Pour the batter over the pineapple layer in dutch oven. Bake as directed by the cake mix directions. Cool for 10 minutes, then carefully turn out onto a plate. ; name: swedish rice dessert ; ingredients: mini marshmallows, rice, crushed pineapple, maraschino cherry, slivered almonds, heavy cream, sugar, vanilla ; preparation:

name: spicy korean chicken ; ingredients: chicken wings, onion, green bell pepper, carrots, soy sauce, black pepper, sugar, water, red pepper paste, dry red pepper ; preparation:Boil wings in pot until blood no longer visible. Drain. Mix ingredients together and bring to boil. Cover and let simmer over med heat for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Cook until carrots reach desired tenderness. Serve with sticky white rice. ; name: ww southwestern frittata ; ingredients: olive oil, eggs, egg whites, salt, pepper, onion, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, salsa ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a medium sized skillet. In a small bowl, beat the eggs and whites, salt, and pepper. Saute the onion and bell peppers about 5 minutes. Slowly pour the mixture from the bowl into the skillet and sprinkle with cheese. Gently stir until the mixture becomes slightly firm. Then turn over the frittata and cook the other side about 2 minutes longer. After taking the frittata from the skillet, cut it in half, and roll it like a burrito. Serve with salsa. ; name: baked arroz con pollo ; ingredients: cooked chicken, salt, olive oil, onion, garlic, green pepper, canned tomato, chicken broth, bay leaf, yellow rice ; preparation:Saute veggies in oil. Add broth, tomatoes and bay leaf. Bring to a boil. Spread rice in a 9x13 casserole pan. Pour hot liquid over all, stir well. Add chicken, mix. Bake at 350 for one hour. ; name: whittle your waist line with a fluffy omelet ; ingredients: eggs, fresh chives, green bell pepper, yellow onion, low fat cottage cheese, salt and pepper, butter-flavored cooking spray ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In mixing bowl, combine the egg yolks and cottage cheese until well-blended. Add salt and pepper. In separate bowl, whisk or, using a hand mixer, beat egg whites until very fluffy, but not dry. On medium, heat a small cast iron skillet and spray with butter spray. Saute pepper and onion until softened. Meanwhile, fold egg yolk mixture into egg whites. Immediately pour into skillet and cooks for about 2 minutes. Place in preheated oven and bake until puffy. Sprinkle with chopped chives to serve. Cut into wedges. ; name: hard chargin blue cheese stampede blue cheese hamburger ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, tabasco sauce, honey, garlic salt, crushed red pepper flakes, black pepper, blue cheese, roasted red peppers, portabella mushrooms ; preparation:Preheat grill to a medium-high heat. Combine ground beef, onion, tabasco, honey, garlic salt, red pepper and pepper in a bowl. Mix well. Cut the blue cheese into 1oz squares. Divide meat into 6 portions and form patties around the pieces of blue cheese. Grill 8-10 minutes or until done. Toast your buns and grill the portabella mushrooms. Place patties on bun and top with roasted red peppers and portabellas. Enjoy. ; name: pizza buns ; ingredients: mushroom, pizza sauce, onion, green pepper, mozzarella cheese, tomatoes, pepperoni, hot dog buns ; preparation:Put pizza sauce in bowl. Drain juice from mushrooms and add. Chop onion& green pepper into small pieces and add to mixture also. Grate mozzarella cheese, leave some for top of buns. Mix ingredients, until fairly thick consistency. Slice tomatoes, and meat if desired. Put pizza bun mixture from bowl on buns or bread, top with tomatoes, meat, and mozzarella cheese. Place buns on cookie sheet and bake for 15 minutes or so until cooked, then broil for a few minutes until cheese is brown. ; name: pommes de terre avec udon ; ingredients: potatoes, cherry tomatoes, green pepper, yellow onion, olive oil, rice vinegar, fresh udon noodles, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in large skillet and add chopped onions. Salt the onions to bring out flavor. Cook until slightly golden. Salt potatoes, add to skillet and cook until potatoes begin to soften and turn brown around the edges. Add rice wine vinegar to help the onions caramelize and bring out the natural flavor of the vegetables. Add chopped pepper, tomatoes and fresh udon noodles. Mix together and season with salt and pepper as needed. ; name: golden chicken spaghetti casserole ; ingredients: yellow bell pepper, orange bell pepper, onion, mushrooms, cheddar cheese, chicken stock, cooked chicken, diced tomatoes, oil, spinach ; preparation:

name: braised celery irish ; ingredients: celery, onion, fresh parsley leaves, bacon, chicken stock, salt and black pepper, butter ; preparation:Clean celery, cut into one-inch pieces and place in a casserole dish. Finely chop bacon and onion and sprinkle over celery along with chopped parsley. Pour on stock. Dot with knobs of butter. Cover dish and bake in a moderate oven for 30-45 minutes. ; name: chicken garlic soup ; ingredients: chicken, carrots, celery, yellow onion, fresh parsley, salt and pepper, garlic, butter, flour ; preparation:Make the chicken broth by simmering chicken, carrots, celery, onion, garlic, parsley, salt and pepper in enough water to cover. When the chicken is thoroughly cooked, remove it and skim the fat from broth. Simmer broth, reducing it until it is very rich. Add the flour and butter to a small amount of broth and mix with a wire whisk until velvety. Pour this mixture into the remaining broth. Tear chicken into bite-sized pieces and add to the soup. Sprinkle with fresh parsley and serve. ; name: brussels sprouts with fried onions and pancetta ; ingredients: brussels sprout, olive oil, butter, pancetta, lemon juice, sea salt, cracked black pepper, fried onions ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a large frying pan. Add the pancetta and fry for 2 minutes until just becoming crisp. Toss in the sprouts, then the lemon juice. Season well. Cook for 2 minutes until heated through. Serve topped with fried onions. ; name: carrot potato and onion gratin ; ingredients: butter, russet potatoes, onions, carrot, salt, fresh ground black pepper, chicken stock, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f generously butter a medium-size gratin dish. Make a layer of one-third of the potato slices in the bottom of the prepared gratin dish. Add a layer of half the onions and then half the carrots. Dot with 2 tablespoons of the butter and season well with salt and pepper. Repeat the layers and finish with the remaining one-third of the potato slices. Dot with the remaining 2 tablespoons of butter and season with salt and pepper. Pour in the stock. Cover with aluminum foil and bake until the vegetables are tender, about 45 minutes. Uncover and sprinkle with the cheese. Bake 10 minutes longer, until the cheese is golden brown. Serve very hot. Makes 6 to 8 servings. ; name: kartoffelpuffer potato pancakes ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, eggs, flour, salt, vegetable oil, sugar, cranberry sauce, orange slice, parsley ; preparation:Combine first five ingredients and mix well. Drain off excess liquid. Form into patties and fry in hot oil in shallow pan until evenly browned, turning once. Drain well on paper towels and sprinkle with sugar. Serve with cranberry sauce or cinnamon applesauce, and garnish with orange slices and parsley, if desired. ; name: john wayne s corn chowder ; ingredients: butter, white onion, chicken broth, potato, corn kernels, thyme, bay leaf, cream ; preparation:Saute onions in butter until they are tender and translucent. Add the corn, potatoes, chicken broth and herbs. Simmer for 25 minutes. Puree the soup in a blender. Return to pot. Before serving, add the cream and butter, stir, and check the seasonings. Add salt and pepper if necessary. ; name: czech summer kohlrabi ; ingredients: onion, kohlrabi, butter, salt, fresh ground black pepper, flour, milk, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a heavy frying pan over medium heat, saut onions and 1 pound kohlrabi in butter until well coated with the butter. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cover tightly and cook, stirring occasionally, until kohlrabi is tender, about 25 minutes. Sprinkle with flour and turn to mix. Gradually add milk and cook and gently stir mixture until milk thickens to a smooth sauce. Correct seasoning, adding salt and pepper generously. Stir in parsley. Makes 4 servings. Womans day home cooking around the world. ; name: brussels sprouts n potatoes ; ingredients: onion, butter, potato, brussels sprout, bay leaf, sweet red pepper, chicken stock, salt and pepper, parsley ; preparation:

name: red cabbage and apple salad ; ingredients: onion, red cabbage, apples, brown sugar, red wine vinegar, salt, allspice, water, raisins ; preparation:Slice onion, cook on high 90 seconds in microwave. Or saute in a little oil. Shred cabbage, chop apples and put in medium saucepan with sugar, vinegar and spices. Fry for 5 minutes over medium heat to meld flavors. Add water and simmer for 15 minutes, or until cabbage is soft. Mix in the onions and sprinkle with rasins. Serve warm, or chill for a few hours before serving. ; name: classy spinach bundles with pistachio dressing ; ingredients: vegetable oil, vinegar, honey, orange zest, pistachios, fresh spinach leaves, green onions ; preparation:Blend oil, vinegar, honey and orange peel. Stir in pistachios and set aside. Place spinach in 2-quart microwave-safe container. Cover with plastic wrap and vent. Microwave at high for 3 to 5 minutes or until spinach is wilted. Rinse with cold water. Squeeze to drain. Divide into 4 bundles. Wrap each bundle with green onion tie. Drizzle with pistachio dressing. Serve warm or chilled. ; name: pickled beetroot ; ingredients: beetroots, vinegar, water, sugar, peppercorn, clove, bay leaf, mustard seeds, cinnamon stick, salt ; preparation:Wash the beetroot well, and cook in boiling salted water until tender. Strain and cool beetroot and remove skins. Slice beetroot into julienne strips and set aside. Place all pickling ingredients into a pan and bring to boil when boiling bring back mixture to a simmer for about 5 minutes and then strain mixture. Spoon beetroot into hot sterilized jars, and top with the vinegar mixture. Seal jars, and store in a cool place. ; name: apple clementine chutney ; ingredients: gala apples, clementine, rice vinegar, light brown sugar, lemon, juice of, lemon zest, cinnamon, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Add all ingredients to sauce pan. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes or until the mixture thickens. Use potato masher and mash after 15 minutes. Refrigerate over night. ; name: crisp red cabbage ; ingredients: red cabbage, apples, red wine vinegar, brown sugar, salt, nutmeg ; preparation:Place cabbage, apples, vinegar, and brown sugar in a saucepan over medium heat. Mix well. Cover and simmer about 10 minutes until cabbage is tender-crisp. Add salt and nutmeg. Mix well. Serve warm. ; name: mushroom and celery salad ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, celery, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, sugar, white pepper, onion salt, garlic powder ; preparation:Combine mushrooms and celery in a salad bowl. Mix oil, lemon juice, salt, sugar, white pepper, onion salt, and garlic powder. Mix well. Pour over mushrooms and celery. Serve. ; name: mushroom and shredded chicken salad ; ingredients: olive oil, button mushrooms, mushrooms, chicken, mixed salad greens, lime juice, soy sauce, sweet chili sauce, red wine vinegar ; preparation:Heat one tablespoon of oil in a pan, add the mushrooms and cook over a medium heat for 2-3 minutes, or until the mushrooms have softened. Toss the mushrooms in a large bowl with the shredded chicken. Combine all the lime and soy dressing ingredients in a small jug or bowl, mix well and pour two-thirds of the dressing over the warm mushrooms. Arrange the salad leaves in a serving dish and toss through the remaining dressing. Top with the chicken and mushrooms and serve warm. ; name: cider roasted vegetables ; ingredients: beets, parsnips, baby carrots, brown sugar, olive oil, apple cider vinegar, shiitake mushrooms ; preparation:

name: chicken wings with honey soy and sesame ; ingredients: vegetable oil, chicken wings, soy sauce, water, honey, sesame seeds ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375f heat the vegetable oil in a small ovenproof frying pan. Fry the chicken wings for 2-3 minutes on each side, until golden. Remove the pan from the heat and add the soy sauce, water and honey. Transfer to the oven and cook for 10-12 minutes, turning the chicken wings once. Arrange the chicken wings on a warmed platter, scatter over the sesame seeds and serve. ; name: green beans with garlic sauce ; ingredients: oil, green beans, soy sauce, garlic, honey, ginger ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: asian sticky chicky ; ingredients: sesame oil, boneless skinless chicken thighs, garlic cloves, rice wine, water, reduced sodium soy sauce, brown sugar, chinese five spice powder, scallions ; preparation:Heat sesame oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken thighs to the skillet. Quickly brown on both sides. Add all remaining ingredients except the chopped scallions. Bring just to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and gently simmer for about 30 minutes. Remove lid and turn over thighs. Continue to cook uncovered until sauce is a thick glaze. This may take only a few minutes. Careful not to let it burn. Place on a platter or plates and sprinkle with the scallions. ; name: chinese chicken ; ingredients: chicken parts, soya sauce, water, sugar, ginger, garlic, onion powder, dry mustard, pepper ; preparation:Put chicken in roaster. Combine ingredients and pour over. Cover with lid. Bake 30 minutes at 350. Remove lid. Baste and cook 30 minutes longer uncovered. ; name: thai grilled chicken thighs ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, fresh basil, fresh coriander, ginger, garlic, chili, soy sauce, fish sauce, olive oil, brown sugar ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except chicken in a bowl. Mix thoroughly. Add chicken and leave to marinate at least one hour, preferably longer. Grill chicken on the bbq, hotplate or in the griller until golden brown and cooked through. Ususlly you would expect 12 thigh fillets to feed 4 to 6 people- in my family the kids eat 4 each so this recipe serves 3. ; name: teriyaki dump chicken oamc ; ingredients: soy sauce, sugar, red wine vinegar, vegetable oil, garlic clove, ground ginger, boneless skinless chicken breast, long grain rice ; preparation:Mix soy sauce, sugar, vinegar, oil, garlic, and ginger to make marinade. Freeze chicken in marinade in a 1-gallon freezer bag. When preparing to serve, thaw chicken. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Pour chicken and marinade into a baking dish that has been coated with nonstick cooking spray. Bake for 35 minutes. Prepare rice according to package directions. Serve chicken over rice. ; name: garlic glazed chicken ; ingredients: chicken breasts, garlic clove, vinegar, soy sauce, honey, dried red peppers, oil, green onion, sesame seeds, rice ; preparation:Cube chicken into bite-seize pieces. Fry over high heat, stirring often for 3-4 minutes. Add all other ingredients. Cook on mediun-high 15 minutes or until syrupy. Sprinkle with garnishes. Serve over hot rice. ; name: korean roast chicken thighs ; ingredients: chicken thighs, soy sauce, green onion, sesame oil, honey, garlic, ground ginger, black pepper ; preparation:

name: bed and breakfast sausage egg casserole ; ingredients: sausage, eggs, milk, salt, dry mustard, bread, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown sausage and drain. Beat the eggs with milk, salt, and mustard. Layer bread cubes in the bottom of a buttered 9 by 13-inch casserole dish. Crumble the sausage over the bread and top with cheese. Pour the egg mixture over all. Refrigerate overnight. Bake in 350 degree oven for 30-40 minutes. When using a glass casserole, bake in 325 degree oven for 45-60 minutes. This is really good with a little bit of maple syrup on top. ; name: ann s egg sausage casserole ; ingredients: little smokies sausage, spicy bulk sausage, white bread, milk, eggs, dry mustard, salt, american cheese ; preparation:Cut smokies in small pieces. Fry bulk sausage breaking into small pieces, and drain. Beat eggs, and add remaining ingredients. Mix all together and put in a 9x13 casserole dish. Cover with foil and refrigerate overnight. Bake covered for 55 minutes. Remove cover and bake 5-10 minutes more. Let set 5-10 minutes after removing, so eggs can set. ; name: easy breakfast egg casserole ; ingredients: white bread, bulk pork sausage, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Grease a 13x9-inch baking pan. Place bread in the bottom and sprinkle with sausage and cheese. Beat eggs, milk, salt and pepper with a whisk. Pour over the bread mixture. Bake 40-45 minutes or until eggs are set in the center and lightly browned. ; name: country club eggs a great make ahead breakfast casserole ; ingredients: pork sausage, eggs, white bread, salt, dry mustard, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown sausage in skillet, stirring until browned and crumbled. Then drain. Combine all ingredients in a large bowl and mix well. Pour mixture into a greased 9x13 casserole dish. Regfrigerate at least 8 hours or overnight. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake for 45 minutes or until center tests done. ; name: ninja turtle pizzas ; ingredients: english muffins, pizza sauce, cheese, pepperoni ; preparation:Place english muffins on a baking dish. Place pizza sauce, cheese, and your favoirte toppings on the english muffins. Cook at 350 degrees for about 15-20 minutes or until brown. You can also cook in a toaster oven. My kids only like the pepperoni but my husband and i we put it all on- pepperoni, black and green olives, green peppers, pineapple, tomatoes, just whatever. Enjoy. ; name: club sandwich ; ingredients: bread, mayonnaise, american cheese, ham, tomatoes, lettuce, crisp bacon, monterey jack cheese, deli turkey ; preparation:Spread mayonnaise on one side of a piece of toast. Add layer of american cheese, ham, two slices of tomato, two leaves of lettuce, and two pieces of bacon. Spread mayonnaise on second piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on top of that second piece of toast. Layer monterey jack cheese, the rest of the tomatoes, lettuce, turkey and bacon on top. Spread mayonnaise on third piece of toast and place on the stack mayo side down. Slice the sandwich in quarters diagonally. Skewers or long toothpicks may be used to hold all the layers together. ; name: tsr version of mcdonald s filet o fish sandwich by todd wilbur ; ingredients: mayonnaise, sweet relish, onions, salt, hamburger buns, breaded fish fillets, american cheese ; preparation:In a small bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, relish, minced onion, and salt and set aside. This is your tartar sauce. Lightly grill the faces of the buns. Cook the fish according to the package instructions. You can bake the fish, but your sandwich will taste much more like the original if you fry it in oil. Divide the tartar sauce and spread it evenly on each of the top buns. Place a slice of cheese on each of the bottom buns. Place the cooked fish on top of the cheese slice on each sandwich, and top off the sandwiches with the top buns. ; name: just like mc donald s sausage egg mc muffin copycat ; ingredients: sausage patties, english muffins, cheddar cheese, eggs, margarine, oil ; preparation:

name: orange beef and rice ; ingredients: oil, top round beef, onion, garlic cloves, sliced mushrooms, carrot, rice pilaf mix, orange juice, beef broth ; preparation:Briefly heat oil in large, deep pot over medium-high heat. Add beef and onion. Cook, stirring frequently, for 5 minutes. Add garlic, mushrooms and carrots. Cook another 5 minutes. Add pilaf mix, orange juice and beef broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 20 minutes or until liquid has been absorbed. ; name: three step stroganoff ; ingredients: boneless round steak, vegetable oil, cream of mushroom soup, water, onion soup mix, sour cream, cooked noodles ; preparation:Slice round steak into thin strips and stir-fry in oil until no longer pink. Stir in soup, water and onion soup mix. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes. Stir in sour cream, heat through. Serve over noodles. ; name: minute steaks with taco sauce ; ingredients: butter, vegetable oil, minute steaks, button mushrooms, taco sauce, fresh parsley, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Heat the butter and oil in a frying pan. Season the steaks with salt and pepper and fry for 1 minute on each side on fairly high heat. Place the cooked steaks into a serving dish and place in the oven to keep warm. Add mushrooms to the pan. Cook on high heat and lightly brown. Remove from pan and place in oven to keep warm. Pour the taco sauce in the pan and simmer for about 1 minute. Place the mushrooms and steaks on a plate and pour the taco sauce over the steaks. Garnish with the parsley. Serve. ; name: steak in pizzaiola sauce ; ingredients: top round beef, diced tomatoes, garlic, olive oil, dried oregano, salt, hot pepper sauce, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place oil and garlic in large skillet over medium heat for 2-3 minutes or until garlic is golden brown. Press down on garlic to release juices, then discard garlic. Add steaks to skillet and cook 1-2 minutes or until steaks are done, turning once. Place steaks on serving platter. Add tomatoes, oregano, salt and hot pepper sauce to skillet. Bring to a boil. Boil, stirring occasionally, 4-5 minutes or until sauce is slightly thickened. Stir in parsley. Pour sauce over steaks and serve. ; name: easy hamburger stew ; ingredients: lean ground beef, garlic, onion, potatoes, carrots, kernel corn, cream of mushroom soup, water, salt and pepper, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Saute ground beef, garlic and onion. Add potatoes, carrots and corn. Stir in soup, water and seasonings. Cover and simmer until veggies are tender. Serve over steamed white rice. ; name: chinese steak crock pot ; ingredients: onion, olive oil, top sirloin steaks, ground pepper, garlic salt, beef broth, onion soup mix, diced tomatoes, five-spice powder ; preparation:Slice onion and put on bottom of crock pot. Season the steak with pepper and garlic salt. Heat the oil in a skillet and lightly brown the steak. When done, place steak on onions in crock pot. In a bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Pour over top of steak. Cook 4-6 hours depending on your crock pot or until steak is tender. Serve over noodles or rice. ; name: carolina panthers cheese dip ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, garlic cloves, pepper, velveeta cheese, cream of mushroom soup, pace picante sauce, jalapeno pepper ; preparation:Cook beef, onion and garlic in large skillet until well browned. Drain grease. Add remaining ingredients. Cook on medium till cheese is melted and mixture is heated through. Stir often. Serve warm with corn chips, nachos, potato chips, etc. This same recipe may be made in a crock pot. ; name: beef mushroom dijon ; ingredients: boneless beef top sirloin steak, vegetable oil cooking spray, sliced mushrooms, onion, cream of mushroom soup, water, dijon-style mustard, cooked rice, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: quick pickles ; ingredients: sugar, vinegar, salt, celery salt, dill seed, cucumbers, onion ; preparation:Stir sugar in the vinegar until dissolved. Add salt, celery salt, and dill seed, mixing together. Pour over cucumbers and onions. Stir and push under liquid. Let stand for 24 hours. Put in jars and refrigerate. No need to can, just keep in refrigerator. They will keep indefinetely in refrigerator. ; name: green beans with pan roasted red onions thanksgiving ; ingredients: water, green beans, olive oil, red onions, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Bring water to a boil in a large saucepan. Add beans and cook 6 minutes or until crisp tender. Drain, keep warm. Heat oil in large, non-stick skillet over medium-high heat, add onions and saute 8 minutes for until browned. Add broth. Cook 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in vinegar and remaining ingredients. Stir in beans. Cover and cook 2 minutes. ; name: easy sweet and sour red cabbage saute ; ingredients: oil, onion, apple, red cabbage, apple cider vinegar, sugar, celery seed, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add in onion and saute until golden. Add in sliced cabbage, cider vinegar, sugar, celery seeds and black pepper. Mix to combine and cook until the cabbage if crisp-tender and the liquid is reduced to a glaze. Season with salt. ; name: simple pecan cranberry coleslaw ; ingredients: coleslaw, green onion, dried cranberries, pecans, mayonnaise, sugar, red wine vinegar, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a small bowl, whisk together dressing ingredients. Combine salad ingredients in a large bowl. Pour dressing over salad mixture and toss well to coat. Allow salad to chill for at least 20 minutes before serving. Salad may not require all of the dressing. ; name: vegan salad nicoise ; ingredients: french beans, potatoes, tomatoes, cider vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, mustard powder, sea salt, black pepper, capers, olives ; preparation:Cook the beans and potatoes seperately in boiling water. Leave to cool and slice them. Quarter the tomatoes and arrange them with the beans and potatoes on individual salad plates. Combine the oil, vinegar, mustard and seasoning then pour over the salad. Chop the olives finely, combine them with the capers and sprinkle this over the salad. ; name: authentic bavarian potato salad ; ingredients: potato, hot chicken broth, white vinegar, salt, pepper, sugar, oil, onions, butter, chives ; preparation:Boil the potatoes, slice while still warm and add broth. Mix vinegar with salt, pepper and sugar. Sugar and salt should be dissolved before adding the oil. Add marinade to the potatoes. Add onions and finally the melted butter. Garnish with chives or parsley. If you want to add cucumber, thinly slice them and salt. Drain before adding to the salad. ; name: cucumber carrot salad ; ingredients: cucumbers, seasoning salt, carrot, rice wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Combine cucumbers and salt in large mixing bowl. Toss to coat. Let stand at room temperature 15 minutes. Rinse salt off of cucumbers and return to bowl. Add carrot. In a small bowl mix together remaining ingredients. Pour over cucumber mixture and toss well to coat. Cover and refrigerate at least four hours. ; name: bavarian german potato salad ; ingredients: onion, cucumber, radishes, all-purpose flour, cider vinegar, water, salt, ground pepper, potatoes ; preparation:

name: lemon chicken with olives ; ingredients: boneless chicken thighs, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, diced tomatoes, lemon, brown sugar, oregano, kalamata olive, salt & pepper ; preparation:Fry off chicken until browned, about 5 minutes. Put aside and keep warm. In the same fry pan, fry off onions and garlic. Cook til transparent or soft, about 3 minutes. Stir often. Add chicken back to the pan. Add tomatoes, lemon slices, sugar and oregano. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer uncovered 40 minutes. It is ready when the sauce is thickened and the chicken is cooked through. Stir in olives in the last few minutes. Season with salt and pepper, if needed. ; name: honey balsamic chicken satay great for camping ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic cloves, honey, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, crushed red pepper flakes, ranch dressing ; preparation:Cut each chicken breast into 3 or 4 long strips. Combine all other ingredients in a small bowl and whisk until combined. Place chicken in ziploc bag and add marinade. Marinate for at least one hour. Thread chicken onto bamboo skewers. Grill over medium to hot coals or fire until juices run clear. ; name: garlic dill rice ; ingredients: minced garlic cloves, olive oil, rice, chicken broth, dill weed, salt, onion powder ; preparation:In a large skillet, saute garlic in hot olive oil until softened. Add rice and saute for 2 minutes over high heat. Add broth and seasonings and bring back to a boil. Lower heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until done. Fluff and mix rice and allow to stand uncovered for a few minutes before serving. ; name: sweet spicy garlic grilled chicken thighs ; ingredients: chicken thighs, pepper jelly, garlic cloves, fresh parsley, dried italian herb seasoning, oil, seasoning salt ; preparation:Combine jelly, garlic, herbs, and oil. Spread mixture between skin and meat of each thigh. Place in a large ziplock bag with thighs. Refrigerate overnight. Prepare grill. Remove chicken sprinkle lightly seasoned salt. Cook marinade for 5 minutes over medium low flame. Grill 25-30 minutes, turning occasionally until cooked throughout. Discard skin if you want before serving. Top with spicy marinade. ; name: black olive mayonnaise ; ingredients: garlic cloves, pitted black olives, flat leaf parsley, mayonnaise, fresh lemon juice, salt, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Place the garlic cloves into the bowl of a food processor and pulse until finely chopped. Add the olives and parsley and pulse again until the mix is almost a puree. Add the mayonnaise, lemon juice and salt and pulse until just combined. With the processor running, add the olive oil in a stream. Pour into a bowl and chill until ready to use. Great served with sandwiches, over toast, flatbread, pita chips, etc. ; name: bulghur pilav ; ingredients: onion, olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, dried basil, bay leaf, rosemary, bulgur, warm water ; preparation:In a covered saucepan, saute the onions in the olive oil for a few minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the salt, pepper, basil, bay leaf, and rosemary or marjoram. Cover and cook for about 10 minutes, unil the onions are translucent and beginning to brown. Stir in the bulghur. Toast for about 2 minutes, until the bulghur begins to darken. Add the water, cover tightly, and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to very low. Let the bulghur steam for about 15 minutes. Each grain should be separate and tender, but not chewy. Add a little more water if the bulghur seems underdone, but be sparing, or it will become mushy. Remove the bay leaf and serve hot. ; name: mini chicken burgers with herbs ; ingredients: panko breadcrumbs, ground chicken, garlic cloves, parsley, dried oregano, dried basil, lemon juice, salt & freshly ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Place bread crumbs in a small, shallow dish. Mix chicken, garlic, parsley, oregano, basil and lemon juice. Add salt and pepper. Form into 16 patties, each flattened and 2 inches in diameter. Press into bread crumbs to coat each side. In large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon oil over medium heat. Add as many patties as will fit in a single layer and cook, turning once, until each side is brown and patties firm up, about 10 minutes. Repeat with remaining patties, adding more oil if necessary. Serve hot. ; name: crock pot balsamic chicken ; ingredients: garlic powder, dried basil, salt, pepper, instant minced onion, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, boneless skinless chicken thighs, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: sugarless apple cookies ; ingredients: dates, apple, raisins, water, all-purpose flour, ground cinnamon, baking soda, eggs, artificial sweetener ; preparation:In a large saucepan, combine dates, apple, raisins and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 3 minutes. Remove from heat and cool. Combine flour, cinnamon and baking soda. Stir into apple mixture and mix well. Combine eggs and sweetener. Add to batter and mix well. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto a nonstick baking sheet. Bake at 350 degrees for 10 minutes. ; name: donna s chinese chews ; ingredients: flour, sugar, dates, salt, eggs, nuts ; preparation:Mix flour, sugar, dates, salt and nuts together. Add 2 eggs and mix throughly. Spread into an 8x8 inch greased pan. Bake at 325 for 40 minute. When cooled make into balls and roll in sugar. ; name: old fashioned walnut bread ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, shortening, milk, vanilla, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Sift flour, sugar, baking powder and salt into large bowl. Add egg, shortning, milk and vanilla. Stir until all is moistened. Stir in the walnuts. Bake in a 9x5 loaf pan for 1 hour, 20 minutes, or until toothpick comes out clean. ; name: ghirardelli brownies ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, vanilla, butter, ghirardelli sweet ground chocolate and cocoa, flour, baking powder, salt, walnuts, milk chocolate chips ; preparation:Grease a 8x8 inch baking pan and set aside. Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a medium bowl stir together the eggs, sugar and vanilla. Mix well. Add butter mixing to incorporate. Sift the ground chocolate with the flour, baking powder and salt. Stir into the egg mixture and add the walnuts. Spread into the prepared baking pan. Bake for 20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: date walnut scones ; ingredients: self raising flour, table salt, caster sugar, dates, walnuts, lemon, milk, cream, eggs, plain flour ; preparation:Prehaeat fan forced oven to 180c. Sift the flour, salt and sugar into a bowl. Add the dates, walnuts and lemon zest & mix lightly. Make a well in the centre of the mixture and set bowl aside. Whisk the milk, cream and the eggs in a seperate small bowl and pour the milk mixture into the flour mixture. Using your finger. Press dough lightly using finger. Gently roll out the dough until 2-3cm thick then using a 5-6cm scone cutter cut the dough into rounds. Place rounds on a non stick baking tray and brush each round with a little milk. Bake scones for 20 minutes or until golden. Serve warm with favourite topping. ; name: toffee pecan blondies ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, butter, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, toffee pieces, pecans, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Butter a 10 x 15 pan and set aside. In medium bowl combine flour, baking powder & salt. Set aside. In large bowl beat butter, sugar & vanilla. Slowly beat in eggs. On low speed gradually add in flour mixture. Stir in toffee & pecans. Spread in pan. Bake 20-25 minutes. Let cool & cut. You can drizzle melted chocolate chips over if desired. ; name: old farmer s almanac butterscotch icebox cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, salt, baking powder, nuts ; preparation:Cream together butter and brown sugar until light. Add egg and vanilla, and mix well. Stir together flour, salt, and baking powder and add to sugar-egg-butter mix, mixing well. Stir in nuts. Form dough into a 2-inch-diameter log and wrap in foil or waxed paper. Chill for 12 to 24 hours. Slice and bake on ungreased cookie sheets at 400 degrees f for 8 to 10 minutes. ; name: date fruitcake ; ingredients: dates, walnut pieces, candied cherry, flour, salt, baking powder, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract ; preparation:

name: fried jack ; ingredients: monterey jack cheese, milk, flour, seasoned bread crumbs, vegetable oil, salsa ; preparation:Cut cheese into rectangular sticks or one inch cubes. Place the cheese pieces in a bowl and pour the milk over the cheese, coating thoroughly. Remove cheese from milk and coat with flour. Quickly dip in milk again and roll each piece in bread crumbs. In a medium to large saucepan, heat 2 to 3 inches of oil to med-high heat. Quickly fry a few pieces of cheese at a time, about 1 minute or until golden. Remove with slotted spoon and drain on paper towels. Serve with salsa, if desired. ; name: lazy day brunch casserole crustless quiche ; ingredients: broccoli, tomatoes, monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese, milk, flour, eggs, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix milk, flour and eggs well. Add the remaining ingredients and pour into 8 x 8 greased baking dish. Bake for 40-45 minutes. Let sit 10 minutes before serving. ; name: individual cheesy bacon wrapped eggs ; ingredients: bacon, butter, cheddar cheese, eggs, black pepper, salt, english muffins, salsa ; preparation:Set oven to 350 degrees. Set oven rack to second-lowest position. Spray inside of each muffin tin with cooking spray. In a skillet cook the bacon slices over medium heat until brown but still flexible. Wrap 1 slice of bacon around the inside of each muffin cup. Drizzle about 2 teaspoons melted butter into the inside of each cup. Sprinkle about 1 tablespoons grated cheese over the melted butter, then crack 1 egg over the cheese. Season the egg with black pepper and a little salt. Bake for about 10-15 minutes. Remove then top with another tablespoon of grated cheese on top of the egg. Return to oven until the cheese has melted and the egg is cooked. ; name: aloha sandwiches ; ingredients: bacon, white bread, pineapple, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook bacon until evenly brown. Drain and set aside. Place 8 slices of toast on a baking sheet. Place a slice of pineapple, two slices of bacon and a slice of cheese on each. Broil until cheese is melted. Serve hot. ; name: grilled ham n jack cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: butter, texas toast thick bread, sharp cheddar cheese, deli ham, red onions, ranch dressing, monterey jack pepper cheese ; preparation:Butter one side of each slice of texas toast. On the unbuttered sides of four slices, layer cheddar cheese, half of the ham, onion if desired and remaining ham. Spread with ranch dressing. Top with pepper jack cheese and remaining toast, buttered side up. On a hot griddle, cook sandwiches for 3 - 4 minutes or until bottoms of sandwiches are browned. Carefully turn. Cook 2 minutes longer or until cheese is melted. ; name: andreas fault bagel sandwich ; ingredients: bagel, egg, avocado, sun-dried tomatoes, red onions, monterey jack cheese, alfalfa sprout, cooked bacon, salt & pepper ; preparation:Split bagel in half and toast lightly. Meanwhile, scramble eggs and cook in a small frying pan sprayed with nonstick cooking spray until done, trying to keep the eggs in one large piece. Butter bagel if desired and place cooked egg on top of one half. Top with a sprinkling of cheese, a slice of red onion, some avocado slices, and the sun-dried tomatoes. Top with bacon strips and alfalfa sprouts if desired. Season to taste with some salt and pepper. Place remaining bagel half on top and cut into two halves. Serve warm. ; name: bacon cheese and tomato dreams ; ingredients: bread, american cheese, tomatoes, bacon ; preparation:Cook the bacon. Drain. Get the cheese ready. Slice the tomato. Put the bread under the broiler till brown. Turn over. Put the slice of cheese on the bread, and then top with the tomatoes. Put back under the broiler. Take out and put on a plate. Sprinkle with a tad of salt and pepper. Top with bacon. Enjoy. ; name: bacon and tomato grilled cheese sandwich ; ingredients: cooked bacon, butter, bread, monterey jack pepper cheese, tomatoes ; preparation:

name: nana s sugar cream pie ; ingredients: sugar, flour, salt, whipping cream, milk, vanilla, cinnamon, butter, unbaked pie shell ; preparation:Mix sugar, flour and salt together. Add cream, milk and vanilla. Pour mixture into a 9 inch unbaked pie shell. Sprinkle with cinnamon and dot with butter. Bake in 425 f oven for 10 mins. Reduce heat to 350 f and bake for 1 hr 15 mins. ; name: rumrunner s pecan pie ; ingredients: eggs, all-purpose flour, dark corn syrup, sugar, rum, butter, vanilla, pecans, deep dish pie shells ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In large bowl beat eggs with wire whisk. Add flour and continue to whisk until it has been incorporated. Add corn syrup, sugar, rum, butter and vanilla. Stir in pecans. Evenly divide mixture between frozen pie crusts. Bake 50-55 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Let cool at room temp on wire rack. ; name: keebler cherry crunch pie ; ingredients: graham cracker pie crusts, cherry pie filling, cornstarch, water, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, all-purpose flour, quick-cooking oats, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Mix cornstarch and water to form paste. In a bowl, mix paste and pie filling, then spoon into prepared crust. Combine sugar, flour and oats in another bowl. Mix in melted butter, then spoon this onto filling. Bake on baking sheet for 40 minutes. Cool for at least four hours before serving. Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: basic pancakes ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, milk, unsalted butter, egg, vegetable oil ; preparation:In a small bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder and salt, set aside. In a medium bowl, whisk together milk, butter and egg. Add dry ingredients to milk mixture, whisk until just moistened. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium. Fold a sheet of paper towel in half and moisten with oil, carefully rub skillet with oiled paper towel. For each pancake, spoon 2 to 3 tablepoons of batter onto skillet, using the back of the spoon to spread batter into a round. Cook until surface of pancakes have some bubbles and a few have burst, 1 to 2 minutes. Flip carefully with a thin spatula and cook until browned on the underside, 1 to 2 minutes more. Serve warm, with desired toppings. ; name: cherry orange cobbler ; ingredients: cherry pie filling, mandarin orange sections, all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, salt, unsalted butter, egg, whole milk, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. In medium saucepan, combine cherry pie filling & oranges, & bring to boil, then reduce heat to simmer & keep hot. Whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder & salt, then cut in butter until coarse. Whisk together the egg & milk, then add to flour mixture, stirring just to moisten. Pour hot filling into a 1. 5 or 2 quart baking dish. Immediately spoon on the biscuit topping in 6 mounds. Combine the 2 tablespoons of sugar & cinnamon, & sprinkle over the biscuits. Bake 20 minutes, until browned. Serve warm. ; name: chocolate chip and peanut cookies ; ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, all-purpose flour, salt, baking soda, semisweet chocolate piece, peanuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Cream butter and sugars. Add egg, vanilla, and beat until light and fluffy. Sift together flour, salt and baking soda. Stir into creamed mixture. Blend well. Add chocolate pieces and peanuts and stir by hand. Drop from teaspoon about 2 inches apart on a greased cookie sheet. Bake in 375f oven for 12 minutes. Remove from sheet immediately. ; name: cinnamon thins ; ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, egg, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add egg and beat well. Combine flour with baking powder and salt. Add to creamed mixture and mix well. Drop onto greased cookie sheet in marble-sized balls. Press flat with bottom of greased glass dipped in the sugar-cinnamon mixture. Bake in 350f oven 10 minutes. Remove from cookie sheet and cool. ; name: rhubarb custard pie ; ingredients: sugar, all-purpose flour, ground nutmeg, salt, eggs, rhubarb, butter, pie crusts ; preparation:

name: nick s famous fluffy rice and chicken casserole ; ingredients: cream soup, milk, long grain brown rice, mushrooms, dried onion flakes, chicken ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Mix soup and milk, reserving one cup. Pour remainder into ungreased 13x9 cake or casserole pan. Add rice, mushrooms and minced onion to the soup-milk, mixing well. Lay chicken pieces over rice-soup-milk mixture, pour reserved milk over the top of the chicken. Cover with foil, sealing edges tightly. Bake for one hour.
