Uncover and bake until golden & bubbly. ; name: sarah s chicken pot pie ; ingredients: low-fat cream of chicken soup, low-fat milk, honey, frozen vegetables, pie crust, cooked chicken ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Open pie crusts and let sit out to soften. Spray pie pan with nonstick cooking spray. In large mixing bowl - mix soup, milk, honey, vegetables together. Unroll 1 crust into pie dish. Pour in mix. Unroll 2nd pie crust on top. Pinch edges together. Poke 5-8 knife marks in center of crusts. Bake at 350 for 75 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and enjoy. ; name: slow cooker chicken biscuits ; ingredients: cooked chicken, condensed cream of mushroom soup, condensed cream of chicken soup, water, chicken bouillon granules, fresh ground black pepper, refrigerated buttermilk biscuits ; preparation:Combine chicken, canned soups, water, bouillon and pepper in slow cooker. Cut biscuits into quarters. Stir into mixture. Cover. Cook on low 4 to 6 hours, stirring occasionally, or until biscuits are cooked. ; name: caroline s quick chicken and dumplings ; ingredients: water, cooked chicken, cream of chicken soup, chicken bouillon granules, seasoned pepper, refrigerated buttermilk biscuits ; preparation:In a large pot, bring first 5 ingredients to a boil over medium-high heat. Stir often. Separate each biscuit in half, making 2 rounds per biscuit. Cut each round in half. Drop biscuit pieces, 1 at a time, into boiling broth mixture. Stir. Place cover on pot, turn heat to low, and simmer, stirring occasionally for 15 to 30 minutes or until dumplings are desired doneness. ; name: cheesy chicken and rice bake ; ingredients: cream of chicken soup, water, white rice, onion powder, ground black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, cheddar cheese, salt & pepper ; preparation:Mix soup, water, rice, onion powder and black pepper in 2-qt shallow baking dish. Top with chicken. Sprinkle chicken with additional pepper & salt. Cover and bake at 375 for 45 min or until chicken is no longer pink and rice is done. Uncover and sprinkle cheese over chicken. ; name: cauliflower ham chowder ; ingredients: cauliflower, chicken broth, cream of chicken soup, half-and-half cream, fresh ground pepper, cornstarch, cold water, cooked ham, chives ; preparation:In a large saucepan, cook the cauliflower in the chicken broth for 4 minutes or until tender-crisp. Stir in cream of chicken soup, half and half and pepper. Combine the cornstarch and water until smooth. Gradudally stir into cauliflower mixture. Bring to a boil, cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Reduce heat. Add ham. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until heated through. Garnish with chives. ; name: easy shrimp etouffee ; ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, cream of celery soup, rotel tomatoes & chilies, onion, green bell pepper, shrimp, butter, white rice ; preparation:Melt butter in large saucepan. Saut veggies until crisp-tender. Add soups & tomatoes. Simmer 45 minutes, then add shrimp, cook until pink. Serve over hot white rice. ; name: cornbread chicken pot pie ; ingredients: cream of chicken soup, whole kernel corn, cooked chicken, corn muffin mix, milk, egg ; preparation:

name: pasta shells with chicken and broccoli ; ingredients: oil, broccoli, onion, garlic cloves, carrot, cooked chicken, salt, tomatoes, pasta shells, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in a 10-inch skillet over medium heat. Cook broccoli, onion, garlic and carrot in oil about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until broccoli is crisp- tender. Stir in chicken, salt, and tomatoes. Cook about 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, just until chicken is hot. Toss with pasta. Sprinkle with cheese and parsley. ; name: zuppa di broccoli broccoli soup ; ingredients: garlic, extra virgin olive oil, broccoli florets, chicken broth, roma tomatoes, white wine, fresh basil ; preparation:In saute pan, saute garlic with oil until brown. Add broccoli and tomatoes and stir. Cool for 1 minute, then add wine and broth. Bring to boil 2 to 3 minutes. Serve immediately. Add basil for garnish. ; name: sun dried tomato and rocket pesto pasta ; ingredients: sun-dried tomato, garlic cloves, pine nuts, rocket, basil leaves, parmesan cheese, olive oil, cooked pasta ; preparation:Place the tomatoes, garlic, half of the pinenuts, rocket and basil in a food processor and process until smooth. Toast the remaining pinenuts until golden. Set aside. Slowly add the oil to the basil mixture while the processor is running. Turn the processor off and then stir through the parmesan. Stir pesto through the pasta then sprinkle with the reserved pinenuts. Serve immediately with salad and crusty bread. ; name: avocado cream pasta ; ingredients: spaghetti, lemon, avocado, garlic cloves, olive oil, pepper, parsley, salt, black olives ; preparation:Put garlic lemon juice zest and oil in blender. Add parsley. Add peeled avocado add salt and pepper and blend. Top pasta and toss garnish. Top with olives. ; name: penne pasta with tomatoes and cheese ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, plum tomatoes, dried basil, ground red pepper, chicken broth, penne pasta, havarti cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat 3 tbsp oil in pan. Saute onion and garlic. Mix in tomatoes, basil and ground red pepper. Bring to a boil, breaking up tomatoes. Add broth and boil. Reduce heat and simmer about 1 hour. Cook pasta and drain. Toss with 3 tbsp oil. Mix pasta with sauce and then mix in havarti cheese. Put into 9x13 baking dish and sprinkle top with parmesan cheese. Bake in 375 oven about 30 minutes. Of this recipe will easily serve 4. ; name: stuffed and barbecued tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, herbs, fresh parmesan cheese, garlic cloves, olive oil, pepper ; preparation:Have grill preheated to medium. Cut tomatoes in half crosswise. Remove and discard seeds. In a bowl combine the herbs, cheese, garlic, oil, and pepper medley. Fill the tomatoes with the mixture. Grill the tomatoes until tender and the cheese is starting to melt, 8- 10 minutes. Remove from bbq using a flat spatula. Enjoy. ; name: pasta shells with broccoli anchovies ; ingredients: head broccoli, pasta shells, olive oil, garlic cloves, anchovies packed in oil, red chili peppers, lemon, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook the broccoli in a pan of boiling water for 3 mins, then drain, reserving the cooking water. Cook the pasta in the same water as the broccoli according to pack instructions. Heat the oil in a pan, then fry garlic until lightly golden. Remove garlic, then set aside. Add anchovies, chili and half a cup of pasta cooking water to the pan. Cook for 2 mins, until the liquid has reduced by half and the anchovies have broken down. Stir in the broccoli and a squeeze of lemon juice, then cook for 1 min, until the broccoli has warmed through. Drain the pasta then toss everything together. Serve scattered with parmesan. ; name: chicken and broccoli spaghetti ; ingredients: broccoli florets, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh lemon juice, cooked chicken, basil leaves, ground black pepper, thin spaghetti, tomatoes, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: fresh green beans with gingered walnuts ; ingredients: canola oil, soy sauce, gingerroot, garlic clove, walnut halves, green beans, fresh lime juice, olive oil, cilantro leaf ; preparation:Preheat oven to 250 degrees. On a baking sheet spread the canola oil and heat up in the oven. Once the pan is hot, remove from oven and add the soy sauce, fresh ginger, garlic and walnut halves. Stir to coat. Bake, stirring occasionally, for about 25 minutes, or until walnuts are browned and crisp. Remove the pan from the oven and set the nuts on a paper towel to drain and cool. In a medium saucepan, steam the green beans for approximately 5 minutes, or until crisp-tender. Drain and toss the beans with the toasted walnuts, lime juice and olive oil in a serving bowl. Garnish with cilantro leaves if desired. ; name: stir crazy pork and papaya ; ingredients: vegetable oil, unsalted cashews, red chile, garlic cloves, pork fillets, greens, lime, juice and zest of, soy sauce, papaya, brown rice ; preparation:Heat 1 tablespoon of the vegetable oil in a wok over medium heat. Add the cashews and gently toss until golden brown. Remove with a perforated spoon and set aside. Heat the remaining tablespoon of oil. Add the chilli and garlic, and stir-fry for 1 minute. Raise the heat and add the pork, greens and lime zest. Fry for a few minutes until pork begins to colour. Add the lime juice, soy sauce and papaya. Heat through for 1 minute, stirring. Return the cashews to the wok and toss to mix. ; name: griddled marinated eggplant with feta and herbs ; ingredients: eggplants, olive oil, lemon, juice of, garlic clove, feta cheese, flat leaf parsley, cilantro ; preparation:Heat a griddle or frying pan until very hot. Brush the egggplant with a little oil and griddle or fry in batches until soft and cooked through. Arrange eggplant on a platter. Mix together the lemon and garlic with 5 tbsp olive oil and some seasoning, and drizzle over the aubergine. Let the flavors meld together for 5 minutes, then scatter the feta and herbs over and serve. ; name: sonoma diet hummus ; ingredients: garbanzo beans, tahini, water, lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, kosher salt, cumin seed, cayenne pepper, fresh flat-leaf parsley ; preparation:In a food processor combine garbanzo beans, tahini, the water, the 2 tablespoons lemon juice, the oil, garlic, kosher salt, cumin seeds, and cayenne pepper. Cover and process until smooth. Transfer to a medium bowl. Stir in the 1 tablespoon parsley. If desired, stir in additional lemon juice to taste. Garnish with additional parsley. Serve with baked pita chips or vegetable dippers, or use as a spread in a grilled vegetable sandwich. Add seeds. Cook about 2 minutes or until toasted and aromatic, shaking skillet frequently. Place toasted seeds in a spice grinder and process until finely ground. ; name: tahina parsley salad ; ingredients: tahini, garlic cloves, green chili, salt, lemon, juice of, flat leaf parsley, water ; preparation:Add tahina in a bowl. Add lemon juice to bowl and stir well. Add in the water mix till incoperated. Add salt, garlic and chili. Add parsley. Serve with fish, grilled meat, rice dishes and falafals. ; name: curry currant hummus ; ingredients: chickpeas, olive oil, garlic cloves, curry powder, lemon juice, water, salt, dried currant ; preparation:Combine chick peas, olive oil, crushed garlic, curry powder, lemon juice and water in a food processor or blender. Puree until smooth. Add salt to taste. Transfer to a bowl and gently stir in currants by hand. Cover with plastic wrap and chill at least 4 hour for flavours to blend. ; name: lou s bean spread ; ingredients: butter beans, lemon, juice of, salt, black pepper, garlic cloves, paprika, hot pepper, kalamata olive, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Drop garlic into a running food processor. Stop the processor, add 2 tablespoons olive oil and lemon juice. Process to get garlic chopped finer. Add beans, salt and pepper. Process to a smooth paste. With the processor running, slowly add a stream of olive oil until mixture is smooth. Transfer to a bowl and stir in peppers and olives. Drizzle with olive oil and dust with the dulce paprika. Serve with toasted pita chips. ; name: chicken on lemongrass skewers ; ingredients: lemongrass, peanut oil, lime rind, coriander leaves, chicken breasts, lime juice, birds eye chiles, macadamia nut oil, raw sugar, garlic clove ; preparation:

name: baked mostaccioli with peppers ; ingredients: vegetable oil, ground beef, green peppers, onion, pasta sauce, parmesan cheese, oregano, mozzarella cheese, mostaccioli pasta ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet. Brown the ground beef. Add the peppers and onions. Drain off any fat. Stir in pasta sauce, 2 tbs. Parmesan, oregano, 1 cup mozzarella, and pasta. Put mixture in a 13x9 baking dish. Sprinkle with remaining mozzarella and parmesan. Bake uncovered 30 minutes until hot and bubbly. ; name: mozzarella basil bruschetta ; ingredients: italian bread, extra virgin olive oil, tomatoes, fresh basil, fresh ground black pepper, salt, part-skim mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Cut each slice of bread in half. Place on an ungreased baking sheet and brush with oil. In small bowl, combine the tomato, basil, pepper and salt. Spoon 1 t over each piece of bread. Top with cheese and remaining tomato mixture. Bake at 375 degrees for 10-12 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: venison parmesan ; ingredients: steaks, parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, eggs, salt and black pepper, olive oil, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Mix together 3 tbsp. Parmesan cheese with 1 cup bread crumbs. In bowl, beat 2 eggs, salt and pepper to taste. Dip venison in eggs, then bread crumbs. Heat 6 tbsp. Olive oil in skillet till hot. Fry venison 5 mins. Each side till brown. Then place venison on a cookie sheet, spoon spaghetti sauce over venison and bake in 325 degree oven till tender, i usually bake 15 or 20 mins. Then add mozzeralla cheese and bake till cheese melts. ; name: italian sub stoup rachael ray ; ingredients: olive oil, sweet italian sausage, pepperoni, ham, green pepper, onion, diced tomatoes, chicken stock, gemelli pasta, arugula ; preparation:Place a soup pot on the stovetop and preheat to medium high. Add the olive oil and the sausage. Brown and crumble the sausage, drain off excess fat if necessary, then add the pepperoni and ham. Cook for two minutes. Add the bell peppers and onions and cook for two minutes more. Add the tomatoes and chicken stock and bring to a boil. Stir in the pasta and cook for 8 minutes. Stir the arugula into the stoup just before you serve it up. ; name: chicken breasts stuffed with spinach sun dried tomatoes ; ingredients: fresh spinach, sun-dried tomatoes with italian herbs, reduced-fat mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dried italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt, ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Coat a large nonstick skillet with nonstick cooking spray. Add the spinach, and cook over medium-high heat, 2 minutes, or until the spinach is wilted. Remove from heat, and toss in the sun-dried tomatoes, mozzarella and parmesan. Set aside. Cut a deep pocket into the thickest side of each piece of chicken, and stuff a quarter of the spinach mixture into each pocket. Close by pressing flesh together and securing with a wooden toothpick, if necessary. Combine the italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt and pepper, and sprinkles both sides of the chicken pieces with some of the mixture. Wipe out the skillet, add the olive oil, and preheat over medium-high heat. Add the chicken, and cook for 2 minutes on each side, or until nicely browned. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover and cook for about 8 minutes, turning occasionally, until the chicken is cooked through. Serve hot. ; name: hot pizza sub sandwich ; ingredients: italian bread, pizza sauce, italian seasoning, green pepper, deli ham, salami, pepperoni, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, american cheese ; preparation:Slice bread in half horizontally. Spread bottom half with pizza sauce, sprinkle with seasoning. Top with green pepper, ham, salami, pepperoni. And cheeses, replace bread top. Place on baking sheet. Bake 425 degrees for 12-15 minutes or until cheese is melted. If cooking on open grill-wrap in foil. If cooking on gas grill covered doesnt need foil. ; name: hoagie ; ingredients: italian bread, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, prepared mustard, roast beef, tomatoes, romaine lettuce ; preparation:Slice bread in half lengthwise and spread one side with mayo, the other side with mustard. Sprinkle cheddar on mayo side and mozz on mustard side. Spread meat on bread. Bake at 300 until cheese is melted. Add tomato and lettuce right before serving. Also good with avocado. ; name: kielbasa pasta casserole ; ingredients: ziti pasta, polish sausage, oil, italian-style stewed tomatoes, tomato sauce, dried oregano, fresh parsley, ground black pepper, italian style breadcrumbs, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:

name: avocado orange salad ; ingredients: navel oranges, orange juice, white wine vinegar, olive oil, red leaf lettuce, avocado, salt and pepper ; preparation:Combine orange juice, white wine vinegar, olive oil, salt and pepper. Set aside. In a seperate bowl, lightly toss segmented oranges, red leaf lettuce, and avocado. Pour vinegar dressing over all. Enjoy. ; name: mint iced tea ; ingredients: water, peppermint tea bags, orange pekoe tea bags, orange, zest of, mint leaves, whole cloves, superfine sugar, pink grapefruit juice, ice cube, mint sprig ; preparation:Bring water to boil in a tea kettle. In a large tea pot, place tea bags, orange zest, mint leaves and cloves and then pour boiling water over all. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Cover and let steep until cool. Strain tea through mesh strainer into a large pitcher filled with ice. Stir in grapefruit juice. Serve over ice in large glasses, garnished with mint sprigs, if desired. ; name: spicy mint tea ; ingredients: orange pekoe tea bag, mint sprigs, cayenne pepper, boiling water, white sugar, lemon juice, cinnamon stick, lemons ; preparation:Steep 1 tea bag, 6 mint stems and cayenne pepper in 2 cups of boiling water. Strain the mixture, keeping only the liquid. Add the sugar, lemon juice and cinnamon stick to the mint mixture and refrigerate. When ready to serve, remove the cinnamon stick and dilute the mint mixture with equal parts of water. Serve in a tall glass with ice, add a fresh mint sprig and a lemon slice for garnishing. ; name: alcohol free hot toddy ; ingredients: water, lemon, orange, cream of tartar, crystallized ginger, tabasco sauce, honey, ground cloves, lemon juice ; preparation:Place first five ingredients in a sauce pan and simmer for 20 minutes or so. Remove lemon and orange pieces. Add the rest of the ingredients and bring mixture to a boil. Strain, cool and bottle. Keep in refrigerator up to two weeks. Save ginger slices if you like and add to bottle. Add a small amount to a teacup and fill with hot water. ; name: spice tea ; ingredients: pineapple juice, lemon juice, water, brown sugar, cinnamon sticks, ground cloves, ground allspice, tea bags ; preparation:Combine juices and water in a saucepan, and bring to a boil. Add sugars and spices, and simmer for 20 minutes. Remove from heat, and add tea bags. Steep for about 10 minutes. Strain and serve, either hot or iced. ; name: fizzy raspberry citrus ice tea ; ingredients: tea bags, fresh raspberries, orange, lemon, boiling water, sugar, club soda, ice cube ; preparation:Place tea bags, berries, orange, lemon and sugar in a heat-proof pitcher or bowl. Pour boiling water over. Let steep 10 to 15 minutes, then remove tea bags. Let mixture cool to room temperature, then chill. You can either keep fruit in or strain it out, depending upon your preference. When ready to serve, fill a tall glass with ice. Pour in tea mixture to fill half way. Top off with club soda. ; name: orange iced tea ; ingredients: oranges, boiling water, tea bags, ice cube, honey ; preparation:With a vegetable peeler, peel each orange in a continuous spiral, removing only the outer colored layer of peel. In a large pitcher, pour boiling water over the tea bags and orange peel. Cover and steep 5 minutes. Remove tea bags. Chill tea mixture with peel in a covered container. To serve, remove the peel and pour iced tea over ice cubes in tall glasses. Sweeten to taste with honey. Garnish with orange slices and fresh mint leaves, if desired. ; name: honey citrus iced tea ; ingredients: tea bags, water, navel oranges, lemons, orange juice, lemon juice, honey, ginger ale ; preparation:

name: blender yeast rolls ; ingredients: skim milk, dry yeast, sugar, eggs, oil, flour, salt ; preparation:In a blender, combine the warm milk, yeast, sugar, eggs and oil. Cover and process on low speed for 30 seconds or until blended. In a large bowl, combine the flour and salt. Add the yeast mixture and stir with a spoon until combined. Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled in size, about 30 minutes. Stir dough down. Fill greased muffin cups half full. Cover and let rise ntil doubled, about 30 minutes. Bake at 350 for 18-20 minutes or until golden. Serve warm. ; name: whole wheat rolls ; ingredients: whole wheat bread flour, white bread flour, salt, sugar, non-fat powdered milk, yeast, vegetable oil, egg, warm water ; preparation:Combine ingredients in the order your bread maker calls for on dough cycle. Check on dough half way through needing adding a bit more flour or water as needed so dough is fairly tacky. Turn out onto greased cutting board and work with greased hands. Shape into 15 rolls and place in greased 9x13 pan making 5 rows of 3. Let rise 30-45 minutes or until doubled in size. Bake at 350 for 15-20 minutes. ; name: italian bread bread machine ; ingredients: water, olive oil, sugar, dry yeast, all-purpose flour, salt, egg white, cornmeal ; preparation:Add into bread machine container, warmed water, olive oil, sugar, yeast. Let yeast foam a bit. Dump in flour. Add salt on top of flour. Turn on bread machine to dough setting. Watch for the first bit and add flour as needed to get a good dough. Get cookie sheet ready by lightly oiling with olive oil and sprinkle on cornmeal. Form dough into loaf and set on cookie sheet with tea towel to cover until doubled in size. Preheat oven to 375f. Cut slits diagonally in loaf with sharp knife. Brush with egg white. Bake in preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown and when you knock the bottom of bread it sounds hollow. ; name: french bread loaf bread machine ; ingredients: warm water, flour, salt, sugar, active dry yeast, cornmeal ; preparation:Add all ingredients except cornmeal to your bread machine in the order listed. Use dough cycle only. Remove dough from bread machine and shape into loaf. Sprinkle with cornmeal. Let rise until double, about 1 hour. Bake at 450 degrees for 15-20 minutes or until the top is golden brown. ; name: jamilah s basic dough recipe ; ingredients: dry active yeast, warm water, sugar, all-purpose flour, salt, extra virgin olive oil, egg, milk ; preparation:Dissolve the sugar in the cup water. Sprinkle the yeast over the water and let ferment and bubble. In a large bowl combine the yeast, flour, salt, olive oil, egg, and warm milk. Knead until a soft dough is formed. Dough will be slightly sticky, so always make sure your hands have a little olive oil on them. Lightly grease the same bowl with olive oil. Return the dough to the bowl, cover with a clean cloth and leave in a warm dry place for at least 2 hours, until doubled. ; name: simple and standard pizza dough ; ingredients: active dry yeast, warm water, bread flour, water, salt, olive oil, honey ; preparation:Stir the yeast into the warm water to dissolve. Add the flour. Stir the remaining ingredients into the flour mixture. Knead with dough hook or by hand until smooth and elastic. Place dough in a lightly greased bowl and cover. Allow to rise in a warm place for 30 minutes. Punch down the dough and divide into portions. On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough into very thin rounds and top as desired. Bake at 400f until crisp and golden brown, approx 8-12 minutes. Rolled dough may be stored in the freezer. I have kept rolled dough in the freezer for several months with the only effect being a less puffy baked crust. ; name: metric jester s famous homemade bread ; ingredients: warm water, sugar, salt, fast rising yeast, extra virgin olive oil, flour ; preparation:Dissolve sugar and salt in warm water, then stir in yeast. Allow yeast mixture to sit for 5 to 10 min. Place flour into mixing bowl, making a hole in the centre. Drizzle oil over flour, and then combine yeast and flour mixes. Knead on a floured surface until it creates a ball. Place in bread pan and allow to rise 2 hours. If dough is double in size, preheat oven to 350f. Bake until golden. If using a breadmaker, be sure to follow the proper directions for your bread maker, however i suggest you dissolve the sugar and salt in the water first. ; name: best bread machine bread ; ingredients: warm water, white sugar, bread machine yeast, oil, skim milk powder, white bread flour, salt ; preparation:

name: sweet n sour onions ; ingredients: onion, water, ketchup, barbecue sauce, vinegar ; preparation:Coat 12 inch nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Heat over medium-high heat. Add onions and cook until golden, 5-7 minutes. Stir in water, ketchup, barbecue sauce and vinegar. Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally. ; name: carne adovada marinated pork ; ingredients: pork ribs, salt, garlic, whole leaf oregano, blended red chili sauce ; preparation:Sprinkle meat with salt. Add garlic and oregano to blended chili. Pour over meat and marinate in refrigerator 6-8 hours or overnight. Cook slowly on top of stove or in 350 oven until meat is done, about 1 hour. Thick slices of potatoes may be marinated with the meat. ; name: braised pork spareribs ; ingredients: vinegar, brown sugar, soya sauce, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, pork spareribs ; preparation:Brown spareribs in frying pan in small amount olive oil. Remove spareribs and place in oven proof pan. Add brown sugar, vinegar, soya sauce, ginger and garlic in frying pan and cook at low heat until melted and blended. Pour over ribs and cover with tight covered lid or tin foil. Cook at 350 for 1 hour and turn ribs. Continue for another hour. ; name: sticky pork with bok choy ; ingredients: oil, pork fillets, oyster sauce, honey, water, ginger, bok choy, green onions, coriander ; preparation:Heat large pan over medium heat. Add oil and pork, cook 3 minutes each side. In a bowl combine sauce, honey, water and ginger. Pour over pork. Bring to the boil, add bok choy and green onions. Cover with a lid and reduce heat. Simmer 7 minutes till pork cooked through and bok choy is tender. Top with coriander to serve. ; name: oven baked sweet bbq chops ; ingredients: pork chops, onion, brown sugar, ketchup, vinegar, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper ; preparation:Combine everything in a small saucepan and bring to a boil. Simmer 5 minutes. Place 3 pork chops in a pan. Spoon sauce on top and cover. Bake at 375 for 45 minutes to 1 hour. ; name: bacony beans ; ingredients: bacon, sweet onion, pork and beans, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, mustard, molasses ; preparation:Brown bacon in skillet till crispy. Set aside. Pour off all but a thin layer of the bacon fat and cook onion till soft. In large casserole dish, combine remaining ingredients and then add bacon, onion and the fat left in the skillet. Mix thoroughly and bake in a 375 oven for 45 minutes. ; name: marinated pork and red onion kebabs ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, red onion, bamboo skewers, vegetable oil, dry red wine, red wine vinegar, soy sauce, garlic, gingerroot, sugar ; preparation:Thread 2 pieces of pork and 2 pieces of onion alternately on each skewer. Season with salt and pepper. Arrange kebabs in 13x9x2-inch glass baking dish. Whisk all remaining ingredients in medium bowl. Pour marinade over kebabs. Let stand up to 2 hours at room temperature or cover and refrigerate up to 1 day, turning occasionally. Preheat broiler. Drain marinade into small saucepan. Boil marinade 2 minutes. Broil kebabs until pork is cooked through, turning frequently and basting occasionally with marinade, about 12 minutes. ; name: 16 hour pulled pork ; ingredients: pork butt, onions, ginger ale, barbecue sauce ; preparation:

name: butterscotch oatmeal bites ; ingredients: miniature marshmallows, butterscotch chips, peanut butter, butter, cheerios toasted oat cereal, raisins, flaked coconut ; preparation:In heavy saucepan, combine marshmallows, butterscotch chips, peanut butter, and butter. Cook and stir on medium-high heat until melted. Remove from heat. Stir in cheerios, raisins, and coconut. Drop by bite size pieces onto wax paper. Let stand for 10 minutes. ; name: pound cake s mores ; ingredients: poundcake, mini marshmallows, semi-sweet chocolate chips, caramel ice cream topping, nuts ; preparation:Place pound cake slices on a baking sheet. I line the sheet with foil for easy clean-up. Sprinkle each slice with marshmallows and chocolate chips. Above measurements are approximate for these toppings. I make sure each slice is covered but not heaping. Broil 4-6 inches from the heat for 1-2 minutes or til marshmallows are lightly browned. Transfer to a plate. Drizzle with caramel ice cream topping and sprinkle on nuts if desired. ; name: espresso bark ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, margarine, coffee beans, white chocolate ; preparation:Cover a cookie sheet with waxed paper. Combine the chocolate chips and margarine in a microwave-safe bowl. Heat in the microwave at 30 second intervals, stirring between each, until melted and smooth. Mix in the coffee beans until evenly distributed. Pour the chocolate out onto the waxed paper and spread into an even layer. Sprinkle the pieces of white chocolate evenly over the top and press in lightly to make sure they stick. Place in the freezer until set, about 5 minutes. Break into pieces and store in an airtight container. ; name: easy peanut butter squares ; ingredients: smooth peanut butter, miniature marshmallows, walnuts, butter, butterscotch chips ; preparation:In top of double boiler, melt butter, peanut butter and butterscotch chips. Remove from stove and cool until bottom of pan is touchable. Add marshmallows and nuts. Mix together. Place in a buttered pan and refrigerate. ; name: barbecued banana splits ; ingredients: banana, miniature marshmallows, miniature chocolate chips, ice cream ; preparation:Make slit down center of unpeeled banana and spread apart to open. Stuff marshmallows and chocolate chips into opening. Place bananas directly on cooking grate of grill. Grill over medium heat until skin is blackened, about 6- 8 minutes. Marshmallows should be golden brown, chocolate melted, and banana carmelized to a dark golden brown. Remove with tongs, transfer to plate, and serve with a scoop of ice cream. Can also add whipped cream and chopped nuts if desired. ; name: sorority chocolate fudge ; ingredients: granulated sugar, margarine, evaporated milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, milk chocolate chips, marshmallow creme, nuts, vanilla ; preparation:Cream margarine and sugar with wooden spoon in 6 quart saucepan. Mixing thoroughly, stir in milk over medium heat. Evenly work from bottom of pan. Cook to full rolling boil. If using candy thermometer, cook to 230 degrees. If not, cook 7 minutes from start of full rolling boil, still stirring constantly. Remove from heat and add marshmallow creme, chocolate chips and vanilla. Beat until very think and creamy. Pour into an 11x16 tray which has been lightly and evenly buttered. ; name: marshmallow cake ; ingredients: margarine, marshmallows, toffee pieces, rice krispies ; preparation:In a pan melt together the margarine, marshmallows and toffee pieces. When melted, take off the heat. Add the rice krispies. Mix well. Pour into a greased tray. Flatten mixture and leave to set. ; name: stained glass window cookies ; ingredients: chocolate chips, margarine, mini marshmallows, nuts ; preparation:

name: bbq crock pot beef ; ingredients: beef stew meat, chili sauce, water, onion soup mix, brown sugar, mustard, vinegar, celery ; preparation:Cut or trim beef if needed. Place all ingredients in crock pot. Stir to combine. Cover. Turn on high for 4-5 hours low for 6-8 hours. Taste great served on rice or egg noodles. ; name: chinese five spice short ribs crock pot ; ingredients: onion, short rib of beef, garlic salt, black pepper, vegetable oil, beef broth, stewed tomatoes, onion soup mix, chinese five spice powder ; preparation:Slice the onion and put it into a slow cooker. Season the short ribs with garlic salt and pepper. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Working in batches, brown all sides of the short ribs. When browned, place in slow cooker on top of sliced onions. In a mixing bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Pour over the top of short ribs. Cover and cook on low for 8 to 9 hours. ; name: rich and hearty crock pot vegetable beef soup ; ingredients: beef stew meat, tomato juice, frozen mixed vegetables, water, salt, pepper, cayenne pepper, hot sauce, parmesan cheese, vegetable beef soup mix ; preparation:Place stew meat in crockpot. Add tomatoe juice, vegatables, soup starter, salt, pepper, cayenne pepper, and hot sauce. Add water and stir well. Cook on low for five hours. Sprinkle each bowl with parmesan cheese and serve. ; name: ramen noodle stir fry ; ingredients: peanut oil, fresh gingerroot, mushrooms, green onions, salt, ramen noodles, soy sauce, sesame oil, cooking sherry, beef ; preparation:Heat oil in wok 375 degrees. Add 1st 4 ingredients. Cook about one minute. Add remaining ingredients and heat through. Serve. ; name: bbq beef ribs ; ingredients: beef back ribs, tomato sauce, lager beer, garlic cloves, sugar, hot sauce, dried basil, salt, pepper ; preparation:Combine all the ingredients in a sauce pan, bring to a boil and simmer 10 minutes, cool a bit. Place the slabs of ribs in a large plastic bag and pour in the sauce, turn to coat the ribs and seal the bag. Marinate in the fridge for at least an hour. Remove ribs from the marinade and reserve the marinade. Place ribs over medium heat and grill for 50-60 minutes turning the ribs and basting with the marinade during the last 20 minutes of cooking. ; name: cheeseburger chowder ; ingredients: ground beef, celery, green pepper, onion, potatoes, beef bouillon cubes, water, flour, milk, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown ground beef in large pot. Drain off grease. Add potatos, onions, peppers, celery, salt and bouillon cubes. Pour in water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat cover and simmer for 15 to 20 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Whisk flour into milk and slowly pour into pot with meat and vegetables. Stir until soup is thickened slightly. Mix in cheese and stir until melted. ; name: mushroom and wine steak sauce ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, butter, onion, garlic, condensed beef broth, tomato paste, ground pepper, cornstarch, water, dry red wine ; preparation:Melt butter in a saucepan. Add mushrooms, onion and garlic. Saute until golden, about 5 minutes. Stir in broth, tomato paste and black pepper. Bring to the boiling point. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 10 minutes. Blend cornstarch with water. Mix some of the hot mushroom sauce into cornstarch mixture and return to saucepan. Cook and stir until clear and thickened. Stir in wine and cook until hot. Serve over steak, hamburgers or other meat. ; name: crock pot beef with red wine gravy ; ingredients: beef stew meat, onions, beef bouillon cubes, cornstarch, salt, pepper, dry red wine, cooked noodles ; preparation:

name: easy no fail microwave peanut brittle ; ingredients: sugar, corn syrup, dry roasted salted peanuts, butter, vanilla, maple extract, baking soda ; preparation:Combine sugar and corn syrup in a 3-qt heat-resistant plastic microsafe bowl. Microwave on high for 5 minutes. Stir in peanuts. Microwave on high for 2-3 mins longer, or until peanuts and syrup are lightly browned. Add butter, vanilla and baking soda. Mix until light and foamy. Pour quickly onto a buttered cookie sheet, and spread to desired thickness. When cool, break into pieces. ; name: hazelnut brittle ; ingredients: white sugar, water, light corn syrup, butter, hazelnuts, salt, baking soda, vanilla, chocolate ; preparation:Put a large pot or kettle over a medium heat. Add sugar, water, and corn syrup and bring to a boil. When mixture comes to a boil, add butter. Cook to 260 degrees f on a candy thermometer without stirring and add the sliced hazelnuts. Bring mixture to 300 degrees f and stir in salt, baking soda and vanilla. Pour mixture onto a greased baking sheet and spread out and allow to cool. Break up into pieces and decorate with melted chocolate. ; name: old fashioned butterscotch sauce ; ingredients: light brown sugar, light corn syrup, butter, evaporated milk, baking soda, vanilla ; preparation:In a medium saucepan combine sugar, syrup, and butter. Cook, stirring constantly, over medium heat until sugar has dissolved and mixture comes to a full rolling boil. Allow to boil, without stirring, for exactly 1 minute. Remove from heat and let stand for 5 minutes. In another bowl or large measuring cup, combine evaporated milk, baking soda, and vanilla. Stir into the slightly cooled sauce. Pour into jars, cover, and refrigerate. Place jar in a pan of warm water to reheat. ; name: ann s crunchy peanut brittle ; ingredients: butter, baking soda, sugar, water, karo light corn syrup, raw peanuts, vanilla ; preparation:Mix and set aside the butter and soda. In a large pan, mix and boil the sugar, water, and syrup to hardball stage. Add peanuts and stir constantly until mixture turns yellow about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and add butter mixture and vanilla. Pour onto greased cookie sheet. Pat into a thickness you like with the back of a spoon. Cool and break into pieces. Store in airtight container. ; name: caramel fondue ; ingredients: sugar, corn syrup, water, heavy cream, unsalted butter, pure vanilla extract, cake, chocolate ; preparation:In medium saucepan, combine the sugar with the corn syrup and water. Cook over low heat, stirring occasionally, until the sugar dissolves, about 10 minutes. Increase the heat to moderately high and simmer, brushing down the sides of the saucepan occasionally with a wet brush, ntil the syrup starts to turn golden. Gently swirl the pan and continue to simmer until a deep amber caramel forms, about 40 minutes total from the time you started. Remove the saucepan from the heat. Carefullyl stir in the heavy cream, then stir in the butter until melted. Return the saucepan to the heat and bring the caramel just to a simmer. Remove from the heat and stir in the vanilla. Let the caramel cool for 30 minutes, whisking occasionally. Pour the caramel into a heatproof serving bowl or fondue pot set over low heat and serve with the cake, fruit and garnishes. The caramel can be refrigerated for 1 week. Rewarm gently over low heat. ; name: chewy irresistible caramel popcorn ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, corn syrup, baking soda, salt, popcorn ; preparation:Pop the popcorn kernels and put into a greased large bowl. Melt butter on medium heat in a medium size saucepan. Turn heat down to low, and add brown sugar, stir until blended together well. Making sure that the sugar does not burn turn the heat back up to medium, and add corn syrup. All the while stirring and making sure there is no sticking. Add the salt and baking soda. This will make the sugar double in size be careful not to let it go over the sides of the pot. Immediately pour onto popcorn. Stir until the caramel has covered popcorn completely. Transfer onto a cookie sheet with wax paper, and let cool. ; name: popcorn twist caramel corn ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, corn syrup, baking soda, popcorn ; preparation:Prehead oven to 250f. Place entire bag of popcorn twists into a large roaster. In a large sauce pan, cook together butter, brown sugar and corn syrup for 2 minutes after butter has melted and it starts to gently boil. Add baking soda to mixture. This will cause mixture to foam - that is why you need a large saucepaan. Allow to foam to cook down slightly. Pour caramel mixture over popcorn twists and stir until mixed. Place in oven for 35-45 minutes,, stirring at least every 10-15 minutes. Remove from oven and pour on wax paper. Allow to cool slightly and break apart. ; name: swedish hard candies knck ; ingredients: sugar, dark corn syrup, butter, cream, blanched almonds ; preparation:

name: tomato and maple meatballs ; ingredients: ground veal, green onion, garlic cloves, milk, bread, olive oil, maple syrup, salt and pepper, tomato sauce ; preparation:In a large bowl, mix veal, green onion and garlic. In a medium bowl, put milk and soak the bread then incorporate to the veal mixture. Shape in 10 large meatballs. At medium heat, in a small skillet, heat olive oil and brown the meatballs a few minutes. Add maple syrup, salt, pepper and let cook around 3 minutes more. Remove the skillet from the heat. In a saucepan, put tomato sauce and bring to boil. When it comes to boil, add meatballs, cover and simmer around 25 minutes. Serve on a bed of pasta. ; name: shrimp and radicchio salad ; ingredients: olive oil, red wine vinegar, garlic cloves, shallot, dijon mustard, small shrimp, lettuce, radicchio, cherry tomatoes ; preparation:Combine first five ingredients in a bowl. Stir in shrimp. Cover and refrigerate 30 minutes. In a large salad bowl combine lettuce and radicchio, pour shrimp and dressing. Toss add tomatoes and toss again. ; name: garlic lime shrimp ; ingredients: butter, fresh lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, white sugar, lime peel, cayenne, shrimp, parsley ; preparation:Melt butter in a medium-heave skillet over medium heat. Mix in the next six ingredients. Saut for 30 seconds and add shrimp. Saut shrimp until they are opaque in centre, about 3 minutes, turning occasionally. Stir in parsley and serve over rice or pasta. ; name: blue cheese sauce for steaks burgers and chicken ; ingredients: green onion, garlic cloves, butter, flour, milk, blue cheese, white wine, white pepper, pepper sauce ; preparation:In a small saucepan, saute onion and garlic in butter until tender. Sprinkle with flour. Stir until blended. Gradually add milk. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Add blue cheese, wine or chicken broth, white pepper and pepper sauce. Heat through. Serve sauce over meat. ; name: chicken estufao ; ingredients: chicken, garlic cloves, onion, rice vinegar, salt, fresh ground black pepper, peanut oil, soy sauce, water ; preparation:Combine chicken, garlic, onion, vinegar, salt, and pepper in a bowl and mix well. Remove chicken, reserving liquid. Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat. Add chicken and cook 3 minutes. Reduce heat and add soy sauce, water, and reserved liquid. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes, or until chicken is falling off the bones. ; name: malaga gazpacho ; ingredients: tomatoes, cucumbers, green pepper, garlic clove, water, extra virgin olive oil, sherry wine vinegar, salt, white bread ; preparation:Combine all the ingredients in the container of an electric blender. Blend at high speed, pausing now and then to scrape down with a rubber spatula as necessary. Pour the mixture through a large strainer placed inside a mixing bowl. Press and stir with a wooden spoon to extract as much liquid as possible. Discard the solids. Taste soup for seasoning and add more salt if desired. Chill thoroughly, as much as 24 hours, before serving. ; name: lamb marinade ; ingredients: olive oil, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, thyme, coriander, garlic cloves ; preparation:Mix all the ingredients above in a bowl. Add your desired cut of lamb. Cover in the fridge for at least 24 hours. Cook your lamb in your preferred way. Enjoy a nice new taste to your meat. ; name: original cesar cardini caesar salad ; ingredients: garlic cloves, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese, olive oil, red wine vinegar, worcestershire sauce, egg yolk, bacon bits, romaine lettuce leaf ; preparation:

name: chutney chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked boneless skinless chicken breasts, bell pepper, raisins, celery, green onion, miracle whip light, mango chutney, romaine lettuce ; preparation:Toss chicken, bell pepper, raisins, celery and onions in large bowl. Stir mayonnaise and chutney in small bowl until blended. Add to salad. Toss to evenly coat. Serve at room temperature or chilled. Line 4 individual plates with lettuce leaves. Top with salad. ; name: mr food honey mustard chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, mayonnaise, honey, dijon-style mustard, onion powder, ground red pepper ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 425 degrees f. Coat a 10- by 15-inch rimmed baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. Place the chicken breasts on the baking sheet. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Mix well. Spread the mixture evenly over the chicken breasts. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes, or until the topping is golden and no pink remains in the chicken. ; name: lemon chili chicken with penne ; ingredients: penne, boneless skinless chicken breast half, olive oil, onion, garlic, bottled lemon juice, tomatoes, water, red pepper flakes, cilantro ; preparation:In large pot, cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, in large skillet, brown chicken in oil with onion and garlic. Add lemon juice, tomatoes, water and red pepper flakes. Cook 2 to 3 minutes. Add penne. Heat through. Garnish with cilantro. Serve hot or cold. ; name: thai coconut chicken soup ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, coconut milk, laos powder, green onions, serrano chilies, nam pla, lemongrass, lime ; preparation:Bring 1 cup coconut milk to boil. Add chicken, lemon grass, and laos. Cover and simmer til chicken is tender. Add remaining 1 cup coconut milk, green onions and chilis. Do not boil. Stir in lime juice and fish sauce just before serving. ; name: cheesy chicken with bbq sauce bacon ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, salt, pepper, barbecue sauce, bacon, cheddar cheese, scallions, tomatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Spray 3-quart baking dish with cooking spray. Place chicken in prepared dish. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Spoon sauce over. Bake 20 minutes, until internal temperature registers 160. Place 2 slices of cooked bacon over each chicken half and sprinkle cheese on top. Bake an additional 5 minutes. Top with the diced tomato and scallion. ; name: grilled greek chicken breasts ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, lemon, juice of, dried oregano, garlic salt, olive oil, feta cheese, tzatziki, kalamata olive ; preparation:Combine lemon juice, oregano, garlic salt in shallow dish. Whisk to combine. While wisking stir in olive oil. Add chicken turning once. Marinate 30-60 minutes turning half-way. Grill to your liking. Discard marinade. Top chicken with feta cheese, tzatziki sauce, and olives. ; name: crock pot orange honey chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, orange juice, chicken broth, honey, dry mustard, teriyaki sauce, broccoli floret, cauliflower floret, carrot ; preparation:Place frozen breasts in crock pot. Mix juice, broth, honey, dry mustard and teryiaki sauce. Pour over chicken in crock. Cook on low for four hours. Add vegetables about one hour before serving. Place on top of chicken and do not stir. Cook the additional hour and serve over rice. ; name: spicy caribbean chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, green onions, jalapeno peppers, lemon juice, honey, fresh thyme ; preparation:

name: sweet cream waffles ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, eggs, heavy cream, butter ; preparation:In a small bowl combine the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar. Stir until blended. In a medium bowl, place the egg yolks, cream, and butter. Whisk until well mixed. Stir the dry ingredients into the cream mixture. Whisk until well mixed and smooth. Heat the waffle iron. Brush lightly with butter if not nonstick. Beat the egg whites until stiff, then fold them gently into the batter. Cook until waffles are golden, about 5 minutes. ; name: rooster cookies sugar cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, salt, flour ; preparation:Cream together the butter and sugar. Beat in 1 egg, add salt and flour. Mix all ingredients are well blended. Chill dough for 3-4 hours before rolling. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Roll out and cut. Bake about 8-10 minutes or until barely colored. Cookies can be frosted and decorated or eaten just plain. ; name: almond sugar cookies ; ingredients: flour, butter, sugar, milk, baking powder, almond extract, salt, eggs ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and almond extract. Combine dry ingredients, add to sugar mixture. Drop onto cookie sheet. Bake 350 for 1012 minutes. ; name: farina cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, flour, baking powder, salt, farina, raisins ; preparation:Cream together butter and sugar. Add egg. Add remaining ingredients and stir. Drop onto cookie sheet with spoon. Bake at preheated 350 oven for 15 minutes. ; name: peanut butter corn muffins ; ingredients: flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, vegetable oil, crunchy peanut butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Grease muffin tins. Place all dry ingredients in a mixing bowl and mix up with an electric mixer. Add the liquids and mix smooth. Place 2 tablespoons of batter in the bottom of each of the greased muffin cups. Add 1 tablespoon of crunchy style peanut butter. Add the remaining bit of batter and bake for approx. 25 minutes or until a tooth pick comes out clean. ; name: honey buttermilk cornbread ; ingredients: cornmeal, flour, baking powder, salt, egg, buttermilk, oil, honey ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. And grease a 8 inch square baking pan. Sift the cornmeal, flour, baking powder and salt together. In a seperate bowl mix the egg, buttermilk oil and honey. Add the egg mixture to the dry ingredients. Beat until smooth. Pour into pan. Bake 20 minutes edges may start to brown a little. ; name: mimi s cornmeal scones ; ingredients: flour, cornmeal, baking powder, baking soda, salt, firm butter, buttermilk ; preparation:Mix first 5 ingredients in a medium bowl. Cut in the butter using pastry blended till it looks like fine crumbs. Stir in buttermilk so dough leaves sides of bowl and forms a ball. Turn dough onto lightly floured surface and knead lightly about 10 times. Pat or roll into a 7-inch circle on ungreased cookie sheet that has been sprinkled with cornmeal. Score into 8 wedges, cutting down halfway to the bottom. Bake in 400 degree oven for 20-25 minutes or till light brown. Immediately remove from sheet and carefully separate wedges. Serve warm. ; name: maismeel kadetjes cornmeal muffins ; ingredients: butter, salt, sugar, eggs, milk, baking powder, flour, cornmeal ; preparation:

name: warm chorizo and thyme lentils ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, chorizo sausages, celery, garlic cloves, thyme, green lentils, chicken stock, salt and pepper, red wine vinegar ; preparation:Heat oil in deep frypan. Add onion and chorizo, cook about 8 minutes till browned. Add celery, garlic and thyme, cook further 5 minutes. Add lentils, stock, salt and pepper, cook 25 minutes till lentils are tender. Remove from the heat, stir through vinegar. ; name: chili lime shrimp kabobs ; ingredients: lime juice, olive oil, white wine vinegar, garlic cloves, chili powder, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables ; preparation:In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first seven ingredients. Add the shrimp. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 1 hour. Drain and discard marinade. On each of 12 metal or soaked wooden appetizer skewers, thread two shrimp and any veggies you want to add. Grill kabobs, covered, over medium heat or broil 4 inches from the heat for 5-8 minutes or until shrimp turn pink, turning once. ; name: easy skillet casserole ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, garlic powder, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, tomato paste, milk, butter, macaroni & cheese dinner mix ; preparation:Brown beef in a large, deep pot with onion, garlic powder, salt, pepper and worchestershire sauce. Cook macaroni separately according to package directions. When beef is cooked add tomato paste and prepared macaroni. Mix throughly. Cook over low heat until thickened. Add grated cheese on top, if desired. Cover and set aside for 5 mins before serving. ; name: tomato and garlic salad salat iz pomidorov s chesnokom ; ingredients: red wine vinegar, garlic cloves, tomatoes, red onion, extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper, fresh basil ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine the vinegar and the garlic and let stand for 30 minutes. Place the tomatoes and onion in a salad bowl and sprinkle with the vinegar and garlic mixture. Toss with the olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes. Sprinkle the salad with the basil and serve. ; name: mild red chile dressing ; ingredients: dried tomatoes, hot water, garlic clove, extra virgin olive oil, orange juice concentrate, apple cider vinegar, tamari, red chili powder, black pepper, salt ; preparation:Soak the dried tomatoes in the hot water for 20 to 30 minutes, or until they become soft and plump. With a slotted spoon, transfer the tomatoes to a food processor and add the garlic. Chop finely. Pour tomato-soaking water into the processor and blend well. Add the olive oil or apple juice, orange juice concentrate, 3 tablespoons vinegar, soy sauce, chile powder, pepper and salt if using. Process until the dressing is creamy. Taste and add another tablespoon vinegar if needed. Pour into a jar, cover and refrigerate until ready to use. ; name: amazing rib eye steaks with marsala sauce ; ingredients: rib eye steaks, salt and pepper, olive oil, butter, garlic cloves, sliced mushrooms, flour, marsala wine, beef broth, dried rosemary ; preparation:Heat olive oil in skillet over high heat. Salt and pepper steaks to taste. Place steaks in hot skillet and immediately turn down heat to medium high. Cook steaks for 4 minutes on each side or to your taste. Remove steaks to a platter and cover with foil to keep warm. Remove skillet from heat and add butter and garlic. Return to heat and add mushrooms and saute until done. Add flour and cook for about a minute, decrease heat to medium low, then add wine and broth. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly until thick. Remove pan from heat and add rosemary. ; name: saucy spareribs ; ingredients: pork spareribs, dark soy sauce, orange marmalade, garlic clove, onion, salt, pepper, beef stock, vinegar ; preparation:Brown the ribs in a frying pan with a little oil. Place the sliced raw onion into the bottom of a casserole dish large enough to hold all the ribs. Mix together the soy sauce, orange marmalade and the garlic in a bowl. Place the browned ribs on top of the onions in the casserole dish then spread them with the soy mixture. Season the ribs with salt and pepper. Mix the stock with the vinegar in a jug then pour over the ribs and cover with lid. Cook for 1 hour at 200 degrees with the lid on then for another half and hour with the lid off. ; name: tangy crock pot beef roast ; ingredients: beef eye round, tomato paste, marsala wine, red wine vinegar, warm water, brown sugar, garlic cloves, onion soup mix, thyme, pepper ; preparation:

name: soft chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: plain flour, baking soda, unsalted butter, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, eggs, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. In a small bowl sift together flour and baking soda, set aside. In a large bowl, combine butter and both sugars. Beat on medium speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Reduce speed to low, add salt, vanilla, and eggs. Beat until well mixed, about 1 minute. Add flour mixture, mix until just combined. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop heaping spoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto baking trays lined with parchment paper. Bake until golden around the edges and soft in the middle, about 8-10 minutes. ; name: very good and yummy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, splenda granular, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla flavoring, almond flour, baking soda, salt, mini chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease cookie sheets. In a large bowl, cream together the butter, splenda and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt. Gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, fold in the chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until light brown. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely. ; name: gourmet magazine s cinnamon blueberry muffins ; ingredients: unsalted butter, light brown sugar, whole milk, egg, all-purpose flour, baking powder, cinnamon, salt, blueberries ; preparation:Put oven rack in middle position and preheat oven to 400f. Put liners in muffin cups. Whisk together butter, brown sugar, milk, and egg in a bowl until combined well. Whisk together flour, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt in a large bowl. Add milk mixture and stir until just combined. Fold in blueberries gently. Divide batter among muffin cups and bake until golden brown and a wooden pick inserted into center of a muffin comes out clean, 25 to 30 minutes. ; name: nana s chocolate chip cookies classic toll house cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, kosher salt, baking soda, unsalted butter, light brown sugar, granulated sugar, eggs, pure vanilla extract, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly butter two baking sheets. In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, salt, and baking soda. In a large bowl, using an electric mixer, beat the butter and sugars on medium-high speed until fluffy, 2 to 3 minutes. One at a time, beat in the eggs, then the vanilla. Reduce speed of mixer to low and gradually add the flour mixture, mixing until just combined. Mix in the chocolate chips and nuts, if desired, by hand. Drop heaping tablespoons of the dough onto the 2 prepared baking sheets, spacing them 2 inches apart. Bake, rotating the baking sheets halfway through, until golden around the edges but still soft in the center, 12 to 15 minutes. Cool slightly on the baking sheets, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely. Store the cookies in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days. ; name: classic chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, butter, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a medium mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time, then vanilla. On low speed gradually add flour mixture and mix just until blended. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 9 to 12 minutes. Transfer cookies to cooling racks to cool. ; name: chocolate chip and peanut cookies ; ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, all-purpose flour, salt, baking soda, semisweet chocolate piece, peanuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Cream butter and sugars. Add egg, vanilla, and beat until light and fluffy. Sift together flour, salt and baking soda. Stir into creamed mixture. Blend well. Add chocolate pieces and peanuts and stir by hand. Drop from teaspoon about 2 inches apart on a greased cookie sheet. Bake in 375f oven for 12 minutes. Remove from sheet immediately. ; name: the albertson s chocolate chip cookie recipe ; ingredients: brown sugar, granulated sugar, eggs, butter, vanilla extract, flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Cream together sugars and butter until light and fluffy in large bowl. Add eggs one a time, beating well after each. Add vanilla, beat well. In a smaller bowl, combine flour, salt, and baking soda. Add gradually to wet ingredients until completely combined. Stir in entire package of chocolate chips and nuts if you desire. Drop by rounded tablespoons onto a greased baking sheet. Bake at 375 f until browned, about 12 minutes. ; name: mean chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, brown sugar, white sugar, eggs, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:

name: banana poppy seed quick bread ; ingredients: bananas, sugar, butter, eggs, lemon peel, flour, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, poppy seed ; preparation:Mash bananas with a potato masher until all large pieces are broken down - you should receive about 1 cup of banana total. If not, then add enough banana to equal one cup. Cream together the sugar and butter until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs and grated lemon peel until blended. Combine the flour, baking powder, salt and cinnamon. Beat the bananas into the wet ingredients alternately with the dry ingredients -- repeating twice ending with dry ingredients. Hand stir in the poppy seeds. Pour into a well-greased 9x5 inch loaf pan. Bake at 350 f for 50-60 minutes until pick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in pan for 10-15 minutes before turning out onto a wire rack to completely cool. ; name: real swedish pancakes pannkakor ; ingredients: eggs, wheat flour, milk, salt, butter ; preparation:Mix eggs, flour and salt. Add the milk, a little at the time, and whisk to a smooth batter. The batter will be very thin. In a hot skillet, add one teaspoon butter and just as much batter to cover the bottom. Fry the pancakes golden brown on both sides. Add more butter for each new pancake. Roll or stack them on a serving plate. Keep warm. Serve hot, preferably with whipped cream and jam. ; name: banana eggs ; ingredients: eggs, banana, cinnamon, salt, butter ; preparation:Preaheat skillet over medium heat. Place eggs, banana, cinnamon, and salt in a blender. Blend until smooth. Melt butter in skillet and add egg mixture. Cook until eggs begin to set. Flip. Cook until fully set and enjoy with toast. ; name: basic crepes ii ; ingredients: eggs, flour, milk, butter, salt ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a blender. Whirl one minute. Scrape down and blend 15 seconds more. Refrigerate at least one hour before making crepes. Heat a lightly greased 6 inch skillet. Remove from heat. Spoon in 2 tbsp batter. Lift and tilt skillet to spread evenly. Return to heat. Brown on one side only. To remove, invert pan over paper toweling. Repeat with remaining batter. ; name: aidan s banana nut bread ; ingredients: salt, self raising flour, nutmeg, cinnamon, butter, sugar, eggs, bananas, nuts ; preparation:Sift together salt, flour and spices. Cream butter and sugar, then add the eggs one at a time, beating well. Beat mixture until light and fluffy. Add sifted flour and spices and bananas to creamed mixture, combining lightly. Fold in nuts. Turn the mixture into a well greased loaf tin bake in a moderate oven for 50 to 60 minutes. Cool in the tin. Can be iced with a cream cheese frosting or lemon icing. ; name: pa dutch sauerkraut dumplings ; ingredients: egg, salt, milk, flour, baking powder ; preparation:Make into a paste. Drop into boiling kraut. If your rise is not pleasing, put in more baking powder. I have seen recipes up to a tbsp of baking powder. Once it is the right consistency to drop and you do, close the pan and do not, i repeat, do not look at the dumplings until done. About 12 minutes. ; name: grandma betty s best banananut bread ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, bananas, all-purpose flour, salt, baking soda, nuts ; preparation:Mix together butter, sugar, eggs, and bananas. Add the rest of the ingredients and blend. Spray a 9x5 inch pan with oil spray. Add mix to pan and bake at 350 degrees for 50 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. After removing from oven, allow to cool for 5 minutes then let finish cooling on a cooling rack. ; name: pesach banana cake ; ingredients: eggs, banana, salt, sugar, potato flour ; preparation:

name: breakfast crescent pizza ; ingredients: crescent rolls, sausage, bacon, hash brown, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Unroll rolls into 4 rectangles and place in a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Press up sides slightly and press perforations together. Layer cooked sausage, cooked bacon, hash browns, and cheese. At this point you can make it ahead and refrigerate for up to 24 hours. Mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over the dish. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: sherri s breakfast casserole ; ingredients: crescent rolls, hot sausage, onion, sliced mushrooms, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, eggs ; preparation:Flatten rolls in bottom of greased 9x13 baking pan or casserole dish. Brown sausage and drain. Add onion and mushrooms to sausage and pour mixture over rolls. Add cheese on top of sausage. At this point you may continue or casserole may be refrigerated overnight. Beat eggs and pour on top and cover with foil. Bake at 350f for 40-45 minutes. Brown last 10 minutes. Remove from oven and let set 5 minutes. If you are freezing, allow casserole to cool and freeze. To bake, place in oven directly from freezer but allow about 50-60 minutes for baking. ; name: smoked oyster heaven ; ingredients: cream cheese, cilantro, fresh lime juice, jalapenos, hot sauce, white bread, smoked oysters, red onion ; preparation:Mix together the cream cheese, cilantro, lime juice, jalapeno& hot sauce. Cut the toast slices into interesting shapes, 6 pieces per slice. Spread the cheese mixture thinly on each piece. Drain the oysters well on a paper towel. Pop an oyster on each toast piece. Sprinkle onion lightly over top. Serve. ; name: toasted ham and cheese supreme ; ingredients: white bread, mayonnaise, deli ham, cheddar cheese, red onions, horseradish sauce, butter ; preparation:Spread four slices of bread with mayonnaise. Layer each with the ham, cheese and onion. Spread horseradish sauce on remaining bread. Place bread with horseradish side down over onion. Spread butter on the outside of each sandwich. In a large skillet over medium heat, toast sandwiches for 4 - 5 minutes on each side or until bread is lightly browned and cheese is melted. ; name: easy breakfast egg casserole ; ingredients: white bread, bulk pork sausage, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Grease a 13x9-inch baking pan. Place bread in the bottom and sprinkle with sausage and cheese. Beat eggs, milk, salt and pepper with a whisk. Pour over the bread mixture. Bake 40-45 minutes or until eggs are set in the center and lightly browned. ; name: zesty italian crescent casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese, sour cream, crescent rolls, parmesan cheese, butter ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. In large skillet, brown beef and onion then drain. Return meat to pan. Add spaghetti sauce. Meanwhile, in a medium bowl combine mozzarella cheese and sour cream. Pour hot meat into an ungreased 12 x 8 inch dish. Spoon cheese mixture over meat. Unroll crescent roll dough over the top of the mixture. Mix parmesan cheese and butter together, then spread over the top of the dough. Bake 18-25 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: hobo breakfast special ; ingredients: bulk sausage, yellow onion, fresh mushrooms, vegetable oil, hash browns, eggs, extra-sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium-high heat, brown the sausage. If desired, drain fat. Add onions and mushrooms and cook until tender, set aside in a separate bowl. In the same skillet, add the oil and hash browns over medium-high heat and cook until golden brown on 1 side. Once golden brown add eggs, add the sausage and mushroom mixture. Scramble together until desired consistency and top with cheese. Cover with a lid until cheese melts and serve. ; name: crock pot cheese dip with a new twist ; ingredients: cheese spread, cream cheese, rotel, smoked sausage ; preparation:

name: grilled feta cheese appetizer ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, feta cheese, garlic clove, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, fresh oregano, fresh ground black pepper, french bread ; preparation:Oil a 14 inch long piece of heavy duty aluminum foil. Place onion slices in center of french bread slices on the foil. Slice feta into 24 pieces, place on top of onions and sprinkle with garlic. Add bell peppers and sprinkle with oregano and black pepper. Fold up foil and seal edges. Grill covered 30 minutes turning once or bake at 350f. ; name: skordalia potato and garlic dip ; ingredients: floury potatoes, garlic cloves, lemon juice, ground almonds, extra virgin olive oil, egg, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Boil the potatoes in their skins until cooked - about 30 minutes. What you are aiming for in this recipe is starchy mashed potato. As soon as the potatoes are cool enough to handle, peel them and either mash them or put them through a potato ricer. Peel the garlic cloves and pound them in a pestle with the lemon juice or use a hand-blender for this step. Mix the potato, garlic and ground almonds together thoroughly in a bowl, and then beat in the olive oil gradually with a wooden spoon. Beat in the whole egg and season with salt and pepper. ; name: silverbeet swiss chard and mushroom pie ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic cloves, mushrooms, silver beet, nutmeg, salt & freshly ground black pepper, eggs, thickened cream, low-fat swiss cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over a moderate heat. Saute the onion and garlic for 5 mins or until soft. Add the mushrooms and saute for another 2 minutes. Add the silverbeet, nutmeg and season. Cover the saucepan and cook until the silverbeet wilts. Remove from the heat, stir the silverbeet through the mushrooms and drain any excess moisture. Transfer the silverbeet mixture into a large 6 cup capacity baking dish. Whisk the eggs and cream together, season and stir through the grated cheese, then pour the egg mixture over the silverbeet mixture, swirl the egg mixture through the silverbeet using a fork. Bake the pie for 40 mins or until golden and set. Allow to cool slightly before slicing. ; name: lucerne onion salad luzerner zwiebelsalat ; ingredients: onions, oil, garlic cloves, wine vinegar, rosemary, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Prepare a marinade of vinegar, rosemary, coriander, salt, pepper. Cut the peeled onions and garlic slices. Fry onions in oil until golden brown. Drain and while still hot, add to the marinade. Refrigerate. ; name: creamy white bean soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, carrot, garlic cloves, cannellini beans, water, italian seasoning, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a 4 quart saucepan on medium high heat. Add onion, carrots and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally until they are soft. Add beans, water, and seasonings. Stir and reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes or until carrots are tender. Take half of soup and blend in blender until smooth. Return soup to bean mixture in pan and stir. Ladle into bowls and drizzle with olive oil before serving. Top with freshly grated parmesan cheese, if desired. ; name: jerk seasoning caribbean ; ingredients: green onions, scotch bonnet peppers, garlic cloves, white wine vinegar, brown sugar, ground allspice, dried thyme, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Seed the peppers, peel the garlic. Add everything to a blender or processor and blend well. Store in a covered container. Use for basting on pork or beef. Also see recipe of mine for beef jerk burgers. ; name: mediterranean vegetables in a creamy white wine sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, white onion, garlic clove, zucchini, mushrooms, dry white wine, chicken stock cube, heavy cream ; preparation:In a skillet over medium heat, warm up the olive oil. Add the green and red bell peppers, onion and garlic and cook, stirring, for 4 minutes. Add the zucchini and mushrooms and cook, still stirring, for a further 4 minutes. Add the dry white wine and simmer uncovered for 4 minutes. By the end of the 4 minutes, the wine should have reduced a little. Crumble in the chicken stock cube, stir it in and simmer for 2 minutes. Add the cream. Turn up the heat a little and simmer for 5 minutes, until the sauce has reduced and thickened. Serve over pasta, rice, baked potatoes, chicken or as a side dish. ; name: beet greens with bacon and onion ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, yellow onion, beet leaves, white wine, bacon bits, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: easy key lime pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, key lime juice, cool whip, graham cracker pie crust ; preparation:Beat cream cheese, sugar and lime juice until fluffy. Fold in 6 oz of the thawed cool whip. Pour into prepared graham cracker crust. Top with remaining cool whip. Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving. ; name: fluffy 2 step cheesecake ; ingredients: cream cheese, cool whip, sugar, graham cracker crust, pie filling ; preparation:Beat cream cheese and sugar in large bowl, with a mixer, on high speed until smooth. Gently stir in whipped topping. Spoon into crust. Refrigerate 3 hours or until set. Add pie filling as a topping. Keep leftovers refrigerated. ; name: angel lush cake ; ingredients: crushed pineapple, vanilla flavor instant pudding and pie filling mix, cool whip topping, angel food cake, berries ; preparation:Mix pudding and pineapple in bowl. Gently stir in whipped topping. Cut cake horizontally into thirds. Spread one-third pudding mixture over bottom layer of cake. Top with second layer. Repeat layering, ending with pudding. Refrigerate at least 1 hour or until ready to serve. Garnish with your favorite seasonal berries. ; name: fluffy no bake cheesecake ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, cool whip, graham cracker pie crust ; preparation:Beat cream cheese and sugar in a large mixing bowl until well blended. Gently stir in whipped topping. Spoon into crust. Refrigerate 3 hours or until set. Serve plain or with pie filling of choice. ; name: blueberry cheesecake pie ; ingredients: graham cracker pie crust, cream cheese, sugar, eggs, blueberry pie filling, non-dairy whipped topping ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Combine cream cheese, sugar and eggs in a small bowl. Beat until fluffy. Place crust on baking sheet. Pour mixture into crust. Bake 25 to 30 minutes. Remove from oven. Cool. Spread blueberry filling on top. Garnish with whipped topping. Chill 3 hours. ; name: season s strawberry lemon cheesecake ; ingredients: graham cracker crust, cream cheese, strawberry jam, powdered sugar, lemon pie filling, strawberry, cool whip ; preparation:Whip the softened cream cheese together with the powdered sugar and the strawberry jam till smooth. Spoon this into the graham cracker crust. Place one layer of the sliced strawberries on top of the cheesecake mixture and pour on the lemon pie filling, spreading till even. Place in fridge to set and cool at least 1 hour. Garnish with cool whip and fanned strawberries at serving time. ; name: chocolate cherry ice cream pie ; ingredients: magic shell ice cream topping, graham cracker crust, maraschino cherries, vanilla ice cream, peanut butter cups ; preparation:Following package directions, drizzle half of the ice cream topping over the crust. Gently spread to coat bottom and sides. Freeze until firm. Meanwhile, set aside six cherries for garnish. Chop remaining cherries. In a large bowl, combine ice cream and chopped cherries. Spread into prepared crust. Sprinkle with peanut butter cups. Drizzle with remaining ice cream topping. Garnish with reserved cherries. Cover and freeze for 2 hours or until firm. Remove from freezer 15 minutes before serving. ; name: toffee bar crunch pie ; ingredients: caramel ice cream topping, milk, instant vanilla pudding, cool whip, chocolate-covered english toffee bars, graham cracker pie crust ; preparation:

name: solo chicken breast with honey rum sauce ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, mayonnaise, honey, rum, black pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Combine the mayonnaise, honey and rum and set aside. Pat the chicken breast dry, apply the pepper and olive oil to both sides. Sear in a very hot frying pan 4 minutes on each side. Let the chicken rest for a couple minutes, and then slice. Serve over cooked rice or pasta, and drizzle the sauce over the meat. ; name: super simple sweet and sour chicken with rice ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, sweet and sour sauce, pineapple tidbits, bell pepper, onion, chicken broth, uncooked rice ; preparation:Place uncooked rice in 9 x 13 glass baking dish. Top with uncooked chicken breasts. Drain juice from pineapple into a bowl. Add the sweet and sour sauce and chicken broth. Mix to lightly to blend. Scatter peppers, onions and pineapple chunks over the chicken. Pour sweet and sour mixture over all. Cover tightly with aluminum foil and bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour. Remove foil in last 15 minutes of cooking. ; name: grilled ginger chicken ; ingredients: soy sauce, lime juice, liquid honey, fresh ginger, garlic, tabasco sauce, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:In a small bowl, stir soy sauce, lime juice, honey, ginger, garlic and tobasco. If you want this as a marinade, make this several hours in advance, pour into a ziploc bag, add chicken and marinate in fridge for several hours shaking often. Alternatively, you can brush both sides of the chicken after making the sauce for a quick meal. Lightly oil grill and then heat bbq to medium. Bbq with lid closed, turning and basting halfway through with remaining marinade. Remember not to baste chicken before taking off grill since raw chicken was in it. Make sure the baste is fully cooked before removing from grill. Grill for 12- 16 minutes until juices run clear. ; name: chicken breasts with oriental orange glaze ; ingredients: boneless chicken breast halves, butter, cornstarch, mustard, orange juice, orange marmalade, soy sauce ; preparation:Melt butter in a large saucepan over high heat. Brown chicken breast quickly, then turn the heat down to medium and cook until juices run free of pink. Turning the chicken often to prevent burning. Mix cornstarch, mustard, orange juice and soy sauce in a small bowl. When chicken is fully cooked, place on a heated platter or in a low oven to keep warm. Discard the oil left in the saucepan. Add the orange mixture to the saucepan and heat to boiling over medium heat, stirring constantly, and boil through until thickened. Pour over chicken breasts. ; name: different but delicious chicken salad for parties ; ingredients: pineapple juice, lemon pepper seasoning, boneless skinless chicken breasts, almonds, garlic powder, mayonnaise ; preparation:Poach chicken breasts in pineapple juice with plenty of lemon pepper seasoning until cooked through and the poaching liquid has thickened into a partial glaze. Discard the poaching liquid and allow the chicken to cool. Run the chicken breasts through a food processor until crumbly and then pour into a large bowl. Run almonds through the food processor until coarsely or finely chopped. Add almonds to chicken. Now add garlic powder to the mix -- the more the better. Do not be afraid that you will overpower the chicken salad as the garlic powder is what makes the dish so addictive. Add mayo to desired consistency. Serve chicken salad with croissants, toasted french bread slices or a bread of your choice. ; name: quick mediterranean chicken thighs ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, salt, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil, diced fire-roasted tomatoes, orange juice, garlic, capers ; preparation:Season both sides of the chicken thighs with salt and pepper.
