Remove from cookie sheet at once and cool on wire rack. ; name: my favourite gingerbread lebkuchen ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, treacle, eggs, plain flour, self raising flour, ground ginger, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, bicarbonate of soda ; preparation:

name: corn pudding ; ingredients: whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, eggs, sugar, flour, milk, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:Combine sugar, flour, salt and pepper. Add milk and slightly beaten eggs. Stir in corn. Dot with butter on top. Bake in 375 degree oven, in pan of water for 1 hour. ; name: cheesy rice corn skillet ; ingredients: celery, onion, cooked rice, frozen whole kernel corn, nonfat dry milk powder, water, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, dried parsley flakes, lemon pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, saute celery and onion for 6 to 8 minutes or until just tender. Stir in rice and corn. In a small bowl, combine dry milk powder and water. Add milk mixture to the celery mixture. Mix well to combine. Stir cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, parsley flakes and lemon pepper into celery mixture. Lower heat and simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. ; name: cream of shiitake and corn soup ; ingredients: olive oil, leeks, vegetable broth, potato, celery, frozen corn kernels, shiitake mushroom, unsweetened soymilk, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a big pot, over medium heat, put half of the oil. Add the leeks and cook until they are tender. Add the broth, the potato, the corn and the celery. Cover and let cook until the vegetable are tenders. Meanwhile, in a frying pan, saut the mushrooms in the rest of the oil. Season to taste. Cream the soup with a blender. Put the soup in bowls. Make a nest of mushrooms over and serve piping hot. ; name: omelet with corn and smoked mozzarella ; ingredients: fresh corn, water, eggs, salt & freshly ground black pepper, basil leaves, smoked mozzarella cheese, unsalted butter ; preparation:Cut corn from cob or use frozen and place in a small skillet with a few tablespoons water. Cook over medium heat until heated through and drain. Meanwhile, combine eggs, a tablespoon water in a medium bowl and beat lightly. Add corn to the eggs and season with salt and pepper, add cheese and basil. Stir. Wipe out skillet, add butter and heat over medium high heat. When the butter just starts to foam, add egg mixture and stir once or twice. Cover and cook until the bottom is pale golden, then carefully invert with a plate and slide back into the skillet. Cook an additional 1 or 2 minutes and serve. ; name: tlayuda with black bean puree aka mexican unpizza ; ingredients: black beans, salt & freshly ground black pepper, garlic, onion, chili powder, cumin, corn tortillas, mozzarella cheese, cabbage, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. If using dried beans, add salt, pepper, garlic, onion, chili powder and cumin in last few minutes of cooking. Place mixture in blender or food processer with enough liquid to allow machine to do its work and roughly puree. If using canned beans, add seasonings and warm mixture gently in a saucepan, stirring, to take the edge off of the garlic and onion. Then roughly puree with a little of the liquid as necessary. Place the tortillas on pizza peel or baking sheet and evenly spread with the bean mixture and then the cheese. Bake for 5 minutes, then sprinkle with cabbage and cilantro if using. Bake another 5 minutes until the topping is hot and tortilla is crisp on the edges. Cut into wedges if desired. ; name: corn black bean salsa ; ingredients: black beans, corn kernels, rotel diced tomatoes, green onion, fresh cilantro, oil, red wine vinegar, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Combine beans, corn, diced tomatoes, green onions and cilantro in large bowl. Whisk together oil, vinegar, salt and black pepper. Pour dressing over bean mixture. Stir gently to combine. Can be served immediately, or chilled for a few hours before serving. ; name: really different grilled corn on the cob tex mex style ; ingredients: corn on the cob, butter, parmesan cheese, sugar, salt, cayenne pepper, dried herbs ; preparation:Remove frozen corn from package and grill until corn is hot and you have nice grill marks. Mix melted butter with remaining ingredients and spread all over hot corn. You can also roll corn in it, dip them or whatever method you choose to get them thoroughly coated with the yummy mixture. Sprinkle corn with added salt if you like. Serve immediately. I usually just put the corn in a container and add 1 cup sugar and then cover with water. Really sweetens the corn nicely- this method can be used on fresh or frozen. ; name: corn casserole from food network ; ingredients: fresh corn kernels, salt and black pepper, ground nutmeg, vegetable oil, onions, eggs, milk, aged white cheddar cheese, oil ; preparation:

name: zucchini rice pilaf ; ingredients: dried basil, butter, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, long grain rice, carrot, zucchini ; preparation:In a skillet, saute basil and butter for one minute. Then add chicken stock and bring to a boil. Stir in the rice and carrot. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Add zucchini slices and simmer another 10 minutes or until zucchini is tender. ; name: barley bake ; ingredients: celery, sliced mushrooms, green onion, garlic clove, butter, barley, fresh cilantro, chicken broth, salt and pepper ; preparation:Saute celery, mushrooms, onions and garlic in butter until soft. Add barley and cook until light brown. In a 2 quart buttered casserole combine barley mixture, parsley or cilantro and chicken broth. Cover and bake at 350 for 30 minutes and then uncover and bake for 45 minutes more or until barley is tender and liquid is absorbed. If necessary, add more broth. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: lemon pepper veggies ; ingredients: fresh broccoli florets, cauliflower florets, fresh carrot, water, butter, lemon-pepper seasoning, garlic powder ; preparation:In a microwave-safe bowl, combine the broccoli, cauliflower, carrots and water. Cover and microwave on high for 4-7 minutes, or until crisp-tender. Drain. Combine the rest of the ingredients. Drizzle over vegetables and toss to coat. ; name: cauliflower with scallions ; ingredients: cauliflower florets, butter, scallions, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook cauliflower until tender, 3-5 minutes. Drain and transfer to a serving dish. In a small skillet, melt butter over medium low heat. Add scallions and cook 2 minutes. Pour over cauliflower and toss. Season with salt and pepper. Serve hot. ; name: cheese stuffed mushrooms ; ingredients: mushrooms, green onion, garlic cloves, butter, dry breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, basil, pepper ; preparation:Remove mushroom stems and chop finely. In a small pan, cook stems, green onions, garlic and butter over medium heat til tender, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and add all remaining ingredients except caps. Fill caps with mixture, place in baking dish. Bake 350f for 15 minutes. ; name: mediterranean cauliflower salad ; ingredients: cauliflower, red bell pepper, fresh parsley, greek olive, capers, wine vinegar, olive oil, dried oregano, salt and pepper ; preparation:Steam cauliflower florets until just tender. Refresh under cold water to stop the cooking process. In a bowl, combine cauliflower, pepper, parsley, olives and capers, toss lightly. Whisk together the vinegar, oil and oregano and pour over vegetables. Marinate in the refrigerator for two hours or even overnight. Serve cold. ; name: passover or anytime broccoli cauliflower bake ; ingredients: broccoli, cauliflower floret, matzo meal, reduced-calorie butter, dry parsley flakes, lemon zest, thyme, table salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Place vegetables in a 2 quart ovenproof casserole dish. Bake until slightly tender, about 40 minutes. Combine remaining ingredients. Sprinkle mixture over vegetables. Bake until crumbs are crisp and brown, and vegetables are tender- about 5 minutes. ; name: steamed vegetable medley ; ingredients: cauliflower florets, carrot, red onion, fresh mushrooms, margarine, lemon juice, dried basil, dried marjoram ; preparation:

name: farmer s old fashioned vanilla pudding ; ingredients: milk, sugar, eggs, flour, pure vanilla extract, butter, heavy whipping cream ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan, heat milk and sugar, over medium to low heat. When hot, stir in eggs and flour. Beat together well and boil until thick. Stir in butter and vanilla after it is cooked. Cool and served chilled. Before serving, whip up heavy cream and fold in to chilled pudding. ; name: strawberry cheese cake ice cream ; ingredients: cream cheese, milk, fresh lemon juice, sugar, salt, heavy cream, eggs, vanilla, strawberry ; preparation:Bring milk just to a boil in a heavy saucepan. Whisk together eggs, sugar, and salt in a bowl, then add hot milk in a slow stream, whisking. Pour custard back into saucepan and cook over moderately low heat, stirring with a wooden spoon, approx 2 to 3 minutes, the custard will coat the back of the spoon. Immediately pour custard through a fine-mesh sieve into a clean bowl. On very low speed, blend in cream cheese until thoroughly incorporated. Stir in cream and vanilla. Place plastic wrap directly onto surface of custard mixture and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or over night. Freeze completely cooled custard in ice cream maker. When custard is nearly done, add sliced strawberries. Complete freezing process and transfer to an airtight container. Place in the freezer to cure for about two hours. Allow to stand at room temperature 5-10 minutes before serving. ; name: the heavy one cheesecake ; ingredients: cream cheese, granulated sugar, flour, lemon zest, orange zest, egg yolks, eggs, heavy cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 475 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese until it is light and fluffy. Mix in the sugar and flour and continue beating until it is smooth. Add the zests, the yolks, the eggs, one at a time, thoroughly mixing after the addition of each with the mixer. Stir in the heavy cream, and mix only briefly until blended. Pour the mixture into the prepared crust in the 10-inch springform pan, and bake for 15 minutes at 475 degrees f. Then, reduce the oven temperature to 200 degrees f and continue to bake for 60 minutes. Then, turn the oven off and allow the cake to sit inside while it cools down for another 60 minutes. Remove the cake from the oven, allow to cool to room temperature, then chill in the refrigerator over night. ; name: coconut macaroon ice cream biscuit tortoni ; ingredients: sugar, water, egg yolks, whipping cream, vanilla, macaroons ; preparation:Boil sugar and water together to form a syrup which spins a thread when dropped from the. Beat egg yolks well. Add syrup slowly, beating eggs during addition. Cook for 5 min. In double boiler. Remove from heat and beat well. Add the 1 c. Macaroons and cool. Whip the cream and fold into cooled egg mixture. Fold in vanilla. Spread in a shallow container and top with the powdered macaroons to give a brown crust appearance. Freeze overnight. ; name: sea salt caramels ; ingredients: heavy cream, granulated sugar, light corn syrup, honey, butter, vanilla extract, sea salt, bittersweet chocolate ; preparation:Prepare an 8-inch baking pan by lining it with aluminum foil and spraying the foil with nonstick cooking spray. Place the cream in a large saucepan over medium-high heat and bring it to a boil. Stir in the sugar, corn syrup and honey and stir until it begins to boil. Periodically wipe down the sides of the pan with a pastry brush dipped in water to prevent sugar crystals from forming. Cook the candy, stirring occasionally, until it reaches 257 degrees on a candy thermometer. Remove the pan from the heat immediately and stir in the butter, vanilla, and 2 teaspoons of salt. Pour into prepared pan and let set at room temperature until firm enough to cut. Cut the caramel into small squares or strips with a chefs knife. Temper the chocolate and dip the caramels in the chocolate one at a time. Place them on a baking sheet covered with waxed paper or foil to set. While chocolate is still wet, sprinkle on the remaining salt and allow to set completely. ; name: butterscotch peanut butter bars squares ; ingredients: brown sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla extract, flour, baking powder, salt, peanut butter, heavy cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a large bowl, cream brown sugar and melted butter. Add vanilla and eggs 1 at a time. In a separate bowl, sift flour, powder, and salt. Add dry mixture into wet mixture. Spread into a greased glass baking dish. Cook in oven until golden, 15-18 minutes. In a microwave safe bowl, heat peanut butter and cream on low heat. Stir until smooth, and spread over baked bars. Cool slightly and cut into bars. ; name: aunt georgia s shortbread cookies ; ingredients: butter, light brown sugar, sugar, egg yolks, vanilla, flour ; preparation:Cream together butter and sugars. Add in egg yolks and vanilla. Gradually add in flour. Roll teaspoon sized balls onto ungreased cookie sheets. Flatten with tines of a fork the way you would peanut butter cookies. Sprinkle with colored sugars or sprinkles if desired. Bake at 375 degrees for 8 minutes. ; name: honey ginger ice cream ; ingredients: heavy cream, whole milk, brown sugar, honey, gingerroot, egg yolks ; preparation:

name: gingersnap oatmeal ; ingredients: old-fashioned oatmeal, skim milk, water, molasses, ground ginger, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, vanilla extract, kosher salt ; preparation:In a small pot, heat oatmeal, skim milk, and water over medium heat. As oatmeal mixture is warming, add all the other ingredients. Stir thoroughly to combine. Let cook until most of the liquid is absorbed, and the oatmeal reaches yknow an oatmealy consistency. Serve warm. ; name: sugar coated molasses cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, molasses, eggs, flour, salt, baking soda, ground ginger, ground cloves, ground cinnamon ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar. Beat in the molasses and eggs. Separately, combine the dry ingredients, then slowly mix into the wet ingredients. When blended and smooth, roll the dough into small balls, about 1 inch around. Dip the tops in sugar and place on greased or non-stick baking sheets. Bake at 350f or 180c for 10-12 minutes. Cool on a wire rack, then store in a tightly covered container to keep the cookies soft. ; name: baked apricots with honey albaricoques al horno con miel ; ingredients: butter, apricots, slivered almonds, honey, ground ginger, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Lightly butter an ovenproof dish large enough to hold the apricot halves in a single layer. Arrange the apricots in the dish, cut side up. Sprinkle the apricots with the almonds and drizzle the honey over the top. Dust with the ginger. Bake for 12-15 minutes, until the apricots are tender and the almonds golden. Remove from the oven and serve at once, with ice cream on the side, if you want. ; name: sea salt caramels ; ingredients: heavy cream, granulated sugar, light corn syrup, honey, butter, vanilla extract, sea salt, bittersweet chocolate ; preparation:Prepare an 8-inch baking pan by lining it with aluminum foil and spraying the foil with nonstick cooking spray. Place the cream in a large saucepan over medium-high heat and bring it to a boil. Stir in the sugar, corn syrup and honey and stir until it begins to boil. Periodically wipe down the sides of the pan with a pastry brush dipped in water to prevent sugar crystals from forming. Cook the candy, stirring occasionally, until it reaches 257 degrees on a candy thermometer. Remove the pan from the heat immediately and stir in the butter, vanilla, and 2 teaspoons of salt. Pour into prepared pan and let set at room temperature until firm enough to cut. Cut the caramel into small squares or strips with a chefs knife. Temper the chocolate and dip the caramels in the chocolate one at a time. Place them on a baking sheet covered with waxed paper or foil to set. While chocolate is still wet, sprinkle on the remaining salt and allow to set completely. ; name: cinnamon chocolate sherbet ; ingredients: cocoa powder, sugar, ground cinnamon, nutmeg, water, evaporated milk, vanilla extract ; preparation:In saucepan, mix cocoa, sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg. Whisk in the water. Bring to a boil. Continue whisking to break up lumps and prevent burning. Reduce heat and simmer 2-3 minutes, until sugar is completely dissolved. Remove from heat add the milk and vanilla. Let cool. When the mixture reaches room temperature, pour in ice-cream maker. Freeze according to directions. ; name: harvest time pumpkin dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, powdered sugar, pumpkin puree, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, gingersnaps ; preparation:Let cream cheese stand at room temperature until softened. In a large bowl beat the cream cheese at medium speed of an electric mixer until creamy. Gradually add the powdered sugar, beating well. Stir in pumpkin, cinnamon and nutmeg. Serve immediately with gingersnaps for dipping, or cover and chill. ; name: hot chocolate with pink peppermint whipped cream ; ingredients: heavy cream, peppermint candies, powdered sugar, peppermint candy, whole milk, salt, semisweet chocolate, creme de cacao, instant coffee granules, vanilla extract ; preparation:This recipe can also be made with white chocolate. Simply substitute white chocolate and leave out the coffee. Beat the cream, pulverized peppermints and sugar untill stiff peaks form. Pipe or spoon onto a parchment paper lined baking sheet, sprinkle with the crushed peppermints, and freeze until firm, about 20 minutes. Heat the milk and salt for the hot chocolate in a saucepan over medium heat until steam begins to rise. Whisk in the remaining ingredients until smooth. Ladle into mugs and top with a rosette of frozen whipped cream. Doubling the whipped cream will give you quite a few rosettes to keep in the freezer until needed. Store them in an airtight container and try to use them within 2 or 3 weeks. ; name: aztec hot chocolate ; ingredients: skim milk, sugar, honey, ground ginger, ground cloves, ground red pepper, unsweetened cocoa, vanilla extract, whipped cream ; preparation:

name: the ultimate creamy chicken carbonara ; ingredients: spaghetti, bacon, onion, garlic clove, cooked chicken, parmesan cheese, whipping cream ; preparation:Cook and drain spaghetti as directed on package. While spaghetti is cooking, cook bacon in a a skillet, stirring frequently, until crisp. Remove bacon from pan with slotted spoon and drain. Drain fat from skillet, reserving 1 tablespoon in the pan. Cook onion and garlic in bacon fat over medium heat about 3 minutes, stirring frequently, until onion is tender. Stir in spaghetti, chicken, cheese and whipping cream. Cook, stirring occasionally, until heated through. Toss with bacon. ; name: easy shrimp etouffee ; ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, cream of celery soup, rotel tomatoes & chilies, onion, green bell pepper, shrimp, butter, white rice ; preparation:Melt butter in large saucepan. Saut veggies until crisp-tender. Add soups & tomatoes. Simmer 45 minutes, then add shrimp, cook until pink. Serve over hot white rice. ; name: creamy swiss steak ; ingredients: flour, salt, pepper, boneless beef round steak, butter, onion, condensed cream of mushroom soup, water, cooked noodles ; preparation:In a shallow bowl combine the flour, salt, and pepper. Dredge beef. In a large skillet, brown beef in butter on both sides. Transfer to a 3 quart slow cooker. Top with onion. Combine soup and water, pour over onion. Cover and cook on low 8-9 hours or until meet is tender. Serve with noodles. ; name: crock pot beef marsala ; ingredients: olive oil, beef stew meat, flour, garlic cloves, marsala wine, chicken stock, cream of mushroom soup, baby portabella mushrooms, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add beef cubes and saute until browned. Add garlic. Saute until garlic is lightly browned. Add flour and stir until well coated. Transfer meat into the crockpot and add marsala, broth, soup and sliced mushrooms. Mix well. Cover and cook on low for 8 to 10 hours or on high for 5 to 7 hours or until meat is tender. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve with or over rice, egg noodles or mashed potatoes. ; name: italian spaghetti frittata ; ingredients: spaghetti, parmesan cheese, butter, fresh parsley, eggs, salt & pepper ; preparation:Drain the spaghetti and stir in the cheese, 3 tbsp butter and the parsley. Let it cool slightly. Add salt& pepper to the beaten eggs. In a large non stick skillet heat remaining butter, over medium heat until foaming but not brown pour in the spagetti mixture and spread evenly. Cook for 4-5 minutes until the bottom is brown. Loosen with a spatula and invert onto a plate. Slide the frittata back into the pan and cook the other side until golden 3-4 minutes. ; name: ham cheese macaroni bake ; ingredients: onion, macaroni noodles, ham, cheddar cheese, milk, sour cream, cream of mushroom soup, parsley ; preparation:Using a layered effect, place onion, noodles, ham and cheese in a large 9 x 13 baking dish. Repeat for second layer using onion, noodles, ham and cheese. In a small bowl mix milk, sour cream and cream of mushroom soup. Pour over top of ham mixture. Sprinkle top with parsley. Bake in a 360 degree oven for 45 minutes. ; name: chicken noodle casserole ; ingredients: cooked chicken, medium noodles, onions, cream of mushroom soup, salt, pepper, mixed mushrooms, buttered bread crumbs ; preparation:Mix onions with noodles. Add chicken and seasonings. Add soup and mix well. Put mixture in greased 2 quart casserole dish. Sprinkle buttered bread crumbs or corn flake crumbs over top. Cover and bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. Uncover 10 minutes before done and let brown. ; name: easy turkey tetrazzini ; ingredients: spaghetti, white mushroom, butter, cooked turkey, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, salt and pepper, parsley ; preparation:

name: buttered noodles with eggs and parmesan cheese ; ingredients: noodles, eggs, parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, black pepper, butter ; preparation:Cook noodles in a large pot of lightly salted water until al dente. While the pasta is cooking, place the eggs, grated cheese, parsley, salt and pepper into a mixing bowl and beat with a whisk until well combined. When the noodles are almost cooked, melt the butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Quickly drain the pasta and add it to the skillet. Toss briefly to coat it with the butter. Add the egg mixture to the skillet and using a flat wooden spoon, mix quickly together for less than a minute until the eggs and noodles become creamy and thick. Do not cook the eggs too long or they will scramble and ruin the dish. Serve immediately. ; name: cheesy broccoli noodle soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, chicken broth, fine egg noodles, frozen chopped broccoli, salt, garlic powder, fresh ground pepper, milk, american cheese ; preparation:Heat olive oil in large saucepan. Add onion and saute over medium heat till onions are golden. Add chicken broth and bring to a boil. Add salt and noodles. Cook uncovered for about 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in broccoli and garlic powder and cook for another 4 minutes. Add milk, cheese and pepper stirring constantly until the cheese is melted. ; name: broccoli and noodles supreme ; ingredients: medium egg noodles, broccoli florets, cream of chicken and broccoli soup, sour cream, parmesan cheese, pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:In large saucepan prepare noodles according to package directions. Add broccoli for last five minutes of cooking time. Drain. In same pan mix soup, sour cream, cheese, pepper, garlic powder, and noodle mixture. Over medium heat, heat through, stirring occasionally. ; name: kid friendly tuna noodle casserole ; ingredients: spaghetti noodles, condensed cream of mushroom soup, milk, tuna in water, onion, garlic cloves, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large bowl, combine mushroom soup, milk, tuna, onions, garlic and cheddar cheddar cheese. Toss with cooked pasta. Transfer to greased 9-inch square casserole pan. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Bake uncovered for 30-45 minutes. ; name: pasta with turkey sausage tomatoes mozzarella ; ingredients: hot sausage, olive oil, garlic, onion, tomatoes with juice, dried red pepper flakes, pasta, smoked mozzarella cheese, parsley, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. Discard garlic. Add onion and cook until softened. Add tomatoes with juice, sausage and pepper flakes. Cook over medium high heat, until sauce is thickened. Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and toss with sausage in large bowl. Toss with mozzarella. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and chopped parsley. Serve hot. ; name: parmesan ranch snack mix ; ingredients: corn chex, wheat chex, rice chex, oyster crackers, pretzel twists, pistachio nut, parmesan cheese, butter, dry ranch dressing mix, garlic powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 250f. In a large bowl combine the cereal, oyster crackers, pretzels, pistachios and cheese. In a small bowl combine the butter, salad dressing mix, and garlic powder. Drizzle over the cereal mix, tossing to lightly coat mixture. Place on a cookie or baking sheet and bake for 30 minutes. Remove and let cool completely before packing in jars. ; name: spaghetti cupcakes ; ingredients: spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, ground black pepper, pasta sauce, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 12-cup muffin pan. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, and pepper. Evenly press mixture into muffin cups to form a crust. Evenly top each cup with pasta sauce, then mozzarella cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until bubbling. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. ; name: pizza flavored snack mix ; ingredients: crispix cereal, parmesan cheese, spaghetti sauce mix, garlic powder, pretzel nuggets, vegetable oil ; preparation:

name: church supper chops ; ingredients: pork chops, cream of mushroom soup, water, milk, vegetable oil, flour, salt, pepper ; preparation:Mix the flour, salt and pepper. Dredge chops in it. Brown chops in the oil in a skillet. When browned, remove chops to a platter and drain fat. Stir soup water and milk into skillet, mixing well. Put chops back in. Cover. Reduce heat to low and simmer 45 minutes. If gravy is too thin, stir in a teaspoon full of leftover flour and cook a bit. ; name: pork chops in mushroom gravy ; ingredients: pork chops, flour, salt and pepper, butter, onion, garlic, fresh mushrooms, milk, dry red wine, dried thyme ; preparation:Combine flour, salt and pepper and dredge pork chops in the mixture. Melt butter in large skillet and brown pork chops on each side. Remove chops from skillet. Saute onion, garlic and mushrooms in same skillet. Add leftover flour that was used to coat chops, then add milk, wine and thyme. Simmer until mixture starts to thicken. Return chops to pan and cover. Simmer for 30 minutes or until chops are done. ; name: rice cooker fried rice ; ingredients: rice, beef stock, oil, bacon, onion, garlic, frozen mixed vegetables, soy sauce ; preparation:Turn rice cooker onto cook. Add oil, bacon, onion and garlic to rice cooker. Stir frequently until onion is soft. Add rice to rice cooker and coat in oil. Add frozen vegetable and beef stock and mix well. Place lid on rice cooker and let it do its thing. When finished mix in soy sauce and stir. Serve. ; name: smoked sausage potato chowder ; ingredients: smoked sausage, beef broth, water, scalloped potatoes mix, frozen mixed vegetables, salt, lemon pepper, whole milk, fresh chives ; preparation:Brown sausage in a soup pot over medium high heat. Add broth and water, potatoes and mixed vegetables, bring to a boil. Reduce heat, whisk in sauce mix, salt and lemon pepper until blended. Cover and simmer over low heat 10-15 minutes or until potatoes are tender, stirring occasionally. Stir in milk, cook uncovered, over medium heat until heated through. Remove from heat, stir in chopped chives and serve. ; name: 3 ingredient pan simmered italian boneless pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, stewed tomatoes, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil over medium-high heat in large frying pan that has a lid. Season pork chops with salt and pepper. Sear chops in pan till lightly browned, about 1-2 minutes per side. Remove frying pan from burner. Slowly pour can of stewed tomatoes over chops. Distribute tomatoes so some are under chops and the balance is evenly covering the tops of the pork chops. Cover pan and return to burner. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 2-3 hours, or until chops are fork tender. You can leave the chops on low for even longer, if you prefer - adjust to your schedule. Uncover and let simmer for another hour until some of the water in the pan evaporates. Serve with side of mashed potatoes or over pasta of your choice with some parmesan cheese. ; name: roast pork and apple dinner ; ingredients: pork chops, onion, sliced mushrooms, balsamic vinaigrette, minute white rice, condensed chicken broth, water, red apples, dried thyme leaves ; preparation:Spray large nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Add chops. Cook on medium-high heat 4 minutes on each side or until browned. Add onion, mushrooms and dressing. Cook an additional 3 minutes. Stir in rice, broth, water, apples and thyme. Reduce heat to medium. Simmer 10 minutes or until heated through. ; name: easy filipino pancit noodles for two ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, yellow onion, fresh ground black pepper, rice noodles, vegetable oil, low sodium soy sauce, green cabbage, paprika, hard-boiled egg, green onions ; preparation:Heat a large skillet over medium heat and use either cooking spray or a small amount of oil. Add the onions and pork and saute 5 minutes, or until browned, stirring often. Remove pork from pan and set aside. Soak rice noodles in warm water for 5 minutes then drain. Heat pan over medium high heat. Add noodles to pan and saute 2 minutes. Stir in soy sauce, and cook 2 minutes more, tossing to coat. Add cabbage and paprika and cook 1 minute. Then place pork back in pan and cook for 4 minutes more, stirring frequently. Garnish with egg slices and chopped green onion before serving. ; name: pork chop onion and rice casserole ; ingredients: pork chops, oil, dry onion soup mix, frozen mixed vegetables, uncooked rice, beef broth ; preparation:

name: rice with chayote fritanga ; ingredients: vegetable oil, chayote, onion, garlic cloves, cooked rice, tomatoes, salt, pepper, chives ; preparation:Heat 2 tablespoons vegetable oil in 12 inch skillet until hot. Cook and stir chayote over medium heat until crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Cook and stir onion and garlic in 1 tablespoon oil until onion is tender, about 5 minutes. Stir in rice, cook and stir until hot, about 8 minutes. Stir in chayote, tomato, salt and pepper. Cook and stir until tomato is hot, 3 to 5 minutes. Sprinkle with chives. ; name: garlic spiked broccoli and mushrooms ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, button mushrooms, broccoli, fresh rosemary, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:In large skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Add garlic and saute 1 minute. Add mushrooms and saute 3 minutes, until mushrooms release juice. Add broccoli and rosemary and cook 3 to 5 minutes or until broccoli is crisp-tender. Season to taste with salt and pepper. ; name: onion mushroom and spinach saute for two ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, mushrooms, garlic clove, spinach leaves, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat a medium saute pan on medium heat. Add olive oil. Add onions and mushrooms, stirring for 5-10 minutes, until golden brown, adding garlic halfway through. Add spinach and stir a minute or two, until spinach is just wilted. Remove from heat and add balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper to taste. ; name: mushroom toasties ; ingredients: butter, chestnut mushrooms, garlic clove, thyme leaves, white bread, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat grill to high. Melt butter in a frying pan and fry mushrooms until tender. Add garlic and thyme and cook for another minute. Toast the bread, top with the mushrooms and then the cheese. Grill until cheese is brown and bubbly. ; name: hamburger stoganoff ; ingredients: onion, garlic clove, butter, ground beef, flour, salt, pepper, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, mushroom ; preparation:Saute onion and garlic in butter over medium heat. Stir in meat and brown. Add mushrooms, flour, salt and pepper. Cook 5 minutes. Stir in soup. Simmer uncovered 10 minutes. Add sour cream, mix well and heat through. Serve over mashed potatoes, pasta or rice. ; name: sauteed broccoli cauliflower and mushrooms ; ingredients: broccoli, cauliflower, mushrooms, garlic, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Mix cut-up broccoli and cauliflower, sliced mushrooms and minced garlic. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Cover and let stand an hour, if possible. Heat oil in a large saute or fry pan until very hot. Add vegetables all at once, spreading in an even layer. Do not stir until bottom of layer begins to brown. Flip and stir to get unbrowned pieces to bottom. Let cook until beginning to brown. The trick here is to keep heat high and brown pieces without overcooking or burning them. If pieces are browned, but not soft enough for your taste, turn off heat and cover pan for a few minutes. ; name: glazed rosemary honey mushrooms ; ingredients: olive oil, rosemary, garlic clove, honey, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper, button mushrooms ; preparation:Preheat onven to 325 degrees. In a heavy bottom pan place oil through salt and pepper heat and whisk to blend and melt honey. Add mushrooms and toss to coat. Bake for 30-40 minutes stirring a couple times. Serve with a sprig of rosemary. ; name: mushrooms for the bbq ; ingredients: oil, butter, mushrooms, garlic, chives, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: healthier french toast ; ingredients: eggs, milk, maple syrup, cinnamon, vanilla extract, bread, oil, powdered sugar, carrot, sweet potato ; preparation:Combine eggs, milk, orange puree, maple syrup or honey, cinnamon, and vanilla in a large shallow dish. Dip bread until soaked on both sides. Cook in skillet over medium heat. Use a small amount of oil to keep the toast from sticking. Allow the first side to brown, then flip to brown the second side of the bread. Dust with powdered sugar or top with your favorite syrup. ; name: super easy chocolate mousse ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, heavy cream, instant coffee, dark chocolate ; preparation:Melt chocolate and set aside. In a blender combine egg yolks and sugar, mix for 2 minutes. Add chocolate and heavy cream and coffee, blend for 2 minutes. Add egg whites and blend for 4 minutes. Pour into serving dish and refrigerate for at least 3 hours. ; name: tingle mints ; ingredients: powdered sugar, butter, mint extract, water ; preparation:Melt butter. Place powder sugar in bowl along with flavoring and melted butter. Knead with hands until mixture is in a solid non-sticky dough mixture. If powder sugar is left in bowl, add very little water to mix in mixture. Shape and enjoy. ; name: mint julep sweet tea ; ingredients: fresh mint leaves, lemon, sugar, tea, bourbon, ice, mint sprig ; preparation:Combine first 3 ingredients in a 2 quart pitcher. Press mint leaves against sides of pitcher with back of spoon to release flavors. Stir in tea and bourbon. Serve over crushed ice. Garnish with mint leaves. ; name: mandarin mocha ; ingredients: coffee, chocolate syrup, orange extract, milk, cocoa powder ; preparation:Pour coffee into a cup. Add chocolate syrup. Add extract. Steam the milk till it is frothy and add to coffee. Spoon a bit of milk foam onto coffee and sprinkle with cocoa powder. Sweeten with sugar if desired. ; name: cinnamon chocolate sherbet ; ingredients: cocoa powder, sugar, ground cinnamon, nutmeg, water, evaporated milk, vanilla extract ; preparation:In saucepan, mix cocoa, sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg. Whisk in the water. Bring to a boil. Continue whisking to break up lumps and prevent burning. Reduce heat and simmer 2-3 minutes, until sugar is completely dissolved. Remove from heat add the milk and vanilla. Let cool. When the mixture reaches room temperature, pour in ice-cream maker. Freeze according to directions. ; name: coffee mousse ; ingredients: instant coffee, unflavored gelatin, water, boiling water, cream cheese spread, sugar, whipping cream, eggs, coffee beans ; preparation:Mix coffee granules, gelatine and room temperature water in small bowl until well blended. Add boiling water. Stir at least 1 minute or until gelatine is completely dissolved. Cool to room temperature. Beat cream cheese and sugar in large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until well blended. Gradually add cream, beating until well blended. Add eggs. Beat just until blended. Gently stir in coffee mixture. Pour evenly into 6 dessert dishes. Refrigerate several hours or until set. Top each with coffee bean just before serving. ; name: sahlep salep sahlab ; ingredients: instant tea, sugar, cinnamon, milk ; preparation:

name: the pizza makers sauce ; ingredients: garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, olive oil, crushed tomatoes, dried oregano, salt ; preparation:In a big skillet. Cook the garlic and red pepper flakes in the oil over medium heat until the garlic is golden, about 1 minute. Add in tomatoes, oregano, and salt to taste. Bring to a simmer. Cook, stirring occasionally, until thickened, about 10-15 minutes. Let the sauce cool before spreading it on the pizza dough. Keeps well in refrigerator for up to 5 days. In the freezer for 1 month. ; name: tarka dhall ; ingredients: lentils, water, salt, turmeric, onion, garlic cloves, dried red chilies, cumin seed, oil, garlic clove ; preparation:Wash lentils till the water runs clear. Drain the lentils. Place lentils in pan with the water, salt, turmeric, onion, garlic and chillis. Cook till the lentils are soft and sloppy. Heat the oil in a separate pan, fry the cumin seeds till they start to pop, add the garlic and cook 30 seconds. Serve the lentils with the fried garlic and cumin seeds poured over them. ; name: curried shrimp with cilantro ; ingredients: olive oil, shallots, garlic cloves, curry powder, reduced-sodium vegetable broth, shrimp, fresh lime juice, low-fat sour cream, fresh cilantro, salt and pepper ; preparation:Over medium heat, heat oil in skillet. Add shallots and garlic. Cook and stir about 2 minutes until tender. Add curry powder. Cook and stir about 1 minute until the mixture becomes fragrant. Add the broth and bring to simmer. Add the lime juice and shrimp. Simmer until the shrimp are cooked through, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in sour cream and cilantro. Season with salt and pepper, serve immediately. ; name: red pepper hummus ; ingredients: garlic cloves, garbanzo beans, tahini, fresh lemon juice, jar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Wtih processor running, drop garlic through feed tube and mince. Scrape down sides of work bowl. Add chickpeas, tahini and lemon juice. Process until mixture is smooth. Add roasted peppers. Process until peppers are finely chopped. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer hummus to small bowl. ; name: tournedos con salsa chipotle filet mignon in chipotle sauce ; ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, oil, dried chipotle chiles, tomatoes, dried oregano, sugar, salt and pepper, filet mignon, french bread ; preparation:Saute the onion and garlic in the oil until soft, then add all of the other ingredients and cook over low heat until done, approximately one half hour. Remove from heat and puree in a blender or food processor until smooth. Return to the pan and keep warm until ready for serving. Grill or saute the filet mignons to taste, usually rare or medium-rare. Place each filet on a slice of the french bread, and spread the sauce over each. Serve warm. ; name: spiced lemon rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil, mustard seeds, ground turmeric, onion, garlic cloves, chilies, long-grain white rice, fresh lemon juice, kosher salt, roasted cashews ; preparation:Heat oil in a large heavy saucepan over medium heat. Add mustard seeds and turmeric and cook, shaking pan, until mustard seeds pop, 1-2 minutes. Add onion, garlic, and chile and cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is translucent, about 7 minutes. Add rice and stir to coat, add lemon peel, salt, and 3 cups water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and cook until rice is tender, 20-25 minutes. Stir in lemon juice. Cover and let stand off heat for 15 minutes. Fluff with a fork and stir in cashews. ; name: lamb and sweet potato slow cooker casserole aust ww 4 pnts ; ingredients: olive oil, lean lamb, onions, garlic cloves, coriander powder, whole cardamom pods, sweet potato, hot water ; preparation:Place lamb, onions, garlic, coriander, cardamom, sweet potato and stock in a 5-litre capacity slow cooker. Season well with salt and pepper. Cover and cook on a low setting for 7 hours. Make sure to split cardamom pods down centre with a large sharp knife. This will help cardamom flavour to infuse in casserole. Unfortunately some of the black seeds may come out during the cooking process, so be careful not to eat them. They arent at all harmful to your health, just a little full-on in flavour. Serve with steamed green beans or broccoli. ; name: curry massalla gravy ; ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, passata, turmeric powder, garam masala powder, green cardamom seeds, vegetable oil, water, salt ; preparation:

name: carrot potato and onion gratin ; ingredients: butter, russet potatoes, onions, carrot, salt, fresh ground black pepper, chicken stock, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f generously butter a medium-size gratin dish. Make a layer of one-third of the potato slices in the bottom of the prepared gratin dish. Add a layer of half the onions and then half the carrots. Dot with 2 tablespoons of the butter and season well with salt and pepper. Repeat the layers and finish with the remaining one-third of the potato slices. Dot with the remaining 2 tablespoons of butter and season with salt and pepper. Pour in the stock. Cover with aluminum foil and bake until the vegetables are tender, about 45 minutes. Uncover and sprinkle with the cheese. Bake 10 minutes longer, until the cheese is golden brown. Serve very hot. Makes 6 to 8 servings. ; name: mary s swiss steak ; ingredients: margarine, onions, round steaks, flour, salt, pepper, paprika, water, sour cream ; preparation:Melt 4 tbsp margarine in a large skillet, then saut onions. Remove from the skillet. Coat the steak with the flour. Season with salt and pepper. Melt remaining margarine in the skillet and brown the meat well on both sides. Mix with steak the onions, water, sour cream until blended. Cover and cook over medium heat till meat is tender. Uncover and cook until the sauce thickens. Serve over hot cooked rice or noodles. ; name: pommes de terre a la boulangere ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, onions, potatoes, salt and pepper, fresh thyme, beef stock ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 300 degrees f. Melt half the butter with the olive oil in a saute pan, and gently fry the onions until soft and lightly golden, about 15 minutes. Spread half the onions in the bottom of a casserole. Lay a layer of sliced potatoes on top, season with salt and pepper, and scatter with thyme leaves. Build another layer of onions, then a final one of potatoes, and finally pour over the stock. Cover the pan with foil, and bake until all the liquid has been absorbed, 2 to 3 hours, removing the foil for the last hour if you like a crisp top. ; name: rogene s yummie potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, green onion, chicken stock, cheddar cheese, breadcrumbs, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cook potatoes till tender, peel and grate. Heat the butter with soup and chicken stock. Blend in sour cream, onion, and most of the cheese. Mix with the potatoes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Spread into a 9x13 baking dish. Mix the bread crumbs with the melted butter and then place on top of the potatoe mixture. Sprinkle with the remaining cheese. Bake for 45 min at 350 degrees or until bubbly. ; name: mum s leek and potato soup ; ingredients: butter, leeks, onion, potatoes, salt, pepper, boiling water, chicken stock, milk, cream ; preparation:Wash leeks and chop up. Melt butter in saucepan and add chopped onions and leeks. Fry for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the potatoes, water, stock and salt. Bring to the boil and then simmer for 20 minutes. When vegetables are tender, put through blender. Return to saucepan and re-heat. Add milk, cream and pepper. Do not re-boil. Serve in soup bowls with bread and butter or french stick and butter on the side. ; name: parmesan garlic potatoes ; ingredients: butter, garlic powder, parmesan cheese, red potatoes, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Set oven to 375f. Grease a 13 x 9-inch baking dish. Pour the melted butter into the bottom of the baking dish, then sprinkle with garlic powder, then parmesan cheese. In a large bowl toss the potato halves in olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Place the potatoes cut-side down over the parmesan cheese in the baking dish. Bake for about 40-45 minutes, or until tender. ; name: hunter s sauce sauce chasseur ; ingredients: mushroom, tomatoes, butter, shallot, salt & freshly ground black pepper, dry white wine, beef broth, fresh tarragon, cornstarch, water ; preparation:Melt butter in a saucepan and add mushrooms, shallots, salt and pepper to taste, and cook about 10 minutes. Add the wine and simmer briefly over high heat. Add the tomatoes and beef broth, and tarragon. Cook about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Blend the cornstarch with the water. Stir into sauce and cook until slightly thickened. ; name: potatoes paprika ; ingredients: butter, shallot, hungarian paprika, tomatoes, salt and pepper, sour cream, potatoes, chicken stock ; preparation:

name: black bean nachos with chipotle tabasco ; ingredients: black beans, ground cumin, tabasco brand chipotle pepper sauce, tortilla chips, red onion, tomatoes, shredded cheddar cheese, cilantro ; preparation:In a bowl, combine beans, cumin and tabasco brand chipotle pepper sauce and mix well. Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread tortilla chips in a single layer over large baking sheet with edges slightly overlapping. Spoon approximately one teaspoonful of black beans onto each corn chip and top with onion, tomato, and cheese. Bake in oven 6 to 8 minutes or until cheese melts and nachos are heated through. Sprinkle with the fresh cilantro. Serve hot. ; name: jana s church enchiladas ; ingredients: flour tortillas, ground beef, onion, taco seasoning, cream of chicken soup, milk, green chilies, velveeta cheese, green onion dip ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Brown ground beef and onion. After meat is finished, add taco seasoning. In a saucepan, combine soup, milk, green chilies, velveeta and onion dip. Heat on low till creamy. Fill tortillas with spoonful of meat, roll and put seamside down. Pour creamy mixture over tortillas in a 9x13 pan. Cook at 350 for 20-30 minutes. ; name: wildcat scramble ; ingredients: diced onion, tortilla chips, green chili, canned black beans, sour cream, chorizo sausage, eggs, cilantro, salt and pepper, cheese ; preparation:Mix eggs, sour cream, salt and pepper and set aside. Saute onions and sausage. Drain fat. Add all ingrediants to eggs except cheese. Pour into greased, oversized, muffin tins, makes 12 large. Sprinkle grated cheese on top. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes or until set. ; name: spinach rollups ; ingredients: burrito-size flour tortillas, frozen chopped spinach, mayonnaise, cream cheese, sour cream, dried onion flakes, bacon bits, tabasco sauce ; preparation:Cook the spinach and drain it, squeezing out all of the moisture. Mix together all ingredients except the tortillas. Spread small amount of spinach mixture out on the face of a tortilla. Roll it up and place it in a plastic freezer bag. Continue spreading and rolling tortillas until the spinach mixture is gone. Fold the plastic bag over when all rollups are inside to make sure they stay tightly rolled. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours. Slice with a sharp knife, arrange on a platter, and serve as appetizers. ; name: broccoli burritos ; ingredients: flour tortillas, fresh broccoli, monterey jack cheese, tomatoes, onion, jalapeno, tomato sauce, sour cream ; preparation:Wrap tortillas tightly in aluminum foil. Bake at 350 degrees f for 15 minutes. Combine broccoli, cheese, tomato, jalapenos if you want, and onion. Spoon mixture evenly in center of each tortilla. Roll up each tortilla. Place seam side down in a lightly greased 12x8 2-inch baking dish. Top with tomato sauce or other tomato variant. Cover dish, and bake at 350 degrees f. For 45 minutes. Spread sour cream over top. Garnish with parsley if desired. ; name: inside out b double t s ; ingredients: flour tortillas, mexican cheese, maple bacon, tomatoes, mayonnaise, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, butter-flavored cooking spray ; preparation:Spray a large, flat skillet with cooking spray. Drop one tortilla in and fill with lots of cheese. Sprinkle bacon pieces over cheese. Top with another tortilla. Flip over when bottom tortilla is golden brown. Cook until cheese is melted. Slide onto a plate and cut into wedges with a pizza wheel cutter. Slather each piece with mayonnaise and top with a thick slice of tomato. Sprinkle with sea salt and freshly ground black pepper and serve. Cooking time does not include cooking time for the bacon. ; name: cowboy soup ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, green pepper, enchilada sauce, vegetable soup, ranch style beans, whole kernel corn ; preparation:Combine ground beef, onion, and green pepper in large saucepan. Cook till onion and pepper are tender. Drain off fat. Add enchilada sauce, soup, beans, and corn to ground beef and onion mixture. Stir to combine. Simmer for 15 minutes. ; name: lower fat burrito casserole ; ingredients: flour tortillas, refried beans, enchilada sauce, onion ; preparation:

name: steamed broccoli rabe ; ingredients: broccoli rabe, olive oil, garlic clove, crushed red pepper flakes, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Trim broccoli by cutting off the bottom of the stalks. Rinse well and drain allowing water droplets to remain on broccoli. Heat oil in a heavy skillet. Add garlic and red pepper flakes. Add broccoli rabe and stir until the leaves start to wilt. Season with salt and pepper. Cover skillet and let cook 3 to 5 minutes, turning occasionally. ; name: oriental cabbage ; ingredients: onion, water, garlic clove, fresh ginger, sesame oil, cabbage, soy sauce ; preparation:Slice onion. Place in bowl with water. Cover and microwave on high for 3 minutes. Put onion in large skillet with remaining ingredients. Cook, covered, over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, until cabbage is tender, about 20 minutes. ; name: red star basic chicken taco filling ; ingredients: oil, cooked chicken, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes with juice, green chilies, cumin seed, salt, black pepper, water ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Sautee chicken, onion and garlic until onion softens and chicken begins to brown crisp on edges, about 8-12 minutes. Salt and pepper to taste. Reduce heat to medium. Stir in tomatoes, chiles and cumin. If needed add enough water just to make the mixture a little soupy. Continue to cook, stirring occassionally, until liquid is reduced. Mixture should be moist, not wet or dry. Use immediately or freeze for later. ; name: lentils with onion and garlic ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, dried red chili, green lentil, water ; preparation:Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top. ; name: grilled feta cheese appetizer ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, feta cheese, garlic clove, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, fresh oregano, fresh ground black pepper, french bread ; preparation:Oil a 14 inch long piece of heavy duty aluminum foil. Place onion slices in center of french bread slices on the foil. Slice feta into 24 pieces, place on top of onions and sprinkle with garlic. Add bell peppers and sprinkle with oregano and black pepper. Fold up foil and seal edges. Grill covered 30 minutes turning once or bake at 350f. ; name: ratatouille rice ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, mushroom, red bell pepper, eggplant, tomato sauce, chicken broth, dried thyme leaves, brown rice ; preparation:Prheat oven to 350 degrees. Heat oil in 12 inch fry pan over medium heat. Add onion, cooking til soft, about 7 minutes. Add garlic and cook 1 more minute. Add mushrooms, bell pepper and eggplant. Cook, stirring, until liquid has evaporated, about 5 minutes. In a 3 or 4 quart casserole, combine eggplant mixture with tomato sauce, broth, thyme and rice. Cover and bake till rice is tender. ; name: pantry southwest chicken ; ingredients: tomatoes and green chilies, tomato sauce, black beans, onion, corn, chicken breasts, garlic cloves, cumin, salt and pepper, olive oil ; preparation:In olive oil, cook the chicken until almost done. Remove from pan. In same pan, add onion and garlic. Cook until onion is translucent. Add diced tomatoes with chilis, can of tomato sauce, can of black beans, corn, and cumin. Return chicken to pan and cook until the chicken is done. Serve with hot cooked rice. ; name: chili garlic broccoli ; ingredients: broccoli, red chili pepper, garlic clove, vegetable oil, dark soy sauce ; preparation:

name: scrumptious chicken ; ingredients: skinless chicken breast halves, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, dry onion soup mix, fresh basil ; preparation:Grease the bottom and sides of slow cooker. Place chicken in slow cooker. Combine all the remaining ingredients except fresh herbs. Pour over chicken. Cover. Cook on low for 6 hours. Sprinkle with fresh herbs just before serving. Serve with rice, couscous, or over toast as a sos meal. ; name: nif s quick and tasty parmesan chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, milk, garlic powder, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, paprika, salt and pepper, grapeseed oil ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Pound the chicken breasts to an even thickness with the side of a mallet. Mix milk and garlic powder together in a shallow dish. Mix breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese and paprika in a separate shallow dish. Add salt and pepper to taste. Heat frying pan on medium heat and add oil. Coat the chicken in milk and press into the breadcrumb mixture. Brown both sides of the chicken in the hot pan, about 4 to 5 minutes on each side. Place chicken on a baking sheet. Bake until cooked through, about 20 minutes. ; name: curried chicken florentine ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, mild cheddar cheese, frozen spinach, lemons, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, mayonnaise, curry powder, butter, oil ; preparation:Squeeze juice from one lemon over chicken breasts and let sit for 15- 20 minutes at room temp. Heat butter and oil in a large skillet. Salt and pepper chicken breasts and cook in hot oil until lightly browned. Put spinach into bottom of a 9 x 13 casserole. Sprinkle shredded cheese on top of spinach. Place browned chicken breasts on top of cheese. Mix soup, sour cream, mayo, juice from second lemon, and curry powder. Pour over chicken breasts. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 45 minutes. Serve with rice. ; name: easy elegant chicken and sherry ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, sliced mushrooms, sherry wine, paprika ; preparation:Place chicken breasts in casserole dish. Mix together soup, sour cream, mushrooms and sherry. Pour over chicken. Sprinkle with paprika. Bake 1 hour and 10 minutes at 350 degrees. Serve with rice. ; name: chicken with bacon cream sauce ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, garlic powder, salt and pepper, bacon, sour cream, cream of mushroom soup, cooked rice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Season chicken breasts with garlic powder, salt and pepper. Wrap each chicken breast in 1 strip of bacon and place in a 9x13x2-inch baking dish. In a small bowl, mix the sour cream and soup. Spoon mixture over the chicken and bake uncovered for 40 to 50 minutes or until slightly brown on top. Serve with hot cooked rice, if desired. ; name: easy chicken almondine ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, ritz crackers, sliced almonds, butter, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Boil chicken on stove top until no longer pink. Dice or shred chicken and layer on bottom of 9 x 13-inch pan. In seperate bowl, mix cream of chicken soup with sour cream. Blend well. Spread soup sour cream mixture on top of chicken. Add shredded cheese, then layer with crushed ritz crackers. Pour melted butter over crackers. Sprinkle almonds on top. Bake at 350 degrees for approximately 25 minutes, until bubbly. ; name: pollo a la crema ; ingredients: olive oil, boneless chicken breasts, sweet onion, fresh mushrooms, paprika, chicken base, heavy cream, sour cream ; preparation:Heat oil in large frying pan. Saute chicken and onion until chicken is no longer pink & onions are translucent. Add cream, mushrooms, paprika & chicken base. Bring to a boil and simmer for 5-7 minutes or until chicken is tender. Remove from heat and stir in sour cream. Mixture will be somewhat thin, but should be a creamy texture like the consistency of a white sauce. Serve hot with warmed flour tortillas and spanish rice. ; name: chicken supreme ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, butter, fresh mushrooms, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, garlic salt, paprika, swiss cheese ; preparation:

name: limoncello syllabub with crushed amaretti cookies ; ingredients: lemons, juice and zest of, limoncello, heavy cream, caster sugar, amaretti cookies ; preparation:Mix the lemon juice, most of the zest and the limoncello together. Pour the cream into a large bowl and softly whip with the sugar. Drizzle in the lemon mixture and whisk until incorporated. Divide between 6 small glasses and refrigerate for at least an hour. Just before serving, put 6 cookies in a plastic bag. Crush with a rolling pin and sprinkle over each dessert with a little lemon zest. If you like, serve each with a whole cookie on the side. ; name: summer peach salad ; ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, heavy cream, fresh peaches, pecans, lemon juice ; preparation:Beat cream cheese and heavy cream until fluffy. Stir in mayo and lemon juice. Fold in peaches and pecans. Pour into 9x9x2 glass dish and freeze for 3-4 hours. Using warm knife, cut into squares. ; name: sweet dip with cookies and fruit ; ingredients: cream cheese, butter, yogurt, orange zest, powdered sugar, cookie, berries, dark chocolate squares ; preparation:Beat first 4 ingredients at medium-high speed with an electric mixer until smooth. Gradually add sugar, beating until creamy. Cover and chill at least 1 hour or up to 3 days covered. Let stand at room temperature 30 minutes before serving. Serve with cookies, berries, and dark chocolate squares. ; name: lemon passionfruit butter ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, butter, passion fruit, lemons, juice of, water, lemon zest ; preparation:In a heatproof bowl, whisk together the eggs and sugar until combined. Place over a pan of gently simmering water. Gradually add all remaining ingredients. Whisk over low heat 10-15 minutes, until the mixture thickens and coats the back of a wooden spoon. Do not boil. Pour into sterilised jars and seal. The bottles can be stored in a cool place but must be refrigerated once opened. ; name: easiest ever hollandaise sauce ; ingredients: butter, lemon, juice of, salt, white pepper, egg yolks ; preparation:Cut the butter into several pieces and bring to room temperature. In the top of a double boiler, combine egg yolks, lemon juice, salt and pepper. Add a piece of butter. Cook, stirring steadily with a wooden spoon or wire whisk, over, but not touching, boiling water. When butter melts and sauce begins to thicken, add remaining butter, stirring constantly until melted. Continue cooking as sauce thickens, about 2 more minutes. Immediately remove from heat. ; name: quick lemon curd ; ingredients: white sugar, eggs, fresh lemon juice, lemons, zest of, unsalted butter ; preparation:In a microwave bowl, whisk together the sugar and eggs until smooth. Stir in lemon juice, lemon zest, and butter. Cook in the microwave for one minute intervals, stirring after each minute until the mixture is thick enough to coat the back of a metal spoon. It will be quite liquid but will set up somewhat overnight. Remove from the microwave, and pour into sterile jars. Store for up to 3 weeks in the refrigerator. ; name: perfect no cook strawberry ice cream ; ingredients: strawberry, sugar, fresh lemon juice, salt, heavy cream ; preparation:Coarsely mash strawberries with sugar, lemon juice, and salt using a potato masher in a large bowl. Let stand, stirring and mashing occasionally, 10 minutes. Transfer half of strawberry mixture to a blender and pure with cream until smooth. Return strawberry cream to bowl with remaining strawberries and chill, stirring occasionally, until very cold, 3 to 6 hours. Freeze mixture in ice cream maker. Transfer to an airtight container and put in freezer to firm up. ; name: easy lemon mousse ; ingredients: double cream, lemon, juice of, lemon, zest of, sugar, low-fat cream cheese ; preparation:

name: scampi shrimp skewers ; ingredients: shrimp, margarine, olive oil, garlic cloves, dry white wine, fresh parsley, lemon peel, ground black pepper, green onions, sweet red pepper ; preparation:If your shrimp is frozen, thaw before using. Peel shrimp leaving tails intact and devein. In a small saucepan using medium-high heat, melt margarine or butter and oil. Add garlic and cook for 2 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in wine, parsley, lemon peel, and ground pepper. Set aside. Using 6-inch long appetizer skewers thread shrimp, green onion, and pepper pieces and brush with garlic mixture. Grill the shrimp and vegetable skewers on a grill rack directly over medium heat for approximately 6 to 8 minutes or until shrimp turns pink. Turn once and brush with garlic mixture halfway through grilling. Serve immediately. ; name: scallops alexandra ; ingredients: scallions, garlic, paprika, salt, pepper, butter, scallops, seasoned bread crumbs ; preparation:Mix scallions, garlic, paprika, salt, and pepper together. In a saute pan, melt butter. When butter is melted, add saute scallion mixture. In a separate bowl, coat the scallops with bread crumbs. Add the coated scallops to the saute mixture. Stir and cook for about 2 to 4 minutes, until golden brown. ; name: clams with garlic and almonds tapas ; ingredients: littleneck clams, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, sliced almonds, dry white wine, lemons, juice and zest of, scallions, parsley ; preparation:Scrub and drain cockles and set aside. In a 12-inch to 14-inch saute pan, heat oil until smoking. Add garlic and almonds and saute until golden brown. Add clams, wine and lemon juice and zest and bring to a boil. Cover and cook until clams open, about 3 to 4 minutes. Uncover, add scallions and parsley and serve. ; name: cilantro dressing for salads ; ingredients: garlic cloves, salt, cilantro, parsley, sherry wine vinegar, olive oil, hot pepper sauce, sugar ; preparation:Using your steel knife in the food processor mix garlic and salt. Process until it is a paste. Add cilantro and parsley. Process to a fine mince. Add vinegar. Process for 10 seconds. Add oil in a slow steady stream with the processor on. Add hot pepper sauce and a pinch of sugar. Chill the dressing for several hours in a glass jar. Shake to combine before using. ; name: sea scallops sauteed with mushrooms pasta ; ingredients: sea scallops, pasta, fresh mushrooms, butter, garlic cloves, white wine, fresh lemon juice, sea salt ; preparation:Rinse scallops & drain. Melt 2 tbsp butter in large non-stick skillet. Add 1 clove pressed garlic & scallops. Cook over medium heat about 6 - 8 minutes, stirring often. Remove scallops and set aside leaving juice in pan. Add wine, 2 tbsp lemon juice, 2 cloves pressed garlic and mushrooms. Saute for about 3 minutes. Add cooked pasta to pan, 1 tbsp butter, stir until melted. Add cooked scallops, 1 tbsp lemon juice, 1 tsp sea salt, stir, cover pan, remove from heat & let juices blend for about 5 minutes. Stir & serve. ; name: jamaican pumpkin soup ; ingredients: onion, pumpkin, chicken stock, scotch bonnet pepper, scallions, garlic cloves, bay leaf, fresh thyme, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:Saut onions in butter in a large pot until transparent. Add pumpkin and fill with stock. Add the remaining ingredients and bring to boil. Simmer for about half an hour or to desired consistency. Remove scotch bonnet pepper and serve hot. ; name: baked fennel with saffron ; ingredients: fennel, onion, garlic cloves, butter, olive oil, hot chicken stock, white wine, saffron, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 425 degrees f. Place fennel, onion and garlic into an oiled baking dish using the 2 tablespoons oil. Combine saffron, chicken broth and white wine and pour over fennel season with salt and pepper. Dot with butter. Cover and bake for 25 - 30 minutes. If desired, uncover the baking dish toward the end of the cooking time, to allow any excess liquid to evaporate. Garnish with the fennel fronds. ; name: scallops in garlic cream sauce ; ingredients: scallops, butter, garlic cloves, parsley, scallions, white wine, salt, pepper, cream ; preparation:

name: refreshing pina colada cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, eggs, oil, water, instant coconut cream pudding mix, milk, cream cheese, crushed pineapple, cool whip ; preparation:Bake cake as suggested on box in a large sheet-cake pan. Cool. Combine puddings, milk, and cream cheese and beat with electric mixer. Refrigerate pudding mixture for an hour. Spread pudding mixture on cake then add a layer of drained pineapple. Top with a layer of cool whip. Store in fridge. ; name: sand dessert aka vanilla dirt dessert ; ingredients: cookies, cream cheese, butter, powdered sugar, vanilla pudding mix, milk, cool whip ; preparation:Crumble cookies in food processor. Set aside. In a medium bowl, combine cream cheese, butter and powdered sugar. Mix in pudding. Slowly add milk. Mix until combined. Fold in cool whip. Using a clean sand bucket or casserole dish, alternate layers of cookie crumbs with the pudding mixture. Chill for at least 2 hours. Imho it tastes better if you make it a day ahead. ; name: crock pot chocolate heaven ; ingredients: chocolate cake mix, instant chocolate pudding mix, eggs, water, sour cream, vegetable oil, semi-sweet chocolate chips, milk chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Spray a 4 quart crock pot with non-stick cooking spray and set aside. In a large bowl, combine the cake mix and pudding mix. In a medium bowl, beat the eggs with the water, then add the sour cream and oil and beat until smooth. Add to the dry ingredients and beat well. Stir in the chocolate chips and walnuts. Pour into crock pot. Cover slow cooker and cook on low for 6-8 hours, until top springs back when touched very lightly with finger. ; name: chocolate mocha pots ; ingredients: eggs, butter, chocolate, rum, coffee extract, whipped cream ; preparation:Put the egg yolks, butter and chocolate in a heat-proof bowl, set over a pan of hot water. Cook gently, whisking occasionally, until chocolate has melted. Remove from heat and whisk in the rum and coffee. Beat the egg whites until stiff, and fold into the coffee mixture until thoroughly mixed. Pour into 8 small ramekins or pots or cups, and refrigerate to set. Decorate with whipped cream and chocolate shavings. If truly showing off, decorate with fresh strawberries and cream. ; name: moist deep chocolate mayonnaise cake or cupcakes ; ingredients: chocolate cake mix, mayonnaise, water, instant coffee granules, eggs, cinnamon, mini chocolate chip ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease and lightly flour two 9-inch round cake pans. In a large bowl using an electric mixer beat together cake mix with mayonnaise, water, eggs and cinnamon for about 2 minutes on medium speed. Divide the batter between the two cake pans. Bake for about 25-30 minutes or until the cakes test done. Cool for 10 minutes in pan then remove to a rack to cool completely. Frost cooled cake with chocolate frosting. ; name: fantastic buttery cream cheese coffee cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, sour cream, flour, baking powder, salt, cream cheese, egg yolk, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 13 x 9-inch. Cream butter with sugar, add in eggs and sour cream. Beat well. In a bowl, sift together flour, baking powder and salt. Add the flour mixture to the creamed mixture. Beat well until combined. Spread more than half of the batter in the prepared baking pan. In another bowl, cream together all filling ingredients, then carefully spread over the cake batter. Spoon the remaining cake batter over the top of the cheese mixture. For the topping mix all ingredients, and sprinkle over cake. Bake for about 50-55 minutes or until middle feels set and not jiggly. ; name: ooey gooey butter bars ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, margarine, egg, coconut, nuts, cream cheese, eggs, powdered sugar, vanilla ; preparation:Mix together cake mix, melted margarine and 1 egg. Press this mixture into an oblong baking pan. Add a layer of coconut and chopped nuts. Mix together cream cheese, 2 eggs, powdered sugar and vanilla. Spread over coconut and nuts. Bake for 35 minutes at 350 degrees. Cool and cut into small squares. ; name: buddha s ultimately moist chocolate cookies ; ingredients: neufchatel cheese, butter, egg, vanilla extract, chocolate cake mix ; preparation:

name: tomato onion quiche ; ingredients: onion, tomatoes, eggs, yogurt, milk, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh basil, sharp cheddar cheese, pastry shells ; preparation:Spread onion and tomato in a 9-inch pastry shell. Mix eggs, yogurt, milk, salt, pepper and basil. Pour into pastry shell. Sprinkle cheese over top. Bake at 400 degrees ot 10 minutes. Then bake at 350 degrees for 35-40 minutes or until a knife comes out clean. Let sit for 5 minutes before serving. ; name: tomato cheese basil tea sandwiches ; ingredients: white bread, butter, mayonnaise, tomatoes, provolone cheese, fresh basil leaves, salt and pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Cut 16 small rounds of bread with a round cookie cutter--should be able to get two out of each piece of bread, otherwise, use a larger cutter and more bread. Spread one of the rounds with a little butter and then a little mayonnaise. Top each with a slice of tomato, cheese round, and a couple of basil leaves. Lightly salt and pepper each one and put a couple of drops of olive oil on top. Place other bread round on top. Refrigerate till ready for the tea. ; name: outrageously good broiled shrimp ; ingredients: shrimp, butter, garlic salt, unseasoned breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, dried parsley ; preparation:Butterfly shrimp and place on non-stick baking pan or line pan with aluminum foil for easier cleanup. Brush shrimp with melted butter. Sprinkle lightly with garlic salt. Mix together bread crumbs, parmesan cheese and parsley. Sprinkle lightly over shrimp. Drizzle lightly with additional melted butter. Broil until light brown. ; name: buttered tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, butter, salt and pepper, sugar, basil ; preparation:Peel tomatoes and remove pulp and seeds. Discard pulp and seeds. Dice the fleshy part of the tomatoes. Melt butter in a skillet. Saut tomatoes in the butter. Stir in the salt and pepper, sugar and basil. Cover and cook about 5 minutes. ; name: southern scalloped tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, butter, bread cubes, onion, sugar, tabasco sauce, sweet basil, cheddar cheese, bacon, saltine crackers ; preparation:Melt butter. Add bread cubes and brown lightly. Add more butter if needed and lightly brown onions. Fry bacon, drain, bacon and crumbled bacon into drippings. Mix all ingredients and spoon into 2 quart casserole dish. Cover with crushed crackers. Bake at 350 degrees for 30-45 minutes. Add cheese on top last 15 minutes. ; name: gourmet jaffles ; ingredients: whole wheat bread, butter, kalamata olives, fresh spinach leaves, sun-dried tomatoes, parmesan cheese, mushroom, sweet pepper, pepper, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Plug in sandwich maker to get warm. Butter bread and place buttered sides together. Layer ingredients on and sprinkle with cheese and pepper. Place slice with ingredients onto sandwich maker and place the other side on top, buttered sided facing outward. Cook for 5 minutes or until bread is golden. Serve immediately. ; name: flounder bake ; ingredients: butter, onions, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, lemon juice, flounder fillets, salt, pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in a pan and cook onion for 2 minutes or until soft. Place fish fillets in a baking dish sprayed with cooking oil. Pour melted butter with onions over the fish. Sprinkle fish with italian bread crumbs and parmesan cheese. Top with lemon juice, salt and pepper. Bake for 15-20 minutes in 375 degree oven until fish is flaky and fully cooked. ; name: savory breaded tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, fine breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, chives, dried basil, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: ambrosia sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, orange, lemon, crushed pineapple, brown sugar, butter, shredded coconut, maraschino cherry ; preparation:Place sweet potatoes in a baking dish. Slice orange and lemon into thin slices. Alternate layering slices on top of sweet potatoes. Combine drained pineapple, brown sugar and melted butter. Pour mixture over sweet potatoes. Sprinkle with shredded coconut. Decorate with cherries. Bake in a 350f oven for 30 minutes. ; name: red white and blue frozen dessert ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, lemons, rind of, plain yogurt, miniature marshmallows, pecans, strawberry, fresh blueberries ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine condensed milk, lemon juice and peel and mix well. Stir in yogurt, marshmallows and nuts. Spread half of mixture in a 9 x 13 inch pan. Layer half of the strawberries and half of the blueberries on top. Layer with remaining yogurt mixture and end with rest of berries on top. Cover and freeze for at least 2 hours. Remove from freezer 10 minutes before serving. ; name: festive carrots pineapple ; ingredients: pineapple chunks, brown sugar, butter, cornstarch, cinnamon, carrots ; preparation:Combine reserved pineapple juice, sugar, butter, cornstarch and cinnamon. Cook and stir until sauce is clear and thickened. Add pineapple and carrots. Heat and serve immediately. If desired, garnish with lime peel. ; name: mom s out of this world salad aka green stuff ; ingredients: boiling water, lime gelatin, miniature marshmallow, pecans, crushed pineapple, shredded coconut, cottage cheese, cool whip, maraschino cherry ; preparation:Pour boiling water over gelatin & marshmellows. Stir until marshmellows are partically melted. Add crushed pineapple. Chill until partically congealed. Fold in nuts & cottage cheese, then whipped cream. Decorate with cherries if desired. Chill until firm. ; name: banana split smoothies ; ingredients: bananas, crushed pineapple, milk, fresh strawberries, honey, ice cubes, whipped topping, chocolate syrup, maraschino cherry ; preparation:In a blender, combine the first five ingredients. Cover and process until smooth. Gradually add ice, blending until slushy. Pour into chilled glasses. Garnish with whipped topping, chocolate syrup and cherries. ; name: southern cranberry salad ; ingredients: strawberry gelatin, boiling water, whole berry cranberry sauce, mandarin oranges, crushed pineapple, pecans, cool whip ; preparation:Mix jello with boiling water. Stir until dissolved. Add cranberry sauce, oranges, pineapple, and pecans. Lightly spray a 4 cup ring mold or pretty glass dish that it will be served. Add salad. Cover with plastic wrap and chill at least 3 hours or till firm. Serve with dollop of cool whip. ; name: autumn fruit salad ; ingredients: granny smith apples, red seedless grapes, mandarin orange segments, miniature marshmallows, low-fat vanilla yogurt, nuts, lime, zest of ; preparation:Core and wedge apples. Combine apples, grapes, and mandarin oranges in medium bowl. Add marshmallows, yogurt and lime zest. Mix gently. Sprinkle nuts over top. Cover. Refrigerate until ready to serve. ; name: the realtor s banana split salad ; ingredients: pineapple chunks, mandarin oranges, miniature marshmallows, sour cream, lettuce leaf, bananas, flaked coconut, maraschino cherries ; preparation:

name: lazy mini okonomiyaki ; ingredients: cabbage, flour, dashi, sake, light soy sauce, eggs, green onions, ham, oil, mayonnaise ; preparation:In a non-stick skillet, saute the cabbage mix. Allow to cool to room temperature before adding to the batter. Mix flour, dashi, sake, soy sauce, and eggs together in a large bowl until smooth, although a few small lumps are fine. To the batter, add the cooled cabbage mixture, ham and the green onions. Mix well. Using the same non-stick skillet that you used to cook the cabbage, heat over medium, a small amount of oil or spray with cooking spray. Drop the batter by tablespoonfuls into the pan. Cook until golden on each side. Serve hot, room temperature, or cold with kewpie mayonnaise and bull-dog tonkatsu sauce. ; name: sweet n sour crunchy cabbage ; ingredients: cabbage, green onions, fried chinese noodles, white vinegar, caster sugar, vegetable oil, soy sauce ; preparation:Chop cabbage into small pieces, place in large bowl. Chop green onions, mix into cabbage. Mix dressing ingredients well, add to cabbage and green onions. Add crunchy noodles just before serving. Enjoy. ; name: pork chow mein ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onions, celery, pork, soy sauce, bean sprouts, cornstarch, beef broth, rice ; preparation:Heat the oil in a deep skillet or wok. Saute the onion and celery 5 minutes. Mix in the pork, soy sauce and sprouts. Cook 2 minutes. Mix the cornstarch with the broth. Add to the skillet, stirring steadily to the boiling point. Cook 3 minutes more. Serve with rice or chow mein noodles. ; name: ramen noodle stir fry ; ingredients: peanut oil, fresh gingerroot, mushrooms, green onions, salt, ramen noodles, soy sauce, sesame oil, cooking sherry, beef ; preparation:Heat oil in wok 375 degrees. Add 1st 4 ingredients. Cook about one minute. Add remaining ingredients and heat through.
