Boil for 2 minutes. Remove from heat, and cool completely. Stir in lemon juice and remaining 2 cups water. Refrigerate. Serve chilled over ice. Garnish with maraschino cherries, fresh mint, and lemon slices, if desired. ; name: fresh mint and ginger lemonade ; ingredients: fresh mint leaves, fresh ginger, honey, boiling water, fresh lemon juice, water, ice cube, lemon slice ; preparation:Combine chopped mint, ginger and honey in medium bowl. Add boiling water and allow to steep for 30-40 minutes. Strain into 4-cup glass measuring cup, pressing on solids to extract liquid. Add lemon juice and enough cold water to measure 4 cups total. Fill glasses with ice cubes. Add lemonade. Garnish with mint leaves and fresh lemon slices. ; name: raspberry granita ; ingredients: fresh raspberry, lemon, sugar, water, mint leaf ; preparation:Combine sugar and water and bring to the boil. Simmer 5 minutes to make a syrup. Allow to cool. Combine berry puree with lemon juice and syrup. Place in a metal bowl or tray. Freeze till set. ; name: plum chutney ; ingredients: italian plums, cranberries, jalapeno peppers, fresh ginger, water, sugar, vinegar, cumin, whole cardamom pod, kaffir lime leaves ; preparation:Wash, pit and chop the plums. Wearing gloves, stem, seed and chop the peppers. Put the plums, cranberries and peppers in a large kettle. Add the ginger, peeled and grated. Add the water, sugar, vinegar and spices. Put the jars into a large canning kettle, and cover with water to an inch above the tops of the jars. Bring to a boil and boil for 10 minutes to sterilize. Simmer the fruit mixture until thickened, about 20 minutes. Remove the keffir lime leaves and cardamom. Pack into hot sterilized jars and seal with lids sterilized according to the manufacturers instructions. Boiling water process 15 minutes. ; name: sparkling honey lemonade in citrus salt rimmed glasses ; ingredients: fresh lemon juice, honey, sparkling water, lemon, zest of, coarse salt, lemon wedges ; preparation:Combine lemon juice and honey in a saucepan. Heat until honey is completely blended with the juice. Chill until cold, then stir and pour into a large pitcher. Add cold water and stir to combine completely. Mix lemon zest with finishing salt in a small dish. Rub the rim of serving glasses with a wedge of lemon or lime. Invert glass into dish of salt and turn to coat rim. Add ice and lemonade. Serve immediately. ; name: so easy cranberry jam spread ; ingredients: cranberries, sugar, fresh orange juice, water, lemon juice ; preparation:Bring all ingredients to a boil in a 2-3 quart saucepan over medium heat, stirring occasionally. Reduce the heat and simmer uncovered, stirring occasionally until slightly thickened, about 20 minutes,. Using a fine-mesh sieve, force the jam through and then discard the skins and seeds. Cool in a bowl stirring occasionally. Store covered in the fridge. ; name: plum good pickled plums ; ingredients: italian plums, fresh ginger, chilies, clove, cinnamon, allspice, salt, sugar, vinegar ; preparation:Wash the fruit and prick each plum with a fork. Put all the other ingredients into a saucepan and bring to a gentle boil, stirring until the sugar has melted. Add plums and cook for 3-4 minutes. Put plums into sterilized jars. Keep boiling the syrup until it thickens, pour over plums. Check the jars are sealed, keep for 2 months before using. ; name: gingery plum jam ; ingredients: plums, water, sugar, fresh lemon juice, fresh ginger, fresh lemon rind ; preparation:

name: easy peanut butter balls ; ingredients: peanut butter, margarine, vanilla, powdered sugar, chocolate chips ; preparation:In a medium bowl knead peanut butter, margarine, vanilla and sugar, with your hands, until smooth dough is formed. Shape into half-inch balls, place on tray lined with wax paper and freeze for at least one hour. Melt chocolate in the microwave. Use 20-second zaps and mix in between each zap until smooth. Insert a toothpick into each peanut butter ball and dip ball into melted chocolate. Return to wax paper and refreeze. Store in airtight container and serve from frozen. ; name: cherry eggnog fudge ; ingredients: sugar, miniature marshmallows, eggnog, butter, light corn syrup, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, nuts, candied cherry ; preparation:Butter sides of a heavy three quart saucepan. Place sugar, marshmallows, eggnog, butter, corn syrup and salt in pan. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until sugar is dissolved. Turn heat to medium and cook until mixture boils. Continue cooking, stirring occasionally to 230 degrees on candy thermometer. Add chocolate chips and cook for 5 minutes or until chocolate chips are completely melted. Stir in nuts and cherries. Pour into buttered 8-inch square baking pan. Cool to room temperature. Chill. Cut into 36 squares. ; name: butterscotch oatmeal bites ; ingredients: miniature marshmallows, butterscotch chips, peanut butter, butter, cheerios toasted oat cereal, raisins, flaked coconut ; preparation:In heavy saucepan, combine marshmallows, butterscotch chips, peanut butter, and butter. Cook and stir on medium-high heat until melted. Remove from heat. Stir in cheerios, raisins, and coconut. Drop by bite size pieces onto wax paper. Let stand for 10 minutes. ; name: wintery white clusters ; ingredients: vanilla baking chips, corn chex, dry roasted salted peanuts, small pretzels, miniature marshmallows, vanilla candy coating ; preparation:Place baking chips in freezer to chill. In large bowl, mix cereal, peanuts, pretzels and marshmallows. Set aside. In large microwavable bowl, microwave candy coating uncovered in high 1 minute 30 seconds. Stir, breaking up large chunks. Microwave about 30 seconds longer or until coating can be stirred smooth. Gently and quickly stir cereal mixture into coating with rubber spatula, stirring gently until evenly coated. Stir in chilled baking chips. Spread on waxed paper until cooled. Break into chunks. Store in airtight container in refrigerator. ; name: can t fail fudge ; ingredients: sugar, butter, evaporated milk, marshmallows, chocolate chips, walnuts, vanilla ; preparation:Mix first 3 ingredients in a 2-quart saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil stirring entire time. Boil until candy thermometer hits 234 degrees, stirring entire time. Remove from heat and add remaining ingredients. Stir until chocolate and marshmallows are dissolved. Pour in buttered 8x8 pan. Chill 30 minutes, cut with buttered knife. Chill again until set. ; name: chocolate crunch peanut butter treats ; ingredients: powdered sugar, peanut butter, rice krispies, oil, dipping chocolate ; preparation:Combine sugar, peanut butter, rice krispies, and oil together. Take spoonfuls sized however large you want and drop onto wax paper cookie sheet. Freeze for about 30 minutes. Remove from freezer. Shape into eggs, hearts for valentines, or other shapes according to holidays with cookie cutters if you need to. Put back on wax paper covered cookie sheet. Freeze for 2 hours. Melt dipping chocolate or chocolate with some grated paraffin wax in microwave. Dip eggs in and completely cover. Put back on cookie sheet and refrigerate. Decorate. Cooking time is freezing time. ; name: popcorn marshmallow kisses ; ingredients: marshmallow creme, peanut butter, milk, popped popcorn, salted peanuts, chocolate ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease a cookie sheet. In a large mixing bowl, combine marshmallow creme, peanut butter, and milk. Stir until smooth. Add popcorn and peanuts. Coat evenly. Lightly grease hands and form popcorn mixture into 2-inch balls. Place on cookie sheet. Bake 5 to 7 minutes. Cool on cookie sheet at least 20 minutes. For a festive presentation, stack the balls like a christmas tree and drizzle with chocolate. ; name: salted nut squares ; ingredients: salted peanuts, butter, peanut butter chips, sweetened condensed milk, mini marshmallows ; preparation:

name: sugar spice pecans ; ingredients: granulated sugar, cinnamon, ground ginger, ground nutmeg, ground cloves, cayenne pepper, egg whites, pecan halves ; preparation:In small bowl, combine sugar with spices. In large bowl, whisk egg whites until frothy. Stir in pecans until coated. Sprinkle with sugar mixture, tossing with spoon to coat nuts evenly. Spread on 2 lightly greased baking sheets and bake in a preheated 325f degree oven, rotating sheets half way through, for 30 minutes or until coating is crisp and nuts are fragrant. Let cool. ; name: orange ginger tea loaf ; ingredients: sugar, margarine, eggs, flour, baking powder, ground ginger, orange juice, milk, orange rind, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Cream together sugar and margarine. Add eggs, beat till light and fluffy. Combine dry ingredients in another bowl. Mix together orange juice and milk. Add the orange juice mixture alternately with the dry ingredients to the batter, beating till blended. Fold in orange rind and walnuts. Bake in a loaf pan about for 45 minutes or until the cake is cooked when tested with a skewer. ; name: holiday eggnog bread ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, butter, walnuts, egg, sugar, nutmeg, eggnog, candied fruit ; preparation:Sift dry ingredients together including sugar. Combine eggnog, melted butter and egg. Stir into dry ingredients just to blend. Blend in nuts and fruits. Place mixture into a greased and floured 9 inch loaf pan. Bake in a preheated 350f oven about 60 to 70 minutes or tested done. Remove from pan and cool completely before slicing. ; name: georgia pecan balls ; ingredients: egg whites, brown sugar, maple flavoring, pecans, dry breadcrumbs, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f and lightly grease baking sheet. Beat egg whites stiff. Add sugar and flavoring. Combine nuts, crumbs and salt. Fold gently into egg whites. Shape into small balls, place on prepared pan and bake for about 20 minutes. ; name: holiday banana bread ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, walnuts, mixed candied fruit, raisins, butter, sugar, eggs, bananas ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Thoroughly grease a 5 x 9-inch loaf pan. Sift the flour, measure, and sift with the baking powder and salt onto a piee of waxed paper. Add the nuts, raisins and candied fruits, and mix until well coated with the flour. Cream together the butter and sugar until fluffy. Beat in eggs one at a time until lthik and pale-lemon colored. Alternate additions of flour and fruit mixture and the mashed bananas, stirring after each addition until well blended. Begin and end with flour mixture. Spoon into prepared loaf pan and bake in preheated oven for about 60 minutrs or until bread pulls away from the sides of the pan. Let cool about 20 minutes before turning out on a rack to cool well. ; name: crock pot sugared nuts ; ingredients: pecans, unsalted butter, powdered sugar, ground allspice, ground cloves, ground cinnamon, ground ginger ; preparation:Preheat crock pot on high for 15 minutes. In preheated crock pot stir the nuts and butter until mixed well. Add the powdered sugar, stirring to coat evenly. Cover and slow-cook on high for 15 minutes. Reduce the heat to low and slow cook, uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the nuts are coated with a crisp glaze. Transfer the nuts to a bowl. In another small bowl, combine the spices and sift them over the nuts, stirring to coat evenly. Let cool before serving. ; name: german spice cookies ; ingredients: eggs, brown sugar, clove, cinnamon, pepper, flour, baking soda, salt, raisins, nuts ; preparation:In a mixing bowl, beat eggs. Add the brown sugar, cloves, cinnamon and pepper. Combine flour, baking soda and salt, gradually add to the egg mix. Stir in raisin and nuts. Drop by tablespoonsful 2 inches apart onto a lightly greased baking sheet. Bake at 400 degrees for 8-10 minutes or until surface cracks. Remove to wire racks to cool. ; name: hot and spicy nuts ; ingredients: egg white, pecans, almonds, cashews, brown sugar, seasoning salt, curry powder, ground cinnamon, cumin seed, ground red pepper ; preparation:

name: spinach and cheese mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, salt and pepper, green onions, butter, spinach, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Set oven to 400 degrees. Butter a 2-quart casserole dish. In a large bowl, combine all ingredients, except the grated cheddar cheese. Spoon into prepared baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 15 minutes. Remove from oven, top with grated cheddar, bake for 5 minutes longer. If desired, roasted garlic may be added to mixture. ; name: easy vegetable rice medley ; ingredients: oil, onion, carrot, celery rib, red pepper, chicken broth, minute white rice, frozen peas, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a skillet. Add onion, carrot, celery, and red pepper. Cook 5 minutes or until tender. Add broth. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice and peas. Cover. Simmer 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. To save time, replace all the veggies with 3 cups frozen mixed vegetables or frozen broccoli florets and add them when you would have added the peas. ; name: potage crcy french carrot soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, carrots, chicken broth, tomato paste, white rice, salt, black pepper, heavy cream, carrot curls ; preparation:Over medium heat, melt butter in a heavy dutch oven. Stir in the onions and cook 5 minutes, until golden. Add carrots, broth, tomato paste and rice. Simmer 30 minutes. Puree in blender in small batches until smooth. Return to pan. Add salt and pepper and stir in the cream. Simmer for 10 minutes. Stir in the softened butter and serve with two carrot curls per serving. ; name: cabbage noodles ; ingredients: linguine, green cabbage, chicken broth, salt and pepper, garlic powder, sour cream ; preparation:Cook noodles according to pkg. Directions. Drain. Meanwhile saute the cabbage in the chicken broth until tender, about 10 minutes. Add cooked noodles and mix well. Add salt, pepper, garlic powder to taste. Take the pan off the heat and fold in the sour cream. ; name: leek onion and potato soup ; ingredients: leeks, potatoes, onion, butter, chicken stock, milk, heavy cream ; preparation:Melt butter in a large saucepan. Add leeks, onions and potatoes and stir. Cover saucepan and sweat veg for 10-15 minutes. Add stock and milk and bring to boil. Replace lid and simmer for 20 minutes. Blend the soup and return to the saucepan. Season and add cream to taste. ; name: white mountain coleslaw ; ingredients: green cabbage, red cabbage, red onion, carrot, sour cream, sugar, mayonnaise, malt vinegar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Grate cabbage. Add red onion and carrot. Toss in a large bowl. In a separate bowl, mix together sour cream, sugar, mayonnaise, and vinegar. Add salt and pepper to taste. Taste, adjust seasoning, taste, taste, taste. Add the mixture to the cabbage, toss well, refrigerate overnight or for several hours, and make sure its well and tightly covered. Serve very cold. ; name: irish mashed potatoes colcannon ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, onion, kale, milk, sour cream, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cook potatoes in water until tender. Drain. While potatoes are cooking. Melt butter in large skillet. Add chopped onion and cook for 5 minutes. Stir in kale and cook 5 more minutes. Remove from heat. Mash potatoes, milk, sour cream, salt and pepper with mixer. Stir in kale mixture. ; name: chicken with sour cream ; ingredients: chicken legs, onion, carrot, water, sour cream, milk, pepper ; preparation:

name: pizzelles ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, margarine, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking powder ; preparation:Beat eggs and sugar together until thickened and pale. Add the cooled melted margarine and vanilla or anise. Sift in flour and baking powder and mix until smooth. Place a heaping tbspn. Of batter in center of mold, close lid, and cook for 30-60 seconds. Remove pizzelle carefully with a fork and lay on flat surface till cool. These can also be removed when done and rolled immediately into a cone shape, then cooled and filled with sweetened ricotta or whip cream. ; name: yummy bars ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, butter, baking powder, eggs, semi-sweet chocolate chips, nuts ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Combine crust ingredients in small bowl and blend well. Press into bottom of ungreased 9x13 baking pan. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, or until lightly browned. Remove from oven to cool slightly. Increase oven temp to 375. In medium bowl combine 1 cup brown sugar, 2 tbsp flour, baking powder and eggs. Blend well. Stir in chocolate chips and nuts. Pour topping evenly over crust, spreading lightly, if necessary. Bake at 357 for 13 to 18 minutes or until deep golden brown. Cool completely before cutting into bars. ; name: baked buttermilk pancakes ; ingredients: egg, butter, all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking soda, baking powder, salt, buttermilk, powdered sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Spray an 8-inch pie plate with vegetable cooking spray. In a large bowl combine egg with melted butter. Whisk until well combined. Sift together flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt in a small bowl. Combine with egg mixture. Pour in buttermilk and stir until just combined. ; name: easy chocolate sauce cake ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, cocoa powder, salt, milk, oil, brown sugar, hot water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all ingredients except the brown sugar and 4 tbsp cocoa and hot water. Spread into a 9x9 pan or equivalent. Mix brown sugar and cocoa and spread over batter. Carefully pour the hot water over all. Bake at 350f for approximately 40 minutes. ; name: maple cream candy 1972 canadian ; ingredients: brown sugar, all-purpose flour, whole milk, butter, baking powder, salt, vanilla, walnuts ; preparation:Lightly grease 9 x 11 brownie pan. Mix in a lightly buttered heavy large saucepan, the brown sugar, butter, cream, flour, baking powder and salt. Cook stirring constantly until mixture reaches 235degrees f. On a candy thermometer. Or until a soft ball forms in cold water. Remove from heat, add vanilla and nuts. Beat two to five minutes or until candy begins to thicken. Pour quickly into prepared buttered pan. Spread evenly. Cut into squares while still soft. ; name: old farmer s almanac butterscotch icebox cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, salt, baking powder, nuts ; preparation:Cream together butter and brown sugar until light. Add egg and vanilla, and mix well. Stir together flour, salt, and baking powder and add to sugar-egg-butter mix, mixing well. Stir in nuts. Form dough into a 2-inch-diameter log and wrap in foil or waxed paper. Chill for 12 to 24 hours. Slice and bake on ungreased cookie sheets at 400 degrees f for 8 to 10 minutes. ; name: mixed berry ricotta cakes ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, butter, ricotta cheese, low-fat milk, eggs, vanilla extract, frozen mixed berries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f line a 12-cup muffin tin with paper liners. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt and sugar. In a medium bowl, stir together melted butter, ricotta, milk, eggs and vanilla until smooth. Pour into dry ingredients and mix until just combined. Fold in berries. Distribute batter evenly into prepared muffin cups. Bake for 18-22 minutes, until a tester inserted into the cake part comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. Refrigerate in an airtight container. Cakes will stay moist for several days. ; name: cherry coconut cracker squares ; ingredients: egg, milk, crackers, brown sugar, baking powder, all-purpose flour, coconut, maraschino cherry ; preparation:

name: white cheese dip tex mex style queso blanco ; ingredients: monterey jack cheese, diced green chilies, fat-free half-and-half, green onions, ground cumin, salt, fresh cilantro, jalapeno, cilantro leaf ; preparation:Combine all ingredients, except garnish of course, in a microwaveable bowl that has been sprayed or brushed with oil. Microwave for 1 minute and stir. Continue microwaving at 30 second intervals, stirring in between until cheese is melted. Serve warm with tortilla chips. For a hotter dip use pepper jack cheese. ; name: beef and bean burritos ; ingredients: beef round steak, garlic, pinto beans, diced green chilies, cilantro, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Spray nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Heat over med. Heat. Add steak and garlic. Cook until desired doneness. Stir in beans, chilis, and cilantro. Cook and stir 7 minutes. Spoon mixture on tortillas. Top with cheese. Fold bottom up, fold sides over. Garnish with salsa, sour cream. ; name: bob s scalloped potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, onions, green peppers, longhorn cheese, velveeta cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:Grease 13 x 9 pan. Alternately layer potatoes, peppers, onions and cheeses. Salt and pepper each layer until all ingredients are used. Mix soup and milk. Pour over top. Bake covered at 350 degrees for 1 hour, then uncover and bake until done. ; name: yummy chili casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, celery, chili, diced tomatoes with juice, taco sauce, corn, egg noodles, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the beef and onion for 5 to 10 minutes, or until meat is browned and onion is tender. Drain fat. Add the celery, chili, tomatoes, taco sauce and corn. Heat thoroughly, reduce heat to low and allow to simmer. Meanwhile, prepare the noodles according to package directions. When cooked, place them in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour the meat mixture over the noodles, stirring well. Top with the cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f for 25 minutes, or until cheese is completely melted and bubbly. ; name: pepper jack potatoes ; ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, monterey jack pepper cheese, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, onion, diced pimentos, salt, fresh breadcrumb, margarine, french-fried onions ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In large bowl, combine all ingredients except breadcrumbs, butter and french fried onions. Mix well. Spread into ungreased 2-quart casserole dish. Toss bread crumbs with butter. Sprinkle over casserole. Bake at 350f for 30-45 minutes or until bread crumbs are golden and mixture is bubbly. Sprinkle french fried onions over casserole. Bake 5 minutes longer or until onions are golden. Will keep in a warm oven, covered. ; name: baked potato with nuts ; ingredients: potatoes, cheese, roquefort cheese, dijon mustard, mayonnaise, garlic clove, tabasco sauce, butter, black pepper, mixed nuts ; preparation:Boil the potatos without peeling. Mix all ingredients in a bowl. Then pierce a little all potatos with a help of knife. Pour the sauce into the potatos. Then bake them for nearly 20 minutes. Service while its hot. ; name: barbecue chicken quesadillas ; ingredients: red onion, bell pepper, butter, cooked chicken, barbecue sauce, monterey jack cheese, cilantro, flour tortillas ; preparation:Saute onions and bell peppers in pan with butter. Remove from pan and set aside. In another pan heat through shredded chicken with bbq sauce. Lightly butter one side of a tortilla. Place butter side down in saute pan. Quickly add some of the cheese, chicken and onions to one half of tortilla. Then quickly fold in half forming a semi-circle. Continue to cook until bottom side is golden brown, then carefully flip quesadilla over. Brown other side and remove from pan. Repeat with remaining ingredients. Cut quesadilla into wedges and serve with additional barbecue sauce. ; name: fire roasted stuffed poblano peppers sp5 ; ingredients: poblano peppers, monterey jack cheese, enchilada sauce, simply potatoes diced potatoes with onion, chorizo sausage ; preparation:

name: sienisalaati finnish finland fresh mushroom salad ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, water, lemon juice, heavy cream, onion, sugar, salt, white pepper, lettuce leaf ; preparation:In 1-qt enamel, glass or stainless stell pan, bring water and lemon juice to a boil. Add sliced mushrooms. Cover pan. Reduce heat and simmer gently for 2 - 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Drain in sieve. Pat dry with paper towels. In 1-qt bowl, combine cream, onion, sugar salt and pepper. Add mushrooms. Toss lightly until well covered. Serve as a salad on crisp, dry lettuce. ; name: mushroom and wine steak sauce ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, butter, onion, garlic, condensed beef broth, tomato paste, ground pepper, cornstarch, water, dry red wine ; preparation:Melt butter in a saucepan. Add mushrooms, onion and garlic. Saute until golden, about 5 minutes. Stir in broth, tomato paste and black pepper. Bring to the boiling point. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 10 minutes. Blend cornstarch with water. Mix some of the hot mushroom sauce into cornstarch mixture and return to saucepan. Cook and stir until clear and thickened. Stir in wine and cook until hot. Serve over steak, hamburgers or other meat. ; name: minute steaks with taco sauce ; ingredients: butter, vegetable oil, minute steaks, button mushrooms, taco sauce, fresh parsley, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Heat the butter and oil in a frying pan. Season the steaks with salt and pepper and fry for 1 minute on each side on fairly high heat. Place the cooked steaks into a serving dish and place in the oven to keep warm. Add mushrooms to the pan. Cook on high heat and lightly brown. Remove from pan and place in oven to keep warm. Pour the taco sauce in the pan and simmer for about 1 minute. Place the mushrooms and steaks on a plate and pour the taco sauce over the steaks. Garnish with the parsley. Serve. ; name: roasted garlic and herb beurre blanc an amazing sauce ; ingredients: white wine, shallots, roasted garlic, cream, butter, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh chives, fresh sage, fresh cilantro, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a saucepan over medium temperature, combine the wine, shallots, and garlic, and reduce until the wine just covers the shallots. Add the cream or half and half and reduce again until the mixture is thick and syrupy, stirring occasionally. Reduce the temperature to very low and gradually whisk the pieces of butter into the mixture, one cube at a time. Do not allow the sauce to become either too hot or too cold or it will break. Season to taste with salt and freshly ground pepper, stir in the remaining ingredients, and serve immediately. Also, feel free to experiment with other herbs than listed above. ; name: leek and mushroom pie with kidney bean crust ; ingredients: kidney beans, unsalted butter, leeks, mushrooms, fresh dill, dried mustard, dry white wine, eggs, cheddar cheese, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Pat the beans dry and put between 2 sheets of waxed paper, crush with rollimg pin. Scrape the beans into an 8 inch pie plate and press into bottom and sides. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large skillet melt butter, add leeks, mushrooms, dill, mustard and saute till leeka are tender. Remove from heat and cool slightly. In mixing bowl beat egss well, add wine, breadcrumbs, cheese and leek mixture. Stir well, salt and pepper to taste. Pour into pie plate and bake 30-40 minutes, till set. ; name: braised salmon with leeks dill ; ingredients: olive oil, leeks, garlic cloves, tomatoes, kosher salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, dry white wine, salmon fillets, fresh dill ; preparation:Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add leek. Saut 3 minutes. Add garlic. Saut 2-3 minutes. Add tomato, salt, and pepper. Saut 2-3 minutes. Add wine and salmon. Sprinkle with dill, and bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 8 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork. ; name: bourbon shrimp flambe ; ingredients: butter, shrimp, bourbon, heavy cream, tomato paste, fresh lemon juice, salt, fresh chives, pecans ; preparation:Melt butter in skillet. Add shrimp, cook for 1 minute. Add bourbon. With a long match ignite and shake pan until flames die down-be careful. Remove shrimp to a warm platter. Add cream and tomato paste to pan. Bring to a boil and reduce until thickened. Add lemon juice, salt, pepper. Return shrimp to pan. Add chives. Garnish with pecans if desired. Serve over wild rice. ; name: white wine poached salmon with tarragon cream for one ; ingredients: unsalted butter, fresh mushrooms, salt & freshly ground black pepper, dry white wine, salmon fillet, heavy cream, fresh tarragon, fresh lemon ; preparation:

name: tuna italian ; ingredients: onion, condensed cream of mushroom soup, evaporated milk, cheddar cheese, tuna, sliced mushrooms, parsley, lemon juice, noodles ; preparation:Cook onion until tender but not brown. Add soup, milk, and cheese. Heat and stir. Break tuna in chunks and add to remaining ingredients. Pour into 2 quart casserole dish. Bake at 350 degrees for 25-30 minutes. ; name: another green bean casserole ; ingredients: green beans, onion, cream of mushroom soup, velveeta cheese, french-fried onions, salt, pepper ; preparation:Place the green beans and onion in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil then lower temperature and simmer until about half of the liquid has evaporated. To the saucepan with the beans and liquid add the mushroom soup, cheese, salt and pepper. Continue to simmer on low until the cheese melts. After the cheese melts taste to see if it needs more cheese if so add now, if not pour the mixture into a greased baking dish and cover and bake on 350 for 30 minutes or until bubbly. Uncover and sprinkle french fried onions on top and place back in oven and bake until browned. Let stand about 3 minutes before serving. ; name: chicken spinach pasta casserole ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, bacon, cooked chicken, french-fried onions, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, frozen chopped spinach, garlic powder, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Cook and drain pasta. Cook and crumble bacon. Cook and drain chicken. In a bowl combine soup, sour cream, spinach and garlic powder. Add pasta, bacon, chicken, 1 c fried onions and 1 c cheese. Spread into a baking dish. Bake at 375 for 30 minutes or until heated through. Top with extra onions and cheese. Bake another 3-5 minutes. ; name: heavenly onions ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, onions, butter, swiss cheese, french bread, cream of chicken soup, milk, soy sauce ; preparation:In frying pan, saute mushrooms and onions in butter over medium heat until soft. Place in bottom of a 9 x 13 inch glass baking dish. Sprinkle grated cheese on top of onion-mushroom mixture. Butter bread slices and place on top of cheese, allowing about 1 slice per serving. Mix soup, milk and soy sauce together and pour over bread, making sure all the bread is covered. Bake at 350 f. For 30 minutes or until brown on top. ; name: italian scalloped potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, italian seasoning, garlic ; preparation:In greased cassarole arrange half the potatoes, onions, mozzerella and parmesean cheese. Repeat the layers. In a small bowl, combine soup, milk, seasoning and garlic. Pour over the layered potatoes and cheese. Cover and bake at 400 f or 200 c for 1 hour. Uncover and bake 10 more minutes or until potatoes are tender. ; name: cheddar mushroom macaroni ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, mayonnaise, mushrooms, onion, garlic clove, elbow macaroni, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the first six ingredients. Mix well. Stir in macaroni. Mix well. Transfer to a greased 9 inch baking dish. Cover and bake at 325 degrees f for 30 minutes or until heated through and cheese is melted. ; name: chicken rice and broccoli skillet ; ingredients: chicken meat, cream of mushroom soup, frozen broccoli, paprika, black pepper, minute rice, mushroom pieces, water ; preparation:Heat a bit of oil in a large and fry the chicken until done. Shred or cut into bite-sized pieces, if desired. Remove from skillet and set aside. Add the can of soup, water, paprika, and pepper. Bring to a boil. Add the broccoli, mushrooms, and rice inches reduce heat to low and add chicken back in the skillet. Cover and cook until the rice is done, anywhere from 5-10 minutes. Let rest a few minutes. ; name: scalloped potatoes extraordinaire crock pot ; ingredients: potatoes, onions, healthy request cream of mushroom soup, evaporated skim milk, low-fat cheddar cheese, chopped pimiento, black pepper ; preparation:

name: raisin buns ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, sugar, eggs, butter, milk, raisins, vanilla ; preparation:Mix flour, baking powder and sugar. Cut in butter. Then add beaten eggs, milk, vanilla and raisins. Mix just until all flour is moistened. Roll out dough onto lightly floured surface with rolling pin. Roll out to about 2 inch thickness. Use a round cookie cutter or the top of a glass to cut out buns. Put them into a 13x9-inch baking pan. Place them all together, no need to separate them. Bake at 450f until golden brown about 12-15 minutes. ; name: impossible blender pie ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, butter, flour, salt, baking powder, milk, coconut, vanilla, ground nutmeg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Put all ingredients in a blender. Blend until all ingredients are well blended. Pour mixture into a 10-inch, slightly greased, pie pan. Bake for 1 hour. May be eaten warm, but refrigerate any leftovers. ; name: christmas snow drop cookies ; ingredients: butter, shortening, powdered sugar, flour, vanilla, almonds ; preparation:Mix in order given. Roll into small balls, about 48, and place on lightly greased cookie sheet or parchment paper. Bake at 300 for 30 to 40 minutes. Remove from oven to cool. Cookies should not be brown but a very light tan. Roll in powdered sugar while still warm. Roll in powdered sugar again when cool. Store in an air tight container. ; name: everyone s favorite sour cream coffee cake ; ingredients: sugar, butter, eggs, sour cream, baking powder, flour, salt, vanilla, brown sugar, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grease a 9 x 13 pan. Cream together butter and sugar. Add eggs, sour cream and vanilla. Mix together flour, baking powder and salt. Add to butter mixture. Spread half the batter in the prepared pan. Sprinkle this with half the filling. Add the rest of the batter and sprinkle with the remaining filling. Bake 35 - 40 minutes. ; name: grandma chin s sponge cake ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, salt, vanilla, butter, milk, flour, baking powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Beat eggs until light. Beat in sugar, salt and vanilla. Beat in milk and butter. Add dry ingredients very quickly and pour into a greased 9x13 pan. Bake 25 to 35 minutes or until toothpick placed in middle comes out clean. Serve with strawberries and whipped cream. ; name: fantastic buttery cream cheese coffee cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, sour cream, flour, baking powder, salt, cream cheese, egg yolk, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 13 x 9-inch. Cream butter with sugar, add in eggs and sour cream. Beat well. In a bowl, sift together flour, baking powder and salt. Add the flour mixture to the creamed mixture. Beat well until combined. Spread more than half of the batter in the prepared baking pan. In another bowl, cream together all filling ingredients, then carefully spread over the cake batter. Spoon the remaining cake batter over the top of the cheese mixture. For the topping mix all ingredients, and sprinkle over cake. Bake for about 50-55 minutes or until middle feels set and not jiggly. ; name: butterscotch peanut butter bars squares ; ingredients: brown sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla extract, flour, baking powder, salt, peanut butter, heavy cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a large bowl, cream brown sugar and melted butter. Add vanilla and eggs 1 at a time. In a separate bowl, sift flour, powder, and salt. Add dry mixture into wet mixture. Spread into a greased glass baking dish. Cook in oven until golden, 15-18 minutes. In a microwave safe bowl, heat peanut butter and cream on low heat. Stir until smooth, and spread over baked bars. Cool slightly and cut into bars. ; name: mondlukaka icelandic almond cake dessert ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, almonds, flour, baking powder, strawberry jam, heavy cream ; preparation:

name: vegetable orzo side dish ; ingredients: orzo pasta, onions, oil, green pepper, red pepper, squash, mushrooms, bamboo shoots, margarine, onion soup mix ; preparation:Cook and drain orzo. Saute onions in oil for ten minutes, until translucent. Add peppers and squash. Saute until tender. Add mushrooms and bamboo shoots and cook until all vegetables are soft. Add margarine, soup mix, and orzo. Mix well. Cook for fifteen minutes or bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. ; name: potatoes boulangere ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, stock, milk, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to gas 4 or 180c. Grease with butter an oblong roasting tin, or a wide shallow dish. Peel potatoes and slice thinly into rounds. Finely chop onion. Arrange a layer of potato on base of dish, sprinkle with onion, and salt and pepper. Continue until all is used up, ending with potato. Pour over the stock and milk, then dot with butter. Place in the hottest part of the oven for 45-50 minutes, until the potatoes are cooked and the top golden and crunchy. For a change used chopped leek as well as or instead of onion. ; name: country sausage peppers and potatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, smoked sausage, yukon gold potatoes, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, red onion, lipton recipe secrets onion soup mix, water ; preparation:In a 12 inch skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Brown sausage on all sides and remove. Cut sausage into 1-inch slices and set aside. Add peppers and onion to sausage drippings and saute, stirring frequently, approximately 2 minutes until tender. Blend onion soup mix with water, add to pan and add diced potatoes. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer, covered, 10 minutes. Return sausage to skillet and simmer, covered, an additional 10 minutes or until sausage is done and potatoes are fork tender. ; name: mexican mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, diced tomatoes, onion, hot chili sauce, green onion, garlic powder, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes. Drain and mash. Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Saute tomatoes, onion, chile sauce, green onion, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Stir in potatoes and cook until heated through. Spoon potato mixture into a 2 quart casserole dish and sprinkle with cheese. Serve when the cheese has melted. ; name: ida s creamy kielbasa and potato soup ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, celery, beef broth, chicken broth, water, garlic cloves, kielbasa, condensed cream of chicken soup, ground black pepper ; preparation:Saute veggies and garlic in 2 t. Of olive oil for 5 minutes. Add remaining ingredients, and bring to a boil, then reduce heat, and simmer until potatoes are tender, 15-20 minutes. Season with pepper. Serve hot. ; name: potato egg casserole a la hot potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, hard-boiled eggs, green onions, parsley, mustard, fresh ground black pepper, low-fat sour cream, bacon, milk, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook potatoes in boiling water until tender. Drain and cool. Combine potatoes, eggs, bacon, parsley and spring onions in a casserole dish. Combine sour cream, mustard and black pepper and then mix through potato mixture, if mixture needs more moisture then add a little milk. Cover and bake at 180c for 15-20 minutes, then sprinkle with cheese and grill until golden. ; name: shipwreck casserole ; ingredients: onions, potatoes, hamburger, white rice, celery, condensed tomato soup, salt, pepper ; preparation:Slice onions in the bottom of a baking dish. Add thinly sliced potatoes. Over potatoes spread hamburger. Next add uncooked rice. Top with a layer of chopped celery. As each layer is added season with salt and pepper to taste. Combine soup with an equal amount of water and pour over all. Cover and bake for 2 hours at 350f. ; name: easy potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, margarine, green pepper, onion, onion soup mix ; preparation:

name: shalom bayit kugel potato kugel ; ingredients: potatoes, onions, eggs, salt, oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 500f. Grate the potatoes and onions on the middle sized hole of a grater. Either by hand or by food processor. If you grate the potatoes and onions together, the potatoes will not turn grey right away. Put into a large bowl or soup pot, and mix well with remaining ingredients. Grease your baking pans, and pour mixture evenly into the pans. Bake for 15 minutes at 500f, then lower the oven to 400f until done. Eat and enjoy. ; name: cucumber side car ; ingredients: cucumbers, onion, mayonnaise, sugar, celery seed, salt and pepper ; preparation:Slice the cucumbers. Slice rings of onion. Add all ingredients and toss with vegetables. Make well in advance. The liquid from the cucumbers blend and make a sauce. ; name: magic potato puffs ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, olive oil, cracker crumb, salt, pepper, egg yolks ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Put potatoes in large pot and add enough water to cover them. Bring to a boil over high heat then reduce heat to medium and cook for 12-15 minutes or until fork tender. Drain off water, mash and allow to cool. Coat a baking sheet with pam. In a small saucepan, saut onion in the olive oil over medium heat until tender. Add the onion, cracker crumbs, salt and pepper to the potatoes and remash. With your hands, roll into balls and place onto baking sheet. Brush with the egg yolks. Bake 40-45 minutes or until crispy brown. Makes 24-72 small puffs. ; name: super delicious and easy baked fish anykind ; ingredients: tilapia fillets, onion, mayonnaise, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking dish. Coat fillets evenly, and not too thickly, with mayo. Sprinkle evenly with sliced onion. Salt and pepper to taste. Bake at 325 degrees f until done, about 20 minutes. ; name: sweet peas and mushrooms ; ingredients: frozen peas, fresh mushrooms, onion, butter, sugar, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cook peas according to package directions. Drain. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saut mushrooms and onion in butter until onion is crisp-tender. Stir in sugar, salt, pepper and peas. Cover and cook until heated through. ; name: smoked salmon and potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, green beans, mayonnaise, eggs, shallots, salmon, water, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place potatoes in a saucepan and cover with cold water and bring to the boil over high heat and then reduce heat to medium and cook uncovered for 10 minutes or until tender,. Add beans for the last minutes and then drain and transfer to a large bowl. Combine mayonnaise, egg. Eschalots and 1 tablespoon cold water in a small bowl and season with salt and pepper. Add mayonnaise mixture and salmon to potato mixture and toss to combine and serve. Salad can be served warm or cold. ; name: easy vegetable rice medley ; ingredients: oil, onion, carrot, celery rib, red pepper, chicken broth, minute white rice, frozen peas, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a skillet. Add onion, carrot, celery, and red pepper. Cook 5 minutes or until tender. Add broth. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice and peas. Cover. Simmer 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. To save time, replace all the veggies with 3 cups frozen mixed vegetables or frozen broccoli florets and add them when you would have added the peas. ; name: garden pea salad ; ingredients: peas, onion, eggs, mayonnaise, salt, pepper, pimiento ; preparation:

name: rogene s yummie potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, green onion, chicken stock, cheddar cheese, breadcrumbs, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cook potatoes till tender, peel and grate. Heat the butter with soup and chicken stock. Blend in sour cream, onion, and most of the cheese. Mix with the potatoes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Spread into a 9x13 baking dish. Mix the bread crumbs with the melted butter and then place on top of the potatoe mixture. Sprinkle with the remaining cheese. Bake for 45 min at 350 degrees or until bubbly. ; name: to die for veggie casserole ; ingredients: celery, sour cream, cheddar cheese, canned corn niblets, green beans, onion, condensed cream of celery soup, ritz cracker, slivered almonds, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Combine celery, sour cream, shredded cheese, corn, green beans, onion, and cream of celery soup in a large bowl, and mix well. Press into a medium casserole dish. In a medium bowl, mix melted butter, crushed crackers and almonds, and spread over top of the mixture of veggies. Bake at 350 for 40-45 minutes. ; name: easy shrimp etouffee ; ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, cream of celery soup, rotel tomatoes & chilies, onion, green bell pepper, shrimp, butter, white rice ; preparation:Melt butter in large saucepan. Saut veggies until crisp-tender. Add soups & tomatoes. Simmer 45 minutes, then add shrimp, cook until pink. Serve over hot white rice. ; name: lotsa broccoli cheese soup with real cheese ; ingredients: fresh broccoli, chicken broth, milk, condensed cream of celery soup, cornstarch, cold water, cheddar cheese, carrot ; preparation:Gently simmer broccoli in the chicken or vegetable broth until tender. Leave broccoli and broth on stove on lowest setting. Add shredded carrot to broccoli and broth. Mix milk and soup and add to soup. Mix cornstarch and water, and add to soup. Simmer until thickened. Add shredded cheese, simmer just until melted. Serve. ; name: chile scalloped potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, green chilies, cream of celery soup, milk, bacon, cheese sauce mix, bell pepper, onion ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Mix the potatoes with chiles, soup, milk, bacon, and cheese sauce. Saute the bell pepper and onion in bacon drippings until tender. Add to potato mix. Cover and bake 1 hours. ; name: the best potato soup ; ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, cream of celery soup, carrots, onion, celery, evaporated milk, potatoes, water, butter ; preparation:Saut vegfies in butter. Add water. Boil potatoes. When potatoes are cooked, drain and add milk and soups. Pour water and veggies inches. Mesh together. It is better not to mesh completely--leave it a little chunky. ; name: easy tuna melt casserole bake ; ingredients: tuna, onion, celery, mayonnaise, bread, swiss cheese, cream of chicken soup, half-and-half ; preparation:Set oven to 350 degrees. Toast the bread slices. Line the bottom of a greased baking dish with 6 slices of bread, set 6 slices of bread aside. In a bowl, mix together the tuna, chopped onion, celery and mayo. Spread the mixture on the bread in the baking dish. Place the remaining bread slices on top of the tuna mixture. Place the slices of cheese over the bread. Mix together the undiluted soup and the half and half. Pour over the cheese slices, spreading with the back of a spoon to coat evenly. Bake for 20-25 minutes. ; name: quick crab stew ; ingredients: butter, onion, condensed cream of potato soup, condensed cream of celery soup, milk, half-and-half, crabmeat, dry sherry, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: iced tea with a twist ; ingredients: tea, orange juice, grapefruit juice, sugar, ice cube, orange rind, grapefruit peel ; preparation:In a 2-quart pitcher combine tea, orange juice, and grapefruit juice. Stir in desired amount of sugar to taste. To serve, pour over ice cubes in glasses. If desired, tie a strip of orange peel and a strip of grapefruit peel into a knot and use as a garnish. Serve at once. ; name: southern tea punch ; ingredients: orange juice, tea bags, of fresh mint, water, sugar, lemon juice ; preparation:Boil water. Add to large teapot with 5-6 teabags and fresh mint. Steep until cool. Add to orange juice. Add sugar to taste. Add squeeze of lemon juice. ; name: slow cooker cranberry tea ; ingredients: sugar, water, cinnamon sticks, cranberry juice, frozen orange juice, fresh lemon juice, orange slice ; preparation:In saucepan, combine sugar, 8 cups water and cinnamon sticks. Mix well and bring to a boil. Pour mixture into slow cooker with remaining ingredients. Cover and cook on high-heat setting for 1 hour. Reduce heat to low and serve slow cooker cranberry tea warm. ; name: pomegranate banana salad ; ingredients: pomegranate seeds, banana, sugar, bell pepper, sweet onion, vinegar, olive oil, pomegranate molasses, salt ; preparation:Dice bananas, peppers and onions. Toss bananas, peppers, onions, pomegranate seeds and sugar together. In a separate bowl whisk together oil, vinegar, and pomegranate molasses. Drizzle over salad mixture and gently toss. Chill for 2 hours. ; name: yin yang melon soup ; ingredients: melon, mint leaf, fresh lime juice, sugar, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:In a food processor or blender, puree the green melon with the mint, lime juice and 1 tbsp. Of the sugar. Pour into a pitcher and refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour. Rinse out the blender. Add the orange melon, lemon juice and the remaining 1 tbsp. Of sugar and puree. Pour into a pitcher and refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour. At the same time, pour both soups from opposite sides into shallow bowls, taking care to keep them from mixing, and serve. The soups can be refrigerated overnight. ; name: melon and green grape salad ; ingredients: cantaloupe, honeydew melon, watermelon, green seedless grape, fresh mint leaves, lime, juice of, honey, red leaf lettuce, mint sprig ; preparation:In a mixing bowl, combine the first 3 ingredients. In a small bowl, mix together the chopped mint leaves, lime juice, and honey. Pour over fruit. Toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate several hours. In a large glass serving bowl, line lettuce leaves along the bottom and sides of bowl. Spoon melon mixture into the center of bowl. Garnish with mint sprigs. ; name: mulled cider ; ingredients: tea, orange juice, lemon juice, splenda granular, vanilla, orange extract, cinnamon stick, whole cloves ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large saucepan. Bring to a simmer. Simmer for 20 minutes to allow the spices to permeate the liquid. Ladle into mugs. Leftovers will keep in the refrigerator 2 to 3 days. Rewarm in the microwave. ; name: pomegranate with orange juice and strawberries ; ingredients: pomegranates, orange juice, sugar, lemon juice, oranges, strawberry, mint leaf ; preparation:

name: margarita limeade on the rocks ; ingredients: frozen limeade concentrate, tequila, triple sec, water, ice, lime wedge, salt ; preparation:Rub rim of cocktail glass with lime, rub rim of glass in margarita salt. Combine limeade, tequila, triple sec & water in cocktail shaker. Shake well. Pour in cocktail glass with crushed ice. Serve with lime slice. For extra tang, squeese a small lime wedge over finished drink. ; name: cranberry and lime sparkler ; ingredients: cranberry juice, lemon lime and bitters soft drink, limes, sugar cubes, sparkling white wine ; preparation:Combine cranberry juice, soft drink and limes in a large jug. Place 1 sugar cube into each chilled champagne glass. Pour in 100ml sparkling white wine. Top with cranberry and lime mixture. Serve immediately. ; name: jim howard mocktail ; ingredients: ice, orange juice, carbonated lemon-lime beverage, orange slice ; preparation:Fill a collins glass with ice. Pour in orange juice. Add soda. Give the mixture a quick stir. Garnish with an orange slice, and serve. ; name: shred s margarita on the rocks ; ingredients: fresh lime juice, fresh lemon juice, agave nectar, tequila, grand marnier, lime wedge, salt ; preparation:Combine tequila, juices, agave nectar, and grand marnier in a shaker with ice. Sprinkle kosher salt onto a small plate. Wet edge of cocktail glass with lime wedge and press glass into salt. Drop a pinch of salt into the bottom of the glass, add ice and pour contents of shaker into the glass. Garnish with lime wedge. ; name: watermelon margaritas ; ingredients: watermelon, lime wedge, salt, tequila, orange liqueur, sugar, ice cubes, lime slice, orange slice ; preparation:Place watermelon slices in heavy duty zip lock bag. Seal and freeze for 2 hours. Rub the rim of a cocktail glass with lime wedge. Place the salt in a saucer and spin the rim of each glass in the salt and set aside. Process the frozen watermelon, tequila, and next 3 ingredients in blender until smooth, stopping to scrape down the sides. Add the ice and blend well, pour into glasses and garnish if desired. ; name: designated driver margaritas ; ingredients: lime wedge, coarse salt, ice cube, cold water, frozen limeade concentrate, frozen orange juice concentrate, lime juice, lime slice ; preparation:Run the lime wedge around the rim of 3 glasses to moisten them. Dip the rims into the salt to lightly coat the edges of the glasses. Place the glasses in the freezer to chill. Place the ice, water, limeade, orange juice concentrate and lime juice in the container of a blender. Process until combined and slushy. Pour into the prepared glasses. Garnish each glass with a lime slice, if desired. Serve immediately. ; name: bottoms up cherry limeade ; ingredients: lime juice, sugar, lime-flavored soda water, maraschino cherry juice, maraschino cherries, lime slices ; preparation:In a bowl, combine lime juice and sugar. Cover and refrigerate. Just before serving, stir carbonated water into lime juice mixture. For each serving, place 1 tablespoon cherry juice in a glass. Add crushed ice and about 1 cup of lime juice mixture. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a lime slice. ; name: ronague bay cocktail isle of man ; ingredients: whiskey, lime, juice of, sugar, ice, lime wedge ; preparation:

name: chilled sage herb tea ; ingredients: fresh sage, fennel seeds, of fresh mint, lemon rind, boiling water, honey, ice cube, mint leaf ; preparation:Place the sage, fennel seeds, mint and lemon rind in a large teapot or plunger. Add the boiling water and cover with a lid. Set aside for 15 minutes to infuse. Strain into a jug and stir in honey to taste. Cover with plastic wrap and place in the fridge for 1 hour to chill. Place ice cubes and a few mint leaves in serving glasses and pour over the chilled tea to serve. ; name: fresh mint and ginger lemonade ; ingredients: fresh mint leaves, fresh ginger, honey, boiling water, fresh lemon juice, water, ice cube, lemon slice ; preparation:Combine chopped mint, ginger and honey in medium bowl. Add boiling water and allow to steep for 30-40 minutes. Strain into 4-cup glass measuring cup, pressing on solids to extract liquid. Add lemon juice and enough cold water to measure 4 cups total. Fill glasses with ice cubes. Add lemonade. Garnish with mint leaves and fresh lemon slices. ; name: greek green beans braised with mint and potatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, margarine, tomato juice, fresh green beans, fresh parsley, potatoes, salt & freshly ground black pepper, of fresh mint ; preparation:Combine olive oil and margarine in a non-reactive pan. Heat through. Add tomato juice or sauce, green beans, parsley and enough water to almost cover. Tuck the potato slices in between, partially cover pan with lid, and simmer for 25 minutes. Stir and season with salt, pepper, and 2 tbsp chopped mint. Cook uncovered until green beans and potatoes are fork tender, about 10 more minutes. If the sauce has not thickened, pour it into a small pan, and reduce to one cup, then combine with the beans and potatoes in a warm serving bowl. Sprinkle with a little additional fresh mint and serve warm. ; name: strawberry cucumber and basil salad ; ingredients: strawberries, fresh basil, balsamic vinegar, sugar, cucumbers, lemon juice, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Peel and seed cucumbers. Halve lengthwise, and slice thin. Combine strawberries, basil, vinegar, and sugar. Toss to coat and chill for 1 hour. Combine cucumbers and lemon juice. Toss to coat. After chilling, add cucumber mixture, salt, and pepper to strawberry mixture. Gently toss to combine, and serve immediately. ; name: classic raspberry vinaigrette ; ingredients: raspberry vinegar, raspberries, honey, fresh basil leaf, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:In a blender or food processor, combine raspberry vinegar, raspberries, honey, and basil. Whirl 1 minute or until well blended. With the motor on, add olive oil in a slow steady stream, whirling until dressing is smooth. Store, covered, in the refrigerator. Serve at room temperature. ; name: couscous with dried apricots currants and pistachios ; ingredients: water, olive oil, cinnamon sticks, ground cumin, coarse salt, dried apricot, couscous, dried currant, pistachios, fresh mint leaves ; preparation:In each of two 3-quart saucepans bring half of water, oil, cinnamon, cumin, salt, and apricots to a boil. Stir 1 box couscous into each pan and let stand, covered, off heat 5 minutes. Fluff couscous with a fork and transfer to 2 shallow baking pans to cool as quickly as possible. Cool couscous completely and with your fingers break up any large lumps. Couscous may be made 1 day ahead and chilled, covered. Bring couscous to room temperature before proceeding. Fluff couscous with fork again and stir in currants, pistachios, mint, and salt and pepper to taste. ; name: balsamic baked onions and potatoes jamie oliver ; ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, butter, fresh rosemary, bulb of garlic, red onions, balsamic vinegar, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. Put the potatoes into a pan of boiling, salted water and cook for around 8 minutes, then drain and return to the pan. Chuff them up a bit by shaking the pan. Get a roasting pan, into which you can fit the potatoes in 1 layer, and heat it on the stove. When hot, pour a glug of olive oil into it and add the butter, rosemary and garlic. Add the potatoes and toss them in all the flavors. Add the onions and all the balsamic vinegar and season with salt and pepper. Cook for 5 minutes on the burner to reduce the balsamic vinegar a little. Place the pan on the top shelf and cook for around 50 minutes, until the potatoes and onions are dark, sticky and crispy - removing the pan to toss the onions and potatoes halfway through. ; name: fresh mint and rosemary sauce ; ingredients: fresh mint leaves, fresh rosemary, granulated sugar, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:

name: hawaiian omelette ; ingredients: eggs, pineapple chunk, ham, monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese, water, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Beat together eggs, water, salt and pepper. Thinly coat your skillet with vegetable oil spray. Heat over medium high. Pour egg mixture into pan. When eggs are almost set, sprinkle half of the omelette with remaining ingredients. Fold other half of omelette over filling. Continue cooking until cheese melts, about 2 minutes. Cut omelette into 3 wedges and serve. ; name: three cheese omelet ; ingredients: butter, eggs, mild cheddar cheese, provolone cheese, swiss cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Using an 8-inch, non-stick skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add beaten eggs. As the eggs begin to thicken, add the 3 cheeses evenly over the eggs. As cheese begins to melt, and before the eggs get brown, flip or turn egg mixture over. Continue to cook until the cheese melts. Turn omelette 1 more time. The finished omelette will be a nice yellow color with the cheese melted. Serve immediately. ; name: sarah s beef enchiladas with chicken soup ; ingredients: hamburger, green chilies, refried beans, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, onions, cheddar cheese, flour tortilla, salt, pepper ; preparation:Brown the hamburger. Drain off fat, mix in chillies and re-fried beans. Heat and then set aside. Mix soup, sour cream and onion together, heat on medium heat until mixed thoroughly. Add enough of the soup mixture to lightly cover the bottom of a greased 9x13 inch pan. Place a scoop of meat and scoop of soup mixture in each tortilla, sprinkle cheese on top. Place in baking dish. Repeat until dish is full. Pour remaining soup mixture on top and top that with the cheese. Bake at 300f for 30 minutes. ; name: mama lu s broccoli casserole ; ingredients: white bread, frozen chopped broccoli, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, butter, sugar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Butter a 9x13 glass pyrex dish. Tear the bread slices into bite size pieces and cover the bottom of the pan. Layer the chopped broccoli on top of the bread slices. In a large bowl, combine the remaining ingredients and pour over the broccoli and bread, making sure all the bread pieces get a good soaking and that the cheese is distributed evenly. Cover with tin foil and bake for 35-40 minutes or until casserole is golden brown and set. Let rest 10 minutes and cut into squares and serve. ; name: southern egg scrambled breakfast ; ingredients: eggs, sour cream, cheddar cheese, ham, onion, fresh mushrooms, green bell pepper, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add mushrooms, bell peppers, and onions. Saute until onions are translucent and tender. Add diced ham and stir until steaming. In the meantime, in large mixing bowl, crack and add the dozen eggs, salt and pepper to taste, one heaping tablespoon of sour cream. Beat with wire whisk until smooth. Pour over the ham and vegetable mixture in the skillet. Sprinkle the top with the cheese. Stir as it cooks until the eggs are no longer shiny. ; name: german french toast ; ingredients: eggs, white bread, muenster cheese, milk, butter, salt ; preparation:Melt butter in a skillet on medium heat. In a small bowl, beat together eggs, milk and salt. Dip bread slices one at a time in egg mixture, and fry in butter until bolden brown. After turning once, top each slice of bread with a slice of muenster cheese. Cover skillet until the cheese is melted. Serve and enjoy. ; name: company crab casserole ; ingredients: crabmeat, milk, soft breadcrumbs, cheddar cheese, butter, onion, green peppers, pimiento, salt, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Pour milk over bread crumbs to soften. Add remaining ingredients except eggs. Stir in eggs. Pour mixture into a well-greased loaf pan or a 6x8 inch casserole. Set the dish in a container of hot water and bake for about 45 minutes or until an inserted knife come out clean. ; name: white castle breakfast casserole ; ingredients: white castle hamburgers, mild cheddar cheese, eggs, skim milk, salt, pepper, mild green chilies ; preparation:

name: white chocolate pecan drop cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, sugar, light brown sugar, egg, vanilla extract, pecans, white chocolate ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350. In a bowl, combinte the first 3 ingredients. Set aside. In a larger bowl, cream the butter with the sugars for 2 minutes or until smooth. Add in the egg and vanilla. Beat well. Add in the dry ingredients and mix thoroughly. Stir in the pecans and white chocolate. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until lightly golden. Let cookies cool on cookie sheet for 5 minutes. Then tranfer to wire rack to cool completely. ; name: softest chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, butter, brown sugar, white sugar, vanilla instant pudding mix, eggs, vanilla extract, chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat over to 350f. Sift together the flour and baking soda, set that aside. In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar, and white sugar. Beat in the instant pudding mix until blended. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Blend in the flour mixture. Finally, stir in the chocolate chips and nuts. Drop cookies by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Edges should be golden brown. ; name: greeny s chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, butter, shortening, sugar, light brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, chocolate chips ; preparation:In a medium bowl, stir flour with baking soda and salt. Set aside. In large mixing bowl, cream butter and shortening with sugar, brown sugar, eggs, and vanilla. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Gradually blend dry mixture into creamed mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop by tablespoon onto parchment-lined cookie sheets. Bake for 9-11 minutes. Cool completely on a wire rack before storing in an airtight container. To make bar cookies, pat the dough down into a 9x13 pan, and bake at 350 degrees f for 30 minutes. ; name: to die for nut bars ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, brown sugar, baking soda, salt, butter, mixed nuts, milk chocolate chips, caramel ice cream topping ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine flours, brown sugar, baking soda and salt. Cut in butter until mixture resembles course crumbs. Press into a greased 15x10x1-inch baking pan. Bake at 350 degrees 10-12 minutes or until golden brown. Quickly spread nuts and chocolate chips over crust. Combine caramel topping with 3 tablespoons flour. Drizzle over nuts and chocolate chips. Bake 12-15 minutes longer or until golden and bubbly. Cool and cut into squares. ; name: white chocolate chunk muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, buttermilk, butter, eggs, vanilla, white chocolate ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Grease 12 large muffin cups. Combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt in a large bowl. Combine buttermilk, butter, eggs and vanilla in small bowl until blended. Stir into flour mixture just until moistened. Fold in white chocolate. Spoon into prepeared muffin cups, filling half full. Bake 25-30 minutes or until wooden toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in pan on wire rack for 5 minutes. Remove from pan. Cool on wire rack 10 minutes. Serve warm or completely cool. ; name: corn muffins with sweet red peppers ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, yellow cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, salt, pepper, buttermilk, vegetable oil, egg, sweet red pepper ; preparation:In large bowl, combine flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, salt and pepper. In small bowl, beat together buttermilk, oil and egg, stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. Stir in red pepper. Spoon batter into well greased or paper lined muffin cups, filling each two thirds full. Bake in 425f degree oven for 15 minutes or until tester inserted in centre comes out clean. Or bake in 8 inch square baking pan in 425f degree oven for 20 minutes or until firm to the touch. Cut into squares to serve. ; name: blueberry dream cake ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, butter, egg whites, vanilla, fresh blueberries, low-fat plain yogurt, egg, lemons ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, butter, egg whites, and vanilla. Mix well. Press onto bottom of 10 inch springform pan. Layer blueberries on base. In large bowl combine flour, yogurt, egg, sugar, vanilla, and lemon rind. Mix until smooth. Pour over blueberries. Bake 60-70 minutes or until cake is firm and golden. ; name: orange blondies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, salt, butter, eggs, orange extract, orange zest, powdered sugar, cream cheese, orange juice ; preparation:

name: green tomato ketchup quebec style chow chow ; ingredients: green tomatoes, onions, coarse salt, white vinegar, granulated sugar, pickling spices ; preparation:In a large bowl, alternate layers of tomatoes and onions, sprinkling each layer with salt. Let stand for at least 8 hours, better overnight. Rinse. Drain well. Combine vegetables with vinegar, sugar and spice bag. In a large saucepan or stock pot, bring mixture to a boil, then simmer, uncovered, for about 30 to 45 minutes. Stir frequently until slightly thickened. Pour into hot, sterilized jars and seal. ; name: buckwheat bake vegetarian ; ingredients: onion, tomatoes, olive oil, buckwheat flour, long grain rice, water, dried basil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Chop the onion and the tomatoes. Heat the oil in a sauce pan and fry the onion until transparent. Add the tomatoes and stir until softened. Stir in the buckwheat and rice and cook for 2minute. Add the remaining ingredients. Bring to the boil, reduce the heat, cover and simmer until the liquid has been absorbed about 20 minutes. Adjust seasoning, then turn the mixture into a greased 7 inch square shallow cake tin. Bake in the oven at 190c 375f for 30 minutes. Serve hot or cold. ; name: vegetarian green chili ; ingredients: butter, garlic, onion flakes, flour, diced tomatoes, green chili pepper, salt, cilantro, water ; preparation:In a large sauce pan, melt butter or margarine. Add garlic and onion and cook until onion is re-hydtrated. Add flour and stir to make a roux. Add tomatoes, green chili, salt and cilantro. Add water. Simmer for 30 minutes. This can also be made in a crock pot. ; name: beets with onion cumin ; ingredients: canola oil, onion, garlic, cumin seeds, all-purpose flour, beets, tomatoes, water, salt ; preparation:Heat a medium saucepan over medium-high heat. Pour in oil and saute onion and garlic until translucent. Mix in cumin seed and saute an additional 2 minutes. Sprinkle in flour and saute 1 minute more. Stir in beets, tomatoes, water, and salt. Reduce heat to low, cover pan with lid, and allow to simmer 30 to 45 minutes, until beets are tender. ; name: lucy s zucchini slice ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, zucchini, bacon, cheddar cheese, self raising flour, vegetable oil, eggs ; preparation:Grease a 19cm x 29cm slice pan with oil. Heat oils in a small pan, cook onion, stirring until soft, you will know this when it goes a bit white and see through. Combine onion with remaining ingredients in medium bowl. Mix well. Spread mixture into prepared pan. Bake in moderate oven 35 minutes or until golden on top and firm. ; name: grandmother merrill s chili sauce ; ingredients: onion, sugar, salt, cinnamon, tomatoes, vinegar, allspice, pickled peppers ; preparation:Finely chop onions and peppers. Mix with sugar, vinegar, and salt. Cook slowly until onions are tender. Chop tomatoes, and add to the mixture, add allspice and cinnamon. Stir well and cook 3 minutes. Good on dried peas or beans, boiled cabbage, etc. ; name: egg and vegetable pie ; ingredients: eggs, bacon, zucchini, red capsicum, carrot, cheese, vegetable oil, self raising flour ; preparation:Whisk eggs together. Add flour and oil gradually and beat until smooth. Add all other ingredients. Place in a greased pie dish. Bake at 200 celcius for 30 minutes. Serve hot with tomato sauce. ; name: domatokeftedes greek tomato patties ; ingredients: tomatoes, onion, sugar, salt and pepper, self-raising flour, olive oil, mint ; preparation:

name: sizzling sherry shrimp with garlic ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, paprika, medium shrimp, dry sherry, salt & freshly ground black pepper, parsley ; preparation:Heat olive oil, garlic, red pepper flakes, and paprika in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Once the oil is hot and the garlic has turned golden brown, increase heat to high and add the shrimp. Cook until the shrimp turn pink and opaque, about 3 minutes. Deglaze the pan with sherry or lemon juice and season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve garnished with chopped parsley. ; name: egyptian spiced prawns ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, paprika, ground cumin, ginger, large shrimp, sea salt, fresh coriander ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large frying pan. Add the garlic and saut gently for 2-3 minutes. Add the paprika, cumin and ginger. Stir to combine. Stir in prawns, salt and cilantro. Stir-fry for 5 minutes or until the prawns turn pink. Serve over hot rice. ; name: rosemary apricot chicken ; ingredients: salt, dried rosemary, black pepper, garlic cloves, chicken quarters, apricot jam, lemon juice, dijon mustard ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Mix salt, rosemary, pepper and garlic. Rub mixture into chicken. Place chicken, meaty side up, in pan and bake for 25 minutes. Meanwhile, mix apricot jam, lemon juice, and mustard. Brush apricot mixture over chicken. Bake for 20 minutes longer or until juices run clear. Serve. ; name: greens and beans ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, dried oregano, fresh parsley, escarole, white beans, chicken broth ; preparation:Heat oil in saucepan. Stir in garlic and seasoning and saute for 3 minutes. Stir in greens. Cover and cook until wilted. Remove cover and stir in beans. Cook for 3 minutes. Add chicken broth for juice and most importantly, flavor. ; name: shrimp and shallot linguini from trader s joes ; ingredients: shrimp, shallots, butter, olive oil, garlic, black pepper, lemon juice, fresh parsley, linguine ; preparation:Mix melted butter, olive oil, shallots, garlic, pepper, parsley and lemon juice in a bowl. Toss shrimp into mixture. Heat skillet on medium. Pour shrimp mixture into skillet and saute until shrimp turn pink in color. Serve over linguini noodles. ; name: 4 minute spicy garlic shrimp ; ingredients: shrimp, olive oil, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, steak seasoning, lemon, zest of, lemon juice, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat a large skillet over medium high heat. Add olive oil, garlic, red pepper flakes, and shrimp. Season with grill seasoning or salt & pepper. Cook shrimp 3 minutes or until just pink. Toss with lemon zest, juice, & chopped parsley. Remove shrimp to a serving platter, leaving the garlic cloves in the pan. ; name: ratatouille rice ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, mushroom, red bell pepper, eggplant, tomato sauce, chicken broth, dried thyme leaves, brown rice ; preparation:Prheat oven to 350 degrees. Heat oil in 12 inch fry pan over medium heat. Add onion, cooking til soft, about 7 minutes. Add garlic and cook 1 more minute. Add mushrooms, bell pepper and eggplant. Cook, stirring, until liquid has evaporated, about 5 minutes. In a 3 or 4 quart casserole, combine eggplant mixture with tomato sauce, broth, thyme and rice. Cover and bake till rice is tender. ; name: caribbean shrimp ; ingredients: shrimp, olive oil, garlic, dried rosemary, dried thyme, black pepper, cayenne pepper, salt, lime ; preparation:

name: dijon glazed carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, butter, light brown sugar, dijon mustard, parsley ; preparation:In a covered medium saucepan, cook carrots in small amount of boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes or until tender-crisp. Drain. Remove from pan. Keep warm. In same saucepan, over medium heat, melt butter. Stir in brown sugar and mustard until combined. Stir in carrots. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until carrots are glazed. Sprinkle with parsley. ; name: carrots with raisin sauce ; ingredients: carrots, brown sugar, cornstarch, water, cider vinegar, raisins, butter ; preparation:Cook carrots in salted water until tender, drain. While carrots are cooking, mix brown sugar and cornstarch in a small saucepan. Stir in water, vinegar and raisins. Cook over low heat until sauce is thickened. Remove from heat, add butter, stir until melted and pour over carrots. ; name: brown sugar glazed carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, butter, brown sugar, salt ; preparation:In a medium saucepan cook carrots, covered, in a small amount of boiling salted water for 8 to 10 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain. Remove carrots from pan. In the same saucepan combine butter, brown sugar, and salt. Cook and stir over medium heat until combined. Add carrots. Cook and stir about 2 minutes or until glazed. ; name: simply sweet and sour red cabbage ; ingredients: butter, red cabbage, sugar, balsamic vinegar, salt & pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Melt butter in a large pot. Over medium heat add 4 cups of cabbage and stir 1 minute. Add remaining cabbage, 4 cups at a time, and stir until cabbage is wilted. Mix sugar and vinegar, then add to cabbage and mix well. Cover and simmer over low heat, stirring occasionally for 30 minutes. Season to taste and stir in parsley before serving. ; name: dressed up baby carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, brown sugar, butter, salt ; preparation:Use either a bag of whole baby carrots from the produce section or 2 15 ounce cans of sliced carrots. Add carrots to a medium sized sauce pan over medium heat. Quickly add the butter and brown sugar and toss the carrots in the melting butter. Just when they begin to bubble, reduce to low heat and simmer 15 minutes. Remember, sugar can scorch quickly, so stir occasionally and keep the heat low. ; name: glazed carrots with onions ; ingredients: butter, carrots, onions, ground ginger, orange juice, currant jelly, salt, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a medium skillet, melt butter over medium-low heat. Add carrots, onions, and ginger, cover and cook, stirring, for about 7 to 10 minutes, until just tender. Stir in the orange juice, jelly, and salt. Cook, uncovered, for about 4 minutes, stirring frequently, until vegetables are tender and nicely glazed with the jelly and orange juice mixture. Sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley just before serving. ; name: carrot onion and celery soup by me ; ingredients: baby carrots, sweet onion, celery, butter, dried tarragon, vegetable broth, chicken broth, dry white wine ; preparation:Slice the carrots fine, mince the onion, slice the celery thin. In a big pot saute the onion in butter until softened. Stir in the carrot, celery and tarragon. Add broth and wine. Bring to a boil. Simmer until done. ; name: bourbon carrots ; ingredients: water, baby carrots, white sugar, salt, butter, brown sugar, bourbon, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: ww caprese rice salad ; ingredients: olive oil, balsamic vinegar, basil leaves, cherry tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, salt, pepper, onion, rice ; preparation:In a large serving bowl, mix together 2 tablespoons olive oil with the vinegar, basil, tomatoes, mozzarella, salt and pepper. Set aside while rice cooks. Heat remaining teaspoon of olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until softened, about 3 minutes. Add rice and pint water. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer until water is absorbed and rice is tender, about 15 - 20 minutes. Toss rice with tomato mixture. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: fried eggs with kansas city style barbecue sauce for 1 ; ingredients: olive oil, arugula leaf, egg, barbecue sauce, sharp white cheddar cheese, fresh cilantro, cracked black pepper ; preparation:Heat up a skillet on medium heat then add the olive oil. Arrange the arugula leaves on a plate. Gently crack the egg and lightly fry for 3 minutes, or to your preference. Carefully arrange the fried egg on the arugula leaves. Spoon barbecue sauce on and around the egg and greens. Grate cheese on top followed by a garnish of fresh cilantro. Season with cracked black pepper. ; name: israeli couscous tomato and mozzarella salad ; ingredients: cherry tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, fresh ground black pepper, garlic clove, israeli couscous, fresh basil, basil leaves ; preparation:Halve cherry tomatoes. In a large bowl combine the tomato, mozzarella, olive oil, vinegar, salt, pepper, and garlic, toss well then refrigerate, covered, to marinate for 30 minutes. Cook couscous according to directions. Rinse couscous with cold water until cool. Toss couscous and basil with tomato and mozzarella mixture.
