Cook the additional hour and serve over rice. ; name: smothered chicken in onion gravy ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, onion, all-purpose flour, pepper, salt, poultry seasoning, garlic powder, ranch dressing, chicken stock ; preparation:Pound chicken breasts slightly to uniform thickness. Preheat non-stick skillet over medium heat for 3 minutes, then melt 4 tablespoons butter. Saut the chicken breasts, 2 at a time in the melted butter until browned on both sides. Place browned chicken in a medium-sized sauce pan. Add remaining two tablespoons of butter to skillet, and then saut the onion until soft and brown, about 4 minutes add onions to chicken in sauce pan. Add 5 tablespoons flour to skillet, and saut about 2 minutes, until slightly browned. Add stock and whisk until smooth. Add salt, pepper and garlic powder, and then pour over chicken in sauce pan. Add ranch dressing and stir. Bring mixture to boil in sauce pan, then cover and simmer over medium low for 30 minutes. I serve with homemade biscuits to mop the gravy, along with mashed potatoes, or wild rice. ; name: carol s chicken fruit salad ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, pineapple chunks, granny smith apple, green seedless grape, light mayonnaise, cashews, romaine lettuce ; preparation:Cut cooked chicken into good sized chunks. Drain pineapple, reserving juice. Chop apple into chunks and dip in pineapple juice to keep them from browning. Combine chicken, pineapple, apple, grapes and mayonaisse. Mix well. Cover and chill 2 hours before serving. Serve over romaine lettuce leaves. Top with some of the cashews. ; name: brown sugar rubbed chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, brown sugar, paprika, onion powder, salt, chili powder ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium-high. Combine sugar and spices in a resealable plastic bag. Wash hands. Add chicken to bag, one piece at a time, shaking to coat. Transfer to plate. Spray on both sides with nonstick cooking spray. Wash hands. Grill chicken, turning frequently to avoid burning sugar, 10 to 12 minutes or until done. ; name: low fat oven bake crispy chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, buttermilk, dried breadcrumbs, garlic powder, chili powder, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Cut chicken breasts into about 3 pieces and put into a ziplock bag, add the buttermilk and marinade overnight, or for at least 2 hours. Preheat oven to 325f and spray a baking sheet with pam cooking spray. Put all the dry ingredients into a ziplock bag and shake to combine. Remove chicken from the ziplock bag and shake off any excess buttermilk and add to the breadcrumb mix, add 3 pieces at a time and shake to coat the chicken. Remove and place on baking sheet. Repeat till all pieces are coated. Spray chicken with pam cooking spray and bake for about 20 minutes. ; name: chicken curried couscous skillet ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, cumin, pepper, chicken broth, curry powder, couscous, frozen peas, raisins ; preparation:

name: homemade stromboli mmmmmmmmmmm ; ingredients: frozen white bread dough, ham, provolone cheese, salami, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, sliced mushrooms, spaghetti sauce, butter, italian seasoning ; preparation:Thaw bread dough& let rise a litte- approximately 30 minutes. Roll out& spread spaghetti sauce on dough. Layer meats& cheeses in order given onto the dough. Roll up on a cookie sheet like a jellyroll& seal the edges. Brush melted butter on top& sprinkle with italian seasoning. Cover with foil. Bake at 350 for 1 hour, then uncover& allow to brown for 10 more minutes. Serve with extra spaghetti sauce for dipping. Bake. ; name: cream cheese tea sandwiches with salad burnet ; ingredients: whole grain bread, butter, salad burnet, cream cheese, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Spread the butter on each slice of bread. Add them whole to the cream cheese. In a small bowl combine the salad burnet and cream cheese. Add salt and pepper, to taste. Mix well. Spread the cream cheese mixture on two slices of bread. Place other slices on top and cut sandwiches in half or quarters. ; name: parmesan crumbed fish bake ; ingredients: bread, basil, olive oil, parmesan cheese, white fish fillets, pasta sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c lightly grease 7cm deep 24cm square baking dish. Place bread in food processor and process until roughly chopped. Add basil and oil and process to a fine breadcrumb mixture. Transfer to mixing bowl and add parmesan. Season fish with salt and pepper. Place in a single layer in baking dish. Spoon over the pasta sauce. Sprinkle the breadcrumb mixture over the top. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until fish is cooked and top is golden. ; name: grilled pear and blue cheese sandwich ; ingredients: blue cheese, havarti cheese, sourdough bread, unsalted butter, pears, salad greens ; preparation:Toss cheeses together in a small bowl. Set aside. Place bread slices on a work surface. Spread 1 teaspoon of the butter on each of 4 bread slices. Set aside. Arrange pear slices evenly on the unbuttered slices. Top with the cheese. Top with the greens, then the buttered slice of bread. Heat remaining 2 tablespoons of the butter in a skillet over medium heat, or prepare a panini pan. Add sandwiches to pan. Heat, turning once, pressing with a spatula to flatten, until cheese melts and bread browns, about 3 minutes per side. ; name: microwave american welsh rarebit ; ingredients: butter, mustard, pepper, salt, beer, velveeta american cheese spread, italian bread ; preparation:Melt the butter and mustard in a microwave safe bowl on high for 15 seconds, add salt and pepper, beer and cheese and microwave on high for at least 30 seconds. Remove the bowl and stir until the cheese has has achieved the desired consistency. Taste and add additional salt and pepper if required. Pour over plain toast or for a lunch, slices of ham and tomatoes may be added. Serve immediately, with the rest of the beer. ; name: fried mozzarella pockets ; ingredients: mozzarella cheese, sandwich bread, eggs, milk, italian breadcrumbs, vegetable oil, olive oil, sliced mushrooms, sage, marinara sauce ; preparation:Cut the mozzarella into 12 chunks. Place each chunk on one half of a bread slice and fold the other half over the top. Press edges together to seal. In a small bowl, whisk together the eggs and milk. Spread the breadcrumbs in another shallow bowl. Dip the cheese pockets into the egg mixture, allowing excess to drip back in the bowl. Dredge in the breadcrumbs, tuning to coat evenly and completely. In a large, heavy frying pan, heat both oils over medium-high heat until hot but not smoking. Working in batches, fry the pockets, turning once, until deep golden brown--about 4 minutes each side. Drain on paper towels. Sprinkle with sage. Serve hot with marinara sauce in dipping cups. ; name: grilled bacon and bleu sandwiches ; ingredients: cream cheese, blue cheese, bacon, italian salad dressing, rye bread ; preparation:Combine cream cheese, blue cheese, bacon and 2 tablespoons italian dressing. Spread cheese mixture evenly onto 4 bread slices. Top with remaining bread. Brush sandwiches on both sides with remaining italian dressing. Grill sandwiches in non-stick skillet over medium heat until golden brown on both sides and filling is melted. ; name: muffuletta panini ; ingredients: butter, bread, provolone cheese, olive salad, black forest ham, mortadella, genoa salami ; preparation:

name: double almond crunch toffee ; ingredients: almonds, butter, sugar, light corn syrup, water, chocolate chips ; preparation:Spread almonds in seperate shallow pans. Place in low temp oven to roast them until light brown. Meanwhile melt butter over low heat in a 2 qt pan. Add sugar, corn syrup and water. Cook, stirring occasionally to hard crack stage watch close, when it gets to 280, quickly stir in coarse chopped nuts. Spread in ungreased pan. Cool. Spread with melted chocolate chips. Sprinkle with nuts. Flip over onto wax paper. Spread more chocolate and nuts. ; name: chinese almond cookies ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, shortening, egg, almond extract, sliced almonds ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Sift flour with sugar, soda salt and cinnamon into a large bowl or food processor by pulsing 3-4 times. Mix in shortening and knead thoroughly. Combine egg and almond extract. Stir into flour mixture. Mix well. Shape into balls using 1 tablespoon of dough. Place on ungreased baking sheets and make a depression in the top with the thumb. Press a blanched whole or sliced almond into the center of each cookie. Bake for 15 to 18 minutes. Makes six dozen. ; name: almonds great appetizer with drinks ; ingredients: almonds, butter, fresh rosemary, brown sugar, salt, ground red pepper ; preparation:Spread almonds in a single layer on a baking sheet. Bake in a 350 oven for about 10 minutes or until nuts are lightly toasted and fragrant. Meanwhile, in a med saucepan melt butter over med heat until sizzling. Remove from heat. Stir in rosemary, sugar, salt and red pepper. Add almonds to butter mixture and toss to coat. Cool slightly before serving. If desired seal cooled nuts in an airtight container and store for up to 1 month in refrigerator or up to 3 months in freezer. ; name: couscous mix with toasted pine nuts coconut milk lime juice ; ingredients: pine nuts, coconut milk, lime juice, sugar, water, chicken base, butter ; preparation:In medium saucepan add all of the ingredients except the couscous mix and the butter. Bring to a boil, take off burner add couscous and cover,. Let set for about 5 minutes. Stir and add butter. Serve. ; name: almond sugar cookies ; ingredients: flour, butter, sugar, milk, baking powder, almond extract, salt, eggs ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and almond extract. Combine dry ingredients, add to sugar mixture. Drop onto cookie sheet. Bake 350 for 1012 minutes. ; name: apple hill cake ; ingredients: sugar, oil, eggs, apples, flour, baking soda, nutmeg, cinnamon, salt, walnuts ; preparation:Combine sugar, oil, and eggs in a large bowl, stirring until well mixed. Stir in diced apples and nuts. Sift together flour, baking soda, nutmeg, cinnamon and salt, then add to bowl. Stir all ingredients together to form a batter. Pour into 9x13 inch greased pan. Bake one hour in a 350 degree oven. ; name: dutch almond cookies amandel koekjes ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, brown sugar, eggs, almonds, flour, baking soda, almond paste ; preparation:Cream butter and sugars together. Then beat in the eggs. Add the flour and soda and then mix in the almond paste. If dough gets too stiff andd a few drops of water. Mix in the nut meats. Drop by teaspoonful on greased cookie sheet. Bake in 325 oven for 15 minutes. ; name: honig brat mandeln honey roasted almonds ; ingredients: almonds, sugar, salt, honey, water, almond oil ; preparation:

name: instant rice pudding ; ingredients: white rice, milk, sugar, salt, vanilla extract, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Combine cooked rice, milk, sugar and salt in a medium saucepan. Bring to a boil, then lower the heat to a simmer and stir in the vanilla. Cook until just about all of the milk is absorbed, stirring occasionally. Stir in cinnamon and nutmeg. Serve warm or chilled. ; name: rudolph chow ; ingredients: butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, creamy peanut butter, rice chex, powdered sugar ; preparation:Melt the butter, chocolate chips and peanut butter together in microwave safe bowl until melted, about 4 minutes. Pour the melted mixture over the cereal, tossing careful so you dont crush the cereal. Pour the powdered sugar over the cereal in a large paper bag or clean trash bag. Toss to coat all the cereal. Let dry and store in an air tight container. To give as gifts, place in tins or coffee cans covered with christmas wrap. ; name: glorified rice dessert salad ; ingredients: cooked white rice, crushed pineapple, sugar, miniature marshmallow, whipping cream, vanilla, maraschino cherry ; preparation:Mix rice, pineapple, sugar and marshmallows in a bowl. Whip cream with additional sugar and vanilla until stiff. Fold into rice mixture. Chill. Decorate with maraschino cherries or slices of fresh pineapple or strawberries. Serves 6-8. ; name: chocolate dipped krispies peanut butter balls ; ingredients: butter, chunky peanut butter, vanilla, powdered sugar, rice, paraffin wax, chocolate chips ; preparation:Melt butter and while hot, stir in peanut butter. Mix well and add vanilla, powdered sugar and rice krispies. Work in with hands until it will form balls. If using paraffin shred on a box grater then add to the chocolate in a double boil and heat till melted and combined. Dip into melted chocolate and paraffin or shortening with toothpick. Cool on waxed paper. ; name: chocolate rice pudding ; ingredients: cooked rice, milk, sugar, cocoa, salt, vanilla, butter ; preparation:Place cooked rice and milk in top of double boiler. Mix in sugar, cocoa and salt. Cook over boiling water 45 mins, stirring occasionally. It should be creamy. Add vanilla and butter before serving. ; name: my mum s rice pudding brulee ; ingredients: pudding rice, milk, vanilla extract, butter, caster sugar, egg yolks ; preparation:Put rice in small pan and cover with boiling water and cook for 4 minutes. Drain and rinse under the hot tap. Put milk in pan with the vanilla and bring to the boil. Put rice and milk into a covered casserole dish and bake in a moderate oven for 30 minutes. Cream butter and sugar until smooth and creamy, add egg yolks and beat. Take rice out of oven, and turn oven down a fraction. Add egg mix mixture to the rice and beat together with a fork. Butter a souffle dish, pour in rice mixture and set in a pan of hot water in the oven and cook for a further 40 minutes. Remove and cool. When quite cold, cover top generously with caster sugar and put under a very hot grill until sugar turns golden brown. Chill and serve with thin cream. ; name: my favorite rice pudding ; ingredients: eggs, milk, sugar, butter, vanilla, salt, cooked rice, raisins, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Beat eggs. Add milk, sugar, rice, eggs, butter, vanilla and salt to the eggs. Pour into buttered baking dish. Sprinkle with cinnamon and nutmeg. Bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes or until set. ; name: individual white chocolate amaretti rice puddings ; ingredients: amaretti cookie, short-grain rice, caster sugar, whole milk, white chocolate ; preparation:

name: grandma s hamburger helper ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, celery ribs, diced tomatoes, pasta, onion soup mix, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Saute onion and celery in water or chicken stock, set aside. Brown the ground beef, drain. Add onion and celery back in. Add can of diced tomatoes, a can of water and the pasta. Bring to boil, simmer uuntil pasta is soft and water is gone. Mix in onion soup mix. Mix in cheddar cheese. Serve. ; name: macaroni pizza ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, salt, pepper, tomato soup, macaroni, milk, egg, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Boil macaroni as per package directions. Drain and set aside. Brown together meat, onion, and seasoning. Stir in soup and heat for 15 minutes. In separate bowl combine pasta with milk and egg. Grease a jelly roll pan and pour pasta mixture in. Spread out to fill pan. Gently spread beef mixture on top to cover. Sprinkle with the cheese. Bake in 350 oven for 20 minutes. Cool 5 minutes before cutting into squares. ; name: macaroni and cheese surprise ; ingredients: ground beef, mushroom and green pepper flavor spaghetti sauce, macaroni and cheese mix, cheese ; preparation:Brown the meat and drain. Add spaghetti sauce and let simmer. Boil macaroni as directed on box. Drain macaroni and add back to pot. Add the cheese from the macaroni and cheese dinner. When the cheese is distributed, add the spaghetti sauce mixture. Mix well. Pour into 13x9 casserole dish. Cover the mixture with the kraft singles. Bake at 375f for 10 minutes or until cheese is melted. Let stand for 5 minutes before serving. ; name: cheesy beef and bean bake ; ingredients: ground beef, salt and pepper, tomato sauce, onion, worcestershire sauce, baked beans, mashed potatoes, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. In a large skillet over medium high heat, combine the ground beef and salt and pepper to taste. Saut for 10 minutes, or until well browned. Add tomato sauce, onion and worcestershire sauce. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Prepare potatoes. Place beef mixture into a casserole dish. Layer the beans over the beef and smooth potatoes over the beans. Sprinkle the cheese over the potatoes and bake uncovered at 375f for 30 to 40 minutes. ; name: simple and delicious meatloaf ; ingredients: ground beef, carrot, mushrooms, celery, onion, bread, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Individually process carrot, mushroom, celery, and onion in a food processor until pieces are ground fine. Add to mixing bowl. Process three slices bread into crumbs and add to bowl. Add ground beef, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper and eggs. Combine well with hands. Form into loaf on a cookie sheet. Bake for 1 hour - 1 hour 20 minutes. Let cool for 15 to an hour. You can serve this right away or cut into thick slices and fry on the stove top for an extra crunchy-licious crust. ; name: steff s shepherd s pie ; ingredients: ground beef, cream of mushroom soup, green beans, onion, cheddar cheese, mashed potatoes ; preparation:Brown ground beef with onions and drain. Add green beans and soup. You may need to add a little milk if too thick. Pour into a greased 9-inch square casserole dish. Sprinkle with cheese. Spread potatoes on top. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes. ; name: dressed up burger patties ; ingredients: ground beef, dry breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, egg, onion, beef broth, fresh mushrooms, water, cornstarch ; preparation:Mix first 5 ingredients. Shape into patties. Cook and brown patties, add onion, broth and mushrooms. Cover and simmer 10 minutes. Heat onion to boiling. Remove patties. Mix water and cornstarch. Add to skillet and stir until thickened. ; name: all in one pot saucy pasta ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, water, pasta sauce, pasta, sliced mushrooms, cheese ; preparation:

name: saucy round steak for a crowd ; ingredients: round steaks, flour, onions, green pepper, celery, carrot, cream of mushroom soup, salt, pepper, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cut steaks to serving sizes. Roll steak in flour, salt and pepper mixture. Brown steak in a fry pan with small amount of oil. Layer a large baking pan with meat then vegetables. Repeat until meat and vegetables are gone. Cover with the cans of soup. Bake several hours or until meat falls apart. ; name: chilly day chicken soup stew ; ingredients: butter, potatoes, onion, carrots, chicken broth, pasta, instant rice, chicken meat, salt & pepper ; preparation:Boil fast in a little water add margarine, potatoes, onion, & carrots until 10 minutes from being done. Add chicken broth or buillion, pasta, & rice. Add chicken. Salt& pepper. Cook about 10 minutes. Until pasta and rice are done. ; name: steak and potato casserole ; ingredients: top round beef, garlic powder, pepper, meat tenderizer, potatoes, red onion, green pepper, fresh mushrooms, red wine and vinegar salad dressing ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degree season meat with seasonings. In large skillet over medium high heat, saute the meat until well browned on all sides. Next, place the potatoes, onions, green peppers and mushrooms over the meat. Top with salad dressing, and cover with foil. Bake at 350 degree for 1 hour, or until potatoes are done and meat is tender. ; name: me mas scouse ; ingredients: oil, onion, carrot, minced beef, potato, beef bouillon cube ; preparation:In a large saucepan heat oil over medium heat. Fry carrot & onion in heated oil until onion is soft & translucent. Add mince & stir gently until browned, taking care not to break mince up too much. Barely cover with water and add stock cubes. Add potatoes and more water if necessary to barely cover. Simmer for as long as possible, stirring regularly and adding more water if necessary. Serve with bread and butter. ; name: shoney s cabbage beef soup ; ingredients: tomatoes, ground beef, onion, beef broth, kidney beans, cabbage, tomato paste, salt and pepper ; preparation:Chop the tomatoes and reserve the juice. Brown the beef with the onions. Drain the fat. Add the beef broth, beans, tomatoes, and juice and tomatoe paste if desired. Add the cabbage, and simmer till tender. Add salt and pepper. ; name: orange beef and rice ; ingredients: oil, top round beef, onion, garlic cloves, sliced mushrooms, carrot, rice pilaf mix, orange juice, beef broth ; preparation:Briefly heat oil in large, deep pot over medium-high heat. Add beef and onion. Cook, stirring frequently, for 5 minutes. Add garlic, mushrooms and carrots. Cook another 5 minutes. Add pilaf mix, orange juice and beef broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 20 minutes or until liquid has been absorbed. ; name: student ragout ; ingredients: bacon, round steak, white onions, carrots, potatoes, garlic salt, salt and pepper ; preparation:In large, deep pot, fry bacon and leave in pot to cool. Add steak, garlic salt, salt and pepper. Layer onions, then carrots, then potatoes, adding salt and pepper to each layer. Add water up to top of potatoes. Turn burner on medium high. When meat begins to sizzle, cover pot, and turn heat to low. When potatoes are tender, stew is done. ; name: simmering steak ; ingredients: steak, onions, carrots, potatoes, green pepper, beef broth, gravy mix ; preparation:

name: onion rice ; ingredients: long-grain white rice, chicken broth, salt, butter, yellow onion, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a medium saucepan over medium-high heat, combine rice, broth, and salt. Bring to a boil. Decrease heat to low and cook, covered, until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat. Meanwhile, in a small skillet over medium heat, melt butter. Add in onion. Saute about 5 minutes, until tender. Stir sauteed onions into cooked rice. Add in parsley and fluff with a fork before serving. ; name: chickpea garbanzo bean and mint soup ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, onion, celery, chickpeas, mint, vegetable broth, tahini, black pepper ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan and fry the garlic, onion and celery for 4-5 minutes. Add the chickpeas to the pan and cook for a further 10 minutes. Now add the finely chopped mint, stirring well, and then pour over the vegetable broth and tahini. Bring to the boil, reduce heat to low and simmer for at least 30 minutes. Season to taste with salt and freshly ground black pepper. ; name: chicken and stars soup ; ingredients: chicken, carrots, onion, celery, garlic cloves, pasta, parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a stock pot, place chicken, carrots, garlic, onion and celery. Cover with water. Boil for thirty to forty minutes, remove chicken from pot. Allow chicken to cool remove skin and bones, then chop chicken into bite-size pieces. Add chicken back to soup, add parsley, pasta, salt and pepper. Allow to simmer until noodles are cooked. You may need to add water to keep soup soupy after pasta has cooked. Use your own judgment. ; name: day after the holiday turkey soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, carrots, celery, chicken stock, corn, turkey, salt, pepper, lemon ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. Reduce heat and add finely diced onions, carrots, and celery. Cook until soft and golden brown, about 5 to 6 minutes. Add corn, turkey, salt and pepper and the chicken stock then bring to a boil. Let the soup simmer uncovered for 10 to 15 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Before serving squeeze in the juice of a lemon. Leftover rice may be substituted for the corn. ; name: vegetarian corn bean and rice wraps ; ingredients: black beans, corn, cooked brown rice, diced onion, tomato sauce, stewed tomatoes, extra virgin olive oil, salt, pepper, garlic ; preparation:Cook brown rice as package directs. For extra flavor, add a tablespoon of vegetarian bouillon--it makes it really tasty. As brown rice is cooking, saut the onion in a tablespoon of extra virgin olive oil. Once onion is softened and browned a bit, add drained and rinsed beans and corn. Turn off heat. Once rice is done, add to the corn and beans. Mix well. Then mix in 1 to 2 cans of tomato sauce. Cook until hot. Serve in tortillas with salsa if desired. ; name: cheesy rice corn skillet ; ingredients: celery, onion, cooked rice, frozen whole kernel corn, nonfat dry milk powder, water, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, dried parsley flakes, lemon pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, saute celery and onion for 6 to 8 minutes or until just tender. Stir in rice and corn. In a small bowl, combine dry milk powder and water. Add milk mixture to the celery mixture. Mix well to combine. Stir cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, parsley flakes and lemon pepper into celery mixture. Lower heat and simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. ; name: spanish rice with bacon ; ingredients: bacon, cooking oil, onion, long grain rice, water, tomatoes, green pepper, jalapeno peppers, chili powder, salt ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook bacon over medium heat until crisp. Remove and drain on paper towel. Add oil to the drippings and saute onion for 3 minutes. Add rice and fry until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Stir in the remaining ingredients and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes or until rice is tender. Sprinkle with bacon and serve. ; name: country corn brown rice ; ingredients: bacon, brown rice, onion, celery, chicken broth, dried chervil, black pepper, corn, parsley ; preparation:

name: white chocolate chunk almond cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, almond extract, flour, baking soda, salt, white baking chocolate, slivered almonds ; preparation:With an electric mixer cream the butter & sugar in a large bowl. Add the eggs one at a time until well blended. Add the almond extract. In a separate bowl combine the flour, baking soda, & salt. Gradually beat flour mixture into the butter mixture until well blended. Stir in white chocolate chips & almonds. Drop cookies in heaping tablespoonfuls about 1-inch apart on ungreased cookie sheet & bake at 375 degrees for 10 minutes or until cookies are lightly browned. Let cookies cool on cookie sheet for 2 minutes then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely. These cookies freeze well. ; name: crunchy pound cake ; ingredients: butter, shortening, sugar, flour, eggs, vanilla, almond extract, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Grease and flour bundt pan. Combine butter and shortening in mixer bowl. Add eggs and blend well. Add other ingredients. Beat on medium speed for 10 minutes. Pour into pan. Bake 70 minutes or until golden brown. Cool in pan 10 minutes. ; name: peach puffed pancakes ; ingredients: eggs, milk, flour, sugar, vanilla, salt, cinnamon, butter, peaches, brown sugar ; preparation:Beat eggs. Add milk, flour, sugar, vanilla, salt and cinnamon, blend well. Mixture will be a little lumpy. Melt butter in 9x13 pan. Add peaches to pan and place in 400 degree oven until butter sizzles, dont burn it. Remove pan from oven and pour batter over peaches. Sprinkle with brown sugar. Bake at 400 for 25 minutes until puffed and brown. Can serve with maple syrup. ; name: sweet and salty cinnamon nuts ; ingredients: egg white, pecans, sugar, cinnamon, salt ; preparation:Heat oven to 300 degrees. Mix sugar, salt and cinnamon. Set aside. Place nuts in a bowl and pour the egg white over them. Stir until nuts are coated and sticky. Sprinkle cinnamon-sugar mixture over nuts and stir until nuts are completely coated. Spread on an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 30 minutes. ; name: peppered almonds ; ingredients: almonds, vegetable oil, sugar, ground black pepper, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Stir all ingredients in small baking pan to coat almonds. Arrange in single layer. Bake until coating is crisp and almonds are toasted, stirring occasionally, about 12 minutes. Cool. ; name: candied almonds ; ingredients: water, sugar, cinnamon, almonds ; preparation:Bring water, sugar and cinnamon to a boil. Stirring constantly. Add almonds and toss to coat. Remove almonds with slotted spoon. Arrange on greased baking pan. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes, basting twice with reserved syrup. Cool. Store airtight. ; name: instant rice pudding ; ingredients: white rice, milk, sugar, salt, vanilla extract, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Combine cooked rice, milk, sugar and salt in a medium saucepan. Bring to a boil, then lower the heat to a simmer and stir in the vanilla. Cook until just about all of the milk is absorbed, stirring occasionally. Stir in cinnamon and nutmeg. Serve warm or chilled. ; name: sugared cinnamon almonds ; ingredients: whole almonds, sugar, cinnamon, egg white, vanilla, salt ; preparation:

name: caramelized broccoli with garlic ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, broccoli, water, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh lemon juice, cashews ; preparation:In a large, deep skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Add the broccoli, cut side down, cover and cook over moderate heat until richly browned on the bottom, about 8 minutes. Add the water, cover and cook until the broccoli is just tender and the water has evaporated, about 7 minutes. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil along with the garlic and the crushed red pepper and cook uncovered until the garlic is golden brown, about 3 minutes. Season the broccoli with salt and black pepper, drizzle with the lemon juice, toasted cashews and serve. ; name: gambas al ajillo shrimp w garlic catalonia ; ingredients: olive oil, butter, shrimp, garlic cloves, fresh lemon juice, paprika, red pepper flakes, flat leaf parsley, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:In a wide, shallow saut pan over high heat, warm the olive oil and the butter. Add the shrimp and garlic and saut quickly for about 2-3 minutes. Add the lemon juice, paprika, pepper flakes, and salt and pepper to taste. Adjust seasonings to your liking. Transfer to a warmed serving dish, sprinkle with the parsley and serve at once. ; name: the pizza makers sauce ; ingredients: garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, olive oil, crushed tomatoes, dried oregano, salt ; preparation:In a big skillet. Cook the garlic and red pepper flakes in the oil over medium heat until the garlic is golden, about 1 minute. Add in tomatoes, oregano, and salt to taste. Bring to a simmer. Cook, stirring occasionally, until thickened, about 10-15 minutes. Let the sauce cool before spreading it on the pizza dough. Keeps well in refrigerator for up to 5 days. In the freezer for 1 month. ; name: venezuelan scrambled eggs perico venezolano ; ingredients: oil, onion, bell pepper, garlic cloves, tomatoes, eggs, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil in a skillet over medium-high flame. Add the onion, bell pepper and garlic and saute for 3 to 4 minutes, or until the onion is softened and translucent. Add the tomatoes and cook for another 3 to 4 minutes to reduce the liquid somewhat. Reduce heat to low, add the eggs, salt and pepper and cook, gently stirring the eggs occasionally to scramble them and just long enough to cook them through while keeping them soft. Serve with bread or arepas and a slice of fresh cheese. ; name: garlic piperade soup ; ingredients: garlic cloves, onions, sweet pepper, olive oil, tomatoes, beef stock, bread, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Blanch the garlic in boiling water for thirty seconds. Run under cold water and drain. Peel and slice the cloves of garlic. Cook the onions and peppers in the oil for ten minutes until the onions are golden and the peppers are soft. Add the garlic and tomatoes. Cover the pan and cook over low heat for thirty minutes. Pour in the broth and bring to a boil. Tear the bread into large pieces and add to the boiling soup where it will disintegrate and thicken the broth. Adjust the amount of bread and broth to the desired thickness of the soup and salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot with grated cheese if you wish. ; name: sweet and spicy red pepper spread ; ingredients: red peppers, walnuts, garlic cloves, salt, hot pepper flakes, pomegranate molasses, olive oil, plain breadcrumbs ; preparation:Roast the red peppers over an open fire or in the oven until the peels are charred. Place them in a paper bag for ten minutes when they are done and the skins will come off very easily. Peel you peppers and rinse off any bits of charred skin. Using a sharp knife remove the seeds of the peppers and finely mince them. In a large bowl combine peppers and walnuts. Mash together with a potato masher until it is somewhat uniform and pasty. Add all other ingredients and mix well until a uniform spread is formed. Add more oil if necessary. Let sit for at least an hour. Serve with pita bread, toast, or crackers. ; name: speckled sweet potato mash ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, red bell pepper, green chili pepper, garlic cloves, olive oil, fat free cream cheese, nonfat milk, coriander leaves, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Roast the red pepper in a hot oven for approximately 30-minutes until skin is blackened. Cool for a few minutes, peel and chop flesh into small dice. Meanwhile, chop the sweet potatoes into large chunks and boil with the garlic cloves for approximately 15-20 minutes until tender. Heat olive oil in a small pan and fry chili for 3-4 minutes over a low heat. Stir in chopped red pepper. Drain sweet potato and garlic and mash with 2 tbsp cream cheese and milk, adding more if needed. Stir red pepper, chili and coriander into mash. Add salt and black pepper to taste. ; name: garlic spinach bell peppers ; ingredients: spinach, olive oil, garlic cloves, hot pepper flakes, sweet red pepper, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: kittencal s parmesan egg noodles ; ingredients: wide egg noodles, butter, garlic, crushed red pepper flakes, parmesan cheese, green onions, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Cook the egg noodles in a large pot of boiling salted water until tender. Drain and set aside. Heat the butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add in garlic and chili flakes. Cook stirring for 2 minutes or until the garlic is softened. Add in the cooked noodles and toss to heat through. Mix in the parmesan cheese and green onion, then season with salt and fresh ground black pepper. Serve with more parmesan cheese. ; name: parmesan garlic potatoes ; ingredients: butter, garlic powder, parmesan cheese, red potatoes, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Set oven to 375f. Grease a 13 x 9-inch baking dish. Pour the melted butter into the bottom of the baking dish, then sprinkle with garlic powder, then parmesan cheese. In a large bowl toss the potato halves in olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Place the potatoes cut-side down over the parmesan cheese in the baking dish. Bake for about 40-45 minutes, or until tender. ; name: pasta macaroni salad ; ingredients: dry pasta, mayonnaise, buttermilk, fresh dill, garlic powder, salt, black pepper, cucumber, sweet red pepper, scallion ; preparation:Cook pasta to package. Drain and rinse with cold water. Set pasta to the side make sure all water is removed. In a big bowl combine mayo, buttermilk, dill, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Stir to combine. Stir in pasta, celery, cucumber, scallions and sweet pepper. Cover and chill for 2 - 24hours. If a little dry just before serving add small amount of buttermilk. ; name: spaghettini verdi ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, garlic cloves, italian parsley, spaghettini, ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, salt ; preparation:Heat butter and oil in a saucepan. Saute crushed garlic until golden. Discard garlic. Stir in the parsley and simmer 4 minutes. Cook the pasta according to package directions. Drain well. Place in a large bowl. Add pepper, parmesan cheese, and salt, and toss well. Add the parsley sauce and toss again. Serve immediately. ; name: to die for fettuccine alfredo ; ingredients: fettuccine pasta, butter, heavy cream, salt and pepper, garlic powder, romano cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Bring a large pot of slightly salted water to a boil. Add fettuccine and cook for 8 to 10 minutes until al dente. Drain. Meanwhile, in a large saucepan, melt butter into cream over low heat. Add salt, pepper and garlic powder. Stir in cheeses over medium heat until melted. This will thicken the sauce. Add pasta to sauce. Use enough of the pasta so that all of the sauce is used and the pasta is thoroughly coated. Serve immediately. ; name: barb s zucchini pancakes ; ingredients: zucchini, onion, bisquick, parmesan cheese, eggs, garlic powder, salt and pepper, canola oil ; preparation:Grate zucchini. Chop onion, add to zucchini. Add beaten eggs, bisquick, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Mix well. Fry as pancakes on hot greased griddle or skillet. Serve as a side dish. ; name: shrimp pesto pizza ; ingredients: pizza dough, cooked shrimp, oregano, salt, pepper, pesto sauce, garlic and herb goat cheese, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Cook pizza dough according to directions. Toss shrimp with oregano, salt, and pepper. When the pizza crust directions call for it, spread the pesto onto the crust. Top with crumbled goat cheese. Top with shrimp. Sprinkle with red pepper flakes. Cook for 10-12 more minutes. ; name: ziti alfredo ; ingredients: ziti pasta, butter, cream cheese, garlic powder, milk, parmesan cheese, ground black pepper, parsley flakes ; preparation:

name: soya tomato cheese casserole ; ingredients: soybeans, cream-style corn, tomatoes, sugar, seasoning salt, soft breadcrumbs, cheese, paprika ; preparation:Lighty grease a shallow casserole dish. Arrange beans in alternate layers with corn. Mix tomatoes, sugar, and salt. And pour over bean mix. Top with buttered crumbs, mixed with cheese, and sprinkle with paprika. Bake uncovered 180c for about 40-45 minutes. ; name: breakfast nachos ; ingredients: tortilla chips, refried beans, eggs, salsa, monterey jack pepper cheese, scallions ; preparation:Cover the bottom of a large oven-safe platter with tortilla chips. Microwave refried beans for 1 minute, then spread over the tortilla chips. Crumble scrambled eggs evenly over beans. Evenly pour warmed salsa over eggs. Top with grated cheese. Broil entire platter in oven until cheese is melted. Serve immediately, garnishing with scallions. ; name: cheesy corn bites ; ingredients: cream cheese, monterey jack pepper cheese, egg, frozen corn kernels, tortilla chips, chives ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, mix the cream cheese, pepper jack cheese, egg & corn. Arrange the chips on a large baking sheet and place 1 tsp corn mixture in each. Bake until the filling sets, approx 20 minute. Sprinkle the corn bites with garnish, serve warm. ; name: crispy cheese topped potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, cheddar cheese, salt, corn flakes, paprika ; preparation:Mix potato slices with butter. Place slightly overlapping in foil-lined baking sheet. Sprinkle lightly with salt. Bake 375 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove from oven, sprinkle with cheese. Top with cornflake crumbs and sprinkle lightly with paprika. Return to oven and bake 25-30 minutes or until potaotes are tender. ; name: spinach and corn tortilla bake ; ingredients: fresh cilantro leaves, scallions, salt and pepper, baby spinach, corn tortillas, kidney beans, salsa, monterey jack pepper cheese, butter ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 425f. In a food processor, combine cilantro, scallions, salt and pepper with as much spinach as will fit. Pulse, adding the rest of the spinach in batches, until all is coarsely chopped. Coat an 8-9 inch square baking dish with butter or oil. Lay 4 tortillas in the bottom of dish, overlapping slightly. Layer with half of beans, salsa, spinach mixture and cheese. Repeat with remaining ingredients, ending with cheese and pressing in gently. Cover dish with foil, place on a rimmed baking sheet. Bake until bubbling, 25-30 minutes. Remove foil, and continue baking until golden, 15-20 minutes more. Cool for 10 minutes before serving. ; name: poat dot cambodian grilled corn ; ingredients: corn, vegetable oil, fish sauce, water, sugar, salt, green onions ; preparation:Prepare charcoal grill or preheat an ungreased cast-iron skillet over medium heat. Very lightly brush the corn with oil and set on the grill rack or in the skillet. Cook, turning every 2-3 minutes, until the kernels are tender and nicely charred, 12-15 minutes total. Keep warm. Meanwhile, in a bowl stir together the fish sauce, water, sugar and salt until it is dissolved. Heat the 2 tbsp oil in a saucepan over medium heat until very hot but not smoking. Carefully pour liquid mixture in. Add the green onions and simmer until the sauce begins to thicken, about 30 seconds. Remove from heat and cool. Brush cooked corn with the sauce and serve. ; name: cheesy macho nachos ; ingredients: green onions, tomatoes, jalapenos, tortilla chips, refried beans, monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese, sour cream, chili with beans ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Lay chips on oven safe platter. You will be layering this so split them. Warm beans and chili on stove or in microwave. Stir beans until smooth. Spread beans over tortillas. Top with onion, cheese, jalepenos, chili and cheddar cheese. Repeat by layering tortilla chips and toppings until gone. Place in oven and bake until cheese is melted. Dollop with sour cream. Add tomatoes and green onions on top. ; name: roasted corn soup ; ingredients: corn on the cob, water, chipotle chiles, salt, feta cheese ; preparation:

name: sam s loaded nachos ; ingredients: hamburger, garlic, dried chili pepper flakes, nacho chips, refried beans, black olives, chunky salsa, cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Fry hamburger with garlic and chili peppers. Drain. Meanwhile spread nacho chips around on a large cookie sheet. Top with refried beans. Sprinkle olives on top. Add salsa. Sprinkle as much or as little cheese as you want. Place in oven and heat for 15 mins. ; name: southwestern tortilla wedges ; ingredients: salsa, sour cream, red bell pepper, cooked chicken, flour tortillas, guacamole, refried beans, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Mix salsa and sour cream. Reserve half of the salsa mixture. Mix half of the salsa mixture, half of the bell pepper and the chicken. Place 2 tortillas on ungreased cookie sheet and spread with chicken mixture. Top each with another tortilla and then top with guacamole. Top each with another tortilla and spread with refried beans. Top each stack with remaining salsa mixture, another tortilla, bell pepper and then cheese. Bake about 15 minutes or until cheese is melted and filling is hot. Cut each stack into 8 wedges. ; name: 4 cheese mexican tortilla appetizers ; ingredients: flour tortillas, refried beans, taco sauce, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, green onion, crushed red pepper flakes, four-cheese mexican blend cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 f. Place tortillas on baking sheet. Bake for 3 to 4 minutes or until crisp. Spread refried beans evenly on tortillas. Spread 1 tablespoon taco sauce over beans. Top with bell peppers, green onions and crushed red pepper. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 7 to 8 minutes or until cheese is melted. Cut into wedges. A pizza cutter works great for this. ; name: green tabasco breakfast burritos ; ingredients: flour tortillas, tomatoes, tabasco jalapeno sauce, eggs, salt and pepper, green onion, ham, unsalted butter, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:Wrap the tortillas in foil and place them in a 300f oven for 10 minutes. Combine the tomato and 1 tablespoon of the tabasco green sauce in a small bowl and set aside. In another bowl, beat the eggs with salt and pepper, and then stir in the green onion and ham. Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add the butter and heat until melted, tilting the pan to cover the bottom and sides. Quickly add the egg mixture and cook until the eggs begin to set. Push the cooked portions to the side, allowing the uncooked egg to run to the bottom of the pan. When the eggs are cooked but still soft, sprinkle the remaining 1 tablespoon tabasco sauce evenly over the surface and top with cheese. Remove from the heat and divide among the tortillas. Roll up the tortillas and serve immediately. ; name: barbecue chicken quesadillas ; ingredients: red onion, bell pepper, butter, cooked chicken, barbecue sauce, monterey jack cheese, cilantro, flour tortillas ; preparation:Saute onions and bell peppers in pan with butter. Remove from pan and set aside. In another pan heat through shredded chicken with bbq sauce. Lightly butter one side of a tortilla. Place butter side down in saute pan. Quickly add some of the cheese, chicken and onions to one half of tortilla. Then quickly fold in half forming a semi-circle. Continue to cook until bottom side is golden brown, then carefully flip quesadilla over. Brown other side and remove from pan. Repeat with remaining ingredients. Cut quesadilla into wedges and serve with additional barbecue sauce. ; name: vegan mexican tortilla pizzas ; ingredients: flour tortillas, refried beans, taco sauce, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, green onions, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Place tortillas on baking sheet. Bake for 3-4 minutes until crisp. Spread beans evenly over tortillas. Spread taco sauce evenly over beans. Top with ingredients of your choosing. Bake for 7-8 minutes. Top with any additional ingredients. Cut into wedges and serve. ; name: 5 minute southwest layered salad k ; ingredients: romaine lettuce, black beans, frozen corn, salsa, monterey jack and cheddar cheese blend, ranch dressing, tortilla chips ; preparation:Arrange lettuce in bottom of glass serving bowl or on serving plate. Layer beans, corn, salsa and cheese evenly over top. Drizzle with dressing. Sprinkle with chips. You can change the cheese and beans to your favorites. ; name: macho nachos courtesy of paula deen ; ingredients: refried beans, white corn tortilla chips, onion, monterey jack pepper cheese, jalapeno, chili, cheddar cheese, sour cream, green onion, tomatoes ; preparation:

name: capellini al gamberetti angel hair pasta with shrimp ; ingredients: capellini, olive oil, large shrimp, garlic cloves, mushroom, diced tomato, artichoke, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain. Meanwhile, heat a large skillet or saute pan over medium high heat and add the olive oil, shrimp and garlic. Cook, stirring frequently until the shrimp just turns opaque, about 2 minutes. Add the mushrooms, tomatoes, and artichokes and keep cooking until the mushrooms are softened, about 3 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Toss with pasta and garnish with fresh parsley. ; name: mediterranean vegetables in a creamy white wine sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, white onion, garlic clove, zucchini, mushrooms, dry white wine, chicken stock cube, heavy cream ; preparation:In a skillet over medium heat, warm up the olive oil. Add the green and red bell peppers, onion and garlic and cook, stirring, for 4 minutes. Add the zucchini and mushrooms and cook, still stirring, for a further 4 minutes. Add the dry white wine and simmer uncovered for 4 minutes. By the end of the 4 minutes, the wine should have reduced a little. Crumble in the chicken stock cube, stir it in and simmer for 2 minutes. Add the cream. Turn up the heat a little and simmer for 5 minutes, until the sauce has reduced and thickened. Serve over pasta, rice, baked potatoes, chicken or as a side dish. ; name: simple roast veggies ; ingredients: potatoes, red pepper, yellow pepper, mushrooms, onion, zucchini, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, minced garlic cloves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Chop up potatoes. Put in microwave for 2 minutes while chopping rest of veggies. Place all veggies in bowl. Add oil, vinegar and garlic, and toss to coat. Spread out in roasting pan and cook for about an hour. ; name: kathleen s burgundy pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, salt, ground black pepper, garlic powder, onion, celery, red wine, brown gravy mix ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Place pork in a 9x13 inch baking dish and sprinkle meat with salt, pepper and garlic powder. Top with onion and celery and pour wine over all. Bake in preheated oven for 45 minutes. When done baking, remove meat from baking dish and place on a serving platter. Pour gravy mix into baking dish with wine and cooking juices and stir until thickened. Slice meat and cover with the gravy. ; name: red rice sausage ; ingredients: vegetable oil, hot smoked sausage, onion, green pepper, celery, water, tomato sauce, salt, black pepper, parboiled rice ; preparation:Heat the oil in a heavy pan over medium heat. Add the sausage pieces and cook until brown, about 5 minutes. Add the onions, green peppers, and celery. Cook for 3 minutes. Add the water, tomato sauce, salt and pepper. Heat to boiling. Stir in the rice. Reduce heat to simmer. Cook covered, until rice is tender, about 30 minutes. Remove from heat and keep covered until time to serve. ; name: rotkrautsalat red cabbage salad ; ingredients: bacon, vegetable oil, sugar, salt, vinegar, pepper, red wine, caraway seed, red cabbage ; preparation:Fry bacon in medium-size fry pan until crisp. Remove and reserve bacon. Add sugar, vinegar, and wine to bacon fat. Stir and cook until sugar is dissolved. Pour this hot mixture over the cabbage. Toss with vegetable oil, salt, pepper, and caraway seeds. Sprinkle crumbled bacon over mixture. Serve at room temperature. ; name: onion mushroom and spinach saute for two ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, mushrooms, garlic clove, spinach leaves, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat a medium saute pan on medium heat. Add olive oil. Add onions and mushrooms, stirring for 5-10 minutes, until golden brown, adding garlic halfway through. Add spinach and stir a minute or two, until spinach is just wilted. Remove from heat and add balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper to taste. ; name: german schweinepfeffer peppered pork ; ingredients: vegetable oil, pork loin, mushroom, onion, cracked black pepper, salt, red wine, parsley ; preparation:

name: l m prawns ; ingredients: oil, hot chili peppers, lemon, juice of, garlic clove, parsley, salt, prawns ; preparation:Mix all ingredients except prawns. Pour half of mixture into another bowl to reserve for use as a sauce. Marinate prawns with rest of mixture for at least a few hours or longer. Remove prawns and set aside. Pour the used marinade into a pan and quickly bring to a boil on the stove. Thread the prawns on skewers. Cook over hot grill, turning once and basting with the cooked marinade until pink and done,. Serve immediately with the reserved sauce for dipping. ; name: lentils with onion and garlic ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, dried red chili, green lentil, water ; preparation:Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top. ; name: moroccan spiced parsnips ; ingredients: ground cumin, ground coriander, ground ginger, ground cinnamon, black pepper, ground cloves, parsnips, olive oil, nut oil, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Toss all spices together and store in an airtight container. Peel parsnips, cut into 3-inch pieces and place in a baking dish. Heat olive oil and nut oil in a small pan. Add 2 tbsp of the spice mix and stir into oil, heating for a minute. Scrape mixture over parsnips, add salt and toss to coat. Cover dish and bake for 25 to 30 minutes, until parsnips are tender. ; name: asian beef skewers ; ingredients: garlic cloves, fresh ginger, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, sirloin tip steak, green onions ; preparation:In a large bowl, mix garlic, ginger, soy sauce, vinegar, oil and sugar. Remove the fat from the steak and cut the meat in dices of 1 inch. Add beef to the marinade and let rest for 10 minutes. On metal skewers or presoaked bamboo skewers, thread beef cubes by alternating with green onion. Set the barbecue to medium high. Brush the beef skewers with the marinade and put on a oiled grill of the barbecue. Close cover and cook about 10 minutes or until beef is grilled but still pink inside. ; name: mediterranean spiced rice with apricots ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic clove, cumin, powdered ginger, cinnamon, chicken stock, water, long grain white rice, dried apricot, green onion ; preparation:In a saucepan, over medium heat, warm the olive oil, add the garlic and cook for 30 seconds. Stir in the chicken stock and water. Bring to a boil. Add the rice. Reduce heat, cover and cook for 15 minutes or until rice is almost tender. Stir in seasonings, apricots and green onion. Cook an additional 5 minutes to blend flavors. ; name: sindhi hara murgh chicken in green curry homemade sindhi style ; ingredients: chicken, cooking oil, coriander powder, turmeric powder, salt, tomatoes, coriander leaves, ginger, garlic cloves, green chilies ; preparation:Heat the oil in a pan. Fry the paste for 5 minutes, stirring continuously. Add the powdered spices, salt and tomatoes. Fry till the oil bubbles to the top. Add the chicken and cook on low heat till the chicken is tender, usually takes about 20-30 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: oriental cabbage ; ingredients: onion, water, garlic clove, fresh ginger, sesame oil, cabbage, soy sauce ; preparation:Slice onion. Place in bowl with water. Cover and microwave on high for 3 minutes. Put onion in large skillet with remaining ingredients. Cook, covered, over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, until cabbage is tender, about 20 minutes. ; name: okra with green chilli ; ingredients: okra, onion, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, green chilies, ground cumin, ground coriander, water, oil, lemon, juice of ; preparation:

name: mile high peanut butter pie ; ingredients: graham cracker pie crust, cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, peanut butter, cool whip ; preparation:Beat cream cheese until softened, add in sweetened condensed milk. Beat until smooth. Add in the peanut butter, beat until thoroughly blended. Gently fold in the cool whip. Pour pie filling into your graham cracker crust. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours. May top with additional cool whip and chocolate shavings or chopped peanuts. ; name: creamy lemon cheesecake pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, sour cream, fresh lemon juice, lemon zest, eggs, graham cracker pie crust ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 325 degrees. Beat cream cheese in bowl with electric mixer on medium, until creamy. Add sugar and beat until well blended. Add sour cream, lemon juice and lemon peel. Mix well. Add eggs, 1 at a time, mixing on low speed after each addition just until blended. Pour batter into pie shell. Bake at 325 degrees for 35- 40 minutes or until center is almost set. Cool completely on wire rack. Refrigerate 4 hours or overnight. ; name: poppy seed lemon pie ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, lemonade concentrate, frozen whipped topping, graham cracker crust, poppy seed, yellow food coloring ; preparation:In a mixing bowl, beat mild and lemonade concentrate until smooth. Fold in 2 cups whipped topping. Spread half into the crust. Add poppy seeds and food coloring to the remaining lemon mixture. Stir until blended. Spoon over first layer. Spread with the remaining whipped toping. Refrigerate until ready to serve. ; name: sur la table margarita pie alcohol free ; ingredients: graham cracker crust, sweetened condensed milk, margarita mix, egg yolks ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 350 degrees f. Mix well together condensed milk, margarita mixer, and egg yolks. Pour mixture into unbaked graham cracker crust. Bake at 350 degrees f for 15 minutes. Allow pie to cool for 15 minutes before chilling in refrigerator. Chill for 4 hours before serving with a dollop of cool whip. ; name: season s strawberry lemon cheesecake ; ingredients: graham cracker crust, cream cheese, strawberry jam, powdered sugar, lemon pie filling, strawberry, cool whip ; preparation:Whip the softened cream cheese together with the powdered sugar and the strawberry jam till smooth. Spoon this into the graham cracker crust. Place one layer of the sliced strawberries on top of the cheesecake mixture and pour on the lemon pie filling, spreading till even. Place in fridge to set and cool at least 1 hour. Garnish with cool whip and fanned strawberries at serving time. ; name: lemon berry pie ; ingredients: raspberries, frozen lemonade, cool whip topping, sweetened condensed milk, yellow food coloring, graham cracker pie crusts ; preparation:Set aside 1 cup berries for garnish. In a large bowl and using a rubber spatula, carefully mix lemonade concentrate and whipped topping. Fold in condensed milk, food coloring and remaining berries. Refrigerate covered up to six hours. Fold mixture into crust. Place reserved berries in a decorative manner on top of filling. Refrigerate until ready to serve. ; name: emerils key lime pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, granulated sugar, butter, condensed milk, key lime juice, eggs, sour cream, powdered sugar, lime zest ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375 degrees f. In a bowl, mix the graham cracker crumbs, sugar, and butter with your hands. Press the mixture firmly into a 9-inch pie pan, and bake until brown, about 20 minutes. Remove from the oven and allow to cool to room temperature before filling. Lower the oven temperature to 325 degrees f. In a separate bowl, combine the condensed milk, lime juice, and eggs. Whisk until well blended and place the filling in the cooled pie shell. Bake in the oven for 15 minutes and allow to chill in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours. Once chilled, combine the sour cream and powdered sugar and spread over the top of the pie using a spatula. Sprinkle the lime zest as a garnish on top of the sour cream and serve chilled. ; name: key lime pie ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, egg yolks, key lime juice, graham cracker pie crust, whipped cream, lime ; preparation:

name: oaty currant bread ; ingredients: plain flour, baking powder, salt, rolled oats, brown sugar, molasses, natural yoghurt, currants, milk ; preparation:Place all the dry ingredients in a mixing bowl. Using a fork, stir till combined. Mix together molasses, yoghurt, currants and milk and add to dry ingredients. Beat till a smooth, thick batter forms. Grease loaf tin, 20 x 13 cms. Pour batter into tin, leave to stand 10 minutes. This allow oats to swell and absorb liquid. Bake at 180 c for 55 - 60 minutes. Serve sliced and buttered. ; name: ultimate oatmeal raisin cookies ; ingredients: brown sugar, butter, baking soda, ground cinnamon, pure vanilla extract, salt, eggs, oats, flour, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix together brown sugar and butter until smooth. Stir in baking soda, cinnamon, vanilla, and salt. Add eggs and stir until blended. Stir in oats, flour and raisins. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet, about 2-inches apart. Bake 9-11 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from cookie sheet at once and cool on wire rack. ; name: king and prince oatmeal raisin muffins ; ingredients: rolled oats, buttermilk, eggs, brown sugar, butter, flour, baking powder, salt, baking soda, raisins ; preparation:Fill muffin tins with paper baking cups. Combine oats and buttermilk in a bowl, let stand for 1 hour. Add eggs, sugar and butter, mix 30 seconds, scrape down bowl. Combine dry ingredients, add. Add raisins. Mix on low speed for about 15 seconds or only until dry ingredients are moistened. Fill muffin cups half full. Bake at 400 degrees for 15-20 minutes. ; name: calas fried rice balls ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, vanilla, rice, eggs, nutmeg, cooking oil, powdered sugar ; preparation:Mix together the flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and vanilla. Thoroughly mix the rice and eggs together in a separate bowl. Add the dry ingredients to the rice and egg mixture. When thoroughly mixed, drop by spoonfuls into the hot deep fat and fry until brown. Drain on paper towel. Sprinkle with powdered sugar and serve while hot. Other variations are to serve with honey. ; name: butterscotch cake with marshmallows ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, shortening, brown sugar, water, vanilla, eggs, milk, marshmallows ; preparation:Sift the flour. Measure and sift again with the baking powder and salt. Mix the shortening, sugar, and water and cook over low heat until the sugar is dissolved. Cool and add vanilla. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Alternately add dry ingredients with the milk. Beat until smooth, being careful not to overheat. Pour into 9 inch cake pan lined with paper. Place marshmallows at intervals on top of the batter. Bake at 350 for 50 minutes. ; name: mrs clinton s chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: flour, salt, baking soda, vegetable shortening, light-brown sugar, granulated sugar, vanilla, eggs, old fashioned oats, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Grease baking sheets. Combine flour, salt and baking soda. Beat together shortening, sugars and vanilla in large bowl with electric mixer until creamy. Add eggs, beating until light and fluffy. On low speed, gradually beat in flour mixture and rolled oats. Stir in chococlate chips. Drop batter by well-rounded measuring teaspoonfuls onto greased baking sheet. Bake at 350f oven for 8-10 minutes or until golden. ; name: apple squares ; ingredients: rolled oats, flour, shortening, baking soda, brown sugar, sliced apples, butter, cinnamon, white sugar ; preparation:Mix rolled oats, flour, shortening, soda and brown sugar together and put half of mixture in bottom of baking pan. Mix together sliced apples, butter, cinnamon and white sugar. Spread over first layer of rolled oats. Cover with remaining rolled oat mixture. Bake in 350 degree oven 35- 40 minutes til done. ; name: rosas rhubarb cake ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, eggs, vegetable oil, white sugar, rhubarb, brown sugar, quick-cooking oats, cinnamon ; preparation:

name: delicious soft chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, granulated sugar, egg, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, cornstarch, baking soda, chocolate ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cream together butter and sugars until creamy. Add egg and vanilla. Blend well. In another bowl combine flour, cornstarch and baking soda. Add to butter mixture and then add chocolate chunks. Drop by tablespoons onto a greased baking sheet and bake for 8-10 minutes, until golden brown around the edges. ; name: featherweight breakfast cake ; ingredients: butter, egg, milk, all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 8x8 square pan. Melt butter and cool slightly and add milk and beaten egg, set to the side. In bowl, sift the next four ingredients, 2 times. Add butter, milk, and egg mixture and stir only enough to smooth out any lumps. Combine the remaining sugar and cinnamon for the topping, in a small bowl or in a ziploc bag. Pour batter into greased pan and sprinkle the mixture of sugar and cinnamon over the top and bake 12 to 15 minutes. ; name: cinnamon thins ; ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, egg, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add egg and beat well. Combine flour with baking powder and salt. Add to creamed mixture and mix well. Drop onto greased cookie sheet in marble-sized balls. Press flat with bottom of greased glass dipped in the sugar-cinnamon mixture. Bake in 350f oven 10 minutes. Remove from cookie sheet and cool. ; name: basic pound cake ; ingredients: sugar, margarine, vanilla, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, evaporated milk ; preparation:Beat sugar, butter, vanilla and eggs in large bowl, low speed for 30 seconds, scraping sides of bowl, then at high speed for 5 minutes, scrape occasionally. In separate bowl, mix flour, baking powder and salt. Beat flour mixture into sugar mixture alternately with milk on low speed. Spread into pan. Bake in 2 loaf pans for approx 55 minutes at 350 degrees. ; name: chocolate chip crispers ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, egg, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, rice krispies, chocolate chips ; preparation:In large bowl beat together butter and sugar. Beat in egg and vanilla. Sift together flour, soda and salt. Mix into wet ingredients. Stir in crispies, and chocolate chips. Drop by tablespoon full onto greased cookie sheet 1 inch apart. Bake at 350 for 10-12 minutes or until lightly browned. ; name: birthday cookie ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, sugar, egg, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips ; preparation:Cream butter and sugars. Add egg and vanilla. Mix on low speed, add dry ingredients. Mix well. Stir in chocolate chips or m&ms. Spray a 12 inch round pizza pan with pam and spread cookie dough evenly to the edges. Bake at 325 degrees f for 15 to 20 minutes, or until light golden brown. When cool, decorate as desired. ; name: cinnamon chip applesauce cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, applesauce, all-purpose flour, baking soda, cinnamon baking chips, powdered sugar, water ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl on until well blended. Beat in eggs, vanilla, and applesauce. Combine flour, baking soda and salt and add to butter mixture, beating until well blended stir in cinnamon chips. Pour into two loaf pans. Bake for 60 minutes or until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean cool completely in pan. Drizzle with glaze or wait until the cake is sliced and then drizzle with glaze to maximize the glazed area. ; name: eggnog cookies ; ingredients: white sugar, butter, eggnog, vanilla extract, egg yolks, ground nutmeg, all-purpose flour, baking powder, ground cinnamon ; preparation:

name: old school mac n cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, butter, eggs, sharp cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, italian cheese blend, american cheese, milk ; preparation:Boil pasta till half cooked. Drain and pou into lasagna glass casserole dish. Whisk eggs and stir into pasta, also mix in butter. Add in all cheeses and pour in milk stir around good. Cook for 1 hour in 350 degree oven until it looks like it getting crispy on top. ; name: macaroni cheese deluxe ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, small curd cottage cheese, sour cream, egg, salt, pepper, sharp cheddar cheese, paprika ; preparation:Cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain well. Combine cottage cheese, sour cream, egg, salt, and pepper. Add shredded cheese, mixing well. Stir in the cooked macaroni. Pour into a greased 9 x 9 x 2 inch baking dish. Sprinkle with paprika. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes. ; name: cheesiest macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: macaroni, milk, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, flour, butter, onion, salt and pepper ; preparation:This step will take approximately 20 minutes, so preheat oven to 350 while working on this step. Put macaroni to boil. In a medium pot heat butter and saut onions. Add milk, flour, salt and pepper. Bring to a rolling boil. Slowly add cheddar cheese, stirring while adding. After cheddar has dissolved, add the mozzarella, stirring while adding. Drain macaroni. Add macaroni directly to the cheese mixture in the pot. Pour mac and cheese mixture into large lasagna pan. Put in oven and bake for 30 minutes or until top is bubbly and golden brown. ; name: yummy low fat mac and cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, low fat cottage cheese, butter, garlic, low-fat cheddar cheese, spinach, sriracha sauce, salt, pepper, boiling water ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except water in oven proof 2 quart casserole dish. Mix well. Pour boiling water over mixed ingredients. Bake at 350f for an hour. Allow to sit for 10 minutes before serving. ; name: buttermilk mac n cheese ; ingredients: eggs, cheddar cheese, buttermilk, butter, salt, elbow macaroni ; preparation:In a large bowl, beat the eggs. Stir in the cheese, buttermilk, butter and salt. Add the cooked macaroni and mix well. Pour into a greased 13 inches x 9 inch x 2 inch baking dish. Bake uncovered, at 350 degrees, for 45-50 minutes or until a thermoneter reads 160 degrees. ; name: alton brown s stove top mac n cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, butter, eggs, evaporated milk, hot sauce, kosher salt, fresh black pepper, dry mustard, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large pot of boiling, salted water cook the pasta to al dente and drain. Return to the pot and melt in the butter. Toss to coat. Whisk together the eggs, milk, hot sauce, salt, pepper, and mustard. Stir into the pasta and add the cheese. Over low heat continue to stir for 3 minutes or until creamy. ; name: comforting baked macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: cooked macaroni, butter, eggs, salt, pepper, milk, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook the macaroni until done as usual. Do not overcook it. Drain macaroni in strainer. Place macaroni, butter, salt, pepper, milk, mozarella cheese, and 3 cups of cheddar cheese in casserole dish. Mix eggs in a bowl first and then stir into mixture. Cover everything with aluminum foil and cook for 45 minutes at 350 degrees. Uncover and add extra cup of cheddar cheese across the top. Bake uncovered for another 15 minutes. ; name: home made macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, butter, evaporated milk, milk, sharp cheddar cheese, monterey jack cheese, velveeta cheese, ground cayenne pepper, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: baked chicken with onions garlic rosemary ; ingredients: chicken parts, salt, pepper, onions, garlic, olive oil, fresh rosemary ; preparation:Position oven rack in center of oven. Preheat to 400f degrees. Rinse chicken parts& pat dry. Season liberally with salt& pepper. In a large bowl, toss together onion rings, garlic, oil& rosemary. Spread half of the onion mixture in a shallow baking dish or roasting pan just large enough to hold the chicken pieces in a single layer. Arrange the chicken pieces on top of onion mixture, and cover with remaining onion mixture. Drizzle with an additional 2 tbsp olive oil. Bake until chicken is done, approximately 45-55 minutes. ; name: forty clove garlic chicken ; ingredients: chicken, salt, cooking oil, garlic, dry white wine, lemon, ground red pepper ; preparation:Sprinkle the chicken lightly with salt. Cook the chicken on all sides in hot oil until browned. Arrange the chicken in a baking dish. Add unpeeled garlic cloves and wine to the chicken. Squeeze lemon quarters over the chicken. Adding the squeezed quarters to the dish. Lightly sprinkle ground red pepper over the chicken. Cover and bake in a 325 degree oven for about 1 hour or until chicken is tender. Transfer chicken and garlic to a serving platter, discarding lemon. Spoon cooking liquid over chicken and garlic. To eat garlic, squeeze the unpeeled clove between your thumb and finger until the clove pops out of its peel and into your mouth. ; name: red star basic chicken taco filling ; ingredients: oil, cooked chicken, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes with juice, green chilies, cumin seed, salt, black pepper, water ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Sautee chicken, onion and garlic until onion softens and chicken begins to brown crisp on edges, about 8-12 minutes. Salt and pepper to taste. Reduce heat to medium. Stir in tomatoes, chiles and cumin. If needed add enough water just to make the mixture a little soupy. Continue to cook, stirring occassionally, until liquid is reduced. Mixture should be moist, not wet or dry. Use immediately or freeze for later. ; name: baked chicken with garlic and rosemary ; ingredients: chicken portions, olive oil, lemon, juice of, chicken stock powder, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary ; preparation:Wipe chicken with damp cloth and place in casserole dish. Mix oil, lemon juice, stock powder and seasoning together and drizzle over chicken. Add lemon slices, garlic cloves and rosemary. Roast in a preheated 200c oven for about 35 minutes. You will need to shake the pan from time to time during the cooking process to prevent sticking. ; name: perfect roast chicken ; ingredients: lemon, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, whole chickens, coarse salt, pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Heat oven to 450 degrees. Rinse and dry chicken and sprinkle with salt and pepper inside the cavity as much as you like. Place the lemon and ginger slices and garlic cloves inside the cavity. Place in a shallow roasting pan and rub on some olive oil. Season the outside with more salt and pepper. Roast 15 minutes then decrease heat to 375 degrees. Roast an additional 65 minutes. Do not open the door during this process. Remove from oven and let rest 10 minutes. ; name: lemon mustard chicken ; ingredients: chicken pieces, cooking oil, dijon-style mustard, lemon juice, lemon pepper seasoning, dried oregano, ground red pepper ; preparation:Skin chicken. Place chicken pieces, bone side up on unheated rack of a broiler pan. Broil 4-5 inches from the heat, about 20 minutes or until light brown. Meanwhile in a bowl stir together oil, mustard, lemon juice, lemon pepper seasoning, oregano and red pepper. Brush mustard mixture onto chicken. Turn chicken, brush with remaning mixture. Broil for 5-15 minutes more or until chicken is no longer pink. ; name: butterfly chicken with lemon rosemary ; ingredients: chicken portions, lemon, olive oil, red onion, fresh rosemary ; preparation:Put chicken pieces in a freezer bag. Add some olive oil. Squeeze half of a lemon in the bag then cut up and leave in bag add red onion. Add rosemary. Shake the bag reallllly well to get all the flavors mixed up and leave in fridge for 24 hours. Place in shallow baking dish and bake as directed for chicken. ; name: marinated ginger chicken ; ingredients: frying chickens, lemon juice, vegetable oil, soy sauce, gingerroot, onion salt, garlic powder ; preparation:

name: awesome easy tamale pie ; ingredients: ground beef, yellow onion, garlic salt, salsa, refried beans, jiffy cornbread mix, egg, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Prepare cornbread mix according to package. In a medium large skillet over medium high heat, saute onions until translucent. Add beef, and saute until browned. Stir salsa and beans into beef, and cook over medium to medium high heat until bubbling and starting to thicken. Stir as necessary while it cooks. Pour beef mixture into 9x9 casserole. Pour cornbread mixture over beef. Bake in 350f oven uncovered for 30-35 minutes, or until cornbread is cooked and starting to brown. ; name: midwestern german meatloaf ; ingredients: lean ground beef, ground pork, sauerkraut, rye breadcrumbs, eggs, onion, milk, grainy mustard, caraway seed, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl combine all of the ingredients. Form meat mixture into a loaf and place into a casserole dish. Bake for 50-60 minutes. Nice with scalloped potatoes and steamed green beans. ; name: lazy man s cabbage roll casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, cabbage, salt and pepper, condensed tomato soup, water, long-grain rice ; preparation:In a skillet, brown onion and ground beef. Place in the bottom of a medium casserole dish. Salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle rice on top. Spread shredded cabbage on top of the rice. Mix water and soup together and pour over everything. Do not stir. Bake for 1 hour at 325f. ; name: easy vegetable rice medley ; ingredients: oil, onion, carrot, celery rib, red pepper, chicken broth, minute white rice, frozen peas, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a skillet. Add onion, carrot, celery, and red pepper. Cook 5 minutes or until tender. Add broth. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice and peas. Cover. Simmer 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. To save time, replace all the veggies with 3 cups frozen mixed vegetables or frozen broccoli florets and add them when you would have added the peas. ; name: aunty diane s yummy burgers ; ingredients: lean ground beef, ground pork, onion, garlic powder, rolled oats, salt & pepper, egg, cold water ; preparation:Mix first 6 ingredients together. Then add the eggs and cold water. Get your hands in there and mix it real good. Roll into balls then flatten into patties. Bbq for 10-15 minutes. Be sure not to press down and squeeze them while they are cooking. Enjoy. ; name: bacon stuffed burgers ; ingredients: bacon, onion, mushroom pieces, lean ground beef, ground pork, parmesan cheese, pepper, garlic powder, steak sauce, hamburger buns ; preparation:Cook bacon until nice crisp. Remove bacon and keep 2 tablespoons of fat drippings. Saute onions in drippings. Crumble bacon with mushrooms add to skillet and set aside. Combine beef, pork, cheese, pepper, garlic powder, and steak sauce. Shape into 16 patties. Divide bacon mixture and place over eight of the patties. Place remaining patties on top and press edges to seal. Fry patties until done. Check for doneness. ; name: chinese five spice short ribs crock pot ; ingredients: onion, short rib of beef, garlic salt, black pepper, vegetable oil, beef broth, stewed tomatoes, onion soup mix, chinese five spice powder ; preparation:Slice the onion and put it into a slow cooker. Season the short ribs with garlic salt and pepper. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Working in batches, brown all sides of the short ribs. When browned, place in slow cooker on top of sliced onions. In a mixing bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Pour over the top of short ribs. Cover and cook on low for 8 to 9 hours. ; name: baby kay s dirty rice ; ingredients: pork sausage, ground beef, cayenne pepper, black pepper, salt, onion, celery, green bell pepper, long grain rice ; preparation:

name: strawberry macadamia nut muffins ; ingredients: milk, butter, egg, flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, fresh strawberries, macadamia nuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Grease the bottoms only of 12 standard-size muffin cups, or line with paper wrappers. Set aside. In a large bowl, beat together the the milk, melted butter, and egg. Stir in the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt just until combined. Do not overmix. Gently fold in the strawberries and macadamia nuts. Spoon batter into the prepared tins. Sprinkle with sugar, if desired. Bake for 20-22 minutes, or until golden and puffed. Immediately invert onto wire racks. Serve warm or cool. ; name: pear cardamom bread ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, ground cardamom, pears, vegetable oil, milk, eggs, cardamom ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease bottom of loaf pan. Mix all ingredients, except topping, in a large bowl. Pour into loaf pan. Mix topping ingredients and sprinkle on top.
