Stir in whole kernel corn. In deep fryer or heavy saucepan drop batter by tablespoonfuls and fry in 2-3 inches of hot oil or fat for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden brown. Drain on paper towles. ; name: coconut cream pudding with ginger crust ; ingredients: butter, ground ginger, vanilla wafer, cornstarch, sugar, half-and-half, vanilla, sweetened flaked coconut ; preparation:Melt butter over low heat and stir in ginger and vanilla wafers. Reserve 3 tsps of crumb mixture. Press remainder in a 9 inch pie plate and chill while pudding is being made. Combine cornstarch and sugar. Add 1 cup half and half, and whisk until cornstarch is dissolved. Stir in remaining half and half and bring to boil over medium heat, whisking, and cook 2 minutes, until thickened. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla and coconut. Transfer to a metal bowl set in a larger bowl of ice and water. Stir until completely cooled and pour into crust. Sprinkle reserved crumbs over. Chill for 20 minutes before serving. ; name: mealie soup south african corn soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, tomatoes, frozen corn, creamed corn, fat-free evaporated milk, chicken broth, salt, black pepper ; preparation:In a large saucepan, melt the butter over moderate heat. Add the onions and saut for 5 minutes. Stir in the tomatoes and cook for about 5 more minutes. Add the corn, creamed corn milk, chicken broth, salt, and pepper. Simmer for about 15 minutes. Serve with crackers. ; name: mexican spice cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, ground ginger, ground allspice, ground cinnamon, ground cloves ; preparation:Cream butter. Add sugar, beating until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla, beating well. Add flour, ginger, allspice, cinnamon, and cloves, stirring well. Drop batter by teaspoonfuls 3 inches apart onto a lightly greased cookie sheet. Bake at 375 degrees f for 5 to 7 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from cookie sheet. Cool on wire racks. Serve on a platter. ; name: sweet potato and corn fritters ; ingredients: cream-style corn, fresh ginger, fresh thyme, self raising flour, milk, egg, sweet potato, butter ; preparation:

name: sweet and spicy pineapple fried rice ; ingredients: oil, garlic, fresh ginger, crushed red pepper flakes, cooked rice, soy sauce, crushed pineapple, green onion ; preparation:Heat oil over medium low heat, add garlic, ginger and red pepper. Cook and stir for 2 minutes. Increase heat to medium high and add rice and soy sauce. Cook for 2 minutes, stirring often. Add pineapple, stir and heat through. Garnish with sliced green onions over the top and serve. ; name: steamed broccoli rabe ; ingredients: broccoli rabe, olive oil, garlic clove, crushed red pepper flakes, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Trim broccoli by cutting off the bottom of the stalks. Rinse well and drain allowing water droplets to remain on broccoli. Heat oil in a heavy skillet. Add garlic and red pepper flakes. Add broccoli rabe and stir until the leaves start to wilt. Season with salt and pepper. Cover skillet and let cook 3 to 5 minutes, turning occasionally. ; name: stir fried shrimp with ginger and mushrooms ; ingredients: canola oil, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, mushroom, celery, toasted sesame oil, large shrimp, reduced sodium soy sauce, dried red pepper flakes ; preparation:Heat the canola oil in a large, heavy skillet over medium heat until hot but not smoking. Add the garlic and ginger, stir fry for 30 seconds. Add the mushrooms, celery and sesame oil and stir fry for 30 seconds. Add the shrimp, soy sauce and red pepper flakes, stir fry til shrimp are pink and cooked through, 3-4 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: zucchini and caramelized onions ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, sugar, zucchini, tomatoes, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil over medium high heat. Add onions, cook stirring for 5 minutes. Add sugar, cook about 7 minutes until carmelized. Add water if necessary to prevent sticking. Add zucchini, cook about 5 minutes until tender. Add tomato and pepper flakes. Cook until heated through and tomato begins to release juices, about 5 minutes add salt and pepper. ; name: spaghetti with italian sausage spinach and diced tomatoes ; ingredients: spaghetti, sweet italian turkey sausage, diced tomatoes, baby spinach, white onion, olive oil, garlic clove, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Boil spaghetti until al dente. Prepare a large non-stick skillet on med-high heat with olive oil. Chop sausage links into bite size chunks and cook until browned in the skillet. Chop onion into large chunks and add to the skillet, mix with sausage. Add garlic, salt, and red pepper flakes. Add tomatoes and spinach. Mix well until heated through. Serve over spaghetti or mix it all up. ; name: pineapple fried rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil, garlic clove, fresh ginger, crushed red pepper flakes, cooked rice, light soy sauce, crushed pineapple in syrup, green onion ; preparation:In large nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-low heat until hot. Add garlic, ginger and red pepper, cook and stir 2 minutes. Increase heat to medium-high. Add rice and soy sauce. Cook 2 minutes, stirring frequently. Add pineapple, tossing to combine. Heat rice through. Sprinkle with green onions before serving. ; name: broccoli pesto ; ingredients: broccoli florets, fresh basil leaf, garlic, pine nuts, coarse salt, ground black pepper, olive oil, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place broccoli in container of blender. Add basil, garlic, pine nuts, salt, pepper, and oil. Process until smooth. Transfer to a bowl and stir in cheese. To serve, toss into warm buttered pasta. Can be refrigerated in a tightly covered jar for a week. May be frozen, but then it is best not to stir in cheese until after defrosting. ; name: pasta with olive oil anchovies and fennel ; ingredients: fennel bulbs, bucatini pasta, olive oil, garlic, wild fennel, anchovy fillets, red pepper flakes, fresh ground black pepper, sea salt ; preparation:

name: fried eggs with kansas city style barbecue sauce for 1 ; ingredients: olive oil, arugula leaf, egg, barbecue sauce, sharp white cheddar cheese, fresh cilantro, cracked black pepper ; preparation:Heat up a skillet on medium heat then add the olive oil. Arrange the arugula leaves on a plate. Gently crack the egg and lightly fry for 3 minutes, or to your preference. Carefully arrange the fried egg on the arugula leaves. Spoon barbecue sauce on and around the egg and greens. Grate cheese on top followed by a garnish of fresh cilantro. Season with cracked black pepper. ; name: old south blue cheese dressing or dip ; ingredients: buttermilk, mayonnaise, onion, blue cheese, pimento stuffed olive ; preparation:In food processor, grind onions. Remove. Then grind olives. Return onions to processor and add mayo and buttermilk. Pulse until well blended. Add blue cheese crumbles. Stir. Pour into jar. Cover and refrigerate at least one hour to blend flavors before serving. ; name: seafood supreme ; ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, sour cream, seafood cocktail sauce, shrimp, mozzarella cheese, green onions, green pepper, tomatoes ; preparation:Blend the first 3 ingredients. Mix well. Spread mixture over a large decorative glass dish. Top with enough cocktail sauce to cover the dish. Chop enough shrimp to scatter around the dish. Top with mozzarella cheese, green onions, green pepper and tomatoe. Chill for 2 - 3 hours before serving. Serve with assorted crackers. ; name: sauced crab ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, crabmeat, lemon juice, onion powder, hot pepper sauce, seafood cocktail sauce, fresh chives ; preparation:Put first 5 ingredients into small bowl. Beat until well combined. Shape into ball. Cover and chill at least 2 hours. Just before serving, place on serving plate. Pour cocktail sauce over crab ball. Garnish with chives. Add more cocktail sauce as needed. ; name: good broccoli casserole ; ingredients: broccoli, cream of mushroom soup, mayonnaise, eggs, tabasco sauce, onion, cheddar cheese, butter, herbed breadcrumbs ; preparation:Combine first 6 ingredients. Sprinkle cheddar cheese on top of broccoli mixture. Combine crumbs and melted butter and sprinkle on top of cheese. Bake 35 minutes in a pre-heated 350 degree oven. This dish will serve 8. Any leftovers are reheated very nicely in microwave. ; name: smoked oyster heaven ; ingredients: cream cheese, cilantro, fresh lime juice, jalapenos, hot sauce, white bread, smoked oysters, red onion ; preparation:Mix together the cream cheese, cilantro, lime juice, jalapeno& hot sauce. Cut the toast slices into interesting shapes, 6 pieces per slice. Spread the cheese mixture thinly on each piece. Drain the oysters well on a paper towel. Pop an oyster on each toast piece. Sprinkle onion lightly over top. Serve. ; name: snack pizza spread ; ingredients: margarine, onion, mushroom pieces, green pepper, celery, parsley, pizza sauce, tomato paste, sharp cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Fry onions in butter in a small sauce pan. Add mushrooms, green peppers, celery, parsley and any other vegetable you may want to add. Add pizza sauce, tomato paste, cheeses and spices. Keeps for a couple of weeks in the fridge if sealed. I also add deli meats or left overs on top and broil over buns, toast, or mini pizza shells. Enjoy. ; name: pimento cheese and crackers ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, cream cheese, mayonnaise, fresh garlic, pimento pepper, onion powder, tabasco sauce, butter flavored cracker, pimento stuffed olive ; preparation:

name: miss daisy s hot baked chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, celery, pecans, mayonnaise, salt, lemon juice, onions, cheddar cheese, potato chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Combine first 7 ingredients. Pour into greased casserole. Mix cheddar and crushed chips and sprinkle over the top. Bake for 10 minutes. ; name: laab salad ; ingredients: ground chicken, fresh lime juice, fish sauce, sugar, hot chili pepper, rice flour, green onions, fresh cilantro, red onions, of fresh mint ; preparation:Brown meat in wok over medium heat without any oil. Transfer to a bowl and mix with lime juice, fish sauce and hot pepper. Add the ground rice and remaining ingredients and combine mixture. Place mixture on a bed of shredded lettuce. Garnish with cucumber, carrot and cabbage. Serve at room temperature. ; name: trio of t s salad tuna tomato and tarragon ; ingredients: red onion, light mayonnaise, kosher salt, salt & freshly ground black pepper, chunk light tuna, celery, fresh tarragon leaves, lettuce, fresh tomato, lemon ; preparation:Place onion in a small bowl and cover with cold water. Refrigerate for 20 minutes. Drain. Whisk mayonnaise, salt and pepper in a medium bowl. Add tuna, celery, tarragon and the drained onion. Stir to combine. Serve on a bed of lettuce with tomato and lemon wedges. ; name: santa fe shrimp martini cocktails ; ingredients: mild salsa, avocado, cayenne pepper sauce, lime juice, fresh cilantro leaves, large shrimp, french-fried onions, lime ; preparation:Combine salsa, avocado, cayenne pepper sauce, lime juice and cilantro. Alternately layer shrimp and salsa mixture in 6 margarita or martini glasses. Microwave french fried onions for 1 minute until golden. Sprinkle over shrimp. Garnish with lime. ; name: seafood chicken ; ingredients: cooked chicken, tuna in vegetable oil, lemons, kalamata olive, hard-boiled eggs, artichoke hearts, lettuce leaf, mayonnaise, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place lettuce leaves on a serving platter and arrange the chicken pieces and chunks of tuna on top of the lettuce leaves. Add the lemon quarters to the platter. And the olives, boiled egg slices and artichoke hearts. Top with mayonnaise or serve the mayonnaise separately in a bowl or jug. Garnish with the chopped parsley. ; name: mexi cheeseburger quiche ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, diced green chilies, eggs, mayonnaise, water, heavy cream, cumin, cayenne pepper, mexican blend cheese ; preparation:Cook ground beef in skillet until done. Drain. Add onions and chiles and cook for 5 minutes. Meanwhile, mix the rest of the ingredients in a bowl. Put beef mixture into a pie dish. Pour cheese mixture over it. Bake at in a 350 oven for 35-40 minutes or until cheese is puffed and slightly brown. ; name: tostadas burros pronto ; ingredients: refried beans, green chili, beef broth, tostadas, flour tortillas, lettuce, chopped tomato, cheddar cheese, salsa, enchilada sauce ; preparation:Mix beans, green chiles, and broth. Heat in microwave until hot or heat on the stove if desired. Warm tostada shells in 350 oven for 3 to 4 minutes. Place some of the bean mixture on the flour tortillas with cheese and roll up. Wrap with foil and place in oven for a few minutes to melt cheese. Serve the tostadas cafetieria style by having each person make their own. Put some bean mixture on top of the shell and sprinkle with cheese. Microwave to melt the cheese if desired. Put lettuce, tomatoes, and salsa on top and eat. Remove burros from the foil and top with any of the lettuce, tomatoes, salsa, or my favorite the enchilada sauce. ; name: turkey wraps with chipotle mayonnaise ; ingredients: mayonnaise, fresh cilantro, green onion, chipotle chile in adobo, fresh lime juice, flour tortillas, smoked turkey, romaine lettuce leaves ; preparation:

name: tuna melt potato wedges ; ingredients: frozen potato wedges, mayonnaise, onion, cheddar cheese, tuna in water, parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 220 c. Place wedges in single layer on baking sheet. Bake for 15 minutes. Meanwhile mix mayo, cheese and tuna together. Place wedges into heatproof serving dish. Spoon over tuna mixture. Put back into the oven for 15 minutes till bubbling. ; name: trio of t s salad tuna tomato and tarragon ; ingredients: red onion, light mayonnaise, kosher salt, salt & freshly ground black pepper, chunk light tuna, celery, fresh tarragon leaves, lettuce, fresh tomato, lemon ; preparation:Place onion in a small bowl and cover with cold water. Refrigerate for 20 minutes. Drain. Whisk mayonnaise, salt and pepper in a medium bowl. Add tuna, celery, tarragon and the drained onion. Stir to combine. Serve on a bed of lettuce with tomato and lemon wedges. ; name: crab stuffed eggs ; ingredients: eggs, white crab meat, mayonnaise, relish, tabasco sauce, fresh chives, salt and pepper, mixed salad greens ; preparation:Spoon out the egg yolks and put them into a large bowl, keeping the egg whites on the side. Mash the yolks with a fork and mix well with the crab meat, mayonnaise, relish and tabasco. Adjust seasoning as necessary. Spoon the mixture back into the egg whites, piling it up. Sprinkle the chives over the eggs. Arrange salad leaves on a plate and place the eggs on top. Chill for about 1 hour until ready to serve. ; name: tuna cheese pie ; ingredients: tuna in water, parmesan cheese, low fat cottage cheese, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking powder, onion flakes, chicken bouillon, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Arrange flaked tuna evenly in a 9 inch pie pan that has been sprayed with a nonstick cooking spray. In a blender, combine half of the parmesan with remaining ingredients. Blend until smooth. Pour mixture over tuna. Top with remaining parmesan. Bake, uncovered, 30 minutes, until set and lightly browned. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. ; name: gingered tuna salad ; ingredients: tuna in water, curry powder, olive oil, red onion, crystallized ginger, mayonnaise, rice vinegar, dijon mustard, pecans, cayenne pepper ; preparation:In a small saucepan over low heat, saut the curry powder in olive oil for 5 minutes, stirring frequently. While the curry powder is cooking, mince the onion and chop the crystallized ginger. In a medium bowl, add the mayonnaise, rice vinegar and dijon mustard. Whisk to blend. Add the cooked curry powder, crystallized ginger, onion, pecans and cayenne pepper. Whisk again to thoroughly blend. Add the tuna and mix with a fork until tuna is well blended and coated with the dressing. Serve and enjoy. ; name: tuna fish and spaghetti casserole ; ingredients: solid white tuna, spaghetti, cream of mushroom soup, milk, onion, green peppers, potato chips ; preparation:Boil spaghetti for 10 minutes. Drain. Spray frying pan with nonstick cooking spray. Saute pepper and onion until softened slightly. Season with salt and pepper. Mix together onion, pepper, tuna, spaghetti, soup, and milk. Add to greased casserole dish. Top mixture with chips. Bake at 375 for 35 minutes. ; name: pasta shells with tuscan tuna ; ingredients: medium pasta shells, red onion, fresh basil, capers, extra virgin olive oil, lemon rind, salt, fresh ground black pepper, albacore tuna in water ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions, omitting salt and fat. Drain pasta in a colander over a bowl, reserving 2 tablespoons cooking liquid. Return pasta to pan. Add reserved 2 tablespoons cooking liquid, onion, and remaining ingredients. Toss well. ; name: farfalle tuna salad ; ingredients: light chunk tuna in water, farfalle pasta, frozen peas, cucumber, onion, roasted red pepper, mayonnaise, red wine vinegar, fresh parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: greek green beans braised with mint and potatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, margarine, tomato juice, fresh green beans, fresh parsley, potatoes, salt & freshly ground black pepper, of fresh mint ; preparation:Combine olive oil and margarine in a non-reactive pan. Heat through. Add tomato juice or sauce, green beans, parsley and enough water to almost cover. Tuck the potato slices in between, partially cover pan with lid, and simmer for 25 minutes. Stir and season with salt, pepper, and 2 tbsp chopped mint. Cook uncovered until green beans and potatoes are fork tender, about 10 more minutes. If the sauce has not thickened, pour it into a small pan, and reduce to one cup, then combine with the beans and potatoes in a warm serving bowl. Sprinkle with a little additional fresh mint and serve warm. ; name: unfried refried beans ; ingredients: onion, dry pinto beans, fresh jalapeno pepper, garlic, salt, fresh ground black pepper, ground cumin, water ; preparation:Place the onion, rinsed beans, jalapeno, garlic, salt, pepper, and cumin into a slow cooker. Pour in the water and stir to combine. Cook on high for 8 hours, adding more water as needed. Once the beans have cooked, strain them, and reserve the liquid. Mash the beans with a potato masher, adding the reserved water as needed to attain desired consistency. ; name: siesta fiesta salad ; ingredients: black beans, sweet corn, sweet red pepper, red onion, red wine vinegar, olive oil, fresh parsley, fresh cilantro, fresh dill, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a colander, rinse the black beans. Drain well. In a large bowl, combine the beans, corn, sweet pepper, and onion. Set aside. In a screw-top jar, combine the vinegar, oil, parsley, cilantro, dill, and black pepper. Cover and shake well. Pour the dressing over the vegetable mixture and toss to coat. Serve at room temperature. Garnish the salad with a sprig of dill, if you like. Makes 4 servings. ; name: lemon green beans ; ingredients: green beans, water, lemon juice, unsalted butter, lemon, rind of, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place beans in a steamer basket over boiling water. Cover saucepan and steam 5-7 minutes or until green beans are tender. Rinse under cold water and drain. Combine water and lemon juice in a heavy nonstick skillet over medium heat. Simmer 2-3 minutes or until reduced by half. Stir in butter. Add green beans and lemon peel. Simmer 3-4 minutes or until green beans are heated throughout. Remove from heat. Add parsley and salt to taste and toss. ; name: basil green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, spring onion, margarine, dried basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper ; preparation:Trim and snap green beans into thirds. Mince the onion. Put water on to boil to steam beans. As soon as water boils, steam beans for 12 to 17 minutes or until tender. Melt margarine for beans and saut onions until tender. Add steamed beans, basil, garlic powder and pepper. Toss beans with basil sauce to coat evenly and serve. ; name: refried beans without the refry ; ingredients: onion, dry pinto beans, fresh jalapeno pepper, garlic, salt, black pepper, ground cumin, water ; preparation:Place the onion, rinsed beans, jalapeno, garlic, salt pepper, and cumin into a slow cooker. Pour in the water and stir to combine. Cook on high for 8 hours, adding more water as needed. Once the beans have cooked, strain them, and reserve the liquid. Mash the beans with a potato masher, adding the reserved water as needed to attain the desired consistency. ; name: sandra lee s black bean burgers ; ingredients: yellow onion, garlic, black beans, cilantro leaves, fresh parsley leaves, egg, red pepper flakes, breadcrumbs, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Heat a grill between low to medium-low heat. In a food processor, pulse onion and garlic until finely chopped. Add 1 can of drained black beans, cilantro, parsley, egg, and red pepper flakes and pulse to combine. Transfer mixture to a large bowl, add the remaining can of drained black beans and the bread crumbs. Season with salt and pepper, to taste, and mix until well combined. Divide mixture into 4 portions and form into patties. Place on hot oiled grill over low to medium-low heat and cook about 6 minutes on each side or until heated through. ; name: green bean saute ; ingredients: fresh green beans, canola oil, yellow onion, salt, black pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: miss daisy s hot baked chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, celery, pecans, mayonnaise, salt, lemon juice, onions, cheddar cheese, potato chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Combine first 7 ingredients. Pour into greased casserole. Mix cheddar and crushed chips and sprinkle over the top. Bake for 10 minutes. ; name: chutney chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked boneless skinless chicken breasts, bell pepper, raisins, celery, green onion, miracle whip light, mango chutney, romaine lettuce ; preparation:Toss chicken, bell pepper, raisins, celery and onions in large bowl. Stir mayonnaise and chutney in small bowl until blended. Add to salad. Toss to evenly coat. Serve at room temperature or chilled. Line 4 individual plates with lettuce leaves. Top with salad. ; name: chicken stuffed with smoked salmon ; ingredients: chicken breasts, oil, onion, red pepper, chicken soup, smoked salmon, sweetcorn, water, salt, pepper ; preparation:Pre heat oven to gas 4, 350f, 180c. Make a pocket in the chicken breasts and stuff with smoked salmon leaving a little of the salmon left over for the sauce. Place in a ovenproof dish. Fry onions in oil until golden, then add red pepper and cook for a further minute. Add soup, water, remainding salmon and sweetcorn and mix well. Pour over the chicken. After 20 mins cooking in oven give the sauce a stir and baste chicken breasts with the sauce, cook for further 20 mins and serve. ; name: chicken almond casserole ; ingredients: chicken, mayonnaise, cream of chicken soup, celery, sliced almonds, cracker crumb, onion, eggs, potato chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 deg. Mix all ingredients together well except for the corn flakes. Lightly grease a casserole dish and add mixture. Top with corn flakes. May drizzle a little melted butter over corn flakes if desired. Bake at 350 for 35 minutes. ; name: hot chicken casserole ; ingredients: cream of chicken soup, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, salt, pepper, cooked chicken, slivered almonds, celery, water chestnuts, potato chips ; preparation:In large bowl, combine first 4 ingredients. Stir until smooth, then mix in the remainder of the ingredients. Put mixture into a baking dish. Top with a thick layer of either crumbled potato chips or chow mien noodles. Bake at 350f for 45 minutes or until hot and bubbly. ; name: spicy chicken with pineapple ; ingredients: cooking oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, onion, paprika, chili powder, red pepper, pineapple slices in juice, tomatoes, red kidney beans ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large saute pan. Add the chicken and onion, and cook together until golden. Add the spices and red pepper, and cook for 1 minute. Halve the pineapple slices, add to the pan with the juice, tomatoes and kidney beans. Cover and simmer 20-25 minutes until the chicken is tender. Serve with rice or mashed potatoes. ; name: super easy chicken broccoli pie ; ingredients: cooked chicken breasts, frozen chopped broccoli, sharp cheddar cheese, eggs, bisquick, milk, dried onion flakes, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a greased pie plate, mix chicken, broccoli, 2 cups of cheddar, and onion flakes. In a separate bowl, whisk together eggs, bisquick, milk, salt, and pepper. Pour egg mixture over chicken mixture. Bake 30-40 minutes or until an inserted knife comes out clean. Sprinkle remaining cheese over the top and bake a few more minutes until it melts. Let cool slightly before cutting. ; name: holiday chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken breasts, fat-free mayonnaise, paprika, dried cranberries, celery, green onions, green bell pepper, pecans, seasoning salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: sausage dressing ; ingredients: sausage, white onion, celery ribs, cornbread, white bread, sage, chicken broth, eggs, salt and pepper ; preparation:Brown sausage with onions and celery. Mix remaining ingredients thoroughly in large pan. Add sausage, onions, and celery after draining. Let sit over night in refregerated area. Bake in oven at 375 degrees until golden brown. ; name: rosemary garlic baby back ribs ; ingredients: pork back ribs, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, extra virgin olive oil, salt, hot pepper flakes, ground black pepper, lemon ; preparation:Remove the membrane from the underside of the ribs, if attached, then cut into 4 sections of 3 or 4 ribs each. In a large dish, combine the garlic, rosemary, oil, salt, hot pepper flakes and pepper. Add the ribs and rub all over with the spice mixture. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour or up to 24 hours. Set a foil drip pan under 1 rack of a 2-burner barbecue or under the centre rack of a 3-burner barbecue. Heat the remaining burners to medium heat. Place the ribs, meat side down, on a greased grill over the unlit burner. Close the lid and cook, turning once, until the meat is tender and pulls away from the ends of the bones, about 1 hour. Squeeze the lemon over the ribs to serve. ; name: butternut ginger soup ; ingredients: light olive oil, butternut squash, carrots, celery ribs, onion, fresh ginger, vegetable broth, salt ; preparation:In a 3-quart saucepan, saute the squash, carrots, celery, onion, and ginger in the olive oil until tender. Add the vegetable broth and bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 40 minute stirring occasionally. Puree soup in a blender or food processor. Reheat on stove if necessary. Add salt to taste. ; name: apple butter ribs crock pot ; ingredients: country-style boneless pork ribs, salt, pepper, onion, apple butter, brown sugar, liquid smoke, garlic cloves ; preparation:Rub salt and pepper on ribs. Place in crock pot. Cover with onions. Mix remaining ingredients and pour over onions. Cover and cook on low for 9 hours. ; name: pork chops with apples and swiss ; ingredients: pork chops, cloves, dry white wine, celery leaves, bay leaves, celery ribs, butter, apples, brown sugar, swiss cheese ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375f and butter a baking pan. Press a clove into each chop, then add the chops to the pan, followed by the wine, celery leaves, and bay leaves. Bake the chops for 30 minutes. Meanwhile, heat the butter in a frying pan and saute the diced celery for 5 minutes, tehn add the apples and brown sugar. Turn the heat to low and cook for 10 minutes, or until just tender. After 30 minutes, remove the pork chops, discard the bay and celery leaves and sprinkle cheese on each chop. Baste with juices and broil a few minutes to brown. Add a few pan juices to the apple-celery mixture, and serve as a side with the pork chops. ; name: new year s eve oven roasted beef brisket ; ingredients: beef brisket, carrot, celery, onions, garlic cloves, diced tomatoes, beef broth, brown sugar ; preparation:In a large bowl combine tomatoes, beef broth, and brown sugar. Stir till mixed well. Pour over top of the brisket and vegies and bake in the oven for 6 hours at 225 f. You can use any type of roast or meat you want. It really does not matter even a tough type of meat will work fine after cooking for 6 hours it will come out fork tender. ; name: celery milan style ; ingredients: celery ribs, water, instant chicken bouillon, margarine, parmesan cheese, parsley ; preparation:Place celery, water, and bouillon in med saucepan. Bring to boil. Reduce heat, cover and cook approx 15 minutes or until celery is crisp-tender. Drain, add butter, cover and let stand until butter melts. Sprinkle with cheese and parsley. ; name: my mom s lentil soup ; ingredients: lentils, celery ribs, onion, garlic, fresh pork hocks, brown sugar ; preparation:

name: potato egg pie ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, fresh pepper, milk, mashed potatoes, hardboiled egg, crisp bacon, parsley, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Over medium heat melt butter then blend in flour, salt and pepper. Slowly mix in milk, stirring continually until mixture is thick and bubbly. Remove from heat- set aside. Line bottom and sides of a greased 9 inch pie plate with half the potatoes. Into the shell layer eggs, bacon, parsley, cheese and white sauce. Cover with remaining potatoes. Brush the top of the pie with 2 tablespoons of milk. Bake for 20 minutes or until top is browned. ; name: potage de tomate or tomato soup if you prefer ; ingredients: yellow onion, butter, tomatoes with basil, tomato paste, thyme, sugar, salt, fresh ground pepper, canned chicken, heavy cream ; preparation:Chop the onion and saute in the butter in a 6 quart pot until soft and clear, but do not brown. Add the tomatoes with liquid, tomato paste, thyme, sugar, salt and pepper to the pot, and simmer on low heat for 30 minutes. Add 2 cups of the broth and simmer for 15 minutes more. Remove the soup from the heat and puree in the food processor or a ricer. Pour through a strainer to remove the seeds. Add more broth if needed to reach the consistency you desire. Reheat the soup stirring in the heavy cream, but do not boil. Garnish if you wish with chopped fresh basil, or chopped fresh chives, or chopped green onion. ; name: tomato onion quiche ; ingredients: onion, tomatoes, eggs, yogurt, milk, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh basil, sharp cheddar cheese, pastry shells ; preparation:Spread onion and tomato in a 9-inch pastry shell. Mix eggs, yogurt, milk, salt, pepper and basil. Pour into pastry shell. Sprinkle cheese over top. Bake at 400 degrees ot 10 minutes. Then bake at 350 degrees for 35-40 minutes or until a knife comes out clean. Let sit for 5 minutes before serving. ; name: cumin potatoes and tomatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, ground cumin, ground cinnamon, olive oil, crushed tomatoes, water, sea salt, pepper ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 200c. In a large mixing bowl, mix the potatoes, onion, cumin, cinnamon, oil, salt and pepper. Spread this mixture evenly in a baking dish. Pour the crushed tomatoes and any juices over the potatoes. Pour water into the pan. Cover with foil and bake for 45 minutes. After this time, reduce oven temperature to 180c, remove foil and bake an additional 30 minutes until the potatoes are tender and the sauce has thickened. ; name: garlicky potato puffs ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, garlic cloves, potato starch, salt, fresh ground black pepper, eggs, parsley, paprika ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 400f. Add the minced garlic to the melted butter and allow to stand until needed. Peel, dice, and boil potatoes till tender. Mash with a potato masher. Add all ingredients to the potatoes and mix well. Place large tablespoons of the mixture in a buttered baking dish or on a cookie sheet. Sprinkle each with paprika, if desired. Bake in the oven for about 10 to 12 minutes, or until golden brown. ; name: balsamic baked onions and potatoes jamie oliver ; ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, butter, fresh rosemary, bulb of garlic, red onions, balsamic vinegar, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. Put the potatoes into a pan of boiling, salted water and cook for around 8 minutes, then drain and return to the pan. Chuff them up a bit by shaking the pan. Get a roasting pan, into which you can fit the potatoes in 1 layer, and heat it on the stove. When hot, pour a glug of olive oil into it and add the butter, rosemary and garlic. Add the potatoes and toss them in all the flavors. Add the onions and all the balsamic vinegar and season with salt and pepper. Cook for 5 minutes on the burner to reduce the balsamic vinegar a little. Place the pan on the top shelf and cook for around 50 minutes, until the potatoes and onions are dark, sticky and crispy - removing the pan to toss the onions and potatoes halfway through. ; name: greek style green beans ; ingredients: diced tomatoes, water, onions, fresh parsley, garlic, of fresh mint, oregano leaves, salt, black pepper, green beans ; preparation:Wash,. Place in pan with water to cover beans. Simmer uncovered until beans are just tender, stirring a few times. Meanwhile, combine undrained tomatoes with water, onions, parsley, garlic, mint, oregano, salt and pepper in a saucepan. Cover. Bring just to a boil, reduce heat and let simmer 10 minutes, stirring frequently. When tomato sauce is thick, drain green beans and top with sauce. Serve promptly. ; name: cheesy potato and onion casserole ; ingredients: potato, tomatoes, onions, herbs, margarine, salt & freshly ground black pepper, milk, plain flour, cheese ; preparation:

name: foolproof buttercream frosting ; ingredients: egg yolks, sugar, light corn syrup, unsalted butter, vanilla ; preparation:In mixer bowl at high speed, beat egg yolks until pale yellow, 4 to 5 minutes. Butter a 2-cup glass measuring cup. In a 2- to 3-quart pan, combine sugar and corn syrup. Cook over medium-high heat and stir until sugar is dissolved and mixture comes to a rolling boil. Immediately pour into the butter glass measuring cup. Beating constantly at medium speed, pour syrup in a thin, steady stream into egg yolks. Continue beating until mixture is at room temperature. Add butter and vanilla. Beat just until smooth. ; name: peanut brittle ; ingredients: sugar, white corn syrup, dry roasted salted peanut, butter, vanilla, baking soda ; preparation:In 2 quart microwave safe bowl stir together the sugar & corn syrup. Microwave on high for 4 minutes. Stir in peanuts and microwave on high for another 4 minutes. Add butter & vanilla, stirring well. Microwave on high for additional 2 minutes. Stir in baking soda until light and foamy. Quickly pour mixture onto a lightly greased cookie sheet or slab marble. Let cool for 1 hour - break into pieces and store in tight container. ; name: amazing overnight french toast ; ingredients: corn syrup, brown sugar, butter, raisin bread, eggs, milk, vanilla ; preparation:Over medium heat, bring corn syrup, brown sugar and butter to a boil. Boil 5 minutes and pour into a greased 13 x 9 baking pan. Cut or tear all of the bread and place in the pan, set aside. Beat eggs, milk and vanilla and pour over bread. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Uncover and bake at 350 for 45 minutes. ; name: caramel popcorn snack ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, brown sugar, corn syrup, salt, vanilla, baking soda, popped popcorn, pecans ; preparation:Bring butter, sugars, syrup, and salt to a boil over medium heat. Boil 5 minutes. Remove from heat and add vanilla and soda. Stir well. Pour over popcorn and nuts. Spread on 2 cookie sheets. Bake for 1 hour at 250f stirring every 20 minutes. Cool and store in airtight containers. ; name: mom s pecan pie ; ingredients: white corn syrup, sugar, eggs, butter, vanilla, pecans, unbaked pie shell ; preparation:Boil syrup and sugar together for about 2 minutes. Pour over eggs gradually, stirring well. Add butter, vanilla and pecans. Pour into pie shell. Bake in preheated 375 oven for about 50 minutes, or until knife inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: old fashioned butterscotch sauce ; ingredients: light brown sugar, light corn syrup, butter, evaporated milk, baking soda, vanilla ; preparation:In a medium saucepan combine sugar, syrup, and butter. Cook, stirring constantly, over medium heat until sugar has dissolved and mixture comes to a full rolling boil. Allow to boil, without stirring, for exactly 1 minute. Remove from heat and let stand for 5 minutes. In another bowl or large measuring cup, combine evaporated milk, baking soda, and vanilla. Stir into the slightly cooled sauce. Pour into jars, cover, and refrigerate. Place jar in a pan of warm water to reheat. ; name: bacon bourbon caramel popcorn ; ingredients: popped corn, bacon, butter, brown sugar, light corn syrup, sea salt, baking soda, bourbon ; preparation:Preheat your oven to 250. Melt 1 cup of butter over medium heat. Mix in brown sugar, corn syrup and sea salt and then stir until boiling at the edges. Lower the heat slightly and let boil until the caramel is 250. Remove from heat and add the baking soda and bourbon. Once fully incorporated, stir in the bacon. Divide the popcorn into two very lightly greased roasting pans and coat with the caramel. Mix well and then put the popcorn into the preheated oven for about 45 minutes to an hour, mixing every 10-15 minutes so the kernels of popped corn is coated in bourbon bacon coating. Once done, pour onto either parchment paper or wax paper to cool and break into pieces. Refrigerate. ; name: fruit plate with marshmallow sauce ; ingredients: sugar, hot water, light corn syrup, egg whites, vanilla, salt, mayonnaise, orange rind ; preparation:

name: chili lime shrimp kabobs ; ingredients: lime juice, olive oil, white wine vinegar, garlic cloves, chili powder, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables ; preparation:In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first seven ingredients. Add the shrimp. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 1 hour. Drain and discard marinade. On each of 12 metal or soaked wooden appetizer skewers, thread two shrimp and any veggies you want to add. Grill kabobs, covered, over medium heat or broil 4 inches from the heat for 5-8 minutes or until shrimp turn pink, turning once. ; name: christmas package cheese snack ; ingredients: cream cheese, dried dill, garlic powder, salt, scallion, red bell pepper ; preparation:Mix the dried dill, garlic powder, and salt into the softened cream cheese. Pack the mixture into a rectangular container lined with plastic wrap. Refrigerate it for at least 3 hours. Before serving time, set the unwrapped block of cheese on a platter and decorate it with a scallion bow and red pepper polka dots and give tag made from cut red pepper. Serve with choice of crackers or veggies. ; name: eggs with cheese and olive oil ; ingredients: olive oil, eggs, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat a large skillet over medium heat. When hot, add 4 teaspoons of oil to pan and swirl to coat. Place eggs in carefully and cook until the white has become solid, about 1 to 2 minutes. Sprinkle the eggs with salt, pepper, and about a tablespoon of cheese for each egg. Swirl the remaining olive oil on the top of the cheese. Carefully turn eggs and cook until yolk is of desired doneness, about 1 minute. Serve immediately. ; name: silverbeet swiss chard and mushroom pie ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic cloves, mushrooms, silver beet, nutmeg, salt & freshly ground black pepper, eggs, thickened cream, low-fat swiss cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over a moderate heat. Saute the onion and garlic for 5 mins or until soft. Add the mushrooms and saute for another 2 minutes. Add the silverbeet, nutmeg and season. Cover the saucepan and cook until the silverbeet wilts. Remove from the heat, stir the silverbeet through the mushrooms and drain any excess moisture. Transfer the silverbeet mixture into a large 6 cup capacity baking dish. Whisk the eggs and cream together, season and stir through the grated cheese, then pour the egg mixture over the silverbeet mixture, swirl the egg mixture through the silverbeet using a fork. Bake the pie for 40 mins or until golden and set. Allow to cool slightly before slicing. ; name: bahian shrimp stew ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, bell pepper, tomatoes, cilantro, garlic clove, tomato paste, bay shrimp, lemon juice, coconut milk ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet, add onion, pepper, tomatoes, cilantro, garlic and tomato paste. Cook for 10 minutes. Bring sauce to a boil, then add shrimp and lemon juice. Reduce heat to medium and cook for 2 minutes. Add coconut milk and bring the mixture to a boil. Serve over rice. ; name: lemon ice cream without ice cream maker ; ingredients: lemon juice, lemon zest, sugar, whole milk, heavy cream, salt ; preparation:Combine lemon juice, lemon zest, and sugar in a mixing bowl. Gradually stir in milk, heavy cream and salt. Pour into an 8 inch glass baking dish, cover and freeze until firm. Remove ice cream one half at a time and run through a food processor until nearly smooth. Pour into a plastic bowl, with lid. Top ice cream mixture with plastic wrap and seal with lid to bowl. Will keep up to one week. ; name: scrumptious cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, crushed pineapple, green bell pepper, green onion, lemon pepper, seasoning salt, pecans ; preparation:Beat cream cheese until softened. Stir in gently, crushed pineapple, bell pepper, green onion, lemon pepper, season salt and 1 cup pecans. Roll on plastic wrap into a ball. Wrap up the ball in plastic wrap and chill for 2-4 hours. Once the ball is firm, roll in remaining 1 cup of chopped pecans. Serve with crackers. ; name: black olive dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, lemon juice, garlic salt, milk, black olives ; preparation:

name: pink lemonade cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, lemonade mix, egg, vanilla extract, lemon extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda ; preparation:Preheat oven to 35o degrees. In a large bowl, cream butter, sugar and lemonade mix until fluffy. Beat in egg, vanilla and lemon extract. In a separate bowl, mix flour and baking soda. Add dry ingredients to batter, beating until thoroughly combined. Form dough into 1-inch ball and roll in granulated sugar. Place balls 2-inch apart on well-greased cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until edges begin to brown. ; name: banana cake x ; ingredients: butter recipe cake mix, baking soda, sour cream, butter, eggs, bananas, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease and flour two cake pans and set aside. Mash banana and set aside. Combine cake mix and baking soda in the large bowl of an electric mixer. Add the rest of the ingredients and beat on low speed until combined. Beat at medium speed for 4-5 minutes. Divide batter between the two pans and bake 30-35 minutes or until center of cake springs back with lightly tapped. Allow to cool on a wire rack and frost. ; name: one pan banana bread ; ingredients: vegetable oil, bananas, vanilla extract, eggs, bisquick baking mix, sugar, nuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Generously grease the bottom only of a 9x5x3-inch loaf pan. Stir all ingredients in pan with a fork until moistened. Beat vigorously 1 minute. Bake 55 to 60 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool 5 minutes. Run knife around sides of loaf to loosen, remove from pan. Cool completely. ; name: my own best cheddar drop biscuits ; ingredients: bisquick baking mix, milk, sharp cheddar cheese, salt, garlic powder, dry mustard, cayenne pepper, butter, italian seasoning ; preparation:Heat oven to 450. Combine first 7 ingredients in medium-sized bowl just til all is moistened. Drop heaping tbls. Of dough onto ungreased baking sheet making 10 mounds. Melt butter with rest of ingredients, and spoon on top of each biscuit. Bake for 8-10 minutes or til golden brown. My oven takes 10 minutes. ; name: dreamsicle bars ; ingredients: instant tang orange drink, sugar, vanilla chips, all-purpose flour, baking soda, baking powder, butter, eggs, vanilla, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, cream the butter, eggs, vanilla, and water. Add the remaining dry ingredients and stir until the mixture is well blended. Spread batter into a lightly greased 9x12 pan. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes. Cool in pan. Cut into 2-inch squares. ; name: strawberry crumble bars ; ingredients: bisquick, quick-cooking oats, brown sugar, butter, strawberry jam ; preparation:Heat oven to 400. Grease a 9x9x2 pan. Mix bisquick, oats and sugar. Cut in the butter until fully mixed. Press half of the bisquick mixture into the pan and spread the jam on top. Press the rest of the mixture gently on top of the jam. Bake 25 to 30 minutes until lightly browned. ; name: light pancakes ; ingredients: low-fat biscuit mix, skim milk, splenda sugar substitute, lemon juice, baking powder ; preparation:Stir all ingredients together until well blended. Let stand 10 minutes. Using ladle, spoon on to hot griddle until edges are dry and middle is bubbly. Turn. Cook until golden. ; name: breakfast biscuits brekkie bix ; ingredients: orange marmalade, butter, bisquick baking mix, cold water ; preparation:

name: mini chocolate chippers ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, white sugar, egg, flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips, oats ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. In a medium bowl cream butter until fluffy. Add sugars and egg, mix well. In another bowl sift dry ingredients, add to wet ingredients. Once the dry and wet ingredients are well mixed add cup of rolled oats and cup of chocolate chips. Spoon a bit of the batter at a time onto a greased pan. Cook from 12 to 15 minute until the cookies are golden and have risen. ; name: mimi s cornmeal scones ; ingredients: flour, cornmeal, baking powder, baking soda, salt, firm butter, buttermilk ; preparation:Mix first 5 ingredients in a medium bowl. Cut in the butter using pastry blended till it looks like fine crumbs. Stir in buttermilk so dough leaves sides of bowl and forms a ball. Turn dough onto lightly floured surface and knead lightly about 10 times. Pat or roll into a 7-inch circle on ungreased cookie sheet that has been sprinkled with cornmeal. Score into 8 wedges, cutting down halfway to the bottom. Bake in 400 degree oven for 20-25 minutes or till light brown. Immediately remove from sheet and carefully separate wedges. Serve warm. ; name: highland squares ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, oatmeal, salt, baking powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a medium sized microwave safe bowl, melt butter. Mix in brown sugar. Add oatmeal, salt and baking powder. Press into an 8x8 baking dish. Bake for 15 - 20 minutes. Let cool before cutting into squares. ; name: soda bread ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, salt, butter, sour milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Stir flour, baking soda and salt together. Cut in butter, until mixture resembles crumbs. Pour in sour milk. Knead dough, cut cross at center and bake for 40 minutes. ; name: king and prince oatmeal raisin muffins ; ingredients: rolled oats, buttermilk, eggs, brown sugar, butter, flour, baking powder, salt, baking soda, raisins ; preparation:Fill muffin tins with paper baking cups. Combine oats and buttermilk in a bowl, let stand for 1 hour. Add eggs, sugar and butter, mix 30 seconds, scrape down bowl. Combine dry ingredients, add. Add raisins. Mix on low speed for about 15 seconds or only until dry ingredients are moistened. Fill muffin cups half full. Bake at 400 degrees for 15-20 minutes. ; name: daddy s fluffy homemade pancakes ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, milk, oil, egg ; preparation:Put all dry ingredients in a medium size bowl and mix well. Add milk, oil and egg. Whisk with fork until blended. Cook on greased skillet or griddle. Cook to desired doneness. Only flip once -- more than once will result in tough pancakes. ; name: buckwheat griddlecakes ; ingredients: flour, buckwheat groats, baking soda, salt, sugar, eggs, sour milk, butter ; preparation:Sift dry ingredients together. Beat eggs, add buttermilk or sour milk. Add to dry ingredients gradually. Add butter, beating to obtain a smooth batter. Drop from a spoon onto a hot greased griddle and brown on both sides. ; name: easy oatmeal favorites ; ingredients: butter, flour, sugar, baking soda, oatmeal ; preparation:

name: crock pot orange honey chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, orange juice, chicken broth, honey, dry mustard, teriyaki sauce, broccoli floret, cauliflower floret, carrot ; preparation:Place frozen breasts in crock pot. Mix juice, broth, honey, dry mustard and teryiaki sauce. Pour over chicken in crock. Cook on low for four hours. Add vegetables about one hour before serving. Place on top of chicken and do not stir. Cook the additional hour and serve over rice. ; name: cilantro lime chicken ; ingredients: garlic, cilantro leaves, black peppercorns, sugar, limes, thai fish sauce, light soy sauce, sunflower oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Make the marinade of garlic, cilantro, ground peppercorns, sugar, lime juice, fish sauce, soy sauce and sunflower oil. Blend well. Place chicken breasts with marinade in a shallow dish or resealable plastic bag, coating them well, and set in the refrigerator at least 1 hour and no more than 2, turning them from time to time. Preheat a ridged griddle pan or heavy non-stick frying pan and cook the chicken for 7-8 minutes each side until the chicken is cooked through. Serve hot or cold, garnished with cilantro leaves. ; name: honey balsamic chicken satay great for camping ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic cloves, honey, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, crushed red pepper flakes, ranch dressing ; preparation:Cut each chicken breast into 3 or 4 long strips. Combine all other ingredients in a small bowl and whisk until combined. Place chicken in ziploc bag and add marinade. Marinate for at least one hour. Thread chicken onto bamboo skewers. Grill over medium to hot coals or fire until juices run clear. ; name: honey and orange glazed chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, vegetable oil, green onions, garlic clove, honey, orange juice, orange, soy sauce ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375. Place the chicken, with the skins on, in a single layer in a shallow roasting dish and set aside. Heat the oil in a small saucepan and gently fry the green onions and garlic for about 2 minutes, until softened, but not browned. Add the honey, orange juice, orange segments and soy sauce to the pan, stirring well and cook until the honey has completely dissolved. Pour the sauce over the chicken and bake, uncovered, for about 45 minutes, basting once or twice until the chicken is cooked. ; name: hawaiian teriyaki chicken ; ingredients: skinless chicken thighs, cornstarch, cold water, sugar, gluten-free soy sauce, vinegar, garlic clove, fresh ginger, pepper, crushed pineapple ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Place chicken in a casserole dish. Combine all ingredients and pour over chicken. Bake covered for 2 hours. Stir several times while baking. Add pineapple just before serving. Serve over cooked rice. ; name: smoky hot chicken stir fried with dried red chillies and green g ; ingredients: skinless chicken thighs, cornstarch, wine, peanut oil, dried red chilies, ginger, brown sugar, light soy sauce, black vinegar, garlic chives ; preparation:Combine chicken with cornflour and shao sing wine in a bowl. Cover, place in refrigerator and leave to marinate for 1 hour. Place 1st measure of oil and chillies in a cold wok and then turn heat to low. Cook for about 1 minutes or until chillies begin to darken slightly. Using a slotted spoon, immediately remove chillies and drain on kitchen paper. Leaving chilli-infused oil in wok, turn heat up to high and stir-fry half the chicken cubes for 3 minutes. Remove with a slotted spoon. Add extra oil to wok with remaining chicken and stir-fry for 3 minutes. Return all chicken to wok, along with ginger and reserved chillies, and stir-fry for 1 minute. Add sugar and stir-fry for 30 seconds. Add remaining ingredients and stir-fry for 30 seconds. Serve immediately. ; name: greek marinade for chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, dill, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, lemon zest, lemon, juice of, ouzo, fennel seed, salt & pepper ; preparation:Put all marinade ingrediantsin a large ziplock bag. Mix well. Add chicken breasts. For a mild flavour, leave for 30 minutes. For more intensity, leave up to 4 hours but no longer. Heat up grill to medium high. Cook breasts, with lid closed for about 7 minutes per side. ; name: crock pot citrus ginger chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken, orange marmalade, lime juice, crushed pineapple, soy sauce, dijon mustard, gingerroot, cayenne pepper, minced garlic clove, sugar ; preparation:

name: portuguese cinnamon wreaths ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg yolks, flour, salt, sherry wine, cinnamon ; preparation:Cream together butter and all but 2 tablespoons of the sugar. Add egg yolks, one at a time and beat until light. Add sifted flour and salt alternately with sherry, mixing well. Fill cookie press with dough and press out each wreath onto ungreased or parchment lined cookie sheets. Bake at 375 for 8-10 minutes. Combine the cinnamon with the reserved 2 tablespoons sugar and sprinkle warm cookies with the mixture. ; name: crock pot apple brown betty ; ingredients: cooking apples, bread, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, brown sugar, butter ; preparation:Wash apples, peel, core, and cut into eights. Place in bottom on crock. Combine bread cubes, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, sugar, butter and toss together. Place on top of apples in crock. Cover. Cook on low setting 2-4 hours. Check apples about halfway into this -- if not softening enough, add water or apple juice to steam inside the pot. Half to three quarters of a cup is usually sufficient. ; name: peasant girls in the mist scandinavian apple and cream pudding ; ingredients: cooking apples, caster sugar, unsalted butter, rye breadcrumbs, soft brown sugar, ground cinnamon, whipping cream, icing sugar, lemon juice, toasted hazelnuts ; preparation:Put the cubed and peeled apple chunks into a large saucepan with the caster sugar and 2 to 3 tablespoons water. Cook them over a gentle heat until they are completely tender - stirring them every so often to mash them down. Put them into a bowl to cool. Melt the butter in a frying pan and add the breadcrumbs and brown sugar. Saute, stirring constantly over a medium heat until the breadcrumbs are golden brown. Add the cinnamon and stir well. Remove from the heat and allow to cool. Whip the cream and add the icing sugar & lemon juice. Take a large glass bowl or 4 individual glass bowls and layer the stewed apples, breadcrumbs and cream - ending with a layer of cream. Scatter with the chopped hazelnuts and serve. ; name: beverly s get up go breakfast cookies ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, egg, frozen orange juice concentrate, orange zest, all-purpose flour, baking powder, grape-nuts cereal ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In medium bowl, cream together butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the egg, orange juice concentrate, and orange zest. Combine the flour and baking powder. Mix into the fluffy mixture until blended. Stir in cereal. Drop by teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until edges are golden. Remove from cookie sheet for cooling. ; name: amish apple crisp ; ingredients: apples, sugar, cinnamon, flour, baking powder, salt, egg, butter ; preparation:Place apple mixture in a deep dish pie pan. Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon. Mix topping ingredients, except the cinnamon and butter, with a fork until blended. Sprinkle topping over apples. Drizzle melted butter over topping. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake at 375f degrees for 40 minutes. ; name: the heavy one cheesecake ; ingredients: cream cheese, granulated sugar, flour, lemon zest, orange zest, egg yolks, eggs, heavy cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 475 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese until it is light and fluffy. Mix in the sugar and flour and continue beating until it is smooth. Add the zests, the yolks, the eggs, one at a time, thoroughly mixing after the addition of each with the mixer. Stir in the heavy cream, and mix only briefly until blended. Pour the mixture into the prepared crust in the 10-inch springform pan, and bake for 15 minutes at 475 degrees f. Then, reduce the oven temperature to 200 degrees f and continue to bake for 60 minutes. Then, turn the oven off and allow the cake to sit inside while it cools down for another 60 minutes. Remove the cake from the oven, allow to cool to room temperature, then chill in the refrigerator over night. ; name: fresh orange curd ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, fresh orange juice, eggs, butter, orange rind ; preparation:Combine sugar and cornstarch in a 3-quart saucepan. Gradually whisk in juice. Whisk in lightly beaten eggs. Bring to a boil over medium heat, whisking constantly, 1-2 minutes or until mixture reaches a pudding like thickness. Remove from heat. Whisk in butter and orange rind. Cover, placing plastic wrap directly on curd. Chill 8 hours. ; name: apple bread pudding ; ingredients: butter, baking apples, sugar, white wine, bread, light cream, eggs, orange zest ; preparation:

name: hungry jack casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, salt, pork & beans, barbecue sauce, brown sugar, instant minced onion, flakey biscuits, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Brown ground beef and strain. Add next 5 ingredients and heat til bubbly. Pour into 2 quart casserole dish. Peel biscuits in half and lay across top. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes. ; name: baked beans and hamburger casserole ; ingredients: worcestershire sauce, ground beef, onion, ketchup, salt and pepper, yellow mustard, butter, sugar, pork and beans ; preparation:Brown ground beef and onion. Drain. Remove from heat. Add all other ingredients and stir well. Place in a casserole dish and bake, covered, at 325 for 45 minutes. ; name: beefy green bean casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, bread, milk, celery, onion, low-sodium worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper, green beans, cream of mushroom soup ; preparation:Soak bread in milk, then add to ground beef along with celery, onion, worcestershire sauce, salt, and pepper. Shape into small balls. Bake in a 325-degree fahrenheit oven until brown. Drain grease from meatballs. Combine meatballs and green beans in casserole dish and pour soup on top. Return to oven and bake at 300 degrees for 1 to 1 hours. ; name: jewel s ground beef casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, chili powder, worcestershire sauce, frozen mixed vegetables, medium noodles, cheese, salt, tomatoes, accent seasoning ; preparation:Fry beef about 10 minutes and drain off grease. Boil noodles about 8 minutes. Stir in onions, salt, chili powder, tomatoes, and worchestershire sauce and cook until onions are translucent. Sprinkle vegetables with accent. In a 2 quart casserole dish, combine meat and vegetables with cooked noodles and cover. Bake, covered, at 350 degrees about 30 to 40 minutes. Uncover and sprinkle with cheese. Bake about 15 minutes longer. ; name: lighter meatloaf ; ingredients: worcestershire sauce, egg whites, black pepper, salt, hot pepper sauce, onion, canned tomato sauce, old fashioned oats, lean ground turkey, lean ground beef ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Spray loaf pan with cooking spray. Combine beef, turkey, onion, and oats in a large bowl, set aside. Mix together tomato sauce, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, egg whites, salt, and pepper. Add to meat mixture and mix well with hands. Press into pan and bake for 60-70 minutes. ; name: bacon topped meatloaf ; ingredients: chili sauce, eggs, worcestershire sauce, onion, cheddar cheese, dry breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, lean ground beef, bacon ; preparation:In a bowl, combine the first eight ingredients. Crumble beef over mixture and mix well. Shape into a loaf in an ungreased 13 inch by 9 inch by 2 inch baking dish. Top with bacon. Bake uncovered at 350 for 70-80 minutes or until meat is no longer pink and a meat thermometer reads 160 degrees. Drain, let stand for 10 minutes before cutting. ; name: sloppy joe di maggios ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, lean ground sirloin, beef hot dogs, onion, steak seasoning, chili powder, dark brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, tomato sauce, hamburger buns ; preparation:Heat the extra-virgin olive oil, a turn of the pan, in a deep skillet over medium-high heat. Add meat and crumble as it browns. Add chopped hot dogs after 3 to 4 minutes then cook 3 to 4 minutes more. Add the onions to the pan and cook to soften, 5 to 6 minutes more. In a bowl mix the spices, sugar, worcestershire and tomato sauce. Pour sauce over the meat and simmer a few minutes to combine flavors. Slop onto buns and serve. ; name: hamburger pudding ; ingredients: ground beef, salt, worcestershire sauce, onion gravy mix, biscuit mix, milk, brown gravy mix, hot water ; preparation:

name: marion county ia pork producers barbecue sauce ; ingredients: ketchup, brown sugar, cider vinegar, prepared yellow mustard, vegetable oil, garlic cloves, worcestershire sauce, lemon, red pepper flakes ; preparation:In a saucepan, combine ketchup, vinegar, oil, worcestershire sauce, brown sugar, mustard, and garlic. Squeeze lemon juice into sauce and add 1 lemon half shell. Heat slowly for about 10 minutes. Sauce does not have to reach the boil, but heating blends flavor. Use sparingly as a basting sauce for fresh pork, ham, ribs, or chicken. Heat additional sauce and serve as a table sauce. Makes about 3 cups. ; name: blueberry balsamic barbecue sauce ; ingredients: blueberries, balsamic vinegar, sugar, ketchup, garlic powder, salt ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a saucepan. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer 15 minutes or until slightly thick. Remove from heat, cool. Place blueberry mixture in a blender. Process until smooth. ; name: sweet and tangy sloppy joes ; ingredients: ground beef, white onion, tomato sauce, ketchup, brown sugar, soy sauce, orange, juice of, cider vinegar, dry mustard, cayenne pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet brown ground beef and onion over medium heat. Drain off excess fat. Stir in the remaining ingredients until well blended. Cover and simmer over low heat for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serve hot on your favorite buns or bread. ; name: homemade worcestershire sauce ; ingredients: apple cider vinegar, low sodium soy sauce, water, brown sugar, ground ginger, mustard powder, onion powder, garlic powder, cinnamon, black pepper ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a medium saucepan and stir thoroughly. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Simmer 1 minute. Cool. Store in the refrigerator. ; name: crock pot cranberry pork roast and gravy ; ingredients: lean pork loin, salt and black pepper, whole berry cranberry sauce, pineapple juice, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, honey, cinnamon, cornstarch, cold water ; preparation:Rub salt and black pepper onto pork loin and place in crock pot. Add all of remaining ingredients except cornstarch and water. Turn crock pot on high for 1 hour and then cook on low for 5-6 hours. Mix cornstarch and water in small bowl and add last 15 minutes of cooking time which will help make the gravy. Remove loin onto a serving plate. This recipe will go well with rice, potatoes or noodles. ; name: noble house black vinegar pork ; ingredients: pork, shaoxing wine, soy sauce, ginger juice, potato starch, black vinegar, rice vinegar, white sugar ; preparation:In a bowl, combine pork, 1 tablespoon of shaoxing wine, the soy sauce and ginger juice. Allow it to marinate for 1 hour. When done marinating, add 1 inch oil to a heavy bottomed pot and preheat the oil to 340 degrees f. Prepare a wire rack by lining it with several layers of paper towels. Put the potato starch in a small bowl, and roll each piece of pork in it to give each piece an even coating of starch. Fry the pork in batches until lightly browned and cooked though. Transfer the fried pork to the paper towel lined rack. In a saute pan, add the remaining shaoxing wine along with the black vinegar, rice vinegar, soy sauce and sugar. Turn the burner on to high heat and bring the mixture to a boil. Add the cooked pork to the black vinegar sauce and continue boiling until the sauce is very thick and syrupy and coats each piece of pork, rather than the pan. Serve with steamed rice. ; name: grilled turkey breast ; ingredients: cider vinegar, garlic, ground mustard, honey, brown sugar, black pepper, olive oil, turkey cutlets ; preparation:In a medium bowl, combine the cider vinegar, garlic, ground mustard, honey, brown sugar, and black pepper. Slowly whisk in the olive oil to thoroughly combine. Place the turkey cutlets in a shallow dish and pour the liquid over top. Cover and place in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour. Preheat the grill or oven broiler. Place the breasts directly on the grill, or on a roasting rack beneath the broiler. Cook for about 20-25 minutes, or until the turkey is fully done. Turn the breasts frequently to prevent burning. ; name: dees sweet and sour sauce ; ingredients: ketchup, cider vinegar, orange juice, pineapple juice, wine vinegar, sugar, mustard, cornstarch, water ; preparation:

name: easy corn fritters ; ingredients: corn, egg, sugar, salt, butter, baking powder, flour, milk, canola oil ; preparation:Thaw frozen corn by placing it in a strainer in the sink and run cold water over it, stirring occasionally, until it is completely thawed. While corn is thawing, mix all of the remaining ingredients except oil in a large bowl. Add thawed corn to batter and mix well. Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet on medium-high. Drop spoonfuls of batter into skillet. Brown on both sides. Drain on paper towels before serving. ; name: quick chocolate chip scones ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, baking soda, egg, skim milk, lemon juice, butter, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Place wax paper on a large baking sheet. Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl. Combine other ingredients in a second bowl. Blend the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients. Add chocolate chips. Drop by large spoonfuls onto the baking sheet. Bake 15 minutes. ; name: simple whole wheat muffins ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, canola oil, maple syrup, cinnamon, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Combine wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix dry and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared muffin pans and bake at 375 for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: almond poppy seed muffins ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, egg, sugar, butter, buttermilk, poppy seeds, almond extract ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f, adjust a rack to the middle position. Spray a 12 cup regular size muffin tin with some nonstick spray. Whisk flour, salt, baking powder, baking soda, and poppy seeds in a large mixing bowl and set aside. Whisk egg, sugar, and almond extract together until combined, then whisk in the buttermilk and melted butter. Add the buttermilk mixture to the flour and fold to combine. There should be not large pockets of flour but small streaks may remain. Do not over mix. The batter will be fairly thick. Divide the batter evenly into the tin. Bake for about 20 25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Flip the muffins out of the tin and cool them right side up on a cooling rack. ; name: fast food biscuits ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, oil, buttermilk, egg wash, egg, water ; preparation:Combine dry ingredients. Measure oil and milk in measuring cup and do not mix. Pour all at once over flour mixture. Just mix in bowl. Does not need to be kneaded or shaped. Just mix until all ingredients are just moistened. Can add a little more flour if it seems too gooey but you basically will take it in your hands to shape and place on pan. Let proof 10 min on lightly greased pan. If you want a more golden look, place egg wash on top before baking. If you want a more dessert type biscuit for strawberry shortcake then dust with sugar and melted butter before baking. 475 degrees 10-12 minutes or until lightly brown. ; name: special banana nut bread ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, canola oil, milk, egg, walnuts, banana, brown sugar ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except for brown sugar and beat on medium speed for 30 seconds. Pour batter into greased loaf pan and generously sprinkle top with brown sugar. Bake at 350 f for 55-65 minutes, or until an inserted toothpick comes out clean. Remove from pan and cool completely on wire rack. Slice when cool. ; name: honey sweet cornbread ; ingredients: flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, margarine, sugar, honey, eggs, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease and flour 8x8 baking pan and set aside. Combine flour, cornmeal, baking powder and salt in mixing bowl and set aside. Place margarine and sugar in large bowl of mixer and cream until smooth. Add honey and eggs and beat to blend, scraping bottom and sides of bowl frequently. Beat in half of the milk. Beat in half of the flour mixture. Repeat with remaining milk and flour mixture. With mixer at lowest speed, continue to mix for 4 minutes. Pour batter into prepared pan and bake in oven 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: cornmeal bread ; ingredients: flour, cornmeal, baking powder, baking soda, salt, sugar, egg, canola oil, water ; preparation:

name: nana s sugar cream pie ; ingredients: sugar, flour, salt, whipping cream, milk, vanilla, cinnamon, butter, unbaked pie shell ; preparation:Mix sugar, flour and salt together. Add cream, milk and vanilla. Pour mixture into a 9 inch unbaked pie shell. Sprinkle with cinnamon and dot with butter. Bake in 425 f oven for 10 mins. Reduce heat to 350 f and bake for 1 hr 15 mins. ; name: classic two crust apple pie ; ingredients: tart apples, lemon juice, sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, butter, pie crusts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Peel, core and thinly and thickly slice the apples. Toss with lemon juice if using. Combine and mix apples, sugar, flour, cinnamon and nutmeg. Pour into crust-lined pie plate. Dot with butter. Place top crust, seal and vent. Cover edges of crust with narrow band of aluminum foil, shiny side out. Bake at 425f for 20 minutes. Reduce temperature to 375f and bake another 30-40 minutes until filling is bubbling and crust is nicely browned. If necessary remove foil last 10 minutes to brown edges. ; name: linda s toll house pie ; ingredients: eggs, flour, sugar, brown sugar, butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts, unbaked pie shells, french vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. In a lg. Bowl, beat the eggs until foamy. Mix in flour, sugar, and brown sugar until well blended. Blend in melted butter or margarine. Stir in chocolate chips and nuts. Pour filling into pie shell. Bake for 1 hour, then remove from oven, and cool for 30 minutes before cutting. ; name: rumrunner s pecan pie ; ingredients: eggs, all-purpose flour, dark corn syrup, sugar, rum, butter, vanilla, pecans, deep dish pie shells ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In large bowl beat eggs with wire whisk. Add flour and continue to whisk until it has been incorporated. Add corn syrup, sugar, rum, butter and vanilla. Stir in pecans. Evenly divide mixture between frozen pie crusts. Bake 50-55 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Let cool at room temp on wire rack. ; name: ny times pecan pie ; ingredients: pie shell, dark corn syrup, sugar, salt, eggs, margarine, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375, parbake pie shell until golden. In a saucepan, bring the corn syrup, sugar and salt to a boil over high heat until the sugar dissolves. Very slowly, pour in a thin stream into the beaten eggs while stirring vigorously. Add the vanilla, margarine and pecans to the mixture and pour into prepared pie shell. Bake for 50 minutes or until puffed. ; name: my real pumpkin pie ; ingredients: pie crusts, eggs, pumpkin, sugar, salt, cinnamon, ginger, ground cloves, sweetened condensed milk, evaporated milk ; preparation:Combine the eggs, pumpkin, sugar, salt, cinnamon, ginger, cloves and milk. Mix well and pour into prepared pie crusts. Bake in a 425f oven for 15 minutes. Reduce temperature to 350f and bake an additional 50-60 minutes or until the center of the pie is no longer wobbly or liquid. Cool and serve with whipped topping or vanilla ice cream. ; name: rhubarb pie ; ingredients: fresh rhubarb, egg, water, flour, granulated sugar, butter, unbaked pie crusts ; preparation:Mix egg, water, flour, sugar and butter together in a bowl. Add rhubarb to mixture and mix well. Pour filling into a pie crust and top with second pie crust. Cut air vents in top crust. Bake at 500 degrees for 5 minutes, then reduce heat to 400 degrees for 50 to 60 minutes, until it bubbles in the center. ; name: blueberry crumb pie ; ingredients: deep dish pie shell, fresh blueberries, sugar, flour, cinnamon, orange juice, brown sugar, butter ; preparation:

name: high protein no guilt skinny cheesecake ; ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, eggs, low-fat sour cream, whey powder, splenda granular, lemon, juice and rind of, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 deg f. Put the cottage cheese, eggs, sour cream, whey powder, splenda, lemon rind an juice, and vanilla extract in a blender, and blend until very smooth. Pour mixed into a sprayed pie pan. Place the cake on the top rack of the oven and place a flat pan of water on the bottom rack. Bake for 30-40 minutes. Cook, then chill well before serving. ; name: buttermilk squares ; ingredients: margarine, eggs, yellow cake mix, powdered sugar, cream cheese ; preparation:Melt margarine in 13 x 9 pan. Mix 2 eggs and cake mix until crumbly. Sprinkle over melted margarine. Mix 2 eggs, powdered sugar and cream cheese until smooth. Pour over cake mixture. Bake 35-45 min in 325 degree oven. ; name: decadent chocolate frangelico pudding ; ingredients: egg yolks, superfine sugar, vanilla extract, cocoa powder, mascarpone cheese, frangelico, heavy cream, hazelnuts ; preparation:In a large metal or glass bowl, beat the egg yolks and sugar with a whisk until very fluffy. Place the bowl over a saucepan filled with simmering water and wisk over low heat for about 5 minutes, until very thick. Whisk in the vanilla, cocoa, mascarpone, and frangelico. Continue whisking for 2 more minutes until thick again. Remove from the heat. Pour the mixture into small tea cups or large espresso cupsand refrigerate for 4 hours to set. Spoon some whipped cream on each, sprinkle with the chopped nuts, and serve. Prepare ahead. The pudding can be made the night before and refrigerated. ; name: cornbread low carb ; ingredients: almond flour, baking powder, eggs, cream, water, butter, splenda sugar substitute ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 combine the almond meal and baking powder. Add the cream, water, sweetener, and eggs, stir to combine. Add the melted butter, stir to combine. Spray pam into the muffin tin. Divide the batter amongst 5-6 muffins. Bake for 15-18 minutes until edges are slightly browned and the tops are firm to the touch. Really good with butter& sugar-free, low carb jam or honey. ; name: cherry cheesecake low fat ; ingredients: eggs, low-fat cream cheese, low fat cottage cheese, nonfat dry milk powder, sugar substitute, lemon juice, pure vanilla extract, reduced fat graham cracker crust, cherry pie filling ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Mix first 7 ingredients by hand or in blender. Pour into pie crust, bake 30 minutes until set. Remove and refrigerate overnight. Spread cherry pie filling on top, serve. ; name: 1900 park fare bread pudding disney ; ingredients: eggs, granulated sugar, heavy cream, salt, ground cinnamon, butter, white bread ; preparation:Place cubed bread in loaf pan. In a mixing bowl, combine eggs and sugar. Mix well. Add cream, salt and cinnamon. Mix well. Pour custard over bread cubes. Press down so custard soaks in well. Place soft butter on top of bread. Bake in a water bath at 325 degrees for approximately one hour until golden brown and custard is firm. Serve with vanilla sauce. ; name: ww core friendly sweet corn cakes ; ingredients: cornmeal, plain fat-free yogurt, baking powder, water, egg, onion, frozen corn, splenda sugar substitute, yogurt cheese ; preparation:Mix yogurt, water and egg together in bowl. Add in cornmeal and baking powder and stir together until batter is moist. If you like sweeter cakes, especially for breakfast, add splenda at same time. Let batter stand for 15-20 minutes. Quickly fold in corn and grated onions. Heat pan over medium heat and lightly coat with cooking spray. Add batter to the pan in spoonfuls. For best results, keep the cakes 2-3 inches in diameter. Let first side cook until tops is dry around the edges. Turn and cook other side. Serve with a dollop of soft yogurt cheese. ; name: breakfast delish ; ingredients: eggs, ricotta cheese, heavy cream, splenda sugar substitute, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:

name: chocolate chip crispers ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, egg, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, rice krispies, chocolate chips ; preparation:In large bowl beat together butter and sugar. Beat in egg and vanilla. Sift together flour, soda and salt. Mix into wet ingredients. Stir in crispies, and chocolate chips. Drop by tablespoon full onto greased cookie sheet 1 inch apart. Bake at 350 for 10-12 minutes or until lightly browned. ; name: brown sugar oatmeal muffins ; ingredients: oatmeal, whole wheat flour, flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, dark brown sugar, milk, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin cups or use paper liners. Mix oats, flours, baking powder and salt in a large bowl. Whisk eggs and brown sugar in another bowl. When smooth, whisk in milk, melted butter and vanilla. Pour over dry ingredients and fold in just until dry ingredients are moistened. Scoop into mufifn cups. Bake 15 to 25 minutes or until springy to the touch in the center. ; name: oaty currant bread ; ingredients: plain flour, baking powder, salt, rolled oats, brown sugar, molasses, natural yoghurt, currants, milk ; preparation:Place all the dry ingredients in a mixing bowl. Using a fork, stir till combined. Mix together molasses, yoghurt, currants and milk and add to dry ingredients. Beat till a smooth, thick batter forms. Grease loaf tin, 20 x 13 cms. Pour batter into tin, leave to stand 10 minutes. This allow oats to swell and absorb liquid. Bake at 180 c for 55 - 60 minutes. Serve sliced and buttered. ; name: mabon lunch crumble ; ingredients: apples, rolled oats, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, butter, cinnamon, salt, allspice, apple juice ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375f.
