Lightly butter a 9-inch square baking pan or a casserole of the equivalent size, then dust it with flour. Peel, core and slice the apples, and arrange them in the pan. In the bowl of an electric mixer, blend the oats, brown sugar, flour, butter, cinnamon, salt and allspice on low speed until it forms a coarse meal. Crumble the mixture evenly over the apple slices and sprinkle with the juice. Bake for 35 minutes. ; name: white chocolate chunk muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, buttermilk, butter, eggs, vanilla, white chocolate ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Grease 12 large muffin cups. Combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt in a large bowl. Combine buttermilk, butter, eggs and vanilla in small bowl until blended. Stir into flour mixture just until moistened. Fold in white chocolate. Spoon into prepeared muffin cups, filling half full. Bake 25-30 minutes or until wooden toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in pan on wire rack for 5 minutes. Remove from pan. Cool on wire rack 10 minutes. Serve warm or completely cool. ; name: blueberry crunch cobbler ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, quick-cooking oats, brown sugar, sweet creamy butter, fresh blueberries, sugar, water, cornstarch, salt, vanilla ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl combine all the crust ingredients. Beat at medium speed on mixer, scraping bowl often, until crumbly. Press 2 cups of the crumb mixture on bottom of ungreased 13x9 inch baking pan. Place blueberries over the crumb crust. In 2-qt saucepan combine remaining filling ingredients except vanilla. Cook over medium heat, stirring the mixture occasionally, until it thickens and comes to a full boil. Continue boiling for 1 minute. Mix in vanilla. Pour over blueberries. Sprinkle with the remaining crumb mixture. Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until lightly browned. ; name: malted chocolate chip cookies vegan ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, dark brown sugar, malted barley syrup, margarine, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all the dry ingredients together. Mix all the wet ingredients together. Mix everything together. Shape into 8-12 balls, put on cooked sheet lined with parchement. Flatten slightly. Leave room between them because the will spread out. Bake for 10-12 minutes at 350f. ; name: crunchy chocolate cookies ; ingredients: rolled oats, all-purpose flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, salt, egg whites, corn syrup, vanilla, rice krispies ; preparation:

name: cuban garlic sauce mojo cubano ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, onion, sour orange juice, oregano, salt, black pepper ; preparation:For the mojo, you will need a large bowl. In a large bowl, pour the sour orange juice or lime juice, oregano, salt, pepper, garlic and sliced onion into the bowl and stir. Heat the olive oil over medium-high for 2 minutes, then when hot, pour olive oil into bowl. Be careful not to get burned, since some of it might splatter out. Mix the mojo ingredients, then let sit for 30 minutes. ; name: rachael ray s spanakopita burgers ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, butter, garlic cloves, red onion, frozen spinach, fresh oregano, feta, ground chicken, seasoning ; preparation:Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. To one side, add a little extra-virgin olive oil and a tablespoon of butter. When butter melts, add the chopped garlic and chopped red onion and cook 5 minutes. Transfer the onions and garlic to a bowl to cool. Return pan to heat. Squeeze all the water out of the thawed spinach. Separate the spinach as you add it to the bowl with cool onions, garlic and season with 1 teaspoon of oregano. Add in feta crumbles then chicken or turkey, grill seasoning and a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil. Mix and form into 4 patties, 1-inch thick. Raise heat on pan to medium-high. Add patties and cook 6 minutes on each side. ; name: cilantro lime chicken ; ingredients: garlic, cilantro leaves, black peppercorns, sugar, limes, thai fish sauce, light soy sauce, sunflower oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Make the marinade of garlic, cilantro, ground peppercorns, sugar, lime juice, fish sauce, soy sauce and sunflower oil. Blend well. Place chicken breasts with marinade in a shallow dish or resealable plastic bag, coating them well, and set in the refrigerator at least 1 hour and no more than 2, turning them from time to time. Preheat a ridged griddle pan or heavy non-stick frying pan and cook the chicken for 7-8 minutes each side until the chicken is cooked through. Serve hot or cold, garnished with cilantro leaves. ; name: greek marinade for chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, dill, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, lemon zest, lemon, juice of, ouzo, fennel seed, salt & pepper ; preparation:Put all marinade ingrediantsin a large ziplock bag. Mix well. Add chicken breasts. For a mild flavour, leave for 30 minutes. For more intensity, leave up to 4 hours but no longer. Heat up grill to medium high. Cook breasts, with lid closed for about 7 minutes per side. ; name: lentils with onion and garlic ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, dried red chili, green lentil, water ; preparation:Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top. ; name: chicken in coriander cilantro sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, skinless chicken thighs, onions, dry white wine, fresh cilantro, garlic cloves, salt, black pepper, lemons ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large non stick fry pan. When it is hot, add the thighs in one layer and saute them over medium to high heat for 4 minutes on each side or until nicely browned. Remove the chicken to a platter. Add the onions to the dripping in the pan. Saut for 1 minute. Stir in the garlic, wine and coriander stems only and saut for 1 minute longer. Return the chicken to the pan, add lemon salt and pepper. Bring the surrounding liquid to the boil. Cover the pan, reduce the heat and boil gently for 15 minutes. Stir in the coriander leaves and serve 2 thighs per person. Serve with rice or cous cous. ; name: cilantro grilled chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, garlic cloves, fresh cilantro, seasoning salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, limes, juice of ; preparation:Pound chicken breasts between wax paper enough to flatten. Combine oil, lime juice, vinegar, mustard, garlic, cilantro, salt and pepper in a bowl. Add chicken, coat well and marinate at least 1 hour. Grill or broil chicken breasts for about 6 minutes on each side, basting once with left over marinate mixture. Preperation time does not include marinate time. ; name: chile chicken ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, bell peppers, onions, ground cumin, oregano, hot chili peppers, boneless skinless chicken breasts, lemon juice ; preparation:

name: koshari lentils and rice with tomato sauce ; ingredients: lentils, white rice, macaroni, onion, olive oil, garlic cloves, tomato sauce, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:Place lentils in saucepan with 4 cups of water and bring to a boil. Allow to simmer on low for 30 minutes, or until tender. Add rice to the lentils and cook for another 20 minutes or so, until rice is tender. Meanwhile, cook macaroni according to package directions to an al dente stage. Combine lentils, rice and macaroni in large pot. Saute onions and garlic in pan in olive oil until browned. Add tomato sauce to onions and garlic and heat until bubbling. Remove from heat. Place a serving of lentil mixture on a plate and cover with sauce. Sprinkle red pepper on top and serve. ; name: mexican rice easy ; ingredients: vegetable oil, long-grain white rice, garlic salt, ground cumin, taco seasoning, onion, tomato sauce, chicken broth ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add rice and cook, stirring constantly. Sprinkle with salt, cumin, and taco seasoning. Cook stirring constantly, until slightly translucent. Stir in onions and cook until tender. Stir in tomato sauce and chicken broth. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 20 to 25 minutes. Fluff with a fork. ; name: simple cumin basmati rice ; ingredients: basmati rice, water, peanut oil, cumin seeds, fresh coarse ground black pepper, salt, fresh cilantro ; preparation:In a medium bowl, soak the rice in the water about 30 minutes. Heat the oil in a large saucepan over med-high heat. Add in the cumin seeds and black pepper. They should sizzle upon contact with the hot oil. Quickly add in the rice with the water it was soaking in. Mix in the salt and bring to a boil over high heat. Decrease heat to the lowest setting, cover the pan, and cook until the rice is done, 10-15 minutes. Do not stir the rice while it cooks. Remove from heat and let the rice rest undisturbed about 5 minutes. Transfer to a serving platter, garnish with cilantro, and serve. ; name: jeera cumin rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil, cumin seed, basmati rice, water, salt ; preparation:Heat the oil in a medium size saucepan over a medium-high heat. Drop in the cumin seeds, and cook until they splutter. Do not allow the cumin seeds to burn or become really dark brown in color. Add the rice and fry it in the oil for about 1 minute. Add the water and salt and bring to a boil. Once the water is boiling, reduce the heat to low and cover the saucepan. Cook the rice for approximately 15 minutes. If you feel the rice is getting burnt near the base of the pan as it cooks, one trick is to place the saucepan on another flat pan or griddle which is directly on the flame. Toss with a fork. ; name: thick cheesy tomato lentil pasta sauce ; ingredients: dried red lentils, onion, water, cheese, parmesan cheese, seasoning, salt and pepper, tomato sauce, garlic clove ; preparation:Cook the lentils in the water until tender. I do a taste test for the lentils to see if they are done. Drain the lentils if they are a little watery. Saute the onion with garlic in oil over medium hear until onion is tender. Add the seasoning, lentils, tomato sauce and cheese. Stir until cheese is melty and everything is well combined. Pour over or spoon over pasta. ; name: brown rice split pea laf ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, garlic cloves, brown rice, vegetable broth, lemon juice, split peas, ground cinnamon, ground cumin, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a medium saucepan over medium heat, heat the oil and saute the onion until golden, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic ands rice and stir until coated with oil. Stir in the broth, lemon juice, split peas, cinnamon, cumin, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, then turn the heat down to a simmer. Cover and cook 45-50 minutes, or until all the liquid is absorbed and the rice and peas are tender. Let stand, covered 10 minutes, then serve hot. ; name: greek rice with cabbage and tomatoes lahanorizo ; ingredients: cabbage, olive oil, white onion, parsley, salt, black pepper, long grain rice, tomatoes, water ; preparation:Over low heat in a large skillet, saut onion until just translucent. Increase heat to medium and add cabbage. Continue cooking until wilted. Add tomatoes and water. When in comes to a boil, add rice, parsley, salt and pepper. Reduce heat to simmer, cover and cook until very little liquid remains and rice is tender. Serve. ; name: lentil rice dish mujadarah arabic dish ; ingredients: lentils, basmati rice, water, salt, black pepper, cumin, olive oil, onions ; preparation:

name: cannellini bean salad with roast cherry tomatoes chorizo ; ingredients: cherry tomatoes, olive oil, salt and pepper, cannellini beans, chorizo sausage, red onion, sherry wine vinegar, honey, mixed salad greens ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f put the tomatoes on a baking tray and drizzle with some of the oil. Season and roast for 20 minutes and then remove. Drain and rinse the beans. Fry the chorizo in a non-stick pan until crisp, then drain on kitchen paper. Wipe the pan clean and add the olive oil, onion and seasoning. Cook for 5 minutes, then add the vinegar and reduce by half. Add the honey and whisk to emulsify. Pour the warm dressing over the beans and mix. Add the chorizo, tomatoes and salad leaves and mix again. Divide between 2 plates. ; name: pepper jack potatoes ; ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, monterey jack pepper cheese, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, onion, diced pimentos, salt, fresh breadcrumb, margarine, french-fried onions ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In large bowl, combine all ingredients except breadcrumbs, butter and french fried onions. Mix well. Spread into ungreased 2-quart casserole dish. Toss bread crumbs with butter. Sprinkle over casserole. Bake at 350f for 30-45 minutes or until bread crumbs are golden and mixture is bubbly. Sprinkle french fried onions over casserole. Bake 5 minutes longer or until onions are golden. Will keep in a warm oven, covered. ; name: sonora scramble ; ingredients: onion, sweet green pepper, butter, tomatoes, eggs, monterey jack cheese, flour tortillas, salsa ; preparation:Cook the onion and pepper in a skillet in the butter until the onion is translucent. Add tomatoes. Simmer 5 minutes. Add the eggs. Cook like scrambled eggs. When cooked sprinkle the cheese over the eggs and allow it to melt. Serve warm with hot tortillas and salsa. ; name: broccoli salad with gouda ; ingredients: broccoli florets, red onion, grape tomatoes, slivered almonds, gouda cheese, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, sugar, black pepper, salt ; preparation:Cook broccoli in boiling salted water for 1 minute. Drain well. Rinse with cold water. Drain well agin. Combine the broccoli with onion, tomatoes, nuts and cheese. In a small bowl, whisk together oil, vinegar, sugar, pepper and salt. Pour over salad mixture and toss to coat. ; name: vera cruz tomatoes ; ingredients: bacon, diced onion, fresh spinach, sour cream, hot pepper sauce, tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Cut tops off tomatoes and scoop out centers, leaving tomato bowls. Sprinkle salt inside tomato to draw out some moisture, set aside. Cook the bacon till crisp in a frying pan. Drain. Reserving 2 tablespoons of the drippings. Crumble the bacon, set aside. Cook onion in drippings, stir in fresh spinach. Cover and cook till tender about 3-5 minute remove from heat. Stir in sour cream, pepper sauce, and bacon. Pour any juice out of tomato bowls, fill with spinach mixture. Bake in pan at 375 for 20-25 minute. Top with cheese and heat till cheese melts and is bubbly. ; name: chilean onion relish ; ingredients: onion, ice water, red wine vinegar, coarse salt, tomatoes, fresh ground black pepper, cayenne pepper, vegetable oil, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Place the onion in a bowl with ice water to cover. Let stand for 30 minutes, then drain well in a colander and blot dry with a paper towel. Combine the vinegar and salt in a bowl and stir or whisk until the salt crystals are dissolved. Add the onion, tomato, pepper, cayenne, oil, and cilantro and gently toss to mix. Correct the seasoning, adding salt, vinegar, or cayenne. The relish should be highly seasoned. The relish is good now. It will be amazing if you let it stand to ripen for a few hours before serving. Serve the relish the same day you make it. 2 cups is enough to serve 4 to 6. ; name: spinach torttellini soup ; ingredients: onion, garlic, olive oil, reduced-sodium chicken broth, water, sugar, salt, pepper, refrigerated cheese tortellini, diced tomatoes ; preparation:In a large saucepan, saute onion, and garlic in oil until tender. Add the broth, water, sugar, salt, and pepper, and bring to a boil. Add tortellini, cook 7-9 minutes or unttil tender, stirring occasionally. Reduce heat, stir in tomatoes, and spinach, and heat through. Just before serving, sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: old mexico spinach cheese dip ; ingredients: onion, vegetable oil, whole canned tomatoes, diced green chilies, frozen chopped spinach, monterey jack cheese, cream cheese, half-and-half cream, red wine vinegar, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: hashbrown breakfast skillet ; ingredients: potatoes, breakfast sausage, eggs, diced onion, cherry tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, hot sauce, salt ; preparation:In a large skillet add the sausage and cook until most of it is brown. Drain and return to pan. Add the grated potatoes, onion, and salt to the skillet. Cook on medium heat until the hashbrowns are golden brown. Push the mixture to one side of the pan and scramble the eggs in the empty space. Once cooked, stir them into the hashbrowns. Add the hot sauce, tomatoes, and cheese. Stir well and serve immediately. ; name: easy breakfast souffle ; ingredients: whole wheat bread, eggs, milk, cheese, dry mustard, cooked sausage, salt, pepper ; preparation:Layer bread cubes in a greased 9x13 pan, followed by a mixture of cheese, beaten eggs, milk, sausage, and seasonings. Set overnight in refrigerator. Start in a cool oven. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: nif s spanish omelette omelet for 2 ; ingredients: olive oil, chorizo sausage, eggs, milk, baking powder, fresh spinach, hard cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in a large nonstick frying pan over medium heat. Add chorizo and saute for about 2 minutes, just until a little browned. Remove sausage and place on a paper towel. Meanwhile, whisk together eggs, milk and baking powder. When sausage is removed from pan, add egg mixture. Sprinkle with sausage and spinach. Top with grated cheese. Cover pan with lid and turn heat down to medium-low. Check after about 3 minutes and see if omelette has set - the middle should not jiggle. Add salt and pepper to taste. ; name: bacon cheese snacks ; ingredients: bacon, cheese, garlic powder, sugar, onions, miracle whip, celery salt, miniature party rye rounds ; preparation:Fry bacon and crumble fine. Add remaining ingredients except rye bread. Mix well. Spread on party rye. Broil until hot. ; name: fried potato patties ; ingredients: potatoes, mozzarella cheese, egg, salt, garlic powder, onion powder, black pepper, breadcrumbs, vegetable oil ; preparation:Combine first 7 ingredients. Chill. Shape mixture into 6 patties. Dip each patty into lightly beaten egg then lightly coat with breadcrumbs. Heat vegetable oil and fry over medium heat until lightly browned, turning once. ; name: corn sausage casserole ; ingredients: sausage, corn, milk, egg, saltine crackers, tater tots, salt, pepper ; preparation:Brown the sausage & drain. To the sausage, stir in the corn. Crumble the saltines by hand and add them. Whisk the egg with milk and stir into the sausage mixture. Add salt & pepper to taste. Pour into a baking dish & top with tater tots. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes, until the tater tots are nice & golden brown. ; name: baked cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: bread, butter, mustard, velveeta cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Butter both sides of bread. Lay 8 slices in a 9x13 inch pan. Spread mustard on top. Cover each slice with velveeta cheese. Cover with remaining bread slices. In seperate bowl mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Mix well. Pour over bread and place in refrigerator overnight, or for at least 6 hours. Bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. Cut into serving size pieces and serve hot. ; name: the old barn inn breakfast brunch quiche ; ingredients: breakfast sausage, egg, cheese, salt, pepper, garlic powder, crescent rolls, milk ; preparation:

name: nikki s health cookies ; ingredients: bananas, vanilla extract, coconut oil, rolled oats, almond meal, coconut, cinnamon, sea salt, baking powder, dark chocolate bars ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl combine bananas, vanilla and coconut oil. In another bowl wisk oats, almond meal, coconut, cinnamon, salt and baking powder. Add dry ingredients to wet ones. Fold in chocolate chunks. Drop small dollops on parchment or silpat lined baking sheet. Bake 14-18 minutes, as long as possible without burning. ; name: rice with coconut milk ; ingredients: jasmine rice, coconut cream, sugar, salt, coconut milk ; preparation:Rinse rice in several changes of water. Drain, discard water and set aside. In a medium pot, over medium heat, bring coconut cream to a boil. Add rice, sugar and salt. Add coconut milk and return to a boil. Cook, partially covered, stirring occasionally, about 3 minutes. Reduce heat to low and simmer, covered, stirring occasionally, 15 to 20 minutes, or until all the liquid has been absorbed and the rice has fluffed. ; name: cocochoconananut bread ; ingredients: bananas, sweetened coconut, pecans, chocolate chips, light rum, eggs, vegetable oil, flour, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine banana, coconut, nuts, chocolate, eggs, rum and oil in a bowl until smooth. Sift in flour, baking powder and salt. Stir just enough to combine. Bake in buttered loaf pan or baking dish for 50 minutes or until you can put a tooth pick in and out of it with out extracting batter. Remove from oven, flip pan upside down onto a tea towel. Remove pan and let bread cool for at least 10 minutes. I used a porcelain dish so metal pans will probably have a lower bake time. ; name: my mum s rice pudding brulee ; ingredients: pudding rice, milk, vanilla extract, butter, caster sugar, egg yolks ; preparation:Put rice in small pan and cover with boiling water and cook for 4 minutes. Drain and rinse under the hot tap. Put milk in pan with the vanilla and bring to the boil. Put rice and milk into a covered casserole dish and bake in a moderate oven for 30 minutes. Cream butter and sugar until smooth and creamy, add egg yolks and beat. Take rice out of oven, and turn oven down a fraction. Add egg mix mixture to the rice and beat together with a fork. Butter a souffle dish, pour in rice mixture and set in a pan of hot water in the oven and cook for a further 40 minutes. Remove and cool. When quite cold, cover top generously with caster sugar and put under a very hot grill until sugar turns golden brown. Chill and serve with thin cream. ; name: coconut cilantro rice with peas and cashews ; ingredients: shredded coconut, canola oil, jasmine rice, low sodium chicken broth, coconut milk, cilantro leaf, cashews, frozen peas, salt ; preparation:In a large stock pot, over medium-high heat, add the coconut and lightly toast. Remove to a small bowl and set aside. In the same pot, add the oil and the rice and saute until the rice is just starting to brown, about 6 to 8 minutes. Add the chicken stock and the coconut milk and stir to combine. Reduce the heat to a low simmer, cover and cook for 15 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in the cilantro, cashews and peas. Season with salt and transfer to a serving bowl. Garnish with the toasted coconut and serve. ; name: old fashioned rice pudding ; ingredients: milk, salt, sugar, butter, vanilla, eggs, brandy, cooked long-grain rice, fresh lemon juice, cinnamon ; preparation:Mix all ingredients except the rice and lemon juice and cinnamon. Mix them well and then add the rice and lemon juice. Sprinkle a bit of cinnamon on top. Place in a 8 x 10-inch baking dish and bake at 325 degrees for 50 minutes, or until it is lightly brown and the custard is set. Test with a table knife. Stick it in the center of the dish, and if it comes out clean the dish is baked. This can be served with maple syrup as was done in earlier times or milk will be enjoyed also. ; name: grand marnier rice pudding ; ingredients: milk, arborio rice, sugar, salt, egg, grand marnier, butter, vanilla ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, bring milk, sugar, rice and salt to a boil, stirring frequently. Reduce heat and simmer about 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Lightly beat egg in a medium bowl. Gradually stir about a fourth of the hot milk mixture into the egg. Return to pan, stirring constantly. Simmer for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until mixture is thick and rice is tender. Remove from heat. Stir in liqueur, vanilla and butter, stirring until butter melts. ; name: simple coconut rice pudding ; ingredients: cooked rice, whole milk, unsweetened coconut milk, sugar, salt, coconut extract, coconut flakes ; preparation:

name: emerils key lime pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, granulated sugar, butter, condensed milk, key lime juice, eggs, sour cream, powdered sugar, lime zest ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375 degrees f. In a bowl, mix the graham cracker crumbs, sugar, and butter with your hands. Press the mixture firmly into a 9-inch pie pan, and bake until brown, about 20 minutes. Remove from the oven and allow to cool to room temperature before filling. Lower the oven temperature to 325 degrees f. In a separate bowl, combine the condensed milk, lime juice, and eggs. Whisk until well blended and place the filling in the cooled pie shell. Bake in the oven for 15 minutes and allow to chill in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours. Once chilled, combine the sour cream and powdered sugar and spread over the top of the pie using a spatula. Sprinkle the lime zest as a garnish on top of the sour cream and serve chilled. ; name: temptation bars ; ingredients: butter, graham cracker crumbs, sweetened flaked coconut, semi-sweet chocolate chips, peanut butter chips, sweetened condensed milk, unsalted peanuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spread melted butter evenly in bottom of 9 x 13 inch pan. Evenly layer crumbs, then coconut and finally chips. Pour condensed milk over all. Sprinkle with peanuts. Bake for 25 minutes or until edges are light brown. Cool on wire rack. Chill until set and cut into bars. ; name: 7 layer cookies ; ingredients: butter, graham cracker crumbs, shredded coconut, butterscotch chips, chocolate chips, sweetened condensed milk, walnuts ; preparation:Melt 1 stick butter in a jelly roll pan. Spread in pan - 1 cup of graham cracker crumbs. 1 cup of shredded coconut. 6 oz of butterscotch chips. 6 oz. Of chocolate chips. Drizzle one can of sweet condensed milk on top. Add 1 cup of chopped walnuts on top. Bake at 350f for 30 minutes. Remove and let cool and then cut into squares. ; name: chocolate orange velvet tart ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, brown sugar, butter, heavy whipping cream, milk, turbinado sugar, orange zest, ground cinnamon, semisweet chocolate, sweetened whipped cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Combine the first 3 ingredients in a bowl. Press firmly into a lightly greased 9 inch pie plate. Bake for 11 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from oven and let cool. In a saucepan, combine the cream and next 4 ingredients. Bring to a simmer over med-low heat. Remove from heat. Add in chocolate, and stir until chocolate melts and mixture is smooth. Pour filling into baked crust. Refrigerate for 4 hours or until firm. Garnish with a dollop of whipped cream and a sprinkle of orange zest. ; name: layer bars ; ingredients: butter, graham cracker crumbs, coconut, chocolate chips, butterscotch chips, pecans, sweetened condensed milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Pour melted butter into bottom of a 9 x 13 inch pan. Sprinkle graham cracker crumbs and coconut over butter. Layer chocolate chips, butterscotch chips and nuts over crumbs and coconut. Pour condensed milk over all ingredients. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. ; name: hello dolly bars ; ingredients: butter, graham cracker crumbs, shredded coconut, semi-sweet chocolate chips, white chocolate chips, walnuts, sweetened condensed milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a 13 by 9 inch baking pan mix together butter and graham cracker crumbs. Press into bottom of pan. Sprinkle coconut, chocolate chips, and walnuts in layers evenly over crust. Drizzle sweetened condensed milk over the top. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes. Let cool completely before cutting into squares. ; name: aloha cheesecake ; ingredients: vanilla wafer crumbs, margarine, cream cheese, sugar, milk, eggs, macadamia nuts, pineapple, kiwi ; preparation:Combine crumbs and margarine. Press onto bottom of 9-inch springform pan. Bake at 350 f, 10 minutes. Combine cream cheese, sugar and milk, mixing at medium speed on electric mixer until well blended. Add eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition. Stir in nuts. Pour over crust. Bake at 350 f, 45 minutes. Loosen cake from rim of pan. Cool before removing rim of pan. Chill. Before serving, top with fruit. ; name: pumpkin cheesecake vegan ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, vegan margarine, soy cream cheese, pumpkin puree, light brown sugar, rum extract, ground cinnamon, ground allspice, ground nutmeg ; preparation:

name: bacon biscuit puffs ; ingredients: biscuits, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, onion, bacon, sugar, garlic salt, hot pepper sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Separate each biscuit into 3 pieces. Place on baking sheet. Combine the cheese, mayo, onion, bacon, sugar, garlic salt and hot pepper sauce in a medium bowl. Mix well. Place a spoonful of the mixture, spreading evenly, on each biscuit round. Bake 10 minutes or until golden. ; name: shirley mom s cheese strata ; ingredients: bread, white cheddar cheese, milk, salt, dry mustard, eggs, butter ; preparation:Butter and cube each slice of bread. Alterante cubed bread and cheese in well greased 9x13 pan. Mix the remaining ingredients together. Pour over top. Sprinkle pepper or paprika over top. Cover and refrigerate overnight. To bake, preheat oven 325 degrees. Place pan in pan of water. Bake covered for 25 minutes. Uncover and bake for 20 more minutes. ; name: baked cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: bread, butter, mustard, velveeta cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Butter both sides of bread. Lay 8 slices in a 9x13 inch pan. Spread mustard on top. Cover each slice with velveeta cheese. Cover with remaining bread slices. In seperate bowl mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Mix well. Pour over bread and place in refrigerator overnight, or for at least 6 hours. Bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. Cut into serving size pieces and serve hot. ; name: impossible garden pie ; ingredients: zucchini, tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, onion, milk, eggs, bisquick baking mix, parmesan cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees. Grease a 10 inch cake pan. In a medium bowl, combine the zucchini, tomato, mozzarella cheese and onion. Sprinkle vegetable mix into cake pan. In another bowl, beat remaining ingredients 1 minute with an electric mixer on medium speed. Pour over the vegetables in the cake pan. Bake 35-40 minutes or until a knive inserted in the center of the pie comes out clean. Cool 5 minutes. ; name: tuna fish junk ; ingredients: butter, onions, celery, bisquick, salt, milk, tuna ; preparation:Saut onion and celery in butter. Remove from heat. Blend in bisquick and salt. Add milk. Cook and stir until thick. Blend in tuna and heat through. ; name: scrambled egg cups for two ; ingredients: bread, butter, eggs, chives, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Flatten bread with a rolling pin. Spread a scant teaspoon of butter on one side of each bread slice. Press bread, buttered side down, into 4 muffin cups. Bake at 350 for 12-15 minutes. Meanwhile, in bowl, beat eggs, chives, salt, & pepper. In a skillet, melt remaining butter over medium-low heat. Add egg mixture. Cook & stir until eggs are completely set. Spoon into bread cups. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 1-2 minutes longer, until cheese is melted. ; name: biscuit topped chicken casserole ; ingredients: butter, flour, chicken broth, cooked chicken, frozen peas, carrots, onion, salt, biscuit dough ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. In a saucepan over medium heat, melt the butter. Add flour and stir thoroughly. Add chicken broth and cook until thickened. To the saucepan, add chicken, peas, carrots, onion and salt. Heat to boiling. Pour into a 1. 5 liter casserole. Top with uncooked biscuits. Bake at 425 8-10 minutes or until the biscuits are done. ; name: supper time cheese bread ; ingredients: eggs, water, biscuit mix, onions, cheddar cheese, salt, cayenne ; preparation:

name: pork chops with tangy creole mustard pineapple sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, pork chops, salt, pepper, chicken broth, pineapple preserves, creole mustard, cider vinegar, tabasco sauce, light brown sugar ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium heat, heat the olive oil. Sprinkle pork chops with salt and pepper and add to the skillet. Cook the chops, turning, until well browned. Add the chicken broth. Cover and continue cooking for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, combine remaining ingredients. Add the sauce to the pork chops, turning to coat well. Cook the chops, uncovered, for 15 minutes longer, turning occasionally. ; name: maple thyme mustard salmon ; ingredients: pure maple syrup, dijon mustard, fresh thyme, garlic clove, fresh ground black pepper, boneless atlantic salmon fillet, baby spinach, extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a shallow glass dish, whisk maple syrup, mustard, thyme, garlic and pepper together. Place salmon fillets in dish and turn to coat. Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes or up to 8 hours. Place salmon on parchment paper lined baking sheet and spoon some of remaining marinade over top. Roast in 425f oven for about 15 minutes or until fish flakes when tested with fork. In large bowl, toss spinach with oil, salt & pepper, and divide among 4 plates. Top with salmon and serve. ; name: mesquite grilled pork chops ; ingredients: pork loin chops with bone, extra virgin olive oil, worcestershire sauce, cracked black pepper, chili powder, garlic powder, kosher salt, ground cumin, ground cinnamon, mesquite wood chips ; preparation:Place mesquite chips in water and let soak for at least 30 minutes. Set pork chops out at room temperature for 30 to 45 minutes before grilling. Combine all paste ingredients. Spread paste mixture on pork chops covering all sides completely using all of the mixture. Drain mesquite chips and place in a small disposable aluminum foil pan. Preheat gas grill on high until hot using both burners. Lift up grate on one side and place aluminum foil pan directly on fire. Sear the pork chops over direct heat for about 6 minutes turning once halfway through searing time. Turn fire down to medium heat under aluminum foil pan hodling mesquite chips and turn off fire on the other burner. Place pork chops on grill side with no heat. Continue to cook with lid closed over indirect medium heat until juices run clear and internal temperature reaches 160 degrees, about 25 minutes. Remove from grill, cover with foil and let rest for 5 minutes. ; name: spicy beer brined rotisserie pork loin ; ingredients: boneless pork loin, beer, dark corn syrup, green onions, prepared mustard, vegetable oil, chili powder, fresh garlic, black pepper ; preparation:Place the pork loin roast in a heavy large plastic ziploc bag. In a bowl whisk together beer, corn syrup, onions, mustard, chili powder, garlic and black pepper. Pour the marinade over the pork. Seal the bag tightly and turn to coat the meat. Place the bag in a large bowl and place in the refrigerator for 8-24 hours. When ready to cook prepare the rotisserie. Remove the roast from the marinade and bring to almost room temperature before cooking. Place the pork on the spit then set over heat and baste every 10-15 minutes or the internal temperature reads 155-160f. Discard any remaining marinade. Remove the roast from the spit and let rest for 15 minutes before slicing. ; name: pork chops with raspberry glaze ; ingredients: butter, boneless pork chops, seedless raspberry jam, raspberry vinegar, grey poupon dijon mustard, orange zest ; preparation:Melt butter in large skillet over medium high heat. Add pork chops and cook 5 to 7 minutes on each side, or until browned. Mix jam, vinegar, mustard and orange zest in small bowl. Spoon evenly over pork chops. Lower heat and simmer uncovered until sauce is reduced to glaze consistency and chops are cooked through, approx 5-7 minutes. Turn chops occasionally. Spoon small amount of sauce onto center of each plate. Slice chops in thin slices. Place chops on top of sauce on plate in a fan shape. Drizzle with remaining sauce. ; name: spicy maple chicken wings ; ingredients: maple syrup, chili sauce, onion, cider vinegar, grainy mustard, worcestershire sauce, chicken wings ; preparation:Combine the maple syrup, chili sauce, onion, cider vinegar, mustard and worcestershire sauce. Pour over chicken wings and allow to marinate for 2 hours, turning occasionally to keep coated. Preheat oven to 400f transfer wings and their marinade into roasting tin. Cook for 45 minutes, basting occasionally until sticky. Serve hot or cold with salad. ; name: grilled orange maple mustard pork chops bbq ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, dijon-style mustard, maple syrup, green onions, orange rind, pepper ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium. Trim fat from chops if necessary and season with pepper. In a small bowl, stir together mustard, syrup, onion and orange peel. Set aside. Grill chops 12-15 minutes until done. Turn once and brush with the sauce mixture during the last 5 minutes of grilling. ; name: maple baked pork chops ; ingredients: pure maple syrup, dijon mustard, molasses, cider vinegar, ground cumin, salt and pepper, center-cut pork chops ; preparation:

name: chocolate dipped kettle chips rachael ray ; ingredients: dark chocolate, vegetable oil, potato chips, pistachios, salt, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Line 2 cookie sheets with wax paper. In a small bowl, break up chocolate, microwave chocolate and oil on high power, stirring every 30 seconds until smooth. Set a rack over the cookie sheets lined with wax paper. Working with one chip at a time, dip the chips into the hot chocolate and set on the rack. Sprinkle chopped pistachios over one-third of chips. Sprinkle coarse salt over one third. Sprinkle cayenne pepper over one third. Refrigerate for 30 minutes before serving. ; name: sweet potato casserole iii ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla extract, milk, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, pecans ; preparation:Combine sweet potatoes, sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla and milk. Mix well. Spoon into a 2 quart casserole. Combine topping ingredients and sprinkle over sweet potatoes. Casserole can be refrigerated at this point for up to 2 days. Bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes or until heated through. Makes 8 sinful servings. ; name: bourbon brown sugar sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, brown sugar, bourbon, butter, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Cube sweet potatoes and boil in water until soft. Add brown sugar, bourbon, butter and mash well. Add cinnamon, nutmeg, and vanilla. Mix all ingredients well. If you want to add more cinnamon and not so much bourbon, for example, feel free. ; name: ruth s chris sweet potato casserole ; ingredients: brown sugar, flour, nuts, butter, mashed sweet potatoes, sugar, salt, vanilla, eggs ; preparation:Combine brown sugar, flour, nuts and butter in mixing bowl. Set aside. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine sweet potatoes, sugar, salt, vanilla, eggs and butter in a mixing bowl in the order listed. Mix thoroughly. Pour mixture into buttered baking dish. Sprinkle the surface of the sweet potato mixture evenly with the crust mixture. Bake for 30 minutes. Allow to set at least 30 minutes before serving. ; name: candied sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, brown sugar, orange zest, vanilla, cinnamon, salt, nutmeg ; preparation:Peel potatoes and cut into chunks. Place potatoes in 13x9 baking pan. In lg saucepan combine remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Boil for 2 minutes. Pour over potatoes. Cover and bake for 45 minutes. ; name: double layer coffee almond fudge ; ingredients: dark chocolate, condensed milk, instant coffee, cinnamon, salt, almonds, vanilla, white chocolate, sliced almonds ; preparation:Place first 5 ingredients in container and microwave on high for 1 minute, stir till smooth, it may need a further 30 seconds. Stir in chopped almonds and vanilla and pour into a foil lined 5 x 8 inch rectangular pan, place in fridge to set whilst you prepare the top layer. Place white chocolate and second lot of condensed milk in micro container and micro for 30 seconds, stir and remicro for a further 15 seconds if needed till smooth. Add flaked almonds and stir, then pour over top of dark chocolate fudge layer patting down till smooth. Place in fridge to set. ; name: so easy homemade truffles ; ingredients: semisweet chocolate, cream cheese, powdered sugar, vanilla, ground nuts ; preparation:Melt chocolate in microwave on med. Power. Stir occasionally. Set aside. Beat cream cheese until smooth. Gradually add sugar, beating until well blended. Add melted chocolate and vanilla, mix well. Refrigerate for 1 hour. Roll into 1 inch balls. Roll in nuts or coconut. Store in refrigerator. ; name: needhams ; ingredients: potatoes, shredded coconut, almonds, vanilla, powdered sugar, dark chocolate ; preparation:

name: glorious chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, margarine, water, ritz cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, mushrooms ; preparation:Roll chicken breasts first in the margarine, then in the crumb mixture. Place in a 9x13 pan sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Mix soup, mushrooms, water, and sour cream. Pour this mixture over the chicken. Sprinkle with remaining crumbs and drizzle on any leftover margarine. Bake at 350 for one hour or until done. ; name: diamond chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, swiss cheese, seasoning salt, seasoned stuffing mix, cream of chicken soup, white wine ; preparation:Place chicken breasts in an 8x8-inch pan. Lay swiss cheese over each breast. Sprinkle with seasoned salt. Mix soup with wine, pour over chicken. Sprinkle with stuffing mix. Bake at 350f for 1 hour. ; name: celebration chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, poultry seasoning, american cheese, cream of celery soup, sour cream, chicken flavor stuffing mix, butter ; preparation:Place chicken in sprayed crock pot. Sprinkle each breast with seasoning. Place a slice of cheese on each. Combine soup and sour cream in a saucepan and heat through enough to be well blended. Spoon over chicken. Sprinkle stuffing mix on top. Drizzle melted butter evenly over stuffing. Cover and cook on low for 5-6 hours. ; name: crunchy chicken cheese bake ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, swiss cheese, cream of chicken soup, tomatoes, margarine, herb seasoned stuffing mix, cooked rice ; preparation:In 3 quart oblong baking dish, place chicken, top with cheese. Stir soup and spread over cheese. Top with tomato. Combine margarine and stuffing, sprinkle over tomato. Bake at 375f for 25 minutes or until chicken is done and sauce is bubbly and stuffing is browned. Serve over rice. ; name: jalapeos cream cheese chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, soft cream cheese, fresh jalapenos, lipton onion soup mix, onion, dry breadcrumbs, garlic powder, cooking spray ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Butterfly chicken breasts to as even a thickness as possible. Sprinkle both sides of chicken with garlic powder to your taste. Cut jalapeos in half and remove seeds and membranes, then dice. Dice onion. Combine cream cheese, diced onion, jalapeos and soup-mix together well. Spray baking pan with cooking spray. Place each chicken breast out flat on pan. Spread cream cheese mixture equally on each chicken breast. Top each breast equally with bread crumbs. Place in oven for 40-45 minutes. Check halfway through cooking time and cover with foil if needed. ; name: vanita s mexican chicken breast ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, evaporated milk, taco seasoning mix, cream of celery soup, cream of chicken soup, green chilies, cheddar cheese, tortilla chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Line bottom of a 9x13 pan. Put raw chicken breast on top of tortilla chips. Mix soups, milk, taco seasoning, and chilies. Pour over chicken in pan. Sprinkle with cheddar cheese on top of soup mixture. Bake at 350 for 40-50 minutes. ; name: curried chicken florentine ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, mild cheddar cheese, frozen spinach, lemons, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, mayonnaise, curry powder, butter, oil ; preparation:Squeeze juice from one lemon over chicken breasts and let sit for 15- 20 minutes at room temp. Heat butter and oil in a large skillet. Salt and pepper chicken breasts and cook in hot oil until lightly browned. Put spinach into bottom of a 9 x 13 casserole. Sprinkle shredded cheese on top of spinach. Place browned chicken breasts on top of cheese. Mix soup, sour cream, mayo, juice from second lemon, and curry powder. Pour over chicken breasts. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 45 minutes. Serve with rice. ; name: chicken and cheese crescent rolls ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, cheddar cheese, cream of chicken soup, whole milk, crescent rolls ; preparation:

name: crustless crab quiche ; ingredients: onion, butter, salt, parmesan cheese, crab, feta cheese, eggs, milk ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Saut onions in butter until caramelized. Add salt to taste. Beat eggs and milk together in small bowl. Sprinkle parmesan in bottom of well greased muffin trays or pie dish. Layer onions, then crab, then feta cheese. Pour egg mix over top. Cook 20 minute. Let cool 8-10 minutes. If it is sticking, scrape the edges with a knife to help release. ; name: italian spaghetti frittata ; ingredients: spaghetti, parmesan cheese, butter, fresh parsley, eggs, salt & pepper ; preparation:Drain the spaghetti and stir in the cheese, 3 tbsp butter and the parsley. Let it cool slightly. Add salt& pepper to the beaten eggs. In a large non stick skillet heat remaining butter, over medium heat until foaming but not brown pour in the spagetti mixture and spread evenly. Cook for 4-5 minutes until the bottom is brown. Loosen with a spatula and invert onto a plate. Slide the frittata back into the pan and cook the other side until golden 3-4 minutes. ; name: green bean and parmesan soup ; ingredients: butter, green beans, garlic clove, vegetable stock, parmesan cheese, light cream, salt, black pepper, parsley ; preparation:Melt butter in a medium saucepan and add the green beans and garlic cooking for 2-3 minutes over medium heat, stirring frequently. Stir in the stock and season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Lower heat and simmer, uncovered, for 10-15 minutes until beans are tender. Pour soup into a food processor and process until smooth. Return to pan and reheat slowly. Stir in parmesan cheese and cream and sprinkle with parsley. ; name: semolina s chicken cordon bleu pasta ; ingredients: chicken breasts, ham, vegetable oil, garlic, parsley, penne rigate, fontina cheese, parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, alfredo sauce ; preparation:Brown chicken. Add ham, garlic and parsley. Add alfredo sauce. Heat and toss with pasta. Put in casserole. Top with bread crumbs, parmesan, and fontina. Place under broiler and brown. ; name: best cream of broccoli soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, garlic clove, celery, chicken broth, broccoli, flour, milk, pepper, velveeta cheese ; preparation:Melt 2 tablespoons butter in medium sized stock pot, and saut onion, garlic and celery until tender. Add broccoli and broth. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Pure soup or mash with potato masher. Return to heat. In small saucepan, over medium heat melt 3 tablespoons butter, stir in flour and add milk. Stir until thick and bubbly, add to soup. Add cheese. Stir until melted. Season with pepper and serve. ; name: spaghettini verdi ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, garlic cloves, italian parsley, spaghettini, ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, salt ; preparation:Heat butter and oil in a saucepan. Saute crushed garlic until golden. Discard garlic. Stir in the parsley and simmer 4 minutes. Cook the pasta according to package directions. Drain well. Place in a large bowl. Add pepper, parmesan cheese, and salt, and toss well. Add the parsley sauce and toss again. Serve immediately. ; name: halloumi and corn casserole ; ingredients: butter, light cream, cream cheese, halloumi cheese, sweetcorn, green onions, flat leaf parsley, garlic clove, nutmeg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Spread the butter over the bottom and sides of a casserole dish. Warm the milk in a heavy-bottomed saucepan over medium heat. Stirring constantly with a wooden spoon, add the cream cheese and stir until it melts. Turn off the heat and add half of the grated cheese and the corn. Stir for a minute. Stir in the scallions, parsley, garlic, the nutmeg and salt and pepper to taste. Pour the mixture into the buttered casserole dish and sprinkle the top with the remaining cheese. Bake about 30 minutes or until the mixture is hot and bubbly and the cheese topping has melted and is just starting to turn golden. ; name: pasta with courgette and walnut sauce ; ingredients: butter, onion, courgettes, pasta, walnuts, parsley, cream, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: banana coconut cream pie smoothie ; ingredients: light coconut milk, pineapple juice, vanilla, sugar, ground nutmeg, ice cubes, bananas, sweetened coconut, whipped cream ; preparation:Place coconut milk, pineapple juice, vanilla, sugar, nutmeg, ice cubes, and frozen banana pieces in a blender. Blend on high until mixture is frothy and ice cubes are finely ground, about 30 seconds to 1 minute. Pour into 4 glasses. Garnish with whipped cream and sprinkle on a little toasted coconut if desired. For vegan omit whipped cream. ; name: chocolate banana bread puddings ; ingredients: unsalted butter, brown sugar, bananas, milk, eggs, pure vanilla extract, white bread, milk chocolate candy bars ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350. Line 12 muffin tins with paper or foil liners. In a nonstick skillet, melt the butter with the brown sugar over moderately high heat. Add the banana slices and cook, turning once, until caramelized, about 3 minutes. The bananas shold be softened and sticky. Remove from the heat and let cool. In a large bowl, whisk together the milk, eggs, and vanilla. Stack the toasted bread, slice off the crusts and cut the bread into 4 triangles. Add the bread to the custard and let soack unti the custard is absorbed, about 10 minutes. Stir in the cooled caramelized bananas and the chocolate. Spoon the mixture into the prepared muffin cups. Bake the puddings until puffy and golden, about 25 minutes. ; name: upside down banana walnut french toast ; ingredients: brown sugar, butter, corn syrup, walnuts, bananas, cinnamon-swirl bread, eggs, milk, vanilla ; preparation:Spray bottom and sides of a 13x9x2-inch glass baking dish with cooking spray or grease with shortening. In a large bowl, stir together first four ingredients then gently stir in the bananas. Spoon this mixture into the baking dish. Reserving heels of bread for another use arrange 2 layers of bread on banana mixture, tearing bread to fit if needed. In a medium-size bowl, beat eggs, milk and vanilla until well mixed. Pour over bread. Cover tightly and refrigerate at least 1 hour but no longer than 24 hours. Heat oven to 325. Uncover casserole and bake 45-50 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Serve portions upside-down, spooning sauce from bottom of dish over each serving. ; name: elizabeth david s perfect chocolate cake flourless ; ingredients: dark chocolate, caster sugar, butter, ground almonds, eggs, icing sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Melt chocolate, sugar & butter in a double boiler of your invention. Remove from the heat and stir thoroughly to combine. Mix in the almonds, then beat in egg yolks one by one. Beat the whites to stif peaks then fold those in also. It helps to mix in about a quarter of the egg to the mix first to lighten it, then fold in the remainder. Turn into a greased and floured cake tin - 20cm round or square. Bake for 40-50 minutes. Cool in the tin before placing on a wire rack and dust with icing sugar to serve to assembled amazed guests. ; name: mocha java my way ; ingredients: strong coffee, semisweet chocolate pieces, sugar, half-and-half ; preparation:In a small saucepan combine coffee, chocolate pieces, and sugar. Cook and stir over medium heat for 2 to 3 minutes or until chocolate is melted and sugar is dissolved. In another small saucepan heat half-and-half or light cream until steaming, stirring occasionally. Pour coffee mixture into a mug. Add warm half-and-half. If desired, stir in additional sugar to taste. Makes 1 serving. ; name: karen s tiramisu ; ingredients: eggs, cream cheese, sugar, ladyfingers, strong black coffee, coffee liqueur, cocoa ; preparation:Make the tiramisu at least one day before it is needed and store covered in the fridge. Beat the egg yolks with the sugar until light, then beat in the cheese, beating until smooth. Whisk the whites until stiff but not dry, and then fold these into the mixture. The whites will lose most of their volume and the finished result will be a softer cream rather than a mousse. Mix your chosen spirit with the coffee. Dip the biscuits one at a time into the coffee and arrange half of them in a single layer in a serving dish. Spread half of the cream mixture over them. Now continue with the remaining fingers, pouring on any leftover coffee. Spread the second half of the cream over the top and sprinkle liberally with cocoa powder. Cover and store in the fridge for at least 24 hours. ; name: celestial peach sundae ; ingredients: vanilla ice cream, peaches, light corn syrup, brown sugar, butter, walnuts, candied ginger ; preparation:Place the ice cream in four dessert cups. Place in freezer. Combine corn syrup, brown sugar, butter, walnuts and ginger if using in pot and bring to a boil. Cook rapidly for 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Top ice cream with 2 peach halves. May be fresh or canned peaches. Spoon walnut sauce over each. Sprinkle with a little chopped candied ginger if desired. ; name: frozen coffee smoothie ; ingredients: strong coffee, brown sugar, vanilla bean, bananas, blanched almonds, ice cubes ; preparation:

name: turkey and cabbage casserole ; ingredients: ground turkey, onion, rice, tomato soup, water, stewed tomatoes, cabbage, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease covered casserole dish. Cut cabbage into large pieces and place in casserole dish. Brown turkey and onion. Add rice to turkey and stir. Salt and pepper to taste. Put turkey mixture over cabbage. Add tomato soup, water, and stewed tomatoes. Bake for 30 to 45 minutes until rice and cabbage are tender. ; name: goulash heart healthy version ; ingredients: ground turkey, whole wheat elbow macaroni, onion, light cheese whiz, garlic powder, diced tomatoes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook macaroni until al dente, drain and reserve. Brown ground turkey. Add onion and garlic powder, cook until onion is translucent. Add tin of tomatoes, with their juices. Return cooked macaroni to pot, heat through. Add cheez whiz, stir until melted. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. ; name: meatloaf simple and delicious ; ingredients: ground beef, onion roasted garlic soup mix, ketchup, eggs, oatmeal, brown sugar, mustard ; preparation:Mix the ground beef, soup mix, ketchup, eggs and oatmeal together. Spray a 9x13 pan with cooking spray. Press the meatloaf into the pan. Mix the ketchup, brown sugar and mustard together and spread over the meatloaf. Bake at 350 for about 50 minutes. ; name: low fat turkey in the garden meatloaf ; ingredients: ground turkey, frozen chopped spinach, quick oats, onion, carrot, nonfat milk, egg whites, italian herb seasoning, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Combine in a large mixing bowl the turkey or beef, the spinach, which has been squeezed to drain, the oats, onion, carrots, egg, milk, herbs, salt and pepper. Use a three-tined kitchen granny fork or wooden mixing fork to blend the meat ingredients. Pat into a 9x5-inch loaf pan that has been sprayed with a no-stick oil product, or shape into a loaf and place in the middle of a 13x9-inch baking pan. Bake 1 hour or until a thermometer registers 170 degrees and the center is no longer pink. If substituting beef for turkey, bake 50 to 55 minutes and thermometer should register 160 degrees internal temperature. Let loaf stand out of the oven for 5 minutes before slicing. ; name: asian turkey burger ; ingredients: lean ground turkey, applesauce, hoisin sauce, soy sauce, toasted sesame oil, gingerroot, garlic cloves, salt & freshly ground black pepper, scallions ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the turkey, applesauce, hoisin and soy sauces, sesame oil, ginger, garlic, scallions and salt and pepper to taste. Form the meat into 6 patties. Lightly brush a grill pan or skillet with the sesame oil and place over medium-high heat. Add the patties and fry until golden, about 4 minutes. Turn and cook until the other side is golden and the turkey is cooked through, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a bun. Serve immediately. ; name: ground beef casserole with biscuits ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, cream cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, catsup, salt, biscuits ; preparation:Brown meat and onions. Drain fat. Combine cream cheese, soup, milk, catsup and salt. Add meat and onions. Mix well. Bake uncovered at 375 for 10 minutes. Put 1 can biscuits on top and bake 15-20 minutes longer or until biscuits are brown on top. ; name: bacon pasta ; ingredients: bacon, fresh mushrooms, garlic cloves, penne pasta, parmesan cheese, heavy cream, pepper, green onion ; preparation:Cook bacon until crisp, drain on paper towel and crumble. Reserve 2 tablespoons drippings. Saute mushrooms and garlic in bacon drippings until tender. Stir in cooked pasta, parmesan cheese, heavy cream and pepper. Simmer over low-med heat until sauce is thickened. Remove from heat. Stir in bacon and green onions. Serve hot. ; name: hearty turkey meatloaf ; ingredients: ground turkey, cream of mushroom soup, eggs, oats, minced garlic cloves, onion ; preparation:

name: crock pot southwestern chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, corn, black beans, mexican-style corn, chunky salsa, flour tortilla, cheddar cheese, cooked rice ; preparation:Combine the corn, beans, and half of the salsa in a lightly greased crock pot. Top with the chicken. Pour remaining salsa over chicken. Cover and cook first hour on high, then three more hours on high or 6 hours on low. Serve with warm tortillas and cheese or over rice. ; name: ground turkey stew ; ingredients: lean ground turkey, potatoes, carrot, celery, onions, frozen corn, chicken broth, bay leaves, thyme, salt and pepper ; preparation:Saute ground turkey in stock pot. Add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 45 minutes - 1 hour. Salt and pepper to taste. Serve. ; name: spicy cheeseburger nachos ; ingredients: lean ground beef, garlic, velveeta mexican cheese, rotel tomatoes, green onion, tortilla chips ; preparation:In a big non-stick skillet, cook the ground beef and garlic until the beef is no longer pink, stir frequently. Drain. In a 4-quart slow cooker, add the ground beef mixture, cheese, and tomatoes. Stir to mix. Cover and cook on low for 3-4 hours or until the cheese is melted and mixture is well heated. Stir after 2 hours. Add in the onions, stir to combine. Serve with tortilla chips. ; name: beefed up black bean soup ; ingredients: lean ground beef, black bean soup, black beans, water, salsa, green onion, sour cream ; preparation:Cook beef in 3 quart saucepan until no longer pink. Drain. Stir in soup, beans, water and salsa. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer, uncovered, for 15 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in green onions. Garnish with sour cream. ; name: mini turkey loaves ; ingredients: ground turkey, apple, onion, old fashioned oats, dijon-style mustard, dried rosemary, poultry seasoning, salt, cranberry sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Grease 12 muffin cups. Combine turkey, apple, onion, oats, mustard, rosemary, poultry seasoning and salt in large bowl. Press into prepared muffin cups and bake 20 minutes or until lightly browned and no longer pink in center. Top with cranberry sauce. ; name: low fat turkey in the garden meatloaf ; ingredients: ground turkey, frozen chopped spinach, quick oats, onion, carrot, nonfat milk, egg whites, italian herb seasoning, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Combine in a large mixing bowl the turkey or beef, the spinach, which has been squeezed to drain, the oats, onion, carrots, egg, milk, herbs, salt and pepper. Use a three-tined kitchen granny fork or wooden mixing fork to blend the meat ingredients. Pat into a 9x5-inch loaf pan that has been sprayed with a no-stick oil product, or shape into a loaf and place in the middle of a 13x9-inch baking pan. Bake 1 hour or until a thermometer registers 170 degrees and the center is no longer pink. If substituting beef for turkey, bake 50 to 55 minutes and thermometer should register 160 degrees internal temperature. Let loaf stand out of the oven for 5 minutes before slicing. ; name: chicken and rice chili ; ingredients: spanish rice mix, water, cooked chicken, kidney beans, tomatoes, green bell pepper, chili powder, ground cumin ; preparation:In a 3-quart saucepan, combine rice mix, special seasonings, water, chicken, beans, tomatoes, green pepper, chili powder and cumin. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Simmer uncovered, about 20 minutes or until rice is tender, stirring occasionally. Top with cheese, sour cream and cilantro if desired. ; name: 1 2 3 ground turkey mexican rice ; ingredients: mexican rice, black beans, mexicorn, lean ground turkey ; preparation:

name: easy creamy vegetable soup ; ingredients: onion, carrot, celery, water, vegetables, salt, pepper, chicken broth, half-and-half ; preparation:Simmer onion, carrot and celery in water for 10 minutes or until vegetables are tender. In a blender or food processor. Puree all vegetables. Add salt, pepper, chicken broth and cream. Heat before serving, but do not boil. ; name: chilly day chicken soup stew ; ingredients: butter, potatoes, onion, carrots, chicken broth, pasta, instant rice, chicken meat, salt & pepper ; preparation:Boil fast in a little water add margarine, potatoes, onion, & carrots until 10 minutes from being done. Add chicken broth or buillion, pasta, & rice. Add chicken. Salt& pepper. Cook about 10 minutes. Until pasta and rice are done. ; name: country style green beans with red potatoes ; ingredients: ham hock, green beans, onion, red potatoes, seasoning salt, ground black pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:Place the ham hock and onion into a 4 quart dutch oven and fill half way full with water. Season water with salt, pepper and garlic powder and bring to a boil, then cover and simmer over low heat until meat falls off the bones, about 2 hours. Remove the bones and skin. Return the meat to the pot. Discard bones and skin. Add the green beans to the dutch oven and simmer for 20 minutes, then add the potatoes. Simmer for 10 to 15 minutes more, or until they can be easily pierced with a fork. ; name: microwave potato soup ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, water, half-and-half, butter, salt, pepper, cheese, bacon ; preparation:Microwave potatoes, onion and water on high 8 to 10 minutes until potatoes are tender. Cover and let rest 5 minutes. Mash potatoes with a fork into large pieces. This does help thicken the soup. Add remaining ingredients except cheese and cook on high 5 to 8 minutes to serving temperature. Garnish with cheese and bacon or chives. ; name: potato carrot kugel ; ingredients: russet potatoes, carrots, onion, eggs, oil, matzo meal, salt, pepper ; preparation:Grate vegetables, place in large bowl. Preheat oven to 400. Beat eggs in small bowl, add with remaining ingredients. Grease a 13x9 baking dish, add ingredients. Bake aprox 1 hour until top is brown. ; name: smoked salmon and potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, green beans, mayonnaise, eggs, shallots, salmon, water, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place potatoes in a saucepan and cover with cold water and bring to the boil over high heat and then reduce heat to medium and cook uncovered for 10 minutes or until tender,. Add beans for the last minutes and then drain and transfer to a large bowl. Combine mayonnaise, egg. Eschalots and 1 tablespoon cold water in a small bowl and season with salt and pepper. Add mayonnaise mixture and salmon to potato mixture and toss to combine and serve. Salad can be served warm or cold. ; name: cabbage potato and smoked sausage skillet ; ingredients: head of cabbage, onion, smoked sausage, potatoes, chicken broth, seasoning salt, paprika, pepper ; preparation:Heat pan and add onion, smoked sausage, and potatoes. Season with the seasoned salt lightly, and add the paprika. Cook and stir over medium heat until potatoes are cooked about halfway through. Next add the chopped cabbage and 1 cup of chicken broth. Cook, stirring occasionally until cabbage is crisp-tender and most of the liquid evaporates. ; name: new england boiled dinner pressure cooker ; ingredients: ham shank, water, potatoes, onions, carrots, cabbage, pepper ; preparation:

name: spinach artichoke stuffed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, spinach, mayonnaise, sour cream, water chestnuts, water-packed artichoke hearts, black pepper, salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Steam chopped spinach for 1 minute, drain well and place in a large mixng bowl. Cut the baked potatoes in half lengthwise and scoop the insides into the bowl with the spinach. Add the remaining ingredients except the parmesan cheese and stir well. Mound the filling back into the potato shells and place them in a shallow baking dish. Sprinkle with the parmesan and place under the broiler until the cheese is bubbly and hot. ; name: baby spinach omelet ; ingredients: eggs, baby spinach, parmesan cheese, onion powder, ground nutmeg, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a bowl, beat the eggs, and stir in the baby spinach and parmesan cheese. Season with onion powder, nutmeg, salt, and pepper. In a small skillet coated with cooking spray over medium heat, cook the egg mixture about 3 minutes, until partially set. Flip with a spatula, and continue cooking 2 to 3 minutes. Reduce heat to low, and continue cooking 2 to 3 minutes, or to desired doneness. ; name: eggs baked in potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, milk, salt, pepper, eggs, cheese ; preparation:Bake the potatoes. Scoop out the pulp, after cutting a thin slice from the length of the potato. Mash pulp to a creamy fluff with butter, hot milk, salt and pepper. Fill potato shells, leaving a dent in the middle of each to hold a raw egg. Break 1 or 2 eggs into each potato. Cover with cheese. Bake at 400f for 10 minutes until the egg is firm and cheese is browned. ; name: baba marion s perogy dough ; ingredients: flour, eggs, water, vegetable oil, mashed potatoes, salt ; preparation:Combine everything except flour. Gradually add this mixture to the flour until well mixed. Divide into 3 batches. Knead each until well worked. Wrap each batch in plastic& let rest for 1hr. Ready to roll& fill. ; name: leek and potato pie ; ingredients: potatoes, leeks, flour, salt and pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter ; preparation:Peel the potatoes and slice thinly. Wash the leeks thoroughly and slice thinly discarding about the last 2 inches of the green tops. Mix together the flour, salt, pepper and nutmeg. Grease a casserole dish. Put in alternate layers of potatoes and leeks sprinkling each layer with the seasoned flour and small chips of butter. The top layer should be potatoes. Dot the top with butter, pour hot milk on top of the casserole. Bake in the oven uncovered for about 1 hour. ; name: magic potato puffs ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, olive oil, cracker crumb, salt, pepper, egg yolks ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Put potatoes in large pot and add enough water to cover them. Bring to a boil over high heat then reduce heat to medium and cook for 12-15 minutes or until fork tender. Drain off water, mash and allow to cool. Coat a baking sheet with pam. In a small saucepan, saut onion in the olive oil over medium heat until tender. Add the onion, cracker crumbs, salt and pepper to the potatoes and remash. With your hands, roll into balls and place onto baking sheet. Brush with the egg yolks. Bake 40-45 minutes or until crispy brown. Makes 24-72 small puffs. ; name: blinchatyi pirog pancake pie ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, salt, milk, flour, butter, ground beef, onion, mushroom, salt and pepper ; preparation:Make the filling by sauteing the onions and mushrooms till soft and golden. Season. Mix with the cooked ground beef and leave to cool. Mix the pancake batter together with all ingredients except melted butter and fry 6-8 pancakes, each 7-8 inches in diameter. Cover and keep warm as you make them. When all the pancakes are ready, put two pancakes side by side in a deep baking pan, spread a layer of filling, then another two pancakes, then more meat. Continue in this way, finishing with two pancakes on top. Sprinkle with the melted butter and warm in the oven at 300f for 15 minute serve with a salad. ; name: nana s spinach gnocchi ; ingredients: spinach, potatoes, egg yolks, parmesan cheese, salt, flour, boiling water, butter ; preparation:

name: eatmore chocolate peanut bars ; ingredients: corn syrup, brown sugar, salt, corn flakes, vanilla, peanuts, chocolate chips, peanut butter ; preparation:Bring corn syrup, sugar and salt to a full rolling boil. Stir in peanut butter until well blended. Remove from heat. Stir in vanilla and peanuts. Add cornflakes and chocolate chips. Stir until chips are melted. Turn into buttered 8x8 pan. Pack down and chill before cutting into squares. ; name: mini chocolate chippers ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, white sugar, egg, flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips, oats ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. In a medium bowl cream butter until fluffy. Add sugars and egg, mix well. In another bowl sift dry ingredients, add to wet ingredients. Once the dry and wet ingredients are well mixed add cup of rolled oats and cup of chocolate chips. Spoon a bit of the batter at a time onto a greased pan. Cook from 12 to 15 minute until the cookies are golden and have risen. ; name: peanut butter rice krispies bars no bake ; ingredients: sugar, light brown sugar, light corn syrup, creamy peanut butter, vanilla, rice krispies, salted peanuts ; preparation:In a large microwave-safe bowl combine the white sugar, brown sugar, corn syrup and peanut putter. Microwave on high for 3-4 minutes or until melted, stirring once. Stir in vanilla. Fold in rice cereal and the chopped peanuts until well combined. Spread into a lightly buttered 13 x 9-inch glass baking dish. Cover and chill for 1 hour or until set. Cut into squares. ; name: butter crunch clusters ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, corn syrup, cheerios toasted oat cereal, salted peanuts ; preparation:Heat butter in saucepan over low heat until melted. Stir in brown sugar and corn syrup. Heat to boiling over medium heat, stirring constantly. Boil and stir 1 minute. Remove from heat. Stir in cereal and peanuts until well coated. Drop mixture by tablespoonfuls onto waxed paper. Cool. ; name: cornflake chews ; ingredients: sugar, butter, light corn syrup, peanut butter, corn flakes ; preparation:Heat all but cornflakes and peanut butter to boiling stirring constantly. Take off heat and stir in peanut butter until melted. Stir in cornflakes. Spread in greased pan. Cut when cool. ; name: somebody stole my cookie cookies ; ingredients: corn syrup, sugar, peanut butter, rice krispies, chocolate chips, butterscotch chips ; preparation:Bring the corn syrup and sugar to a boil. Stir in the peanut butter and pour the mixture over the cereal, stir. Put into a greased 9 x 13 pan. Melt the chocolate chips and the butterscotch chips, pour over the cereal mixture and spread evenly. Cool, cut into squares and eat. ; name: peanut butter rice krispies cake ; ingredients: corn syrup, sugar, peanut butter, rice krispies, bittersweet chocolate, margarine ; preparation:Heat corn syrup and sugar. Add peanut butter and mix. Remove from flame and add rice krispies. Spread into 9x13-inch pan. Melt chocolate chips and margarine. Spread over rice krispie mixture. Freeze. Thaw slightly before cutting and serving. ; name: dragon hair candy or dragon beard candy ; ingredients: white sugar, peanuts, corn syrup, rice flour ; preparation:

name: melt in ya mouth swedish butter cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, egg yolks, butter, almond extract ; preparation:Sift flour and sugar into a bowl. Mix the egg yolks, butter and extract in separate bowl. Slowly add flour and sugar a bit a time, mixing the mixture with your finger. Fource dough through a press or roll balls and flatten or make snakes onto grease trays. Bake in a moderate oven for 8 to 10 minutes. Keep in air-tight container. ; name: polvoron ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, powdered milk, iodized salt, margarine ; preparation:Toast all purpose flour until light brown. Add powdered milk, iodized salt, margarine and mix evenly. Add sugar into the flour mixture. Put into a flat container and mold by a polvoron molder. Wrap polvoron in cellophane. ; name: wheat beer bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt, brown sugar, beer ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix dough with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 50 to 60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean. ; name: kittencal s easy one bowl vanilla cupcakes ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, shortening, milk, vanilla, eggs ; preparation:Set oven to 350 degrees f. In a large bowl, mix together the flour with sugar, baking powder and salt until combined. Add in the shortening cream or milk, vanilla and eggs. Beat on medium speed of an electric mixer scraping the bowl constantly until just blended. Pour into paper-lined regular size muffin tins filling under just three-quarters full. Bake for 20-22 minutes or until the cupcakes test done. Immediately remove from pans. Cool completely before frosting. ; name: maw s corn fritters ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, cayenne, eggs, butter, creamed corn ; preparation:Blend flour, baking powder, salt, and cayenne. Blend slightly beaten eggs and butter. Add egg mixture to the dry ingredients and beat with fork until smooth. Stir in corn. Drop by spoonfuls into preheated deep fat at 375f. Fry 4 to 5 minutes. ; name: mayonnaise muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, mayonnaise, milk ; preparation:Combine first 3 ingredients in a small mixing bowl. Add mayonnaise and milk, stirring with a fork until dry ingredients are moistened. Spoon into lightly greased muffin pans, filling three-fourths full. Bake at 450 for 10 to 12 minutes, or till golden brown. Serve warm with butter. ; name: chocolate chip feather pancakes ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, cooking oil, chocolate chips ; preparation:In mixing bowl thoroughly stir together flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Combine egg, milk and cooking oil. Add all at once to dry ingredients, beating until blended. Pour in chocolate chips. Mix well. Bake on hot lightly greased griddle. Makes about 32 dollar-size pancakes or 6-8 4-inch pancakes. ; name: whole wheat popovers ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, butter, eggs, milk, salt ; preparation:

name: cranberry chili ; ingredients: ground beef, picante sauce, low-fat refried beans, whole canned tomatoes, chili powder, garlic clove, whole berry cranberry sauce, kidney beans, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a cooking pan brown meat until pink, stirring to separate. Pour off any fat. Add picante sauce, refried beans, tomatoes, chili powder and garlic. Heat to boiling. Reduce heat to low. Cover and cook for 20 minutes. Add cranberry sauce and kidney beans. Heat thoroughly. Sprinkle each bowl of chili with cheddar cheese before serving. ; name: mom s tangy beef casserole ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, green beans, corn, condensed tomato soup, steak sauce, seasoned pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, potatoes ; preparation:Start potatoes to boil for mashing. Brown beef with peppers and steak sauce, add onions towards the end of the browning so they soften slightly. Drain browned beef leaving enough of the juices for flavor and place in a medium casserole dish. Add beans, soup and corn if desired and stir to mix well. Spread mashed potatoes on top of mixture. Bake covered in an oven preheated to 375 for 25 minutes. Optionally remove covering and bake for an additional 10-15 minutes to brown the potato. ; name: hearty baked bean casserole ; ingredients: bacon, lean ground beef, onion, pork and beans, stewed tomatoes, brown sugar, chili powder, celery salt, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300f degrees. In a large skillet, cook bacon until crisp. Remove and drain fat from skillet. Crumble bacon and set aside. In the same skillet, brown the ground beef and onion. Drain off any fat. Combine all ingredients in a casserole dish and bake for 2 hours. I keep it covered during the first hour, then remove the cover and stir, and leave the cover off for the last hour of cooking, although the original recipe did not specify this. ; name: cottage pie oamc ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, salt, pepper, garlic cloves, frozen peas, tomato soup, picante sauce, mashed potatoes ; preparation:Brown ground beef with the onions, drain. Add salt, pepper, garlic. Spread beef evenly in bottom of 8 x 8 casserole dish. Layer veggies on top of the beef, followed by tomato soup and picante sauce. Top with mashed potatoes. Oamc- allow to cool completely, then wrap and freeze. To serve, thaw completely if frozen and bake at 350 degrees for 30 to 45 minutes or until heated through. ; name: lima bean soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, diced tomatoes, pinto beans, frozen lima beans, brown sugar, salt, water, white kidney beans ; preparation:Heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until onion is translucent, stirring occasionally. Add tomatoes with their liquid, pinto beans, lima beans, brown sugar, salt and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until lima beans are tender, stirring occasionally. Stir in white kidney beans, heat through. To serve, ladle soup into warm serving bowl. Sprinkle with 1 to 2 ounces shredded cheddar cheese if desired. ; name: mexican bean burgers ; ingredients: kidney beans, green pepper, onion, carrot, salsa, dry breadcrumbs, whole wheat flour, black pepper, salt, chili powder ; preparation:Steam carrot until soft.
