Using a 1-inch heart cookie cutter, cut out as many hearts as possible from each slice. In a large glass bowl, whisk the oil with the lemon juice, salt and pepper. Add the arugula, frisee and the beet cut outs and toss. Mound on salad plates and sprinkle with the chives and serve. ; name: white beans with garlic crumb crust ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, balsamic vinegar, tomatoes, zucchini, red bell pepper, white kidney beans, breadcrumbs ; preparation:I just flavoured this with a bit of salt, but if you had fresh basil, thatd be good, too. The recipe called for one bay leaf and some thyme, but i dont have any around. Heat oil in a sauce pan, add onions and garlic. Add balsamic, zucchini and pepper, cook until softened. Add tomatoes, lower heat and simmer 20 min. Heat oven to 350 f, and grease a baking dish. Combine the beans with the tomato mixture and pour into the pan. Mix together crust ingredients and sprinkle overtop. Bake 30 min. ; name: broccoli and green bean polka ; ingredients: head of broccoli, french beans, olive oil, unsalted cashews, almonds, sea salt ; preparation:

name: chocolate chip cheesecake cookies ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, refrigerated chocolate chip cookie dough ; preparation:Mix cream cheese, sugar, eggs, vanilla, and lemon juice until smooth. Cut one package of cookie dough into about 24 slices. Line bottom of a greased 13x9 inch pan with sliced cookie dough. Pour cream cheese mixture into pan to cover cookie dough. Cut remaining cookie dough into slices and cover mixture. Bake at 350 for 35 to 40 minutes. Cool, then chill for 1 hour or more, until very cold. Slice into small squares. ; name: foolproof buttercream frosting ; ingredients: egg yolks, sugar, light corn syrup, unsalted butter, vanilla ; preparation:In mixer bowl at high speed, beat egg yolks until pale yellow, 4 to 5 minutes. Butter a 2-cup glass measuring cup. In a 2- to 3-quart pan, combine sugar and corn syrup. Cook over medium-high heat and stir until sugar is dissolved and mixture comes to a rolling boil. Immediately pour into the butter glass measuring cup. Beating constantly at medium speed, pour syrup in a thin, steady stream into egg yolks. Continue beating until mixture is at room temperature. Add butter and vanilla. Beat just until smooth. ; name: coconut macaroon ice cream biscuit tortoni ; ingredients: sugar, water, egg yolks, whipping cream, vanilla, macaroons ; preparation:Boil sugar and water together to form a syrup which spins a thread when dropped from the. Beat egg yolks well. Add syrup slowly, beating eggs during addition. Cook for 5 min. In double boiler. Remove from heat and beat well. Add the 1 c. Macaroons and cool. Whip the cream and fold into cooled egg mixture. Fold in vanilla. Spread in a shallow container and top with the powdered macaroons to give a brown crust appearance. Freeze overnight. ; name: kissey face cream cheese cookies ; ingredients: butter, cream cheese, granulated sugar, all-purpose flour, egg, vanilla extract, hershey chocolate kisses ; preparation:Cream butter and cream cheese. Gradually add sugar, beating until light and fluffy. Add flour. Beat well. Stir in egg and vanilla. Shape dough into 1-inch balls. Place 2 inches apart a lightly greased cookie sheet. Bake at 375 f for 8 minutes. Remove the cookies from the oven and place one unwrapped hershey kiss in the middle of each cookie. Return to oven and bake 5 minutes. Cool 2-3 minutes on cookie sheets before removing to a wire rack to cool completely. ; name: dirt cake ; ingredients: oreo cookies, cream cheese, powdered sugar, margarine, whipped topping, instant vanilla pudding, milk, vanilla ; preparation:Mix cream cheese, sugar, margarine and whipped topping. Set aside. Mix pudding, milk and vanilla according to pudding directions. Combine mixtures to make filling. Layer crumbs, filling, crumbs, etc. In 9 x 13 inch dish. Refrigerate overnight. ; name: sand dessert aka vanilla dirt dessert ; ingredients: cookies, cream cheese, butter, powdered sugar, vanilla pudding mix, milk, cool whip ; preparation:Crumble cookies in food processor. Set aside. In a medium bowl, combine cream cheese, butter and powdered sugar. Mix in pudding. Slowly add milk. Mix until combined. Fold in cool whip. Using a clean sand bucket or casserole dish, alternate layers of cookie crumbs with the pudding mixture. Chill for at least 2 hours. Imho it tastes better if you make it a day ahead. ; name: maple pots de creme ; ingredients: heavy cream, maple syrup, salt, egg yolks, vanilla extract ; preparation:Bring the cream, maple syrup and salt to a simmer in a sauce pan. Mix the egg yolks and vanilla in a large bowl. Mix the cream mixture into the egg yolks a little at a time. Strain the mixture through a fine sieve. Pour the mixture into 4 ramekins. Place the ramekins in a baking dish and fill the baking dish with hot water until it come halfway up the ramekins. Bake in a preheated 300f oven until set, about 50-60 minutes. Remove from hot water bath and let cool to room temperature. ; name: easy homemade cookie ice cream paula deen ; ingredients: egg yolks, condensed milk, vanilla extract, chocolate sandwich style cookies, heavy cream ; preparation:

name: no bake creamy coconut pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, milk, flaked coconut, whipped topping, almond extract, graham cracker crust ; preparation:Combine cream cheese, sugar, milk and coconut in blender. Blend at medium speed for 30 seconds. Fold into whipped topping. Add extract, spoon into crust. Freeze for about 4 hours. Sprinkle with additional coconut, toasted, if desired. Let stand at room temperature for 5 minutes before serving. Store in freezer. ; name: chocolate chip pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crust, marshmallows, milk, whipping cream, chocolate candy bars ; preparation:Make crust. Melt marshmallows with milk in double boiler. Let cool. Fold in whipping cream and grated chocolate bar. Spread in pan and refrigerate. ; name: chocolate rum balls no cook ; ingredients: butter, icing sugar, semi-sweet chocolate chips, eggs, salt, dark rum, vanilla wafer crumbs, chocolate ; preparation:Combine butter, icing sugar and chocolate chips in a microwavable bowl. Microwave on low to melt - do not cook. Stir in beaten eggs and salt until thick and smooth. Add rum and crumbs then mix well. Refrigerate until mixture is stiff enough to form balls. Roll balls in chocolate shots, ground nuts or coconut. Chill. ; name: chocolate nut kentucky pie ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, flour, salt, bourbon, pecans, chocolate chips, pie crusts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cream butter and sugar. Add beaten eggs, flour, salt, and kentucky bourbon. Add chocolate chips and nuts. Stir well. Pour into partially baked pie shell and bake for 30 minutes, or until center is set. Serve with whipped cream or vanilla ice cream. ; name: sinful brownies ; ingredients: butter, dark chocolate, eggs, sugar, golden syrup, plain flour, cocoa, salt, nuts ; preparation:Pre heat oven 180c. Butter 20cm square cake tin. Melt butter and choc in saucepan over low heat. When melted ans smooth, set aside to cool. Beat eggs and sugar in large bowl till thick and creamy. Stir n cooled chocolate and golden syrup. Then add flour, cocoa, salt and nuts. Pour into tin, bake 30 minutes. Remove from oven, cool in tin then cut into squares. ; name: chocolate cherry pie ; ingredients: graham crackers, cream cheese, sugar, cocoa, egg, almond extract, cool whip, cherry pie filling ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cream together cream cheese and sugar. Add cocoa and mix well. Add egg and almond extract. Mix well. Pour filling into crust. Bake for 35 minutes. Cool completely, then spread an even layer of cool whip over pie, then top with cherry pie filling. Refrigerate 2-3 hours before serving. ; name: chocolate walnut pie ; ingredients: semisweet chocolate, 9 inch pie shell, eggs, light corn syrup, sugar, butter, vanilla, walnuts, whipped cream ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f. Melt the chocolate in the microwave or in a heavy pot on low heat. Pour it evenly into the unbaked pie shell. In a large bowl, mix the eggs, corn syrup, sugar, butter, and vanilla well. Stir in the walnuts. Pour the mixture into the chocolate-lined pie shell and bake until the filling is set, 45 to 50 minutes. Remove to a rack and let cool. The pie may be made ahead several days, or frozen for up to 3 months. Serve with whipped cream if desired. ; name: french silk pie ; ingredients: butter, sugar, cocoa, extra-large eggs, salt, graham cracker crust, whipped cream, nuts, chocolate curls ; preparation:

name: grilled bourbon salmon ; ingredients: pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, bourbon, fresh cracked pepper, garlic powder, vegetable oil, salmon fillet ; preparation:Combine juice, soy, brown sugar, bourbon, pepper, garlic powder and oil in a bowl. Remove all skin from the salmon. Place the salmon in a glass dish side by side. Pour some of the marinade over. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour a few hours will be even better. Drain and grill over med. -high about 5-7 minutes per side or until fish flakes-basting with the reserved marinade. ; name: tuna glazed with ginger and lime ; ingredients: tuna steaks, garlic cloves, ginger, sugar, crushed red pepper flakes, fresh lime juice, soy sauce, dark sesame oil ; preparation:Place steaks in a large shallow dish. Combine garlic and remaining ingredients in a small bowl. Stir well. Pour marinade mixture over tuna steaks. Cover and marinate in the refrigerator for 1 hour, turning once. Remove steaks from the marinade, reserving marinade. Bring marinade to a boil in a small saucepan. Grill tuna steaks, covered, over medium hot coals about 20 minutes or until fish flakes easily. Baste often with marinade. ; name: chinese fish and lettuce soup ; ingredients: fresh white fish, light soy sauce, peanut oil, white pepper, iceberg lettuce, fresh ginger, salt, chicken stock, chinese rice wine, sesame oil ; preparation:Thinly slice the boneless fish and soak in the marinade. Shred the lettuce and set aside. Cook the ginger, oil and salt just until the ginger begins to brown a little bit. Add to the soup stock and bring to a heavy simmer. Just prior to serving, drain the marinade from the fish and add the fish to the soup pot, all at once, along with the lettuce and the rice wine or sherry. Bring back to a full simmer, then remove from stove. Do not overcook the soup. Add a few drops of sesame oil and pepper for garnish, and serve immediately. ; name: malay marinade for grilled pork ; ingredients: fresh ginger, onion, garlic cloves, honey, ground coriander, soy sauce, fresh lime juice, fresh ground pepper, pork chops ; preparation:Mix all ingredients except for the pork. Add the pork to marinate 2 hours at room temperature. Turning meat occasionally. If using pork cubes, place on water soaked skewers. Grill until done, about 5 minutes per side. Serve with rice or herbed new potatoes. ; name: lime marinated broiled salmon ; ingredients: low sodium soy sauce, fresh lime juice, fresh ginger, fresh thyme, garlic cloves, salmon fillets, cooking spray, lime wedges ; preparation:Place first 5 ingredients in a blender. Process until smooth. Pour into a large zip-top plastic bag. Add salmon, and seal and marinate in refrigerator 1 hour, turning bag occasionally. Preheat broiler. Remove salmon from bag, discarding marinade. Place salmon on a broiler pan coated with cooking spray. Broil 8 minutes. Turn, and broil an additional 4 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork. Serve with lime wedges. ; name: pineapple fried rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil, garlic clove, fresh ginger, crushed red pepper flakes, cooked rice, light soy sauce, crushed pineapple in syrup, green onion ; preparation:In large nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-low heat until hot. Add garlic, ginger and red pepper, cook and stir 2 minutes. Increase heat to medium-high. Add rice and soy sauce. Cook 2 minutes, stirring frequently. Add pineapple, tossing to combine. Heat rice through. Sprinkle with green onions before serving. ; name: citrus marinated chuck roast for the grill ; ingredients: chuck roast, salt, pepper, meat tenderizer, low sodium soy sauce, orange juice, lemon juice, sugar, garlic cloves, ginger ; preparation:Sprinkle roast generously on both sides with salt, pepper and meat tenderizer. Mix remaining ingredients. Put roast in a large ziplock bag. Add marinade. Seal and refrigerate at least overnight. Grill over medium-hot coals, turning several times and basting with reserved marinade frequently. Cook approximately 35-40 minutes, until done to your liking. Allow roast to rest for 10 minutes before slicing. ; name: salmon braised in coconut milk ; ingredients: unsweetened coconut milk, orange juice, orange zest, thai fish sauce, asian chili sauce, garlic clove, fresh ginger, of fresh mint, fresh cilantro stems, salmon fillets ; preparation:

name: old fashioned butterscotch sauce ; ingredients: light brown sugar, light corn syrup, butter, evaporated milk, baking soda, vanilla ; preparation:In a medium saucepan combine sugar, syrup, and butter. Cook, stirring constantly, over medium heat until sugar has dissolved and mixture comes to a full rolling boil. Allow to boil, without stirring, for exactly 1 minute. Remove from heat and let stand for 5 minutes. In another bowl or large measuring cup, combine evaporated milk, baking soda, and vanilla. Stir into the slightly cooled sauce. Pour into jars, cover, and refrigerate. Place jar in a pan of warm water to reheat. ; name: homemade maple syrup old fashioned ; ingredients: white sugar, brown sugar, water, butter flavoring, burnt sugar flavoring, maple flavoring ; preparation:Place all but maple flavoring in a medium saucepan, start to cook over medium heat but, turn temperature down just when it reaches a boil. Simmer just 10 minutes and remove from heat. Cool slightly and add maple flavoring. Once cool enough, place in an old syrup bottle, mrs. Butterworths size works really well. ; name: brown sugar fudge ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, evaporated milk, vanilla, powdered sugar, nuts ; preparation:Butter an 8 inch square baking pan. Melt butter in heavy saucepan, add brown sugar. Cook over low heat for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Add milk, cook, stirring until mixture comes to a boil. Continue to stir, allow to come to soft ball stage and remove form heat. Let cool slightly. Stir in the vanilla. Gradually beat in the powdered sugar with electric beaters until mixture reaches a fudge-like consistency, about 2 minutes. Stir in nuts. Pour into prepared pan. Allow to cool completely before cutting into pieces. ; name: chewy irresistible caramel popcorn ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, corn syrup, baking soda, salt, popcorn ; preparation:Pop the popcorn kernels and put into a greased large bowl. Melt butter on medium heat in a medium size saucepan. Turn heat down to low, and add brown sugar, stir until blended together well. Making sure that the sugar does not burn turn the heat back up to medium, and add corn syrup. All the while stirring and making sure there is no sticking. Add the salt and baking soda. This will make the sugar double in size be careful not to let it go over the sides of the pot. Immediately pour onto popcorn. Stir until the caramel has covered popcorn completely. Transfer onto a cookie sheet with wax paper, and let cool. ; name: microwave spiced nuts ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, nutmeg, cinnamon, salt, water, nuts ; preparation:Melt butter in 3 qt microwave bowl on high, approx 30 seconds. Stir in sugar, spices, salt, water. Microwave on high 1 minute. Stir in nuts to coat. Microwave 4-5 minutes more, stirring every minute. Pour onto parchment paper and separate nuts. Cool completely. ; name: fooled you maple spread ; ingredients: brown sugar, all-purpose flour, milk, butter, maple extract ; preparation:In a saucpan, stir together brown sugar, flour, milk and butter. Turn heat to low and cook, stirring often, until mixture is lump-free and smooth. Remove from heat and stir in maple extract. Place in a bowl or jar and refrigerate until serving. After it is chilled you can bring it to room temperature if you wish, to make spreading easier. ; name: celestial peach sundae ; ingredients: vanilla ice cream, peaches, light corn syrup, brown sugar, butter, walnuts, candied ginger ; preparation:Place the ice cream in four dessert cups. Place in freezer. Combine corn syrup, brown sugar, butter, walnuts and ginger if using in pot and bring to a boil. Cook rapidly for 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Top ice cream with 2 peach halves. May be fresh or canned peaches. Spoon walnut sauce over each. Sprinkle with a little chopped candied ginger if desired. ; name: maple caramel sauce for ice cream served at 2013 obama inaugural ; ingredients: butter, light brown sugar, salt, maple syrup ; preparation:

name: scrambled egg cups for two ; ingredients: bread, butter, eggs, chives, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Flatten bread with a rolling pin. Spread a scant teaspoon of butter on one side of each bread slice. Press bread, buttered side down, into 4 muffin cups. Bake at 350 for 12-15 minutes. Meanwhile, in bowl, beat eggs, chives, salt, & pepper. In a skillet, melt remaining butter over medium-low heat. Add egg mixture. Cook & stir until eggs are completely set. Spoon into bread cups. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 1-2 minutes longer, until cheese is melted. ; name: scrambled egg and bacon sandwich ; ingredients: bread, mayonnaise, egg, water, salt and pepper, bacon ; preparation:Slice the 2 slices bacon in half and cook to a crisp. Drain on paper towel, and pour drippings out of pan. Whip egg with water, add salt and pepper and scramble eggs in same pan in which the bacon was cooked. Remove egg to cool. After bread has toasted, spread with mayo and layer on eggs and bacon. Slice and serve with favorite breakfast beverage. ; name: baked cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: bread, butter, mustard, velveeta cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Butter both sides of bread. Lay 8 slices in a 9x13 inch pan. Spread mustard on top. Cover each slice with velveeta cheese. Cover with remaining bread slices. In seperate bowl mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Mix well. Pour over bread and place in refrigerator overnight, or for at least 6 hours. Bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. Cut into serving size pieces and serve hot. ; name: coco s strata ; ingredients: bread, bulk sausage, cheddar cheese, eggs, salt, worcestershire sauce, milk, bacon ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 350. Grease 9 x 13 pan. Fry sausage, breaking it up as it cooks then drain on paper towels. Tear bread into bite-sized pieces and place in pan. Sprinkle cooked sausage then cheese evenly over bread. In a medium bowl, combine eggs, salt, worcestershire sauce and milk, and whisk together with wire whisk until combined. Pour over bread mixture then sprinkle bacon over the top. Bake 35-40 minutes at 350, checking bacon after 25 minutes- if it looks too brown, cover with foil for rest of cooking time. This can be prepared up to the night before. ; name: hashbrown breakfast skillet ; ingredients: potatoes, breakfast sausage, eggs, diced onion, cherry tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, hot sauce, salt ; preparation:In a large skillet add the sausage and cook until most of it is brown. Drain and return to pan. Add the grated potatoes, onion, and salt to the skillet. Cook on medium heat until the hashbrowns are golden brown. Push the mixture to one side of the pan and scramble the eggs in the empty space. Once cooked, stir them into the hashbrowns. Add the hot sauce, tomatoes, and cheese. Stir well and serve immediately. ; name: german french toast ; ingredients: eggs, white bread, muenster cheese, milk, butter, salt ; preparation:Melt butter in a skillet on medium heat. In a small bowl, beat together eggs, milk and salt. Dip bread slices one at a time in egg mixture, and fry in butter until bolden brown. After turning once, top each slice of bread with a slice of muenster cheese. Cover skillet until the cheese is melted. Serve and enjoy. ; name: jane and michael stern s broccoli casserole ; ingredients: white bread, eggs, milk, butter, cheddar cheese, salt, sugar, broccoli ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Butter an 8-inch square pyrex baking dish. Cover the bottom of the dish generously with the torn bread. Combine the eggs, milk, melted butter, cheese, salt and sugar in a bowl. Mix ntil combined. Stir in the roccoli and pour the mixture over the read. Cover with aluminum foil and bake for 35 minutes. For a chewier top, remove the foil during the last 10 to 12 minutes of baking. If you want a crisper crust, run the casserole under the broiler. ; name: breakfast casserole by loretta ; ingredients: bread, cheese, cooked sausage, eggs, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: jalapeos rellenos stuffed jalapenos ; ingredients: jalapenos, queso fresco, cilantro, mint, yellow onion ; preparation:Trim and discard stem ends of 8 jalapeo chiles. Scrape seeds and veins out of each chile with a thin-bladed knife. Mash together queso fresco, cilantro and mint leaves, and yellow onion. Stuff chiles with mixture, dividing it equally between them. Saut chiles in a lightly oiled nonstick skillet over medium-low heat, turning occasionally, until soft and all sides are browned, about 15 minutes. ; name: jalapeno corn casserole ; ingredients: cream cheese, butter, frozen corn, milk, all-purpose flour, jalapeno pepper ; preparation:Using electric mixer, mix cream cheese and butter very well. Gradually mix in milk. Mix in flour and jalapenos. Stir in corn. Pour into a 9x9 greased casserole dish. Bake at 350 for 50-60 minutes, or until bubbling and golden brown on top. ; name: brunch biscuits ; ingredients: bacon, parmesan cheese, green pepper, onion, biscuits, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease tube pan. Mix first four ingredients in bowl. Separate biscuits into 20 pieces, then cut biscuits into 4 pieces. Toss biscuits with bacon and other ingredients. Put all this into tube pan and drizzle with butter. Bake for 25-30 minutes. ; name: bacon and pepper pasta ; ingredients: bacon, onions, garlic cloves, green pepper, sweet red pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook bacon until crisp. Remove bacon with slotted spoon and set aside, reserving the drippings. Saute onions and garlic in drippings for 3 minutes. Add peppers, cook and stir for 3 minutes. Stir in tomatoes and heat through. Add bacon and mix well. Serve over pasta. Cooking time does not reflect time to cook pasta. ; name: hearty breakfast casserole ; ingredients: bacon, biscuits, eggs, cheese, sour cream, salt, pepper, green onion ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly spray a 9x13 inch pan with cooking spray. Quarter biscuits, and place at bottom of pan. Layer with cooked bacon and shredded cheese. In a mixing bowl, whisk together eggs, sour cream, salt, and pepper and pour over cheese and biscuits. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until golden brown. Allow to cool 5-10 minutes before serving. Garnish with onions, if desired. ; name: nacho cheese fries ; ingredients: french fries, cheddar cheese soup, salsa, cumin, sour cream, canned jalapeno slices ; preparation:Cook fries however you like, i prefer mine baked but you could dip fry. In a saucepan combine soup, salsa, and cumin and cook until heated through. On a baking sheet, pile fries in the center of baking sheet. Pour soup mixture over top. Bake at 375 about 4 minutes or until bubbly. Serve with sour cream and jalapenos. I have also added shredded chicken to these. ; name: mexican grilled cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: bread, jalapeno jack cheese, taco seasoning mix, salsa, butter ; preparation:Heat a griddle, sandwich maker, or a skillet over medium heat. In small bowl, mix butter and taco seasoning mix. Spread half of mixture on one side of each piece of bread. Put cheese slices onto bread and top with remaining bread slices. Place the sandwiches, buttered sides down, on hot griddle. Spread top sides with remaining butter mixture. Cook until golden brown on both sides and cheese is melted. Serve with salsa as a dip. ; name: bacon wrapped jalapeno peppers ; ingredients: jalapenos, cream cheese, bacon, toothpick ; preparation:

name: pat s buttermilk pancakes ; ingredients: eggs, buttermilk, salt, sugar, flour, baking soda, baking powder, vegetable oil ; preparation:Beat eggs. Add milk, salt, and sugar. Beat thoroughly. Add enough flour to make a batter consistency. Do not beat well. Hot cake batter should be slightly lumpy. Add baking soda and baking powder. Stir in oil. ; name: mario batali s olive oil and orange cake ; ingredients: oranges, extra virgin olive oil, eggs, salt, sugar, flour, baking powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f and oil a 9-inch round cake pan. Remove zest from all oranges and juice from one. Set fruit aside for another use. In a large mixing bowl with an electric mixer, beat eggs and salt together until frothy and light. Slowly add sugar while continuing to mix. Sift the flour and baking soda together and gradually add to egg mixture. Mix about 1 more minute. In a side bowl, mix olive oil, citrus zest and juice. Using a spoon, stir this into the egg mixture, just folding until all inches. Pour batter into prepared pan and place in oven and bake 50 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in center of cake comes out clean. Cool to room temperature, cut into wedges and serve. ; name: never fail biscuits ; ingredients: flour, salt, sugar, baking powder, milk, butter, egg ; preparation:Mix dry ingredients. Cut in butter. Beat egg and milk slightly in separate bowl. Milk together. Kneed on floured surface. Roll till desired thickness. Cut out with a glass or cookie cutter. Bake 350 for till golden brown. ; name: quick chocolate chip scones ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, baking soda, egg, skim milk, lemon juice, butter, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Place wax paper on a large baking sheet. Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl. Combine other ingredients in a second bowl. Blend the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients. Add chocolate chips. Drop by large spoonfuls onto the baking sheet. Bake 15 minutes. ; name: sweet cream waffles ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, eggs, heavy cream, butter ; preparation:In a small bowl combine the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar. Stir until blended. In a medium bowl, place the egg yolks, cream, and butter. Whisk until well mixed. Stir the dry ingredients into the cream mixture. Whisk until well mixed and smooth. Heat the waffle iron. Brush lightly with butter if not nonstick. Beat the egg whites until stiff, then fold them gently into the batter. Cook until waffles are golden, about 5 minutes. ; name: just plain carrot cake ; ingredients: eggs, vegetable oil, sugar, vanilla, flour, ground cinnamon, baking soda, salt, baking powder, carrots ; preparation:Combine eggs, oil, sugar, and vanilla. Mix well. In a separate bowl, combine and mix dry ingredients. Add to wet mixture, mixing well. Stir in finely crated carrot. Pour batter into 13x9 cake pan that has been sprayed with nonstick cooking spray. Bake at 350 degrees for 50-60 minutes. Allow to cool before frosting with your favorite cream cheese frosting. ; name: italian breakfast lemon loaf ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, vegetable oil, milk, lemon juice, lemon zest, flour, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grease and flour a 9x5x3 loaf pan. Put the eggs in a mixing bowl and beat with an electric mixer until they are pale yellow and thickened. With the mixer running, gradually add the sugar and then the oil in a slow, steady stream. In a small bowl, stir milk, lemon juice, and lemon zest together and add to batter. Sift flour, baking powder, and salt together and blend into batter until thoroughly mixed. Pour batter into the prepared pan, which should be about two-thirds full. Place in oven and bake about 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted near the center of the loaf comes out clean. Place the pan on a cooling rack for 5 minutes. Loosen loaf and turn out onto the rack. Turn loaf upright and let cool completely. Sprinkle with powdered sugar or you can make a lemon glaze and drizzle over. ; name: pancakes milk free ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, egg, orange juice, water, vegetable oil, vegetable oil cooking spray ; preparation:

name: mushroom and celery salad ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, celery, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, sugar, white pepper, onion salt, garlic powder ; preparation:Combine mushrooms and celery in a salad bowl. Mix oil, lemon juice, salt, sugar, white pepper, onion salt, and garlic powder. Mix well. Pour over mushrooms and celery. Serve. ; name: german mushroom salad ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, lemon, juice of, parsley, egg yolk, garlic clove, olive oil, salt, pepper ; preparation:Wash and peel fresh mushrooms, slice finely and sprinkle with lemon juice. Beat the yolk with salt, pepper and the rest of lemon juice, and put the garlic clove through the garlic press into the yolk mixture. Gradually add the olive oil. Chop the parsley and add into the dressing. Pour the dressing over the mushrooms. ; name: sauteed spinach garlic and mushrooms ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, mushrooms, garlic cloves, spinach, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a big saucepan over medium heat, melt the butter with the olive oil. Add in the mushrooms and garlic. Saute about 5 minutes, until tender. Add in spinach. Toss with 2 forks, about 5 minutes, until wilted. Season with salt and pepper. Mix well. Serve immediately. ; name: marinated garlicky mushrooms ; ingredients: garlic cloves, button mushrooms, shiitake mushrooms, tomatoes, lemon juice, olive oil, bay leaf, white wine, salt and pepper, parsley ; preparation:Slice garlic thinly. Cut tomatoes in wedges. Trim mushrooms. Discard stems of shiitake mushrooms. Cut in bite size pieces. Sprinkle the button mushrooms with lemon juice to prevent darkening. Place oil, garlic slices and bay leaf in skillet. Heat until aroma is released. Add all mushrooms and stir fry over high heat. Swirl in white wine and season with salt and pepper. Marinate in refrigerator at least 1 hour. Garnish with tomato wedges and parsley. ; name: chicken in mushroom cream sauce ; ingredients: chicken fillet, flour, olive oil, garlic cloves, mushrooms, white wine, butter, heavy cream ; preparation:Lightly dredge chicken in flour. Fry in olive oil until golden brown and set aside. In another saute pan, add garlic, mushrooms and white wine and simmer until garlic exudes aroma. Add butter and cream and stir. Add the chicken. Cover and simmer on low heat a few minutes until blended and cooked through. Sprinkle a bit of flour for extra thickness, if desired. ; name: carrots and mushrooms saute ; ingredients: carrots, olive oil, garlic clove, fresh mushrooms, sugar, dried thyme, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Place carrots in a medium saucepan. Add water to cover by one inch. Bring to a boil. Partially cover and boil until tender crisp, about 5-8 minutes. Drain. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium low heat. Add garlic and mushrooms and saute, stirring occasionally, until mushroom liquid evaporates, about 6 minutes. Add carrots, sugar, thyme, salt and pepper, cover and cook over low heat 15 minutes. Uncover, remove garlic. Discard. Increase heat to medium-high. Cook, stirring often, until carrots and mushrooms are very lightly browned, 2-5 minutes. ; name: sauteed portabellas spinach ; ingredients: butter, portabella mushrooms, frozen chopped spinach, dried basil, black pepper, garlic cloves, dry red wine, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Melt butter in a large skillet or saute pan over medium heat. Saute mushrooms, spinach, basil, salt, pepper and garlic until mushrooms are tender and spinach is heated through. Pour in wine and reduce heat to low. Simmer 1 minute. Stir in parmesan cheese and serve. ; name: red wine mushrooms the easy way ; ingredients: small mushroom, olive oil, butter, garlic granules, red wine ; preparation:

name: creamy cheddar potatoes ; ingredients: butter, potatoes, salt, fresh ground black pepper, milk, cheddar cheese, parsley ; preparation:In large, nonstick skillet, melt butter. Add potatoes and cook over medium heat until almost tender and lightly browned. Add salt, pepper, and milk, continuing to cook until milk is absorbed and potatoes are tender. Sprinkle with cheese, heating until melted. Stir well, sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve. ; name: baked cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: bread, butter, mustard, velveeta cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Butter both sides of bread. Lay 8 slices in a 9x13 inch pan. Spread mustard on top. Cover each slice with velveeta cheese. Cover with remaining bread slices. In seperate bowl mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Mix well. Pour over bread and place in refrigerator overnight, or for at least 6 hours. Bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. Cut into serving size pieces and serve hot. ; name: southern egg scrambled breakfast ; ingredients: eggs, sour cream, cheddar cheese, ham, onion, fresh mushrooms, green bell pepper, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add mushrooms, bell peppers, and onions. Saute until onions are translucent and tender. Add diced ham and stir until steaming. In the meantime, in large mixing bowl, crack and add the dozen eggs, salt and pepper to taste, one heaping tablespoon of sour cream. Beat with wire whisk until smooth. Pour over the ham and vegetable mixture in the skillet. Sprinkle the top with the cheese. Stir as it cooks until the eggs are no longer shiny. ; name: hawaiian omelette ; ingredients: eggs, pineapple chunk, ham, monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese, water, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Beat together eggs, water, salt and pepper. Thinly coat your skillet with vegetable oil spray. Heat over medium high. Pour egg mixture into pan. When eggs are almost set, sprinkle half of the omelette with remaining ingredients. Fold other half of omelette over filling. Continue cooking until cheese melts, about 2 minutes. Cut omelette into 3 wedges and serve. ; name: german french toast ; ingredients: eggs, white bread, muenster cheese, milk, butter, salt ; preparation:Melt butter in a skillet on medium heat. In a small bowl, beat together eggs, milk and salt. Dip bread slices one at a time in egg mixture, and fry in butter until bolden brown. After turning once, top each slice of bread with a slice of muenster cheese. Cover skillet until the cheese is melted. Serve and enjoy. ; name: spinach tomato scramble ; ingredients: eggs, egg whites, olive oil, roma tomato, baby spinach, feta cheese, walnuts, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Whisk together eggs and egg whites and set aside. Heat olive oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Saute roma tomato until slightly tender. Add egg mixture and scramble until eggs are soft set. Add baby spinach leaves, stir for 30 seconds, turn off heat and cover skillet for one minute. Portion on two plates and top with feta cheese and chopped walnuts. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: cheese straws iv ; ingredients: cheese, butter, red pepper, flour, salt ; preparation:Cream butter and cheese. Add salt, pepper and flour. Mix well. Roll thin. Cut in desired shapes. Place on cookie sheet and bake in 425 degree oven until very light brown, about 8 to 10 minutes. ; name: extra tasty scrambled eggs ; ingredients: eggs, milk, salt & freshly ground black pepper, butter, cheddar cheese, bread ; preparation:

name: meatloaf ; ingredients: breadcrumbs, milk, ground beef, egg, brown sugar, salt and pepper, catsup ; preparation:Add bread crumbs to milk and let set a few minutes. Mix in egg, brown sugar, salt and pepper. Add meat and mix. Finally, add catsup. Pat into 2 loaves. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour and 15 minutes. ; name: scrambled egg cups for two ; ingredients: bread, butter, eggs, chives, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Flatten bread with a rolling pin. Spread a scant teaspoon of butter on one side of each bread slice. Press bread, buttered side down, into 4 muffin cups. Bake at 350 for 12-15 minutes. Meanwhile, in bowl, beat eggs, chives, salt, & pepper. In a skillet, melt remaining butter over medium-low heat. Add egg mixture. Cook & stir until eggs are completely set. Spoon into bread cups. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 1-2 minutes longer, until cheese is melted. ; name: mama lu s broccoli casserole ; ingredients: white bread, frozen chopped broccoli, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, butter, sugar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Butter a 9x13 glass pyrex dish. Tear the bread slices into bite size pieces and cover the bottom of the pan. Layer the chopped broccoli on top of the bread slices. In a large bowl, combine the remaining ingredients and pour over the broccoli and bread, making sure all the bread pieces get a good soaking and that the cheese is distributed evenly. Cover with tin foil and bake for 35-40 minutes or until casserole is golden brown and set. Let rest 10 minutes and cut into squares and serve. ; name: breakfast casserole with a biscuit crust ; ingredients: biscuit dough, sausage, mozzarella cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Butter or spray 9x13 inch baking dish. Heat oven to 425. Press biscuits onto bottom of baking dish, sealing all areas to make solid crust. Sprinkle with cooked sausage, then the shredded mozzarella cheese. Mix eggs, milk, salt, and pepper together. Carefully pour the egg mixture over meat and cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until firmly set in center. ; name: easy bread pudding ; ingredients: eggs, egg whites, skim milk, honey, vanilla, cinnamon raisin bread ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, beat eggs and egg whites. Beat in milk, honey and vanilla. Stir in bread cubes. Pour into 8 inch baking dish, sprayed with a non-stick spray. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean. Serve hot. ; name: potato cheese croquettes ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, egg, cheddar cheese, salt, fine breadcrumbs, milk ; preparation:Break up potatoes. Beat egg in blender until frothy. Add potato pieces gradually, beating at medium speed until blended. Stir in cheese and salt. Shape as desired. Dip into crumbs, them milk, and again into crumbs. Fry in shallow hot fat until golden brown on all sides. ; name: easy breakfast egg casserole ; ingredients: white bread, bulk pork sausage, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Grease a 13x9-inch baking pan. Place bread in the bottom and sprinkle with sausage and cheese. Beat eggs, milk, salt and pepper with a whisk. Pour over the bread mixture. Bake 40-45 minutes or until eggs are set in the center and lightly browned. ; name: hotdog rolls with breadcrumbs ; ingredients: hot dogs, eggs, white bread, cheese, breadcrumbs ; preparation:

name: poor man s pie ; ingredients: 9 inch pie shell, brown sugar, flour, salt, light cream, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Line a large 9-inch pie plate with rolled out pastry dough, prick with a fork and bake for 10 minutes. Remove from oven and reduce heat to 350f. In a small bowl, combine sugar, flour and salt. Mix well and spread evenly over the bottom of the crust. Warm cream in the microwave, and then carefully pour the warmed cream over the sugar mixture, completely covering it. In bits, dab butter over the cream. Bake at 350f for 45 minutes to an hour, or until golden spots form on the top. The filling will seem liquid but will become firmer as it cools. ; name: colonel sanders lemon sponge pie ; ingredients: pie crust, flour, butter, milk, sugar, egg yolks, salt, fresh lemon juice, lemons, rind of, egg whites ; preparation:Temper butter. Cream butter and sugar thoroughly. Add remaining ingredients except egg whites. Fold in stiffly beaten egg whites. Pour into unbaked pie crust and bake slowly in oven at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Reduce oven to 300 degrees f, until tests done - about 45 minutes. ; name: old fashion oatmeal pie ; ingredients: pie crusts, eggs, sugar, flour, ground cinnamon, salt, light corn syrup, butter, vanilla, quick-cooking oatmeal ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Beat eggs until frothy. Combine sugar, flour, cinnamon and salt in a small bowl. Add eggs. Mix well. Add corn syrup, melted butter, and vanilla. Mix oatmeal. Pour into uncooked shell. Bake for 45 minutes. ; name: my real pumpkin pie ; ingredients: pie crusts, eggs, pumpkin, sugar, salt, cinnamon, ginger, ground cloves, sweetened condensed milk, evaporated milk ; preparation:Combine the eggs, pumpkin, sugar, salt, cinnamon, ginger, cloves and milk. Mix well and pour into prepared pie crusts. Bake in a 425f oven for 15 minutes. Reduce temperature to 350f and bake an additional 50-60 minutes or until the center of the pie is no longer wobbly or liquid. Cool and serve with whipped topping or vanilla ice cream. ; name: haupia lilikoi pie hawaiian coconut and passion fruit pie ; ingredients: pie crusts, cornstarch, sugar, salt, coconut milk, frozen passion fruit juice concentrate, water ; preparation:In a saucepan, combine cornstarch, sugar, and salt. Slowly add coconut milk, stirring until blended and cornstarch dissolves. Using a heat diffuser to prevent mixture from over-cooking, cook until thick and smooth. Pour into pie shell and chill until set. Blend sugar, cornstarch, juice concentrate, and water. Cook until thick, stirring constantly. Cool slightly and pour over chilled haupia filling. Chill until set again. ; name: cranberry white chocolate nut pie ; ingredients: dried cranberries, brandy, pie crust, butter, sugar, eggs, salt, walnuts, flour, white baking bar ; preparation:In a small bowl combine dried cranberries and brandy. Cover and chill at least 1 hour. Drain and reserve 1 tablespoons brandy. Preheat oven to 325. Prepare pastry and line a 9 inches pie plate. In a medium bowl wisk together butter, sugar, eggs, and salt. Stir in walnuts, flour and chopped baking bars until just combined. Stir in drained cranberries and 1 tablespoons brandy. Spoon into crust lined pie plate. Bake for 65 minutes, loosely covering pie with foil the last 30 minutes of baking. Cool on rack. ; name: tasty applesauce pie ; ingredients: unbaked 9-inch pie crust, unsweetened applesauce, brown sugar, eggs, crisco, lemon juice, lemon, rind of, salt, nutmeg, cinnamon ; preparation:Heat oven to 450. Combine applesauce, brown sugar, eggs, crisco, lemon juice, lemon peel, salt, nutmeg and cinnamon. Mix well. Pour filling into pie shell. Bake for 15 mins. Reduce heat to 300. Continue baking for 45-55 mins or until knife inserted in the middle comes out clean. Coool thoroughly on wire rack before cutting. ; name: raspberry rhubarb tart ; ingredients: pie crust, flour, sugar, orange zest, rhubarb, raspberries, red currant jelly, powdered sugar ; preparation:

name: comforting cold and flu tea ; ingredients: water, fresh ginger, sage leaves, rosemary sprigs, fresh thyme sprigs, lemon, juice of, cinnamon sticks, honey ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a large pot. Bring to a boil. Turn off heat and steep for about 10 minutes. Strain into a pitcher. Stir in honey while still warm. Store pitcher in refrigerator. Reheat one cup at a time in the microwave, adding more honey to taste, if desired. Drink twice a day, breathing steam through nose, for maximum benefit. ; name: winter fruit compote ; ingredients: sugar, water, fresh ginger, dried fruit, fresh cranberries, orange, granny smith apple ; preparation:In large saucepan, combine sugar, water and ginger. Bring to a boil over high heat. Add dried fruit and bring back to a boil. Immediately reduce heat to low simmer. Cook, uncovered, until fruit is not quite tender, about 5 minutes. Add cranberries and simmer, stirring occasionally, until cranberries pop. Stir in orange and apple. Remove from heat and allow to cool down. For dessert, serve warm over ice cream, or at room temperature over a plain cake, such as angel food cake or pound cake. Can also be served with yogurt. Makes a particularly nice breakfast. ; name: quaker punch ; ingredients: of fresh mint, ginger, tea bags, boiling water, water, sugar, lemons, juice of, oranges, juice of ; preparation:Bruise the mint. Add the ginger and teabags. Pour over the boiling water, cover and steep for 6 or 7 minutes. Strain and discard the solids. Meanwhile, heat the remaining water and sugar just until the sugar is dissolved. Mix with the tea brew. Add the juice of the lemons and oranges, and strain. Serve chilled, over ice. ; name: mojito limeade ; ingredients: fresh mint leaves, limes, ice, white rum, fresh lime juice, club soda, sugar, water, limes, zest of ; preparation:To make the lime-mint syrup, bring the sugar and water to a boil cook until completely dissolved, only about 1 minute. Remove from heat, stir in the lime zest and mint, and let sit for about 30 minutes. Strain, cover and refrigerate until chilled. Muddle mint and lime with the crushed ice in the bottom of a large pitcher. Add chilled lime-mint syrup, rum, lime juice, and more ice. Top off with chilled club soda, to taste. Pour into glasses over crushed ice and serve. Garnish each cocktail glass with a lime slice and mint sprigs. ; name: spiced wassail ; ingredients: cinnamon sticks, cloves, whole allspice, apple cider, cranberry juice, granulated sugar, orange bitters, oranges, rum extract ; preparation:Break the cinnamon stick into pieces, &--along with the whole cloves & whole allspice--tie the cinnamon pieces in a cheesecloth bag. Cut each orange in half. In a large covered saucepan, combine the cider, cranberry juice, sugar & orange bitters. Add the spice bag, oranges & rum extract, & simmer, covered, for 10 minutes. Remove spices & pour into a warm serving bowl, leaving the oranges to float on top. ; name: chilled cranberry soup ; ingredients: water, granulated sugar, cinnamon sticks, ground cloves, fresh cranberries, fresh lemon juice, orange zest, sour cream ; preparation:In a r4-quart sucepan, mix water, sugar, cinnamon sticks & cloves. Bring to boil over high heat, then add cranberries & return to a boil. Reduce heat & cook until cranberries pop, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat & stir in lemon juice & orange zest. Cool to room temperature, then chill about 4 hours in the refrigerator. When ready to serve, top each bowl of soup with a dollop of sour cream. Refrigerate any leftovers. ; name: hot spiced cheer ; ingredients: cloves, cinnamon sticks, crystallized ginger, apple cider, pineapple juice, orange juice, fresh lemon juice, sugar, salt, white rum ; preparation:Place cloves, cinnamon, and crystallized ginger on a double layer of cheesecloth. Gather edges and tie together to make a pouch. Combine cheescloth pouch, cider, pineapple juice, orange juice, lemon juice, sugar and salt in large stockpot and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes. Discard cheesecloth pouch. Serve with rum, if desired. ; name: sweet sage apple and cinnamon toddy ; ingredients: dried apples, fresh sage leaf, cinnamon stick, scotch whisky, honey, boiling water ; preparation:

name: zucchini carrot and parmesan sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, carrot, zucchini, garlic clove, parmesan cheese, cooked pasta ; preparation:Heat the oil over low in a medium skillet. Stir in the carrot, zucchini and garlic. Stirring, 3 minutes. Toss hot pasta with the sauce. Serve with the cheese. ; name: brown butter gnocchi with spinach and pine nuts ; ingredients: gnocchi, butter, pine nuts, garlic cloves, fresh spinach, salt, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook gnocchi according to package directions, drain. Heat butter in a large non stick skillet over medium heat. Add pine nuts to pan. Cook 3 minutes or until butter and nuts are lightly browned, stirring constantly. Add garlic to pan. Cook 1 minute. Add gnocchi and spinach to pan. Cook 1 minute sor until spinach wilts,. Stirring constantly. Stir in salt and pepper. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: barb s zucchini pancakes ; ingredients: zucchini, onion, bisquick, parmesan cheese, eggs, garlic powder, salt and pepper, canola oil ; preparation:Grate zucchini. Chop onion, add to zucchini. Add beaten eggs, bisquick, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Mix well. Fry as pancakes on hot greased griddle or skillet. Serve as a side dish. ; name: spaghetti with zucchini and garlic ; ingredients: zucchini, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, salt & freshly ground black pepper, spaghetti, parmigiano, salt and pepper ; preparation:Pile up 2 or 3 layers of paper towels on a work surface. Working on the paper towels, shred zucchinis using a grater holding the zucchini at an angle. Heat a large skillet over moderate heat. Add extra-virgin olive oil to the pan add chopped garlic to the oil. When garlic starts sizzling in oil, add shredded zucchini. Season zucchini with salt and pepper. Saute shredded zucchini 7 to 10 minutes. Add hot, drained pasta to the pan. Toss spaghetti with zucchini and garlic oil. Add a couple of handfuls of grated cheese to the pan. Adjust seasoning and serve. ; name: portobello pizzas with tomato bruschetta ; ingredients: mushroom caps, garlic clove, olive oil, tomatoes, part-skim mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f remove the mushroom stems and scrape the gills out with a spoon. Stir the garlic into the oil and brush it all over both sides of the mushroom caps. Place the mushrooms bowl-side-up on a baking sheet and bake for 8 - 10 minutes, or until tender. Take the mushrooms out of the oven and over up to 450f. Top mushrooms with bruschetta and sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 5-10 minutes, until the cheese melts. ; name: slow cooked zucchini coins with chopped herbs and crumbled feta ; ingredients: olive oil, zucchini, garlic clove, salt and pepper, fresh herb, feta ; preparation:Heat the oil in a skillet, then add the garlic and zucchini. Sprinkle lightly with salt and cook for 20-30 minutes, stirring every so often. The finished squash should have a golden glaze over the surface and be carmelized in places. Taste for salt and season with pepper. Toss with the herbs and cheese and serve. ; name: breaded n baked zucchini chips ; ingredients: zucchini, egg, milk, garlic, italian breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Combine egg, milk and garlic in a shallow dish and set aside for about 15 minutes to let flavors combine. Combine breadcrumbs, cheese, parsley and pepper in another shallow dish. Dip zucchini slices into egg mixture, then into crumbs and place on a baking sheet that has been sprayed with nonstick cooking spray. Bake for 10 minutes, then turn over and bake for 5 minutes more or until brown and crispy. ; name: continental zucchini ; ingredients: zucchini, corn, pimiento, garlic cloves, oil, salt, pepper, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: grilled potatoes with garlic ; ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, fresh parsley, grainy mustard, lemon juice, butter, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Cut potatoes into large wedges. Place on greased oven trays, bake for about 30 minutes or until just tender. Combine oil, garlic, herbs, mustard and juice in a bowl. Add potatoes and toss until potatoes are well coated with mixture. Return potatoes to oven trays and drizzle with melted butter. Cook under hot grill until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Serve sprinkled with salt if desired. ; name: roasted caraway potatoes ; ingredients: new potatoes, onions, olive oil, caraway seed, salt, pepper ; preparation:Combine first 2 ingredients in a large heavy duty zip-top plastic bag. Mix together remaining ingredients and pour into plastic bag. Shake well to coat. Place potato mixture in an ungreased 13x9 inch pan. Bake at 400 degrees for 1 hour or until potatoes are tender, stirring occasionally. ; name: warm green bean bacon potato salad ; ingredients: small red potato, salt and pepper, olive oil, garlic cloves, bacon, green beans, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:In a large saucepan, cover potatoes with 2 inches salted water. Bring to a simmer and cook until potatoes are just tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Drain thoroughly. In a large nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-high. Add potatoes and garlic and season with salt and pepper. Cook, mashing potatoes slightly, until golden brown in spots, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a serving dish and keep warm. Add bacon to skillet. Cook until bacon is browned, about 3 minutes. Add green beans and cook, stirring occasionally, until bright green and crisp-tender, about 4 minutes. Add to potatoes along with lemon juice to taste. Season with salt and pepper and toss gently to combine. ; name: skordalia potato and garlic dip ; ingredients: floury potatoes, garlic cloves, lemon juice, ground almonds, extra virgin olive oil, egg, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Boil the potatoes in their skins until cooked - about 30 minutes. What you are aiming for in this recipe is starchy mashed potato. As soon as the potatoes are cool enough to handle, peel them and either mash them or put them through a potato ricer. Peel the garlic cloves and pound them in a pestle with the lemon juice or use a hand-blender for this step. Mix the potato, garlic and ground almonds together thoroughly in a bowl, and then beat in the olive oil gradually with a wooden spoon. Beat in the whole egg and season with salt and pepper. ; name: green beans with mushroom cream ; ingredients: fresh green beans, butter, mushrooms, garlic, heavy cream, salt & freshly ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place a large covered pot of lightly salted water on the stove and bring it to a boil. In the meantime, melt butter in a small skillet, increase heat to high, add mushrooms and stir fry until golden brown. Reduce heat to low, add garlic and cook 1 minute. Add cream, salt and pepper and heat through on low. Add beans to boiling water and cook until just tender, drain. Place beans on a serving plate, spoon the mushroom cream across the middle of the beans, sprinkle with parmesan and parsley and serve. ; name: roasted garlic and rosemary potatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh rosemary, garlic cloves, salt and pepper, potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Combine oil, rosemary, garlic, salt and pepper in large bowl. Add potato slices and turn them until throughly coated with the dressing. Arrange in baking dish, slightly overlapping each slice. Place in the oven and bake for 60 minutes until golden crisp. ; name: roasted potatoes and baby carrots with garlic ; ingredients: red potatoes, baby carrots, garlic cloves, olive oil, coarse salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Dry the veggies well with a paper towel and place in a large bowl. Prepare a large non-stick baking sheet, you can line with foil and spray the foil liberally with cooking spray. In a small bowl combine olive oil, chopped garlic, coarse salt and black pepper. Mix well to combine. Pour over the veggies and toss to coat with a wooden spoon or clean hands. Set oven to 400 degrees f. Roast in oven for about 30 minutes or until the potatoes are fork-tender, tossing occasionally with a spatula. ; name: spicy green beans and new potatoes ; ingredients: new potatoes, butter, onion, garlic cloves, fresh green beans, creole seasoning ; preparation:

name: onion and yoghurt dip ; ingredients: yoghurt, onion, coriander leaves, mint leaf, ginger, cumin seed, salt, mustard seeds, green chilies, red chili powder ; preparation:Peel and mince the onion. Clean, wash and chop corriander and mint leaves. Wash and mince the green chillies. Peel and chop the ginger. Roast and powder the cumin seeds. Powder the mustard seeds. Put the onions in water for 15 minutes. Drain thoroughly and keep aside. Blend the yoghurt with 2 tablespoons of water and seasonings. Beat till smooth. Stir in the rest of the ingredients. Serve garnished with a slit green chilli. ; name: aloo raita ; ingredients: yogurt, cumin, salt, black pepper, chili powder, potatoes, fresh chives, cumin seeds ; preparation:Blend together the yogurt, cumin, salt, pepper and chili powder. Chill in fridge. Cook potatoes in boiling water. Peel and dice when cool. Mix with the yogurt. Serve garnished with chopped chives and cumin seeds. ; name: lamb cubes in spicy yogurt marinade ; ingredients: plain yogurt, butter, lemon, juice of, garlic, ground cumin, ground coriander, mustard seeds, cayenne pepper, salt, lamb sirloin ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except the meat in a medium bowl. Place the meat in a shallow glass or ceramic dish in one layer. Pour marinade over and turn meat to coat well. Marinate at room temperature for at least 2 hours. Drain meat. Thread on 6 skewers and grill 10 to 12 minutes, turning to cook all sides. ; name: broiled chicken in spicy marinade ; ingredients: chicken breasts, red pepper flakes, fresh gingerroot, garlic, sea salt, ground cumin, ground coriander, saffron thread, plain yogurt, lime juice ; preparation:Place the red pepper flakes in a small bowl and cover with 1 tbs. Of boiling water. After 10 minutes mash the flakes with the back of a spoon. Mix this paste with the ginger, garlic, sea salt, cumin, coriander and saffron. Add it all to the yogurt and stir well, incorporating the lime juice last. Spoon about three-quarters of the marinade over the breats, moving them around until the are completely covered. Refrigerate until ready to cook. Thiscan be done 2 to 3 hours before cooking or overnight. Reserve the rest of the marinade in the refrigerator. Preheat the broiler and broil the breasts about 4 to 5 minutes on each side, until done. Serve with a dollop of the marinade with each breast as an accompaniment. ; name: eggplant and potato indian ; ingredients: oil, black mustard seeds, potato, eggplant, coriander, cumin, turmeric, cayenne, salt ; preparation:Heat oil over medium-high heat in a big skillet. When hot, put in the mustard seeds. When they start to pop, put in the vegetables. Stir once. Add seasonings. Stir and fry for a minute. Add 3 tablespoons of water, lower heat, cover, and simmer 10-15 minutes. Stir every now and then. If vegetables stick, add a little water. Dish is done when the potatoes are tender. ; name: bean burgers ; ingredients: sunflower seeds, red beans, onion, chili powder, ketchup, wheat germ ; preparation:Chop the sunflower seeds in a food processor. Mix in the remaining ingredients and form the patties. Bake at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes. Remove from the oven and let cool until you can pick up each patty and compress it firmly in your hand to reform the burger. Cook for another 15 minutes on each side. ; name: szechwan green beans ; ingredients: sesame oil, green beans, garlic cloves, salt, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:Place a heavy, deep skillet over medium-high heat. After a few minutes, add the oil. Wait a minute or so and add the green beans. Turn the heat to high and stir-fry for about 5 minutes, or until the beans are well seared. Add the garlic, salt and red pepper, if using. Stir-fry for several more minutes, then remove from heat. ; name: tunisian rub tabil ; ingredients: coriander seeds, cumin seeds, caraway seeds, hot red pepper flakes, coarse salt ; preparation:

name: meatloaf simple and delicious ; ingredients: ground beef, onion roasted garlic soup mix, ketchup, eggs, oatmeal, brown sugar, mustard ; preparation:Mix the ground beef, soup mix, ketchup, eggs and oatmeal together. Spray a 9x13 pan with cooking spray. Press the meatloaf into the pan. Mix the ketchup, brown sugar and mustard together and spread over the meatloaf. Bake at 350 for about 50 minutes. ; name: venus de milo soup ; ingredients: ground beef, chicken broth, water, french onion soup mix, diced tomatoes, celery, frozen mixed vegetables, small shell pasta, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce ; preparation:In a large pot brown ground beef. Drain fat. Add broth, water, celery, soup mix and tomatoes. Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for about 5 minutes. Add pasta and frozen vegetables, along with worcestershire sauce and hot pepper sauce, and cook for 10 minutes more. Serve with parmesan cheese, if desired. ; name: saucy salisbury steak ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, salt, pepper, condensed golden mushroom soup, water, worcestershire sauce, carrot, frozen green beans ; preparation:Mix beef, onion, salt and pepper well. Shape into oval patties. Brown patties, pour off fat. Stir in remaining ingredients. Cove and cook on low for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. ; name: cheater s chili ; ingredients: oil, lean ground turkey, stewed tomatoes, hot chili beans, chili powder ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet. Crumble turkey and cook over medium-high heat until no longer pink. Stir in all remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. ; name: janie s hamburger soup ; ingredients: hamburger, onion, v8 vegetable juice, water, tomato soup, mixed vegetables, italian seasoning, salt, ground black pepper, pasta ; preparation:Saute onion. Brown ground beef with onion. Add remaining ingredients. Simmer on low until pasta is cooked. 2-3 hours. ; name: black eyed pea skillet dinner ; ingredients: ground beef, onions, green pepper, black-eyed peas, whole tomatoes, dried thyme, salt, pepper, hot sauce ; preparation:Add ground beef, onion, and green pepper to a skillet. Cook and crumble meat over medium heat until beef is browned. Drain well. Add the rest of the ingredients to the skillet. Bring to a boil, lower heat, and simmer 30 minutes. ; name: grammy s meatloaf ; ingredients: hamburger meat, ketchup, oatmeal, eggs, onion, salt, pepper, onion soup mix ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Combine all ingredients. Mix lightly but thoroughly. Press into an 8x4 inch loaf pan. Bake for one hour to medium doneness. ; name: sugar bean curry ; ingredients: onion, tomatoes, beans, water, curry powder, oxtail soup mix ; preparation:

name: moist banana nut bread ; ingredients: sugar, eggs, butter, flour, baking soda, baking powder, bananas, nuts, cinnamon, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Cream sugar, eggs and butter. Add dry ingredients. Add mashed bananas, nuts, cinnamon and vanilla. Cook in greased loaf pan for about an hour. For small-medium muffins. 20-30 minutes. ; name: best ever buttermilk pancakes ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, salt, buttermilk, egg, oil ; preparation:Using a food processor, mix together all dry ingredients and pulse 4-5 times to blend. Add remaining ingredients and process until smooth. About 10 seconds. Do not overprocess. Pour onto a hot slightly greased griddle and cook until bubbles appear on the top side. Flip over and brown. ; name: nick s banana bread ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, brown sugar, salt, ginger, cinnamon, vegetable oil, water, vanilla, bananas ; preparation:Mix all dry ingredients into a large mixing bowl. Add all other ingredients. Mix together. Pour mix into bread pan. Bake at 350-400 degrees fahrenheit for 1 hour. ; name: fat free banana crunch muffins ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, white flour, grape-nuts cereal, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, salt, vanilla, egg substitute, bananas ; preparation:In a small bowl mix all dry ingredients together. In a larger bowl mix all wet ingredients together. Add dry ingrediants to wet ingredients. Mix just until combined. Do not overmix. Bake for 20-25 minutes in a 350 degree oven. ; name: bananaberry bread ; ingredients: sugar, butter, eggs, bananas, buttermilk, flour, baking soda, salt, blueberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grease 2 small loaf pans, or 1 large one. Stir sugar, butter, eggs, bananas and buttermilk in large bowl. Stir in flour, baking soda, and salt. Stir in blueberries, pour into pan. Bake large pan for 75 minutes, smaller pan from 55-60 minutes. Cool for 5 minutes, remove from pan onto wire rack, cool 2 hours before slicing. ; name: our favorite banana bread ; ingredients: butter, sugar, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, eggs, bananas, sour cream, walnuts ; preparation:Cream butter. Gradually add sugar, beating with a mixer at medium speed. Combine flour with baking powder, baking soda, and salt, stirring well. Combine eggs, banana, and sour cream. Stir well. Add flour to creamed mixture, alternately with banana mixture, beginning and ending with flour mixture. Mix until blended after each addition. Stir in walnuts. Pour batter into greased and floured 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour and 15 minutes or until a wooden pck inserted in center comes out clean. Let cool completely on a wire rack. Yield 1 loaf. ; name: cooking light toni s banana bread ; ingredients: banana, sugar, canola oil, egg substitute, egg, all-purpose flour, cream of tartar, baking soda, salt, cooking spray ; preparation:Combine the first five ingredients in a large bowl. Beat at medium speed of a mixer until smooth. Combine flour, cream of tartar, baking soda, and salt in a bowl, stirring with a whisk. Add flour mixture to banana mixture, stirring just until moist. Spoon batter into an 8x4-inch loaf pan that has been coated with cooking spray. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes, or until a wooden pick inserted in the center comes out clean. Cool 10 minutes in pan on wire rack. Remove from pan. Cool completely on rack. ; name: banana quinoa muffins wheat free ; ingredients: quinoa flour, quinoa, baking powder, baking soda, salt, bananas, eggs, honey ; preparation:

name: jan s belgian waffles ; ingredients: eggs, vanilla, flour, salt, milk, butter, sugar, cinnamon, lemon juice ; preparation:Beat egg yellow until light. Add a small amount of melted butter and quickly stir to temper the yolks. Add the remaining melted butter, vanilla and lemon juice. Mix well. Combine flour, salt, sugar and cinnamon together in separate bowl. Add warmed milk to flour mixture. Add egg yolk mixture to flour mixture and beat well. Beat egg white until stiff. Gently fold into batter. Pour batter onto heated waffle iron and cook until lightly crisp and golden. Serve with hot syrup, fresh berries, whipped cream, or bananas and chocolate chips. ; name: basic cupcakes ; ingredients: eggs, vanilla, sugar, butter, flour, baking powder, salt, frosting ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Place all ingredients in a bowl and beat together until mixture is smooth. Line muffin pan. Half fill each muffin paper with batter. Bake 18 to 20 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. Frost as desired. ; name: ukranian nothings ; ingredients: eggs, oil, sugar, flour, salt ; preparation:Beat eggs well. Add sugar and beat well. Add oil and beat well. Add flour, pinch of salt and beat until batter is bubbly. Drop by small teaspoons on cookie sheet 2 inches apart. Bake at 325 degrees celcius for 30 minutes. ; name: frozen french toast ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, salt, nutmeg, vanilla, milk, dry bread ; preparation:Beat all but the bread in a large bowl. Dip each slice of bread in mixture so it absorbs as much as possible. Brown on both sides in margarine over moderate heat. Cool. Freeze in single layer on greased cookie sheet overnite. Stack and wrap in foil and return to freezer until ready to use. To heat place slice in toaster until hot. ; name: betty crocker peach pancakes ; ingredients: egg, flour, milk, vegetable oil, sugar, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, peach ; preparation:Beat egg with hand beater until fluffy. Add rest of ingredients. Grease griddle and heat. Pour about 3 tbsp batter onto hot griddle and cook until edges of pancake puff and look dry around edges. Flip, and cook opposite side until golden brown. ; name: betty crocker fudge brownies homemade ; ingredients: sugar, flour, cocoa, salt, baking powder, eggs, oil, vanilla ; preparation:Mix all these ingredients together with a whisk and dump them into a ziploc to save. Should be good in the pantry for 6 months. When making the brownies, preheat oven to 350f. Add eggs, oil and vanilla and mix with a fork til just blended. Do not overmix. Pour into a silicone or buttered 9x9 pan. Bake for 20-25 minutes. ; name: danish cookies press cookies ; ingredients: flour, granulated sugar, butter, salt, vanilla, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cream together sugar and butter. Add eggs which have been slightly beaten. Add salt and flour. Add vanilla. Mix well. Form into fancy shapes by using a cookie press. Place on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 8 to 10 minutes. ; name: jewish old family recipe hamantashen by ileene rubinrotte ; ingredients: eggs, oil, sugar, vanilla, baking powder, salt, flour, raspberry preserves ; preparation:

name: coconut cranberry chews ; ingredients: butter, sugar, orange rind, vanilla, flour, baking powder, salt, dried cranberries, dried coconut ; preparation:With a mixer on medium speed, beat butter, sugar, orange peel and vanilla until smooth. In another bowl mix flour, baking powder and salt. Add butter mixture and beat on low speed for about 5 minutes. Stir in cranberries and coconut. Shape dough into 1-inch balls and place 2 inches apart on buttered baking sheets. Bake in a 350 oven for 8 minutes. Remove from oven and let cookies cool on sheets for 5 minutes. ; name: mama s no bake banana pudding ; ingredients: banana, wafer cookies, sweetened condensed milk, cool whip, instant vanilla pudding ; preparation:Make pudding according to directions on box for pie filling, but do not let set. Mix in cool whip & eagle brand. Slice bananas into desired thickness. In a large bowl, starting with pudding mixture, layer pudding, then cookies, then bananas. Repeat until all pudding mixture is used and top with cookies. Cover & refrigerate 3-4 hours until set. ; name: vanilla pudding dessert ; ingredients: milk, vanilla instant pudding mix, sweetened condensed milk, cool whip, vanilla wafers, fresh strawberries ; preparation:In a large bowl, whisk milk and pudding mix for 2 minutes. Let stand for 15 minutes. Fold in condensed milk. Set aside 1 tablespoon whipped topping and 2 tablespoons wafer crumbs. Fold remaining whipped topping into pudding. In a 2 quart serving bowl, layer a third of the strawberries, wafer crumbs and pudding mixture. Repeat layers twice. Sprinkle with reserved wafer crumbs. Top with reserved whipped topping. Refrigerate until serving. ; name: grizzlenuckles ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, graham wafer crumbs, desiccated coconut, chocolate chips, icing sugar ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except icing sugar. Mix well. Pat into a greased 13x9-inch pan. Bake at 350f for 20-25 minutes. Do not overbake. Sprinkle with icing sugar. Cool and cut into squares. ; name: layered coconut bars ; ingredients: margarine, vanilla wafer crumbs, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts, flaked coconut, sweetened condensed milk ; preparation:Combine butter and crumbs in an 8-inch square baking dish. Press down to form a crust. Sprinkle with chocolate chips, nuts and coconut. Pour milk over all. Bake at 350f for 25 minutes. ; name: sue s quick n easy banana pudding ; ingredients: condensed milk, water, vanilla instant pudding mix, cool whip, vanilla wafers, bananas ; preparation:Put the condensed milk and the water in a bowl and mix well. Add the box of instant pudding and stir until well combined. Chill about 5 minutes until set. Fold in cool whip. Layer pudding, cookies, and bananas 2 or 3 times, depending on the size and shape of your serving dish. Keep in fridge until ready to serve. ; name: vanilla wafer almond pie crust ; ingredients: vanilla wafer cookies, unsalted butter, salt, pure vanilla extract, almonds ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350-degrees. Process cookies in food processor until finely ground. Combine crumbs, butter, salt, vanilla and almonds, stirring until crumbs are moistened. Press mixture evenly across 9-inch pie plate. Bake crust until crisp, about 7 minutes. Let cool completely before filling. Crust may also be wrapped tightly in plastic and frozen up to one month. ; name: no bake vanilla orange balls ; ingredients: vanilla wafers, powdered sugar, oleo, nuts, frozen orange juice, coconut ; preparation:

name: southwestern cilantro pork ; ingredients: pork chops, salt and pepper, vegetable oil, fresh cilantro, red onion, ground cumin, chili powder, tomatoes ; preparation:Heat vegetable oil in large non-stick skillet. Rub pork chops with salt and pepper. Place on hot skillet. Cook each side 2-3 minutes. Meanwhile, place half of the chopped cilantro, red onions, half the cumin, half the chili powder, and salt and pepper in bottom of crock pot. Place the pork chops on top. Place chopped tomatoes, remaining cilantro, remaining cumin, remaining chili powder, and salt and pepper on top of pork chops. Cook on high for 3-4 hours. ; name: just right vegetable beef stew ; ingredients: stew meat, baking potatoes, carrots, onion, okra, mixed vegetables, sweet corn, crushed tomatoes, tomato juice, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place meat, onions, potatoes, and carrots into a dutch oven, cover with water and boil for twenty minutes or until potatoes are tender. Add canned vegetables. You probably will not need the entire can of tomato juice. Simmer on stove for thirty minutes. Salt and pepper to taste. Serve with hot corn bread. ; name: chilly day chicken soup stew ; ingredients: butter, potatoes, onion, carrots, chicken broth, pasta, instant rice, chicken meat, salt & pepper ; preparation:Boil fast in a little water add margarine, potatoes, onion, & carrots until 10 minutes from being done. Add chicken broth or buillion, pasta, & rice. Add chicken. Salt& pepper. Cook about 10 minutes. Until pasta and rice are done. ; name: pork with carrots and snow peas ; ingredients: oil, boneless pork chops, salt and pepper, carrots, snow peas, chicken broth, flour, lemon juice ; preparation:Heat oil in a skillet. Slice chops horizontally into thirds. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and fry in oil on medium high heat until browned on both sides, 2-3 minutes per side. Remove from pan. Set aside. Add carrots and snow peas to pan. Cook, stirring, one minute. Combine broth, flour and lemon juice. Add to carrots in skillet. Cook, stirring, 1 minute, or until liquid is slightly thickened. Return pork to pan. Heat through. ; name: 4 hour beef stew ; ingredients: stew meat, onion, carrots, celery, potatoes, sugar, salt, dry tapioca, v8 vegetable juice, delmonte ketchup ; preparation:Place meat on bottom of 9 x 13 pan. Spread veggies over top. Mix sugar, salt and tapioca in small bowl and then sprinkle over all the meat and veggies. Mix v8 and ketchup in small bowl and pour over all. Cover tightly with foil and bake in oven at 250 for about 4-5 hours, no peeking. ; name: student ragout ; ingredients: bacon, round steak, white onions, carrots, potatoes, garlic salt, salt and pepper ; preparation:In large, deep pot, fry bacon and leave in pot to cool. Add steak, garlic salt, salt and pepper. Layer onions, then carrots, then potatoes, adding salt and pepper to each layer. Add water up to top of potatoes. Turn burner on medium high. When meat begins to sizzle, cover pot, and turn heat to low. When potatoes are tender, stew is done. ; name: bacon and rice creole ; ingredients: bacon, green bell pepper, onions, salt, canned tomatoes, brown rice ; preparation:Simmer vegetables and spices in a saucepan. At the same time, fry the bacon. When bacon is done, remove from pan and crumble into small pieces. Drain off all fat. Let rice brown lightly. Add the vegetables and bacon. Let simmer over very low heat for 30 minutes. Check after 20 minutes to see if it is drying out. If so, add more tomatoes, or some water, or a combination of both. ; name: salt cod chowder ; ingredients: salt cod fish, fat salt pork, onion, raw potatoes, raw carrot, boiling water, salt, pepper, canned corn niblet, milk ; preparation:

name: cheesecake for breakfast omelette ; ingredients: butter, eggs, sour cream, white sugar, cream cheese, vanilla, fruit preserves, whipped cream ; preparation:In bowl mix eggs with sour cream and 1 tbsp sugar. Whisk for five minutes or use electric mixer on low for two minutes. Melt butter in a heavy 8-inch teflon coated fry pan over lowest heat setting and add egg mixture. While eggs are cooking place cream cheese in bowl and warm in microwave for 45 seconds. Check for warmth, must be warm but not hot. Microwaves vary, after 1st time segment if additional heating is needed use 15 second bursts. Add vanilla and rest of sugar to cream cheese and stir until well combined. Flip omelette by sliding onto plate, cover top with fry pan and invert, replace on heat until firm. Top omelette with cream cheese mixture and then place fruit topping on top of cream cheese. Finish with whipped cream. Serve with your favorite toast buttered and topped with cinnamon sugar. ; name: christmas meringue cookies ; ingredients: egg whites, cream of tartar, salt, sugar, semi-sweet chocolate chips, candy cane, nuts, vanilla ; preparation:Whip egg whites until frothy. Add cream of tarter and salt. Whip until stiff and dry. Add sugar, beating constantly until very stiff. Fold in chocolate chips, crushed candy canes, nuts, and vanilla. Drop by spoonfuls onto heavy brown paper. Bake at 300 degrees until the meringue sets. Cool. Remove from brown paper. ; name: caramel fondue ; ingredients: sugar, corn syrup, water, heavy cream, unsalted butter, pure vanilla extract, cake, chocolate ; preparation:In medium saucepan, combine the sugar with the corn syrup and water. Cook over low heat, stirring occasionally, until the sugar dissolves, about 10 minutes. Increase the heat to moderately high and simmer, brushing down the sides of the saucepan occasionally with a wet brush, ntil the syrup starts to turn golden. Gently swirl the pan and continue to simmer until a deep amber caramel forms, about 40 minutes total from the time you started. Remove the saucepan from the heat. Carefullyl stir in the heavy cream, then stir in the butter until melted. Return the saucepan to the heat and bring the caramel just to a simmer. Remove from the heat and stir in the vanilla. Let the caramel cool for 30 minutes, whisking occasionally. Pour the caramel into a heatproof serving bowl or fondue pot set over low heat and serve with the cake, fruit and garnishes. The caramel can be refrigerated for 1 week. Rewarm gently over low heat. ; name: chocolate waffle pudding ; ingredients: frozen waffles, dark chocolate, eggs, caster sugar, milk, buttermilk, vanilla essence, icing sugar, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 160c lightly grease a 22cm square ovenproof dish. Arrange the waffles in the prepared dish. Sprinkle with the chocolate. Whisk the eggs, sugar, milk, buttermilk and vanilla essence in a large jug until well combined. Pour half the egg mixture over waffles. Set aside for 5 minutes, then pour over the remaining egg mixture. Place the dish in a large roasting pan and fill with enough boiling water to come halfway up the sides of the dish. Bake for about 50 minutes or until the custard has just set. Set aside for 5 minutes before serving.
