Dust with icing sugar and serve with ice cream if desired. ; name: fantastic buttery cream cheese coffee cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, sour cream, flour, baking powder, salt, cream cheese, egg yolk, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 13 x 9-inch. Cream butter with sugar, add in eggs and sour cream. Beat well. In a bowl, sift together flour, baking powder and salt. Add the flour mixture to the creamed mixture. Beat well until combined. Spread more than half of the batter in the prepared baking pan. In another bowl, cream together all filling ingredients, then carefully spread over the cake batter. Spoon the remaining cake batter over the top of the cheese mixture. For the topping mix all ingredients, and sprinkle over cake. Bake for about 50-55 minutes or until middle feels set and not jiggly. ; name: kahlua pots de crme ; ingredients: eggs, heavy cream, sugar, egg yolks, grand marnier, kahlua, chocolate chips, vanilla extract, whipped cream ; preparation:

name: autumn pumpkin spice fudge ; ingredients: sugar, milk, light corn syrup, pumpkin, salt, pumpkin pie spice, vanilla extract, butter, nuts ; preparation:In 3 quart saucepan, combine sugar, milk, syrup, pumpkin, & salt. Bring to a boil over high heat, stirring constantly. Reduce the heat to medium, continue boiling, do not stir. When mixture heats to 232 deg. On candy thermometer remove from heat. Stir in pumpkin pie spice, vanilla, butter& the nuts. Let cool to lukewarm. Beat until very thick& until it loses some of its gloss. Quickly, pour mixture into greased 8-inch square pan. When fudge is firm, cut into pieces. ; name: christmas meringue cookies ; ingredients: egg whites, cream of tartar, salt, sugar, semi-sweet chocolate chips, candy cane, nuts, vanilla ; preparation:Whip egg whites until frothy. Add cream of tarter and salt. Whip until stiff and dry. Add sugar, beating constantly until very stiff. Fold in chocolate chips, crushed candy canes, nuts, and vanilla. Drop by spoonfuls onto heavy brown paper. Bake at 300 degrees until the meringue sets. Cool. Remove from brown paper. ; name: filled custard with fresh fruit ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, nutmeg, milk, half-and-half, egg yolks, vanilla, fresh fruit ; preparation:Combine sugar, cornstarch and nutmeg in top of double boiler. Gradually whisk in milk, half and half, yolks and vanilla until smooth. Set over simmering water. Stir until thick. Cover and continue cooking 10 minutes. Spoon custard into two 1-cup molds. Refrigerate until firm, about 4 hours. Invert custard onto plates. Top with fresh fruit. ; name: nanny s southern pecan pie ; ingredients: eggs, pecan halves, light corn syrup, vanilla extract, sugar, salt, pie crusts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine eggs, corn syrup, vanilla, sugar, and salt in a large mixing bowl. Arrange pecans evenly in the bottom of the pie crust. Pour egg mixture over pecans in the shell. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes or until puffy and crust is golden brown. ; name: 5 star creamed corn ; ingredients: frozen corn, heavy whipping cream, whole milk, salt, sugar, cayenne pepper, butter, flour, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Combine all ingredients, except butter and flour. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes. Blend melted butter with the flour to make a roux. Add roux to the corn and mix well. Remove from heat. Pour into a casserole dish. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Broil until cheese is nicely browned. ; name: banana coconut cream pie smoothie ; ingredients: light coconut milk, pineapple juice, vanilla, sugar, ground nutmeg, ice cubes, bananas, sweetened coconut, whipped cream ; preparation:Place coconut milk, pineapple juice, vanilla, sugar, nutmeg, ice cubes, and frozen banana pieces in a blender. Blend on high until mixture is frothy and ice cubes are finely ground, about 30 seconds to 1 minute. Pour into 4 glasses. Garnish with whipped cream and sprinkle on a little toasted coconut if desired. For vegan omit whipped cream. ; name: apple butterscotch macadamia pie ; ingredients: eggs, light corn syrup, tart apples, butter, vanilla extract, salt, ground cinnamon, macadamia nuts, nestl toll house butterscotch flavored morsels, unbaked 9-inch pie shell ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Combine eggs, corn syrup, apple, butter, vanilla extract, salt and cinnamon in large bowl. Mix well. Stir in nuts and morsels. Pour into pie shell. Bake for 45 to 50 minutes or until edge is set but center still moves slightly. Cool on wire rack for 2 hours. Serve immediately or cover and refrigerate. ; name: coconut macadamia nut french toast ; ingredients: coconut, corn flakes, macadamia nuts, eggs, milk, hawaiian sweet bread, vegetable oil, maple syrup, whipped cream ; preparation:

name: buttered noodles with eggs and parmesan cheese ; ingredients: noodles, eggs, parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, black pepper, butter ; preparation:Cook noodles in a large pot of lightly salted water until al dente. While the pasta is cooking, place the eggs, grated cheese, parsley, salt and pepper into a mixing bowl and beat with a whisk until well combined. When the noodles are almost cooked, melt the butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Quickly drain the pasta and add it to the skillet. Toss briefly to coat it with the butter. Add the egg mixture to the skillet and using a flat wooden spoon, mix quickly together for less than a minute until the eggs and noodles become creamy and thick. Do not cook the eggs too long or they will scramble and ruin the dish. Serve immediately. ; name: noodle koogle kugel ; ingredients: wide egg noodles, sugar, golden raisin, eggs, butter, crushed pineapple, lime, juice of, cinnamon ; preparation:Cook and drain noodles. In large bowl mix other ingredients together. Add in noodle to mixture. Place in a casserole dish or baking foil dish. Sprinkle top with more cinnamon. Bake at a preheated 375 oven for an hour. Let warm and enjoy. ; name: ukrainian spinach noodles ; ingredients: egg noodles, butter, onion, fresh spinach, swiss cheese ; preparation:In a bowl toss noodles with one tablespoon butter. In a skillet melt the remaining butter over medium low heat. Stir in onion and cook for 5 minutes. Stir in spinach and increase heat to high cooking until spinach is limp, tossing occasionally. Stir in noodles, cooking and stirring until heated through. Transfer noodle mixture to a bowl and toss with cheese. Season with salt and pepper. Toss. ; name: buttered noodles with fresh sage ; ingredients: egg noodles, butter, onion, fresh sage leaves, salt, black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook noodles according to package directions. Drain. Melt butter in the empty pot. Simmer onion and sage leaves 5 minutes. Add salt and pepper. Toss with noodles. Top with parmesan cheese just before serving. ; name: ham cheese noodle casserole ; ingredients: ham, egg noodles, sharp cheddar cheese, cream of chicken soup, butter, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cook noodles in accordance with package and drain. In a medium mixing bowl, combine melted soup and milk and stir until well blended. In 13 x 9 baking dish, combine ham, cooked noodles, liquid soup mixture and half of the cheese. Bake for 20 minutes. Sprinkle remaining cheese over top of casserole. Dot with butter. Bake for additional 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbly. ; name: best of all macaroni cheese ; ingredients: macaroni, egg, small curd cottage cheese, sour cream, cheese, salt and pepper, basil ; preparation:Combine egg, cottage cheese, sour cream, cheese, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Add cooked pasta and mix together. Place in any casserole dish. Cook at 350 degrees for a half an hour. Sprinkle with basil for extra flavor. ; name: light bacon and noodles ; ingredients: egg noodles, turkey bacon, fat free sour cream, fat-free cheddar cheese, onion ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cook bacon on stove until crispy. Cook noodles in boiling water until al dente. When bacon is cool, crumble it into small pieces. Add the sour cream and chopped onion to the cooked noodles. Add the bacon and half of the cheese into the noodles, stir well. Pour mixture into a square casserole dish and top with remaining cheddar cheese. Bake in oven for 15 minutes or until bubbly and cheese has melted. ; name: noodles and pot cheese turos teszia ; ingredients: wide egg noodles, pot cheese, butter, sour cream ; preparation:

name: german green beans ; ingredients: bacon, onions, flour, sugar, salt, pepper, vinegar, green beans, bacon bits ; preparation:Fry the bacon in a large cast-iron skillet until crisp, then drain on paper towels, leaving the fat in the pan. Add the onion and cook until light golden and tender, then add the flour and stir, cooking for about 1 minute. Add the sugar, salt, pepper, bean liquid or water, and vinegar, stir, and bring to a rolling boil. Allow to boil for about 3 minutes to thicken the sauce. Add the bacon bits at this time. Add the green beans and cook until heated through, about 7--8 minutes. Transfer the beans and sauce to a serving bowl and top with crumbled bacon. ; name: creamy bean tortilla soup ; ingredients: bacon, onion, celery, salt, red pepper, garlic powder, rotel tomatoes, chicken broth, refried beans, water ; preparation:Saute onion and celery in bacon grease you get from frying your bacon strips. Combine all ingredients including the crumbled bacon and heat till hot. Add water to desired consistency. Soup should be creamy. Serve with tortilla chips. ; name: brussels sprouts extraordinaire ; ingredients: onion, butter, flour, sugar, tomato juice, salt, pepper, frozen brussels sprouts, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a skillet, saute onion in butter until tender. Remove onion and set aside. Blend flour into the drippings. Add tomato juice. Cook and stir over low heat until thickened and smooth. Stir in the sugar, salt, pepper and onion. Arrange the brussels sprouts in a greased 1 quart baking dish. Top with the tomato sauce. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. ; name: sauteed peas and celery ; ingredients: olive oil, red onion, celery, frozen peas, celery leaves, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet on med, add onions, cook until soft. Add celery, cook until crisp tender. Increase heat to med hi, add peas. Cook until peas are heated through. Stir in celery leaves, salt and pepper. ; name: delicious vegetarian gravy ; ingredients: butter, onion, carrots, celery, peppercorns, bay leaves, flour, vegetable broth ; preparation:In a medium sauce pan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the onion, carrots, celery, celery leafs, peppercorns, and bay leafs. Cook until very dark but not burned. 40-50 minutes. Stir in the flour and cook for 2-3 minutes. Slowly pour in the broth while stirring constantly. Bring to a boil, and then drop the heat to low, cover, and cook for 20 minutes. Strain through a cheesecloth and serve immediately. Enjoy. ; name: vegetarian green chili ; ingredients: butter, garlic, onion flakes, flour, diced tomatoes, green chili pepper, salt, cilantro, water ; preparation:In a large sauce pan, melt butter or margarine. Add garlic and onion and cook until onion is re-hydtrated. Add flour and stir to make a roux. Add tomatoes, green chili, salt and cilantro. Add water. Simmer for 30 minutes. This can also be made in a crock pot. ; name: tomato bacon chowder ; ingredients: cooked bacon, butter, flour, nutmeg, low-sodium low-fat chicken broth, diced tomatoes with juice, half-and-half cream, black pepper ; preparation:In heavy saucepan melt butter. Stir in flour. Gradually whisk in half & half and chicken broth. Add nutmeg. Cook and stir until thickened over medium heat. Stir in diced tomatoes along with their juice. Dice bacon and add to soup mixture. Heat through and season with black pepper. ; name: 1960 tomato gravy ; ingredients: bacon grease, onion, flour, salt, pepper, canned tomatoes, sugar, bay leaf, celery leaves ; preparation:

name: bacon wrapped stuffed fish ; ingredients: fish fillets, reduced-sodium bacon, unsalted butter, onion, brown breadcrumbs, parsley, herbs, salt & pepper ; preparation:To make the stuffing, melt butter, add onion, saut gently and add all other ingredients except the fish. Cut each fillet in half lengthwise. Place stuffing on each fillet, roll up and wrap a thin slice of bacon around each roll. Place in a buttered ovenproof dish, cover and bake in a moderate oven for 15 minutes. Remove cover to brown the dish for last five minutes. Garnish with lemon wedges and parsley. ; name: i did it stuffing balls ; ingredients: bread, butter, onion, celery, parsley flakes, pepper, salt, poultry seasoning, chicken broth ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cover baking sheet with foil and spray with cooking spray. Put torn bread in large bowl. In skillet, saute onion and celery in the butter. Once soft, add parsley, pepper, salt and poultry seasonings and mix well. Add cooked mixture to bread and incorporate fully. Pour chicken broth over bread and again mix well. Hands work well. Form into balls or use the easy method and use an ice cream scoop. Place on prepared baked sheet and bake for 1 hour. These can be made ahead and frozen and then reheated. ; name: new england scalloped oysters and scallops ; ingredients: butter, breadcrumbs, oyster, celery seed, salt and pepper, cream, scallops ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Mix the melted butter and bread crumbs together and put one third of them in a thin layer in the bottom of a buttered baking dish. Cover with half of the oysters and seasonings. Add some of the cream. Layer half of the scallops next, seasonings, and another third of buttered crumbs. Add the remaining oysters and cream. Top with the final half of scallops and top with remaining buttered crumbs. Bake for 30 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: crab stuffed red snapper ; ingredients: onion, butter, crabmeat, fresh breadcrumb, fresh parsley, heavy cream, lemon thyme, red snapper, salt and pepper, dry white wine ; preparation:Saute onion in butter until golden. Remove from heat and mix in the crab meat, bread crumbs, parsley, heavy cream, and lemon thyme. Sprinkle cavity of fish lightly with salt and pepper. Stuff the fish and skewer edges securely. Mix wine and butter together. Place fish in a greased baking pan, pour wine-butter mixture over fish. Bake in 400f oven, uncovered for 30 minutes or just until the flesh is opaque, basting frequently with wine sauce. ; name: seafood bisque ; ingredients: green onion, butter, all-purpose flour, milk, hot sauce, salt, pepper, fresh lump crabmeat, shrimp, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a large saucepan, saute the green onions in melted butter until the onions are tender. Add in the flour. Stir until smooth. Cook for 1 minutes stirring constantly. Gradually add in the milk. Cook and stir constantly over medium heat until mixture is thickened and bubbly. Stir in hot sauce, salt and pepper to taste. Add in crabmeat and shrimp. Cook and stir over low heat until shrimp turn pink. Add in parsley and stir to combine. Serve. ; name: chicken and corn impossible quiche ; ingredients: milk, eggs, butter, plain flour, tasty cheese, cooked chicken, creamed corn, fresh parsley, chives, salt and pepper ; preparation:Whisk eggs, milk and butter together in a large jug. Sift the flour into a bowl. Make a well in the centre and gradually whisk in the milk mixture. Mix in half the cheese and all remaining ingredients. Spoon mixture into a deep greased pie 25cm pie plate. Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake in a moderate oven for 35-40 minutes or until firm. ; name: simple stove top stuffing ; ingredients: onion, celery, butter, parsley flakes, poultry seasoning, salt, pepper, stale bread, chicken broth ; preparation:In a saucepan saut onion and celery in butter on medium for about 5 minutes until onion is soft. Mix next four ingredients in small bowl and add to onion mixture. Heat and stir for about 1 minute until fragrant. Add bread cubes and stir. Then add chicken broth slowly while stirring. Bread should be moist but not mushy. Fluff with fork to serve. If you want to make simple baked stuffing put stuffing into greased 2 quart casserole dish. Cover and bake at 325f for 30 minutes. Can buddy with chicken in oven. ; name: baked trout amandine ; ingredients: buttermilk, breadcrumbs, fresh parsley, mustard powder, salt, black pepper, trout fillets, slivered almonds, butter ; preparation:

name: special gourmet christmas eggnog ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, milk, whipping cream, bourbon, cognac, dark rum, ground nutmeg, maraschino cherry ; preparation:Beat the egg yolks until they are light. Gradually beat in the sugar until the mixture is thick& light colored. Beat the egg whites until stiff. Pour the egg mizture into a punchbowl that is sitting in crushed ice. Blend in the milk and the beaten cream slowly pour in the bourbon& cognac. Fold in the egg whites. Sprinkle the punch with the 2 tbsp of dark rum. ; name: hpnotiq blue mojito ; ingredients: white rum, hpnotiq liqueur, simple syrup, lime wedges, mint leaves, soda water ; preparation:Muddle mint leaves, 1 lime wedge and simple syrup. Add ice, rum and hpnotiq. Shake. Pour into collins glass. Top with soda water. Garnish with lime wedge. ; name: rice pudding with sultanas spain ; ingredients: white rice, granulated sugar, milk, vanilla extract, sultana, brandy, cinnamon, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Put sultanas in a bowl & cover them with the brandy, then allow them to sit & soak up some of the liquid, about 30 minutes. In a heavy sauce pan, combine rice, sugar, milk, the drops of vanilla & the cinnamon stick. When the milk starts to boil, turn heat to low & simmer slowly, about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent rice from sticking to the bottom of the pan. When sultanas have soaked up some of the brandy, drain them & add the sultanas to the rice & milk mixture. Continue cooking for another 10-15 minutes, & once rice has cooked, remove pan from the heat & remove the cinnamon stick. Spoon into a serving bowl & let cool a bit before sprinkling a little ground cinnamon over the top & serving. ; name: french clafouti ; ingredients: fruit, eggs, flour, sugar, milk, vanilla extract, rum ; preparation:Grease and flour circular deep dish glass pie plate. Beat together eggs, sugar and flour. Add the vanilla and milk gradually. Arrange the fruit in the bottom of the pan. Pour the batter mixture over the fruit. Optional, strew dots of unsalted butter over the clafouti halfway though baking. Bake at 400 degrees f, for 30 to 40 minutes. ; name: tropical pineapple salad ; ingredients: pineapple, honey, passion fruit, dark rum ; preparation:Halve the pineapple, cut away and discard the core, and scoop out the pineapple flesh. Reserve the shell. Roughly chop the flesh and toss with enough honey to sweeten. Halve the passion fruit, spoon out the pulp, and combine with the pineapple. Stir in the rum and chill for 30 minutes so the flavors marry. Spoon the fruit back into the shell and serve. ; name: chocolate mocha pots ; ingredients: eggs, butter, chocolate, rum, coffee extract, whipped cream ; preparation:Put the egg yolks, butter and chocolate in a heat-proof bowl, set over a pan of hot water. Cook gently, whisking occasionally, until chocolate has melted. Remove from heat and whisk in the rum and coffee. Beat the egg whites until stiff, and fold into the coffee mixture until thoroughly mixed. Pour into 8 small ramekins or pots or cups, and refrigerate to set. Decorate with whipped cream and chocolate shavings. If truly showing off, decorate with fresh strawberries and cream. ; name: hot bananas with rum and raisins ; ingredients: raisins, dark rum, unsalted butter, light brown sugar, bananas, nutmeg, ground cinnamon, slivered almonds ; preparation:Put the raisins in a bowl with the rum. Let them soak while you saute the bananas. Melt the butter in a frying pan, add the sugar and stir until dissolved. Add the bananas and cook for a few minutes, until tender. Sprinkle the spices over the bananas, then pour the rum and raisins on top. Sprinkle on the almonds and serve. Good with ice cream. ; name: spicy night cap ; ingredients: spiced rum, milk, cinnamon, sugar ; preparation:

name: gerstensuppe barley soup ; ingredients: butter, barley, celery, onion, flour, chicken broth, salt & pepper, heavy cream ; preparation:Heat butter in heavy saucepan. Saut onions, celery, and barley in it. Sprinkle with flour. Gradually stir in hot broth. Season with salt and pepper. Simmer, covered, for about 1 hour, stirring occasionally, until barley is very tender. Remove from heat and add cream. ; name: jalapeno cheese soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, celery, yellow onions, garlic salt, white pepper, velveeta cheese, jalapeno pepper, sour cream, flour tortilla ; preparation:Cut the velveeta cheese into cubes. In a large saucepan, place the chicken broth, diced celery, diced onions, garlic salt and white pepper. Cook over high heat for 10 minutes, or until the mixture reduces and thickens slightly. In a blender or food processor, place the broth and the cubed velveeta cheese. Puree them together until the mixture is smooth. Return the pureed mixture to the saucepan and simmer it for 5 minutes. Add the diced jalapeno peppers and mix thoroughly. Serve with a dollop of sour cream and a warm flour tortillas. ; name: brussels sprouts extraordinaire ; ingredients: onion, butter, flour, sugar, tomato juice, salt, pepper, frozen brussels sprouts, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a skillet, saute onion in butter until tender. Remove onion and set aside. Blend flour into the drippings. Add tomato juice. Cook and stir over low heat until thickened and smooth. Stir in the sugar, salt, pepper and onion. Arrange the brussels sprouts in a greased 1 quart baking dish. Top with the tomato sauce. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. ; name: tomato tarte ; ingredients: flour, egg, cold water, salt and pepper, butter, dijon mustard, tomatoes, thyme, olive oil ; preparation:Combine the flour and egg in a mixing bowl with a pinch of salt. Mix in the butter with the flour mixture with your hands. Add the water by the tablespoon until you can gather the dough into a ball. Refrigerate the dough for about 30 minutes. Preheat oven to 450f grease 10-12 inch round pizza pan. Roll out the dough to fit the your pizza pan or you can just press the dough in the pan. Bake for 10 minutes and remove from oven. Let your oven cool down to 400f spread the crust with mustard and then layer on the tomato slices. Sprinkle the thyme, salt and pepper on top of the tomatoes. Drizzle with olive oil and bake at 400f for 30 minutes. ; name: tomato bacon chowder ; ingredients: cooked bacon, butter, flour, nutmeg, low-sodium low-fat chicken broth, diced tomatoes with juice, half-and-half cream, black pepper ; preparation:In heavy saucepan melt butter. Stir in flour. Gradually whisk in half & half and chicken broth. Add nutmeg. Cook and stir until thickened over medium heat. Stir in diced tomatoes along with their juice. Dice bacon and add to soup mixture. Heat through and season with black pepper. ; name: crisp roasted broccoli ; ingredients: broccoli, olive oil, coarse salt, cracked black pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven and a baking sheet to 375. Cut broccoli into florets, the smaller the size the quicker it will cook and crispier it will be. Toss florets with olive oil to coat. Add remaining ingredients and toss well. Spread into a single layer on the hot baking sheet. If desired sprinkle additional parmesan cheese and black pepper on top. Bake for 10-12 minutes for small florets or 15-20 for larger pieces. ; name: cheesy onion soup ; ingredients: onions, butter, cayenne pepper, flour, seasoning salt, half-and-half, colby, ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, crouton ; preparation:In a large saucepan saute onion and pinch cayenne pepper in butter until the onions are just lightly golden. Stir in flour and salt until blended. Gradually add half and half cream until blended. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Season with ground black pepper to taste. Stir in colby or monterey jack cheese until melted. Ladle into bowls, sprinkle with parmesan cheese and croutons. ; name: broccoli cheese appetizer tarts ; ingredients: wonton skins, butter, egg, flour, cooked broccoli, roasted red pepper, cheddar cheese, onion powder, dried thyme, pepper ; preparation:

name: hash brown bake ; ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, butter, cooked ham, shredded cheddar cheese, red peppers, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Thaw potatoes between layers of paper towels to remove excess moisture. Press into bottom and up sides of an ungreased 9-inch pie plate. Drizzle with butter. Bake for 25 minutes until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack for 10 minutes. Combine ham, cheese and red and green peppers. Spoon into potato shell. Combine eggs, milk, salt and pepper, stirring well. Pour over ham mixture. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 to 30 minutes or until set. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving. ; name: carrot potato and onion gratin ; ingredients: butter, russet potatoes, onions, carrot, salt, fresh ground black pepper, chicken stock, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f generously butter a medium-size gratin dish. Make a layer of one-third of the potato slices in the bottom of the prepared gratin dish. Add a layer of half the onions and then half the carrots. Dot with 2 tablespoons of the butter and season well with salt and pepper. Repeat the layers and finish with the remaining one-third of the potato slices. Dot with the remaining 2 tablespoons of butter and season with salt and pepper. Pour in the stock. Cover with aluminum foil and bake until the vegetables are tender, about 45 minutes. Uncover and sprinkle with the cheese. Bake 10 minutes longer, until the cheese is golden brown. Serve very hot. Makes 6 to 8 servings. ; name: baby new potatoes with creamy parmesan sauce ; ingredients: new potatoes, butter, flour, milk, salt, black pepper, ground nutmeg, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cover potatoes with water, bring to a boil, lower heat, cover and simmer until tender, about 8 minutes. Drain and cover to keep warm. In saucepan over medium high heat, melt butter, whisk in flour, then milk, stirring constantly until thick. Season sauce with salt, black pepper and nutmeg. Stir in cheese. Pour sauce over potatoes and stir to coat. ; name: cheesy spuds dauphinoise ; ingredients: floury potatoes, milk, heavy whipping cream, garlic, salt and pepper, unsalted butter, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Place the cream, milk and garlic in a saucepan and slowly bring to the boil. Remove from the heat and allow to cool. Peel and thinly slice the potatoes. Butter a small baking tray or ovenproof dish and season lightly with salt and pepper arrange slices of potato over the bottom of the dish overlapping as you go, lightly seasoning each layer with salt and pepper until all the potato is used up. Pour the cream and milk mixture over until the potatoes are just covered. Press down the potatoes with something flat so that the cream covers all of the potatoes. Bake in a moderate oven for about 30 minutes. Turn the oven down to 300f and sprinkle the potatoes with grated cheese. Cook until tender for a further 15 minutes. If the potatoes get too brown on top for your liking, cover them with aluminium foil. ; name: uncle john s baked potato soup ; ingredients: baking potatoes, butter, flour, milk, sour cream, whole green onions, cheddar cheese, salt and pepper, bacon ; preparation:Bake potatoes until tender. Melt butter slowly in pan, blend in flour, making a roux. Gradually add milk, stirring constantly, then add salt and pepper to taste. Scoop out potatoes and set aside. Chop half of the potato peels to use in soup. When milk is very hot, whisk in potatoes, onions, and potato peels. Whisk well and add sour cream. Heat thoroughly. Add cheese a little at a time until all is melted. Serve with crumbled bacon. ; name: easy hash brown potato bake ; ingredients: frozen hash browns, butter, parmesan cheese, onion, salt and black pepper, garlic powder, cream of chicken soup, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Set oven to 350 degrees f. Butter a casserole dish or baking pan enough to hold the ingredients. Mix all ingredients together adjust salt and pepper to taste. Transfer to a buttered casserole dish. Bake for 40-45 minutes. ; name: sweet potato mash with caramelised onions ; ingredients: onions, oil, sweet potato, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:Peel onions, cut in half and finely slice so you have half moon shaped circles. Put into a medium frypan and drizzle with oil and massage the oil in to break up the half rings. Cover frypan and cook over a low to moderate heat giving a stir occasionally until a nice golden colour, the longer you take the sweeter the onion will be. Put sweet potatoes in a pot of cold water and season with a little salt and bring to the boil and cook till tender. When potatoes are cook, drain and give a good shake, put in butter and mash till you get the consistency you like. Add your caramelised onions and mix in well and season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: easy campfire potatoes made in the oven ; ingredients: onion, butter, flour, salt, pepper, sharp cheddar cheese, milk, frozen hash brown potatoes ; preparation:

name: yummy roasted garlic mashed potatoes ; ingredients: garlic, olive oil, russet potatoes, butter, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Drizzle garlic with olive oil, then wrap in aluminum foil. Bake in preheated oven for 1 hour. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add potatoes, and cook until tender, about 15 minutes. Drain, cool and chop. Stir in butter, milk, salt and pepper. Remove the garlic from the oven, and cut in half. Squeeze the softened cloves into the potatoes. Blend potatoes with an electric mixer until desired consistency is achieved. ; name: beer flavored potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, salt, pepper, green pepper, onion, beer, beef broth, brown sugar ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium heat, cook potatoes in oil for 15 minutes, turning occasionally. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Stir in green pepper and onion. Cook 5 minutes longer, stirring occasionally. In a small bowl, combine the beer, broth and brown sugar. Stir into vegetables. Bring to boil. Reduce heat. Cook 2 minutes longer. ; name: parmesan and garlic fries ; ingredients: russet potatoes, olive oil, garlic cloves, thyme, seasoning salt, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. In a large mixing bowl, place the cut potatoes and pour the olive oil over the top. Sprinkle on the garlic, thyme and seasoned salt. Mix well until the potatoes are evenly coated. Spread the potatoes on a baking sheet in a single layer. Do not throw away the oil that is left in the bowl. Bake 30 minutes, turning the fries over halfway through. After 30 minutes of baking, return the fries to the bowl with excess oil and sprinkle with the parmesan cheese and parsley. Toss to coat and return to baking sheet and bake for another 10 minutes. If desired, sprinkle fries again with a few shakes of parmesan and a few shakes of seasoned salt. ; name: blue cheese and chive mashed potatoes ; ingredients: russet potatoes, blue cheese, butter, fresh chives, garlic salt, pepper ; preparation:Peel potatoes and cut into chunks. Cook in boiling water for 15 to 20 minutes or until tender when pierced with a fork. Drain well. Mash with a potato masher or mixer until smooth and stir in remaining ingredients. Return to stove and cook for a few minutes more until very hot. ; name: dutch style potato bake ; ingredients: potatoes, tart apples, sauerkraut, cooking oil, dijon mustard, salt, black pepper, bacon, green onions ; preparation:Toss together the potatoes, apples, sauerkraut, oil, mustard, salt and pepper. Transfer to a lightly greased 9x13-inch baking dish. Bake at 400f for 1 hour, stirring occasionally, until potato and apple are tender and just starting to brown. Scatter crumbled bacon and sliced green onion on top. Serve hot. ; name: potato fries with onion and chilli ; ingredients: potatoes, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, chili powder, salt, black pepper, lime ; preparation:Bring water to boil in pot and cook potatoes until they are just tender. Cool to handle and then cut each quarter into thick slices. Heat oil in large skillet and add potatoes and onion. Turn until the vegetables are pale gold. Add garlic and cook until the garlic turns golden. Add chilli powder, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring to coat the potatoes and lightly toast chilli powder. Sprinkle with lime juice before serving. ; name: romanian mousaka ; ingredients: potato, olive oil, onions, canned tomatoes, ground pork, beef stock, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large pan or wok and use to fry the potatoes for about 10 minutes or until just softened. Add the onions and fry for a further 10 minutes. Transfer the mixture to an oven-proof casserole dish then top with the meat and tomatoes. Season with salt and black pepper then stir to combine. Pour the beef stock over the top then transfer to an oven pre-heated to 170c and bake for about 60 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: sunday morning hash browns potatoes homemade ; ingredients: russet potatoes, onions, salt, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil ; preparation:

name: vegetarian green chili ; ingredients: butter, garlic, onion flakes, flour, diced tomatoes, green chili pepper, salt, cilantro, water ; preparation:In a large sauce pan, melt butter or margarine. Add garlic and onion and cook until onion is re-hydtrated. Add flour and stir to make a roux. Add tomatoes, green chili, salt and cilantro. Add water. Simmer for 30 minutes. This can also be made in a crock pot. ; name: jenny approved hamburger spinach tomato pasta one dish meal ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, garlic cloves, frozen spinach, carrot, diced tomatoes, crushed tomatoes, macaroni ; preparation:Put a pot of water on to boil. Brown the ground beef with the chopped onions and garlic. Add pasta to boiling water -- cook as long as advised by box directions. Put frozen spinach and shredded carrots into a microwave-safe bowl and zap for 7 minutes. Add both cans of tomatoes to cooked meat, stir, and simmer for a few minutes. Add spinach and carrots to the meat mixture, stir, and simmer for a few minutes. Drain pasta and place in a huge serving dish. Put meat and veggie mixture into the huge serving dish and mix thoroughly with the pasta. Serve hot. ; name: scalloped creole green beans ; ingredients: bacon, onion, celery, green bell pepper, diced tomatoes, salt, pepper, sugar, american cheese, green beans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Fry bacon until crisp and set aside. Saute onion, celery, and bell pepper in bacon drippings until transparent. Transfer onion mixture to a medium sauce pan and add tomatoes, salt, pepper, and sugar. Cook, covered over low heat for 1 hour. Add cheese to sauce mixture and stir until melted. Place green beans in casserole dish, crumble bacon over beans, and pour sauce over top. Bake, uncovered for 1 hour. ; name: strapatsada scrambled eggs in tomato sauce ; ingredients: tomatoes, green pepper, eggs, olive oil, feta cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Put the tomatoes and green pepper in a non-stick frying pan and cook them until they are a very thick sauce. Season to taste. Add oil and eggs. Let the eggs cook till set on the bottom before giving them a stir. Bring the set eggs up, and continue to cook, in this way. When the eggs are fully cooked, top with the cheese. Allow the cheese to melt. ; name: speedy chili with macaroni ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, diced tomatoes, kidney beans, tomato sauce, elbow macaroni, chili powder, salt, ground cayenne pepper, paprika ; preparation:Preheat skillet to 350f. Spray skillet with vegetable spray. Add ground beef and onions and cook until beef is no longer pink. Add remaining ingredients and mix well. Cover and reduce heat to simmer for 20 to 30 minutes. ; name: meat lovers pizza casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, pizza sauce, elbow macaroni, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni slices, salt ; preparation:In a large skillet cook the beef and onion over medium heat until meat is no longer pink. Drain. Stir in remaining ingredients. Transfer to a greased 2 quart baking dish. Bake uncovered at 350 for 40-45 minutes or until heated through. ; name: broiled fish steaks with tomato glaze ; ingredients: tuna steaks, oil, salt and pepper, diced tomato, garlic, lemon wedge ; preparation:Preheat the broiler. Brush a baking sheet with oil. Lay the fish on the baking sheet in a single layer. Brush with 1 t of oil and season with salt and pepper. Combine the tomatoes and garlic in a small bowl. Stir in the remaining t oil. Season with salt and pepper. Broil the fish for 4 minutes. Turn over with a spatula, top with the tomato mixture, and continue to broil for another 4 to 5 minutes. Check doneness by inserting a knife between layers of the flesh. The meat should be just translucent. Spoon pan juices back over the fish and serve with lemon wedges. ; name: gram s baked macaroni ; ingredients: diced tomatoes, elbow macaroni, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:

name: linguica and green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, onion, garlic cloves, green bell pepper, potatoes, linguica sausage, allspice, crushed red pepper flakes, tomato sauce ; preparation:Saute onion, garlic, and bell pepper in 1-2 tablespoons butter or olive oil until onions are tender. Place onions, garlic, bell pepper, potatoes, linguica, and green beans in a large saucepan. Add enough water to cover. Add all-spice, red pepper, tomato sauce or crushed tomatoes, salt and pepper. Cover and simmer until beans are crisp tender and potatoes are fork tender. ; name: spicy korean chicken ; ingredients: chicken wings, onion, green bell pepper, carrots, soy sauce, black pepper, sugar, water, red pepper paste, dry red pepper ; preparation:Boil wings in pot until blood no longer visible. Drain. Mix ingredients together and bring to boil. Cover and let simmer over med heat for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Cook until carrots reach desired tenderness. Serve with sticky white rice. ; name: vegetarian green chili ; ingredients: butter, garlic, onion flakes, flour, diced tomatoes, green chili pepper, salt, cilantro, water ; preparation:In a large sauce pan, melt butter or margarine. Add garlic and onion and cook until onion is re-hydtrated. Add flour and stir to make a roux. Add tomatoes, green chili, salt and cilantro. Add water. Simmer for 30 minutes. This can also be made in a crock pot. ; name: spicy peanut chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, salt and pepper, peanut butter, soy sauce, honey, garlic clove, crushed red pepper flakes, dry roasted salted peanut, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Chop. Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Line a baking pan with foil. Place the chicken wings in a single layer on the tray. Salt and pepper them lightly. Bake the wings for about 30 minutes until they are just beginning to brown and get crisp. While the wings are baking, combine the peanut butter, soy sauce, honey, garlic, and the hot peppers in a small saucepan. Heat the mixture over low heat, stirring until well blended and spreadable. Spoon or brush the peanut sauce generously over the wings. Return the wings to the oven for 10- 15 minutes until the sauce is set. Remove the wings from the oven and sprinkle immediately with the chopped peanuts and cilantro. Let cool slightly before serving. ; name: creamy mushroom artichoke sauce ; ingredients: butter, oil, mushroom, onion, garlic cloves, chicken broth, cream cheese, artichoke hearts, fresh lemon juice, ground red pepper ; preparation:Melt butter with oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add mushrooms, onion, and garlic and saute 5-7 minutes or until tender. Stir in chicken broth and cream cheese and cook, stirring constantly, 2-3 minutes or until cream cheese melts. Stir in artichoke hearts, lemon juice and red pepper. Reduce heat to low and cook 2 minutes or until mixture is hot. ; name: swiss chard with pinto beans ; ingredients: garlic, swiss chard, red pepper flakes, pinto beans, diced tomatoes, lime, salt and pepper ; preparation:Saute garlic and crushed red pepper. Add swiss chard, cover. Add beans and tomatoes. Salt, pepper, lime. Simmer until sauce is reduced. ; name: spaghetti with italian sausage spinach and diced tomatoes ; ingredients: spaghetti, sweet italian turkey sausage, diced tomatoes, baby spinach, white onion, olive oil, garlic clove, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Boil spaghetti until al dente. Prepare a large non-stick skillet on med-high heat with olive oil. Chop sausage links into bite size chunks and cook until browned in the skillet. Chop onion into large chunks and add to the skillet, mix with sausage. Add garlic, salt, and red pepper flakes. Add tomatoes and spinach. Mix well until heated through. Serve over spaghetti or mix it all up. ; name: asian style vegetable stir fry ; ingredients: honey, stir-fry sauce, red pepper flakes, peanuts, broccoli florets, mushrooms, onion, carrot ; preparation:

name: barbecued fish steaks ; ingredients: salmon fillets, onion, garlic, butter, lemon juice, soy sauce, salt, orange juice, ground pepper ; preparation:Saut onion and garlic in butter or margarine until tender. Add ingredients through ground peppercorn and simmer for about 7 minutes, stirring occasionally. Cool. Pour liquid into a zip-lock type storage bag. Add salmon. Marinate in refrigerator 45 minutes, turning after about 20 minute intervals. Remove fish from marinade. Place on well-greased, hinged wire grill. Cook 2 inches from coals for 3 minutes, basting frequently with sauce. Turn and cook for about 5 minutes longer, or until fish is done. ; name: weight watchers sauteed shrimp ; ingredients: olive oil, shrimp, fresh lemon juice, salt-free lemon & herb seasoning, table salt, black pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add shrimp and saut 1 minute. Add lemon juice, lemon herb seasoning, salt and pepper. Stir to coat shrimp. Saut until shrimp are bright pink and cooked through, about 3 minutes more. Remove from heat and stir in parsley. Yields about 3 ounces of shrimp per serving. ; name: prawns caramelised with honey and orange ; ingredients: shrimp, salt and pepper, powdered ginger, olive oil, butter, honey, fresh orange juice ; preparation:Clean and shell the prawns. Season with salt, pepper and ginger. Heat oil in frying pan, add butter. When oil is hot add prawns sauteeing for two minutes. Remove from heat and drain on paper towel. Discard oil from pan, reheat and slowly add honey, allowing it to colour slightly. Return prawns to pan to coat in the honey. When covered with the caramelised honey remove and place and warm serving plate. Reheat pan and slowly add orange juice. Turn up heat to allow sauce to reduce by half. Pour over prawns and serve. You can add toasted almonds and slices of orange for presentation. ; name: bahian shrimp stew ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, bell pepper, tomatoes, cilantro, garlic clove, tomato paste, bay shrimp, lemon juice, coconut milk ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet, add onion, pepper, tomatoes, cilantro, garlic and tomato paste. Cook for 10 minutes. Bring sauce to a boil, then add shrimp and lemon juice. Reduce heat to medium and cook for 2 minutes. Add coconut milk and bring the mixture to a boil. Serve over rice. ; name: south beach salmon with creamy lemon sauce low carb ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic clove, lemon juice, capers, lemon-pepper seasoning, fat free sour cream, salmon fillets ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f. Coat a baking sheet with cooking spray. Heat the oil in a small saucepan over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook for one minute. Reduce heat to low. Stir in the lemon juice, capers and lemon-pepper seasoning and cook for 5 minutes. Add the sour cream and cook for 5 minutes or until heated though. Meanwhile, place the salmon on the prepared baking sheet. Bake for 20 minutes or until the fish is just opaque. Serve with the sauce. ; name: roast salmon with lime salsa ; ingredients: limes, red onion, cilantro, jalapeno, canola oil, sugar, sea salt, salmon fillets, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 425. Using a sharp knife, carefully peel the limes. Be sure to remove all of the bitter white pith. Working over a bowl, cut in between the membranes to release the lime sections into the bowl. Cut each section crosswise into quarters. Return the limes to the bowl and stir in the onion, cilantro and jalapeo. Add 1 tablespoon of the oil, the sugar and a pinch of salt and toss well. Heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of oil in an ovenproof skillet until shimmering. Season the fillets on both sides with salt and pepper and add to the skillet, skinned side up. Cook over moderately high heat until golden brown on the bottom, about 2 minutes. Transfer the skillet to the oven and roast the salmon for 5 minutes, or until just cooked through. Transfer to 4 dinner plates, spoon the salsa on top and serve. ; name: cod portuguese ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic clove, green pepper, chopped tomatoes, paprika, orange, juice of, cod fish fillets, salt and pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat the oil in a heavy fry pan and saute the onion, garlic and pepper for about 5-7 minutes until softened. Add the tomatoes, paprika and orange juice. Season, stir well and simmer for a further 5 minutes. Lay the fish fillets on top, cutting them to fit the pan if necessary. Season lightly, cover and simmer gently for 12-15 minutes or until the fish is cooked but still firm. Transfer to serving dishes and sprinkle with parsley. Serve. ; name: citrus roasted fish with capers ; ingredients: fish, olive oil, lemon, juice of, sea salt, pepper, lemon, orange, capers ; preparation:

name: bob s scalloped potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, onions, green peppers, longhorn cheese, velveeta cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:Grease 13 x 9 pan. Alternately layer potatoes, peppers, onions and cheeses. Salt and pepper each layer until all ingredients are used. Mix soup and milk. Pour over top. Bake covered at 350 degrees for 1 hour, then uncover and bake until done. ; name: easy yummy creamy chicken tetrazzini ; ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, chicken breasts, noodles, onion salt, milk, american cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook noodles as directed on box. Partially thaw chicken, then dice. Cook chicken in skillet. In a separate small sauce pan, add cream of mushroom soup, milk, and cheese. Stir over low heat until melted. When noodles are done, strain, and return to sauce pan. Add the cooked chicken breast and cheese sauce mix. Stir together and simmer uncovered, on low heat about 10 minutes. Add salt and pepper at end to taste. ; name: chicago chicken casserole ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, broccoli, corn, cream of mushroom soup, milk, velveeta cheese, mushroom, pimiento, ritz cracker, butter ; preparation:Poach chicken in water, when cool enough to handle pull apart into bite-size pieces. In a large 9x12 casserole layer cooked chicken, drained corn and broccoli. Mix soup with milk, cheese, mushrooms and pimentos. Heat and pour over chicken. Sprinkle top with ritz crackers which have been mixed with enough butter to moisten. If prepared ahead and refrigerate, do not top with the ritz until ready to bake. Bake for 1 hour or till bubbly and hot. Do not fill casserole to full. This cooks over easily. ; name: bow tie bake ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, sliced mushrooms, green pepper, salt and pepper, bow tie pasta, condensed tomato soup, mozzarella cheese, cream of mushroom soup ; preparation:In a skillet, cook beef, onion, mushrooms, green pepper, salt and pepper over medium heat until the meat is no longer pink. Drain. In a greased 3-quart baking dish, layer half of the pasta, half of the meat mixture, all of the tomato soup and 1 cup of cheese. Top with the remaining pasta and meat mixture. Spread evenly with mushroom soup. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 30-45 minutes or until heated thoroughly. ; name: chicken and mushroom saute ; ingredients: butter, chicken breasts, mushroom, onion, bacon, cream of mushroom soup, milk, parmesan cheese, noodles ; preparation:Melt half of butter in large skillet over medium-high heat. Saut chicken until no longer pink, about 5 minutes. Remove from skillet. Set aside. Melt remaining butter in same skillet over medium heat. Saut mushrooms and onion until tender and liquid is evaporated, stirring often. Stir in soup, milk, and cheese. Bring to boil. Return chicken to skillet and add bacon. Heat through, stirring occasionally. Serve over noodles. ; name: tuna italian ; ingredients: onion, condensed cream of mushroom soup, evaporated milk, cheddar cheese, tuna, sliced mushrooms, parsley, lemon juice, noodles ; preparation:Cook onion until tender but not brown. Add soup, milk, and cheese. Heat and stir. Break tuna in chunks and add to remaining ingredients. Pour into 2 quart casserole dish. Bake at 350 degrees for 25-30 minutes. ; name: chicken cordon bleu portabella in a white sauce ; ingredients: portabella mushrooms, chicken breasts, ham, provolone cheese, salt, cream of mushroom soup, whole milk, white wine, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray bottom of pan and arrange mushrooms in baking dish. Next take the chicken and stretch it out, dont tear though. Next, take your slice of ham and place it on the chicken, then your cheese on your ham. Take the small end of the chicken and gently roll the chicken tucking in the sides. Place the chicken on the mushrooms. Season lightly with salt and pepper. Next, mix all ingredients of the sauce together and pour over the chicken. Bake for 40-45 min or until chicken is done and juices run clear. ; name: kid friendly tuna casserole ; ingredients: pasta, velveeta cheese, cream of mushroom soup, canned tuna ; preparation:

name: sarah s fabulous summer pasta salad ; ingredients: cherry tomatoes, garlic, olive oil, dried tubular pasta, fresh basil leaf, sea salt, black pepper ; preparation:Put pasta on to boil. Halve tomatoes. Place tomatoes in large bowl with all other remaining ingredients, stir well, cover and leave. When pasta is al dente, drain, and then add to tomato mixture. The warm pasta will semi-cook the basil and garlic, releasing its flavour. Serve immediately, with crusty italian bread and a nice glass of red wine. ; name: bow tie pasta with broccoli and tomatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, butter, minced garlic cloves, bow tie pasta, fresh broccoli florets, cherry tomatoes, fresh parmesan cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Prepare pasta according to package directions and drain completely. Steam broccoli until fork tender, drain completely. Cut tomatoes in half. In skillet over medium heat melt butter in olive oil. Add garlic and cook for 2-3 minutes. Put the prepared pasta in skillet and toss to coat. Add the tomatoes and toss for 2-3 minutes. Add the broccoli and toss 1-2 minutes. Salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle with grated parmensa cheese. ; name: basil chicken over angel hair pasta ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, olive oil, onion, garlic clove, chopped tomatoes, boneless chicken breast halves, fresh basil, salt, hot pepper sauce, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook angel hair pasta until it is al dente, about 8 to 10 minutes. Drain, and set aside. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Saute the onions and garlic. Stir in the tomatoes, chicken, basil, salt and hot pepper sauce. Reduce heat to medium, and cover skillet. Simmer for about 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until mixture is hot and tomatoes are soft. Toss sauce with hot cooked angel hair pasta to coat. Serve with parmesan cheese. ; name: cherry tomato pasta ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, cherry tomatoes, sugar, salt and pepper, fresh basil leaf, thin spaghetti, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place oil in a skillet over low heat. Add the garlic and cook, stirring, until golden, about 6-7 minutes. Add the tomatoes, sugar, salt, and pepper. Raise heat to medium and cook, gently smashing some of the tomatoes with the back of the spoon, until the sauce is thickened, about 8 minutes. Stir in the basil. Add the pasta, combine well and serve immediately, topped with grated cheese. ; name: pasta e fagioli soup ; ingredients: olive oil, carrot, garlic cloves, vegetable broth, pasta, diced tomatoes, kidney beans, peas, fresh basil, cheese ; preparation:Saut carrots in the olive oil for 2 minutes. Stir in garlic. Cook 1 minute. Add broth and pasta. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Simmer 10 minutes. Stir in tomatoes and beans. Cook 5 minutes more. Stir in peas. Cook till pasta is tender and heated through. Top with basil and cheese. ; name: pasta and beans ; ingredients: pasta, olive oil, garlic, tomatoes, kidney beans, italian seasoning, sugar, fresh spinach, feta cheese, sliced ripe olives ; preparation:Cook pasta according to pkg instructions. Meanwhile, heat oil in lg skillet or dutch oven. Add garlic. Cook and stir 1 minute. Add tomatoes, beans, italian seasoning and sugar. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes. Add spinach. Cook 3 minutes. Put drained pasta on serving plates. Top with tomato mixture. Sprinkle with feta and olives. ; name: basil pesto lighter version ; ingredients: pine nuts, garlic, extra virgin olive oil, fresh basil leaves, parmesan cheese, salt ; preparation:Add nuts and garlic to blender and pulse until minced. Add olive oil, pulse a few time more. Add basil leaves, cheese, salt and blend until smooth. Scrape sides of blender as you go to make sure everthing mixes well. Serve with your favorite pasta. ; name: angel hair with garlic spinach and white beans ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, fresh spinach leaves, cannellini beans, vegetable broth, angel hair pasta, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: flounder bake ; ingredients: butter, onions, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, lemon juice, flounder fillets, salt, pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in a pan and cook onion for 2 minutes or until soft. Place fish fillets in a baking dish sprayed with cooking oil. Pour melted butter with onions over the fish. Sprinkle fish with italian bread crumbs and parmesan cheese. Top with lemon juice, salt and pepper. Bake for 15-20 minutes in 375 degree oven until fish is flaky and fully cooked. ; name: tex mex breakfast hash and eggs ; ingredients: chorizo sausage, onion, garlic, frozen hash brown potatoes, green chilies, tomatoes, salsa, eggs, cilantro, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large skilled cook the chorizo over medium heat until browned and done. Drain reserving 3 t. Drippings, setting sausage aside. Return drippings to the pan and over medium heat saute the onions and garlic for 4-5 minutes. Add the chiles and stir well. Add the potatoes, reduce heat to medium low and cook for 20 minutes, stirring often. Add the tomatoes to heat through. Spoon onto plates, top with eggs and offer salsa at the table. Garnish with chopped cilantro and cheese if you wish. ; name: scrambled egg and breakfast sausage panini ; ingredients: butter, green onions, breakfast sausage, pecan pieces, eggs, salt and pepper, italian bread, bocconcini, fresh fruit ; preparation:In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add the onions, sausages and pecans. Saut until onions are just softened, about 3 minutes. Add eggs and cook, stirring with a wooden spoon, until eggs are firm but not dry. Remove from heat and set aside. Meanwhile, heat a panini maker or a grill pan over medium-high heat. Divide sausage mixture into 4 portions and mound each portion on one slice of bread. Top each with bocconcini slices and top with remaining bread slices. Lightly butter the outside of each panini. Cook until both sides of each panini are golden. Serve immediately. Serve warm and garnish with maple syrup and fresh fruit if desired. ; name: italian sausage onion pizza ; ingredients: sausage, bell pepper, pizza sauce, prepared pizza crust, fried onions, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Cook sausage in nonstick skillet over medium heat until browned, stirring frequently. Drain. Add pepper and cook 3 minute stir in pizza sauce. Spread sausage mixture on pizza crust. Sprinkle with french onions and cheese. Bake pizza on baking sheet. Bake 10 to 12 minute until cheese melts and crust is golden an crispy. Cut into wedges to serve. ; name: garlic pizza wedges ; ingredients: bread pizza crust, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, red onion, garlic, dried oregano ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place crust on an ungreased 14 in pizza pan. In a small bowl, combine cheese, mayonnaise, onion, garlic and oregano. Spread over crust. Bake at 450 degrees for 8 to 10 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. Cut into wedges and serve warm or slightly cooled. ; name: annz california fuzion pizza ; ingredients: pizza crusts, pesto sauce, chicken, sweet onion, green chili pepper, blue cheese, italian cheese blend, fresh tomato ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 450 degrees. Spread a thin layer of pesto over the entire pizza crust. Sprinkle with chicken, onion, and roasted peppers. Sprinkle lightly with blue cheese crumbles, then with most of the shredded cheese. Top with chopped tomatoes and the remaining cheese. Bake at 450 on a pizza stone for 10 - 15 mins or until the cheese is melted and bubbly. ; name: baked gnocchi ; ingredients: gnocchi, olive oil, garlic cloves, frozen spinach, diced tomatoes, italian seasoning, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, sliced mushrooms ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 grease lagrge casserole dish. Cook gnocchi according to directions. Drain. Heat oil in large skillet. Add garlic, cook 30 sec. Add tomatoes and seasoning. Cook and stir 5 minutes. Add gnocchi to spinach mixture in skillet, stir gently. Transfer gnocchi mixture to prepared casserole dish. Sprinkle with cheeses. Bake 20-30 minutes or until bubbly and sheese is melted. Enjoy. ; name: asparagus mushroom bacon quiche ; ingredients: pie crust, cheddar cheese, cooked bacon, mushroom, onion, asparagus spears, milk, eggs, italian seasoning, garlic ; preparation:

name: oyster sauce beef ; ingredients: beef, egg white, oyster sauce, sherry wine, cornstarch, sugar, soy sauce, green onions, fresh ginger, oil ; preparation:Marinate beef in egg white, oyster sauce, sherry, cornstarch, soy sauce and sugar for 1 hour. Heat oil in frying pan until hot. Stir-fry green onions and ginger 1 minute. Add beef. Stir-fry 4 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: grilled rosemary pork chops ; ingredients: olive oil, red wine vinegar, garlic clove, fresh rosemary, coarse sea salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, worcestershire sauce, center-cut pork loin chops ; preparation:Mix oil, vinegar, garlic, rosemary, salt, & pepper, and brush on chops. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes or as long as overnight. Preheat grill. Grill 5-8 minutes on each side, depending on thickness. Let rest 1-2 minutes before serving. ; name: chinese bar b que chicken ; ingredients: chicken, salt, pepper, flour, water, red wine vinegar, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, prepared mustard, hot sauce ; preparation:Cut up whole chicken. Dust with flour, salt and pepper. Brown in skillet. Arrange in greased baking dish. Combine water, vinegar, brown sugar, worchestershire sauce, mustard and hot sauce in a saucepan and cook until simmering. Pour over chicken in baking dish. Bake, uncovered, at 350 for 45 to 60 minutes. ; name: jackie s famous broccoli salad ; ingredients: broccoli, red onion, bacon, old cheddar cheese, raisins, mayonnaise, red wine vinegar, worcestershire sauce, sugar, salt ; preparation:Wash broccoli and cut into bite-size pieces. Thinly slice red onion. Fry bacon until crisp and break into pieces. Shred cheddar cheese. In medium size bowl mix all ingredients until well blended. Add sugar to your taste preference. Cover and refrigerate for 3 hours or overnight. ; name: sticky fingers ; ingredients: brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, ketchup, honey, hot sauce, apple cider vinegar, breaded chicken tenders ; preparation:Cook chicken as directed. Combine all other ingredients in a medium sized bowl. Toss chicken in the sauce. Spread chicken on a greased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 for 5-7 minutes. The longer it cooks the stickier they become. ; name: cheese burgers ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, lean ground beef, egg, parsley, roquefort cheese, worcestershire sauce, tabasco sauce, salt, pepper ; preparation:In small frying pan, heat 1 tablespoon of the oil. Add onion, cover, and cook over low heat for 4 minutes. Combine beef and egg, mixing well. To beef mixture, add cooked onion, parsley, worcestershire and tabasco sauces and mix well. Shape mixture into 4 large patties, scoring each with a knife. Heat remaining tablespoon of oil in large frying pan. When hot, add meat patties and cook 10 to 12 minutes over medium heat. Turn 4 times during cooking, and once seared, season well. When burgers are done, transfer to ovenproof dish. Cover each burger with a slice of cheese and broil 2 to 3 minutes. ; name: tangy barbecue sauce ; ingredients: unsalted butter, celery, yellow onions, ketchup, fresh lemon juice, granulated sugar, cider vinegar, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:In medium saucepan over medium heat, melt butter. Add celery and onion and cook 2 to 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add remaining ingredients and whisk together. Bring to boil, reduce heat, cover and simmer 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Transfer to a bowl, cover and refrigerate until ready to use. ; name: baked bbq turkey drumsticks ; ingredients: turkey legs, sea salt, black pepper, unsulphured molasses, red wine vinegar, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, red onion, coconut oil ; preparation:

name: apple walnut salad with cranberry vinaigrette ; ingredients: walnuts, salad greens, gala apples, fresh cranberries, balsamic vinegar, red onion, honey, dijon mustard, vegetable oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Toast walnuts for 8-10 minutes in a 350f oven. In a food processor or blender, combine cranberries, vinegar, onion, honey and mustard. Puree until smooth. Gradually add oil and season to taste with salt and pepper. In a salad bowl, toss together greens, apples and enough dressing to coat. Sprinkle with walnuts. ; name: tropical salsa ; ingredients: strawberry, kiwi, green onion, yellow sweet peppers, lemon juice, fresh cilantro, sugar, ground red pepper ; preparation:In a medium bowl stir together the strawberries. Kiwi fruit. Green onion. Sweet pepper. Lime or lemon juice. Cilantro, parsley, or basil. Sugar. And pepper. Cover and chill salsa for 6 hours. ; name: tuscan chicken sandwich ; ingredients: balsamic vinaigrette, focaccia bread, mixed salad green, tomatoes, red onions, boneless skinless chicken breasts, mayonnaise, basil pesto ; preparation:Spread vinaigrette in a thin layer over the bottom slice of focaccia. On top of the vinaigrette, layer greens, tomato, onion and chicken. Stir together mayonnaise and pesto. Spread on the top slice of focaccia. Close the sandwich and serve. ; name: citrus salsa ; ingredients: grapefruit, orange, tomatoes, green bell pepper, jalapeno pepper, red onions, cilantro, sugar, salt ; preparation:Peel, section and chop the grapefruit and orange. Place in a medium bowl. Seed and dice the tomato, green pepper and jalapeno. Add to the fruit. Dice the red onion and cilantro. Add to the bowl. Add the sugar and salt to the the salsa ingredients. Stir to combine. Drain juice before serving. Serve with tortilla chips. Also good as a condiment with grilled chicken or pork. ; name: cucumber tomato salad ; ingredients: tomatoes, cucumber, green onion, italian salad dressing, vinegar, fresh basil, salt, pepper, garlic salt ; preparation:In a serving bowl, layer half of the tomatoes, all of the cucumber, then remaining tomatoes. Sprinkle with onion. Combine remaining ingredients in a jar with a tight fitting lid and shake well. Pour over salad. Cover and chill for 25 to 30 minutes or until ready to serve. ; name: green salad with shrimp and feta ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, fresh lemon juice, rosemary, salt, mixed salad greens, green onions, shrimp, cherry tomatoes, feta cheese ; preparation:For dressing, combine oil, vinegar, lemon juice, rosemary, salt and pepper in a small jar with a tight-fitting lid. Cover and shake to combine. Dressing can be made several days in advance and refrigerated, shake well before using. Combine remaining ingredients in a large salad bowl. Chill until serving time. To serve, add dressing and toss lightly to combine. Add additional freshly ground pepper to taste. ; name: tuna bean and sweetcorn salad ; ingredients: chunk tuna, corn mixed with chopped peppers, red onion, red kidney beans, salt and pepper, mixed salad green, olive oil, lemon juice, chili powder ; preparation:In a large bowl, mix the tuna lightly with the sweetcorn, onion and kidney beans. Season well with salt and pepper. Divide the salad leaves between two plates. Season lightly. Pile tuna salad on top. Drizzle over the olive oil and lemon juice. Sprinkle with chili powder. Serve with toasted bread. ; name: strawberry and greens salad ; ingredients: mixed salad green, radishes, strawberry, spring onions, red pepper, coriander, vinaigrette ; preparation:

name: rhubarb dessert ; ingredients: white cake mix, rhubarb, sugar, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert ; preparation:Mix cake mix according to package directions. Put into a greased 9 x 13 inch pan. Mix the rhubarb, sugar, & jello together. Spoon onto cake mix. Bake according package directions. ; name: peach dump cake ; ingredients: white cake mix, crushed pineapple, butter, brown sugar, frozen peaches ; preparation:Spread the can of pineapple on the bottom of a large cake pan. Open 1 bag of peaches and pour over pineapple. Open 1 bag cake mix and pour over peaches. Open 2nd bag of peaches and pour over cake mix. Srinkle brown sugar over mixture and then pour butter over mix. Pop in 350 oven for 45 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. ; name: dump it in rhubarb cake ; ingredients: rhubarb, strawberry gelatin, sugar, cinnamon, yellow cake mix, water, whipped topping, flour ; preparation:Spread rhubarb in an 9x13 pan. Sprinkle with sugar and dry jello powder. Sprinkle dry cake mix over sugar. Pour a cup of water evenly over mixture. Cover tightly with foil. Bake 350 f for 30 minutes or so until cake is done. ; name: miss minda s super sunshine cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, applesauce, eggs, mandarin oranges in light syrup, cool whip, vanilla instant pudding mix, crushed pineapple ; preparation:Ignore the directions on the box cake mix and instead, in a medium bowl, add the cake mix, applesauce, eggs and mandarine oranges. Bake at the temperature on box and for the suggested length of time. After cake is cooled, combine cool whip with instant pudding and pineapple with the juice. Let it rest for 10 minutes and frost the cake. Serve. ; name: chocolate tube cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, instant chocolate pudding mix, eggs, oil, water, powdered sugar, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Blend cake mix and pudding in a large bowl. Add eggs, oil and water. Start on low speed, then 10 minutes at medium speed once ingredients are throughly mixed. Turn batter into a 10 inch tube pan. Bake 50 minutes at 350 or until toothpick is clean. Cool in pan on rack do not turn upside down. Using a 2 tined fork, poke holes 1 inch apart in the entire cake. Prepare glaze mixing powdered sugar and milk til smooth. Pour glaze over cake immediately and allow to cool in the pan. ; name: vacuum cleaner bar cookies ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, oleo, eggs, cream cheese, powdered sugar, coconut, nuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Combine cake mix, oleo, and 1 egg. Press into bottom of a 10x15 pan. Beat remaining eggs. Add cream cheese and powered sugar. Mix well. Stir in coconut and nuts. Spread over crust. Bake at 325 for 40-45 minutes until golden brown. Cut into squares. ; name: moist crock pot lemon cake ; ingredients: lemon cake mix, instant lemon pudding mix, eggs, water, sour cream, vegetable oil, white chocolate chips, almonds ; preparation:Spray a 4 quart crock pot with non-stick cooking spray and set aside. In a large bowl, combine the cake mix and pudding mix. In a medium bowl, beat the eggs with the water, then add the sour cream and oil and beat until smooth. Add to the dry ingredients and beat well. Stir in the white chocolate chips and almonds. Pour into crock pot. Cover slow cooker and cook on low for 6-8 hours, until top springs back when touched very lightly with finger. ; name: weight watchers raspberry zinger cake ; ingredients: white cake mix, diet sprite, egg whites, raspberry jell-o gelatin, boiling water, cool whip, flaked coconut ; preparation:

name: blackhawk chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, gruyere cheese, prosciutto, seasoned flour, eggs, fine breadcrumbs, butter, cognac, heavy cream ; preparation:Wrap each slice of gruyere in a slice of prosciutto. Put boned breasts between 2 pieces of wax paper and pound them with the flat side of a cleaver or heavy knife. Wrap each chicken breast piece securely around a ham packet, covering it completely, using toothpicks to secure, if you desire. Dust with seasoned flour then dip in beaten egg and roll in fine bread crumbs. Refrigerate at least 1 hour. Brown breasts carefully on both sides in butter, then arrange on a heat proof platter and finish cooking in oven at 350 degrees for 10 minutes or until fork thender. Do not allow them to dry out. Into the pan in which they were browned, pour cognac, ignite and when the flame dies down, add cream. Simmer until thickened. Add salt and pepper to taste. Pour sauce over chicken just before serving. ; name: egyptian chicken panne breaded fried chicken breasts ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, lemon, juice of, onion, salt & pepper, fine breadcrumbs, oil ; preparation:Take and slice your chicken breasts into thinner slices. Put slices into glass mixing bowl or dish. Squeeze the juice of lemon onto chicken slices. Add the onion liquid. Add salt & pepper and cover with plastic wrap, put in refrigerator for at least an hour. When ready to fry, take a slice and dip into bowl filled with bread crumbs. Do this until all chicken is breaded, setting each slice on a plate. Add oil in a large frying pan, not too much, just enough to cover bottom of each slice. Fry until golden brown on each side. ; name: dukkah chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, natural yoghurt, lemon juice, ground black pepper, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, dukkah ; preparation:First, combine all of the marinade ingredients in a medium sized bowl. Marinate the chicken strips in this mixture for at least one hour. Preheat oven to 180c, and line a baking tray with waxed paper. Put all of the breadcrumb ingredients in a food processor, and give it a few quick pulses, to mix the cheese through evenly. Dip each piece of marinated chicken in the breadcrumb mixture, being sure to coat it thoroughly and evenly. Place the chicken pieces on the baking tray, and give them a quick spray of olive oil. Bake at 180c for 25 minutes, then turn them all over, and give them another 15 minutes. Serve with mediterranean fried cous cous, and herb, lemon, and garlic dressing. ; name: spicy buffalo chicken wraps ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, canola oil, louisiana hot sauce, lettuce, flour tortillas, reduced-fat ranch dressing, blue cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in a nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray and cook chicken for 6 minutes. Drain. Add hot sauce and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 3-5 minutes or until sauce is thickened and chicken is no longer pink in center. Place lettuce on warm tortillas and drizzle dressing on top. Place chicken and sauce over lettuce and top with blue cheese. Roll up and serve. ; name: cheese it chicken fingers ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, sour cream, cheez-it crackers, butter ; preparation:Put the sour cream into a large bowl. Add the chicken strips and mix well to coat with the sour cream. Roll the chicken strips in the crushed cheese its. Coat them well. Place the strips on a baking sheet with a rim and drizzle the butter over them. Bake in a 350f degree oven for 25-30 minutes. ; name: cheesy chicken breasts ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, plain flour, ground black pepper, unsalted butter, reduced-sodium chicken broth, dry white wine, dried oregano ; preparation:Beat fillets between 2 sheets of waxed paper until 5mm thick. Cut each slice of cheese in half and place 1 half on top of each fillet. Starting with short end tightly roll up fillets. Tie with kitchen string. On waxed paper, mix flour and pepper. Add chicken and toss gently. In a non-stick fry pan melt butter over medium heat. Add chicken fillets and fry turning occasionaly until golden about 3 minutes. Add chicken stock, wine and dried oregano. Increase heat and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low simmer until chicken is cooked through and sauce has thickened about 10-12 minutes. ; name: glorious chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, margarine, water, ritz cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, mushrooms ; preparation:Roll chicken breasts first in the margarine, then in the crumb mixture. Place in a 9x13 pan sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Mix soup, mushrooms, water, and sour cream. Pour this mixture over the chicken. Sprinkle with remaining crumbs and drizzle on any leftover margarine. Bake at 350 for one hour or until done. ; name: oven ranch chicken ; ingredients: plain breadcrumbs, ranch dressing mix, low-fat sour cream, boneless skinless chicken breast ; preparation:

name: chapel hill shrimp cucumber salad rounds ; ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, ketchup, prepared mustard, garlic powder, shrimp, cucumber, onion, cracker ; preparation:Blend together the cream cheese, mayonnaise, ketchup, mustard, and garlic powder. Gently fold in the shrimp, chopped cucumber, & chopped onion. Chill for at least 3 hours in the refrigerator. When ready to serve, spread crackers or toast rounds with the spread, then garnish each with a cucumber round and a shrimp. This spread also makes a wonderful sandwich. ; name: mika s honey and soy glazed salmon ; ingredients: honey, soy sauce, fresh lime juice, water, dijon mustard, canola oil, salmon fillets, toasted sesame seeds, green onion ; preparation:In a small bowl, whisk together honey, soy sauce, lime juice, water and mustard. In a small non-stick skillet, heat oil over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking and cook salmon 2-3 minutes on each side, or until golden and just cooked through. Transfer salmon to 4 plates. Add honey mixture to skillet and simmer stirring occasionally, until it reaches a glaze-like consistency. Pour glaze over salmon and sprinkle with sesame seeds and green onions. ; name: finger lickin good mustard oven fried chicken ; ingredients: dijon mustard, lemon juice, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, ground black pepper, chicken thighs, bran flakes, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Combine mustard, lemon juice, garlic, rosemary, and pepper in a bowl. In a sealable bag combine bran flakes and cheese. Crush up the bran flakes slightly with hands on the outside of the bag. Coat chicken with mustard mixture. Then transfer the chicken pieces to the bag and shake to coat with the bran flake mixture. Place the crumb coated chicken pieces in a shallow baking dish coated with non stick spray. Sprinkle any remaining bran flake crumbs on top. Cover with foil and bake for 20 minutes. Remove foil and bake another 20-30 minutes, or until juices run clear when pricked with a fork. ; name: deviled eggs with fresh tarragon and capers ; ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, extra virgin olive oil, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, celery, fresh tarragon, capers, shallots, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Boil the eggs, shell and cut in half lengthwise. In a small bowl mash the eggs yolks with a fork. Mix in the olive oil, mayonnaise, and dijon mustard. Stir in the celery, fresh tarragon, capers and the shallots. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Divide and spoon the mixture into the egg halves. Garnish each egg half with 1 or 2 slices of celery. If not eating immediately, cover well and refrigerate. ; name: lower calorie chicken piccata ; ingredients: dijon mustard, egg, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, chicken breast, olive oil, chicken broth, lemon juice, parsley, lemon ; preparation:Combine the mustard and egg in a small bowl. Place the bread crumbs on a sheet of wax paper. Dip the chicken in the egg, then in the bread crumbs to cover. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Cook the chicken in the oil until golden and cooked through, about 5 minutes on each side. Transfer to a plate. Add the broth and lemon juice to the skillet. Simmer 30 seconds, stir in the parsley. Pour the sauce over the chicken and garnish with the lemon sliced, if desired. ; name: jenny s deviled eggs ; ingredients: extra large eggs, mayonnaise, milk, white vinegar, instant chicken bouillon, dry mustard, sugar, dill relish, paprika, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place eggs in a single layer in a large pot. Put just enough cold water in the pot to cover the eggs. Bring to a rapid boil. Remove from burner and cover and let sit in hot water for 20 minutes. Drain eggs and remove shell under cold water. Cut the boiled egg in half lengthwise and remove the yolks and place yolks in a mixing bowl. Reserve your egg halves on an egg tray or platter. Combine all ingredients except dill relish with an electric mixer, blender or processor. Stir in the relish. Either spoon the mixture into the egg whites or pipe it in using a pastry bag or place in a ziploc baggie and snip a corner and squeeze into egg white. Garnish with paprika, parsley or anything else you like. ; name: roast duck with a honey soy basting sauce ; ingredients: duck, dijon mustard, soy sauce, honey, garlic cloves, dry white wine, olive oil, cornflour ; preparation:Wash duck under cold water and remove any missed feathers. Combine all the basting ingredients and boil over a high heat for about 2 minutes. Keep sauce warm while basting, stirring occasionally. Place duck in a roasting dish, brush with basting sauce. Bake in a slow oven for about three hours, bast several times while cooking. Turn the oven up to 170-180 and continue to roast for a further 30-45 minutes until skin is browned and crisp and duck is cooked through. As the duck is finishing off, mix a little water with cornflour, turn up the heat on stove, add cornflour to basting sauce and stir until mixture thickens.
