Serve duck with basting sauce. ; name: seasoned scrambled eggs ; ingredients: egg whites, eggs, ranch salad dressing, spicy brown mustard, fresh parsley, garlic powder, canola oil, part-skim mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: pumpkin gingersnap cheesecake bars ; ingredients: gingersnap cookies, cream cheese, eggs, sweetened condensed milk, pumpkin, pumpkin pie spice, salt, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grease a 9 x 13 pan. Put the ginger snap cookies in a large zip lock bag and crush the cookies with a rolling pin until they are pulverized. Put the crushed cookies in a layer in the 9 x 13 pan to form the bottom crust. In a mixing bowl beat cream cheese until light. Add the condensed milk and mix. Add eggs, canned pumpkin, spices and salt. Blend in the nuts if desired. Mix all together and pour carefully on top of the cookie crust in the pan. Bake 30 - 40 minutes at 350. Cool, chill, and serve. May be topped with whipped topping and more nuts for looks but is fine the way it is. ; name: harvest time pumpkin dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, powdered sugar, pumpkin puree, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, gingersnaps ; preparation:Let cream cheese stand at room temperature until softened. In a large bowl beat the cream cheese at medium speed of an electric mixer until creamy. Gradually add the powdered sugar, beating well. Stir in pumpkin, cinnamon and nutmeg. Serve immediately with gingersnaps for dipping, or cover and chill. ; name: ginger glazed carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, water, butter, honey, orange juice, ground ginger, salt, ground nutmeg, parsley flakes ; preparation:In a large skillet combine carrots, water, and 1 tablespoon of the butter. Bring to boiling. Reduce heat to medium. Cover and cook for 6 to 8 minutes or until carrots are nearly tender. Drain. Return to skillet. In a small bowl combine honey, orange juice, ginger, salt, and nutmeg. Pour over carrots. Add the remaining butter. Cook, uncovered, 5 to 6 minutes more or until carrots are tender, stirring to glaze carrots. Just before serving, sprinkle with parsley. ; name: carrot souffl carrot casserole ; ingredients: carrots, butter, salt, white pepper, eggs, heavy cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly spray a 2 quart casserole dish with non-stick cooking spray. Boil or steam carrots in until very soft. Drain. Add butter, salt, and pepper. Pure carrots in food processor until smooth. Cool slightly. Add eggs and cream. Blend well. Fill casserole dish or ramekins with mixture. Set in a baking pan of hot water and bake for 30-35 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: savoury pecan loaf ; ingredients: pecans, fresh breadcrumbs, butter, onion, carrot, cottage cheese, dried oregano, eggs, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Chop pecans, onions, carrots. Combine pecans and breadcrumbs in a bowl. Cook onions in butter until soft, remove from heat. Add to the pecans, add rest of ingredients and mix. Put into greased loaf tin. Bake 35-40 mins till firm. ; name: golden potato cakes ; ingredients: potatoes, cheddar cheese, fresh breadcrumbs, green bell pepper, onion, dried sage, dried oregano, salt, pepper, egg ; preparation:Shred peeled potatoes with grater. Put shredded potatoes in colander, then rinse and squeeze potatoes under running cold water in sink for a minute or two. Squeeze out excess water until potatoes are fairly dry, then dump them into a large mixing bowl. Add remaining ingredients and mix with hands until incorporated. Pat into patties the size of your hand. Fry with a few tablespoons butter in a non-stick frying pan until golden, turning once. Serve as-is or with ketchup or a dollop of sour cream. ; name: white mountain coleslaw ; ingredients: green cabbage, red cabbage, red onion, carrot, sour cream, sugar, mayonnaise, malt vinegar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Grate cabbage. Add red onion and carrot. Toss in a large bowl. In a separate bowl, mix together sour cream, sugar, mayonnaise, and vinegar. Add salt and pepper to taste. Taste, adjust seasoning, taste, taste, taste. Add the mixture to the cabbage, toss well, refrigerate overnight or for several hours, and make sure its well and tightly covered. Serve very cold. ; name: the cake of wisdom ; ingredients: carrots, ginger, lemon peel, eggs, honey, cinnamon, dry breadcrumbs, ground hazelnuts, cream cheese ; preparation:

name: cabbage curry ; ingredients: cabbage, green chilies, onion, garlic cloves, canola oil, salt, chili powder, turmeric, canned tuna ; preparation:In a medium sized pan, pour the oil and heat under high heat. After 1 minute, add the onions, garlic, and salt. Fry until onion and garlic are slightly turning gold. Add the chillies and continue frying. Keep stirring the whole time to avoid burning on the bottom of pan. When the onions and garlic look golden, but not browned, add chilli powder, turmeric and tuna. Stir the ingredients well for about 1 minute or so. Lower the heat to the lowest it can go. Now add the cabbage to the rest of the ingredients in the pot and gently stir around until the cabbage is fully coated with the rest of the ingredients. Place a lid on the pot and let it cook for about 30 minutes taste and see if the cabbage is cooked after 30 minutes. If not, leave it for another 5 min or so until you think its cooked. Goes well with rice or naan, or just as a side dish. ; name: carrot soup with lime and chiles ; ingredients: canola oil, onion, garlic cloves, carrot, brown rice, chicken stock, salt, green chilies, lime, juice of ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the onion and saut for about 3 minutes, until transparent. Add the garlic and saut one minute longer. Add the carrots, broth and salt. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium-low. Simmer, partially covered for about 20 minutes, or until carrots are tender. Stir in the chiles, lime juice and rice. Cool and pure the soup with a food processor, blender or immersion blender. The easiest way to puree is to add the solid ingredients to your food processor with just enough liquid to puree and then mix this thick pureed mixture back into the broth. Reheat, if necessary and serve warm. ; name: simmered black beans ; ingredients: onion, green bell pepper, olive oil, garlic, ground cumin, chili powder, black beans, diced tomato, dried thyme, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Cook and stir onion, green pepper and olive oil in medium skillet over low heat until vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes. Add garlic, cumin and chili powder, cook 1 minute. Add beans, tomatoes and thyme. Stir to combine. Cover and cook over very low heat about 10 minutes. Uncover and cook, stirring until beans are thickened, about 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. ; name: peas n peppers ; ingredients: red peppers, water, frozen peas, butter, orange rind, dried rosemary, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cut the peppers in half lengthwise, remove stems, seeds and white membrane. Bring the water to a boil, add peas, return to boil cook 5 minutes until peas are tender, drain, reserve the cooking water. Puree the peas in your food processor add 5 tbsp of the reserved water and the butter return to saucepan and stir in the orange peel& rosemary heat through. Meanwhile immerse the peppers in boiling water and blanch for apprx 5 minutes or until the peppers are hot but still crisp fill the peppers with the pureed peas. Serve hot. ; name: two chile green rice ; ingredients: long-grain rice, olive oil, green onions, serrano pepper, lime, juice of, chili powder, oregano, cilantro, water, salt ; preparation:Saute green onions and serrano peppers 2 minutes in olive oil. Add the rice and saute another 2 to 3 minutes. Add lime juice, chile powder and oregano and continue sauteeing another minute or so. Pour in water, add cilantro, bring to a boil then reduce heat, cover and simmer on very low heat for 15 minutes or until rice is done. Salt to taste. ; name: easy vegetable rice medley ; ingredients: oil, onion, carrot, celery rib, red pepper, chicken broth, minute white rice, frozen peas, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a skillet. Add onion, carrot, celery, and red pepper. Cook 5 minutes or until tender. Add broth. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice and peas. Cover. Simmer 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. To save time, replace all the veggies with 3 cups frozen mixed vegetables or frozen broccoli florets and add them when you would have added the peas. ; name: peperonta ; ingredients: olive oil, red onion, yellow bell peppers, red bell peppers, zucchini, garlic cloves, water, tomatoes, sea salt, black pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet. Add onion and cook until soft, but not browned. Add peppers, zucchini, garlic and water. Reduce heat to low and simmer 10 to 15 minutes. Add tomatoes, salt and pepper. Simmer 20 minutes, until the mixture is thick and shiny. ; name: spring green guacamole ; ingredients: peas, avocado, nonfat sour cream, green onion, cilantro, lime juice, green chili, garlic clove, salt, black pepper ; preparation:

name: healthy slow cooker polynesian chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, pineapple juice, vinegar, light soy sauce, fresh ginger, garlic clove, sesame seeds, crushed red pepper flakes, rice, nonstick cooking spray ; preparation:Spray inside of slow cooker with non-stick cooking spray. Place chicken on the bottom of the slow cooker. Add all other ingredients into slow cooker, cover. Cook on high heat for 4 - 6 hours. As slow cooker temperatutres can vary, you may need to cook for more or less time. Chicken pieces will break apart durring cooking. Spoon chicken and sauce over rice. ; name: cilantro grilled chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, garlic cloves, fresh cilantro, seasoning salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, limes, juice of ; preparation:Pound chicken breasts between wax paper enough to flatten. Combine oil, lime juice, vinegar, mustard, garlic, cilantro, salt and pepper in a bowl. Add chicken, coat well and marinate at least 1 hour. Grill or broil chicken breasts for about 6 minutes on each side, basting once with left over marinate mixture. Preperation time does not include marinate time. ; name: devilled chicken low carb ; ingredients: olive oil, lemon, juice and zest of, garlic cloves, dried red chilies, boneless skinless chicken thighs, salt & fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Combine the oil, lemon juice and rind, garlic, chilli and seasoning in a shallow bowl. Add the chicken pieces and coat. Cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight. Thread the chicken onto 12 oiled skewers and cook under a preheated grill for 6-8 minutes, turning frequently. Delicious served with a mixed leaf salad with red capsicum added. I did not bother with a salad dressing as the chicken is so beautifully piquant. Prep time does not include marinade time of 4 hours. ; name: make ahead marinated chicken breasts ; ingredients: buttermilk, dijon mustard, honey, fresh rosemary, dried thyme, dried sage, dried marjoram, pepper, salt, boneless chicken breasts ; preparation:Mix together buttermilk with mustard, honey and seasonings. Place chicken breasts in a freezer bag. Pour marinade over chicken breasts. Freeze. On serving day thaw chicken, discarding marinade. Grill over medium heat until chicken is tender and juices run clear. ; name: apricot rosemary chicken ; ingredients: dried rosemary, dried oregano, dried basil, salt, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, fat free chicken broth, apricot preserves, honey mustard ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f line a 9x13-inch baking pan with foil, spray with olive oil. In a small bowl, mix the spices and rub over both sides of chicken breasts. Place in the prepared pan. Pour broth over chicken. Bake for 20 minute. In a small bowl, mix preserves and mustard, brush or spoon over chicken and bake an additional 10-15 minute or until done. ; name: lebanese chicken and potatoes ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, red potatoes, onion, ground sumac, salt, white pepper, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Place chicken, potatoes and onions in a large baking dish. Season with sumac, salt and white pepper. In a bowl, stir together garlic, olive oil, and lemon juice. Pour over chicken mixture. Sprinkle evenly with the parsley. Cover dish with foil. Bake in preheated oven for 35-40 minutes. Remove foil, increase heat to 450 degrees and cook until chicken and potatoes are golden, about another 30-40 minutes. ; name: dad s chicken soup ; ingredients: low sodium chicken broth, onion, celery, carrots, garlic, long-grain white rice, fresh thyme, cooked chicken, salt and pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Bring first five ingredients to boil in heavy large pot or dutch oven over high heat. Mix in rice and thyme. Return soup to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and simmer uncovered until rice is tender, stirring occasionally, about 30 minutes. Add chicken and simmer until heated through, thinning with additional broth if desired. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer soup to large bowl. Garnish with parsley and serve. I like corkscrew pasta in this. ; name: orange ginger chicken and rice recipe ; ingredients: orange juice, onion, cooked brown rice, fresh ginger, dried parsley, dried thyme, boneless skinless chicken breasts, cinnamon ; preparation:

name: sweet lemon and spice pork chops or ribs ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, honey mustard, tomato ketchup, lemon & herb seasoning, garlic, onion, black pepper ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 350 degrees f. Spread chops or full rack of ribs in roasting pan. Mix honey mustard, ketchup, lemon and herb spice, and dices garlic. Spread mixture over meat. Place cut onion over meat and sauce. Spinkle black pepper over entire dish. Bake for 30-40 minutes, until tender. Serve with your choice of vegetables for a little sweeter sauce add granulated sugar to taste. ; name: ranch marinated pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, ranch dressing, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, garlic cloves, onion powder ; preparation:Wash and pat dry pork chops with paper towel. Poke several holes in them with a fork. In a shallow baking pan, mix together rest of ingredients. Place pork in marinade, turning to coat completely. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour, turning at least once. Preheat oven to 275 degrees. Remove cover from pan, bake chops for about 30 minutes, turning at least once during cooking. Serve with baked potatoes, using cooked marinade and pan drippings to top. ; name: pork chops low cal carb ; ingredients: pork loin chops, dijon mustard, corn flakes, salt, pepper, basil, tarragon, garlic powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to broil. Coat pork chops with the mustard. In a shallow bowl, combine crushed corn flakes and the seasonings. Dredge pork chops in the crushed corn flakes mixture. Place pork chops on a wire rack and set rack on top of a sheet pan. Place under the broiler and cook on both sides until golden brown, about 5 minutes on each side. ; name: boneless honey mustard grilled pork loin ; ingredients: boneless pork loin, honey mustard, dijon mustard, orange juice, cajun seasoning, pepper, lemon pepper ; preparation:Wash the pork loin under cold water and pat dry with a paper towel. Take a fork and poke holes all over the loin, even the ends. Mixing all the wet ingredients in a small bowl, set aside. In another bowl, mix all the dry ingredients making sure the loin is dry, shake the dry ingredients all over the loin the front, back and the ends. Rub the dry seasoning on the loin making sure it is well covered and worked all in the loin. With a brush spread the wet ingredients all over the loin. Put the loin in a plastic bag, casserole dish or baking roaster and put back into frig for a minium of 12 hours, 24 is even better. Grill on low to medium heat until the thick part of the loin reaches 170. In a oven bake at 350 until the thickest part of the loin is 170. Enjoy. ; name: darrell s zingy pork chops ; ingredients: center-cut pork chops, barbecue sauce, orange marmalade, ground ginger, garlic powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Place chops in 8-inch square baking dish. Combine sauce, marmalade, ginger and. Garlic powder. Spoon evenly over chops. Bake 45 minutes or until chops are cooked through. ; name: stove top smoker one pot meal cajun pork chops ; ingredients: center-cut pork chops, potatoes, carrots, onion, elephant garlic clove, lemons, olive oil, cajun spices, garlic, wood chips ; preparation:Combine marinade ingredients in a ziploc bag. Add pork chops and marinade in refrigerator for at least one hour. To bottom of smoker add 3 tablespoons mesquite wood chips. Line tray of smoker with aluminum foil. Arrange potatoes, onions, carrots and pork chops in tray. Brush everything with marinade or spray with pam. Close lid and place on grill or stove-top. Smoke over medium heat for 30 minutes. Check for doneness before serving. ; name: grilled orange maple mustard pork chops bbq ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, dijon-style mustard, maple syrup, green onions, orange rind, pepper ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium. Trim fat from chops if necessary and season with pepper. In a small bowl, stir together mustard, syrup, onion and orange peel. Set aside. Grill chops 12-15 minutes until done. Turn once and brush with the sauce mixture during the last 5 minutes of grilling. ; name: pork chops in honey mustard sauce ; ingredients: center-cut pork chops, salt and pepper, olive oil, dry white wine, honey, dijon mustard ; preparation:

name: cornmeal crusted chicken legs ; ingredients: cornmeal, breadcrumbs, cayenne pepper, salt & freshly ground black pepper, chicken legs, dijon mustard, liquid honey ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Combine the cornmeal, breadcrumbs cayenne, salt and pepper in a shallow sided dish. Brush the chicken all over wth the mustard. Place the chicken in the crust mixture and pat the mixture onto the chicken to coat it on all sides. Set on a baking sheet skin side down and bake for 20 minutes. Turn the pieces over and bake for 15 minutes more. Drizzle the top of the chicken with honey and bake for 10-15 more, or until cooked through. For a calorie reduced version of this dish, remove the skin from the chicken before coating. I made this tonight using boneless, skinless chicken breasts, it was really tasty -- just decrease the cooking time. ; name: another garlic shrimp recipe ; ingredients: medium shrimp, butter, olive oil, dijon mustard, garlic, kosher salt, red chili pepper flakes, lemons, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place shrimp in a large broiler safe pan and pre-heat broiler, set aside. In a large saute pan, melt butter and oil until bubbly. Add garlic and saute 1-2 minutes-- be careful not to burn garlic. Add the dijon mustard, chili flakes and salt and stir until well blended. Pour sauce over shrimp and broil for approximately 5 minutes or until shrimp has turned pink. Remove from broiler and place on large platter, sprinkle with lemon juice and fresh parsley. Serve with fresh bread and extra lemon. ; name: dijon glazed halibut ; ingredients: dijon mustard, garlic cloves, fresh parsley, salt, fresh ground pepper, halibut fillets ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium. Coat the grill rack with nonstick cooking spray. Combine all ingredients but fish and optional parsley. Brush over fish. Grill fish, covered with grill lid, 6 to 8 minutes on each side or until fish flakes with a fork. Garnish with additional parsley, if used. ; name: french onion soup with cider ; ingredients: unsalted butter, onion, sea salt, dry cider, beef stock, baguette, dijon mustard, gruyere cheese, fresh thyme ; preparation:Melt butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onions and sea salt and cook, stirring occasionally, for 30 minutes or until onions are deep golden. Add cider and simmer until reduced by half, then add stock and simmer for 10 minutes. Season with pepper. Meanwhile, place bread on a foil-lined tray and cook both sides under a hot grill until dried but not browned. Spread with mustard and top with cheese, then grill until cheese bubbles and browns. Serve soup topped with the crotons and sprigs of thyme. ; name: baked herb crusted salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillets, dijon mustard, fresh parsley, fresh oregano, fresh thyme, plain breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Line baking pan with aluminum foil and spray with cooking spray. Combine herbs and crumbs, then mix with melted butter. Brush dijon on salmon fillets. Pat herb mix onto fillets. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or to your own preference. ; name: golden cheese bread ; ingredients: butter, cheddar cheese, dijon mustard, italian bread ; preparation:Combine butter, cheese and mustard. Spread on cut surfaces of bread. Place on foil covered baking sheet. Bake at 425 for 7 to 10 minutes or until spread has melted and is a light golden brown. To serve, slice diagonally. ; name: rack of lamb persille ; ingredients: racks of lamb, dijon mustard, unsalted butter, shallot, dried thyme, italian style breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. French the lamb by trimming the. Rub the fat side of each rack with mustard. In a saute pan, melt the butter over medium-low heat and cook shallots for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from the heat. Add thyme, bread crumbs, salt and pepper to taste and pat the mixture evenly onto the mustard, and arrange crumb side up in a roasting pan. Roast for 30 minutes, or until meat thermometer reaches 130-140 for medium rare. Carefully remove from the oven and let stand for 10 minutes. To serve, interlock the ribs, transfer to a serving platter and cut the chops. If you like, you could put paper frills on the frenched end bone of each chop. ; name: honey mustard tilapia ; ingredients: butter, dijon-style mustard, honey, seasoned dry bread crumb, pecans, fresh parsley, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: tex mex rice and beans ; ingredients: olive oil, yellow onion, green bell pepper, minced garlic cloves, rotel, pinto beans, white rice, chicken stock ; preparation:Heat olive oil. Add onion, peppers and garlic. Cook until transparent. Add rice and toast. Add chicken stock and rotel. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer covered for 20 mins. When 20 mins is up add beans. ; name: bahian shrimp stew ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, bell pepper, tomatoes, cilantro, garlic clove, tomato paste, bay shrimp, lemon juice, coconut milk ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet, add onion, pepper, tomatoes, cilantro, garlic and tomato paste. Cook for 10 minutes. Bring sauce to a boil, then add shrimp and lemon juice. Reduce heat to medium and cook for 2 minutes. Add coconut milk and bring the mixture to a boil. Serve over rice. ; name: orange almond scallops ; ingredients: orange juice, soy sauce, garlic cloves, sea scallops, green pepper, toasted almonds, cooked rice, orange zest ; preparation:Mix the orange juice, soy sauce and garlic together. Add scallops. Toss to coat. Put in the fridge for about 1 hour. Preheat the george foreman grill for 5 minutes. Drain scallops, discarding the marinade. Spray both sides of the grill with non-stick cooking spray. Place scallops and peppers on grill. Grill 3 minutes or until scallops or opaque. Remove scallops and continue grilling peppers about 1 minute longer. Mix the almonds and cooked rice together. Serve the scallops and peppers on rice garnished with orange peel. ; name: nava s jamaican inspired red beans and rice ; ingredients: olive oil, yellow onion, garlic cloves, cooked brown rice, adzuki beans, light coconut milk, fresh cilantro, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a saucepan on medium heat. Saut the onion and garlic until the onion is translucent. Add the rice, drained beans, coconut milk and thyme if using. Bring to a simmer then cover and cook over low heat until most of the coconut milk has evaporated, about 15 minutes. Garnish with cilantro leaves. Season with salt and pepper and serve hot. ; name: barbecued fish steaks ; ingredients: salmon fillets, onion, garlic, butter, lemon juice, soy sauce, salt, orange juice, ground pepper ; preparation:Saut onion and garlic in butter or margarine until tender. Add ingredients through ground peppercorn and simmer for about 7 minutes, stirring occasionally. Cool. Pour liquid into a zip-lock type storage bag. Add salmon. Marinate in refrigerator 45 minutes, turning after about 20 minute intervals. Remove fish from marinade. Place on well-greased, hinged wire grill. Cook 2 inches from coals for 3 minutes, basting frequently with sauce. Turn and cook for about 5 minutes longer, or until fish is done. ; name: confetti shrimp ; ingredients: red bell pepper, olive oil, shrimp, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, lemon juice, lime juice, salt, red chili oil, chives ; preparation:In a large saut pan, heat the oil, garlic and ginger over medium high heat until fragrant. Add the shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until bright pink. In a bowl, whisk the remaining olive oil, lemon and lime juice, scallion or chives, chili oil and salt. Pour over shrimp and let sit in the refrigerator for at least an hour or even over night. Before serving, toss shrimp with roasted red pepper. ; name: sweet and spicy pineapple fried rice ; ingredients: oil, garlic, fresh ginger, crushed red pepper flakes, cooked rice, soy sauce, crushed pineapple, green onion ; preparation:Heat oil over medium low heat, add garlic, ginger and red pepper. Cook and stir for 2 minutes. Increase heat to medium high and add rice and soy sauce. Cook for 2 minutes, stirring often. Add pineapple, stir and heat through. Garnish with sliced green onions over the top and serve. ; name: ginger orange tilapia ; ingredients: orange juice, orange peel, garlic, ginger, vegetable oil, tilapia fillets, flour, salt and pepper, green onion ; preparation:

name: whipped cream topping ; ingredients: heavy whipping cream, powdered sugar, vanilla extract, nutmeg ; preparation:Chill a medium-sized mixing bowl and mixer beaters in refrigerator for 15-30 minutes before preparing. Make sure to thoroughly chill whipping cream as well. Pour all ingredients into the mixing bowl. Beat at low speed at first until mixture begins to bubble and slightly thicken. Then beat at medium-high speed until beaters begin to leave a trail, and stiff peaks form when tested with the back of a spoon. Top dessert of your choice. Cover and store in refrigerator for 24-48 hours. ; name: chocolate pots de creme ; ingredients: heavy cream, granulated sugar, semisweet chocolate morsels, egg yolks, vanilla extract ; preparation:Put heavy cream in top of a double boiler. Add sugar. Place over boiling water and scald. Remove from heat and add chocolate and stir until completely melted. Beat egg yolks and gradually beat them into the hot chocolate cream mixture. Place top of double boiler over boiling water again and cook, stirring constantly, until well thickened. Remove from heat, stir in vanilla, and then pour into 6-8 small custard cups. When cool, place in refrigerator to chill before serving. ; name: non alcoholic hard sauce ; ingredients: powdered sugar, butter, salt, vanilla extract, heavy cream ; preparation:Sift powdered sugar and set aside. Beat butter until soft. Gradually beat in the sugar until well blended. Beat in salt and vanilla. Beat in heavy cream. When sauce is very smooth chill thoroughly. Serve. ; name: extreme kahlua chocolate mousse ; ingredients: heavy cream, egg yolks, sugar, strong coffee, kahlua, vanilla extract, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:In a 4 quart crockpot, stir together the cream, yolks, sugar, coffee, kahlua and vanilla extract until well blended, but dont whip. Stir in chocolate chips, cook on low for 1 hour, 45 minutes or until surface has small bubbles and chocolate is melted. Carefully pour the hot liquid into a blender and blend on high until it expands to 5 or 6 cups. Pour into a pyrex bowl, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate several hours. To serve, scoop into serving dishes. Makes 6 servings. ; name: new mexican hot chocolate ; ingredients: sugar, cocoa, water, cinnamon, nutmeg, milk, pure vanilla extract, whipped cream, cinnamon sticks ; preparation:Whisk together sugar, cocoa, water, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a saucepan over medium heat. Add milk and cook, stirring, until hot. Add vanilla and stir. Pour chocolate into serving cups and top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with a little cinnamon and nutmeg and serve with a cinnamon stick. ; name: fresh orange yogurt parfaits with granola ; ingredients: plain yogurt, currants, granola cereal, pure vanilla extract, honey, orange, zest of, orange juice, orange ; preparation:Line a sieve with cheesecloth or paper towels and suspend it over a bowl. Pour the yogurt into the sieve and allow it to drain, refrigerated, for 3 hours or overnight. Place the thickened yogurt into a medium bowl and stir in the currants or raisins, vanilla, honey, and orange zest. Thin with orange juice until it is a desirable consistency. Divide yogurt among 4 dessert dishes or parfait glasses, spooning yogurt in alternating with granola. Garnish with sections of orange and serve. ; name: cherry chocolate fruit decadence ; ingredients: low-fat cherry yogurt, chocolate flavored syrup, coconut, whipped cream, strawberry ; preparation:Mix yogurt, chocolate syrup and coconut in large bowl. Fold in whipped cream. Arrange layer of strawberries in each of 8 dessert or parfait dishes. Top with half of the yogurt mixture. Repeat layers. Serve immediately. ; name: modern morocco coffee cinnamon ice cream ; ingredients: heavy cream, instant espresso powder, fat-free sweetened condensed milk, plain fat-free yogurt, ground cinnamon, figs ; preparation:

name: taro and chicken coconut cream casserole ; ingredients: chicken, onion, spinach, taro root, tomatoes, cornflour, coconut cream, water, salt, lemon slice ; preparation:Arrange alternating layers of chicken, onions, spinach or taro leaves, and taro root in a casserole dish. Mix coconut cream and water together with salt, and corn flour. Pour over the top of the chicken mixture. Cover with tomatoes. Cover casserole with foil or a lid and bake at 325 for 1 hour until until chicken and vegetables are done. Serve with lemon slices. ; name: tri colour veggie burgers ; ingredients: carrot, zucchini, brown onion, egg whites, salt and pepper ; preparation:Grate or julienne vegetables. Mix grated vegetables with egg whites. Season. Place about 2 tablespoons worth of mixture into a non-stick frypan, flatten it out slightly so that the burgers are about 1cm thick. Cook on both sides till golden brown and crispy. ; name: aunt marie s peas ; ingredients: mushrooms, peas, onion, celery, butter, pimientos, salt, pepper ; preparation:Drain mushrooms, reserve liquid. Cook peas in amount of mushroom liquid called for on pea package. Cook onions& celery in butter until soft. Add pimentos& mushrooms, heat thoroughly. Add peas, salt& pepper. Refrigerate until next day. Heat to serve. ; name: spanish tortilla potato omelette ; ingredients: potato, onion, olive oil, eggs, salt ; preparation:Slice the potatoes as thin as possible and dry with a paper towel. Saut potatoes and onions in olive oil over medium heat, turning frequently, until golden brown. Meanwhile, beat the eggs with salt and pepper until foamy, 1-2 minutes. Pour the eggs over the potatoes, cover, lower the heat, and cook for about 5-7 minutes, until the omelette is set and the bottom is golden brown. Slide the omelette onto a plate, cover with the other plate, flip, and slide the omelette back into the pan, so that the cooked side is on top. Cover and cook for about 5 minutes longer. Cut into wedges and serve. ; name: split pea and zucchini soup ; ingredients: split peas, onion, vegetable oil, zucchini, water, vegetable bouillon granules, turmeric, pepper, salt ; preparation:Soak the split pea overnight in cold water, or at least 6 hours. Cook the onion in the oil until soft. Add the zucchini to the pan stirring for 2-3 minutes. Add the water, split pea, veg bouillon, tumeric, salt and pepper and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat, then cover and simmer for 30-40 minutes, or until the split peas are tender. ; name: tomato lentil stew ; ingredients: lentils, onions, oil, chopped tomatoes, water, oregano, basil, black pepper, salt ; preparation:Cook lentils in the water. Meanwhile, chop the onions. Saut onions in a little oil. Add the tomatoes when the onions are translucent. Cook 5-10 min then add the lentils. Cook 5 more minutes. ; name: zucchini mix in tomato sauce ; ingredients: tomatoes, olive oil, onion, celery, zucchini, sugar, salt ; preparation:Chop or partially puree tomatoes to your liking. Heat oil in large pan. Add onion and celery, saute for about 10 minutes or until onion and celery are soft. Add zucchini and cook until soft. Add tomatoes, sugar and salt. Bring to boil, and turn down to a simmer. Simmer for 30 minutes. Cool and pack into freezer containers. Freeze up to 3 months. ; name: la casita s guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, onion, salt, water ; preparation:

name: bavarian strawberry cream pie ; ingredients: strawberry, sugar, cold water, unflavored gelatin, boiling water, fresh lemon juice, heavy cream ; preparation:In a large bowl, crush strawberries and add sugar. Let stand 30 minutes. Pour cold water in a bowl and add the unflavored gelatin to the top. Let stand 5 minutes. Add boiling water to dissolve the gelatin. Stir. Stir in the the strawberries and add fresh lemon juice. Chill the gelatin until it is the thickness of unbeaten egg whites. Whip the cream until firm peaks form. Gently fold into strawberry mixture. Pour into pie crust and refrigerate for at least 4 hours. ; name: jelly jello slice bar ; ingredients: plain sweet biscuits, butter, sweetened condensed milk, lemons, unflavored gelatin, water, jello gelatin, boiling water, cold water ; preparation:Combine crushed biscuits and butter mixing well. Press into greased 30cm x 23cm pan and refrigerate. Combine condensed milk, lemon juice and gelatin mix. Mix well and pour over prepared base. Refrigerate 2 hours. Mix jelly powder and boiling water together, then add cold water. Refrigerate until consistency of unbeaten egg white, pour over lemon layer. Refrigerate, then cut into squares when set. I prefer a red jelly for this, but any flavour would be ok. ; name: simple strawberry syrup for pancakes ; ingredients: strawberry gelatin, cornstarch, sugar, water, frozen strawberries ; preparation:Combine geletin, cornstarch, and sugar in a large saucepan. Add water and stir to combine. Add strawberries and mash to break into small pieces. Heat over medium-high heat until mixture boils. Continue to boil for 1 minute or until syrup thickens. Cool. Store in fridge. Warm syrup to serve. ; name: orange lemon parfaits low fat low sugar ; ingredients: sugar-free lemon gelatin, fresh orange juice, low-fat cream cheese, evaporated skim milk, vanilla extract ; preparation:Sprinkle gelatin over orange juice in a heavy saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium high heat, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Combine remaining ingredients in a blender. Add gelatin mixture and pure. Chill before serving in individual serving glasses. ; name: simple light lemon pie ; ingredients: sugar-free vanilla pudding mix, sugar-free lemon gelatin, water, lemon juice, reduced fat graham cracker crust, light whipped topping ; preparation:In small saucepan, combine pudding mix and gelatine. Add water and lemon juice. Stir until smooth. Cook and stir over medium heat until mixture comes to a boil. Cook and stir 1-2 minutes longer or until thickened. Remove from the heat. Cool clightly. Pour into crust. Cover and refrigerate for 3 hours or until set. Spread with whipped topping. ; name: orange witches brew punch ; ingredients: orange gelatin, sugar, boiling water, apricot nectar, pineapple juice, lemon juice, ginger ale ; preparation:In a large bowl, dissolve gelatin and sugar in water. Stir in the apricot nectar, pineapple juice and lemon juice. Freeze in two 2-qt. Freezer containers. Remove from the freezer 2-3 hours before serving. Place contents of one container in a punch bowl. Mash with potato masher. Stir in ginger ale just before serving. Repeat. ; name: pink peppermint parfait ; ingredients: strawberry gelatin, hot water, ice water, peppermint extract, vanilla ice cream, chocolate sprinkles ; preparation:Heat water to boiling in 2 quart saucepan. Remove from heat. Add gelatin powder and stir until dissolved. Stir in ice cold water & peppermint extract. Cut ice cream into chunks. Add to gelatin mixture and stir until blended. Chill mixture until it begins to thicken and mound when spooned. Turn into parfait glasses. Chill until firm, 25-45 minutes. Garnish with chocolate sprinkles. Enjoy. ; name: raspberry whip ; ingredients: sugar-free raspberry gelatin, boiling water, cold water, sugar-free cool whip ; preparation:

name: ham cheese macaroni bake ; ingredients: onion, macaroni noodles, ham, cheddar cheese, milk, sour cream, cream of mushroom soup, parsley ; preparation:Using a layered effect, place onion, noodles, ham and cheese in a large 9 x 13 baking dish. Repeat for second layer using onion, noodles, ham and cheese. In a small bowl mix milk, sour cream and cream of mushroom soup. Pour over top of ham mixture. Sprinkle top with parsley. Bake in a 360 degree oven for 45 minutes. ; name: cranberry pilaf ; ingredients: butter, onion, fresh parsley, chicken bouillon cubes, boiling water, raw rice, cranberries ; preparation:Melt butter in a covered saucepan. Saute onion until transparent. Add parsley. Combine bouillon cubes and boiling water. Add to onion and parsley. Stir in rice. Bring mixture to a boil. Add cranberries. Simmer, covered, for 25 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. ; name: crunchy sweet and sour salad ; ingredients: walnuts, ramen noodles, unsalted butter, broccoli, romaine lettuce, green onion, vegetable oil, sugar, red wine vinegar, soy sauce ; preparation:Melt butter in skillet and brown walnuts & ramen noodles. Cool on paper towels. Combine browned noodles and walnuts with broccoli, lettuce, and onions in large serving bowl. Whisk remaining four ingredients together in mixing bowl. Dress salad when ready to serve. ; name: tagliatelle and chicken bake ; ingredients: tagliatelle pasta noodles, onion, vegetable oil, chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup mix, coarse grain mustard, red bell pepper, broccoli florets, water ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 200 celcius. Fry onion and chicken in oil for 3-4 minutes. Add the pepper and broccoli and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add the dry soup mix, mustard and water to the pan and bring to the boil, stirring until thickened. Place cooked tagliatelle into a suitable heatproof dish and pour the sauce over the top. Sprinkle with cheese and bake for 20 minutes. ; name: slow cooker chicken with rosemary apples and onions ; ingredients: onions, apples, chicken pieces, salt, ground black pepper, fresh rosemary leaves, chicken stock, cream of celery soup, cooked rice ; preparation:Arrange onion and apple slices in bottom of slow cooker. Place chicken pieces on top and season all over with salt and black pepper. Sprinkle rosemary over chicken. In a medium bowl, whisk together chicken stock and soup. Pour mixture over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 6 to 8 hours or on high for 3 to 4 hours. Serve chicken, sauce, apples, and onions over rice. ; name: saucy pork n noodle bake for 2 ; ingredients: oil, cooked pork, noodles, cream of onion soup, whole kernel corn, pimiento, sharp cheddar cheese, green pepper ; preparation:Hea oven to 375 degrees. Heat oil in 8-inch skillet. Brown meat over medium-high heat. Drain off fat. Stir in remaining ingredients. Pour into ungreased 1-quart casserole. Bake uncovered until noodles are tender, about 45 minutes. ; name: buttered noodles with eggs and parmesan cheese ; ingredients: noodles, eggs, parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, black pepper, butter ; preparation:Cook noodles in a large pot of lightly salted water until al dente. While the pasta is cooking, place the eggs, grated cheese, parsley, salt and pepper into a mixing bowl and beat with a whisk until well combined. When the noodles are almost cooked, melt the butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Quickly drain the pasta and add it to the skillet. Toss briefly to coat it with the butter. Add the egg mixture to the skillet and using a flat wooden spoon, mix quickly together for less than a minute until the eggs and noodles become creamy and thick. Do not cook the eggs too long or they will scramble and ruin the dish. Serve immediately. ; name: skillet franks n noodles ; ingredients: frankfurter, onion, dried basil, butter, cream of celery soup, milk, canned tomato, wide egg noodles, dried parsley ; preparation:

name: avocado open facers ; ingredients: mayonnaise, lemon juice, whole wheat bread, avocado, lettuce, tomatoes, cooked bacon, thousand island dressing, pickle, olive ; preparation:Combine mayonnaise and half the lemon juice. Spread on one side of each slice toast. Brush avocado with remaining lemon juice. Place leaf lettuce, tomato slices, and avocado slices on toast. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Crisscross 2 bacon slices atop each. Spoon on thousand island dressing. Garnish plate with pickles and olives. ; name: leftover turkey or chicken enchiladas ; ingredients: cooked turkey, vegetables, cheddar cheese, mexican blend cheese, salsa, cumin, chili powder, hot sauce, tortillas ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a bowl toss turkey, vegetables, cheese, salsa, hot sauce, chili powder, and cumin. Spoon filling into tortilla shells. You may need to use more than four if your shells are small. Roll the tortilla up and place seam side down into a lightly greased baking pan. Top with extra cheese and salsa if desired. Baked until heated through, about 15-20 minutes. ; name: 5 minute southwest layered salad k ; ingredients: romaine lettuce, black beans, frozen corn, salsa, monterey jack and cheddar cheese blend, ranch dressing, tortilla chips ; preparation:Arrange lettuce in bottom of glass serving bowl or on serving plate. Layer beans, corn, salsa and cheese evenly over top. Drizzle with dressing. Sprinkle with chips. You can change the cheese and beans to your favorites. ; name: seafood pea ista salad ; ingredients: mayonnaise, italian salad dressing, parmesan cheese, black-eyed peas, corkscrew macaroni, crabmeat, broccoli floret, green pepper, chopped tomato, green onion ; preparation:Combine mayonnaise, italian salad dressing and cheese in large bowl. Blend well. Add peas, broccoli, pepper, tomato, and onions. Toss gently to mix. Cover & refrigerate at least 2 hours. ; name: southwestern tortilla wedges ; ingredients: salsa, sour cream, red bell pepper, cooked chicken, flour tortillas, guacamole, refried beans, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Mix salsa and sour cream. Reserve half of the salsa mixture. Mix half of the salsa mixture, half of the bell pepper and the chicken. Place 2 tortillas on ungreased cookie sheet and spread with chicken mixture. Top each with another tortilla and then top with guacamole. Top each with another tortilla and spread with refried beans. Top each stack with remaining salsa mixture, another tortilla, bell pepper and then cheese. Bake about 15 minutes or until cheese is melted and filling is hot. Cut each stack into 8 wedges. ; name: buffalo style chicken nachos recipe ; ingredients: cooked chicken, hot sauce, butter, tortilla chips, cheddar cheese, green onions, ranch dressing ; preparation:In a bowl, toss chicken with hot sauce and butter. Layer chips, chicken mixture and cheese in baking dish. Sprinkle with green onions. Bake nachos at 350f for 5 minutes or until cheese is melted. Splash on more hot sauce to taste. Serve with ranch dressing on the side for dipping. ; name: easy tuna melt casserole bake ; ingredients: tuna, onion, celery, mayonnaise, bread, swiss cheese, cream of chicken soup, half-and-half ; preparation:Set oven to 350 degrees. Toast the bread slices. Line the bottom of a greased baking dish with 6 slices of bread, set 6 slices of bread aside. In a bowl, mix together the tuna, chopped onion, celery and mayo. Spread the mixture on the bread in the baking dish. Place the remaining bread slices on top of the tuna mixture. Place the slices of cheese over the bread. Mix together the undiluted soup and the half and half. Pour over the cheese slices, spreading with the back of a spoon to coat evenly. Bake for 20-25 minutes. ; name: blt pinwheels ; ingredients: mayonnaise, cream cheese, chunky salsa, dry mustard, bacon, flour tortillas, tomatoes, romaine lettuce ; preparation:

name: italian white bean soup ; ingredients: italian turkey sausage, onion, garlic cloves, cooking oil, cannellini beans, nonfat chicken broth, plum tomato, oregano, kale ; preparation:In a large sauce pan cook onion and garlic in hot oil about 5 minutes or until onion is tender. Stir in beans, broth, tomatoes and marjarom. Bring to boiling. Reduce heat. Simmer covered for 15 minutes. Stir in cooked sausage, kale or spinach simmer for about 5 minutes more or until kale is tender. Season to taste with pepper. ; name: italian sub stoup rachael ray ; ingredients: olive oil, sweet italian sausage, pepperoni, ham, green pepper, onion, diced tomatoes, chicken stock, gemelli pasta, arugula ; preparation:Place a soup pot on the stovetop and preheat to medium high. Add the olive oil and the sausage. Brown and crumble the sausage, drain off excess fat if necessary, then add the pepperoni and ham. Cook for two minutes. Add the bell peppers and onions and cook for two minutes more. Add the tomatoes and chicken stock and bring to a boil. Stir in the pasta and cook for 8 minutes. Stir the arugula into the stoup just before you serve it up. ; name: sausage cavatelli with broccoli rabe ; ingredients: italian sausages, pasta shells, garlic, broccoli rabe, chicken broth, butter, olive oil, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Saute sausage, breaking into small pieces. Remove from pan. Pour off excess grease. Cut rabe into bite size pieces and saute in olive oil. Add garlic and saute another minute or two. Add chicken broth and simmer until rabe is tender. Add butter and cooked sausage to pan. Stir until butter is melted. Pour over cooked shells. Serve with parmesan cheese. ; name: smoked sausage primavera ; ingredients: spaghetti, frozen broccoli florets, sweet red pepper, onion, smoked sausage, water, evaporated milk, butter, italian seasoning, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook spaghetti according to package directions adding the vegetables during the last 4 minutes. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, bring sausage and water to a boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 8 minutes or unti heated through. Add milk, butter and italian seasoning. Cook and stir until butter is melted. Drain spaghetti & vegetables and return them to the pan. Add parmesan cheese and sausage mixture to the pasta & veggies - toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: spaghetti sauce with cream cheese salsa ; ingredients: spaghetti sauce, salsa, ground chuck, italian turkey sausage, cream cheese, onion, olive oil, salt, pepper, oregano ; preparation:Place olive oil in large skillet and turn up to medium heat. Chop onion, then add to hot oil. Saute for approximately three minutes. Add ground beef and sausage. Stir and cook until both are well browned. Remove oil from pan. Add sauce, then add the salsa. Cover and cook at medium heat until sauce starts to bubble. Cut cream cheese into chunks and stir into the sauce. Cook and stir until thoroughly melted. Serve over pasta, rice or bread. ; name: penne with collards sausage and mushrooms ; ingredients: spicy smoked sausage, fresh mushrooms, garlic cloves, olive oil, collard greens, dried italian seasoning, tomatoes seasoned with basil garlic & oregano, penne pasta, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Prepare pasta according to package directions and plan to have it cooked& ready to go by the end of the cooking process. Brown sausage slices in a large deep pot until browned on each side. Remove sausage slices from the pan and drain off any fat. Add oil to the same pot, heat over medium briefly, then add garlic and mushrooms, stirring constantly until mushrooms are tender - this will take only a few minutes. Return the sausage slices to the pan along with collards, italian seasoning, and tomatoes with their juices. Cook, stirring as needed, for about 10 minutes. Add the cooked pasta and toss well. Serve with grated parmesan cheese sprinkled over each serving to taste. ; name: spring mix in pasta salad ; ingredients: spaghetti noodles, spring greens, cherry tomatoes, black olives, chicken piece, black bean garlic sauce, italian dressing ; preparation:Cook pasta as directed, rinse and drain thoroughly. Place in large salad bowl, and mix in the black bean garlic sauce giving a light coating to all. This can be adjusted to your taste. Add bag of spring mix salad, olives and cherry tomatoes. Mix completely, and then pour the italian dressing over all mixing thoroughly once more. Can be eaten right off or chilled for later. ; name: white bean sausage rigatoni ; ingredients: rigatoni pasta, white kidney beans, italian-style stewed tomatoes, smoked turkey sausage, fresh basil, asiago cheese ; preparation:

name: honey mustard green beans vinaigrette ; ingredients: fresh green beans, fresh lemon juice, vegetable oil, honey, dijon mustard, salt and pepper ; preparation:Put the drained steamed or blanched green beans in a mixing bowl. In a smaller bowl, add the lemon juice, oil, honey, and mustard. Whisk until smooth. Pour the mixture over the beans and toss to coat. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot, cold, or at room temperature. ; name: romaine salad with avocado and oranges ; ingredients: oranges, lemon juice, olive oil, dijon mustard, salt, romaine lettuce, scallions, avocado ; preparation:With a paring knife remove the skin and pith from the oranges. Working over a large salad bowl to catch the juices, cut out the orange segments. Set aside. Add the lemon juice, oil, mustard, and salt to the juice, whisking to blend. Add the lettuce and scallions, tossing well. Add the avocado and toss gently to combine. ; name: arugula and goat cheese salad ; ingredients: fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard, virgin olive oil, salt & pepper, baby arugula, red seedless grapes, goat cheese, capers ; preparation:Whisk together the mustard, lemon juice & oil. Place arugula in a large bowl and toss with the dressing. Divide between 4 plates. Sprinkle grapes, cheese, cper & hemp heart over the arugula. Serve. ; name: spicy broccoli ; ingredients: dijon mustard, lemon, juice of, paprika, cayenne pepper, olive oil, broccoli ; preparation:Combine mustard, lemon juice, paprika, cayenne and olive oil. Cut off ends of broccoli. Cut lengthwise into florets, retaining stems. Steam or cook broccoli in simmering water until crisp tender, about 5-6 minutes. Drain and remove to serving bowl. Add mustard mixture and toss until thoroughly coated. ; name: baby greens with mustard vinaigrette ; ingredients: eggs, honey dijon mustard, white pepper, salt, red wine vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, butter lettuce ; preparation:Peel and chop eggs. Combine next 5 ingredients and process until smooth with a hand held blender. Place lettuce in a bowl, add dressing and eggs and toss gently. Serve on a plate or salad bowl. Garnish with chopped parsley. ; name: cucumber tomato salad ; ingredients: olive oil, lemon juice, dijon mustard, salt, sliced ripe olives, tomatoes, cucumber, lettuce leaf ; preparation:Combine first 4 ingredients, stirring well with fork or small whisk. Combine olives, tomato, and cucumber in a bowl. Pour dressing mixture over tomato mixture. Toss. Cover and chill 30 minutes, if desired. Serve on lettuce leaves. ; name: smoky grilled asparagus ; ingredients: mayonnaise, extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, garlic clove, sweet smoked paprika, kosher salt, cumin seed, asparagus ; preparation:Light a grill. In a shallow dish, whisk the mayo with the oil, lemon juice, garlic, paprika, salt and cumin. Add the asparagus and toss. Let stand for 30 minutes. Grill the asparagus over moderately high heat, turning, until tender and blistered in spots, about 6 minutes. Serve warm. ; name: lemon asparagus 3 weight watchers points ; ingredients: fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard, olive oil, kosher salt, black pepper, asparagus, shallot ; preparation:

name: chicken with lime and capers ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, olive oil, salt, garlic cloves, chicken bouillon cube, hot water, fresh lime juice, capers, cooked rice ; preparation:Heat butter and oil in a skillet. Add chicken. Sprinkle salt over chicken as it cooks. When the chicken is almost completely cooked, add the garlic. While the chicken is cooking, dissolve the bouillon cube in water. Add the lime juice, capers and caper juice to the chicken. Stir in the chicken bouillon. Cover and simmer while you cook the rice. Serve hot over the rice. ; name: crock pot lemon garlic chicken and wild rice ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, garlic cloves, wild rice, lemon juice, water, fresh parsley ; preparation:Season the chicken breasts generously with salt and pepper. Place the chicken breasts in the bottom of a slow cooker. Add the garlic and rice. Add the lemon juice to the water and stir. Pour this mixture over the rice and chicken. Stir once to coat. Place the lid on the slow cooker and set on low for 8 hours. To plate, place a serving of the rice on each plate and top with 1 chicken breast. Garnish with fresh parsley sprigs. ; name: garlic ginger chicken for two ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, butter, garlic cloves, cumin, ground ginger, lemon juice, dark brown sugar, water ; preparation:Use one tablespoon of the olive oil to saute the chicken breast over medium heat until brown, set aside. Add second tablespoon of olive oil, butter, garlic and spices and saut until fragrant. Add lemon juice and stir until mixed. Add reserved chicken, brown sugar and enough water or wine to create a sauce with the spices and sugar. Simmer about 10 minutes, turning once, until the flavors begin to penetrate the meat. Add more water as needed. ; name: greek marinade for chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, dill, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, lemon zest, lemon, juice of, ouzo, fennel seed, salt & pepper ; preparation:Put all marinade ingrediantsin a large ziplock bag. Mix well. Add chicken breasts. For a mild flavour, leave for 30 minutes. For more intensity, leave up to 4 hours but no longer. Heat up grill to medium high. Cook breasts, with lid closed for about 7 minutes per side. ; name: cilantro grilled chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, garlic cloves, fresh cilantro, seasoning salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, limes, juice of ; preparation:Pound chicken breasts between wax paper enough to flatten. Combine oil, lime juice, vinegar, mustard, garlic, cilantro, salt and pepper in a bowl. Add chicken, coat well and marinate at least 1 hour. Grill or broil chicken breasts for about 6 minutes on each side, basting once with left over marinate mixture. Preperation time does not include marinate time. ; name: the best chicken and sausage kebabs ever ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, mild italian sausage, olive oil, red wine vinegar, garlic cloves, dijon mustard, oregano, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Cut the chicken and sausage into thick pieces of roughly equal size and place in a large ziploc bag. In a small bowl or measuring cup, whisk together the remaining ingredients for the marinade. Pour the marinade into the ziploc bag with the meat, seal and distribute so all of the meat is covered with marinade. Let sit for a minimum of two hours or up to eight. When finished marinating, skewer the meat onto metal or wooden skewers, alternating two pieces of sausage, then two pieces of chicken. Grill for 20 minutes or until done, turning the kebabs once halfway during cooking. Serve on a platter, and take the meat off the skewers at the table. It makes a nice presentation. ; name: marsala chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, flour, garlic salt, pepper, dried oregano, olive oil, butter, mushroom, marsala wine, chicken stock ; preparation:Mix flour and herbs. Cut chicken horizontally i find it easier to cut it horizontally. Dredge chicken in flour and herbs. Heat oil and butter until it sizzles. Saute chicken on both sides until lightly browned, about 3 minutes on each side. Remove chicken from pan. Add muchrooms to pan. Saute muchrooms about 4-5 minutes. Add chicken back to pan. Add wine. Cover skillet, simmer on low for about 10 minutes. ; name: garlic roast chicken with rosemary and lemon ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, mccormick grill seasoning, dry white wine ; preparation:

name: really good brussels sprouts ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, bacon, salt, green onions, lemon, juice of, sugar ; preparation:Trim the bottoms off of the brussels sprouts and then cut in half vertically. Fry bacon in a large pan until crispy. Remove from pan and reserve the fat. Add the brussels sprouts to the bacon fat and fry on medium. Do not stir too often as they need to brown. Sprinkle with the salt. Once the brussels sprouts are browned, add the green onion. Crumble the bacon and add to the brussels sprouts. Stir together the juice of the lemon and the sugar. Pour juice over the brussels sprouts and cook until evaporated. ; name: brussels sprouts with cashews ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, margarine, fresh lemon juice, salted cashews, pepper ; preparation:Depending on the size of the sprouts steam them for 5-8 minutes. They should still be slightly crisp. Drain and pour into a fry pan where you have already melted the margarine. Add lemon juice and pepper. Cook until sprouts are heated through and glazed with the margarine. Sprinkle with the nuts and serve. ; name: baby bella and green bean salad ; ingredients: fresh green beans, garlic cloves, red wine vinegar, dijon mustard, coarse salt, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil, green onions, baby portabella mushrooms, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat salted water in a large saucepan until boiling. Cook the beans until tender, about 7 minutes. Drain beans. Set aside to cool. Whisk together the garlic, vinegar, mustard, salt and pepper to taste in a small bowl. Slowly whisk in the olive oil, adding in a steady stream, until smooth. Combine the reserved beans, green onions, mushrooms and parsley in a large bowl. Pour dressing over vegetables. Toss lightly. Chill 30 minutes before serving. ; name: brussels sprouts with fried onions and pancetta ; ingredients: brussels sprout, olive oil, butter, pancetta, lemon juice, sea salt, cracked black pepper, fried onions ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a large frying pan. Add the pancetta and fry for 2 minutes until just becoming crisp. Toss in the sprouts, then the lemon juice. Season well. Cook for 2 minutes until heated through. Serve topped with fried onions. ; name: tropical green beans ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh green beans, yellow onion, garlic cloves, salt, balsamic vinegar, hearts of palm, sun-dried tomato, pine nuts, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature. ; name: lemony shredded brussels sprouts ; ingredients: olive oil, brussels sprouts, sea salt, fresh ground pepper, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:In a large nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add brussels sprouts and 2 tablespoons water. Season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, until crisp-tender, 8 to 10 minutes. Remove from heat, and stir in lemon juice. Serve immediately. ; name: smothered cabbage ; ingredients: savoy cabbage, onion, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, fennel seed, salt, fresh ground black pepper, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Chop off the hard core of cabbage and discard rinse the cabbage well and slice thinly. Put the onion in the olive in a medium saucepan and cook gently until a good golden colour. Add the garlic cook 1 minute, then add the fennel seeds and cabbage. Cook until the cabbage has wilted turning often with tongs, then season with salt and pepper and pour over the vinegar. Cover with lid and cook very gently for 45 minutes turning often. If the cabbage dries up add 1 tablespoon of water. ; name: linda s string bean and brussels sprouts saute ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, green beans, butter, garlic clove, salt and pepper, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:

name: baked cajun chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, dried thyme, nonstick cooking spray, garlic salt, nonfat milk, white pepper, onion powder, crushed red pepper flakes, ground black pepper ; preparation:Spray a 13x9x2 inch baking dish with non-stick cooking spray. Arrange the chicken in the dish. Brush lightly with the milk. In a small bowl mix onion powder, thyme, garlic salt, white pepper, red pepper, and black pepper. Sprinkle over chicken. Bake at 375 for 45 minutes. ; name: baked panko chicken parmesan ; ingredients: chicken tenderloins, parmesan cheese, panko breadcrumbs, italian seasoning, salt, black pepper, garlic powder, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Beat eggs in a bowl. Combine cheeses, bread crumbs and spices in a separate bowl. Dip chicken pieces in egg, then bread crumb mixture, then egg, then bread crumb mixture again. Place chicken on a cookie sheet and bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes. Serve over pasta with marinara sauce and mozzarella. Or place chicken on a hoagie roll with marinara and mozzarella for a chicken parmesan sub. Also great for dipping with marinara or ranch. ; name: cheddar chicken chowder ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast half, garlic clove, salt, pepper, flour, chicken broth, milk, frozen mixed vegetables, hot sauce, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Spray large saucepan with cooking spray. Add chicken and garlic. Cook and stir on medium-high heat 5 minutes or until cooked through. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in flour. Cook and stir an additional minute. Add broth, milk and vegetables and hot sauce. Stir. Reduce heat to medium. Bring just to boil, stirring frequently. Remove from heat. Stir in cheese until completely melted. ; name: jalapeos cream cheese chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, soft cream cheese, fresh jalapenos, lipton onion soup mix, onion, dry breadcrumbs, garlic powder, cooking spray ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Butterfly chicken breasts to as even a thickness as possible. Sprinkle both sides of chicken with garlic powder to your taste. Cut jalapeos in half and remove seeds and membranes, then dice. Dice onion. Combine cream cheese, diced onion, jalapeos and soup-mix together well. Spray baking pan with cooking spray. Place each chicken breast out flat on pan. Spread cream cheese mixture equally on each chicken breast. Top each breast equally with bread crumbs. Place in oven for 40-45 minutes. Check halfway through cooking time and cover with foil if needed. ; name: chicken breast ala escarole ; ingredients: italian seasoned breadcrumbs, garlic, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast, egg, flour, olive oil, escarole, chicken broth ; preparation:Mix together crumbs, garlic and parmesan cheese and set aside. Pound chicken breast lightly to even out thickness. Dip chicken in egg, then in flour. Saute in 2 t oil in large skillet over medium heat for 3 minutes on each side until lightly browned. Add half of escarole to skillet, sprinkle with half of bread crumb mixture. Add remaining escarole and bread crumbs. Pour in broth, then drizzle with remaining olive oil. Simmer, covered on low about 15 minutes, until escarole is wilted and chicken is done. ; name: country style chicken kiev ; ingredients: breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, oregano leaves, garlic salt, salt, butter, boneless skinless chicken breasts, apple juice, green onion, parsley ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees. Combine bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, basil, oregano garlic salt and salt. Dip chicken in breasts in melted butter, then coat with bread crumbs mixture. Reserve remaining butter. Place chicken in 9 inch square baking dish. Bake for 50-60 minutes or until chicken is fork tender. Meanwhile, add apple juice, green onion an dparsley to reserved melted butter. When chicken is golden brown, pour buter sauce over chicken. Continue baking for 5 minutes. Serve with sauce spooned over. ; name: open faced cordon bleu ; ingredients: eggs, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, vegetable oil, butter, diced tomatoes, oregano, salt, ham, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:Beat eggs in shallow dish. Place bread crumbs in another shallow dish. Dip chicken in egg, then crumbs. Heat oil and butter in lg skillet. Brown chicken on both sides. Put chicken in baking pan. Pour tomatoes over chicken. Sprinkle with oregano and salt. Top chicken pieces with ham and then cheese. Bake at 375 for 15 minutes, or until tomato juice is bubbly. ; name: spicy oven fried chicken breasts ; ingredients: dry breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, paprika, dried thyme, garlic salt, ground red pepper, low-fat buttermilk, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, cooking spray, margarine ; preparation:

name: chicken and artichoke bake ; ingredients: artichoke hearts, fresh spinach, shallot, garlic, chicken broth, white wine, chicken thighs, cream of chicken soup, milk, diced green chilis ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Drain and cut the artichokes into smaller pieces and place in a medium size bowl. Add the spinach, garlic and shallots. Mix the chicken broth and wine and pour over spinach and artichokes mixture. Mix well and set aside. Skin the thighs and remove any fat. Place in a 9 inch square baking dish. Mix the chicken soup, milk and green chilies together and set aside. Spread spinach mixture over the chicken. Pour soup mixture over spinach mixture. Cover with a lid or foil. Put it in the oven and bake for 1 hour or until chicken is done and juices are hot and bubbly. ; name: chinese soup ; ingredients: oil, mushrooms, water, garlic clove, ramen noodles, sherry wine, lemon juice, tabasco sauce, green onion ; preparation:Fry mushrooms, and garlic in oil. Add water and the flavour packs from the instant noodles. Bring to a boil. Add the noodles. Simmer 3 minutes. Add onions and your choice of any garnishes. ; name: tournedos brennan ; ingredients: butter, sliced mushrooms, flour, mushroom liquid, red wine, worcestershire sauce, salt, black pepper, filet mignon, tomatoes ; preparation:In a small saucepan, melt butter and saute mushrooms. Add flour and cook slowly a few minutes until slightly browned. Stir in wine, mushroom juice, and seasonings. Cook until thickened. While sauce is cooking, season and grill filets to taste cut the tomato into four nice slices and grill. Arrange tomato slice on each filet and pour mushroom sauce over all. ; name: mussels in garlic butter ; ingredients: butter, garlic cloves, parsley, mussels, shallot, thyme, bay leaf, salt, dry white wine ; preparation:Cream the butter with the garlic and parsley in a bowl and set aside. Place the mussels in a saucepan with the remaining ingredients, bring to boil and simmer for 3 minutes or until the mussels open. Detach the lid from the base and place the mussels still sitting in their shells on a baking sheet. Dot generously with the garlic butter and grill until the butter has melted. Serve the mussles on their own or in the wine broth. ; name: shrimp and shallot linguini from trader s joes ; ingredients: shrimp, shallots, butter, olive oil, garlic, black pepper, lemon juice, fresh parsley, linguine ; preparation:Mix melted butter, olive oil, shallots, garlic, pepper, parsley and lemon juice in a bowl. Toss shrimp into mixture. Heat skillet on medium. Pour shrimp mixture into skillet and saute until shrimp turn pink in color. Serve over linguini noodles. ; name: pasta with salmon ; ingredients: shallot, dill, salmon fillets, butter, dry white wine, frozen shrimp, pasta, fish stock, cream, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cut the shallot and the dill. Cook the shrimp. In a deep skillet, heat the butter, add the shallot and the dill then fry the salmon fillets. When the shrimp is cooked add to the skillet. Then in the same skillet where the salmon and shrimp are -- add the fish stock, the cream and the white wine. Add salt and pepper to your taste and leave in low heat from 2-3 minutes, moving every now and then to mix well. Cook the pasta in water with salt. When the pasta is al dente, drain it and add it to the deep skillet where the salmon and shrimp are. Mix well and serve hot. ; name: the never enough mushroom vegetarian gravy ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic clove, white button mushrooms, portabella mushrooms, white wine, salt, ground black pepper, bay leaf ; preparation:Heat the oil in a 5 quart pot on medium heat. Add the onions and saute until caramelized, about 20-30 minutes, stirring and scraping the bottom of the pot occasionally. Add garlic, if using, and saute 2 minutes, or until softened. Pour in 5 cups water, bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes. Blend with an immersion blender. Add the mushrooms, wine, salt, pepper, bay leaf and 2 cups water. Bring to a boil, occasionally pushing the mushrooms into the liquid. Reduce heat and simmer 45-60 minutes, or until of desired thickness. Remove bay leaf and adjust seasoning, if necessary. I also added some fresh chopped thyme before serving. ; name: shrimp with artichokes ; ingredients: shallots, mushroom, butter, dry white wine, artichoke hearts, chives, chopped pimiento, shrimp, lemon, parsley ; preparation:

name: italian bread bread machine ; ingredients: water, olive oil, sugar, dry yeast, all-purpose flour, salt, egg white, cornmeal ; preparation:Add into bread machine container, warmed water, olive oil, sugar, yeast. Let yeast foam a bit. Dump in flour. Add salt on top of flour. Turn on bread machine to dough setting. Watch for the first bit and add flour as needed to get a good dough. Get cookie sheet ready by lightly oiling with olive oil and sprinkle on cornmeal. Form dough into loaf and set on cookie sheet with tea towel to cover until doubled in size. Preheat oven to 375f. Cut slits diagonally in loaf with sharp knife. Brush with egg white. Bake in preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown and when you knock the bottom of bread it sounds hollow. ; name: armenian zeppole bishi ; ingredients: yeast, warm water, sugar, eggs, flour, salt, vegetable oil ; preparation:Dissolve yeast in warm water with sugar. Whisk in eggs. Add flour and salt to make a batter a little thicker than pancake batter. Allow to rise in a warm spot until double in bulk. Heat oil to 375 degrees. Drop by spoonfuls in hot oil. Keep them rolling around until browned. Drain and serve with powdered sugar or maple syrup. ; name: buttermilk cheese bread bread machine ; ingredients: water, egg, sharp cheddar cheese, whole wheat flour, bread flour, dry buttermilk, salt, yeast, lemon pepper ; preparation:Place ingredients in bread machine pan in recommended order and set on dough cycle. Check consistency of dough and add additional water or flour, if necessary. At end of cycle, remove, shape, and let rise until approximately doubled. Bake in preheated 350 deg. Oven. For app. 30 to 40 minute. ; name: bermuda johnny bread caribbean ; ingredients: sugar, flour, salt, baking powder, egg, milk, butter ; preparation:Mix sugar, flour, salt, and baking powder. Add egg and milk and mix until batter consistency. Melt butter in frying pan. Spoon a third of the batter into the pan. Fry on low heat until brown. Turn and brown the other side. Repeat twice with the remaining batter. Split bread in half and serve with plenty of butter and jam. ; name: buckingham palace scones ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, butter, egg, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Sift together flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Chop in the butter until the particles of butter are the size of coarse cornmeal. Add the egg and milk. Stir quickly and lightly, only until no flour shows. Add more milk if needed to make dough soft. Turn the dough out on a floured surface and knead gently about 15 times. Cut the dough in half. Shape each half into a ball, press each down into a round and cut into 8 wedges like a pie. Place the wedges on a greased cookie sheet without allowing the sides to touch. Bake until golden brown about 12 minutes. ; name: never fail biscuits ; ingredients: flour, salt, sugar, baking powder, milk, butter, egg ; preparation:Mix dry ingredients. Cut in butter. Beat egg and milk slightly in separate bowl. Milk together. Kneed on floured surface. Roll till desired thickness. Cut out with a glass or cookie cutter. Bake 350 for till golden brown. ; name: 100 whole wheat rolls ; ingredients: yeast, water, honey, olive oil, eggs, salt, whole wheat flour ; preparation:Dissolve yeast in water and honey for about 5 minutes. Combine honey, olive oil, eggs, and salt in a large mixing bowl. Slowly add flour and knead until it loosens from sides of the bowl. Place in large oiled bowl, cover and let rise until about double. About one hour, be sure it is in a warm place. Punch down and remove dough. Shape dough into rolls about 2 inch in diameter. Place on an oiled or non stick baking sheet, cover and let rise for 30 minutes. Pre-heat oven to 375 degrees. Bake at about 375 degrees for about 20 minutes or until browned. ; name: liisa s dinner rolls abm ; ingredients: water, egg, sugar, butter, dry milk, salt, bread flour, yeast ; preparation:

name: chicken and corn impossible quiche ; ingredients: milk, eggs, butter, plain flour, tasty cheese, cooked chicken, creamed corn, fresh parsley, chives, salt and pepper ; preparation:Whisk eggs, milk and butter together in a large jug. Sift the flour into a bowl. Make a well in the centre and gradually whisk in the milk mixture. Mix in half the cheese and all remaining ingredients. Spoon mixture into a deep greased pie 25cm pie plate. Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake in a moderate oven for 35-40 minutes or until firm. ; name: cucumber tuna boat ; ingredients: cucumbers, tuna, hard-boiled eggs, cheddar cheese, celery, mayonnaise, sweet pickle relish, onion, lemon juice, salt ; preparation:Cut cucumber in half lengthwise. Remove and discard seeds. Cut a thin slice from bottom if necessary so they sit flat. In a bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Spoon into the cucumbers. Serve immediately. ; name: chicken and chickpea salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, cherry tomatoes, chickpeas, flat leaf parsley, red onion, feta, olive oil, lemon juice, baby spinach ; preparation:Combine chicken, tomatoes, chickpeas, parsley, onion and feta in a large bowl. Season with black pepper. Toss gently to combine. Whisk oil, juice and salt and pepper together in a small bowl until well combined. Add spinach to chicken, drizzle with dressing and toss again to combine. Serve with crusty bread. ; name: cheesy broccoli noodle soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, chicken broth, fine egg noodles, frozen chopped broccoli, salt, garlic powder, fresh ground pepper, milk, american cheese ; preparation:Heat olive oil in large saucepan. Add onion and saute over medium heat till onions are golden. Add chicken broth and bring to a boil. Add salt and noodles. Cook uncovered for about 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in broccoli and garlic powder and cook for another 4 minutes. Add milk, cheese and pepper stirring constantly until the cheese is melted. ; name: crock pot chicken and dumplings spend with pennies version ; ingredients: onion, cream of celery soup, cream of chicken soup, fresh parsley, poultry seasoning, black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, low sodium chicken broth, frozen vegetables, refrigerated biscuits ; preparation:Add onion to 6 qt crock pot and top with chicken breasts. In a small bowl, combine cream of celery soup, cream of chicken soup, parsley, poultry seasoning and pepper. Spread over chicken breasts. Top with chicken broth and cook on high 5 hours. Approximately 1 hour before serving, roll each biscuit thin and flat. Cut into 4 strips. Add vegetables and biscuit strips to the slow cooker and stir. Remove chicken breasts and slightly shred. Add back into slow cooker and stir. Let cook an additional 10 minutes and serve. ; name: chef dee s crock pot stuffing ; ingredients: margarine, chicken broth, hot water, bread cubes, celery, diced onion, poultry seasoning, parsley flakes, salt, pepper ; preparation:Combine melted margarine, chicken broth and hot water. In a large bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Pour the water mixture over the crumb mixture and stir. Spray crock pot with pam, then spoon stuffing into it. Cook on low for 5-6 hours, scraping the sides and stirring once, half way through. Check the moisture once or twice, add a little hot water if necessary, but it should be nice and moist as is. ; name: chinese new year rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil, cooked chicken breast, cooked rice, green onions, celery, carrot, soy sauce, black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over medium high heat. Add chicken. Cook and stir until lightly browned. Add remaining ingredients. Cook and stir about 10 minutes. Serve. ; name: which came first the chicken or the egg salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, hard-boiled eggs, celery, green onion, sweet pickle relish, mayonnaise, salt and pepper, fresh curly-leaf parsley ; preparation:

name: oriental marinated cucumber salad ; ingredients: white vinegar, soy sauce, sugar, ground ginger, english cucumber, green onions ; preparation:Combine vinegar, soy sauce, sugar and ginger. Thinly slice cucumber and combine with green onions in a separate bowl. Pour dressing on top. Mix well. Chill. ; name: fresh tomato basil salad weight watchers ; ingredients: red wine vinegar, sherry wine vinegar, shallot, salt, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil, basil sprig, tomatoes, fresh basil ; preparation:Whisk together 2 vinegars, shallot, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Slowly whisk in oil until blended. Add the basil sprig and bruise it with the back of a wooden spoon. Let mixture stand at room temperature for about 20 minutes. Discard sprig of basil. Put the tomatoes in a serving bowl. Drizzle with the dressing and add shredded basil. Toss to coat.
