Add onion, cover, and cook over low heat for 4 minutes. Combine beef and egg, mixing well. To beef mixture, add cooked onion, parsley, worcestershire and tabasco sauces and mix well. Shape mixture into 4 large patties, scoring each with a knife. Heat remaining tablespoon of oil in large frying pan. When hot, add meat patties and cook 10 to 12 minutes over medium heat. Turn 4 times during cooking, and once seared, season well. When burgers are done, transfer to ovenproof dish. Cover each burger with a slice of cheese and broil 2 to 3 minutes. ; name: rich topping for steaks or veal ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, tomato ketchup, sour cream, tabasco sauce, black pepper, grainy mustard, worcestershire sauce, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Mix first 7 ingredients with a fork. Roast or grill meat until nearly done as you like it. Spread the cheese mixture over each portion of meat. Sprinkle over the parmesan. Grill carefully -- watching -- until the cheese melts. Serve immediately on warmed plates. ; name: cream cheese tuna dip ; ingredients: milk, cream cheese, mayonnaise, green onion, prepared horseradish, red pepper sauce, worcestershire sauce, tuna, paprika ; preparation:

name: banana split surprise ; ingredients: margarine, graham cracker crumbs, eggs, powdered sugar, vanilla, crushed pineapple, bananas, frozen whipped topping, pecans, maraschino cherry ; preparation:Combine melted margarine and cracker crumbs, mold and pat into bottom of a 13x9x2-inch pan. Beat eggs at high speed until light, about 4 minutes. Add powdered sugar, softened margarine and vanilla. Beat 5 minutes at high speed. Spread mixture over crumbs mixture. Chill 30 minutes. Spread pineapple over cream mixture. Arrange bananas over the pineapple, then spread with whipped topping. Sprinkle with pecans and garnish with cherries. Chill 6 hours or overnight. ; name: doris cranberry salad ; ingredients: crushed pineapple with juice, water, black cherry gelatin, whole berry cranberry sauce, apple, celery, walnuts, lemon juice ; preparation:Prepare the apples, celery, and walnuts. Combine pineapple& water in a saucepan. Heat just to boiling& add gelatin. Stir until gelatin is dissolved. Add other ingredients, stir well, and turn off burner. Pour into bowl. Chill until firm. ; name: fruit salad with pudding ; ingredients: peach slices, pineapple chunks, vanilla instant pudding mix, strawberry, banana, blueberries, grapes, sugar ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine peaches, pineapples, and vanilla pudding mix. This includes the juices from the cans. Mix well until pudding is dissolved. Stir in strawberries, banana, blueberries, grapes, and sugar if desired. Chill. ; name: hawaiian tea sandwiches filling ; ingredients: crushed pineapple, sugar, nuts, cream cheese, milk, bread ; preparation:In saucepan combine pineapple and sugar. Bring to boil. Cook until thick, stirring constantly. Cool. Stir in nuts. Soften and mash cheese with enough milk or mayonnaise to make a good spreading consistency. Combine with pineapple mixture. Spread on thin bread, top as sandwich. Trim and cut into squares. ; name: coco nutty tropical treat bars ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, icing sugar, butter, sweetened condensed milk, crushed pineapple in juice, sweetened flaked coconut, almonds, white chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375, grease a 9x13 pan. In a medium bowl, mix graham crumbs and icing sugar, stir in butter until evenly blended. Press crumb mixture firmly into bottom of prepared pan. Bake until edges are golden brown about 10-12 minutes. In a large bowl stir condensed milk, pineapple, coconut& almonds. With a rubber spatula dollop pineapple mixture onto crumb crust and spread almost to the edges. Bake until just set, 10-15 minutes. Remove from oven& sprinkle with white chocolate chips, let stand until chocolate softens, 3-4 minutes. Then spread chocolate over surface. Cool completely, cut into bars. ; name: orange pineapple jello salad ; ingredients: crushed pineapple, sugar, orange jell-o, cool whip, cream cheese, milk ; preparation:Drain pineapple juice and reserve. Combine pineapple juice with sugar and bring to a boil in the microwave. Add orange jello to boiling liquid and let cool. After mixture has cooled, stir in cool whip. In a separate bowl, soften cream cheese with milk. Stir into jello mixture. Add crushed pineapple and blend all together. Put in mold and refrigerate. ; name: ambrosia sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, orange, lemon, crushed pineapple, brown sugar, butter, shredded coconut, maraschino cherry ; preparation:Place sweet potatoes in a baking dish. Slice orange and lemon into thin slices. Alternate layering slices on top of sweet potatoes. Combine drained pineapple, brown sugar and melted butter. Pour mixture over sweet potatoes. Sprinkle with shredded coconut. Decorate with cherries. Bake in a 350f oven for 30 minutes. ; name: peach pineapple blackberry cobbler ; ingredients: crushed pineapple, frozen blackberrie, peach slices, yellow cake mix, pecans, sugar, butter ; preparation:

name: english muffin panini with goat cheese and tomato ; ingredients: english muffins, pesto sauce, goat cheese, tomatoes, radicchio ; preparation:Spread toasted side of each english muffin half with pesto. Spread cheese over 4 english muffin halves. Top with tomato slices, radicchio, and remaining english muffin halves. Spray panini with cooking spray. Coat skillet or grill pan with cooking spray and heat over medium heat. Place panini in pan. Weight with smaller-diameter saucepan weighted with 2 cans. Cook 2 minutes. Flip, replace weight, and cook 2 minutes more. ; name: easy bake oven english muffin pizza ; ingredients: english muffin, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, sliced mushrooms ; preparation:Separate the english muffins and place on a baking sheet. Top each with about 1 tbs. Of prepared sauce. Top with any additional pre-cooked toppings. Top with shredded cheese. Bake in your easy-bake oven for about 15-20 minutes. ; name: brunch b t on english muffins ; ingredients: english muffins, miracle whip light, bacon, red onions, beefsteak tomato, fresh basil ; preparation:Toast muffins and spread each muffin half with 1 tbs miracle whip. Cut bacon slices in half. Lay 3 bacon slice halves on top of each muffin half. If including onion, top each with a slice of onion. Top onion with a slice of tomato. Sprinkle basil over the top. ; name: tomato basil pizza snack ; ingredients: whole wheat english muffin, no-salt-added tomato sauce, part-skim mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, tomatoes ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Place english muffin on a small baking sheet. Spread tomato sauce over top of muffin. Top with cheese. Sprinkle fresh basil and tomato on top. Broil until cheese is brown and sauce is bubbly. Serve immediately. ; name: cowboy chicken cheese muffins ; ingredients: cooked chicken breast strips, pesto sauce, butter, english muffins, cooked bacon, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a medium bowl, stir together the chicken, pesto, and melted butter until chicken is evenly coated. Place english muffin halves, cut sides up, on a baking sheet. Divide the chicken mixture evenly among the muffin halves. Bake about 10 minutes or until chicken mixture is heated through. Top muffins with the bacon pieces. Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese. Bake for 2 to 3 minutes more or until the cheese is melted and bubbly. ; name: open faced crab melts ; ingredients: lump crabmeat, mayonnaise, salt, pepper, english muffins, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Stir together first 4 ingredients. Spread mixture evenly over cut sides of muffin halves. Sprinkle evenly with cheese. Broil 5 inches from heat 2-3 minutes or until cheese is melted. Serve immediately. ; name: kentucky hot brown strata ; ingredients: country bread, smoked turkey, bacon, tomatoes, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, dried sage, salt, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Oil or butter a deep 9- or 10-inch baking dish. Slice the bread about -inch thick. Arrange 3 equal alternating layers of the bread, turkey, bacon, tomato, and cheese in the baking dish. Cut or tear the bread slices if needed to make snug layers. In a bowl, whisk the eggs with the milk, sage, salt, and cayenne. Pour the liquid mixture over the bread mixture. Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours to overnight. Remove the strata from the refrigerator 20-30 minutes before you plan to bake it. Preheat oven to 350. Bake the strata for 50-55 minutes until puffed, golden brown, and lightly set in the center. Serve hot. ; name: eggs benedict sort of for 2 ; ingredients: english muffins, canadian bacon, swiss cheese, eggs, milk, black pepper, cayenne pepper, hollandaise sauce ; preparation:

name: marsala chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, flour, garlic salt, pepper, dried oregano, olive oil, butter, mushroom, marsala wine, chicken stock ; preparation:Mix flour and herbs. Cut chicken horizontally i find it easier to cut it horizontally. Dredge chicken in flour and herbs. Heat oil and butter until it sizzles. Saute chicken on both sides until lightly browned, about 3 minutes on each side. Remove chicken from pan. Add muchrooms to pan. Saute muchrooms about 4-5 minutes. Add chicken back to pan. Add wine. Cover skillet, simmer on low for about 10 minutes. ; name: chicken chardonnay ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, salt, pepper, flour, butter, garlic cloves, thyme, sage, white wine, swanson chicken broth ; preparation:Cut up all chicken breasts into bite sized cubes. Melt 3 tablespoons of the butter in a large skillet. Mix together the flour and the salt and pepper meant for the batter. Carefully coat all chicken cubes and brown in skillet. Remove and place in a shallow dish and cover. Melt down the rest of the butter. Mix in garlic, and all spices. Add chicken back into the mix and coat throughly. Add in white wine, allow to come to a boil for 5-7 minute. After the wine has cooked down, add in chicken broth, bring to a boil and then simmer for an additional 5-7 minute. I reccomend serving this over pasta. Very tasty. ; name: cilantro pesto chicken tenders ; ingredients: chicken breast tenders, walnuts, garlic cloves, fresh cilantro leaves, fresh italian parsley, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, lime ; preparation:In a food processor, finely chop the walnuts and garlic. Add cilantro, parsley, salt and pepper and process until finely chopped. With processor running, slowly add the oil to create a smoothe puree. Place chicken in large, resealable bag plastic bag, add the marinade and seal tightly. Make sure marinade is evenly distributed on all the chicken tenders. Refrigerate for 2 hours. Remove chicken from bag and thread on skewers. Grill over direct high heat for about 6 to 8 mins, turning over once. Serve warm with lime wedges. ; name: rosemary roasted chicken with potatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, paprika, rosemary, garlic, black pepper, salt, chicken breast halves, small red potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix oil, and seasonings in a large bowl. Add chicken and potatoes. Toss to coat. Line 15x10x1-inch baking pan with foil and spray with no-stick cooking spray. Arrange chicken and potatoes in single layer in pan. Roast in oven for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are tender, turning potatoes occasionally. ; name: devilled chicken low carb ; ingredients: olive oil, lemon, juice and zest of, garlic cloves, dried red chilies, boneless skinless chicken thighs, salt & fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Combine the oil, lemon juice and rind, garlic, chilli and seasoning in a shallow bowl. Add the chicken pieces and coat. Cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight. Thread the chicken onto 12 oiled skewers and cook under a preheated grill for 6-8 minutes, turning frequently. Delicious served with a mixed leaf salad with red capsicum added. I did not bother with a salad dressing as the chicken is so beautifully piquant. Prep time does not include marinade time of 4 hours. ; name: chicken rosemary ; ingredients: sweet white wine, dried rosemary, vegetable oil, fresh mushrooms, salt and pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves ; preparation:In small bowl, combine wine and rosemary. Let stand at room temperture for 2 hours. Heat oil in lg skillet. Saute mushrooms until lightly browned. Remove from skillet. Salt and pepper the chicken. Cook chicken until browned on both sides. Add a little more oil if necessary. Return mushrooms to skillet. Add wine and rosemary mixture. Cook and stir for 2 minutes. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. ; name: mediterranean chicken for two ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, herbed feta cheese, black olives, extra virgin olive oil, black pepper, tomatoes, onion, garlic clove, fresh basil, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Cut a 2-inch pocket in the thickest part of each chicken breast. In a small bowl combine the feta and the chopped olives, then stuff of mixture into each pocket. In a nonstick skillet, heat 2 tbs. Olive oil on medium to high heat. Season the chicken with pepper and add it to the skillet, cooking 2 minutes on each side or until brown. Transfer to an oven safe baking dish, drizzled with 1 tbs. Olive oil and bake for 18 minutes. In a bowl mix tomato, kosher salt, onion, garlic, basil and parley. When chicken is 5 minutes from being finished, put the remaining olive oil in the skillet, add tomato mix and heat through. Serve chicken with tomato mix on top. ; name: garlic and sage chicken and potato saute ; ingredients: oil, butter, fresh sage leaves, garlic, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, small red potato, salt and pepper, chicken broth, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: best cheesy potato soup ever ; ingredients: butter, celery, onion, potatoes, chicken broth, milk, salt, paprika, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium high heat. Saut celery and onions together. Add potatoes and chicken broth. Cover and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 12 minutes. In batches, puree potatoes in blender and return to sauce pan. Stir in milk and seasonings. Add the cheese and heat only until melted. Garnish with paprika, croutons, and parsley. ; name: scalloped potatoes curdle free ; ingredients: butter, flour, milk, salt, potatoes ; preparation:Melt butter in a sauce pan, stir in flour, salt and add milk slowly, stirring constantly until sauce boils and thicken. Add potatoes and heat, stirring until the mixture boils again. Spoon potatoes into a shallow, greased casserole. Sprinkle 1 t diced butter over top. Bake at 350 for 35 minutes. ; name: potato egg pie ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, fresh pepper, milk, mashed potatoes, hardboiled egg, crisp bacon, parsley, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Over medium heat melt butter then blend in flour, salt and pepper. Slowly mix in milk, stirring continually until mixture is thick and bubbly. Remove from heat- set aside. Line bottom and sides of a greased 9 inch pie plate with half the potatoes. Into the shell layer eggs, bacon, parsley, cheese and white sauce. Cover with remaining potatoes. Brush the top of the pie with 2 tablespoons of milk. Bake for 20 minutes or until top is browned. ; name: potato soup with ham and cheese ; ingredients: potatoes, water, ham, milk, cheddar cheese, salt, pepper, red pepper flakes, butter, flour ; preparation:Boil potatoes until tender enough to eat but not to soft. Drain potatoes and reserve the liquid. In a large pot melt butter. When the butter is melted add the flour and whisk to combine until smooth. Add the milk whisking to combine until smooth. Add 2 cups of the potato cooking water. Add the ham and cook for 5 minutes. Add the cheese and stir till melted. Add the potatoes, salt, pepper, and red pepper. Place on the lowest heat and let set for 5 to 10 minutes for the flavors to blend. Serve with crusty bread and maybe a salad. ; name: mashed potatoes swirled with pesto ; ingredients: potatoes, milk, butter, salt, pepper, pesto sauce, basil, pine nuts ; preparation:Cover and cook potatoes in boiling salted water for 15 to 20 minutes, until potatoes are fork tender. Drain potatoes. Mash potatoes in a large mixing bowl until no lumps remain. Add butter and milk, salt, and pepper mashing in to blend together. Fold in pesto very lightly just to streak the potatoes. Garnish with pine nut and basil. ; name: cheesy scalloped potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, white flour, onion, celery leaves, parsley flakes, butter, salt, pepper, milk, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Put flour, onion, celery leaves, parsley, butter, salt, pepper and milk into blender. Mix on high about 2 minutes. Arrange potatoe slices in buttered 2 quart baking dish. Pour onion mixture over potatoes. Sprinkle with grated cheese. Bake in 350 degree oven 1 hour. Uncovered. Can be frozen and reheated. I always make two at a time and stash one in the freezer. ; name: smokey cheese covered roasted potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, mozzarella cheese, salt, black pepper, olive oil, bread, salted peanuts ; preparation:Also need a big lid that will cover your serving dish entirely and a smoldering red hot charcoal piece. Grease a baking dish and line the potatoes. Drizzle oil to coat well and sprinkle salt and pepper. Bake for 1 hour in a preheated oven turning the potatoes from time to time. When potatoes are done, sprinkle shredded cheese and bake for 5-7 minutes more till the cheese melts nicely. Transfer the potatoes to a serving dish. Now keep the bread slice in the center of the dish. Place the smoldering charcoal piece on the bread slice and let one drop of oil fall on the same. U will see lot of smoke coming out. At this very moment, immediately cover the dish with a large lid that will not let the smoke escape from any side. Remove the lid after a minute. Garnish with crushed peanuts or almonds and enjoy a nice meal. ; name: bill knapp s au gratin potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, flour, milk, salt, pepper, paprika, instant chicken bouillon granules, velveeta cheese ; preparation:

name: blinchatyi pirog pancake pie ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, salt, milk, flour, butter, ground beef, onion, mushroom, salt and pepper ; preparation:Make the filling by sauteing the onions and mushrooms till soft and golden. Season. Mix with the cooked ground beef and leave to cool. Mix the pancake batter together with all ingredients except melted butter and fry 6-8 pancakes, each 7-8 inches in diameter. Cover and keep warm as you make them. When all the pancakes are ready, put two pancakes side by side in a deep baking pan, spread a layer of filling, then another two pancakes, then more meat. Continue in this way, finishing with two pancakes on top. Sprinkle with the melted butter and warm in the oven at 300f for 15 minute serve with a salad. ; name: potato egg pie ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, fresh pepper, milk, mashed potatoes, hardboiled egg, crisp bacon, parsley, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Over medium heat melt butter then blend in flour, salt and pepper. Slowly mix in milk, stirring continually until mixture is thick and bubbly. Remove from heat- set aside. Line bottom and sides of a greased 9 inch pie plate with half the potatoes. Into the shell layer eggs, bacon, parsley, cheese and white sauce. Cover with remaining potatoes. Brush the top of the pie with 2 tablespoons of milk. Bake for 20 minutes or until top is browned. ; name: fried eggs with sour cream ochiuri cu smantana ; ingredients: sour cream, flour, butter, eggs, salt and pepper ; preparation:In small bowl, thoroughly mix sour cream and flour. Heat butter in a small skillet over medium-high heat. As soon as the foam disappears from the melted butter, break eggs one by one into the hot butter. Add salt and pepper to taste. When eggs begin to solidify, gently spoon sour cream over them, cover, and let cook another half minute to a minute, depending on personal preference. With spatula, transfer eggs to a warm serving plate. ; name: cheese straws iv ; ingredients: cheese, butter, red pepper, flour, salt ; preparation:Cream butter and cheese. Add salt, pepper and flour. Mix well. Roll thin. Cut in desired shapes. Place on cookie sheet and bake in 425 degree oven until very light brown, about 8 to 10 minutes. ; name: tee s corn pudding ; ingredients: sugar, flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, whipping cream, butter, corn ; preparation:Combine first 4 ingredients. Whisk together eggs, whipping cream and butter. Gradually add sugar mixture, whisking until smooth. Stir in corn. Pour mixture into a lightly greased 13 x 9 baking dish. Bake at 350 for 50 minutes or more until deep golden and set. Let pudding stand 5 minutes. ; name: baby food chicken ; ingredients: butter, unbleached flour, milk, chicken, potato, white cheddar cheese, vegetables, salt ; preparation:Grill or bake chicken, remove bones and shred. Bake or boil potato and chop into small cubes or mash. Melt butter in a saucepan. Add milk, flour, and cheese and make a sauce. Add chicken and potato to it. Add remaining ingredients. ; name: cheesy asparagus and ham ; ingredients: butter, flour, milk, mild cheddar cheese, salt, pepper, asparagus, ham, breadcrumbs ; preparation:In large skillet, melt butter, stir in flour, cook 1 minute. Slowly stir in milk, cook until bubbly. Add cheese, salt and pepper, mix well. Remove from heat. Put 3 pieces asparagus on each ham slice. Roll up and place in 13x9 baking pan. Cover with the cheese sauce. Sprinkle with crumbs. Bake at 375 for 20 minutes. ; name: swiss green bean casserole ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, pepper, sugar, onion, sour cream, string beans, swiss cheese, corn flakes ; preparation:

name: south of the border strata ; ingredients: white bread, monterey jack cheese, green chili, ham, milk, eggs, green onions, tabasco sauce, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Spray 9x13 inch casserole dish. Place bread on bottom and top with monterey jack cheese, green chiles and ham. Mix eggs, milk, green onion& tabasco and pour over bread. Top with cheese and cover over night. Bake 325 for 40 minutes. ; name: broccoli casserole jane and michael stern ; ingredients: white bread, eggs, milk, butter, cheddar cheese, kosher salt, sugar, broccoli florets ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 and butter an 8-inch square baking dish. Cover the bottom of the dish generously with the torn bread. Combine the eggs, milk, melted butter, cheese, salt, and sugar in a bowl. Mix until combined. Stir in the broccoli and pour the mixture over the bread. Cover with aluminum foil and bake for 35 minutes. For a chewier top, remove the foil during the last 10 minutes of baking time. ; name: wisconsin monte cristo sandwich ; ingredients: egg, plain yogurt, salt, butter, white bread, ham, swiss cheese, cheddar cheese, powdered sugar ; preparation:In a wide shallow dish, whisk the egg, yogurt and salt. Brush one side of bread slices with melted butter. Layer the ham, swiss and cheddar on the buttered side of 2 slices of the bread. Top with remaining bread, buttered side inward. Melt 2 tablespoons of butter in a cast iron skillet over medium-low heat. Carefully dip both sides of the sandwich into the egg mixture, holding sides of sandwich together. Cover and cook in skillet until golden, then turn and cook other side until cheese is melted. Add additional butter to skillet as needed. Dust with powdered sugar and serve immediately. ; name: breakfast casserole with a biscuit crust ; ingredients: biscuit dough, sausage, mozzarella cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Butter or spray 9x13 inch baking dish. Heat oven to 425. Press biscuits onto bottom of baking dish, sealing all areas to make solid crust. Sprinkle with cooked sausage, then the shredded mozzarella cheese. Mix eggs, milk, salt, and pepper together. Carefully pour the egg mixture over meat and cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until firmly set in center. ; name: wife saver breakfast ; ingredients: white bread, cheddar cheese, back bacon, eggs, dry mustard, onion, green pepper, salt & pepper, butter, corn flakes ; preparation:Grease the bottom of 11 x 13 pan. Remove crusts from bread and layer them in bottom of pan. Add a layer of sliced cheese, and then a layer of ham followed with a final layer of bread with crusts removed. Set aside. In a medium bowl beat the eggs, then add dry mustard, minced onion, chopped green pepper, and salt& pepper to taste. Pour egg mixture over bread, cheese and ham. Cover and refrigerate overnight. In the morning preheat oven to 350f. Mix melted butter to the crushed corn flakes and sprinkle over top. Bake for 1 hour. ; name: hawaiian omelette ; ingredients: eggs, pineapple chunk, ham, monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese, water, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Beat together eggs, water, salt and pepper. Thinly coat your skillet with vegetable oil spray. Heat over medium high. Pour egg mixture into pan. When eggs are almost set, sprinkle half of the omelette with remaining ingredients. Fold other half of omelette over filling. Continue cooking until cheese melts, about 2 minutes. Cut omelette into 3 wedges and serve. ; name: kentucky hot brown strata ; ingredients: country bread, smoked turkey, bacon, tomatoes, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, dried sage, salt, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Oil or butter a deep 9- or 10-inch baking dish. Slice the bread about -inch thick. Arrange 3 equal alternating layers of the bread, turkey, bacon, tomato, and cheese in the baking dish. Cut or tear the bread slices if needed to make snug layers. In a bowl, whisk the eggs with the milk, sage, salt, and cayenne. Pour the liquid mixture over the bread mixture. Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours to overnight. Remove the strata from the refrigerator 20-30 minutes before you plan to bake it. Preheat oven to 350. Bake the strata for 50-55 minutes until puffed, golden brown, and lightly set in the center. Serve hot. ; name: southwestern monte cristos ; ingredients: white bread, hot pepper jelly, honey-baked ham, monterey jack pepper cheese, smoked turkey, eggs, milk, hot sauce, unsalted butter ; preparation:

name: frog hollow chicken sandwiches ; ingredients: chicken breast fillet, white wine, celery, celery leaves, fresh chives, mayonnaise, lemon, juice of, salt and pepper, bread ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 c. Place chicken in baking dish with celery leaves and wine. Cover dish with foil and cook chicken 20 - 30 minutes. Remove from oven and allow to cool. Drain. Roughly chop chicken. Mix in a large bowl with with all other ingredients, adding enough mayonnaise to moisten chicken and bind ingredients. Cut crusts off of bread and spoon mixture on the centre of half the bread and spread to the edge with knife. Top with remaining half of bread, pressing down gently. Cut each sandwich into 3 fingers. Place in baking dish cover with a damp tea towel and seal with plastic wrap. Sandwiches can be stored in refrigerator up to 6 hours. ; name: chicken stuffed with smoked salmon ; ingredients: chicken breasts, oil, onion, red pepper, chicken soup, smoked salmon, sweetcorn, water, salt, pepper ; preparation:Pre heat oven to gas 4, 350f, 180c. Make a pocket in the chicken breasts and stuff with smoked salmon leaving a little of the salmon left over for the sauce. Place in a ovenproof dish. Fry onions in oil until golden, then add red pepper and cook for a further minute. Add soup, water, remainding salmon and sweetcorn and mix well. Pour over the chicken. After 20 mins cooking in oven give the sauce a stir and baste chicken breasts with the sauce, cook for further 20 mins and serve. ; name: spicy oriental chicken ; ingredients: chicken breast, green peppers, onion, flour, sugar, soy sauce, hot chinese chili paste, chicken stock, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cut chicken into a 1-2 inch size and season with salt and pepper. Place the chicken in a bowl and evenly coat with flour. Slice green peppers and onion into strips. Combine sugar, soy sauce, chili paste and chicken stock or water in a small bowl. Heat a saute pan with olive oil. Place chicken and brown both sides. Add green pepper and onion strips, put a lid and cook until chicken is heated through and the onion and pepper strips become tender. Add the seasoning mixture and cook until heated through. Serve immediately. ; name: lemon grilled salmon or chicken ; ingredients: dill weed, lemon-pepper seasoning, salt, garlic powder, brown sugar, chicken broth, olive oil, soy sauce, salmon ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except the salmon or chicken in a container that can be sealed. Mix together well. Add the salmom or chicken and marinate at least 1 hour, turning once. Drain and discard marinade. Place salmon skin side down on grill for 15-20 minutes. You may also broil salmon or chicken for 20-30 minutes. ; name: chicken tortellini salad ; ingredients: cheese tortellini, reduced-fat sour cream, light mayonnaise, dry ranch dressing mix, cooked chicken, roasted red peppers, scallions, fresh basil ; preparation:Cook the tortellini according to the package directions. Drain, rinse with cold water, drain again. In a large bowl, combine the sour cream, mayonnaise, and ranch dressing mix. Mix well. Add the tortellini, chicken, roasted peppers, scallions, and basil. Toss until well combined. Cover and chill until ready to serve. ; name: shaker tavern dijonnaise ranch chicken and pasta ; ingredients: ranch salad dressing, butter, dijon mustard, white wine, chicken breasts, pasta, garlic powder, black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Mix the ranch dressing and mustard. Set aside. Pound the chicken evenly and cut into strips. Toss on garlic and pepper to taste. Saute chicken in the butter until brown and cooked through. Add the wine. Stir and cook over medium heat for 5 minutes. Stir in ranch and mustard mixture, heating thoroughly. Stir in the pasta. Serve with a sprinkling of the parmesan cheese on top. ; name: asian chicken salad ; ingredients: ramen noodles, cooking oil, chicken breasts, sesame ginger salad dressing, ground ginger, celery, carrot, cashews, peas ; preparation:Boil noodles until just tender, about 3 minutes. Pan fry cubed chicken with oil. When the pasta is done, drain it, add the chicken. Mix in celery, carrots, peas and nuts. Wisk the dressing with the ginger and coat chicken and vegetables with the dressing. ; name: apple annie s tea room s chicken salad ; ingredients: chicken breasts, celery, red bell peppers, dried dill weed, dry ranch dressing mix, mayonnaise ; preparation:

name: chickpea soup with shredded kale and chorizo ; ingredients: chicken stock, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, chickpeas, dried chili, kale, chorizo sausage ; preparation:Fry the onion and garlic in the olive oil in a large pan. Add the chickpeas, chicken stock and chilli. Cook for about 10 minutes. Stir in the kale and cook for 3 minutes. Spoon into bowls and top with the chorizo. ; name: spinach fettuccine with sun dried tomatoes goat cheese ; ingredients: olive oil, oyster mushroom, shallot, garlic, sun-dried tomato, white wine, fresh basil, spinach fettuccine, salt and pepper, goat cheese ; preparation:In an extra large skillet, place the oil and heat it on medium until it is hot. Add the mushrooms, shallots, garlic and sun-dried tomatoes. Saute the ingredients for 2 to 3 minutes or until the mushrooms are slightly cooked. Add the wine and stir it. Cook the ingredients for 1 minute. Add the basil and stir. Add the pasta, salt and pepper. Mix the ingredients together thoroughly so that the pasta is well coated. Add more oil if the pasta seems dry. Place the pasta on a serving plate. Sprinkle the goat cheese on top. ; name: fettuccine with creamy tomato sausage sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, spicy sausage, garlic, crushed tomatoes, sun-dried tomato, dry white wine, cream, spring onions, sage leaves, fettuccine ; preparation:Heat olive oil in frying pan, cook sausages for 8-10 minutes or until cooked through. Remove from pan and chop roughly, cover to keep warm. Return pan to medium heat and add garlic, crushed and sundried tomatoes, white wine and cream and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer, uncovered for 10 minutes or until sauce thickens slightly. Meanwhile, cook pasta according to package directions, drain. Stir cooked sausage, spring onions and sage through sauce, season to taste. Divide pasta among serving bowls and spoon over sauce. ; name: sausage potatoes and peas ; ingredients: italian sausages, sweet peas, potatoes, chicken bouillon cube, hot water, butter, parsley, oregano, salt and pepper ; preparation:Spread sausage links, potatoes and peas in 13 x 9 baking dish. In saucepan over medium heat mix rest of ingredients until boullion cube is dissolved. Pour over sausage, potatoes and peas. Cover tightly with aluminum foil. Bake in 350 degree oven 45 minutes to 1 hours. ; name: caldo de hongos ; ingredients: olive oil, mushroom, onion, garlic cloves, jalapenos, water, salt and pepper, cilantro ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large stockpot over medium heat. Add onions and saute for about 2 minutes. Add garlic and saute for another minute. Stir in jalapenos and mushrooms and cover pot, reducing heat to low. Let vegetables sweat for about 10 minutes, or until softened and juices are released from the mushrooms. Add water or broth, salt and pepper to taste, and cilantro. Bring to a boil, then serve immediately. ; name: skewered garlic shrimp ; ingredients: shrimp, soy sauce, pineapple chunks, oil, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, green onions ; preparation:Combine soy sauce, pineapple chunks, pineapple juice, oil, garlic, crushed red pepper and green onions in plastic bag. Add shrimp. Marinate at least 1 hour. I usually let it marinate a few hours. Place shrimp, pineapple and green onions on skewers. Grill until pink. ; name: good broccoli casserole ; ingredients: broccoli, cream of mushroom soup, mayonnaise, eggs, tabasco sauce, onion, cheddar cheese, butter, herbed breadcrumbs ; preparation:Combine first 6 ingredients. Sprinkle cheddar cheese on top of broccoli mixture. Combine crumbs and melted butter and sprinkle on top of cheese. Bake 35 minutes in a pre-heated 350 degree oven. This dish will serve 8. Any leftovers are reheated very nicely in microwave. ; name: sausage stuffed mushroom caps ; ingredients: mushrooms, spicy bulk sausage, garlic clove, scallion, egg, white breadcrumb, soy sauce ; preparation:

name: easy peanut butter balls ; ingredients: peanut butter, margarine, vanilla, powdered sugar, chocolate chips ; preparation:In a medium bowl knead peanut butter, margarine, vanilla and sugar, with your hands, until smooth dough is formed. Shape into half-inch balls, place on tray lined with wax paper and freeze for at least one hour. Melt chocolate in the microwave. Use 20-second zaps and mix in between each zap until smooth. Insert a toothpick into each peanut butter ball and dip ball into melted chocolate. Return to wax paper and refreeze. Store in airtight container and serve from frozen. ; name: peanut butter and jelly smoothie ; ingredients: creamy peanut butter, jelly, milk, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Combine peanut butter and jelly. Place in blender container. Add milk and ice cream. Cover. Blend until smooth. Pour into tall glass. Serve immediately. ; name: can t fail fudge ; ingredients: sugar, butter, evaporated milk, marshmallows, chocolate chips, walnuts, vanilla ; preparation:Mix first 3 ingredients in a 2-quart saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil stirring entire time. Boil until candy thermometer hits 234 degrees, stirring entire time. Remove from heat and add remaining ingredients. Stir until chocolate and marshmallows are dissolved. Pour in buttered 8x8 pan. Chill 30 minutes, cut with buttered knife. Chill again until set. ; name: old virginia nut brittle ; ingredients: water, sugar, light corn syrup, salt, peanuts, butter, baking soda, vanilla ; preparation:Bring water to a boil in a large saucepan. Stir in sugar until dissolved. Stir in corn syrup. Cook mixture to 250 degrees f on candy thermometer. Add salt and peanuts. Cook to 295 degrees f, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat and stir in butter, soda, and vanilla until well mixed. Our onto greased marble slab or stoneware platter and spread evenly. Let cool and harden. Break into pieces. ; name: no bake fudge cookies ; ingredients: sugar, milk, salt, cocoa, margarine, vanilla, peanut butter, oatmeal ; preparation:Mix first 6 ingredients in a sauce pan and cook until it boils. Boil for 1-3 minutes. Remove from heat and add peanut butter and oatmeal. Drop by teaspoonfuls on to wax paper. Chill until set. ; name: quick drop cookies ; ingredients: sugar, salt, butter, milk, peanut butter, rolled oats, vanilla extract, instant chocolate drink mix ; preparation:Combine sugar, salt, butter and milk in a medium size sauce pan. Bring to a boil and let boil for 1 minute. Stir in peanut butter, oats, vanilla and chocolate drink mix. Drop by rounded teaspoons full onto waxed paper. Let set until cool. Store in airtight container. ; name: protein power balls ; ingredients: creamy peanut butter, corn flakes, powdered soy protein concentrate, brown sugar, semi-sweet chocolate chips, sweetened coconut ; preparation:Combine all but coconut. Work with your hands to combine well. Scoop out spoonfuls and roll into golf ball sized balls. Roll in coconut to coat. Refrigerate at least one hour. Store in airtight container in fridge for up to one week. ; name: peanut butter sundaes ; ingredients: sugar, water, creamy peanut butter, vanilla ice cream, salted peanuts ; preparation:

name: easy sweet potato pie ; ingredients: sugar, flour, evaporated milk, egg, vanilla, cooked sweet potatoes, unbaked pie shells ; preparation:In a bowl, combine sugar, flour, milk, egg and vanilla. Stir in the sweet potatoes. Pour into pie shell. Cover edges of pastry loosely with foil. Bake at 375 degrees for 45 minutes. Remove foil. Bake 15 minutes longer or until crust is golden brown and a knife inserted near the center comes out clean. ; name: steakhouse mashed sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet butter, milk, salt, brown sugar, vanilla extract, ground nutmeg, sweet potatoes, nutmeg, butter ; preparation:Combine sweet potatoes, milk, brown sugar, vanilla and nutmeg in a large saucepan. Bring to a slow boil, reduce, cover and cook over low heat stirring the sugar & milk mixture onto the potatoes. Cook for approximately 30-45 minutes. Remove from heat, mash in a large bowl combining the sugar, milk vanilla mixture into the potatoes. For more buttery potatoes, add teaspoon of butter while mashing. Shake ground nutmeg over potatoes to taste. If you want a slightly browned version, place potatoes in pyrex pan and bake for 10 minutes at 350f for a crispy outer layer. ; name: sweet potatoes with pecan praline streusel ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, cinnamon, brown sugar, mini marshmallows, flour, pecans ; preparation:Wash and skin potatoes, chop into large chunks. Boil potatoes until tender and mash. Stir in butter, cinnamon, brown sugar and mini marshmallows to taste. Mix in a separate bowl, flour, sugar, cinnamon, and pecans, drizzle melted butter over mixture and stir to moisten, mixture should resemble chunky crumbs. Pour potatoes mixture into casserole dish and cover with a thin layer of mini-marshmallows. Top with pecan mixture. Bake at 350f for 30 minutes or until brown and bubbly. ; name: bourbon brown sugar sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, brown sugar, bourbon, butter, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Cube sweet potatoes and boil in water until soft. Add brown sugar, bourbon, butter and mash well. Add cinnamon, nutmeg, and vanilla. Mix all ingredients well. If you want to add more cinnamon and not so much bourbon, for example, feel free. ; name: grandma s potato puffs ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, oil, maple syrup ; preparation:Beat egg yolks until creamy. Add mashed potatoes and mix well. Sift flour, salt and baking powder. Add flour mixture to potatoes. Beat egg whites until stiff. Fold egg whites into mixture. Drop by teaspoonfuls into hot grease or oil. Serve with syrup while hot. ; name: grace s banana chocolate chip oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, mashed banana, egg, vanilla, oats, flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f. Cream butter and sugar. Add bananas, egg and vanilla. Beat well. Combine oats, flour, baking soda and salt. Mix well and add to creamed banana mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop cookies onto a cookie sheet. Bake approximately 8-10 minutes, depending on size of cookies. ; name: paul prudhomme s candied yams ; ingredients: unsalted butter, sweet potatoes, water, sugar, dark brown sugar, orange, lemon, cinnamon sticks, vanilla extract, mace ; preparation:Heat the butter in a 4-quart saucepan over high heat. When about half melted, add the remaining ingredients. Stir, cover, and cook over high heat until mixture comes to a strong boil, about 10 minutes. Stir then reduce heat and simmer covered 20 minutes. Uncover and continue cooking until sweet potatoes are very tender, about 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat and discard cinnamon sticks. Orange and lemon slices can also be discarded if desired. Serve immediately, undrained. Can also be mashed. ; name: holiday sweet potato coconut casserole ; ingredients: mashed sweet potatoes, sugar, evaporated milk, eggs, vanilla, butter, coconut, nuts, brown sugar, flour ; preparation:

name: rice pudding smoothie ; ingredients: whole milk, cream cheese, pure vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, ice cube, cooked white rice, nutmeg, cinnamon stick ; preparation:Using a blender, mix the milk, cream cheese, vanilla and cinnamon and blend until smooth. Add the ice cubes and blend on high speed until slushy, about 15 seconds. Add the rice and pulse for 5 seconds. Sprinkle with nutmeg. Garnish with the cinnamon stick. ; name: tuna tahini salad ; ingredients: couscous, chicken stock, olive oil, tomatoes, plain yogurt, canned tuna, capers, tahini, lemon, juice of ; preparation:Allow several hours for couscous to cool before preparing and serving the salad. Prepare the couscous by bringing the stock and olive oil to a boil in a medium sauce pan. Stir in couscous, cover, and remove from heat. Let stand for 5 minutes. Put into a bowl and allow to cool in the refrigerator. After couscous is cooled, mix it with all remaining ingredients in a large bowl. Use a fork to break up the couscous if it has become sticky. Serve chilled. ; name: french style hot chocolate ; ingredients: chocolate pieces, milk, half-and-half, sugar, ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon, ground allspice, vanilla, almond extract, heavy cream ; preparation:Melt chocolate in 1 cup of milk, over low heat, stirring constantly. Gradually add remaining milk and half and half, followed by remaining ingredients, except vanilla and almond extract. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until completely heated. Stir in vanilla and almond extract. Serve with whipped cream and sprinkle with nutmeg if desired. ; name: saffron raisin couscous with fresh mint ; ingredients: water, saffron thread, extra virgin olive oil, salt, couscous, raisins, of fresh mint ; preparation:In a saucepan, bring the water to a boil and add the saffron. Remove from the heat, cover, and let stand for 30 minutes. Return the pan to the heat, bring to a boil, and mix in the olive oil, salt, couscous, and raisins. Remove from the heat, cover, and let stand for 30 minutes. Using a fork and your finger. Taste and adjust the seasonings. Stir in the mint. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: couscous with peas and parmesan ; ingredients: couscous, chicken broth, butter, parmesan cheese, frozen peas, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Bring chicken broth to a boil. Add butter, parmesan and cous cous and return to a boil. Remove from heat. Add peas and cover for five minutes. Fluff with fork and add salt and pepper to taste. ; name: baked tomatoes stuffed with couscous and feta ; ingredients: chicken stock, couscous, of fresh mint, fresh parsley, pistachios, feta, olive oil, salt and pepper, tomatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 190 degrees c. Bring the stock to the boil. Place couscous in a bowl and pour the boiling stock over. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and leave to steam for 10 minutes. Fluff couscous with a fork, and add all ingredients except the tomatoes. Season to taste with the salt and pepper. Slice a top off each tomato, and using a teaspoon, hollow out, remove and discard seeds. Fill each tomato with couscous mix, and replace top as a lid. Place stuffed tomatoes on a baking tray and bake for 15-20 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: couscous and cherry tomato salad ; ingredients: couscous, red chili pepper, cherry tomatoes, green onion, extra virgin olive oil, lemon juice, cilantro, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Place the couscous in a bowl and pour over 300ml boiling water. Leave for 30 minutes until the water has been completely absorbed, allow to cool. Add the olive oil, lemon juice, cilantro and seasoning to taste. Add chili pepper, tomatoes and onions and stir gently to combine ingredients. Allow to chill for at least an hour. It allows the flavours to mingle. Keeps well in the fridge for 2 or 3 days. ; name: couscous dried fruit and honey pudding ; ingredients: couscous, mixed fruit, nuts, milk, honey, vanilla extract, sugar, ground cinnamon, heavy cream ; preparation:

name: quick fettuccine carbonara ; ingredients: bacon, dry fettuccine, eggs, parsley, dried italian herb seasoning, parmesan cheese, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Saute the bacon in a small skillet until crisp. Remove with a slotted spoon and drain well on a paper towel. Cook fettuccini noodles according to package instruction until firm and tender. Meanwhile, beat the eggs thoroughly in a large bowl suitable for serving. Have the cooked bacon and the chopped parsley ready at hand. When the pasta is done, drain it immediately in a colander, and pour into the bowl of eggs and immediately begin tossing it. As the strands of pasta become coated with the beaten eggs, their heat will cook the eggs. Sprinkle the bacon, italian seasoning and parsley on, and serve immediately. Top with lots of freshly grated parmesan cheese and freshly ground black pepper. ; name: quick easy frittata ; ingredients: butter, new potato, broccoli, eggs, water, parmesan cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in non-stick pan. Saut veggies over medium high heat until warmed through, about 3-4 minutes. While veggies are in pan, scramble eggs and water. Add cheese and scramble until foamy. Turn heat down to medium. Pour eggs over veggies in pan. Let eggs cook in pan until set-about 7-8 minutes. Run spatula around edge of pan, slide frittata onto serving plate. Season to taste with salt& pepper. ; name: spaghetti cupcakes ; ingredients: spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, ground black pepper, pasta sauce, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 12-cup muffin pan. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, and pepper. Evenly press mixture into muffin cups to form a crust. Evenly top each cup with pasta sauce, then mozzarella cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until bubbling. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. ; name: deep dish pizza quiche ; ingredients: cream cheese, eggs, heavy cream, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, pizza cheese, garlic powder, pizza sauce, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Beat together cream cheese and eggs till smooth. Add cream, parmesan cheese and spices. Spray a 9-inch or larger glass baking dish with oil. Put the cups pizza cheese in dish and pour egg mixture over it. Bake at 375 degrees for 30 minutes or until eggs are set. Spread on pizza sauce, mozzarella cheese and favorite toppings. Bake until bubbly and browning. Let stand 10 minutes. Serve. ; name: prosciutto spinach and egg pies ; ingredients: prosciutto, eggs, spinach, cheddar cheese, cherry tomatoes, sea salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Lightly spray a 6 cup muffin tin. Line the muffin cups with the prosciutto slices, pressing the prosciutto into the bottom and sides of each cup. Crack 1 egg into each cup. Sprinkle the spinach over the eggs, then the cheddar cheese, dividing them evenly. Top each serving with 4 tomato halves and season with salt and pepper. Bake the pies for 18 to 20 minutes, until the egg whites are firm and the yolks are starting to set but are still soft in the center. Timing might vary due to oven differences and preferences. Set them aside to cool for about 5 minutes. Run a knife around the edges of each cup to loosen, then lift the pies out of the tin. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: oven baked parmesan romano chicken ; ingredients: italian breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, romano cheese, fresh ground black pepper, seasoning salt, fresh flat-leaf parsley, paprika, butter, fresh garlic, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees f. Combine breadcrumbs, cheeses, black pepper, salt, parsley and paprika in shallow bowl. Set aside. Combine butter and garlic in a 9-inch pie pan. Dip 1 chicken breast at a time into butter mixture. Place into breadcrumb mixture, turning to coat evenly. Place chicken breasts into ungreased 13x9-inch glass baking dish. Drizzle with any remaining butter mixture. Bake for 25-35 minutes or until chicken is lightly browned and juices run clear when pierced with a fork. ; name: spinach tomato scramble ; ingredients: eggs, egg whites, olive oil, roma tomato, baby spinach, feta cheese, walnuts, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Whisk together eggs and egg whites and set aside. Heat olive oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Saute roma tomato until slightly tender. Add egg mixture and scramble until eggs are soft set. Add baby spinach leaves, stir for 30 seconds, turn off heat and cover skillet for one minute. Portion on two plates and top with feta cheese and chopped walnuts. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: pastina with milk and eggs ; ingredients: milk, italian pastina, eggs, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: tropical grilled tuna ; ingredients: fresh pineapple, onion, jalapeno peppers, fresh cilantro, lime juice, tuna steaks, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Grill pineapple slices, uncovered, over medium heat for 5-7 minutes on each side. Chill for 30 minutes. Dice the pineapple. Place in a bowl. Stir in the onion, jalapenos, cilantro and lime juice. Refrigerate for 1 hour or until chilled. Brush tuna steaks with oil. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Grill, covered, over medium heat for 5 minutes. ; name: garlic roasted potato salad ; ingredients: new potato, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, mayonnaise, creole mustard, parsley, scallions, lemon, juice of, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl, toss potatoes, garlic, and olive oil together to coat. Place potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet. Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Place in 350 degree oven for 15-20 minutes, or until tender, allow to cool for 10 minutes. Combine mayonnaise, creole mustard, lemon juice, parsley, and scallions. Add to potatoes. Add salt or pepper to taste. Serve cold or room temperature. ; name: citrus marinated chuck roast for the grill ; ingredients: chuck roast, salt, pepper, meat tenderizer, low sodium soy sauce, orange juice, lemon juice, sugar, garlic cloves, ginger ; preparation:Sprinkle roast generously on both sides with salt, pepper and meat tenderizer. Mix remaining ingredients. Put roast in a large ziplock bag. Add marinade. Seal and refrigerate at least overnight. Grill over medium-hot coals, turning several times and basting with reserved marinade frequently. Cook approximately 35-40 minutes, until done to your liking. Allow roast to rest for 10 minutes before slicing. ; name: tuna glazed with ginger and lime ; ingredients: tuna steaks, garlic cloves, ginger, sugar, crushed red pepper flakes, fresh lime juice, soy sauce, dark sesame oil ; preparation:Place steaks in a large shallow dish. Combine garlic and remaining ingredients in a small bowl. Stir well. Pour marinade mixture over tuna steaks. Cover and marinate in the refrigerator for 1 hour, turning once. Remove steaks from the marinade, reserving marinade. Bring marinade to a boil in a small saucepan. Grill tuna steaks, covered, over medium hot coals about 20 minutes or until fish flakes easily. Baste often with marinade. ; name: malay marinade for grilled pork ; ingredients: fresh ginger, onion, garlic cloves, honey, ground coriander, soy sauce, fresh lime juice, fresh ground pepper, pork chops ; preparation:Mix all ingredients except for the pork. Add the pork to marinate 2 hours at room temperature. Turning meat occasionally. If using pork cubes, place on water soaked skewers. Grill until done, about 5 minutes per side. Serve with rice or herbed new potatoes. ; name: spicy honey glazed chicken breasts ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onion, garlic clove, honey, hot pepper sauce, chili powder, lemon juice, boneless skinless chicken breasts, pineapple ; preparation:In a small saucepan, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook, stirring, until translucent and beginning to brown, 6 to 8 minutes. Add the honey, hot pepper sauce and chili powder and simmer for 1 minute. Remove from the heat, stir in the lemon juice and set aside. Preheat a grill or large grill pan to medium-high. Rub the chicken with the remaining 3 tablespoons olive oil and season with salt. Grill until well marked, about 7 minutes. Flip and cook until the bottoms are well marked and the chicken is cooked through, another 2 minutes. Transfer to a plate and brush with the reserved honey glaze. Cover with foil and let rest for 5 minutes. Meanwhile, grill the pineapple until well marked on one side, about 4 minutes, then flip and cook for another 2 minutes. Serve with the chicken. ; name: ayam bali balinese chicken ; ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, hot red chili pepper, cashew nuts, lemon juice, soy sauce, palm sugar, fresh ginger, peanut oil, boneless skinless chicken thighs ; preparation:Combine the onion, garlic, chili peppers, cashew nuts, lemon juice, soy sauce, sugar, and ginger in an electric blender or food processor and blend until it forms a smooth paste. Heat the oil in a large skillet over high heat and saute the chicken until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes. Add the blended mixture and cook uncovered for 2 to 3 minutes, stirring constantly. Add the coconut milk, reduce the heat to low and simmer uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the chicken is tender and the sauce has thickened, about 10 to 15 minutes. Garnish with toasted cashews. ; name: sweet ginger steak sweet potatoes ; ingredients: topside steak, fresh ginger, extra virgin olive oil, fresh ground black pepper, sweet potatoes, oil, sweet chili sauce, lemon, juice of ; preparation:

name: ham asparagus pie ; ingredients: crescent rolls, ham, asparagus spears, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, onions, salt, pepper ; preparation:Spray a pie plate with vegetable spray. Press rolls out evenly into a 9-inch pie plate. Combine all remaining ingredients and pour into crust. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes. Let stand 5 minutes before cutting. ; name: ham cheese macaroni bake ; ingredients: onion, macaroni noodles, ham, cheddar cheese, milk, sour cream, cream of mushroom soup, parsley ; preparation:Using a layered effect, place onion, noodles, ham and cheese in a large 9 x 13 baking dish. Repeat for second layer using onion, noodles, ham and cheese. In a small bowl mix milk, sour cream and cream of mushroom soup. Pour over top of ham mixture. Sprinkle top with parsley. Bake in a 360 degree oven for 45 minutes. ; name: fasta pasta ; ingredients: linguine, onion, oil, ham, button mushrooms, coarse grain mustard, heavy cream, salt & freshly ground black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta in lightly salted boiling water until just tender. Drain and keep hot. Meanwhile cook onion in oil over a gentle heat until softened, but not brown. Stir in the ham and mushrooms and cook for two minutes more. Add mustard and cream. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Toss through the pasta ribbons, coating well. Serve in four warmed bowls topped with parmesan shavings. ; name: crab melt ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, butter, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, garlic salt, crabmeat, chives, french bread ; preparation:Melt butter and cheese over low heat. Add lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, and garlic salt. Mix well. Process in blender until smooth. In bowl, fold in crabmeat and chives. Slice bread into half inch slices and spread on crabmeat mixture. Place on ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: zesty italian crescent casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese, sour cream, crescent rolls, parmesan cheese, butter ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. In large skillet, brown beef and onion then drain. Return meat to pan. Add spaghetti sauce. Meanwhile, in a medium bowl combine mozzarella cheese and sour cream. Pour hot meat into an ungreased 12 x 8 inch dish. Spoon cheese mixture over meat. Unroll crescent roll dough over the top of the mixture. Mix parmesan cheese and butter together, then spread over the top of the dough. Bake 18-25 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: toasted ham and cheese supreme ; ingredients: white bread, mayonnaise, deli ham, cheddar cheese, red onions, horseradish sauce, butter ; preparation:Spread four slices of bread with mayonnaise. Layer each with the ham, cheese and onion. Spread horseradish sauce on remaining bread. Place bread with horseradish side down over onion. Spread butter on the outside of each sandwich. In a large skillet over medium heat, toast sandwiches for 4 - 5 minutes on each side or until bread is lightly browned and cheese is melted. ; name: it s a gouda hot ham sandwich ; ingredients: french roll, dijon mustard, honey, ground cayenne pepper, ham, raspberry preserves, onions, gouda cheese ; preparation:If using a strong onion or shallot, peel and soak in ice water. Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Slice roll almost in half and lay open on a baking sheet. Combine mustard, honey and cayenne in small bowl, then spread on both halves of roll. Layer ham across both halves of roll, spread preserves over ham. Dice shallot and sprinkle over preserves, then top with cheese. Place in hot oven until cheese melts, about 3-4 minutes. Fold to close sandwich before serving. Enjoy warm or wrap tightly to serve later. ; name: tailgate sandwiches ; ingredients: rolls, black forest ham, gruyere, chive & onion cream cheese, butter, parmesan cheese, worcestershire sauce, dried onion flakes ; preparation:

name: garlic parmesan pull apart loaves ; ingredients: butter, garlic clove, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, refrigerated buttermilk biscuits ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees. In a small bowl, stir together butter, garlic, cheese and parsley. Remove biscuits from container. On baking pan with sides, make 2 loaves of 5 biscuits each. Set the biscuits on their sides, just touching each other end to end, like they were in the can, only in 2 groups of 5. Split each biscuit in half. Divide the butter evenly between biscuits and spread in between split layers. Reshape the loaves. Bake 11 to 14 minutes or until loaves are deep golden brown and thoroughly baked. ; name: pizza biscuit ; ingredients: pillsbury grands refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, cheddar cheese, pepperoni, pizza sauce ; preparation:Roll the dough out as thin as it will go without it breaking. Put pizza sauce on half of the rolled out dough. Sprinkle cheese on that half only. Put whatever toppings you like on top of that. Fold over the other half of the biscuit. Cook at 375 for about 10-15 minutes. ; name: cheesy chicken pot biscuit cups low fat low cal ; ingredients: refrigerated biscuits, cooked chicken breast, reduced-fat cream of chicken soup, low-fat cheddar cheese, dried parsley flakes, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Separate biscuits and place each biscuit in a cup of an ungreased 12-hole muffin pan, pressing dough up sides to edge of cup. In a medium bowl, combine chicken, chicken soup, cheddar cheese, parsley flakes, and black pepper. Mix well to combine. Evenly spoon chicken mixture into prepared biscuit cups. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven. Place muffin pan on a wire rack and let set for 2-3 minutes. Serve at once. ; name: bubble up pizza ; ingredients: buttermilk biscuits, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese, garlic clove, mushroom ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In big bowl, quarter biscuits with kitchen cutter. Stir in 1 cup sauce and 2 cups cheese. Press a garlic clove with garlic press and add to biscuit mixture. If desired, add additional toppings and mix to combine. Spread mixture into 9 x 13 pan. Pour remaining sauce over top and spread out. Sprinkle remaining cheeses over top. Bake for 30-35 minutes. ; name: roasted turkey panini ; ingredients: focaccia bread, turkey breast, dried cranberries, sharp cheddar cheese, red onion, olive oil, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Saute the dried cranberries and red onion in olive oil for two minutes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add one tablespoon of water to keep ingredients moist. Set cranberry compote aside. Slice the rosemary & onion focaccias in half, then slice horizontally to create the top and bottom sandwich portions. Cover the bottom half of the focaccia with cranberry compote and top with 4 ounces of roasted turkey breast and one slice of sharp cheddar cheese. Place top of focaccia over sandwich. Grill over medium-high heat on both sides. ; name: mini snack pizzas ; ingredients: refrigerated dinner rolls, pizza sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Place rolls on ungreased baking sheet try to flatten rolls so they resemble flat circles. Take a spoonful of sauce and spread ontop of each rolls. Then cut up cheese into small bits and garnish. Add meat ontop of cheese and then place remaining cheese ontop of meat. Cook for about 15 min of until rolls are golden. ; name: bacon biscuit puffs ; ingredients: biscuits, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, onion, bacon, sugar, garlic salt, hot pepper sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Separate each biscuit into 3 pieces. Place on baking sheet. Combine the cheese, mayo, onion, bacon, sugar, garlic salt and hot pepper sauce in a medium bowl. Mix well. Place a spoonful of the mixture, spreading evenly, on each biscuit round. Bake 10 minutes or until golden. ; name: buttermilk biscuit bubble pizza ; ingredients: refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, green pepper, onion, black olives, sliced mushrooms, pasta sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: lu s chili mac ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, garlic clove, green pepper, diced tomatoes, chili powder, worcestershire sauce, red beans, salt and pepper, cooked macaroni ; preparation:Cook macaroni according to package directions. Brown ground beef in a large skillet. Drain fat. Add onions and garlic and cook until onion is soft. Add green pepper and tomatoes, chili powder and worcestershire sauce. Cover and simmer on low about 20 minutes. Stir in macaroni. Salt and pepper to taste. ; name: bar be que pork and beans ; ingredients: pork and beans, tomato sauce, onions, ground beef, mustard, brown sugar, garlic clove, salt, pepper ; preparation:Brown ground beef in skillet over medium heat. Remove ground beef leaving the dripping in pan. Add to crock pot with tomato sauce and pork and beans. Stir well. Brown onion in drippings with minced garlic. Add to crock pot. Add the mustard, brown sugar, salt and pepper. Stir well. Let simmer for 2 hours in crock pot. ; name: pantry southwest chicken ; ingredients: tomatoes and green chilies, tomato sauce, black beans, onion, corn, chicken breasts, garlic cloves, cumin, salt and pepper, olive oil ; preparation:In olive oil, cook the chicken until almost done. Remove from pan. In same pan, add onion and garlic. Cook until onion is translucent. Add diced tomatoes with chilis, can of tomato sauce, can of black beans, corn, and cumin. Return chicken to pan and cook until the chicken is done. Serve with hot cooked rice. ; name: kielbasa and pasta ; ingredients: onion, red bell pepper, granulated garlic, kielbasa, diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, whole wheat penne ; preparation:Spray pan with cooking spray and saute sausage. Drain as much grease as possible. Put 1 large diced onion and one diced red bell pepper in pan with sausage and cooked until the tender. Sprinkle with garlic powder. Add can diced tomatoes and tomato sauce. Cook pasta separately and add in at end of cooking time. ; name: spanish rice with bacon ; ingredients: bacon, cooking oil, onion, long grain rice, water, tomatoes, green pepper, jalapeno peppers, chili powder, salt ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook bacon over medium heat until crisp. Remove and drain on paper towel. Add oil to the drippings and saute onion for 3 minutes. Add rice and fry until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Stir in the remaining ingredients and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes or until rice is tender. Sprinkle with bacon and serve. ; name: kale with tomatoes and green chiles ; ingredients: kale, garlic, yellow onions, olive oil, tomatoes and green chilies, salt, pepper ; preparation:Rinse the kale and remove the fibrous middle rib, slice the leaves into ribbons. Over medium heat, saute the garlic in the olive oil until fragrant. Then add the onions and saute together, stirring constantly until the onions are limp. Do not allow the garlic or onions to brown. Add the kale and saute for 15-20 minutes or until tender, stirring frequently to prevent the greens from scorching. Add the tomatoes and green chiles and salt and pepper to taste, stirring everything together and cooking until heated through--about 1-2 minutes. Serve over rice or combine with blackeyed peas or refried beans and rice to make a tasty and hearty filling for vegetarian wraps. ; name: tuna fiesta ; ingredients: long grain rice, onion, cooking oil, mushrooms, green pepper, frozen peas, tomato soup, salt and pepper, garlic clove, tuna ; preparation:Wash the rice and boil. Peel and slice the onion and fry it gently in the butter or oil in a saucepan, until soft. Wash and slice the mushrooms and pepper. Add them to the onion and fry gently, until soft. Add the peas, tomato soup, salt, pepper and garlic gently stir in the drained tuna and cook for a few minutes, until hot. Drain and fork the rice. Spoon the rice onto a plate, press into a ring and pour the tuna sauce into the middle. ; name: unstuffed green bell peppers ; ingredients: ground round, green peppers, onions, garlic salt, tomato sauce, cooked rice, water ; preparation:

name: jean s darn good chocolate cake ; ingredients: chocolate cake mix, instant chocolate pudding mix, eggs, sour cream, warm water, oil, chocolate chips ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 350. Grease a bundt pan. Mix cake mix, instant pudding, eggs, water, sour cream, and oil. Beat until all blended and fluffy. Mix in chocolate chips and pour into bundt pan. Bake 45to 50 minutes. Remove cake from oven and cool on wire rack for 20 minutes. Run sharp knife around edge and invert on rack to cool. ; name: marbled chocolate sour cream cake ; ingredients: semisweet chocolate morsel, yellow cake mix, eggs, sour cream, vegetable oil, water, sugar, powdered sugar ; preparation:Melt the chocolate in the microwave in a medium size bowl for 1 minute, stir, then continue to heat it for 10-20 second bursts until stirs smooth and totally melted, set aside. Mix the rest of the items together, beating on low speed until moist then on high speed for 2 minutes. Take 2 cups of the cake batter and stir into the melted chocolate. Using a greased bundt or round tube pan, spoon in the two batters alternately. Bake at 375 degrees for 35-45 minutes. Check for doneness with a toothpick. Cool in the pan for 20 minutes, then remove from pan and cool completely before sprinkling with powdered sugar. ; name: dulce de leche cream cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, eggs, oil, water, sweetened condensed milk, caramel ice cream topping, heavy whipping cream, powdered sugar, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:Prepare cake mix according to directions for a 13 x 9 baking pan, cool completely in pan on wire rack. Place sweetened condensed milk in a large, microwave safe bowl. Micro on med. For 4 minutes, stirring half way through. Reduce to med-low power, micro for 16 to 24 minutes, whisking every few minutes, until thick and light caramel color. Stir in caramel topping. Cool for 15 minutes. Spread evenly over cake, cool completely. Beat whipping cream in a large mixing bowl until soft peaks form. Add sugar and vanilla, beat until stiff peaks form. Spoon over cake, sprinkle with nuts. Refrigerate for 1 to 2 hours. ; name: fall time pumpkin cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, sugar, canola oil, canned pumpkin, water, ground cinnamon, eggs, butter, whipping cream, brown sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a standard size bundt pan, 9 x 13-inch baking pan, or two 9-inch cake pans. In a large bowl, mix together the yellow cake mix, sugar, oil, pumpkin, water, cinnamon and eggs. Beat until well blended. Transfer to the baking dish or cake pans. Bake for 45 minutes. For glaze, cook together the butter, whipping cream and brown sugar for 3 minutes, stirring. When slightly cooled, pour over cake. ; name: 123 cake ; ingredients: oil, yellow cake mix, instant vanilla pudding, water, apple pie filling, egg ; preparation:In 9x13 pan, pour oil. Covering bottom and sides. Add cake mix, pudding, water and egg. Mix with fork. Moistening all dry ingredients. Pour in pie filling. Swirl into mixture. Bake at 350 for 35 minutes, or until toothpick comes out clean. ; name: jumbo chocolate chip cookie ; ingredients: butter, sugar, light brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, flour, baking soda, vanilla instant pudding mix, chocolate chips, chocolate frosting ; preparation:With an electric mixer, blend together butter, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla and eggs. Add flour, baking soda, and pudding mix and mix well. Stir in chocolate chips. Pour into a lightly greased pizza pan. Bake at 350f for 20 minutes or until done. Remove from oven and cool completely. Once the cookie is cool, you may decorate the cookie using a piping bag or hand held decorator. ; name: death by chocolate cake ; ingredients: chocolate cake mix, eggs, oil, water, cool whip, sweetened condensed milk, caramel topping, heath candy bar ; preparation:Bake the cake per the box instructions in a bundt pan. Put the cake on a large platter. When the cake is done and while still hot, poke holes with a fork. Pour sweetened condensed milk over the hot cake - it will soak inches. Cool. Pour caramel topping over top of cake and spread cool whip over the top. Sprinkle with the crushed heath bars. ; name: mocha bundt cake ; ingredients: cocoa, yellow cake mix, instant chocolate pudding mix, eggs, vegetable oil, strong black coffee, coffee liqueur, powdered sugar ; preparation:

name: greek roasted beans in tomato sauce gigantes plaki ; ingredients: butter beans, tomatoes, garlic cloves, onions, tomato paste, olive oil, parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:Soak the beans overnight, the longer, the better. Preheat oven at 350 farenheit. Drain and rinse the beans and boil in water for about 40 minutes to an hour, until they are soft but not mushy. Make sure you boil them enough. Otherwise the beans will be too hard to eat even after baking. Sauce - saut the onion in a bit of olive on low heat until soft and add the garlic cloves whole. If you want a stronger garlic flavor you can mince the garlic. Add the tomato, the tomato paste, parsley, salt and pepper to taste and about cup olive oil. Let it simmer until sauce thickens, about 10 minutes. Once the beans have boiled, drain them and put them back into the pot, add the sauce and mix gently. Pour the mixture in a pan and spread evenly and then pour about another cup olive oil over the beans and bake for about 50 minutes until beans are tender. Accompany with feta cheese and bread. ; name: santa maria style pinquito beans ; ingredients: beans, bacon, ham, onion, garlic cloves, tomato puree, red chili sauce, sugar, salt, dry mustard ; preparation:Pick over beans to remove dirt and small stones. Cover with water and let soak overnight in a large container. Drain, cover with fresh water and simmer 2 hours, or until tender. Saut bacon and ham until lightly browned. Add to beans. Saut onions in bacon fat until lightly browned. Add garlic and saut a minute or two longer. Add tomato puree, chili sauce, sugar, mustard, and salt. Drain most of liquid off beans and stir in sauce. Keep warm on low heat until ready to serve. ; name: tex mex rice and beans ; ingredients: olive oil, yellow onion, green bell pepper, minced garlic cloves, rotel, pinto beans, white rice, chicken stock ; preparation:Heat olive oil. Add onion, peppers and garlic. Cook until transparent. Add rice and toast. Add chicken stock and rotel. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer covered for 20 mins. When 20 mins is up add beans. ; name: low fat homestyle refried beans ; ingredients: onion, canola oil, garlic cloves, ground cumin, salt, cayenne pepper, pinto beans, water, lime juice ; preparation:In a large saucepan, saute the onion in oil until tender. Stir in the garlic, cumin, salt and cayenne. Cook and stir for 1 minute. Add beans and mash. Add water. Cook and stir until heated through and water is absorbed. It only takes a few minutes. Remove from heat, and stir in lime juice. ; name: spicy black beans ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic clove, ground cumin, black beans, red pepper flakes ; preparation:In a saucepan over medium heat, add the oil, onion, and garlic. Sweat the onions for about 2 minutes. Add the cumin and beans. Stir and add the red pepper flakes. Simmer for about 5 minutes. ; name: vegan white bean aioli ; ingredients: navy beans, lemon juice, salt, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil, garlic cloves ; preparation:Combine the beans, lemon juice, salt and pepper in a blender or food processor and puree until smooth, scraping down the sides of the bowl to get everything. Preheat a small pan over low heat. Cook the garlic in the olive oil for about 3 minutes. Add the garlic and oil to the mixture in the blender and puree. Taste for salt, pepper and lemon and adjust to your liking. Transfer to a container, cover and refrigerate until ready to use. ; name: szechwan green beans ; ingredients: sesame oil, green beans, garlic cloves, salt, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:Place a heavy, deep skillet over medium-high heat. After a few minutes, add the oil. Wait a minute or so and add the green beans. Turn the heat to high and stir-fry for about 5 minutes, or until the beans are well seared. Add the garlic, salt and red pepper, if using. Stir-fry for several more minutes, then remove from heat. ; name: beans n ham hocks ; ingredients: pink beans, onion, garlic cloves, ham hock, water, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: efo spinach ; ingredients: fresh spinach, onion, tomatoes, red bell pepper, olive oil, chicken bouillon cubes, salt, white pepper ; preparation:Wash and drain spinach leaves, removing any thick stems. Slice onions, tomatoes and red peppers into strips. Heat oil in a saute pan. Add onions and peppers and cook until wilted. Add tomatoes and cook. Crumble bouillon cubes into pan and add spinach with whatever water clings to the leaves. Cook until spinach wilts. Season with salt and white pepper, to taste. ; name: citrus salsa ; ingredients: grapefruit, orange, tomatoes, green bell pepper, jalapeno pepper, red onions, cilantro, sugar, salt ; preparation:Peel, section and chop the grapefruit and orange. Place in a medium bowl. Seed and dice the tomato, green pepper and jalapeno. Add to the fruit. Dice the red onion and cilantro. Add to the bowl. Add the sugar and salt to the the salsa ingredients. Stir to combine. Drain juice before serving. Serve with tortilla chips. Also good as a condiment with grilled chicken or pork. ; name: peperonta ; ingredients: olive oil, red onion, yellow bell peppers, red bell peppers, zucchini, garlic cloves, water, tomatoes, sea salt, black pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet. Add onion and cook until soft, but not browned. Add peppers, zucchini, garlic and water. Reduce heat to low and simmer 10 to 15 minutes. Add tomatoes, salt and pepper. Simmer 20 minutes, until the mixture is thick and shiny. ; name: green tomatoes veggies ; ingredients: zucchini, green tomatoes, onion, eggplant, sweet red peppers, garlic, olive oil, black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Prepare the vegetables. Remove the skin from the head of garlic but do not crush the cloves or chop them. Leave the garlic cloves whole. Heat about 2 to 3 tbsps. Of olive oil on high in a heavy skillet. Add the sweet pepper and onion and garlic and saute for about 3 minutes. Add the remaining vegetables and continue cooking until they are done to your taste. Grind some fresh black pepper over all and stir well. Place in serving platter and sprinkle a small amount of grated parmesan cheese over all. ; name: broccoli salad with gouda ; ingredients: broccoli florets, red onion, grape tomatoes, slivered almonds, gouda cheese, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, sugar, black pepper, salt ; preparation:Cook broccoli in boiling salted water for 1 minute. Drain well. Rinse with cold water. Drain well agin. Combine the broccoli with onion, tomatoes, nuts and cheese. In a small bowl, whisk together oil, vinegar, sugar, pepper and salt. Pour over salad mixture and toss to coat. ; name: tomato mint and red onion salad ; ingredients: cherry tomatoes, red onion, mint, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, salt, pepper ; preparation:Slice tomatoes in half and place in bowl. Add onion and mint to tomatoes and mix. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. Sprinkle the lemon zest on top. Salt and pepper to taste. Let salad marinate for 20 minutes before serving. ; name: ultimate warm salsa ; ingredients: tomatoes, jalapenos, serrano pepper, onion, fresh cilantro, olive oil, garlic, comino, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Using a food processor, process the tomatoes to a chunky puree, do not liquify. In a large skillet or frying pan, heat the oil and add the peppers and onions. Saute until the onion softens and is clear 5-10 minutes. Add the tomato puree and spices. Simmer for 20-30 minutes or until desired consistency. Serve warm with tortilla chips. ; name: tomatillo guacamole spicy dip ; ingredients: avocados, tomatillos, red onion, roma tomatoes, lime juice, red pepper flakes, hot pepper sauce, salt and black pepper ; preparation:

name: katie s chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, butter, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla extract, instant vanilla pudding, eggs, chocolate chips, baking powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f.
