Mix dry ingredients with wire whisk. Add butter, eggs, and vanilla to dry mix. Stir in chips with your hands. Roll into 1-inch balls and place on ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 375f for 8-10 minutes. ; name: double chocolate dream cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking cocoa, baking soda, salt, butter, brown sugar, granulated sugar, vanilla extract, eggs, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Combine flour, cocoa, baking soda and salt in a small bowl. Beat butter, brown sugar, granulated sugar and vanilla extract in until creamy. Beat in eggs for about 2 minutes until light and fluffy. Gradually beat in flour mixture. Stir in morsels. Drop by rounded tablespoon onto ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until cookies are puffed. Cool on cookie sheets for 2 minutes. Remove to wire racks to cool completely. ; name: chocolate chip waffles low fat and healthy ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, egg whites, nonfat milk, vanilla, chocolate chips ; preparation:Sift dry ingrediants in one bowl, and, using a fork, lightly beat the wet ingrediants in a serapate bowl. Add the dry into the wet and add the chocolate chips, mixing until just combined. Pour into a preheated greased waffle iron, and i cook mine for 3-4 minutes with my waffle iron. This recipe yeilds 4 square waffles for me. These freeze well. ; name: strawberry yogurt pancakes ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, sugar, eggs, butter, low-fat strawberry yogurt, buttermilk, vanilla ; preparation:In a mixing bowl, mix flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and sugar. Add in the eggs, buttermilk, melted butter, yogurt and vanilla and mix until smooth. Spray griddle with pam or use a slab of butter for each pancake and heat over medium heat. Pour approximately cup of batter onto a preheated griddle. Cook for 8-10 minutes or the top is nice and bubbly. Turn and brown the other side. Serve with warm maple syrup. ; name: white chocolate chip macadamia nut cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, light brown sugar, white sugar, salted butter, eggs, pure vanilla extract, macadamia nuts, white chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In medium bowl combine flour, soda and salt. Mix well, set aside. In a large bowl with a mixer blend sugars at medium speed. Add butter and mix to until it forms a grainy paste, scraping down the sides of the bowl. Add eggs and vanilla, and beat at medium speed until fully combined. Add the flour mixture, macadamia nuts and white chocolate chips, and blend on low speed until just combined. Do not overmix. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until edges begin to brown. Move immediately to cooling rack. ; name: no sugar banana bread made with stevia and yogurt ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, yogurt, stevia, eggs, bananas ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease 9 x 5 loaf pan. In large bowl, combine flour, soda and salt. In separate bowl, cream together yogurt and stevia. Stir in eggs and mashed bananas until well blended. Stir banana mixture into flour mixture. Stir just to moisten. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 60-65 minutes until a toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean. ; name: white chocolate pecan drop cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, sugar, light brown sugar, egg, vanilla extract, pecans, white chocolate ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350. In a bowl, combinte the first 3 ingredients. Set aside. In a larger bowl, cream the butter with the sugars for 2 minutes or until smooth. Add in the egg and vanilla. Beat well. Add in the dry ingredients and mix thoroughly. Stir in the pecans and white chocolate. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until lightly golden. Let cookies cool on cookie sheet for 5 minutes. Then tranfer to wire rack to cool completely. ; name: monkey bars ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, nutmeg, bananas, butter, eggs, sugar, vanilla extract, chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: crescent roll up sandwiches ; ingredients: crescent rolls, meat, cheese, mustard ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Seperate the crescent roll dough into the 8 triangles. Spread the mustard on the dough. Put 1 piece of meat and 1 piece of cheese on each roll, folding the meat over the cheese to copy the crescent triangle. Roll up the crescent roll, wide to narrow, and place on a cookie sheet with the point of the crescent on the bottom. Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until golden. Serve warm. ; name: breakfast crescent pizza ; ingredients: crescent rolls, sausage, bacon, hash brown, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Unroll rolls into 4 rectangles and place in a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Press up sides slightly and press perforations together. Layer cooked sausage, cooked bacon, hash browns, and cheese. At this point you can make it ahead and refrigerate for up to 24 hours. Mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over the dish. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: mayonnaise baked fish ; ingredients: fish fillets, mayonnaise, butter, onion, parmesan cheese, lemon juice, old bay seasoning, black pepper, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Place fish, in a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish. In a bowl, combine mayonnaise, butter, onion, cheese, lemon juice, old bay, and pepper. Mix until a thick paste is formed. Spread mixture evenly over fish filets, then top with bread crumbs. Bake for about 10 minutes, or until fish is flaky. To finish cooking, place fish under the broiler, for another 2-3 minutes, or until fish is golden brown. ; name: crab meat tacos ; ingredients: olive oil, sweet onion, fresh tomato, cabbage, crab delights imitation crab, eggs, milk, salt, corn tortillas, ranch dressing ; preparation:Heat large non-stick skillet over medium heat. Add olive oil. Add the chopped sweet onion. Cook until light brown. Add the diced tomato, shredded cabbage and crab meat. Stir. Meanwhile, beat the eggs together with the milk and salt. Add the beaten egg mixture to the skillet. Stir and cook until the eggs are done, cooked and seasoned with 1 tablespoon ranch dressing. Heat the tortillas in a skillet. Fill with the cooked crab meat. Pour the remaining ranch dressing on top. ; name: sopapia dessert cake ; ingredients: crescent rolls, cream cheese, vanilla, butter, cinnamon, sugar ; preparation:Cover bottom of a baking pan with 1 pack of the crescent rolls. Mix 2 packs cream cheese and 1 cup sugar in a bowl with the hand mixer until creamy and add 1 tablespoon vanilla. Add mix onto the crescent rolls. Top with the 2nd pack of rolls. Melt 1 stick of butter and pour over the cake. Sprinkle with 1 cup of sugar and cinnamon. Bake at 350f for 30-35 minutes. ; name: crescent roll bars ; ingredients: crescent rolls, sugar, egg, vanilla, cream cheese, cinnamon ; preparation:Remove roll from the refridgerator 20 minutes ahead of time. Mix together 1 cup of sugar, egg yolk, vanilla and cream cheese in mixer. Place 1 package of crescent rolls in bottom of a greased 9x13 pan. Pour cream cheese mixture over top. Put second package of rolls over top. Beat egg white and spread over the top of rolls. Mix remaining sugar and cinnamon and sprinkle on top. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 to 35 minutes. Cuts better if chilled overnight. ; name: riverboat crescent ; ingredients: crescent rolls, parmesan cheese, dill weed, butter ; preparation:Separate dough and cut each triangle into half to form 2 triangles. Sprinkle each with approximately teaspoonful combined cheese and dill weed and press lightly. Roll up and place on ungreased cookie sheet with point side down. Brush with butter and sprinkle with remaining cheese mixture. Bake at 375 degrees for 10-12 minutes or until lightly brown. ; name: cheesy crab squares ; ingredients: crescent rolls, miracle whip, lemon juice, pepper, sharp cheddar cheese, imitation crabmeat, green onion, parsley ; preparation:

name: quinoa mac and cheese ; ingredients: quinoa, vegetables, salt, seasoning salt, garlic cloves, eggs, soymilk, cheddar cheese, panko breadcrumbs ; preparation:Lightly saute any veggies you would like in this dish. Cook quinoa to packaged instructions until fully cooked. Preheat oven to 350f coat 13x9 inch dish with cooking spray. Whisk together eggs and milk in large bowl. Fold in quinoa mixture and cheese. Stir very well and let some of the cheese melt. Transfer to prepared baking dish and if using panko crumbs or bread crumbs add now and bake 30-35 mins, until bread crumbs are browned. ; name: company crab casserole ; ingredients: crabmeat, milk, soft breadcrumbs, cheddar cheese, butter, onion, green peppers, pimiento, salt, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Pour milk over bread crumbs to soften. Add remaining ingredients except eggs. Stir in eggs. Pour mixture into a well-greased loaf pan or a 6x8 inch casserole. Set the dish in a container of hot water and bake for about 45 minutes or until an inserted knife come out clean. ; name: new england scalloped oysters and scallops ; ingredients: butter, breadcrumbs, oyster, celery seed, salt and pepper, cream, scallops ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Mix the melted butter and bread crumbs together and put one third of them in a thin layer in the bottom of a buttered baking dish. Cover with half of the oysters and seasonings. Add some of the cream. Layer half of the scallops next, seasonings, and another third of buttered crumbs. Add the remaining oysters and cream. Top with the final half of scallops and top with remaining buttered crumbs. Bake for 30 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: baked ritzed pork chops ; ingredients: butter, ritz cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, eggs, pork chops ; preparation:Place butter in baking dish. Combine cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, and garlic salt. Stir egg to a smooth liquid. Coat chops in crumbs. Dip in egg and again in crumbs. Bake 30 minutes at 400 turning over chops half way through. ; name: parmesan sage baked pork chops ; ingredients: plain breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, sage, lemon peel, eggs, flour, salt & pepper, center-cut pork chops, butter, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Mix breadcrumbs, cheese, sage and lemon peel in a pie plate or shallow bowl and set aside. Beat eggs in a medium bowl and set aside. Place flour on a plate and season with salt and pepper. Coat pork chops on both sides with flour. Dip pork chops into eggs, then coat on both sides with breadcrumb mixture. In heavy large ovenproof skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add pork chops to skillet and cook until golden brown. Place skillet into oven. Bake until pork chops are crisp on the outside and meat thermometer inserted into pork registers 150 f. ; name: sicilian steak ; ingredients: breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, parsley, italian seasoning, eggs, round steak, tomatoes ; preparation:Blend bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, parsley and seasoning in medium bowl. Set aside. Cut round steak into individual serving size pieces, set aside. Beat 2 eggs in a separate shallow bowl. Grease or oil a 13 x 9 baking pan. Dip pieces into egg and then dredge in crumb mixture and lay in pan. Preheat oven to 325f. Lay tomato slices over breaded steak. Cover pan with foil and bake for one hour at 325. Pull foil off and bake for an additional 10 minutes. ; name: outrageously good broiled shrimp ; ingredients: shrimp, butter, garlic salt, unseasoned breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, dried parsley ; preparation:Butterfly shrimp and place on non-stick baking pan or line pan with aluminum foil for easier cleanup. Brush shrimp with melted butter. Sprinkle lightly with garlic salt. Mix together bread crumbs, parmesan cheese and parsley. Sprinkle lightly over shrimp. Drizzle lightly with additional melted butter. Broil until light brown. ; name: crunchy baked flounder ; ingredients: panko breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, unsalted butter, flounder fillets, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: delicious soft chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, granulated sugar, egg, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, cornstarch, baking soda, chocolate ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cream together butter and sugars until creamy. Add egg and vanilla. Blend well. In another bowl combine flour, cornstarch and baking soda. Add to butter mixture and then add chocolate chunks. Drop by tablespoons onto a greased baking sheet and bake for 8-10 minutes, until golden brown around the edges. ; name: chocolate chip blondies ; ingredients: brown sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla extract, flour, baking powder, salt, milk chocolate chips ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine brown sugar, butter, eggs and vanilla just until blended. Combine flour, baking powder and salt. Add to brown sugar mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Spread into a a greased 13x9 pan. Bake at 350 for 18-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. Cut into bars. ; name: narraway chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: shortening, brown sugar, white sugar, vanilla, eggs, all-purpose flour, salt, baking soda, rolled oats, chocolate chips ; preparation:Mix the shortening, brown sugar and white sugar together in a large bowl. Combine the vanilla and eggs in a second bowl. Combine the flour, salt and baking soda in a third bowl. Into the first bowl, mix, alternately, one-third of the second and third bowls ending with the flour bowl until you have a smooth mixture. Once you have a smooth mixture, add the rolled oats and chocolate chips and mix until you have an even distribution. Bake on cookie sheets at 375f for approximately 7-9 minutes in the top half of the oven. ; name: malted chocolate chip cookies vegan ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, dark brown sugar, malted barley syrup, margarine, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all the dry ingredients together. Mix all the wet ingredients together. Mix everything together. Shape into 8-12 balls, put on cooked sheet lined with parchement. Flatten slightly. Leave room between them because the will spread out. Bake for 10-12 minutes at 350f. ; name: caramel tart filling ; ingredients: brown sugar, plain flour, butter, vanilla essence, egg yolks, milk, pastry shells ; preparation:Put brown sugar, plain flour, butter, vanilla essence and egg yolks into a medium saucepan and mix well together. Slowly add milk beating well. Put over a medium heat and stir continuously until it thickens and has a rich glossy brown colour, about 10 to 15 minutes. Let cool and pour into ready made cooked pie pastry shell. Optional extra. Beat 2 egg whites till soft peaks form, slowly add in 4 tablespoon sugar until glossy and have stiff peaks. Spoon meringue onto caramel, making sure it covers the pastry. Put into a hot oven and bake till golden - should only take a few minutes. Cut and serve with thick cream. ; name: brown sugar chews ; ingredients: egg, light brown sugar, vanilla flavoring, flour, salt, baking soda, nuts ; preparation:Beat egg. Add sugar and vanilla. Blend in dry ingredients. Add nuts. Pour into well greased 8 inch square pan. Bake in 350 degrees f oven for 20-25 minutes. Allow to cool completely before cutting. This will be slightly soft when removed from oven. ; name: peppermint white chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, light brown sugar, vanilla, egg, all-purpose flour, salt, baking soda, white chocolate chips, candy cane ; preparation:Cream butter until light. Gradually add sugars, creaming well until blended. Beat in vanilla and egg. Stir together flour, salt and soda. Add flour mixture to butter mixture, blending well. Stir in chips and crushed candy canes. Drop by level tablespoonfuls, 2 inches apart, onto cookie sheets covered with parchment paper. Bake at 375 degrees for about 12 minutes until golden. Remove to wire racks to cool. ; name: homemade butterscotch pudding ; ingredients: dark brown sugar, all-purpose flour, eggs, salt, milk, vanilla extract ; preparation:

name: weight watchers grilled green shrimp ; ingredients: parsley, basil, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, large shrimp ; preparation:To prepare the marinade, combine the parsley, basil, garlic, oil, salt and pepper in a zip-close plastic bag. Add the shrimp. Refrigerate, turning the bag occasionally, 1 hour to overnight. Spray a nonstick ridge grill pan with nonstick spray and set over medium-high heat. Working in batches, if necessary, grill the shrimp until they are just opaque in the center and lightly browned on the outside, 2-3 minutes on each side. ; name: pasta with tomatoes olives and capers ; ingredients: tomatoes, garlic, angel hair pasta, extra virgin olive oil, black olives, capers, flat leaf parsley, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Toss the tomatoes and garlic together and drain them in a strainer while you continue with the recipe. Bring a large pot of well-salted water to a boil and cook the pasta until al dente. Drain it well, return it to the pot, and toss it with the tomato mixture. Toss again with the olive oil, olives, capers, parsley, salt, and pepper. Let sit for 3 to 5 minutes to absorb the flavors before serving. ; name: tomato and bell pepper spaghetti ; ingredients: whole wheat spaghetti, olive oil, green pepper, grape tomatoes, parmesan cheese, garlic, oregano, basil, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. While the spaghetti is cooking, heat a large saut pan over medium heat with olive oil. Saut green peppers. Add tomatoes and herbs once pepper softens. Heat until warmed. Combine pasta and tomato mixture. Sprinkle cheese on top and fold edges of pasta toward the center. Heat until warm. Transfer to plate, stir, and serve. ; name: soupy black beans ; ingredients: olive oil, scallions, garlic cloves, green chilies, black beans, water, salsa, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add scallions and garlic cloves and saute until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add black beans and water. Increase heat and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add salsa and stir until heated through. Add salt and pepper to taste. ; name: jewish spaghetti ; ingredients: olive oil, green bell peppers, red bell peppers, yellow onions, canned tomato sauce, salt, pepper, cooked spaghetti ; preparation:Heat olive oil over medium heat in large frying pan. Cook onions until softened. Add peppers and cook until soft. Add tomato sauce, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Simmer on low for 10 minutes. Add to spaghetti. ; name: quick scallops and spaghetti ; ingredients: whole wheat spaghetti, bay scallops, olive oil, black pepper, garlic cloves, onion, lemon, salt, flat leaf parsley, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Cook spaghetti per package instruction while preparing the scallops. While spaghetti is cooking, heat skillet on medium high. Add olive oil and heat about 1 minute. Add garlic and black pepper, saute for about 45 seconds, do not brown. Add scallops and cook until opaque. Remove scallops to a bowl with slotted spoon. Add onion and cook until softened. Once onion pieces are clear and soft, squeeze in the juice of one large lemon. Salt to taste. Drain and put hot spaghetti in a large bowl, immediately pour the skillet of scallops on top of the spaghetti, add chopped parsley and toss to mix. Serve immediately, can add lemon, parsley or red pepper to taste. ; name: one pot tomato basil pasta ; ingredients: pasta, diced tomatoes with juice, sweet onion, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, dried oregano leaves, basil sprigs, vegetable broth, extra virgin olive oil, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place pasta, tomatoes, onion, garlic, basil, in a large stock pot. Pour in vegetable broth. Sprinkle on top the pepper flakes and oregano. Drizzle top with oil. Cover pot and bring to a boil. Reduce to a low simmer and keep covered and cook for about 10 minutes, stirring every 2 minutes or so. Cook until almost all liquid has evaporated i left about an inch of liquid in the bottom of the pot but you can reduce as desired. Season to taste with salt and pepper, stirring pasta several times to distribute the liquid in the bottom of the pot. Serve garnished with parmesan cheese. ; name: pasta with garlic and oil pasta aglio e olio ; ingredients: spaghetti, salt, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, hot red chili peppers, italian parsley ; preparation:

name: lemon rosemary zucchini ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, yellow bell pepper, fresh rosemary, zucchini, lemon juice, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:In medium non-stick skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add yellow pepper and rosemary and saute 2 minutes. Add zucchini and salt and pepper, to taste. Continue to saute for another 4 to 5 minutes or until zucchini is just tender. Remove from heat and stir in lemon juice. ; name: cilantro grilled chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, garlic cloves, fresh cilantro, seasoning salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, limes, juice of ; preparation:Pound chicken breasts between wax paper enough to flatten. Combine oil, lime juice, vinegar, mustard, garlic, cilantro, salt and pepper in a bowl. Add chicken, coat well and marinate at least 1 hour. Grill or broil chicken breasts for about 6 minutes on each side, basting once with left over marinate mixture. Preperation time does not include marinate time. ; name: roast shrimp with orange and rosemary ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, rosemary, shrimp, orange juice, orange, zest of, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. When oven is ready, warm 2 tbsp of the olive oil in a 9 x 13 inch baking pan. Add rosemary, return to oven until rosemary begins to sizzle. Add shrimp, sprinkle with the orange juice, orange zest, salt and pepper and remaining olive oil. Roast until the shrimp turns pink, about 10 minutes. ; name: rao s lemon chicken ; ingredients: fryer chickens, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, red wine vinegar, garlic, salt and pepper, fresh oregano ; preparation:Broil chicken, skin side down, then turn to char skin. Cool chicken. Cut into pieces. Arrange in pan- skin side down. Pour marinade on top. Broil 3 minutes. Turn, cook 1 minute. Arrange on serving platter& pour juices all over. ; name: baked chicken with garlic and rosemary ; ingredients: chicken portions, olive oil, lemon, juice of, chicken stock powder, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary ; preparation:Wipe chicken with damp cloth and place in casserole dish. Mix oil, lemon juice, stock powder and seasoning together and drizzle over chicken. Add lemon slices, garlic cloves and rosemary. Roast in a preheated 200c oven for about 35 minutes. You will need to shake the pan from time to time during the cooking process to prevent sticking. ; name: rosemary roasted chicken with potatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, paprika, rosemary, garlic, black pepper, salt, chicken breast halves, small red potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix oil, and seasonings in a large bowl. Add chicken and potatoes. Toss to coat. Line 15x10x1-inch baking pan with foil and spray with no-stick cooking spray. Arrange chicken and potatoes in single layer in pan. Roast in oven for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are tender, turning potatoes occasionally. ; name: savoury chicken ; ingredients: chicken breast halves, dry red wine, olive oil, soy sauce, brown sugar, ground ginger, garlic, oregano ; preparation:Arrange chicken in large shallow baking dish. Mix remaining ingredients in large bowl. Pour marinade over chicken. Cover and refrigerate 2-4 hours. Preheat oven to 360f. Bake chicken in marinade until just springy to touch, basting 2-3 times with marinade, about 40 minutes. Transfer chicken to platter. Tent with foil to keep warm. Strain marinade into saucepan. Boil until reduced to 2 cups, about 20 minutes. Serve sauce with chicken. ; name: orange rosemary glazed chicken ; ingredients: chicken breasts, salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh rosemary, orange marmalade, sherry wine vinegar, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:

name: microwave potato soup ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, water, half-and-half, butter, salt, pepper, cheese, bacon ; preparation:Microwave potatoes, onion and water on high 8 to 10 minutes until potatoes are tender. Cover and let rest 5 minutes. Mash potatoes with a fork into large pieces. This does help thicken the soup. Add remaining ingredients except cheese and cook on high 5 to 8 minutes to serving temperature. Garnish with cheese and bacon or chives. ; name: pink potatoes ; ingredients: carrots, potatoes, onion, milk, butter, flour, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook the potatoes with salt until done. Drain into a colander. Cook the carrots separately with some sugar and salt until tender. Drain into the colander. In one of the pots add the butter and melt and saute the onion till tender. Add the flour and cook one minute. At this point stir in the milk. Add the potatoes and the carrots and mash together until smooth. Add the salt and pepper and some garlic or onion powder if desired. ; name: irish mashed potatoes colcannon ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, onion, kale, milk, sour cream, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cook potatoes in water until tender. Drain. While potatoes are cooking. Melt butter in large skillet. Add chopped onion and cook for 5 minutes. Stir in kale and cook 5 more minutes. Remove from heat. Mash potatoes, milk, sour cream, salt and pepper with mixer. Stir in kale mixture. ; name: leek and potato pie ; ingredients: potatoes, leeks, flour, salt and pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter ; preparation:Peel the potatoes and slice thinly. Wash the leeks thoroughly and slice thinly discarding about the last 2 inches of the green tops. Mix together the flour, salt, pepper and nutmeg. Grease a casserole dish. Put in alternate layers of potatoes and leeks sprinkling each layer with the seasoned flour and small chips of butter. The top layer should be potatoes. Dot the top with butter, pour hot milk on top of the casserole. Bake in the oven uncovered for about 1 hour. ; name: nora ephron s mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, heavy cream, butter, salt, pepper ; preparation:Put potato in a large pot of salted water and bring to a boil. Lower the heat and simmer for 20 minutes, until tender. Drain and place potatoes back in the pot over low heat and shake the pan to remove excess moisture. Peel. Put through a potato ricer and immediately add 1 tablespoons of heavy cream and add as much melted butter and salt and pepper as you feel like. Eat immediately. ; name: potatoes gourmet ; ingredients: potatoes, cheese, butter, sour cream, green onions, salt, pepper ; preparation:Boil potatoes in skins and cool, peel and grate. Combine with 4 tblsp butter, melted. Stir in cheese until almost melted. Blend with rest of the ingredients. Put in a 2 quart pan sprayed with cooking oil. Dot the top with 2 tblsp butter. Cover and bake at 300 about 25 minutes. ; name: blue cheese mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, milk, butter, salt, pepper, blue cheese ; preparation:Boil potatoes until fork tender, about 20 minutes. Drain. Shake pan over low heat to help dry potatoes. Mash potatoes until no lumps remain. Add milk, mashing until smooth. Add butter, salt, pepper and blue cheese. Mash vigorously until potatoes are light and fluffy. If desired, put small pats of butter on top. ; name: irio kenya ; ingredients: white potatoes, watercress, peas, corn, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: cheesy spuds dauphinoise ; ingredients: floury potatoes, milk, heavy whipping cream, garlic, salt and pepper, unsalted butter, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Place the cream, milk and garlic in a saucepan and slowly bring to the boil. Remove from the heat and allow to cool. Peel and thinly slice the potatoes. Butter a small baking tray or ovenproof dish and season lightly with salt and pepper arrange slices of potato over the bottom of the dish overlapping as you go, lightly seasoning each layer with salt and pepper until all the potato is used up. Pour the cream and milk mixture over until the potatoes are just covered. Press down the potatoes with something flat so that the cream covers all of the potatoes. Bake in a moderate oven for about 30 minutes. Turn the oven down to 300f and sprinkle the potatoes with grated cheese. Cook until tender for a further 15 minutes. If the potatoes get too brown on top for your liking, cover them with aluminium foil. ; name: elsie s potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, low-fat cream cheese, fat free sour cream, onion salt, salt, pepper, butter ; preparation:Cook and mash potatoes. Add all incredients, except butter and combine. Put into large greased casserole. Dot with butter. Bake, covered, at 350 for 30 minutes. If making ahead, cover and chill or freeze. Thaw before baking. ; name: kittencal s dill and sour cream potato salad with eggs ; ingredients: baby potatoes, radishes, hard-boiled eggs, green onions, sour cream, sugar, garlic powder, fresh dill, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Wash and scrub the outside of the new potatoes. Place into pot and cover with cold water. Add in 2 tablespoons salt and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Cook intil just fork tender. Remove to a bowl and cool to room temperature. Slice the cooled potatoes in half. Add in green onions and sliced eggs. Toss to combine. In a small or medium bowl bowl combine the sour cream with sugar, garlic powder, fresh dill and seasoned salt. Pour over the potatoes and toss to combine. Season with black pepper to taste if desired. Chill for a minimum of 3 or more hours before serving. ; name: twice baked potatoes with cream cheese ; ingredients: potatoes, fat free cream cheese, nonfat milk, onion salt, butter, fresh ground pepper, parsley, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Put cream cheese out to soften. Scrub potatoes. Dry them off and grease them with butter and salt the skins. Bake at 350f for 1 hour. Remove from oven and cool to handle. Cut potatoes in half, lengthwise, remove cooked potato and put in large bowl. Be carefully to leave the skin intact. Mash with cream cheese, hot milk, onion salt, butter, and pepper. Pile mixture back into skins. Sprinkle with paprika and parsley and bake 20 more minutes. ; name: spinach and cheese mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, salt and pepper, green onions, butter, spinach, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Set oven to 400 degrees. Butter a 2-quart casserole dish. In a large bowl, combine all ingredients, except the grated cheddar cheese. Spoon into prepared baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 15 minutes. Remove from oven, top with grated cheddar, bake for 5 minutes longer. If desired, roasted garlic may be added to mixture. ; name: creamy spinach potato mash ; ingredients: baby spinach, baking potatoes, garlic cloves, rosemary, chicken broth, butter, roasted red pepper ; preparation:Place spinach in colander. In pot, bring next 3 ingredients and enough salted water to cover, to a boil. Cook 20 minutes. Pour over spinach to drain. Discard rosemary. Return potatoes and spinach to pot and stir in butter and broth. Using hand masher, mash mixture until smooth. Stir in peppers and serve. ; name: mommom s fluffy potato casserole ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, cream cheese, onion, eggs, all-purpose flour, salt and pepper, french-fried onions ; preparation:Put the potatoes into the large bowl of your electric mixer. Add the cream cheese, chopped onions, eggs, and flour. Beat at medium speed until the ingredients are blended, then beat at high speed until the light and fluffy. Taste. Add salt and pepper, if needed. Spoon into a greased 9-inch-square baking dish. Distribute the canned onions evenly over the top. Bake, uncovered, in a 300 degree oven for about 35 minutes. ; name: potato pepper jack soup sp5 ; ingredients: simply potatoes traditional mashed potatoes, monterey jack pepper cheese, fat-free chicken broth, garlic powder, baby spinach ; preparation:

name: easy spritz cookies ; ingredients: sugar cookie mix, butter, egg, flour, almond extract, colored sugar sprinkle ; preparation:Heat oven to 375f. In large bowl, stir cookie mix, butter, egg, flour and almond extract until soft dough forms. Fit cookie press with desired template. Fill cookie press with cookie dough. Press cookies onto ungreased cookie sheets. Decorate as desired using colored sugars and sprinkles. Bake 6 to 8 minutes or until set. Cool 1 minute. Remove from cookie sheet to wire rack. ; name: pumpkin pie french toast baked ; ingredients: eggs, milk, pumpkin puree, vanilla, pumpkin pie spice, brown sugar, texas toast thick bread ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Mix the eggs, milk, pumpkin puree, vanilla, pumpkin pie spice, and brown sugar in low flat bowl for easy dipping. Line two cookie sheets with foil and spray with pam. Dip the bread into the egg mixture on both sides and place on cookie sheet. Bake for 25 minutes, flipping them over half way through. Serve with maple syrup, powdered suger, or eat them plain if you are on the go. ; name: baked peach pancakes ; ingredients: butter, bisquick baking mix, milk, eggs, fresh peaches, sugar, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Place 2 tablespoons butter in each of two 9-inch pie plates. Heat in oven until melted. Stir together bisquick, milk and eggs. Arrange half of the peach slices in each pie plate. Divide batter evenly between pie plates. Stir together sugar and cinnamon. Sprinkle over batter. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until puffed and golden brown. High altitude no changes. ; name: cake mix cake plus ; ingredients: cake mix, eggs, flour, sour cream, sugar, milk, margarine ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan or 12-cup fluted tube pan with non-stick cooking spray. In large mixing bowl, combine cake mix, eggs, flour, sour cream, sugar, milk and margarine. Beat to mix well. Pour into prepared pan. Bake for 1 hour, or until done. ; name: mini doughnut cupcakes ; ingredients: sugar, ground cinnamon, yellow cake mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs, ground nutmeg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease and flour 24 minit muffin pan cups. Combine sugar and cinnamon in small bowl. Mix cake mix, water, oil and eggs according to package directions, stir nutmeg into batter. Fill prepared muffing cups two-thirds full. Bake about 12 minutes or until lightly browned and toothpick inserted into centers come out clean. Remove cupcakes from pans. Roll warm cupcakes in sugar mixture until completely coated. Save any remaining cinnamon-sugar mixture from this recipe to sprinkle on toast or pancakes. ; name: quick taco casserole ; ingredients: ground chuck, onion, taco seasoning mix, tomato sauce, whole kernel corn, cheddar cheese, baking mix, milk, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cook ground chuck with onion until chuck is brown. Drain off grease. Spoon into ungreased 9x13x2-inch baking dish. Stir in dry taco seasoning mix, tomato sauce, and corn. Sprinkle with cheese. Stir baking mix, milk, and eggs until blended and pour over beef mixture. Bake 35 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: southern sausage onion cornbread ; ingredients: sausage, onion, eggs, sugar, milk, vegetable oil, cream-style corn, cheddar cheese, self-rising cornmeal mix ; preparation:Brown sausage and onion. Drain well. In medium size bowl combine eggs, sugar, milk, oil, corn and cheese. Stir in cornmeal mix. Pour one-half of mixture into a greased 9 x 9 inch baking dish. Sprinkle sausage and onions over mixture. Pour remaining mixture over top. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 35 to 40 minutes. May sprinkle small amount of cheese over top during last 3-5 minutes of baking. ; name: grandmother s cornbread ; ingredients: jiffy cornbread mix, mayonnaise, eggs, oil, sugar ; preparation:

name: cheesy broccoli noodle soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, chicken broth, fine egg noodles, frozen chopped broccoli, salt, garlic powder, fresh ground pepper, milk, american cheese ; preparation:Heat olive oil in large saucepan. Add onion and saute over medium heat till onions are golden. Add chicken broth and bring to a boil. Add salt and noodles. Cook uncovered for about 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in broccoli and garlic powder and cook for another 4 minutes. Add milk, cheese and pepper stirring constantly until the cheese is melted. ; name: brown rice split pea laf ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, garlic cloves, brown rice, vegetable broth, lemon juice, split peas, ground cinnamon, ground cumin, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a medium saucepan over medium heat, heat the oil and saute the onion until golden, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic ands rice and stir until coated with oil. Stir in the broth, lemon juice, split peas, cinnamon, cumin, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, then turn the heat down to a simmer. Cover and cook 45-50 minutes, or until all the liquid is absorbed and the rice and peas are tender. Let stand, covered 10 minutes, then serve hot. ; name: tex mex rice and beans ; ingredients: olive oil, yellow onion, green bell pepper, minced garlic cloves, rotel, pinto beans, white rice, chicken stock ; preparation:Heat olive oil. Add onion, peppers and garlic. Cook until transparent. Add rice and toast. Add chicken stock and rotel. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer covered for 20 mins. When 20 mins is up add beans. ; name: day after the holiday turkey soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, carrots, celery, chicken stock, corn, turkey, salt, pepper, lemon ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. Reduce heat and add finely diced onions, carrots, and celery. Cook until soft and golden brown, about 5 to 6 minutes. Add corn, turkey, salt and pepper and the chicken stock then bring to a boil. Let the soup simmer uncovered for 10 to 15 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Before serving squeeze in the juice of a lemon. Leftover rice may be substituted for the corn. ; name: french chicken thighs in cilantro sauce ; ingredients: corn oil, chicken thighs, onion, garlic, dry white wine, fresh cilantro, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil on large nonstick frying pan. Add thighs in one layer and saute them over medium to high heat for 4 minutes on each side, until nicely browned. Remove the chicken to a platter. Add the onions to the drippings in the skillet. Saute for 1 minute. Stir in the garlic, wine, and cilantro stems and saute for 10 seconds longer. Return chicken to frying pan, add salt and pepper, and bring surrounding liquid to a boil. Cover the pan, reduce heat, and bring to a slow boil for 15 minutes. Stir in cilantro leaves. Serve 2 chicken thighs per person. ; name: tomatoe rice ; ingredients: olive oil, butter, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes, vegetable stock, long grain rice, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil and butter in saucepan until butter melets in a medium saucepan add the onion and garlic and saut for about 5 minutes or until onion is softened. Add the tomatoes, mix well, cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Add the stock, rice, salt and pepper, mix well and bring to the boil. Cover and simmer very gently for about 20 minutes. Serve hot or cold. ; name: braised lettuce with peas and lemon ; ingredients: olive oil, shallots, boston lettuce, chicken broth, dried thyme, sugar, frozen peas, lemon zest, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large skillet over moderate heat. Saut the shallots until tender, about 5 minutes. Add the lettuce, chicken broth. Thyme, and sugar and simmer covered over low heat for about 5 minutes, until the lettuce is tender. Add the peas and cook an additional 5 minutes. Add the lemon zest, salt, and pepper, and serve immediately. ; name: herbed split pea soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, carrot, garlic, dried split peas, turkey ham, dried marjoram, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:

name: homemade hamburger helper ; ingredients: oil, onion, garlic, salt, ground beef, tomatoes, macaroni and cheese mix, milk, butter, american cheese ; preparation:Start water boiling for pasta. Heat oil or butter in skillet. Add onions and garlic and saute. When wilted, add beef and seasonings. Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and prepare with milk, butter and cheese sauce packet. Set aside over low heat. When beef is only slightly pink, add tomatoes. Continue cooking till meat is done. Stir beef mixture into mac and cheese, add extra cheese and stir until melted. ; name: hoosier sloppy joes ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, salt, pepper, chili peppers, celery salt, worcestershire sauce, ketchup, water, brown sugar ; preparation:Brown beef in large skillet. Add onion, salt, pepper, chili pepper, celery salt and worcestershire sauce. Drain beef mixture. Transfer beef mixture to crock pot. In large bowl combine ketchup, water and brown sugar. Pour over beef mixture. Allow to warm in crock pot on lowest setting. Serve on buns. ; name: kittencal s jazzed up pasta sauce ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, garlic, crushed red pepper flakes, parmesan cheese, marinara sauce, salt, fresh ground black pepper, sugar ; preparation:In a medium pot brown the ground beef with onion until no longer pink. Drain all fat. Add in the garlic, chili flakes and drained mushrooms. Cook stirring until the meat is browned. Mix in the parmesan cheese then pasta sauce. Bring to a simmer stirring over medium heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer uncovered for 45 to 60 minutes or even longer, stirring occasionally. Season with salt, pepper and sugar about halfway through cooking. ; name: sunrise chicken hash ; ingredients: olive oil, yukon gold potatoes, fennel, celery, cooked chicken, ripe olives, chives, dill, kosher salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add potatoes and fennel and cook 5 to 6 minutes until golden. Add red onion, celery and chicken. Cook and stir 4 to 6 minutes, until vegetables are tender and chicken is golden. Mix in california ripe olives, chives, dill, salt and pepper and remove from heat. Divide evenly among 4 plates. ; name: spicy au gratin beef bake ; ingredients: ground beef, white onion, crushed red pepper flakes, seasoning salt, au gratin potatoes, boiling water, milk, butter, ground black pepper, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. In a medium non-stick skillet, over medium heat, add the first 4 ingredients and cook until meat is no longer pink and onion is tender. Drain if needed. While meat mixture is browning, boil water. In a large bowl add rest of ingredients except shredded cheese. Mix well. Pour into a greased or sprayed 2-quart baking dish. Cover with lid or foil and bake for 30 minutes. Sprinkle with cheese and bake until cheese is melted and lightly browned. ; name: crock pot taco soup ; ingredients: cooked ground beef, v8 vegetable juice, onion powder, whole kernel corn, kidney beans, tomato sauce, taco seasoning mix, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook ground beef until no longer pink. Place all ingredients except cheese in crock pot and stir. Cook on low 4 hours or until heated through. If eating immediately, pour in bowls and top with cheddar cheese. If freezing, let cool and place in freezer container. When ready to eat, pull and let thaw in fridge. Microwave on high 2 minutes or until heated through. Top with cheddar cheese. Also you can make this on the stove top. Combine all ingredients except cheese and let simmer for an hour. Top with cheddar cheese and serve. ; name: impossible cheesebuger pie ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, salt, cheddar cheese, milk, bisquick baking mix, eggs ; preparation:Heat oven to 400. Cook beef and onion, drain. Stir in salt. Spread in greased 9 inch pie plate. Sprinkle with cheese. Stir remaining ingredients with fork until blended. Pour into plate. Bake 25 minute or until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Shirley j hedrick. 5-23-05. ; name: poutine burger eh ; ingredients: ground beef, kosher salt, ground pepper, buns, butter, fresh mozzarella cheese, french fries, chicken gravy, caramelized onion ; preparation:

name: ginger glazed almonds with dried fruit ; ingredients: unsalted butter, light brown sugar, water, fresh ginger, sea salt, ground ginger, blanched almonds, cooking spray, berries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Melt butter in a large skillet on medium heat. Stir in sugar, water, fresh ginger, salt, and ground ginger. Cook until sugar dissolves. Stir in almonds and remove from heat. Line a baking sheet with foil and coat with cooking spray. Spread almonds onto foil, and bake 25 to 35 minutes, stirring once, until almonds are golden. Transfer almonds on foil to a rack and cool completely. Loosen with a spatula and combine with dried fruit. Store mixture airtight for up to 3 days. ; name: sweet peach tea ; ingredients: tea leaves, lemon, gingerroot, boiling water, ice cubes, peaches, sugar, mint, fresh peach ; preparation:Place tea, lemon and ginger in a heatproof container and add boiling water. Let tea steep 7 to 8 minutes. Place 4 cups of the ice in a pitcher, then pour in tea. Blend diced peaches and sugar in a blender until smooth. Mix into tea. Serve in glasses over remaining ice and garnish with mint and peach slices. ; name: spiced blueberries ; ingredients: blueberries, vinegar, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, sugar ; preparation:Place berries in a large saucepan and add vinegar and spices. Boil for 30 minutes. Add sugar and boil for an additional 30 minutes or until thickened sufficiently. Stir occasionally after adding sugar to prevent scorching. Pour into sterilized jars and seal. ; name: winter fruit compote ; ingredients: sugar, water, fresh ginger, dried fruit, fresh cranberries, orange, granny smith apple ; preparation:In large saucepan, combine sugar, water and ginger. Bring to a boil over high heat. Add dried fruit and bring back to a boil. Immediately reduce heat to low simmer. Cook, uncovered, until fruit is not quite tender, about 5 minutes. Add cranberries and simmer, stirring occasionally, until cranberries pop. Stir in orange and apple. Remove from heat and allow to cool down. For dessert, serve warm over ice cream, or at room temperature over a plain cake, such as angel food cake or pound cake. Can also be served with yogurt. Makes a particularly nice breakfast. ; name: hot mulled crock pot punch ; ingredients: cranberry juice, apple juice, brown sugar, salt, cinnamon sticks, whole cloves ; preparation:Pour cranberry and apple juices into crock pot. Add brown sugar and salt. Stir until dissolved. Tie cinnamon sticks and cloves in cheesecloth or put them in a tea ball and add to crock pot. Heat on low for 2 hours. Remove cinnamon and cloves. Serve hot. ; name: spiced applesauce ; ingredients: apples, sugar, lemon juice, fresh lemon rind, cinnamon stick, nutmeg, allspice, clove ; preparation:Place all ingredients in the slow cooker and set on low. Cook for approximately 4 to 6 hours or until apples are tender. The time will vary depending on the type of apples used. Remove cinnamon stick. Taste and adjust seasonings. Serve warm or cold. ; name: mulled white wine with peach juice ; ingredients: dry white wine, peach juice, lemon slices, fresh ginger, ground cinnamon, honey, crystallized ginger ; preparation:Add the first 6 ingredients in a saucepan over low heat. Stir to dissolve the honey. Bring to just a simmer and cook for 2 minutes. Do not let the wine come to a boil. Discard the lemon slices and fresh ginger. Pour the wine into 2 warmed mugs or heatproof glasses. Garnish with crystallized ginger and serve. ; name: slow cooker peach butter ; ingredients: peaches, water, light brown sugar, fresh lemon juice, ground ginger, ground cloves ; preparation:

name: easy white cake ; ingredients: sugar, butter, egg whites, vanilla extract, flour, baking powder, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350, or 325 if you have dark non-stick pan. Prepare pan whichever way. In a bowl, cream together sugar and butter. Add the sifted flour and baking powder. Beat in eggs. Stir in vanilla. Finally, stir in milk until batter is smooth. Bake for about 30-40 minutes, until cake springs back at touch. ; name: spritz cookies ii ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, almond extract ; preparation:Stir together flour and baking powder. Beat butter for 30 seconds. Add sugar and beat until fluffy. Add egg, vanilla and almond extract. Beat well. Gradually add dry ingredients to beaten mixture, beating till well combined. Do not chill. Force dough through a cookie press onto an ungreased cookie sheet. If desired, sprinkle with colored sugars or with ground almonds dyed red or green with food coloring. Bake in a 400 oven for 7-8 minutes. Cool on wire rack. ; name: top secret recipes version of ihop french toast by todd wilbur ; ingredients: eggs, milk, vanilla, all-purpose flour, salt, butter, thick bread, powdered sugar ; preparation:Beat eggs in a shallow bowl. Add milk, vanilla, flour, and salt to eggs. Beat with an electric mixture until all is well combined. Heat a large skillet over medium heat. When the surface is hot, add about a teaspoon of butter. Dip the bread into the batter and drop it onto the hot skillet. Let cook for 2-3 minutes on each side or until each side is golden brown. Cut toast in half diagonally and sprinkle with powdered sugar. ; name: ice cream pancake with honey and walnuts ; ingredients: flour, sugar, honey, walnuts, egg, water, oil, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Chop the walnuts into halves. Heat sugar to caramalize slightly and add honey. In a mixing bowl, mix flour along with egg and oil. Add water and mix to a smooth batter. Make small pancakes and keep aside. Place a scoop of icecream in the pancake and roll. Cut the pancake into two. Serve immediately, garnished with chocolate sauce, caramalize honey and walnuts. ; name: italian wedding cakes ; ingredients: flour, shortening, sugar, vanilla extract, eggs, baking powder ; preparation:Combine flour and shortening as if for pie crust. Add baking powder and combine. In a separate bowl, beat eggs and then add sugar and vanilla. Add flour mixture to egg mixture. To shape cookies, you can simply roll them into 1-inch balls or you can roll them into logs and fold them into pretzel shapes. They will puff up some but will mostly retain whatever shape you form them into. Bake at 350 degrees for 12 to 14 minutes. They will not brown much. Cool and frost with your favorite glaze and add sprinkles. For convenience, you can melt store-bought frosting. ; name: grandma chin s sponge cake ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, salt, vanilla, butter, milk, flour, baking powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Beat eggs until light. Beat in sugar, salt and vanilla. Beat in milk and butter. Add dry ingredients very quickly and pour into a greased 9x13 pan. Bake 25 to 35 minutes or until toothpick placed in middle comes out clean. Serve with strawberries and whipped cream. ; name: puffed pancake ; ingredients: eggs, milk, unbleached flour, granulated sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, butter ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 425f. You will need a 12-inch cast iron skillet, or oven-proof skillet, and a blender. In a blender at medium speed, mix together the eggs, milk, flour, granulated sugar, vanilla, and cinnamon, until just combined, about 15 seconds. The batter should be a little bit lumpy. Melt the butter or margarine in a 12-inch cast iron skillet by putting it in the hot oven for about 30 seconds. Remove the skillet from the oven, spread the butter to coat the bottom and sides of the skillet, and pour in the batter. Return the skillet to the center oven rack and bake for about 20 minutes, or until the pancake is puffed and lightly browned. ; name: southern pound cake ; ingredients: cake flour, sugar, crisco, eggs, milk, vanilla ; preparation:

name: ricotta spinach dip with chips ; ingredients: fresh spinach, ricotta cheese, scallions, radishes, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh dill, water chestnut, parsley, olive, cherry tomatoes ; preparation:Stem the spinach and clean it thoroughly. Dry completely using a salad spiner and mince fine. Place the ricotta in a medium large bowl. Use a wire whisk or wooden spoon to beat until quite smooth stir in the spinach and all other ingredients, except garnishes. Cover tightly and chill until very cold. Serve with chips, raw veggies, or good crackers. ; name: tomato onion quiche ; ingredients: onion, tomatoes, eggs, yogurt, milk, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh basil, sharp cheddar cheese, pastry shells ; preparation:Spread onion and tomato in a 9-inch pastry shell. Mix eggs, yogurt, milk, salt, pepper and basil. Pour into pastry shell. Sprinkle cheese over top. Bake at 400 degrees ot 10 minutes. Then bake at 350 degrees for 35-40 minutes or until a knife comes out clean. Let sit for 5 minutes before serving. ; name: andreas fault bagel sandwich ; ingredients: bagel, egg, avocado, sun-dried tomatoes, red onions, monterey jack cheese, alfalfa sprout, cooked bacon, salt & pepper ; preparation:Split bagel in half and toast lightly. Meanwhile, scramble eggs and cook in a small frying pan sprayed with nonstick cooking spray until done, trying to keep the eggs in one large piece. Butter bagel if desired and place cooked egg on top of one half. Top with a sprinkling of cheese, a slice of red onion, some avocado slices, and the sun-dried tomatoes. Top with bacon strips and alfalfa sprouts if desired. Season to taste with some salt and pepper. Place remaining bagel half on top and cut into two halves. Serve warm. ; name: strawberry romaine salad ; ingredients: butter, sugar, sliced almonds, romaine lettuce, fresh strawberries, red onion, mayonnaise, milk, poppy seeds, raspberry vinegar ; preparation:In a saucepan, over medium heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter, stir in sugar and almonds and cook until golden brown. Remove from heat and allow to cool slightly. Combine lettuce, strawberries, onion and the sugared almonds. Mix dressing ingredients together and toss with salad. Chill for a short time and then serve. ; name: lemon pesto dip ; ingredients: fresh basil, baby spinach leaves, walnuts, asiago cheese, soft silken tofu, salt, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil, lemon zest ; preparation:Pulse the basil and spinach in a mini food processor until finely chopped. Add the nuts and cheese. Whirl until the nuts are finely chopped. Add the tofu, salt and pepper. With the motor running, drizzle in the olive oil. Add the lemon zest, and whirl to blend. Scoop the pesto into a bowl. Surround it with your selection of raw veggies, including red bell pepper strips, cherry tomatoes, etc. The dip will keep up to 2 days in the refrigerator. ; name: creamy curry cauliflower soup ; ingredients: cauliflower, onion, garlic cloves, celery ribs, diced tomatoes, red curry paste, vegetable broth, coconut milk, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:Put cauli, onion, garlic, celery, tomatoes, water and curry paste in a large pot. Bring to a boil and simmer until all ingredients are well cooked. Using an immersion blender, puree all ingredients to desired smoothness and return to heat. Lower temperature and add milk and coconut milk. Heat through and serve. ; name: super salad adapted from whole foods superfood salad ; ingredients: kale, napa cabbage, broccoli slaw mix, edamame, vegetables, red onion, sunflower seeds, raw cashews, raspberries, light raspberry vinaigrette dressing ; preparation:Combine and toss. All the measurements are estimates. I typically eyeball everything based on how much i want to make. I like to chop both the kale and cabbage well because it allows all the ingredients to incorporate better and it is just yummier that way. This salad stores really well in an air tight container in the refrigerator minus the dressing. I like to portion it out into single serving containers for ease as well as when i add the dressing i just replace the lid and shake to distribute the dressing. ; name: strawberry and kiwi spinach salad with grilled chicken breast ; ingredients: fresh spinach leaves, strawberries, kiwi, slivered almonds, feta cheese, red onion rings, chicken breasts, poppy seeds ; preparation:

name: chili crusted salmon with roasted potatoes ; ingredients: chili powder, brown sugar, salt, potatoes, green onions, olive oil, ground black pepper, salmon fillets ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. In small mixing bowl, combine chili powder, brown sugar, and salt. In 13 x 9 glass baking dish, toss potatoes with onion, olive oil, pepper, and 1 tbsp of the chili mixture until evenly coated. Cover with foil and roast 20 minutes. Meanwhile, use remaining chili mixture to coat salmon fillets. Place on top of potatoes, skin side down, and roast uncovered 10-12 minutes, or until fish flakes easily and potatoes are tender. ; name: curried pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, brown sugar, curry powder, dry mustard, hungarian paprika, salt, pepper ; preparation:Trim fat from pork. Mix sugar and spices in a small bowl. Rub pork with spice mixture. Place pork on a broiler pan coated with cooking spray. Insert a meat thermometer in the thickest part. Bake at 425 degrees for about 25-35 minutes, or until the thermometer registers 160 degrees. Let stand 5 minutes before slicing. Serve with mango chutney. ; name: easy 20 minute hot sausage and potato soup ; ingredients: hot pork sausage, frozen southern style hash brown potatoes, garlic powder, celery salt, salt, dry mustard, white pepper, onion flakes, chicken broth, country gravy mix ; preparation:Add sausage to a hot pan and break it up to crumble it as you cook it. When the sausage is no longer pink, add the hash browns, seasonings and onion flakes. Cook the hash browns until they are slightly soft. Wisk some of the chicken broth with the gravy mix in a bowl and slowly add to the pot. Add the remaining chicken broth to the pot. Mix gently and bring to a rolling boil over med-high heat. Lower the heat to simmer and cook for an additional 15-20 minutes, or until hot all the way through. ; name: dutch baked beans ; ingredients: bacon, onion, white kidney beans, salt, brown sugar, catsup, garlic powder, chili powder ; preparation:Cook bacon until not quite done. Drain and set aside. Saute onions in 2 or 3 tablespoons bacon fat. Take 1 can of beans and rinse and drain well. Use other can as is. Pour the unstrained can into large frying pan. Add brown sugar. Stir until sugar is melted. Add onions and rest of the beans. Chop bacon. Add to mixture, along with catsup, spices and salt. Simmer for 15 to 20 minutes. ; name: ww chili rubbed pork chops ; ingredients: chili powder, brown sugar, ground cumin, garlic powder, worcestershire sauce, boneless pork chops, green beans, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:Preheat broiler and coat broiler pan with cooking spray. In a small bowl, combine chili powder, sugar, cumin and garlic powder. Add worcestershire sauce and stir until paste forms. Rub paste onto both sides of each pork chop, place on prepared pan and broil 4 minutes on each side until inside is no longer pink. Serve with string beans drizzled with fresh lemon juice. ; name: not french dressing ; ingredients: onion powder, dry mustard, sugar, salt, paprika, white wine vinegar, olive oil, sunflower oil ; preparation:Combine dry ingredients and vinegar in a jar with a tight-fitting lid. Cover and shake well until sugar is dissolved. Add oil. Cover and shake well. Let stand at least half an hour before using. Shake well just before pouring onto salad greens. Refrigerate unused portion. ; name: pumpkin cream soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, curry powder, flour, chicken broth, canned pumpkin, brown sugar, nutmeg, salt, milk ; preparation:Saute onion in butter. Add curry powder and flour. Cook until bubbly. Add other ingredients. Simmer. Garnish with chives or parsley. ; name: chipotle crusted pork tenderloins can sub chops ; ingredients: onion powder, garlic powder, dried chipotle powder, salt, brown sugar, pork tenderloin ; preparation:

name: carrot salad with black mustard seeds ; ingredients: carrot, red bell peppers, cashews, salt, vegetable oil, black mustard seeds, cilantro ; preparation:If very moist, press shredded carrots dry before mixing the salad. Mix carrots, bell pepper, cashews and salt. In a small pan heat oil over medium heat until hot. Add mustard seeds and fry until they sputter and turn grey. Pour oil and seeds over salad, add herbs and toss to mix. Serve. ; name: spicy korean chicken ; ingredients: chicken wings, onion, green bell pepper, carrots, soy sauce, black pepper, sugar, water, red pepper paste, dry red pepper ; preparation:Boil wings in pot until blood no longer visible. Drain. Mix ingredients together and bring to boil. Cover and let simmer over med heat for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Cook until carrots reach desired tenderness. Serve with sticky white rice. ; name: mixed grilled vegetables ; ingredients: olive oil, red onions, yellow squash, red bell peppers, yellow bell peppers, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat grill to high. Lightly oil grates. Insert two 8-inch-long metal or presoaked wooden skewers through onion slices horizontally. Place prepared skewers and remaining vegetables on one or two rimmed baking sheets. Drizzle with oil. Season with salt and pepper. Working in batches if necessary, remove from baking sheets. Arrange on grill. Cook, turning occasionally, until lightly browned and tender, 4 to 8 minutes for squash and 8 to 12 minutes for onions and peppers. Remove skewers, and serve. ; name: chickpeas chorizo beans and sausage ; ingredients: red onions, extra virgin olive oil, red bell peppers, chorizo sausages, chickpeas, parsley, salt, pepper ; preparation:Saute onions in oil in a large pan or wok over medium heat for 5 minutes. Add the chopped peppers and cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Move the vegetables to one side of the pan. Add the sliced chorizo to the cleared space and brown on both sides. Cook chorizo for 10 minutes or until cooked through, stirring occasionally. Add chickpeas and mix together. When heated through season with the salt and pepper to taste. Serve. ; name: cool summer veggie salad ; ingredients: cilantro, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, white onion, red pepper, lemon, lime ; preparation:Chop cilantro, cucumber, onion, pepper. Cut grape tomatoes in half. Combine everything in bowl. Squeeze half the lemon in bowl. Squeeze the whole lime in bowl. Mix everything together. ; name: bbq cheddar chicken roll ups ; ingredients: green bell pepper, red bell pepper, sweet onion, boneless skinless chicken breast, barbecue sauce, whole wheat tortillas, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook and stir vegetables in large nonstick skillet on medium-high heat for 3 minutes. Add chicken, cook and stir 3-4 minutes or until no longer pink. Stir in barbecue sauce. Cook on medium heat 3 minutes or until chicken is done, stirring occasionally. Spoon chicken mixture down centers of tortillas. Top with cheese. Roll up. Cut in half. ; name: dees bell pepper salad ; ingredients: bell peppers, chickpeas, pine nuts, sunflower seeds, oil, lemon, parsley, green onions, feta cheese ; preparation:In skillet heat oil add drained chickpeas when oil is hot. Brown shake often, will take some time. Then add seeds watch close dont burn. In bowl add the peppers onion parsley. Juice lemon watch for seeds. Put over veggies. Add skillet stuff. Toss. Can add the feta but dont add to much can over power salad. ; name: bratwurst skillet ; ingredients: bratwurst, green bell peppers, red bell peppers, onions, paprika, caraway seed ; preparation:

name: nif s quick and tasty parmesan chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, milk, garlic powder, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, paprika, salt and pepper, grapeseed oil ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Pound the chicken breasts to an even thickness with the side of a mallet. Mix milk and garlic powder together in a shallow dish. Mix breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese and paprika in a separate shallow dish. Add salt and pepper to taste. Heat frying pan on medium heat and add oil. Coat the chicken in milk and press into the breadcrumb mixture. Brown both sides of the chicken in the hot pan, about 4 to 5 minutes on each side. Place chicken on a baking sheet. Bake until cooked through, about 20 minutes. ; name: cipherbabe s chicken rotini ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, olive oil, rotini pasta, broccoli florets, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cut broccoli and then chicken into bit-size pieces. Heat oil in a skillet to medium heat. Saute chicken until done. Set aside. Boil rotini according to package directions. Add broccoli to boiling water during the last 2-4 minutes. Combine noodles, broccoli and chicken. Serve with cheese, salt and pepper. ; name: marsala chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, flour, garlic salt, pepper, dried oregano, olive oil, butter, mushroom, marsala wine, chicken stock ; preparation:Mix flour and herbs. Cut chicken horizontally i find it easier to cut it horizontally. Dredge chicken in flour and herbs. Heat oil and butter until it sizzles. Saute chicken on both sides until lightly browned, about 3 minutes on each side. Remove chicken from pan. Add muchrooms to pan. Saute muchrooms about 4-5 minutes. Add chicken back to pan. Add wine. Cover skillet, simmer on low for about 10 minutes. ; name: cheddar chicken chowder ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast half, garlic clove, salt, pepper, flour, chicken broth, milk, frozen mixed vegetables, hot sauce, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Spray large saucepan with cooking spray. Add chicken and garlic. Cook and stir on medium-high heat 5 minutes or until cooked through. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in flour. Cook and stir an additional minute. Add broth, milk and vegetables and hot sauce. Stir. Reduce heat to medium. Bring just to boil, stirring frequently. Remove from heat. Stir in cheese until completely melted. ; name: parmesan almond chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, butter, parmesan cheese, almonds, oregano leaves, parsley, paprika, pepper, salt ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees. Spray a cookie sheet with no stick cooking spray. Dip chicken in butter, coat with combined remaining ingredients. Place on cookie sheet. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or till tender. ; name: amish style chicken and corn soup ww core ; ingredients: low sodium chicken broth, skinless chicken breasts, onion, carrot, celery, saffron, frozen corn, whole wheat egg noodles, parsley ; preparation:Add the broth, chicken, onion, chopped celery and saffron to a large saucepan. Bring to a boil. Cover and reduce to a simmer for 30 minutes. During simmering time, you may want to gently skim any foam that comes to the top of the broth. Take the chicken from the pan and reserve to the side while it cools. Strain broth removing all bits. Return to the sauce pan. Take the now cooked chicken, remove the bones and dice into small inch cubes. Add to the broth along with the cooked noodles, corn, celery and parsley. Heat the soup until all ingredients are hot. Serve. ; name: mediterranean chicken and pasta ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, marinated artichoke hearts, olive oil, garlic cloves, chicken broth, dry white wine, fresh oregano, kalamata olive, campanelle pasta, feta cheese ; preparation:Drain the artichokes reserving the marinade. Cut any large pieces in half and set aside. In a large skillet heat the oil over med-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until no longer pink then add the garlic and cook till the chicken has browned to desired doneness. Add the reserved marinade, broth and wine. And if using the dried oregano. Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer, covered for 10 minutes. Stir in the artichokes and olives. Simmer for 5 to 10 minutes. Add the hot cooked pasta and simmer for 10 minutes or until sauce is absorbed. Serve with the crumbled feta cheese. Great with a salad. ; name: chicken vegetables and pasta soup ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, olive oil, onion, carrots, cauliflower florets, low-sodium low-fat chicken broth, dried herbs, pasta, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: wine and black olive pate ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, chopped tomatoes, olives in brine, cumin seed, celery salt, clear honey, red wine ; preparation:Heat the oil in a medium sized saucepan, add the cumin seeds and allow them to sizzle for a few seconds. Add the onions and garlic and saute gently for 3-5 minutes, or until soft. Add the tomatoes, olives, honey, a pinch of celery salt and honey. Mix together and cook gently for 10 minutes. Pour in the red wine, bring to the boil and simmer for another 20 minutes, uncovered. Turn up the heat and stir vigorously until the mixture has reduced to the consistency of a soft pate. This final stage will take about 5 minutes, but cooking time will depend on the thickness of the juice the chopped tomatoes are packed in. Turn into a serving dish and allow to cool. The flavours will intensify, the longer you leave the pate before eating. ; name: cubano marinade ; ingredients: white onion, garlic cloves, orange juice, lime juice, lemon juice, water, dried oregano, cumin seed, salt ; preparation:Put onion, garlic, orange juice, lime juice, lemon juice and water in a blender. Set blender on liquify setting and process until smooth. Add remaining ingredients to blender. Process for one minute more. Marinate meat for at least one hour in mixture. It is better to marinate meats overnight. Marinate fish for no longer than 20 minutes, or it will toughen. Brush meat frequently with the sauce while cooking. ; name: portuguese potato and cilantro soup ; ingredients: onions, garlic cloves, olive oil, potatoes, vegetables, salt, cayenne, cilantro ; preparation:In a large saucepan, saute the onions and garlic in 3 tablespoons of oil for 5 minutes, until limp, then add the last tablespoon of oil and the potatoes and stir-fry for a minute. Add the stock, cover, and simmer for 45 minutes, until the potatoes are mushy. Remove from heat and puree. Return the soup to the pot, season with salt and cayenne, and stir in the chopped cilantro. You can serve the soup cold--or reheat by slowly bringing it to a simmer. Ladle into soup plates and top with a sprinkling of cilantro or chives. ; name: moong sabzi lentil vegetable mix ; ingredients: dried lentils, onion, tomatoes, coriander, green chili pepper, cumin seed, vegetable oil, salt ; preparation:Heat oil in a pan. Add cumin seeds. Wait until they crackle before adding the chili. Now add onion, a pinch of salt, and saute on a low flame till the onion turns translucent. Add the tomato and a bit of salt and let it fry on a low flame until the water starts separating from the tomato. Add the moong dal and mix it well into the onion-tomato paste, add salt, let it fry for a few minutes. Add enough water to just about submerge the moong, cover the pan with a lid and leave it to cook on a low flame. Stir the mixture occasionally to make sure that the water does not evaporate leaving the moong stuck to the bottom of the pan. When all the water has disappeared, check to see that the moong is soft enough to be eaten. The mix should be dry and not liquid like indian dal normally is. Sprinkle the chopped corriander and serve hot with chappati or roti. ; name: spicy black beans ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic clove, ground cumin, black beans, red pepper flakes ; preparation:In a saucepan over medium heat, add the oil, onion, and garlic. Sweat the onions for about 2 minutes. Add the cumin and beans. Stir and add the red pepper flakes. Simmer for about 5 minutes. ; name: tarka dhall ; ingredients: lentils, water, salt, turmeric, onion, garlic cloves, dried red chilies, cumin seed, oil, garlic clove ; preparation:Wash lentils till the water runs clear. Drain the lentils. Place lentils in pan with the water, salt, turmeric, onion, garlic and chillis. Cook till the lentils are soft and sloppy. Heat the oil in a separate pan, fry the cumin seeds till they start to pop, add the garlic and cook 30 seconds. Serve the lentils with the fried garlic and cumin seeds poured over them. ; name: lebanese adas bis silq lentil swisschard soup ; ingredients: brown lentils, cold water, olive oil, swiss chard, onion, garlic cloves, cilantro, salt & pepper, lemon juice, lemon wedge ; preparation:Wash the lentils and place in a large sauce pan with the 6 cups water. Bring lentils to a boil, skimming when necessary, cover and simmer gently for approximately 1 hour or until the lentils are soft. In a separate pan heat the olive oil, add onions and cook until transparent, stir in the garlic and cook for a minute more. Add shredded swiss chard and stir fry until the leaves are wilted. Pour onions into the pot with the lentils, add cilantro, season with salt and pepper, add lemon juice and simmer for a further 15-20 minutes. Serve in soup bowls garnished with a wedge of lemon. Serve with some type of flatbread. ; name: green lentils with garlic onion madhur jaffrey ; ingredients: vegetable oil, whole cumin seed, garlic cloves, onion, green lentil, water, salt, cayenne ; preparation:

name: hot layered hero sandwich ; ingredients: honey mustard, deli turkey, genoa salami, mozzarella cheese, red onions, deli ham, monterey jack cheese, tomatoes, romaine leaves, bread ; preparation:Cut bread in half. Carefully hollow out part of the bottom and top of bread and discard this or give it to the birds. Spread mustard on cut sides of bread. On the bread bottom layer in the order given above except for the lettuce. The lettuce goes on after it comes out of the oven. Replace top and wrap in heavy-duty foil. Place on baking sheet. Bake at 450 degrees for 12-15 minutes or till heated through. Unwrap and put the lettuce on top of the tomato layer. Cut into wedges. ; name: cheddar apple ham sandwich ; ingredients: light mayonnaise, mustard, liquid honey, multi-grain bread, cheddar cheese, ham, apple ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine mayonnaise, mustard and honey. Spread on one side of each slice of bread. Layer cheese on 4 bread slices. Top each with 2 slices of ham, apple slices and remaining bread. Cut sandwiches in half. Use any apple slices left to garnish. ; name: todd s broccoli salad ; ingredients: mayonnaise, sugar, vinegar, broccoli, baby spinach, red onion, bacon bits, dark raisin, golden raisin ; preparation:Mix mayonnaise, sugar, and vinegar in a bowl. Set aside. In a large bowl, mix broccoli, spinach, onion, bacon bits, and raisins. Pour the dressing over the mixture and mix thoroughly but gently. Allow at least 1 hour of refrigeration before serving. ; name: cucumber side car ; ingredients: cucumbers, onion, mayonnaise, sugar, celery seed, salt and pepper ; preparation:Slice the cucumbers. Slice rings of onion. Add all ingredients and toss with vegetables. Make well in advance. The liquid from the cucumbers blend and make a sauce. ; name: waldorf salad ; ingredients: red apples, brown sugar, lemon juice, celery, pecans, mayonnaise ; preparation:Wash, core and dice unpeeled apples. Sprinkle lemon juice over them and toss together gently to coat, then sprinkle brown sugar over the apples and toss again. Chill for at least 20 minutes. Add celery and nuts then stir in mayonnaise, adding only enough for desired consistency. Serve on a bed of greens. ; name: chipotle rubbed salmon tacos ; ingredients: mayonnaise, fresh lime juice, dried chipotle powder, orange zest, sugar, salmon, extra virgin olive oil, corn tortillas, hass avocado, cabbage ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f in a small bowl, whisk the mayo with the lime juice. In another small bowl, combine the chipotle powder with the orange zest and sugar. Rub each salmon piece with 1 t. Olive oil and then the chipotle-orange zest mixture. Let sit 5 minutes. Wrap the tortillas in foil and bake for about 8 minutes, until they are soft and heated through. Meanwhile, heat a grill pan. Season the salmon with salt and grill over high heat, until nicely browned and just cooked through, about 3 minutes per side. Gently break each salmon piece in half. Spread the mashed avocado on the warm tortillas, top with the salmon, and the cabbage. Drizzle each taco with the lime-mayo and serve right away. ; name: hominy salad ; ingredients: white hominy, green pepper, onions, celery, sweet pickle relish, salt, celery seed, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise ; preparation:Rinse hominy and drain well. Chop green pepper, onion and celery. Toss hominy and veggies together. Stir in pickle relish, celery seed, salt cheese and mayonnaise. Chill and serve cold. ; name: honeydew ham salad ; ingredients: macaroni, ham, celery, red onion, mayonnaise, lime juice, honey, fresh cilantro, honeydew melon ; preparation:

name: maple and orange glazed chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, plain flour, salt and pepper, olive oil, maple syrup, whole grain mustard, orange, zest of, orange, juice of, soy sauce ; preparation:Pick any visible fat from off the chicken and wash and dry. Dredge the pieces of chicken in the seasoned flour, patting to remove excess flour. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet. Pan fry the chicken, presentation side first, in the hot olive oil until nicely browned on both sides. While the chicken is browning, combine the remaining ingredients in a measuring cup. Remove the browned chicken from the pan and place in a shallow casserole dish. Add the sauce ingredients, scraping to deglaze the pan, then pour over the chicken in the dish. Bake in a 350f oven for 20 minutes until nicely glazed and the chicken is cooked through. ; name: spinach and cheese stuffed chicken breast ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, fresh spinach, sour cream, cream cheese, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, onion, whole wheat bread crumbs, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Prepare chicken breasts by cutting a slit or flap in the largest part of the breast. Mix all filling ingredients and spoon into chicken breast. Place stuffed chicken breasts into a glass 9x13 inch pan. Sprinkle with bread crumb mixture and parmesan cheese. Bake at 400 degrees for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. ; name: nif s quick and tasty parmesan chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, milk, garlic powder, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, paprika, salt and pepper, grapeseed oil ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Pound the chicken breasts to an even thickness with the side of a mallet. Mix milk and garlic powder together in a shallow dish. Mix breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese and paprika in a separate shallow dish. Add salt and pepper to taste. Heat frying pan on medium heat and add oil. Coat the chicken in milk and press into the breadcrumb mixture. Brown both sides of the chicken in the hot pan, about 4 to 5 minutes on each side. Place chicken on a baking sheet.
