Bake until cooked through, about 20 minutes. ; name: dijon chicken kabobs ; ingredients: dijon mustard, green onion, fresh breadcrumbs, fresh parsley, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Combine mustard and onions in a bowl. In another bowl, combine breadcrumbs and parsley. Toss chicken chunks in mustard mixture. Coat chicken chunks with bread crumb mixture. Line a baking sheet with foil and coat the foil with nonstick cooking spray. Thread chicken onto metal or soaked wooden skewers, leave a small space between the chunks. Place the skewers on the prepared baking sheet. Bake uncovered at 450 degrees for 6 - 8 minutes or until the juices run clear. ; name: salad dressing chicken ; ingredients: skinless chicken breast halves, light honey dijon salad dressing, fresh rosemary, dried breadcrumbs, seasoning salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 475 f. Spray a roasting rack and shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray or grease lightly with some oil. Remove skin from chicken, rinse well, and pat dry. Using a pastry brush, coat both sides of each piece of chicken well with the salad dressing. Set breasts, meaty sides up, onto the sprayed roasting rack and sprinkle with rosemary. If you like, season to taste with a little seasoned salt& pepper. Sprinkle bread crumbs on top of the chicken. Bake 20 minutes, then flip pieces over using a pair of tongs and brush with some more salad dressing. Bake another 40 minutes or until cooked through. Cook time will vary based on the actual weight of your chicken pieces-allow 15 minutes per pound plus 10-15 extra minutes to calculate the total cooking time. ; name: chicken rollatini with cheese ham spinach ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, deli ham, baby spinach leaves, goat cheese, dijon mustard, seasoned bread crumbs, extra virgin olive oil, salt, pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: garlic chicken livers ; ingredients: chicken livers, flour, salt, pepper, butter, canola oil, onions, garlic cloves, sherry wine ; preparation:Mix the flour, salt and pepper in a brown bag or plastic bag. Put the chicken livers, a few at a time, in the bag and shake until completely coated. In a heavy fry pan, heat butter and oil. Cook livers 8 to 10 minutes, remove from pan and add chopped onions and garlic. When onions are transparent, return the livers to the pan. Add the sherry. Cook over a high flame for 1 to 2 minutes. Good served over rice. ; name: maple and orange glazed chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, plain flour, salt and pepper, olive oil, maple syrup, whole grain mustard, orange, zest of, orange, juice of, soy sauce ; preparation:Pick any visible fat from off the chicken and wash and dry. Dredge the pieces of chicken in the seasoned flour, patting to remove excess flour. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet. Pan fry the chicken, presentation side first, in the hot olive oil until nicely browned on both sides. While the chicken is browning, combine the remaining ingredients in a measuring cup. Remove the browned chicken from the pan and place in a shallow casserole dish. Add the sauce ingredients, scraping to deglaze the pan, then pour over the chicken in the dish. Bake in a 350f oven for 20 minutes until nicely glazed and the chicken is cooked through. ; name: portuguese chicken with peas frango com ervilhas ; ingredients: chicken pieces, salt & freshly ground black pepper, olive oil, butter, onions, chicken stock, port wine, fresh oregano, green peas ; preparation:Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Heat the oil and butter in a large heavy baking dish over moderate heat and brown the chicken on all sides. Transfer the chicken to a plate and set aside. Saute the onions in the same baking dish until tender but not brown, about 10 minutes. Stir in the stock, wine, and oregano and return the chicken to the skillet. Cover and simmer over low heat until the chicken is tender, 45 to 60 minutes. Adjust the seasoning with salt and pepper and add the peas about 15 minutes before serving. ; name: frog hollow chicken sandwiches ; ingredients: chicken breast fillet, white wine, celery, celery leaves, fresh chives, mayonnaise, lemon, juice of, salt and pepper, bread ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 c. Place chicken in baking dish with celery leaves and wine. Cover dish with foil and cook chicken 20 - 30 minutes. Remove from oven and allow to cool. Drain. Roughly chop chicken. Mix in a large bowl with with all other ingredients, adding enough mayonnaise to moisten chicken and bind ingredients. Cut crusts off of bread and spoon mixture on the centre of half the bread and spread to the edge with knife. Top with remaining half of bread, pressing down gently. Cut each sandwich into 3 fingers. Place in baking dish cover with a damp tea towel and seal with plastic wrap. Sandwiches can be stored in refrigerator up to 6 hours. ; name: french chicken thighs in cilantro sauce ; ingredients: corn oil, chicken thighs, onion, garlic, dry white wine, fresh cilantro, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil on large nonstick frying pan. Add thighs in one layer and saute them over medium to high heat for 4 minutes on each side, until nicely browned. Remove the chicken to a platter. Add the onions to the drippings in the skillet. Saute for 1 minute. Stir in the garlic, wine, and cilantro stems and saute for 10 seconds longer. Return chicken to frying pan, add salt and pepper, and bring surrounding liquid to a boil. Cover the pan, reduce heat, and bring to a slow boil for 15 minutes. Stir in cilantro leaves. Serve 2 chicken thighs per person. ; name: mediterranean pasta ; ingredients: linguine, bacon, boneless chicken breast, salt, diced tomatoes with juice, dried rosemary, feta cheese, pitted black olives, artichoke hearts ; preparation:Bring large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add linguine and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente. Drain. Season chicken with salt. Stir chicken with bacon in a large skillet or saucepan. Add tomatoe and rosemary, simmer 20 minutes. Stir in feta cheese, olives and artichoke hearts and cook until heated through. Toss with fresh cooked pasta and serve warm. Garnish with extra feta if desired. ; name: baked haddock in cream sauce iceland ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, cheddar cheese, haddock fillets, sherry wine, paprika ; preparation:Melt butter in pan over medium heat and stir in flour, salt, pepper, and nutmeg whisking until smooth. Add milk slowly, whisking to get out any lumps and make smooth. Add the cheese, stirring until melted. Place haddock in greased baking dish. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Pour sauce over haddock. Drizzle over sherry and sprinkle with paprika. Bake at 325f. For 45 minutes. Serve and enjoy. ; name: tapas chicken with sherry pechuga de pollo con jerez ; ingredients: flour, chicken breast, olive oil, salt and pepper, fresh thyme, green olives, sherry wine ; preparation:

name: breaded n baked zucchini chips ; ingredients: zucchini, egg, milk, garlic, italian breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Combine egg, milk and garlic in a shallow dish and set aside for about 15 minutes to let flavors combine. Combine breadcrumbs, cheese, parsley and pepper in another shallow dish. Dip zucchini slices into egg mixture, then into crumbs and place on a baking sheet that has been sprayed with nonstick cooking spray. Bake for 10 minutes, then turn over and bake for 5 minutes more or until brown and crispy. ; name: zucchini and carrots with garlic and herbs ; ingredients: olive oil, carrot, zucchini, garlic, salt and pepper, fresh parsley, fresh basil leaf, fresh oregano ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over moderate heat. Add carrots, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately. ; name: linguine with fresh tomatoes olives and feta cheese ; ingredients: linguine, tomatoes, fresh basil, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, black olives, feta cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, combine tomato, basil, olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper in mixing bowl. Drain pasta and place in large serving bowl. Top with tomato mixture, sprinkle with feta cheese and olives. Serve. ; name: mediterranean marinated vegetable salad ; ingredients: tomatoes, green pepper, yellow pepper, zucchini, red onion, italian dressing, fresh basil, garlic cloves, italian cheese blend ; preparation:Toss tomatoes, peppers, zucchini and onions in large bowl. Combine dressing, basil and garlic. Pour over vegetable mixture, toss to coat. Add cheese, mix lightly. Refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving. Makes 8 servings, 1 cup each. ; name: simple zucchini pasta by mark bittman ; ingredients: salt and pepper, extra virgin olive oil, zucchini, onion, thyme, tomatoes, pasta, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Bring a large pot of water to a boil and salt it. Put olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add zucchini, onion and thyme, and cook, stirring occasionally. Add salt and pepper and adjust heat so onion and zucchini release their liquid without browning. Cook for about 20 minutes, or until very tender. Add tomatoes and their liquid to zucchini and raise heat a bit so mixture bubbles. Cook pasta until it is nearly but not quite tender. If sauce threatens to dry out, add a little pasta cooking water. Drain pasta and finish cooking it in sauce. Serve, garnished with parsley or parmesan. ; name: ravioli with garbanzos and spinach ; ingredients: cheese ravioli, olive oil, garlic cloves, garbanzo beans, summer squash, roma tomatoes, fresh thyme, black pepper, fresh spinach ; preparation:Cook ravioli, drain, cover and keep warm. Meanwhile, in a large skillet heat oil over medium-high heat. Add garlic and cook, stirring constantly, for 15 seconds. Add garbanzos, squash, tomatoes, thyme and pepper. Sstir 4-5 minutes, until squash is tender. Add the cooked ravioli to bean mixture and toss gently to combine. Arrange spinach on plate and top with ravioli. Fresh ravioli may be used in place of dry, but you would want more by weight to feed the same number of people. ; name: zucchini medley ; ingredients: zucchini, mushroom, green pepper, onion, olive oil, garlic, salt and pepper, fresh parsley, tomato sauce ; preparation:Heat oil in a large fry pan, add the vegetables and garlic, salt and pepper to taste. Saute to desired doneness. Add tomato sauce, and simmer for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with fresh parsley you can serve this on rice, or as a side dish, hot or cold or luke warm. You can put this on a ham sandwich. Yummm. You can put this in an omelette and top with mozzarella and parmesan. You can add hot sauce or peppers to your liking. This is very versatile. ; name: gnocchi with cheese prosciutto and basil ; ingredients: gnocchi, garlic, fresh basil, fontina cheese, parmesan cheese, prosciutto, olive oil, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: grandma s slow cooker barbecue pork chops ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, tomato sauce, lemon juice, brown sugar ; preparation:Mix tomato sauce, lemon juice, and brown sugar in a small bowl. Pour half of the sauce mixture into the crock pot. Layer pork chops in crock pot, and pour the rest of the sauce mixture on top. Make sure that the sauce is covering the pork chops. Cook on high for 3 hours or on low for 5 hours. ; name: chili rub for pork ; ingredients: pork chops, brown sugar, ground cumin, chili powder, salt, vegetable oil ; preparation:Trim fat and slash edges at 1 inch intervals. In bowl, combine dry ingredients. Stir in oil. Rub all over chops. Grease grill and cook until juices run clear. Approx 8 minutes. ; name: pork chop and apple rice skillet ; ingredients: butter, pork chops, water, applesauce, red apple, cinnamon, minute rice ; preparation:Melt butter in a large skillet on medium heat. Add pork chops. Cook 5 minutes on each side or until cooked. Remove pork chop from skillet. Add watr, applesauce, apple, cinnamon to skillet. Stir. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice. Top with chops. Cover and cook on low heat for 5 minutes. Let stand 5 minutes. ; name: rancher s pork chops crockette ; ingredients: lean pork chops, onion, green pepper rings, catsup, brown sugar ; preparation:Brown pork chops to remove excess fat. Place onion slices in bottom of crockette. Place pork chops on top of onion slices. Top with green pepper rings, catsup and brown sugar. Cover and cook 7 to 9 hours. ; name: basil spinach tomato pork strips ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, basil, pepper, salt, frozen chopped spinach, white onion, diced tomatoes, butter ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350. Cut the pork chops into strips. Sprinkle with basil, pepper, and salt. Top with veggies, and pats of butter or margarine. Cover with aluminum foil and bake for 40 minutes, or until pork is fully cooked. ; name: apple butter ribs crock pot ; ingredients: country-style boneless pork ribs, salt, pepper, onion, apple butter, brown sugar, liquid smoke, garlic cloves ; preparation:Rub salt and pepper on ribs. Place in crock pot. Cover with onions. Mix remaining ingredients and pour over onions. Cover and cook on low for 9 hours. ; name: crock pot pork apple and cranberry stew ; ingredients: boneless pork roast, salt, pepper, tart apples, sweet onion, cranberries, apple cider, chicken broth, brown sugar, dried rubbed sage ; preparation:Season pork roast with salt and pepper. Brown on all sides in a skillet. Meanwhile, put a layer of apples on the bottom of the crock pot. When the meat is browned, throw it on top of the apples. Throw in the rest of the apples, the onion, and the cranberries around and on top of the pork. Mix the apple cider, the chicken broth, the brown sugar and the sage. Pour over the pork and fruits. Cover and cook on high for 6-7 hours until the pork falls apart when you poke it with a fork. Shred the pork and mix well with the sauce. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve over hot buttered noodles. ; name: apples and cinnamon pork chop bake ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, cinnamon, margarine, apples, brown sugar ; preparation:

name: simple black beans ; ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, fresh thyme, dried black beans, bay leaves, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large pot, saute onion in oil over medium-high heat until the onion is soft, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and thyme. Cook until fragrant, 1 minute. Add the drained beans, bay leaves and enough water to cover beans. Bring to a boil over high heat, reduce temperature to simmer, cover and cook for 40 to 50 minutes or until beans are tender but not mushy. Check often and add from 1 to 2 cups additional water if beans start to cook dry. Drain beans, remove the bay leaves and fresh thyme springs, season with salt and pepper to taste. Please. If they are salted before they will not soften. When cool, divide into 1 cup servings and freeze in rigid container or vacuum pack in small bags. ; name: soupy black beans ; ingredients: olive oil, scallions, garlic cloves, green chilies, black beans, water, salsa, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add scallions and garlic cloves and saute until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add black beans and water. Increase heat and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add salsa and stir until heated through. Add salt and pepper to taste. ; name: roasted spicy chickpeas ; ingredients: olive oil, roasted garlic cloves, cumin, cayenne pepper, garbanzo beans, reduced-fat feta cheese, dried thyme ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Pour the olive oil into an ovenproof pan. Stir the garlic, cumin, and cayenne pepper into the olive oil and mix well. Add the garbanzo beans and toss to coat evenly. Bake in preheated oven until garbanzo beans turn golden, about 30 minutes, shaking every 10 minutes. Remove from oven, and sprinkle with feta cheese and thyme. Serve warm. ; name: fagiolini con pomedore ; ingredients: green beans, olive oil, garlic cloves, diced tomatoes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Add green beans to a pot of water and cook until the beans are tender---about 20 to 30 minutes, and drain well. I believe that canned green beans could be used. In a frying pan, add olive oil and garlic. Saute the garlic, but make sure the garlic does not get brown in color. Strain the tomatoes and discard liquid. Smash up the tomatoes with a fork and drain away any excess juice. Add the tomatoes to the olive oil & garlic and season with salt and pepper. Cook for 10 to 15 minutes. While the tomatoes are cooking, the water will begin to evaporate, and you will notice more of the olive oil. That is when the sauce is ready. Add the cooked green beans to the frying pan and incorporate the sauce with the greens beans, serve. ; name: white bean parsley and garlic mash ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, cannellini beans, vegetable stock, flat leaf parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil in a saucepan and fry the onion gently for 5 minutes. Add the garlic and cook for another 2 mins until soft. Add the stock or water to loosen. Stir in the parsley and seasoning. Serve. ; name: roasted napa cabbage ; ingredients: vegetable oil, garlic cloves, napa cabbage, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil in a skillet on low. Add the garlic cloves and cook very gently for 15 minutes. Discard the garlic and toss the cabbage with the oil, salt and pepper. Preheat your oven to 450. Place the cabbage on a baking sheet and bake for about 15 minutes or until the tops of the cabbage pieces are browned. Serve hot. ; name: lentils with onion and garlic ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, dried red chili, green lentil, water ; preparation:Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top. ; name: quick green rice ww ; ingredients: canola oil, fresh snow peas, garlic clove, cooked brown rice, fresh cilantro ; preparation:

name: chocolate cherry loaf ; ingredients: flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking powder, salt, baking soda, cherries, sugar, sour cream, eggs, unsalted butter ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f grease a 5-by-9-inch loaf pan. In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, salt and baking soda. In a medium saucepan, combine the whole cherries and the sugar. Using a potato masher, crush the cherries. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, for 15 minutes. Transfer to a large bowl and let cool. Whisk in the sour cream and eggs. Stir in the flour mixture. Fold the chopped cherries into the batter. Gradually stir in the butter. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan, then bake until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 55 minutes. Let cool in the pan for 15 minutes, then turn out onto a rack to cool completely. ; name: southern style pecan fudge ; ingredients: powdered sugar, butter, cocoa powder, milk, vanilla, salt, pecans ; preparation:Butter a 9x5-inch pan. In a medium saucepan, heat sugar, butter, cocoa, milk, vanilla and salt over low heat, stirring until smooth. Stir in chopped pecans. Spread quickly in a buttered 9x5-inch loaf pan. Cool. Cut into squares. ; name: chocolate pudding cake low calorie ; ingredients: flour, sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking powder, salt, nonfat milk, unsweetened applesauce, vanilla extract, boiling water, light brown sugar ; preparation:Spray a 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan with cooking spray and set aside. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, cocoa, baking powder, and salt. Whisk in remaining cake ingredients, blending thoroughly. Pour into baking pan, spreading evenly. In a large bowl, whisk together pudding ingredients until sugar and cocoa are dissolved. Pour carefully over batter. Pudding layer will be thin and runny. Bake for 35-40 minutes, or until top is firm to the touch. Let cake rest for 15 minutes before cutting. Cover and refrigerate leftovers for up to 7 days or wrap tightly and freeze for up to 2 months. ; name: gluten free cocoa brownies ; ingredients: butter, cocoa powder, sugar, eggs, vanilla, gluten-free flour, salt, xanthan gum ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees and grease an 88x2 pan or 12 muffin tins. Melt butter in a sauce pan or in a 1 quart container in the microwave. Remove from heat. Add cocoa until blended, then add sugar and mix well. Add eggs, one at a time. Stir in vanilla, flour, salt & xanthan gum do not overmix. Bake 25-30 minutes. Cool and serve. ; name: betty crocker fudge brownies homemade ; ingredients: sugar, flour, cocoa, salt, baking powder, eggs, oil, vanilla ; preparation:Mix all these ingredients together with a whisk and dump them into a ziploc to save. Should be good in the pantry for 6 months. When making the brownies, preheat oven to 350f. Add eggs, oil and vanilla and mix with a fork til just blended. Do not overmix. Pour into a silicone or buttered 9x9 pan. Bake for 20-25 minutes. ; name: mocha butterballs ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, vanilla extract, instant coffee granules, hot water, flour, cocoa, salt, walnuts, icing sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f degrees. Have ungreased cookie sheets ready. Beat butter, sugar and vanilla together until fluffy. Dissolve coffee in hot water and stir into butter mixture. Sift flour, cocoa and salt into mixture and add nuts. Stir to blend well. Shape into one-inch balls and put on cookie sheets. Bake 15 minutes or until set. Roll in icing sugar while warm. Let cool and roll in icing sugar again before storing in a container with a tight lid. ; name: chocolate pudding low fat ; ingredients: sugar, cocoa powder, cornstarch, nonfat milk, bittersweet chocolate, vanilla ; preparation:In a saucepan, stir together sugar, cocoa, and cornstarch. While stirring, gradually add milk and cook until thickened and bubbly, about 5 minutes. Reduce heat to medium low and add bitterseet chocolate. Cook, stirring, another 3 minutes. Remove from heat and cool 5 minutes. Add vanilla. Pour into dessert dishes and serve or lay plastic on pudding surface and refrigerate. ; name: mom s chocolate gravy ; ingredients: granulated sugar, butter, milk, flour, unsweetened cocoa powder ; preparation:

name: smooth golden fudge ; ingredients: evaporated milk, sugar, salt, vanilla extract, water, golden syrup, margarine, liquid glucose, nuts, chocolate ; preparation:Heat the milk, water, syrup, glucose, salt, margarine and sugar in a heavy based pan, untit the sugar has dissolved, and the margarine has melted. Stir constantly. Bring to the boil, and boil rapidly. Stir constantly, otherwise it will catch on the bottom of the pan. Boil until the sugar thermometer reads 115oc, which is the soft ball stage. Remove from heat, and add vanilla, but do not stir in. Leave the pan on a side to cool to 45oc. This could take quite a while. Beat until thick, and it looses its gloss. Scrape into a prepared tin to cool. Leave in the fridge for 3 hours, or until firm. Dip in melted chocolate and roll in chopped nuts for an added touch. ; name: healthier french toast ; ingredients: eggs, milk, maple syrup, cinnamon, vanilla extract, bread, oil, powdered sugar, carrot, sweet potato ; preparation:Combine eggs, milk, orange puree, maple syrup or honey, cinnamon, and vanilla in a large shallow dish. Dip bread until soaked on both sides. Cook in skillet over medium heat. Use a small amount of oil to keep the toast from sticking. Allow the first side to brown, then flip to brown the second side of the bread. Dust with powdered sugar or top with your favorite syrup. ; name: easy caramel sorbet ; ingredients: sugar, water, salt, vanilla extract ; preparation:In dry heavy saucepan, cook sugar, alone, undisturbed. Over moderate heat until it begins to melt. Continue cooking, stirring with a fork, until it is melted completely& a deep caramel. Remove from heat& carefully add water down side of pan. Return to heat& cook caramel, stirring, until dissolved completely. Stir in salt& vanilla extract& chill until cold. Freeze sorbet in an ice-cream maker. ; name: vanilla coke syrup non alcoholic ; ingredients: sugar, water, salt, vanilla extract ; preparation:Mix sugar, water and salt in a small saucepan. Heat to boil, then boil gently for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract. Use one shot per can of coke over ice for vanilla coke. Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: granny s fudge ; ingredients: sugar, butter, evaporated milk, chocolate chips, miniature marshmallows, walnuts, vanilla extract ; preparation:Combine the sugar, butter and milk in large saucepan. Let boil stirring frequently at medium heat until soft ball stage. Add chocolate chips. Remove from heat. Stir until chips dissolve. Add marshmallows, walnuts and vanilla. Stir well. Pour into 9 x 13 pan. Put in refrigerator to cool. Cut when hard. ; name: mrs margaret s chocolate fudge ; ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, butter, salt, milk chocolate candy bar, chocolate chips, marshmallow whip, walnuts, vanilla extract ; preparation:Butter a 9 x 13 glass pan. Set aside. Boil sugar, milk, butter and salt in a medium pan over medium heat 6 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. In a large glass or metal bowl, break up hershey bar. Add chocolate chips and marshmallow whip. Pour bowling sugar mixture into the bowl and mix until the chocolate is melted. Mix in chopped nuts and vanilla. Pour mixture into the 9 x 13 glass pan. Let cool. Invert cooled mixture onto waxed paper and cut into squares. ; name: cranberry maple butter ; ingredients: water, fresh cranberries, maple syrup, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, vanilla extract ; preparation:Combine the water and cranberries in a large saucepan or dutch oven. Bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer for 5 minutes or until cranberries pop. Place cranberry mixture in a blender or food processor, and process until smooth. Combine cranberry mixture, maple syrup, sugar, and cinnamon in pan. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Simmer, uncovered 25 minutes or until mixture is thick, stirring frequently. Stir in vanilla. Cool. Store in refrigerator up to 2 months. ; name: summertime soy granita ; ingredients: sugar, water, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, vanilla-flavored soymilk, slivered almonds, mint sprig ; preparation:

name: chipotle corn muffins ; ingredients: baking soda, baking powder, salt, yellow cornmeal, eggs, plain yogurt, oil, chipotle chiles in adobo, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 425 degrees. Spray muffin tins lightly with oil. Mix together baking soda, baking powder, salt, and cornmeal in a small bowl. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs with yogurt. Stir in the chipotles& cheese. Then gently stir the egg mix into the cornmeal mix just until combined. Fill the muffin tins with the batter& bake for 10-15 minutes for regular sized muffins or 7-10 minutes for mini-muffins. ; name: tasty triple corn fritters ; ingredients: flour, yellow cornmeal, baking powder, sugar, salt, eggs, milk, oil, cream-style corn, whole kernel corn ; preparation:Lightly spoon flour into measuring cup. Combine flour, cornmeal, baking powder, sugar and salt in a medium bowl. Combine eggs, milk, oil and cream style corn in a large bowl. Blend in dry ingredients, stirring just until moistened. Stir in whole kernel corn. In deep fryer or heavy saucepan drop batter by tablespoonfuls and fry in 2-3 inches of hot oil or fat for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden brown. Drain on paper towles. ; name: banana oatmeal muffins ; ingredients: flour, brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, quick oats, plain yogurt, banana, oil, egg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Grease a muffin pan. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, brown sugar, baking powder and soda. In another bowl stir together oats and yogurt, stirring in banana, oil and egg. Stir mixture into flour mixture and stir until moistened. Put in muffin pans and bake for 20- 25 minute until done. ; name: sweet corn pancakes ; ingredients: eggs, half-and-half, sour cream, flour, baking soda, baking powder, corn, vegetable oil ; preparation:Beat the egg whites until they hold soft peaks when the beaters are lifted up. In another bowl, combine the egg yolks, half-and-half, and sour cream. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the egg yolk mixture. Add the beaten egg whites, using a gentle stirring motion to combine them with the yolk mixture. Add the corn and stir gently. Pour a small amount of oil into a non-stick pan and heat it over medium heat. Drop batter, about 1 tablespoon at a time, into the pan for each pancake and cook until golden brown on each side. Serve with butter if desired. ; name: mary s skillet cornbread ; ingredients: cornmeal, flour, baking soda, salt, sugar, egg, butter, buttermilk ; preparation:In a mixing bowl. Stir corn meal, flour, soda, salt sugar into pea size shapes. In a 450 degree oven in a heavy skillet heat butter till melted and sizzling but not brown. Meanwhile add egg and buttermilk to dry ingredients beat until completely combined. Stir in butter and pour into hot skillet until golden brown and bake for 20-25 minute. ; name: honey buttermilk cornbread ; ingredients: cornmeal, flour, baking powder, salt, egg, buttermilk, oil, honey ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. And grease a 8 inch square baking pan. Sift the cornmeal, flour, baking powder and salt together. In a seperate bowl mix the egg, buttermilk oil and honey. Add the egg mixture to the dry ingredients. Beat until smooth. Pour into pan. Bake 20 minutes edges may start to brown a little. ; name: no pudge brownie clone ; ingredients: sugar, flour, cocoa, egg whites, cornstarch, baking soda, salt, non-fat vanilla yogurt, nonstick cooking spray ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all dry ingredients. Add yogurt and mix well. Batter will be very thick. Spray an 8x8 pan with nonstick cooking spray. Spread batter evenly. Bake for 30-35 minutes. Remove and cool. Dip a knife in warm water and cut into 16 squares. ; name: iron chef cornbread ; ingredients: yellow cornmeal, baking powder, salt, baking soda, eggs, creamed corn, canola oil, plain fat-free yogurt ; preparation:

name: chocolate chip waffles low fat and healthy ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, egg whites, nonfat milk, vanilla, chocolate chips ; preparation:Sift dry ingrediants in one bowl, and, using a fork, lightly beat the wet ingrediants in a serapate bowl. Add the dry into the wet and add the chocolate chips, mixing until just combined. Pour into a preheated greased waffle iron, and i cook mine for 3-4 minutes with my waffle iron. This recipe yeilds 4 square waffles for me. These freeze well. ; name: cinnamon belgian waffles ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, ground cinnamon, baking powder, granulated sugar, salt, eggs, vanilla extract, oil, milk ; preparation:Mix all of the dry ingredients together in a large bowl and whisk to blend, then set aside. In a small bowl, beat the egg whites until stiff peaks form. In another bowl, add the egg yolks, vanilla, oil and milk, whisking slightly to combine. Add the egg yolk mixture to the dry ingredients and beat until well mixed. Fold in the egg whites just until combined. Make waffles according to the machine instructions. ; name: sugar hill inn s sour cream maple muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, maple syrup, sour cream, egg, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Butter standard muffin tins. In a small bowl, stir and toss the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. In a medium bowl, beat the butter until smooth then slowly add the maple syrup, beating constantly. Beat in the sour cream and egg. Fold in the raisins. Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, and stir until just blended. Spoon mixture into the prepared muffin tins, filling each cup about two-thirds full. Bake until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 15 - 18 minutes. Cool in the tin for 5 minutes, then remove. ; name: chewy chocolate cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, light corn syrup, egg whites ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Spray cookie sheet with cooking spray. In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg whites until throughly blended. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls, about 1 inch apart onto prepared sheets. Bake 7 to 9 minutes, or until set. Remove cookies to wire rack to cool completely. ; name: bunches of bananas bread ; ingredients: bananas, sugar substitute, vanilla, all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon ; preparation:In one bowl, mash the bananas until smooth and add the sugar and vanilla, blending until incorporated. In another bowl, mix the dry ingredients until well blended and add to the bananas. Mix these thoroughly. Pour this into a 9x13 glass baking dish or a regular loaf pan. Bake at 350 for an hour. ; name: blackberry vanilla muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, granulated sugar, egg, milk, butter, vanilla, frozen blackberries ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. In a large bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar. In another bowl, beat together the egg, milk, melted butter, and vanilla. Pour the egg mixture into the flour mixture. Stir quickly and just enough to moisten the dry ingredients. Do not overmix - the batter will be lumpy. Stir in the frozen blackberries. Fill greased muffin tins. Bake for 22 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: white chocolate chunk muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, buttermilk, butter, eggs, vanilla, white chocolate ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Grease 12 large muffin cups. Combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt in a large bowl. Combine buttermilk, butter, eggs and vanilla in small bowl until blended. Stir into flour mixture just until moistened. Fold in white chocolate. Spoon into prepeared muffin cups, filling half full. Bake 25-30 minutes or until wooden toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in pan on wire rack for 5 minutes. Remove from pan. Cool on wire rack 10 minutes. Serve warm or completely cool. ; name: banana bread ii ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, applesauce, granulated sugar, egg whites, bananas, vanilla extract ; preparation:

name: spritz cookies ii ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, almond extract ; preparation:Stir together flour and baking powder. Beat butter for 30 seconds. Add sugar and beat until fluffy. Add egg, vanilla and almond extract. Beat well. Gradually add dry ingredients to beaten mixture, beating till well combined. Do not chill. Force dough through a cookie press onto an ungreased cookie sheet. If desired, sprinkle with colored sugars or with ground almonds dyed red or green with food coloring. Bake in a 400 oven for 7-8 minutes. Cool on wire rack. ; name: peach sunshine tea cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, vanilla, egg, flour, baking powder, peaches, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 grease a 9 inch springform pan in small bowl, blend butter and sugar, then add vanilla and egg. Beat well add flour, baking powder, and salt to butter mixture. Blend well. Spread dough over bottom and 1 inch up sides of pan. Over dough, arrange 5-6 peach slices in center to create a circular shape place rest of slices around center circle to create the effect of sunrays. Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon. Bake 35-45 minutes cool 10 minutes then remove the sides of pan. ; name: absolutely best brownies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, cocoa, salt, self-rising flour, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease and flour a 9 x 9-inch pan. In a bowl, beat together the butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix well. Combine the cocoa, salt, and flour together. Stir into the sugar mixture. Stir in the walnuts. Spread evenly into prepared pan. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until firm. ; name: basic sugar cut out cookies ; ingredients: sugar, egg, vanilla, butter, shortening, plain flour, chocolate chips ; preparation:Cream together sugar and butter. Beat in the egg and vanilla. If using spices add them at this point, i like a combination of 1 tsp ground ginger, 1 tsp of cinnamon and half a tsp of allspice. But have also made them using a cup of chocolate chips. Add in the flour a cup at a time. Roll out between two sheets of baking paper and place onto ungreased cookie sheets. I roll out about half a centimetre thick when cutting out and put on an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 400 for about 6-10 minutes, the time taken depends on the size of cutters you have used. Cool for a minute on the cookie sheet then transfer to a wire rack before decorating. ; name: impossible blender pie ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, butter, flour, salt, baking powder, milk, coconut, vanilla, ground nutmeg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Put all ingredients in a blender. Blend until all ingredients are well blended. Pour mixture into a 10-inch, slightly greased, pie pan. Bake for 1 hour. May be eaten warm, but refrigerate any leftovers. ; name: betty crocker fudge brownies homemade ; ingredients: sugar, flour, cocoa, salt, baking powder, eggs, oil, vanilla ; preparation:Mix all these ingredients together with a whisk and dump them into a ziploc to save. Should be good in the pantry for 6 months. When making the brownies, preheat oven to 350f. Add eggs, oil and vanilla and mix with a fork til just blended. Do not overmix. Pour into a silicone or buttered 9x9 pan. Bake for 20-25 minutes. ; name: hausfreunde friends of the house cookies ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, baking chocolate, almonds, raisins, flour, baking powder, milk, powdered sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Beat the eggs with the sugar till foamy. Add the remaining ingredients one by one, ending with the flour and baking powder together. Spread dough into a large greased 11 inch baking pan. Bake for 28-32 minutes. The top should look dry and crusty with some nice cracks. When done, ice with a mixture of milk and powdered sugar. Let cool 2 hours or more and cut into small squares. Stored in a cookie tin and refrigerated, these bars keep for quite a while. ; name: chocolate chews ; ingredients: baking chocolate, butter, eggs, sugar, vanilla, cake flour, nuts ; preparation:

name: janie s hamburger soup ; ingredients: hamburger, onion, v8 vegetable juice, water, tomato soup, mixed vegetables, italian seasoning, salt, ground black pepper, pasta ; preparation:Saute onion. Brown ground beef with onion. Add remaining ingredients. Simmer on low until pasta is cooked. 2-3 hours. ; name: delicious vegetable beef soup ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, garlic, dried italian herb seasoning, stewed tomatoes, beef broth, frozen mixed vegetables, conchiglie, parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a soup pot or large saucepan, cook the ground beef, onion, and garlic over medium heat, stirring often, for about 8 minutes. Add the dried herb seasoning and continue to cook for 1 minute. Place the tomatoes in a blender and break them into smaller chunks and then add to the pot. Add the water-mixed beef broth or beef cube and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer, partially covered for 15 minutes so the flavors can blend. Add the vegetables and conchiglie. Simmer uncovered over medium heat until they are tender, maybe 10 minutes. Season the soup with salt and pepper and stir in the parsley. ; name: mediterranean pork with orzo ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, lemon pepper, olive oil, water, orzo pasta, salt, fresh spinach, grape tomatoes, kalamata olive, feta cheese ; preparation:Bring water and salt to boil. Add orzo, cook 8 minutes. While orzo is cooking, cut pork into 1 inch cubes. Toss with lemon pepper. Heat olive oil in skillet, saute pork until done, 8-10 minutes. Turn down to low. Add olives, spinach and tomatoes. Cook 2 minutes until spinach is wilted. Drain orzo, toss with pork mixture. Top with feta. ; name: baked panko chicken parmesan ; ingredients: chicken tenderloins, parmesan cheese, panko breadcrumbs, italian seasoning, salt, black pepper, garlic powder, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Beat eggs in a bowl. Combine cheeses, bread crumbs and spices in a separate bowl. Dip chicken pieces in egg, then bread crumb mixture, then egg, then bread crumb mixture again. Place chicken on a cookie sheet and bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes. Serve over pasta with marinara sauce and mozzarella. Or place chicken on a hoagie roll with marinara and mozzarella for a chicken parmesan sub. Also great for dipping with marinara or ranch. ; name: creamy white bean soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, carrot, garlic cloves, cannellini beans, water, italian seasoning, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a 4 quart saucepan on medium high heat. Add onion, carrots and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally until they are soft. Add beans, water, and seasonings. Stir and reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes or until carrots are tender. Take half of soup and blend in blender until smooth. Return soup to bean mixture in pan and stir. Ladle into bowls and drizzle with olive oil before serving. Top with freshly grated parmesan cheese, if desired. ; name: quick easy tuscan bean soup ; ingredients: baby carrots, onion, olive oil, cannellini beans, reduced-sodium chicken broth, dried italian seasoning, baby spinach, cracked black pepper ; preparation:In a dutch oven, cook and stir carrots and onion in 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium-high heat 3 minutes. Add beans, broth and seasoning. Bring to boiling. Slightly mash beans. Reduce heat. Simmer, uncovered, 8 minutes, stirring occasionally. Meanwhile, in large skillet, heat remaining oil over medium-high heat. Add spinach and toss 1-2 minutes, just until wilted. Remove from heat. Ladle soup, top with the spinach and sprinkle with the pepper. ; name: oven roasted tomato sauce ; ingredients: tomatoes, garlic cloves, dried italian herb seasoning, sugar, salt, black pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat the oven 400f. Slice tomatoes in half, set aside. Pour the olive oil onto a large baking sheet and spread it around the sheet. Sprinkle evenly the garlic, herbs, sugar, salt and pepper over the oil. Place the tomatoes cut side down onto the baking sheet. Roast for about 30-40 minutes, or until the skins start to lift from the tomatoes. Allow to cool. Remove the skins and put the sauce into a large bowl and break up the flesh with a fork. Reheat sauce if using immediately. ; name: simplified choucroute garni for crock pot pork chops sauerk ; ingredients: dried italian seasoning, salt, pepper, potatoes, boneless pork chops, tart apples, sauerkraut, kielbasa, sweet white wine, frozen peas ; preparation:

name: so easy homemade truffles ; ingredients: semisweet chocolate, cream cheese, powdered sugar, vanilla, ground nuts ; preparation:Melt chocolate in microwave on med. Power. Stir occasionally. Set aside. Beat cream cheese until smooth. Gradually add sugar, beating until well blended. Add melted chocolate and vanilla, mix well. Refrigerate for 1 hour. Roll into 1 inch balls. Roll in nuts or coconut. Store in refrigerator. ; name: brownie krispies ; ingredients: milk chocolate chips, butter, light corn syrup, vanilla, peanut butter, powdered sugar, crispy rice cereal, pecans ; preparation:In large saucepan, combine chocolate chips, butter and corn syrup. Stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Remove from heat and add vanilla, peanut butter and powdered sugar. Mix well. Stir in cereal and pecans and mix ell. Spread into greased 9x13 pan. Chill until firm. ; name: toffee cookie bites with saltine crackers ; ingredients: saltine crackers, butter, light brown sugar, milk chocolate chips, pecans ; preparation:Cover bottom of a 13- x 9-inch aluminum foil-lined pan with crackers. Microwave butter and brown sugar in a microwave-safe glass bowl on high for 3 to 4 minutes or until sugar dissolves, stirring occasionally. Pour butter mixture over crackers. Bake at 325 for 15 minutes or until bubbly. Remove from oven, and sprinkle with chocolate morsels, spreading as they melt. Sprinkle with pecans. Cover and chill at least 2 hours. Cut toffee into 1-inch squares or break into pieces, and store in an airtight container in refrigerator. ; name: hello dolly bars ; ingredients: butter, graham cracker crumbs, shredded coconut, semi-sweet chocolate chips, white chocolate chips, walnuts, sweetened condensed milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a 13 by 9 inch baking pan mix together butter and graham cracker crumbs. Press into bottom of pan. Sprinkle coconut, chocolate chips, and walnuts in layers evenly over crust. Drizzle sweetened condensed milk over the top. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes. Let cool completely before cutting into squares. ; name: saltine cracker cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, saltine crackers, chocolate chips, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Line cookie sheet with foil. Place 40 crackers in one layer on cookie sheet. In saucepan on low heat, combine butter and brown sugar. Heat until blended. Boil 3 minutes. Pour mixture evenly over crackers. Sprinkle cracker centers with chocolate chips. Place in oven until chips melt. Sprinkle with chopped nuts. Cut while warm. Store on wax paper. ; name: two layer pecan pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, vanilla, egg, pecan pieces, eggs, light corn syrup, unbaked pie shell ; preparation:Beat bottom layer ingredients together until smooth. Pour into an unbaked pie shell. Mix top layer ingredients and pour gently over the cream cheese mixture. Bake in preheated 350 degree oven for 50 to 60 minutes. As it bakes, the bottom layer will rise to the top. ; name: chocolate cheesecake pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, butter, powdered sugar, vanilla extract, milk chocolate chips, frozen whipped topping, chocolate cookie pie crust ; preparation:In large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, butter, sugar, and vanilla. Beat in melted chocolate. Fold in whipped topping. Spoon into crust. Cover and chill until serving. ; name: sweet cream cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, powdered sugar, mini chocolate chip, vanilla, pecans, graham cracker sticks ; preparation:

name: pioneer woman soul sweet taters ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, sugar, milk, eggs, vanilla extract, salt, brown sugar, pecans, flour, butter ; preparation:Wash 4 medium sweet potatoes and bake them in a 375-degree oven until fork tender, about 30-35 minutes. When they are finished cooking slice them open and scrape out the flesh into a large bowl. Add 1 cup of sugar, 1 cup of milk, 2 eggs, 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract and 1 teaspoon of salt. With a potato masher, mash them up just enoughyou dont want to be perfectly smooth. Now, in a separate bowl, add 1 cup brown sugar, 1 cup pecans, chopped, cup flour, and stick of butter. With a pastry cutter or fork, mash together until thoroughly combined. Spread the sweet potato mixture into a regular baking dish and sprinkle the crumb mixture all over the top. Bake in a 400-degree oven for 30 minutes, or until golden brown. ; name: cranberry apple sweet potato packet ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, granny smith apples, dried cranberries, brown sugar, butter, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 or a grill to medium high. Center sweet potatoes, apple slices and cranberries on 18x24-inch sheet of heavy-duty aluminum foil. Sprinkle with brown sugar. Combine melted butter or margarine and cinnamon and drizzle over brown sugar. Bring up sides of foil. Double-fold the top and ends of foil to make a large foil package, leaving room for heat to circulate inside. Bake 25 to 30 minutes on cookie sheet in oven or place on covered grill 20 to 25 minutes until potatoes are tender. ; name: yummy sweet potato casserole ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, white sugar, eggs, salt, butter, milk, vanilla extract, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Put sweet potatoes in a medium saucepan with water to cover. Cook over medium high heat until tender. Drain and mash. In a large bowl, mix together the sweet potatoes, white sugar, eggs, salt, butter, milk and vanilla extract. Mix until smooth. Transfer to a 9 x 13 inch baking dish. In a medium bowl, mix the brown sugar and flour. Cut in the butter until the mixture is coarse. Stir in the pecans. Sprinkle the mixture over the sweet pototato mixture. Bake in the preheated oven 30 minutes, or until the topping is lightly brown. ; name: sweet potatoes with pecan praline streusel ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, cinnamon, brown sugar, mini marshmallows, flour, pecans ; preparation:Wash and skin potatoes, chop into large chunks. Boil potatoes until tender and mash. Stir in butter, cinnamon, brown sugar and mini marshmallows to taste. Mix in a separate bowl, flour, sugar, cinnamon, and pecans, drizzle melted butter over mixture and stir to moisten, mixture should resemble chunky crumbs. Pour potatoes mixture into casserole dish and cover with a thin layer of mini-marshmallows. Top with pecan mixture. Bake at 350f for 30 minutes or until brown and bubbly. ; name: super easy yam blueberry delight ; ingredients: sweet potatoes in syrup, blueberry pie filling, walnuts, brown sugar, maraschino cherry ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine pie filling and yams, and place in a casserole dish. Cover and bake for 40-50 minutes. Place walnuts on top. Uncover and bake 10 minutes longer. Remove from oven. Garnish with brown sugar and cherries. ; name: quick apple cobbler ; ingredients: apple pie filling, lemon juice, nutmeg, biscuits, butter, cinnamon sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. To make cinnamon mixture combine 3 t. Sugar with 1 teaspoons cinnamon. In a pan combine pie filling, lemon juice & nutmeg. Bake for 10 minutes. Cut biscuits in half & dip in melted butter, turn in cinnamon mixture and place on hot apple mixture. Bake 15 minutes. ; name: grilled sweet potato packets with pecan butter ; ingredients: sweet potato, sweet onions, vegetable oil, butter, light brown sugar, salt, ground cinnamon, pecans ; preparation:Prepare barbecue grill for direct cooking. Alternately place potato slices and onion rings on four 1412-inch sheets of heavy-duty foil. Brush tops and sides with oil to prevent drying. Double fold sides and ends of foil to seal packets. Place foil packets on grid. Grill packets, on covered grill, over medium coals 25 to 30 minutes or until potatoes are fork-tender. Meanwhile, to prepare pecan butter, combine butter, sugar, salt and cinnamon in small bowl. Mix well. Stir in pecans. Carefully open packets. Top each with dollop of pecan butter. ; name: apple spiced sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, apple pie filling, golden raisin, butter, apple pie spice, pecans, sugar ; preparation:

name: tropical green beans ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh green beans, yellow onion, garlic cloves, salt, balsamic vinegar, hearts of palm, sun-dried tomato, pine nuts, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature. ; name: jerk seasoning caribbean ; ingredients: green onions, scotch bonnet peppers, garlic cloves, white wine vinegar, brown sugar, ground allspice, dried thyme, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Seed the peppers, peel the garlic. Add everything to a blender or processor and blend well. Store in a covered container. Use for basting on pork or beef. Also see recipe of mine for beef jerk burgers. ; name: tex mex salsa ; ingredients: fresh jalapenos, onion, garlic cloves, whole tomatoes, diced tomatoes, salt, vinegar, fresh cilantro ; preparation:In a food processor or blender add onion, garlic, cilantro, vinegar, and jalapenos. Pulse until thoroughly chopped. Add canned tomatoes and salt. Pulse until throughly combined. Store in refrigerator until ready to use. ; name: countryside potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, garlic cloves, wine vinegar, olive oil, salami, red onions, green onions, parsley, pimentos, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place garlic vinegar, olive oil in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper, whisk together for about a minute. Peel and slice potatoes thick, place in mixing bowl. Add remaining salad ingredients, and toss. Pour vinaigrette and toss again. Season again if needed, and marinate 15 minutes before serving. ; name: caldo de hongos ; ingredients: olive oil, mushroom, onion, garlic cloves, jalapenos, water, salt and pepper, cilantro ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large stockpot over medium heat. Add onions and saute for about 2 minutes. Add garlic and saute for another minute. Stir in jalapenos and mushrooms and cover pot, reducing heat to low. Let vegetables sweat for about 10 minutes, or until softened and juices are released from the mushrooms. Add water or broth, salt and pepper to taste, and cilantro. Bring to a boil, then serve immediately. ; name: the black swan house dressing ; ingredients: garlic cloves, sugar, dry mustard, salt, sour cream, red wine vinegar, oil, parsley, fresh coarse ground black pepper ; preparation:In a food processor place the garlic, sugar, mustard, salt, and sour cream. Add the vinegar. Blend on continuous speed. In a thin stream, slowly add the oil. When blended, fold in the parsley and pepper. ; name: sweet potato salad with rosemary honey vinaigrette ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, olive oil, honey, white wine vinegar, fresh rosemary, garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Line a 15- x 10-inch jellyroll pan with aluminum foil. Coat foil with vegetable cooking spray. Toss together sweet potato and 1 tablespoon oil in pan. Bake at 450 for 35 minutes or until tender. Whisk together remaining 1 tablespoon oil, honey, and next 5 ingredients in a large bowl. Add sweet potato. Toss well. Cool. ; name: chilean cilantro salsa pebre ; ingredients: garlic clove, salt, fresh ground pepper, olive oil, sherry wine vinegar, green onions, jalapenos, fresh cilantro leaves, water ; preparation:

name: chile cashews ; ingredients: vegetable oil, chili powder, ground cumin, crushed red pepper flakes, sugar, roasted cashews ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f and line a baking sheet with aluminum foil for easy cleanup later. Combine oil, chili powder, cumin, red pepper flakes, and sugar with a whisk. Stir in cashews and coat evenly. Spread in a single layer on baking sheet and cook for 8-10 minutes. Remove and let cool for 15 minutes. Transfer to a bowl and serve. ; name: hard chargin blue cheese stampede blue cheese hamburger ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, tabasco sauce, honey, garlic salt, crushed red pepper flakes, black pepper, blue cheese, roasted red peppers, portabella mushrooms ; preparation:Preheat grill to a medium-high heat. Combine ground beef, onion, tabasco, honey, garlic salt, red pepper and pepper in a bowl. Mix well. Cut the blue cheese into 1oz squares. Divide meat into 6 portions and form patties around the pieces of blue cheese. Grill 8-10 minutes or until done. Toast your buns and grill the portabella mushrooms. Place patties on bun and top with roasted red peppers and portabellas. Enjoy. ; name: pineapple fried rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil, garlic clove, fresh ginger, crushed red pepper flakes, cooked rice, light soy sauce, crushed pineapple in syrup, green onion ; preparation:In large nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-low heat until hot. Add garlic, ginger and red pepper, cook and stir 2 minutes. Increase heat to medium-high. Add rice and soy sauce. Cook 2 minutes, stirring frequently. Add pineapple, tossing to combine. Heat rice through. Sprinkle with green onions before serving. ; name: linguica and green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, onion, garlic cloves, green bell pepper, potatoes, linguica sausage, allspice, crushed red pepper flakes, tomato sauce ; preparation:Saute onion, garlic, and bell pepper in 1-2 tablespoons butter or olive oil until onions are tender. Place onions, garlic, bell pepper, potatoes, linguica, and green beans in a large saucepan. Add enough water to cover. Add all-spice, red pepper, tomato sauce or crushed tomatoes, salt and pepper. Cover and simmer until beans are crisp tender and potatoes are fork tender. ; name: country club corn ; ingredients: cream, whole kernel corn, black pepper, butter, saltine crackers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease or butter a small, shallow casserole dish. In the prepared dish, combine the cream, corn, and pepper. Cut butter in small pieces and put on top of corn. Put the broken saltine pieces on top of casserole. Bake until slightly brown on top. ; name: kittencal s jazzed up pasta sauce ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, garlic, crushed red pepper flakes, parmesan cheese, marinara sauce, salt, fresh ground black pepper, sugar ; preparation:In a medium pot brown the ground beef with onion until no longer pink. Drain all fat. Add in the garlic, chili flakes and drained mushrooms. Cook stirring until the meat is browned. Mix in the parmesan cheese then pasta sauce. Bring to a simmer stirring over medium heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer uncovered for 45 to 60 minutes or even longer, stirring occasionally. Season with salt, pepper and sugar about halfway through cooking. ; name: asian pea pods casserole microwave ; ingredients: frozen pea pods, sliced water chestnuts, green onions, butter, soy sauce, cornstarch, salt, ground ginger, pepper ; preparation:Microwave pea pods in 1-qt. Covered glass casserole for 2 minutes, or until thawed. Stir in remaining ingredients. Microwave, uncovered, 4 minutes, or until pea pods are crisp tender. Stir again, adjust seasonings if necessary, and serve. ; name: indonesian corn patties ; ingredients: corn kernels, fish sauce, fresh cracked pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, shallots, egg, cornflour, oil ; preparation:

name: italian white bean soup ; ingredients: italian turkey sausage, onion, garlic cloves, cooking oil, cannellini beans, nonfat chicken broth, plum tomato, oregano, kale ; preparation:In a large sauce pan cook onion and garlic in hot oil about 5 minutes or until onion is tender. Stir in beans, broth, tomatoes and marjarom. Bring to boiling. Reduce heat. Simmer covered for 15 minutes. Stir in cooked sausage, kale or spinach simmer for about 5 minutes more or until kale is tender. Season to taste with pepper. ; name: tex mex spaghetti ; ingredients: turkey bratwursts, onion, garlic, chili powder, ground cumin, rotel tomatoes, picante sauce, dried oregano, cheese, spaghetti ; preparation:Crumble sausage into a large skillet, discard casings. Add onion, garlic, chili powder, cumin and cook over medium-high heat 8 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add tomoatoes, picante sauce, and oregano. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 15 to 20 minutes or until thickened. Add cooked spaghetti and stir well. Serve with shredded cheese at table. ; name: spaghetti and fried eggs ; ingredients: salt, thin spaghetti, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, eggs, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Bring a pot of salted water to the boil. Start the sauce in the next step, and start cooking the pasta when the water boils. Combine garlic and 4 tablespoons of the oil in a small skillet over medium-low heat. Cook the garlic, pressing it into the oil occasionally to release its flavor. It should barely color on both sides. Remove the garlic, and add the remaining oil. Fry the eggs gently in the oil, until the whites are just about set and the yolks still quite runny. Drain the pasta, and toss with the eggs and oil, breaking up the whites as you do. Season to taste, and serve immediately, with cheese if you like. ; name: cherry tomato caper spaghetti ; ingredients: spaghetti, olive oil, garlic clove, red chili pepper, cherry tomatoes, capers, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Boil the spaghetti. Meanwhile, heat the oil in a small non-stick pan, add the garlic and fry, stirring all the time, until golden. Add the chili, tomatoes and capers and fry for a further 3-4 mins until the tomatoes start to break down. Add 2 tbsp of the pasta cooking water to the tomatoes, then drain the pasta and return to the pan. Pour in the tomato sauce and toss everything together well. Serve as it is or sprinkled with freshly grated parmesan. ; name: kittencal s low fat parmesan turkey meatballs ; ingredients: ground turkey, fat-free evaporated milk, fresh garlic, dry breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, green onions, fresh parsley, egg, seasoning salt, black pepper ; preparation:In a bowl mix all ingredients together. Mix and add in more bread crumbs if needed to hold together. Shape into desired size balls. Fry or oven-bake until completely cooked through. Use in you favorite recipes. ; name: mama s beef a roni ; ingredients: ground beef, green pepper, onion, celery, garlic powder, italian seasoning, small shell pasta, mozzarella cheese, pasta sauce ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain. While pasta is cooking, on medium heat brown ground beef in large skillet. Add onions, peppers, celery, italian seasoning and garlic powder, stirring until vegetables are tender. Drain and return to skillet. Stir in pasta sauce. Add pasta and mix thoroughly. Sprinkle cheese over top. Cover with lid and let cheese melt. Let sit for about 5 minutes then serve and enjoy. ; name: solo italian sausage and pasta medley ; ingredients: cooked italian sausage, dry pasta, green bell pepper, onion, garlic clove, tomato sauce, dried basil, olive oil, salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place pasta in 2 quarts of salted water and cook until soft, which should take about 10 to 12 minutes. Chop the pepper and onions into half inch pieces and saute in olive oil. After 5 minutes, add the garlic, basil, and the tomato sauce and simmer until it starts to thicken. If the sauce become to thick, add a little of the water from the pasta. Add the precooked sausage to the vegetable and sauce mixture, and stir over low heat while waiting until the pasta is done. Add drained pasta to the pan, stir, check to see if salt is needed, and plate. Serve with grated parmesan cheese. ; name: easy for sheezy goulash ; ingredients: ground turkey, olive oil, garlic, spaghetti sauce, sweet corn, onion, italian seasoning, elbow macaroni ; preparation:

name: chilled cranberry soup ; ingredients: water, granulated sugar, cinnamon sticks, ground cloves, fresh cranberries, fresh lemon juice, orange zest, sour cream ; preparation:In a r4-quart sucepan, mix water, sugar, cinnamon sticks & cloves. Bring to boil over high heat, then add cranberries & return to a boil. Reduce heat & cook until cranberries pop, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat & stir in lemon juice & orange zest. Cool to room temperature, then chill about 4 hours in the refrigerator. When ready to serve, top each bowl of soup with a dollop of sour cream. Refrigerate any leftovers. ; name: mint iced tea ; ingredients: water, peppermint tea bags, orange pekoe tea bags, orange, zest of, mint leaves, whole cloves, superfine sugar, pink grapefruit juice, ice cube, mint sprig ; preparation:Bring water to boil in a tea kettle. In a large tea pot, place tea bags, orange zest, mint leaves and cloves and then pour boiling water over all. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Cover and let steep until cool. Strain tea through mesh strainer into a large pitcher filled with ice. Stir in grapefruit juice. Serve over ice in large glasses, garnished with mint sprigs, if desired. ; name: slow cooker cranberry tea ; ingredients: sugar, water, cinnamon sticks, cranberry juice, frozen orange juice, fresh lemon juice, orange slice ; preparation:In saucepan, combine sugar, 8 cups water and cinnamon sticks. Mix well and bring to a boil. Pour mixture into slow cooker with remaining ingredients. Cover and cook on high-heat setting for 1 hour. Reduce heat to low and serve slow cooker cranberry tea warm. ; name: spiced lemonade ; ingredients: cloves, cinnamon stick, cranberry juice, water, sugar, frozen concentrated lemonade ; preparation:Mix spices, cranberry juice, and water in saucepan. Bring to a rolling boil. Cover, remove from heat, and let stand about 3 minutes. Strain and discard spices. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Add lemonade. Mix well. Reheat, and serve hot. Garnish each serving with half an orange slice and a sprig of mint or a green cherry. ; name: hot spiced holiday punch ; ingredients: apple cider, cranberry-raspberry juice, fresh raspberries, brandy, brown sugar, cinnamon sticks, fresh ginger, whole cloves, whole allspice, cooking apples ; preparation:Combine apple cider, cranberry-raspberry juice, raspberries, brandy, brown sugar, cinnamon, ginger, cloves and allspice in a 4- to 5-quart dutch oven. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer 15 minutes. Strain punch through a sieve lined with cheesecloth. To serve, return punch to dutch oven. Add apple wedges. Cover and heat until boiling. Pour hot punch into a heatproof bowl or transfer to crockpot. Serve in heatproof cups, floating an apple wedge in each serving. ; name: mulled cider ; ingredients: tea, orange juice, lemon juice, splenda granular, vanilla, orange extract, cinnamon stick, whole cloves ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large saucepan. Bring to a simmer. Simmer for 20 minutes to allow the spices to permeate the liquid. Ladle into mugs. Leftovers will keep in the refrigerator 2 to 3 days. Rewarm in the microwave. ; name: spicy mint tea ; ingredients: orange pekoe tea bag, mint sprigs, cayenne pepper, boiling water, white sugar, lemon juice, cinnamon stick, lemons ; preparation:Steep 1 tea bag, 6 mint stems and cayenne pepper in 2 cups of boiling water. Strain the mixture, keeping only the liquid. Add the sugar, lemon juice and cinnamon stick to the mint mixture and refrigerate. When ready to serve, remove the cinnamon stick and dilute the mint mixture with equal parts of water. Serve in a tall glass with ice, add a fresh mint sprig and a lemon slice for garnishing. ; name: cranberry tea hot punch ; ingredients: tea bags, boiling water, unsweetened cranberry juice, apple cider, brown sugar, cinnamon stick, ginger, cloves, cinnamon sticks, orange slices ; preparation:

name: romaine salad with avocado and oranges ; ingredients: oranges, lemon juice, olive oil, dijon mustard, salt, romaine lettuce, scallions, avocado ; preparation:With a paring knife remove the skin and pith from the oranges. Working over a large salad bowl to catch the juices, cut out the orange segments. Set aside. Add the lemon juice, oil, mustard, and salt to the juice, whisking to blend. Add the lettuce and scallions, tossing well. Add the avocado and toss gently to combine. ; name: mixed greens with honey lime dressing ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh lime juice, honey, lime zest, salt and pepper, red onion, mixed greens, plum tomatoes ; preparation:Whisk first 4 ingredients in a small bowl to blend, season dressing with salt and pepper. Transfer 2 tablespoons dressing to another smaller bowl. Mix in onions. Let onion and remaiming dressing stand at least 1 hour and up to 3 hours. Toss onion mixture occasionally. Mix lettuces, tomatoes, and onion mixture in bowl. Toss with dressing, serve. ; name: wine bar nut mix ; ingredients: pecans, almonds, walnuts, pure maple syrup, extra virgin olive oil, mixed herbs, cayenne pepper, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl, toss the nuts with the maple syrup, olive oil, herbs and cayenne. Spread the nuts on a rimmed baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes., stirring occasionally, until browned. Season the nuts with salt and pepper and toss frequently until cooled. ; name: sweet savory nuts ; ingredients: pecans, almonds, walnuts, pure maple syrup, extra virgin olive oil, mixed herbs, cayenne pepper, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl, toss the nuts with the maple syrup, olive oil, herbs and cayenne. Spread the nuts on a rimmed baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes., stirring occasionally, until browned. Season the nuts with salt and pepper and toss frequently until cooled. ; name: apple cheese salad ; ingredients: red apples, fresh lemon juice, celery, swiss cheese, mayonnaise, prepared mustard, salt and pepper, lettuce leaf, filberts ; preparation:Put apples in a serving dish. Sprinkle with lemon juice. Add celery and cheese. Mix mayonnaise and mustard. Season with salt and pepper. Add to apple mixture. Refrigerate 1 hour to blend flavors. Serve in lettuce cups sprinkled with nuts. ; name: roasted sweet potatoes with orange marmalade and balsamic glaze ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, extra virgin olive oil, honey, ground ginger, balsamic vinegar, orange marmalade, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 375. Lay the sweet potatoes out in a single layer on a roasting tray. Drizzle the oil, salt and pepper over the potatoes. Roast for 25 to 30 minutes in oven or until tender. In a saucepan reduce the vinegar by half, then add honey, marmelade and ginger. Stir to combine. When potatoes are roasted, remove and toss to coat with marmelade mixture. ; name: yet another turkey sausage and kraut skillet ; ingredients: olive oil, carrots, onion, turkey kielbasa, sauerkraut, dijon mustard, white wine, brown sugar, caraway seed ; preparation:In a large skillet heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onion and carrot and cook until onion begins to brown, stirring often. Add sauerkraut, mustard, sherry, caraway, and brown sugar. Mix well. Add kielbasa and bring mixture to a boil. Reduce heat to medium low and simmer, covered, for 10 minutes. Serve mixed with egg noodles, over potatoes, or with chunky rye bread. ; name: roasted sweet potatoes with pineapple and pecans ; ingredients: vegetable oil, sweet potatoes, fresh pineapple, salt, pecans, pure maple syrup, orange marmalade, fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard ; preparation:

name: rice cooker chicken wild rice and veggies ; ingredients: wild rice, chicken broth, water, chicken breast, cabbage, green onions, bok choy ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients in rice cooker and turn on. Stir occassionally. Cook 30-40 minutes. Add green onion and bok choy towards the end of cook time to prevent overcooking. Rice package says 50 minutes cook time, but i just test the rice for tenderness. ; name: rice pilaf with mushrooms ; ingredients: butter, onion, mushroom, salt & freshly ground black pepper, long-grain white rice, low sodium chicken broth ; preparation:Melt butter in a large flameproof casserole and cook the onion over low heat for 5 minutes. Add the mushrooms, salt and pepper and continue cooking 5 minutes longer or until the mushrooms release their liquid. Turn up the heat and cook, stirring constantly, until the moisture in the mushrooms evaporates. Add the rice and stir it for a few minutes or until the grains are transparent. Pour in the stock or stock mixed with water and bring to a boil. Lower the heat, cover the pan and cook the rice for 20 minutes or until all the liquid is absorbed. Transfer half the rice to a plastic container. Serve remaining rice at once. ; name: braised pilaf rice ; ingredients: butter, onions, long grain rice, chicken stock, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place 3 oz butter in an ovenproof pan. Add onion. Cook gently without colour, 2-3 minutes, and then add the rice. Cook gently without colour, 2-3 minutes. Add the hot stock should be about twice the amount of liquid to rice. Stir well and season. Cover with a lid or buttered greaseproof paper. Place in a hot oven 230-250c approx 20 minutes or until rice is tender. When cooked carefully mix in the remaining butter with a fork. For variations try mixing in some fried mushroom slices and toasted pine nuts and parsley, or peas and diced peppers or ham, or add some grated cheese just before serving. ; name: saffron rice pilaf with toasted almonds ; ingredients: white rice, vermicelli, chicken broth, butter, saffron, slivered almonds, seasoning salt ; preparation:In a medium saucepan on medium-low heat, toast almonds until they turn a golden-brown color. Remove from saucepan and set aside. In the same saucepan on medium heat, melt butter. Add vermicelli noodles and brown for 1 minute. Add rice and brown for 1-2 additional minutes being careful not to burn noodles or rice. Add seasoned salt, saffron, toasted almonds and chicken broth and bring to a boil. Cover saucepan and reduce heat to lowest setting. Cook covered for 16 minutes. Remove lid and fluff with a fork. ; name: bacon and egg rice ; ingredients: long-grain white rice, water, bacon, eggs, salt, black pepper, onion, vegetable oil, scallion, sesame oil ; preparation:Bring rice and water to a boil in a 3 quart heavy saucepan, then reduce, heat to low and cook, tightly covered, until water is absorbed and rice is tender, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat and let stand, covered, 5 minutes. Gently stir rice from top to bottom of saucepan with a heatproof rubber spatula. Cook bacon in a 12-inch nonstick skillet over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, until golden and crisp, about 6 minutes. Pour into a sieve set over a heatproof bowl and reserve bacon and fat separately. Whisk together eggs, t salt and t pepper in a medium bowl. Return 3 tablespoons fat to skillet and saut onion over moderately high heat, stirring occasionally, until pale golden, about 5 minutes. Add eggs and cook, stirring, until eggs are just set, about 1 minute. Make a well in center of egg mixture, then pour in vegetable oil and 2 tablespoons reserved bacon fat. Add rice, remaining teaspoon salt and remaining teaspoon pepper and cook, stirring, 2 minutes. Add bacon, scallions, and sesame oil and cook mixture, stirring, 1 minute. Serve immediately. ; name: fruit and wild rice pilaf ; ingredients: butter, onion, celery, reduced-sodium chicken broth, water, long grain and wild rice blend, raisins, pecans ; preparation:Melt butter in medium saucepan over med-high heat. Add onions and celery. Cook 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add broth, water, rice, contents of seasoning packet, and fruit. Bring to boil. Reduce heat to med-low. Cover and simmer 25 minutes, or until liquid is absorbed. Stir in pecans and serve. ; name: yummy rice pilaf ; ingredients: butter, orzo pasta, scallions, long grain rice, reduced-sodium chicken broth, water, salt, pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in medium sauce pan over medium high heat. Add orzo and saute until golden brown. Add scallions and saute quickly. Add chicken broth, water, salt & pepper. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice. Reduced heat to low. Cover and cook for 17-20 minutes. I finished by adding a little extra butter and salt and pepper to taste. ; name: mark bittman s chicken and rice soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, long grain white rice, carrot, celery, chicken, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: sweet simmered pork chops ; ingredients: pork loin chops, scallions, soy sauce, water, dry sherry, mirin, rice vinegar, fresh ginger, garlic cloves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200f. In a large skillet mix together all sauce ingredients. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Turn heat to medium-low and simmer, uncovered, for about 5 minutes. Add pork, cover, and simmer. Turn occasionally and continue simmering until the meat is firm and just about cooked through. Longer for thicker chops. Place the chops on oven safe plate or pan and place in oven. Turn heat to high and reduce sauce to one cup or little less - about half. Remove the ginger slices. Plate chops. Spoon cause over chops and garnish with scallion or chives. ; name: crock pot teriyaki wingers ; ingredients: chicken wings, onion, low sodium soy sauce, brown sugar, ground ginger, garlic cloves, dry sherry ; preparation:Rinse the wings and pat them dry. Cut off and discard the wing. Cut each wing at joint to make two sections. Place the wing parts on a broiler pan. Broil 4-5 inches from the heat for 10 minutes on each side or until chicken is brown. Transfer the wings to a crock pot. Mix together the onion, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, garlic and sherry in bowl. Pour over the chicken wings. Cover and cook on low for 5-6 hours. Stir the wings once to ensure that they are evenly coated with sauce. Serve from the crock pot. ; name: moo shu vegetables ; ingredients: toasted sesame oil, eggs, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, mixed vegetables, mung bean sprouts, scallion, reduced sodium soy sauce, rice vinegar, hoisin sauce ; preparation:Heat 1 teaspoon oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add eggs. Cook, stirring gently, until set, 2 to 3 minutes. Remove to a plate. Wipe out the pan and heat the remaining 2 teaspoons oil over medium heat. Add ginger and garlic and cook, stirring, until softened and fragrant, 1 minute. Add shredded vegetables, bean sprouts, half the sliced scallions, soy sauce and vinegar. Stir to combine. Cover and cook, stirring once or twice, until the vegetables are just tender, about 3 minutes. Add the reserved eggs and hoisin. Cook, uncovered, stirring and breaking up the scrambled eggs, until heated through, 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in the remaining scallions and remove from the heat. ; name: grilled honey garlic pork chops ; ingredients: ketchup, honey, soy sauce, garlic, boneless pork chops, salt and pepper ; preparation:Combine ketchup, honey, soy sauce and garlic. Set aside. Lightly season pork with salt and pepper. Brush each chop with sauce to coat. Cook chops on greased grill 4 to 6 inches from medium-hot coals or on medium setting, basting with sauce often, for about 5 minutes on each side or until meat is cooked through. ; name: lime marinated broiled salmon ; ingredients: low sodium soy sauce, fresh lime juice, fresh ginger, fresh thyme, garlic cloves, salmon fillets, cooking spray, lime wedges ; preparation:Place first 5 ingredients in a blender. Process until smooth. Pour into a large zip-top plastic bag. Add salmon, and seal and marinate in refrigerator 1 hour, turning bag occasionally. Preheat broiler. Remove salmon from bag, discarding marinade. Place salmon on a broiler pan coated with cooking spray. Broil 8 minutes. Turn, and broil an additional 4 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork. Serve with lime wedges. ; name: honey sesame pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, soy sauce, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, sesame oil, honey, brown sugar, sesame seeds ; preparation:Combine soy sauce, ginger, garlic and sesame oil. Place tenderloin in a resealable plastic food storage bag and pour the soy sauce mixture into it. Marinate for 2 hours in the refrigerator.
