I do not recommend marinating this any longer than 2 hours - as the pork will become too salty tasting. Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Remove pork from marinade and pat dry with a paper towel. Mix honey and brown sugar on a plate. Place sesame seeds on another plate. Roll pork in honey mixture and then roll in the sesame seeds. Roast in a shallow pan for 20 to 30 minutes or until meat thermometer inserted into the thickest part registers 160 degrees. Suggested to serve over rice. ; name: chicken tenders w balsamic vinegar glaze ; ingredients: olive oil, chicken tenders, black pepper, garlic, balsamic vinegar, honey, low sodium chicken broth ; preparation:Heat oil over med-high heat. Add chicken season with pepper. Cook 3 to 4 min on each side. Remove chicken and set aside. Reduce heat to low-medium, add garlic and saute. Then add vinegar, honey and chicken broth. Scrape bottom of pan and heat 1 minute. Return chicken to pan, mix ingredients and heat through. ; name: ginger honey glazed barbecued pork chops ; ingredients: honey, low sodium soy sauce, rice vinegar, garlic cloves, gingerroot, pork loin chops ; preparation:

name: cranberry pineapple salad ; ingredients: raspberry jell-o gelatin, boiling water, jellied cranberry sauce, crushed pineapple, orange juice, lemon juice, walnuts, lettuce leaf, cool whip ; preparation:In a bowl, dissolve jello in boiling water. Break up and stir in cranberry sauce. Add pineapple, orange juice, and lemon juice. Chill until partially set. Stir in nuts. Pour into a 11x7 inch dish. Chill until firm. Cut into squares. Serve on a lettuce leaf. Top with a dollop of cool whip. ; name: corned beef molded salad ; ingredients: lemon jell-o gelatin, boiling water, cider vinegar, mayonnaise, corned beef, eggs, celery, green peppers, onions, salt ; preparation:Dissolve jello in boiling water. Slowly blend the vinegar and mayonnaise together till smooth and then slowly add to the jello mixture stirring all the while. Chill till partially set. While waiting for the jello to set, break up the corned beef into small pieces in a large bowl. Add the eggs, celery, green pepper, onion, and salt. Chill till set. ; name: ghoulish punch ; ingredients: boiling water, lime gelatin, orange juice, seltzer water, ice cube, orange sherbet, orange, lime ; preparation:Stir boiling water into dry gelatin in large bowl at least 2 minutes until completely dissolved. Stir in juice. Cool to room temperature. Pour into punch bowl just before serving. Add seltzer and ice. Stir. Add scoops of sherbet and fruit slices. ; name: southern cranberry salad ; ingredients: strawberry gelatin, boiling water, whole berry cranberry sauce, mandarin oranges, crushed pineapple, pecans, cool whip ; preparation:Mix jello with boiling water. Stir until dissolved. Add cranberry sauce, oranges, pineapple, and pecans. Lightly spray a 4 cup ring mold or pretty glass dish that it will be served. Add salad. Cover with plastic wrap and chill at least 3 hours or till firm. Serve with dollop of cool whip. ; name: cranberry salad ; ingredients: cranberries, oranges, gala apples, crushed pineapple, jello gelatin, raspberry jell-o gelatin, pecans, sugar ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, dissolve sugar and jell-o in 2 cups boiling water. Add to the jell-o mixture the juice of both oranges, the zest of one orange, chopped nuts, and the entire can of crushed pineapple. Shred apples and cranberries. Add to jell-o. Mix well. Chill overnight or until set. ; name: cran raspberry waldorf salad ; ingredients: whole berry cranberry sauce, raspberry jell-o gelatin, boiling water, celery rib, apples, walnuts ; preparation:In a medium mixing bowl place jello and pour boiling water over. Stir till dissolved. Add cranberry sauce, stirring with a fork if necessary to break up. Stir till combined. Add in celery, apples and nuts. Stir to mix in fairly evenly. Pour into a 6-cup mold or 8-inch square pan. Chill till set, 2-3 hours. ; name: mountain dew salad ; ingredients: lemon jell-o gelatin, lemon pudding mix, cool whip, mountain dew soda, hot water ; preparation:Prepare pudding according to package directions and cool. Dissolve jello in 2 cups hot water and add mountain dew. Cool slightly. Whip jello and pudding together and fold in cool whip. Chill 4 hours. ; name: lime jello and pineapple salad ; ingredients: lime jell-o gelatin, sour cream, pineapple ring, carrot, celery, pecans, boiling water ; preparation:

name: simple vegan pancakes ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, water, oil ; preparation:Add dry ingredients to bowl and whisk together. Pour in water and oil. Whisk until combined. A few lumps are ok. Spray non-stick spray in skillet, and pour batter in until pancake is desired size. If adding anything like chocolate chips or blueberries, now is the time, just sprinkle them on top of the pancake. Cook on first side until bubbles form, then flip to other side. When second side is golden, remove from pan to plate,. Top with your choice of ingredients. Devour pancakes, take nap. ; name: rosemary and gouda buttermilk biscuits ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, unsalted butter, buttermilk, gouda cheese, dried rosemary, salt, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 f. Whisk together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a large bowl. Add the butter and rub it into the flour using your finger. Crumble the rosemary needles in your hand and add them to the mixture. Add the cheese and toss to combine. Pour in the buttermilk and fold in gently with a spatula until mixture forms a sticky dough. Divide roughly into 8 and drop onto a parchment lined baking sheet. Bake for about 12 minutes until golden on top or a toothpick comes out clean. ; name: slap yo mama pancakes ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, eggs, milk, water, vegetable oil ; preparation:Sift flour and baking powder together. Add remaining ingredients to flour mixture. And whisk togetether until smooth. Add to hot griddle or heavy skillet and cook until golden brown. For the small family or just smaller batches recipe can be done in half, and will make approx 9 small pancakes. ; name: maple syrup banana muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, sugar, yogurt, egg, maple syrup, vegetable oil, bananas ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400f. Sift together the dry ingredients. Set aside. Whisk together the wet ingredients until well-blended. Stir in the bananas. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until just combined. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until cake tester comes out clean. ; name: cornmeal scones ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, baking soda, salt, butter, buttermilk ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Mix flour, cornmeal, baking powder, baking soda and salt in medium bowl. Cut in butter using pastry blender or 2 knives, until mixture looks like fine crumbs. Stir in buttermilk so dough leaves sides of bowl and forms a ball. Turn dough onto lightly floured surface. Knead lightly 10 times. Pat or roll into 7 inch circle on ungreased cookie sheet that has been sprinkled with cornmeal. Score top into 8 wedges, cutting down halfway to the bottom. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until light brown. Immediately remove from cookie sheet, carefully separate wedges. Serve warm. ; name: chocolate chip feather pancakes ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, cooking oil, chocolate chips ; preparation:In mixing bowl thoroughly stir together flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Combine egg, milk and cooking oil. Add all at once to dry ingredients, beating until blended. Pour in chocolate chips. Mix well. Bake on hot lightly greased griddle. Makes about 32 dollar-size pancakes or 6-8 4-inch pancakes. ; name: weight watchers chocolate chip blondies 3 points ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, table salt, brown sugar, light butter, egg whites, vanilla extract, mini chocolate chip, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f in a small bowl, combine flour, baking powder and salt. In a large bowl, beat brown sugar and butter until fluffy. Add egg whites and vanilla. Gradually beat in flour mixture alternating with water. Stir in chips. Spread into a foil-lined 9- x 13-inch baking pan. Bake until golden, about 20 to 25 minutes. Cool on wire rack. Remove foil and cut into 24 two-inch squares. ; name: green chile scones ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, baking powder, green chili pepper, garlic, whipping cream, cayenne ; preparation:

name: sticky balsamic tomato salad ; ingredients: balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, tomatoes, feta cheese, basil leaves, salt and pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Place vinegar and sugar in saucepan over medium heat. Bring to boil, cook 8 - 10 minutes till thickened. Watch carefully though. Set aside to cool. Arrange tomato, feta and basil on serving plate. Drizzle with oil and dressing, season. ; name: simple beet pickles ; ingredients: beet, white vinegar, white sugar, salt, powdered allspice ; preparation:Cook beets, cool and peel. Prepare solution. Put beets in jars. Pour solution over beets. Seal jars. ; name: delicious georgia pear relish ; ingredients: pears, vidalia onions, red bell peppers, green bell peppers, granulated sugar, kosher salt, apple cider vinegar, allspice ; preparation:Put through food grinder all the ingredients. When everything is ground up, mix all together. In a large canning kettle. Cook for 40 minutes. Put in jars and seal. ; name: authentic bavarian potato salad ; ingredients: potato, hot chicken broth, white vinegar, salt, pepper, sugar, oil, onions, butter, chives ; preparation:Boil the potatoes, slice while still warm and add broth. Mix vinegar with salt, pepper and sugar. Sugar and salt should be dissolved before adding the oil. Add marinade to the potatoes. Add onions and finally the melted butter. Garnish with chives or parsley. If you want to add cucumber, thinly slice them and salt. Drain before adding to the salad. ; name: easy refrigerator pickles ; ingredients: sugar, vinegar, salt, onions, turmeric, celery seeds, mustard seeds, cucumber ; preparation:Mix sugar, vinegar, salt, spices, do not heat. Sterilize 3 large jars,. Place one sliced onion in each jar, fill with sliced cucumbers. Pour syrup to top ofjar and put on lids. Place in refrigerator. Ready to eat in 5 days. Keeps 1 year in refrigerator. ; name: grandma s barbecue spareribs ; ingredients: spareribs, onion, oil, lemon juice, vinegar, soy sauce, brown sugar, water, ketchup, salt and pepper ; preparation:Put ribs into a large baking pan, cover with approximately 1 cup of water. Sprinkle tops with salt and pepper. Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes at 350 degrees fahrenheit. Chop onion and saut in oil. Add remaining ingredients. Simmer for 20 minutes. Pour sauce over the ribs and continue baking for 1 hour. Remove foil and cook approximately 10 minutes more. ; name: happy beets ; ingredients: beet, cornstarch, salt, cider vinegar, vodka, sugar ; preparation:Bring saved liquid to a boil. Add cornstarch, salt, vinegar, and sugar. Simmer until thickened and bubbles. Add sliced beets to sauce. Heat for three minutes. ; name: beets with onions ; ingredients: beets, butter, onions, sugar, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: kittencal s fried cabbage with bacon ; ingredients: bacon, onion, garlic, crushed red pepper flakes, cabbage, chicken broth, brown sugar, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium heat cook the chopped bacon until crisp and browned. Remove to a bowl or plate and set aside. Add in onion. Cook stirring until softened. Add in cabbage and broth or water and sugar. Cook stirring until the cabbage wilts season with salt and pepper towards the end of cooking. Stir in the cooked bacon. ; name: swiss chard with pinto beans ; ingredients: garlic, swiss chard, red pepper flakes, pinto beans, diced tomatoes, lime, salt and pepper ; preparation:Saute garlic and crushed red pepper. Add swiss chard, cover. Add beans and tomatoes. Salt, pepper, lime. Simmer until sauce is reduced. ; name: steamed lentils with saffron ; ingredients: brown lentils, olive oil, onion, prosciutto, dry white wine, saffron thread, vegetable stock, salt ; preparation:Rinse the lentils well. Heat the vegetable stock in a small pot. Meanwhile, in a different medium pot heat the olive oil. Add the onion and cook until translucent, 5 to 8 minutes, then add the prosciutto and cook for a few more minutes. Add the lentils, cook for another 2-3 minutes, and pour the white wine. Add the saffron and cook until the alcohol has evaporated, 4-5 minutes. Add the stock, salt to taste, and cook over low heat for 50 minutes to 1 hour, covered. Add water or more stock if necessary. ; name: lentils with chorizo red wine ; ingredients: green lentils, onions, garlic clove, chicken stock, red wine vinegar, red wine, chorizo sausage, parsley, thyme, salt and pepper ; preparation:Fry the onion and garlic in a little oil then add the lentils, red wine, stock, vinegar and thyme. Simmer gently for 30 minutes until tender, add the chorizo for the last 5 minutes of cooking time. Season with salt and pepper. Stir through the parsley. Serve with lots of crusty bread. ; name: quinoa with oyster mushrooms and adzuki beans ; ingredients: olive oil, carrot, green onions, oyster mushroom, vegetable broth, adzuki beans, quinoa, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Crushed the oyster mushrooms slightly and remove the tough stems. Saut carrots, onions, and mushrooms for 3 minutes. Add broth, beans and quinoa. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 to 20 minutes or until all liquid is absorbed. Fluff with a fork. ; name: barley bake ; ingredients: celery, sliced mushrooms, green onion, garlic clove, butter, barley, fresh cilantro, chicken broth, salt and pepper ; preparation:Saute celery, mushrooms, onions and garlic in butter until soft. Add barley and cook until light brown. In a 2 quart buttered casserole combine barley mixture, parsley or cilantro and chicken broth. Cover and bake at 350 for 30 minutes and then uncover and bake for 45 minutes more or until barley is tender and liquid is absorbed. If necessary, add more broth. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: rustic red lentil soup only 4 ingredients ; ingredients: onion, red lentil, chicken bouillon cubes, tomato paste, water ; preparation:Cook onions until very soft, in a medium size pot, with a little extra virgin olive oil. Add chicken cubes, lentils, and tomato paste. Turn the heat on high and add 8 cups of water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and cook for 30 minutes and soup has reduced significantly. Serve warm with italian crusty bread or flatbreads. ; name: healthy lentil dip for cheapo cooks on a budget ; ingredients: brown lentils, vegetable broth, diced onion, red bell peppers, monterey jack cheese, red pepper flakes, salt ; preparation:

name: scallop saute ; ingredients: butter, onions, garlic, salt, pepper, bay scallops, fresh parsley, red pepper flakes, lemon juice ; preparation:Heat butter in 12in skillet. Add onion, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir and saute 1 minute. Add scallops. Stir and saute 4-6 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Add parsley, red pepper flakes, and lemon, heat through. ; name: spinach and cheese casserole ; ingredients: frozen spinach, onion, garlic cloves, butter, eggs, cottage cheese, flour, sharp cheddar cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Drain spinach well. Saute onion and garlic in 2 tbsp of the melted butter until onion is translucent. Mix spinach with the eggs, cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, flour, and the remaining butter. Add the sauteed onions and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared dish and bake for 1 hour. ; name: creamy mushroom artichoke sauce ; ingredients: butter, oil, mushroom, onion, garlic cloves, chicken broth, cream cheese, artichoke hearts, fresh lemon juice, ground red pepper ; preparation:Melt butter with oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add mushrooms, onion, and garlic and saute 5-7 minutes or until tender. Stir in chicken broth and cream cheese and cook, stirring constantly, 2-3 minutes or until cream cheese melts. Stir in artichoke hearts, lemon juice and red pepper. Reduce heat to low and cook 2 minutes or until mixture is hot. ; name: grilled feta cheese appetizer ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, feta cheese, garlic clove, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, fresh oregano, fresh ground black pepper, french bread ; preparation:Oil a 14 inch long piece of heavy duty aluminum foil. Place onion slices in center of french bread slices on the foil. Slice feta into 24 pieces, place on top of onions and sprinkle with garlic. Add bell peppers and sprinkle with oregano and black pepper. Fold up foil and seal edges. Grill covered 30 minutes turning once or bake at 350f. ; name: garden spaghetti ; ingredients: garlic cloves, green onions, canola oil, swiss chard, vegetable broth, fresh black pepper, kosher salt, spaghetti ; preparation:Heat oil on medium heat using a large skillet. Add garlic & onions. Stir-fry about 2 minutes. Add swiss chard, broth, salt and pepper and cook until greens are wilted. Stir frequently. Remove from heat & set aside. Cook spaghetti until al dente. Drain. Toss all together and serve at once. Can subsitute spinach for swiss chard. ; name: caramelized onion dip ; ingredients: olive oil, yellow onion, garlic clove, sour cream, chevre cheese, fresh chives ; preparation:Heat oil in a medium frying pan over medium-low heat. When it shimmers, add onion and garlic, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper, and cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are caramelized and brown, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool slightly. Combine sour cream, chvre, and chives in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a blade attachment. Add onion mixture, and pulse until combined, about 10 pulses. Adjust seasoning with salt and freshly ground black pepper and pulse a few more times to mix in seasoning. Transfer to a serving bowl, cover, and refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour. Serve with potato chips or crudits. ; name: chile carrots with garlic ; ingredients: carrots, onions, garlic cloves, fresh oregano, pickled jalapeno peppers, olive oil, white wine vinegar, black pepper, bay leaves, salt ; preparation:In a pot of boiling water, blanch the sliced carrots for 30 seconds. Drain. In a bowl, mix all of the ingredients with the hot carrots. Refrigerate 30 minutes before serving. Keeps refrigerated for 6 days. ; name: andreas viestad onion pie with jarlsberg and thyme ; ingredients: unsalted butter, red onions, garlic cloves, bay leaf, black peppercorns, whole cloves, sea salt, puff pastry, jarlsberg cheese, fresh thyme ; preparation:

name: chicken and stuffing casserole ; ingredients: chicken, cream of chicken soup, seasoned stuffing mix, corn, peas ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray 9x12 casserole dish with non-stick cooking spray. Prepare stuffing as directed. Let sit. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces. Combine soup, veggies and chicken into 9x13 casserole dish. Stir until everything is mixed thoroughly. Add stuffing on top of casserole. Bake for 30 minutes, or until chicken is thoroughly cooked. ; name: lady and sons chicken in wine sauce ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, kosher salt, black pepper, swiss cheese, condensed cream of chicken soup, white wine, seasoned stuffing mix ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Add the chicken to a shallow buttered casserole and season with salt and pepper, to taste. Layer the cheese slices on top. In a medium bowl, add the soup and the wine, season with salt and pepper and pour over the cheese. Sprinkle stuffing mix on top and drizzle with melted butter. Bake for 45 minutes. Remove from the oven and serve. ; name: golden mushroom pork chop bake ; ingredients: chicken flavor stuffing mix, condensed golden mushroom soup, water, frozen vegetables, pork chops, salt and pepper, garlic powder, seasoning salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 9 x 9 baking dish with cooking spray. In mixing bowl combine half of soup, water and stuffing. Stir until moistened and mix in veggies. Season chops with seasonings. Pour stuffing mixture in bottom of casserole dish and top with pork chops. Top each chop with remaining soup. Bake uncovered for 30-35 minutes or until cooked through. ; name: cream of chicken casserole ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, lemon juice ; preparation:Boil chicken breasts until fully cooked. Put in casserole dish and set aside. Mix soup, mayonnaise, and cheese together. Pour over chicken. Bake at 350f for 20 to 30 minutes. Sprinkle with lemon juice during last 5 minutes of baking. ; name: diamond chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, swiss cheese, seasoning salt, seasoned stuffing mix, cream of chicken soup, white wine ; preparation:Place chicken breasts in an 8x8-inch pan. Lay swiss cheese over each breast. Sprinkle with seasoned salt. Mix soup with wine, pour over chicken. Sprinkle with stuffing mix. Bake at 350f for 1 hour. ; name: onion chicken stuffing bake ; ingredients: seasoned stuffing mix, cooked chicken, condensed cream of chicken soup, sour cream, dry onion soup mix, mushroom stems and pieces, sliced water chestnuts, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare stuffing mix according to package directions. Set aside. Place chicken in a greased 2-qt. Baking dish. Combine the soup, sour cream and dry soup mix. Spread over chicken. Sprinkle with mushrooms and water chestnuts. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 30 to 35 minutes or until bubbly. ; name: creamy swiss chicken breasts ; ingredients: chicken breasts, swiss cheese, low-fat cream of chicken soup, dry white wine, herb seasoned stuffing mix, butter ; preparation:Arrange chicken in a 13x9x2 inch baking dish that has been lightly sprayed with pam. Top with swiss cheese slices. Combine soup and wine, stirring well. Spoon sauce evenly over breasts. Sprinkle generously with stuffing mix. Drizzle melted margarine over crumbs. Bake at 350 for 45-55 minutes. Serves 6. ; name: classic one dish chicken stuffing bake with vegetables ; ingredients: hot water, chicken flavor stuffing mix, boneless skinless chicken breasts, condensed cream of chicken soup, sour cream, mozzarella cheese, frozen peas and carrots ; preparation:

name: teriyaki salmon skewers ; ingredients: soy sauce, hoisin sauce, rice vinegar, garlic clove, salmon fillet, green onion, toasted sesame seeds ; preparation:Whisk together soy and hoisin sauces, vinegar and garlic in a bowl. Slice salmon fillet across the grain into thin strips. Add to soy mixture and let stand for 15 minutes, turning occasionally. Thread each salmon strip onto small metal or soaked wooden skewers. Place skewers on baking sheet and broil, turning and basting with marinade once, for about 4 minutes or until golden and fish flakes easily when tested. Alternatively, cook skewers on oiled grill pan on grill. Before serving, sprinkle with green onion and sesame seeds, if using. ; name: shrimp with rice stick noodles and vegetables ww ; ingredients: rice vinegar, soy sauce, honey, sesame seed oil, rice sticks, large shrimp, red bell pepper, snow peas, cucumber, cilantro ; preparation:In a small cup combine dressing ingredients, whisking until smooth. In a large pot of boiling water cook noodles according to package directions, with a slotted spoon transfer noodles to a colander and drain. Rinse under cold running water. Drain well. Transfer to a large bowl. Return cooking water to a boil. Add shrimp and cook until opaque. Rinse under cold water. Drain. Combine shrimp, dressing and the remaining ingredients with the noodles. Toss to combine. This can be made ahead and refrigerated for up to 2 days. ; name: sweet sour glaze chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, ketchup, brown sugar, rice vinegar, soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic ; preparation:Rinse and drain chicken wings. Combine remaining ingredients to make glaze. Add chicken wings and stir gently to coat. Cover bowl and refrigerate for at least 1 hour. Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Line a baking pan with aluminum foil and arrange wings on pan. Bake for 25 minutes, turn wings and bake for another 25 minutes until golden brown. Serve immediately. ; name: chinese fish and lettuce soup ; ingredients: fresh white fish, light soy sauce, peanut oil, white pepper, iceberg lettuce, fresh ginger, salt, chicken stock, chinese rice wine, sesame oil ; preparation:Thinly slice the boneless fish and soak in the marinade. Shred the lettuce and set aside. Cook the ginger, oil and salt just until the ginger begins to brown a little bit. Add to the soup stock and bring to a heavy simmer. Just prior to serving, drain the marinade from the fish and add the fish to the soup pot, all at once, along with the lettuce and the rice wine or sherry. Bring back to a full simmer, then remove from stove. Do not overcook the soup. Add a few drops of sesame oil and pepper for garnish, and serve immediately. ; name: asian salad ; ingredients: white vinegar, vegetable oil, soy sauce, sugar, butter, ramen noodles, sliced almonds, sesame seeds, head of cabbage ; preparation:Combine dressing ingredients and heat until it comes to a boil. Let cool and refrigerate. Melt butter in frying pan. Brown broken noodles, almonds, and sesame seeds in butter. Set aside. Keep dressing, dry mixture, and cabbage seperate. Mix all 3 together 15 minutes before serving. This is best served cold and fresh. ; name: p90x beef and broccoli stir fry ; ingredients: soy sauce, red onion, garlic, top sirloin steaks, sesame oil, rice vinegar, ginger, broccoli florets ; preparation:Bring 2 quarts of water to a boil. Meanwhile, heat a small amount of soy sauce in a large saut pan, add the onions and garlic, and saut until opaque. Add beef and saut, turning often with tongs, for 7 to 10 minutes. Stir together the oil, vinegar, and ginger and add to the saut mixture. Blanch broccoli in the boiling water. Add to the meat mixture and keep warm. Prepare soba noodles according to package directions. Drain, toss with the beef and broccoli, and serve. ; name: barbarian horseman wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, hoisin sauce, rice wine vinegar, honey, light brown sugar, shallot, toasted sesame oil, dried red pepper, white pepper, onion powder ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine the hoisin sauce, vinegar, honey, brown sugar, shallots, sesame oil, crushed pepper, white pepper, and onion powder. Mix well. Add the wings to the marinade, coating them thoroughly. Marinate 4 hours in the refrigerator. Preheat the oven to 350. Evenly spread the wings on a buttered 2. Inch deep baking dish. Bake for 25-30 minutes, turning occasionally, until brown, glazed, and cooked through. Transfer to a platter. ; name: spicy cold soba noodles ; ingredients: soy sauce, molasses, sesame oil, tahini, brown sugar, chili oil, balsamic vinegar, green onion, salt, soba noodles ; preparation:

name: chopped shrimp salad ; ingredients: small shrimp, seedless cucumber, celery, red onion, mayonnaise, sugar, lemon juice, fresh dill, salt & pepper ; preparation:Cut shrimp in halve or thirds depending on the size. Peel cucumber and chop cucumber, celery and onion, small. Add the remaining ingredients, mix well. Season with salt and pepper. Serve over lettuce or in a hallowed out veggie. ; name: low carb crustless ham broccoli quiche ; ingredients: eggs, heavy cream, cheddar cheese, deli ham, broccoli, green onions, salt & pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a medium sized heavy skillet. Saute green onions until soft and add the shredded ham and stir until slightly browned. In a large bowl, beat the eggs and heavy cream together by hand. Stir in the onions& ham, broccoli, cheese and seasonings. Pour into a buttered deep-dish pie plate. Bake at 375degrees for 45-50 minutes, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Start checking it halfway through the cooking time. Let stand 10 minutes and cut into wedges to serve. ; name: vera cruz tomatoes ; ingredients: bacon, diced onion, fresh spinach, sour cream, hot pepper sauce, tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Cut tops off tomatoes and scoop out centers, leaving tomato bowls. Sprinkle salt inside tomato to draw out some moisture, set aside. Cook the bacon till crisp in a frying pan. Drain. Reserving 2 tablespoons of the drippings. Crumble the bacon, set aside. Cook onion in drippings, stir in fresh spinach. Cover and cook till tender about 3-5 minute remove from heat. Stir in sour cream, pepper sauce, and bacon. Pour any juice out of tomato bowls, fill with spinach mixture. Bake in pan at 375 for 20-25 minute. Top with cheese and heat till cheese melts and is bubbly. ; name: cooking light s seven layer salad ; ingredients: iceberg lettuce, kidney beans, tomatoes, cucumber, carrot, nonfat sour cream, low-fat ranch dressing, reduced-fat sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Layer lettuce, beans, tomatoes, cucumbers, and carrots in that order in a large bowl. Combine sour cream and ranch dressing. Spread dressing mixture over carrot layer. Top with shredded cheddar cheese. Cover and chill. ; name: greek fried cheese sandwich ; ingredients: feta cheese, butter, pita bread round, cucumber, diced tomato, lettuce, plain yogurt, garlic clove ; preparation:Blend yogurt and garlic together and set aside. Warm the pita. In a small skillet melt butter and saute feta just until heated through. Fill the pita with the diced cucumber, diced tomato and shredded lettuce. Add the feta cheese. Top with the yogurt. Makes 1 sandwich. ; name: smoked oyster heaven ; ingredients: cream cheese, cilantro, fresh lime juice, jalapenos, hot sauce, white bread, smoked oysters, red onion ; preparation:Mix together the cream cheese, cilantro, lime juice, jalapeno& hot sauce. Cut the toast slices into interesting shapes, 6 pieces per slice. Spread the cheese mixture thinly on each piece. Drain the oysters well on a paper towel. Pop an oyster on each toast piece. Sprinkle onion lightly over top. Serve. ; name: bbq cheddar chicken roll ups ; ingredients: green bell pepper, red bell pepper, sweet onion, boneless skinless chicken breast, barbecue sauce, whole wheat tortillas, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook and stir vegetables in large nonstick skillet on medium-high heat for 3 minutes. Add chicken, cook and stir 3-4 minutes or until no longer pink. Stir in barbecue sauce. Cook on medium heat 3 minutes or until chicken is done, stirring occasionally. Spoon chicken mixture down centers of tortillas. Top with cheese. Roll up. Cut in half. ; name: threadgill s cottage cheese cucumber salad ; ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, cucumber, fresh dill, green onion, pepper, tabasco sauce ; preparation:

name: cherry chocolate cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, pure vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, cocoa powder, cream of tartar, baking soda, salt, dried cherries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set. ; name: very good and yummy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, splenda granular, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla flavoring, almond flour, baking soda, salt, mini chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease cookie sheets. In a large bowl, cream together the butter, splenda and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt. Gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, fold in the chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until light brown. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely. ; name: chocolate chewy cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, unsifted flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a bowl, combine flour, cocoa powder, baking soda and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely. ; name: chocolate banana muffins ; ingredients: bananas, whole wheat flour, sugar, unsweetened applesauce, salt, baking powder, baking soda, butter, egg, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mash bananas. Add the other ingredients and mix until all ingredients are combined. Spray muffin tins. Bake for 18-20 minutes. ; name: dark chocolate cookies ; ingredients: flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla ; preparation:Mix dry ingredients together in a bowl. Cream butter and sugar in another bowl, add eggs and vanilla. Mix in dry ingredients. Drop by tablespoonsful on ungreased cookies sheets, 2 inches apart, and bake in preheated 375 oven about 12 minutes, til tops are puffed and set. Cool on rack. ; name: white chocolate oat cranberry cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, eggs, rolled oats, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, dried cranberries, white chocolate ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Witch a electric mixer, beat butter and sugar in medium mixing bowl until light and fluffy. Add eggs, mixing well. Combine the oats, flour, salt and baking soda in a separate mixing bowl. Add to butter mixture in several additions, mixing well after each addition. Stir in cranberries and the white chocolate chunks. Drop batter by rounded teaspoon onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: cinnamon applesauce bars ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, cinnamon, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, unsweetened applesauce, raisins ; preparation:Suft together flour, baking soda and cinnamon. Beat butter and sugar until smooth and creamy. Add eggs. Stir in vanilla. Blend mixture and stir in the applesauce with raisins. Spread in a prepared 13 by 19-inch pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 30-35 minutes. Let cool on rack or serve warm with cream. ; name: banana chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, unsweetened applesauce, raw sugar, bananas, eggs, pure vanilla extract, unbleached all-purpose flour, baking soda, quick-cooking oats, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: scampi shrimp skewers ; ingredients: shrimp, margarine, olive oil, garlic cloves, dry white wine, fresh parsley, lemon peel, ground black pepper, green onions, sweet red pepper ; preparation:If your shrimp is frozen, thaw before using. Peel shrimp leaving tails intact and devein. In a small saucepan using medium-high heat, melt margarine or butter and oil. Add garlic and cook for 2 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in wine, parsley, lemon peel, and ground pepper. Set aside. Using 6-inch long appetizer skewers thread shrimp, green onion, and pepper pieces and brush with garlic mixture. Grill the shrimp and vegetable skewers on a grill rack directly over medium heat for approximately 6 to 8 minutes or until shrimp turns pink. Turn once and brush with garlic mixture halfway through grilling. Serve immediately. ; name: fashoulakia greek green bean side dish ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, fresh parsley, of fresh mint, fresh dill, garlic cloves, green beans, salt, black pepper, stewed tomatoes ; preparation:Heat oil in a stockpot over medium-high heat. Add onion. Saut 3 minutes. Add herbs and garlic. Saut 4 minutes. Add beans and remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 30 minutes or until beans are tender. ; name: friggione a side dish of potatoes tomatoes peppers ; ingredients: olive oil, potatoes, onions, red peppers, tomatoes seasoned with basil garlic & oregano, salt, sugar, fresh ground black pepper, parsley ; preparation:Heat oil in large frypan. Non stick is best. Cut the potatoes into 1cm cubes and slice the onions and peppers. Add these to the hot oil and cover and cook over a low to moderate heat for about 20 minutes, stirring several times, until the vegetables are tender and lightly browned. Do not try to hurry this step by cooking on a high heat. Add the can of tomatoes and their juice. Cook uncovered for a further 15-30 minutes until the mixture darkens in colour and the liquid has reduced so that there is only a small amount left around the potatoes. Again do not use a high heat. Season to taste and sprinkle with the chopped parsley if using before serving. Serve hot or warm reheating if neccesary if your meat is not ready at the same time. ; name: grilled shark to die for ; ingredients: soy sauce, shark steaks, catsup, orange juice, lemon juice, fresh parsley, garlic cloves, pepper ; preparation:Combine soy sauce, orange juice, catsup, chopped parsley, lemon juice, pepper, and minced garlic. Add fish. Cover and marinate in refrigerator for 2 hours. Remove fish from marinade, reserving marinade. Grill fish over hot coals 6 minutes on each side or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork, basting frequently with marinade. ; name: lisa s grilled steak marsala ; ingredients: steak, italian salad dressing, mushroom, onions, olive oil, dry marsala wine, garlic cloves, salt and pepper ; preparation:Marinate steak. In a lg. Teflon skillet add olive oil, then add mushrooms, onions, and garlic. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Add marsala wine and let gently boil, until veggies are done, and wine has reduced. Grill steaks to desired doneness, and put on serving plate. Cover with veggies, and serve hot. ; name: grilled potatoes with garlic ; ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, fresh parsley, grainy mustard, lemon juice, butter, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Cut potatoes into large wedges. Place on greased oven trays, bake for about 30 minutes or until just tender. Combine oil, garlic, herbs, mustard and juice in a bowl. Add potatoes and toss until potatoes are well coated with mixture. Return potatoes to oven trays and drizzle with melted butter. Cook under hot grill until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Serve sprinkled with salt if desired. ; name: minute steaks with taco sauce ; ingredients: butter, vegetable oil, minute steaks, button mushrooms, taco sauce, fresh parsley, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Heat the butter and oil in a frying pan. Season the steaks with salt and pepper and fry for 1 minute on each side on fairly high heat. Place the cooked steaks into a serving dish and place in the oven to keep warm. Add mushrooms to the pan. Cook on high heat and lightly brown. Remove from pan and place in oven to keep warm. Pour the taco sauce in the pan and simmer for about 1 minute. Place the mushrooms and steaks on a plate and pour the taco sauce over the steaks. Garnish with the parsley. Serve. ; name: baked halibut steaks ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, fresh parsley, garlic, tomato sauce, halibut steaks, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: bow tie pasta with broccoli and tomatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, butter, minced garlic cloves, bow tie pasta, fresh broccoli florets, cherry tomatoes, fresh parmesan cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Prepare pasta according to package directions and drain completely. Steam broccoli until fork tender, drain completely. Cut tomatoes in half. In skillet over medium heat melt butter in olive oil. Add garlic and cook for 2-3 minutes. Put the prepared pasta in skillet and toss to coat. Add the tomatoes and toss for 2-3 minutes. Add the broccoli and toss 1-2 minutes. Salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle with grated parmensa cheese. ; name: bow tie pasta with sun dried tomatoes and kalamata olives ; ingredients: bow tie pasta, chili-flavored olive oil, pesto sauce, fresh rosemary, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, kalamata olive, parmesan cheese, garlic salt ; preparation:Cook pasta according to directions on package. Be sure to just cook to al dente stage. Drain and return to pot. Place pot on burner but turn off burner. Stir in oil. Stir in remaining ingredients and mix well. I have also added broccoli to pasta water while cooking pasta and this is very good too. ; name: broccoli cheese soup ; ingredients: onion, margarine, flour, salt, white pepper, chicken broth, milk, broccoli, cheddar cheese, celery ; preparation:Saute onion and celery in butter in saucepan over medium heat until tender. Add flour, and salt and pepper, cooking and stirring until mixture is smooth and bubbly. Add broth and milk, stirring constantly until mixture comes to a boil and begins to thicken. Add cooked broccoli, stirring until all is heated through. Remove from heat and stir in cheese until melted and smooth. ; name: italian spaghetti frittata ; ingredients: spaghetti, parmesan cheese, butter, fresh parsley, eggs, salt & pepper ; preparation:Drain the spaghetti and stir in the cheese, 3 tbsp butter and the parsley. Let it cool slightly. Add salt& pepper to the beaten eggs. In a large non stick skillet heat remaining butter, over medium heat until foaming but not brown pour in the spagetti mixture and spread evenly. Cook for 4-5 minutes until the bottom is brown. Loosen with a spatula and invert onto a plate. Slide the frittata back into the pan and cook the other side until golden 3-4 minutes. ; name: tortellini bow tie pasta salad ; ingredients: cheese tortellini, dry bow tie pasta, black olives, pepperoni, feta cheese, cheddar cheese, green pepper, fresh tomato, italian dressing, salad seasoning ; preparation:Drain the precooked tortellini and bow tie pasta in a large colander. Rinse both pastas under cold water until completely cooled. Drain completely and set aside. In a large salad bowl, toss together the salad pastas and vegetables. Add the dressing and spices and toss everything well. Refrigerate until time to serve. This salad develops more flavor the longer it refrigerates so it can be made the night before if desired. Lightly toss just prior to serving. ; name: spinach feta penne with pine nuts ; ingredients: penne pasta, olive oil, fresh garlic, feta cheese, parmesan cheese, baby spinach, pine nuts ; preparation:Cook penne pasta according to package directions. As pasta is cooking, toast pine nuts lightly in a small skillet over medium-low heat, stirring frequently and keeping a close eye on them to prevent burning. Remove pine nuts from heat when lightly browned, after about 1-2 minutes. Set aside pine nuts. Drain cooked pasta and set aside. Heat olive oil in a large, deep skillet or wok. Add garlic and saute over medium heat for about 30 seconds, being careful not to let garlic brown. Stir in cooked pasta. Stir in feta and parmesan cheese and cook for a 2-3 minutes, until feta cheese just starts to melt and pasta and cheese is thoroughly heated through. Stir in spinach and continue to heat until spinach barely starts to wilt. Take pasta off heat and stir in the toasted pine nuts. Transfer to serving dish and serve. ; name: broccoli burritos ; ingredients: flour tortillas, fresh broccoli, monterey jack cheese, tomatoes, onion, jalapeno, tomato sauce, sour cream ; preparation:Wrap tortillas tightly in aluminum foil. Bake at 350 degrees f for 15 minutes. Combine broccoli, cheese, tomato, jalapenos if you want, and onion. Spoon mixture evenly in center of each tortilla. Roll up each tortilla. Place seam side down in a lightly greased 12x8 2-inch baking dish. Top with tomato sauce or other tomato variant. Cover dish, and bake at 350 degrees f. For 45 minutes. Spread sour cream over top. Garnish with parsley if desired. ; name: broccoli and cheddar bow ties ; ingredients: bow tie pasta, broccoli, all-purpose flour, salt, pepper, milk, dijon mustard, old cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: korean seasoned spinach ; ingredients: spinach, soy sauce, sugar, sesame seeds, sesame oil, green onion, salt ; preparation:Remove roots from spinach and wash well. I soak in a solution of vinegar and water and then rinse. In bowl, combine soy sauce, sugar, sesame seeds, sesame oil, and green onions. In a large pot bring water to boil. Add spinach and immerse only until leaves turn bright green. Do not over boil. Spinach will not taste right. Drain and rinse with cold water. Squeeze out as much water as possible. Add the spinach to the sauce and mix well. This can be served warm or even refrigerated for another time. ; name: red rice sausage ; ingredients: vegetable oil, hot smoked sausage, onion, green pepper, celery, water, tomato sauce, salt, black pepper, parboiled rice ; preparation:Heat the oil in a heavy pan over medium heat. Add the sausage pieces and cook until brown, about 5 minutes. Add the onions, green peppers, and celery. Cook for 3 minutes. Add the water, tomato sauce, salt and pepper. Heat to boiling. Stir in the rice. Reduce heat to simmer. Cook covered, until rice is tender, about 30 minutes. Remove from heat and keep covered until time to serve. ; name: ginger soy sauce ; ingredients: soy sauce, water, sugar, fresh ginger, sesame oil, green onions, garlic ; preparation:Whisk soy sauce, water, sugar, ginger, garlic and oil together in a small bowl. Let stand 10 to 15 minutes for the flavors to mix. Then wisk again. Sprinkle with thinly sliced green onion. Use as a dipping suace for ginger chicken or any asian dish. ; name: stir crazy pork and papaya ; ingredients: vegetable oil, unsalted cashews, red chile, garlic cloves, pork fillets, greens, lime, juice and zest of, soy sauce, papaya, brown rice ; preparation:Heat 1 tablespoon of the vegetable oil in a wok over medium heat. Add the cashews and gently toss until golden brown. Remove with a perforated spoon and set aside. Heat the remaining tablespoon of oil. Add the chilli and garlic, and stir-fry for 1 minute. Raise the heat and add the pork, greens and lime zest. Fry for a few minutes until pork begins to colour. Add the lime juice, soy sauce and papaya. Heat through for 1 minute, stirring. Return the cashews to the wok and toss to mix. ; name: curried shrimp with brown rice ; ingredients: shrimp, onion, garlic, frozen green pea, chicken broth, curry paste, cooked brown rice, sesame oil ; preparation:Coat a large, nonstick skillet with cooking spray and preheat over medium heat. Add the shrimp, onion and garlic and cook, stirring frequently, for about 4 minutes or until shrimp turn pink and are thoroughly cooked. Add the peas, broth and curry paste, reduce heat to medium. Cover and cook for a minute or two or just until the peas are thawed and heated through. Add the rice and sesame oil. Toss the mixture gently over medium heat for a minute or two or until heated through. Add more broth if mixture seems too dry. Serve hot. ; name: oriental cabbage ; ingredients: onion, water, garlic clove, fresh ginger, sesame oil, cabbage, soy sauce ; preparation:Slice onion. Place in bowl with water. Cover and microwave on high for 3 minutes. Put onion in large skillet with remaining ingredients. Cook, covered, over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, until cabbage is tender, about 20 minutes. ; name: korean spinach soup ; ingredients: fresh spinach, green onion, garlic clove, sesame oil, ground beef, soy sauce, salt, pepper, water ; preparation:Wash the spinach thoroughly, then trim off the thick stems. Heat the sesame oil in a heavy-bottomed pot. Brown the ground beef, separating while stir-frying. Add the green onion, garlic, soy sauce, salt and pepper and stir-fry for 30 seconds. Add the water, then the spinach. Bring the soup to a boil, then lower the flame. Place a tight-fitting lid on the pot and simmer for 10 minutes. ; name: thai shrimp fried rice with pineapple ; ingredients: jasmine rice, vegetable oil, garlic, onion, medium shrimp, fish sauce, sugar, crushed pineapple, green onions ; preparation:

name: zinggggggy chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, plum jam, soy sauce, hot pepper sauce, prepared horseradish, dijon mustard ; preparation:Heat oven 425f. Place wings in a single layer on a baking sheet. Combine remaining ingredients and brush generously over the wings. Bake 15-20 minutes, baste frequently, until cooked and golden. Serve with chinese hot mustard. ; name: lacquered chinese chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, soy sauce, honey, dark sesame oil, fresh lemon juice, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, five-spice powder, white pepper ; preparation:Mix marinade ingredients together. Pour over wings. Refrigerate for 24 hours, turning container or bag several times to distribute the marinade evenly. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with heavy-duty foil and fold up a rim around the edges. Place marinaded wings on foil close together, but not touching. Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes. Remove wings with tongs to paper towel lined plate, drain. Serve at room temperate or cold. ; name: peppered chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, salt, garlic, black peppercorns, honey, light soya sauce, dark soya sauce ; preparation:Clean chicken wings and pat dry with paper towels. Rub all the marinade ingredients over the wings and keep in covered container. Store in refrigerator for several hours. Arrange chicken on a tray and grill until browned. Serve warm. You can also grill the wings but remember to flip over the wings more often as honey tends to get burnt easily. ; name: chicken wings with an asian flair ; ingredients: chicken wings, teriyaki sauce, soy sauce, garlic, sesame seeds, garlic powder, onion powder, crushed red pepper flakes, maple syrup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. In large bowl mix teriyaki sauce, soy sauce, minced garlic, sesame seeds, garlic powder, onion powder, red pepper flakes, and maple syrup. Place chicken in sauce and toss to coat. Pour chicken and sauce into a large disposable baking pan. Bake for 1 hour, tossing every 20 minutes. The liquid will gradually evaporate the longer you cook it. After 1 hour, increase the oven temperature to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Turn wings to coat evenly and cook for an additional 45 minutes. ; name: bourbon chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, vegetable oil cooking spray, brown sugar, garlic powder, powdered ginger, soy sauce, bourbon, ketchup ; preparation:Lightly coat large non-stick skillet with cooking spray. Place frozen wings in a single layer in the prepared skillet. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Pour mixture evenly over chicken. Cover and cook over medium heat 20 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink inside, turning wings often to prevent from sticking. ; name: port a pitt bbq chicken copycat recipe ; ingredients: butter, water, vinegar, salt, pepper, worcestershire sauce, chicken pieces ; preparation:Combine all ingredients. Pour over chicken in large roasting pan. Cover with aluminum foil. Bake in 325 degree oven 30 to 45 minutes. Grill chicken until browned dipping in marinade several times. ; name: maple chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, teriyaki sauce, light soy sauce, garlic, garlic powder, onion powder, black pepper, pure maple syrup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Remove wing. Place in disposable large baking pan. Add the maple syrup, soy sauce, teriyaki sauce, garlic, garlic powder, onion powder, and black pepper. Toss to coat. Place pan on baking sheet and bake for approximately 1 hour, tossing every 15 to 20 minute the liquid will gradually evaporate the longer you cook it. After 1 hour, increase the oven temperature to 425. Turn wings to coat evenly and cook on additional 45 minute. ; name: spicy ranch chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, hot pepper sauce, butter, cider vinegar, ranch dressing mix, paprika ; preparation:

name: strawberry cheese parfaits ; ingredients: cottage cheese, egg white, whipping cream, salt, vanilla, sugar, frozen strawberries ; preparation:Beat egg white until soft peaks are formed. Blend with cottage cheese, whipped cream, salt, vanilla, and sugar. In parfait gasses, alternate spoonfuls of cheese mixture with strawberries. Freeze. Remove from freezer 20 minutes before serving. ; name: christmas meringue cookies ; ingredients: egg whites, cream of tartar, salt, sugar, semi-sweet chocolate chips, candy cane, nuts, vanilla ; preparation:Whip egg whites until frothy. Add cream of tarter and salt. Whip until stiff and dry. Add sugar, beating constantly until very stiff. Fold in chocolate chips, crushed candy canes, nuts, and vanilla. Drop by spoonfuls onto heavy brown paper. Bake at 300 degrees until the meringue sets. Cool. Remove from brown paper. ; name: raspberry topped lemon pie ; ingredients: 9-inch graham cracker crust, frozen raspberries in light syrup, cornstarch, egg yolks, eagle brand condensed milk, realemon juice, yellow food coloring, whipped topping ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 deg. In saucepan, combine raspberries and cornstarch. Cook and stir until thickened. In bowl, beat egg yolk. Stir in sweetened condensed milk, realemon juice and food coloring if desired. Pour over crust. Bake 8 minutes. Spoon raspberry mixture over top. Chill 4 hours. Spread with whipped topping. Garnish as desired. Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: raspberry jello fruit fluff ; ingredients: raspberry gelatin powder, boiling water, raspberry sauce, cold water, frozen whipped topping, fresh raspberries ; preparation:Completely dissolve the raspberry gelatin in the boiling water. Add cold water. Stir in the raspberry sauce. Cool until thickened but not firm. Whip the gelatin until frothy and lighter in color. Fold the whipped topping into the whipped gelatin until there are no white streaks. Gently fold the raspberries into the mixture. Use a few berries for decoration. Refrigerate until firm, about three hours. ; name: banana meringue delight ; ingredients: egg whites, sugar, vanilla, salt, cream of tartar, instant vanilla pudding, skim milk, bananas, graham cracker squares ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300 degrees farenheit. In large bowl, beat egg whites until slightly stiff. Gradually add sugar and cream of tartar and continue to beat. Add vanilla and salt and continue beating until whites stand in stiff peaks. Spray 9 x 9- inch glass baking dish with non-stick cooking spray. Spread meringue over entire bottom and sides of dish to form a crust. Bake in 300 degrees fahrenheit oven for 45 minutes. Remove and cool. After crust has cooled, prepare pudding mix according to package directions and fold in sliced bananas. Pour pudding mixture into crust and sprinkle ground graham crackers on top. Chill and serve. ; name: orange pecan hot wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, eggs, frozen orange juice concentrate, water, flour, pecans, butter, catsup, brown sugar, tabasco sauce ; preparation:Cut wings into 3 pieces. Discard. Whisk eggs, orange juice concentrate and water until mixed well. Combine flour and pecans in a bag. Dip wings in egg mix, then toss in flour-pecan mix. Pour butter into a 15x10 inch baking pan. Arrange wings in single layer in pan. Bake, uncovered, at 375 for 25 minutes. Combine sauce ingredients. Spoon half over the wings. Turn wings and spoon on the remaining. Bake 30 minutes longer, until juices run clear. ; name: southern cranberry salad ; ingredients: strawberry gelatin, boiling water, whole berry cranberry sauce, mandarin oranges, crushed pineapple, pecans, cool whip ; preparation:Mix jello with boiling water. Stir until dissolved. Add cranberry sauce, oranges, pineapple, and pecans. Lightly spray a 4 cup ring mold or pretty glass dish that it will be served. Add salad. Cover with plastic wrap and chill at least 3 hours or till firm. Serve with dollop of cool whip. ; name: raspberry jello salad ; ingredients: pretzel sticks, white sugar, margarine, cool whip, cream cheese, raspberry jell-o gelatin, boiling water, frozen raspberries ; preparation:

name: cran raspberry jello salad ; ingredients: raspberry jell-o gelatin, frozen raspberries, whole berry cranberry sauce, crushed pineapple in juice ; preparation:Be sure that raspberries and pineapple are well drained. If too much liquid is left in them, the jello will not set up. Mix the jello according to package directions, using the juices from the drained fruits as part of the cold liquid. Stir in the remaining ingredients, breaking up the cranberry sauce well. Put into a 9x13 pan and chill until set. ; name: raspberry rave ; ingredients: red raspberries, crushed pineapple, raspberry gelatin powder, boiling water, sour cream ; preparation:In sieve, drain berries and pineapple over a bowl. Press the fruit with spoon until you have 2 cups juice. In med bowl, dissolve the gelatin in the boiling water. Stir in the 2 cups of juice, the fruit, and the sour cream until blended well. Pour into serving bowl and chill until firm. ; name: jello fruit bars ; ingredients: gelatin, unflavored gelatin, boiling water, berries ; preparation:Mix first 2 ingredients in medium bowl. Add boiling water. Stir 2 minutes. Pour into a 13x9 inch pan sprayed with cooking spray. Stir in berries. Refrigerate 3 hours or until firm. Cut into bars. ; name: caribbean blue jello shots ; ingredients: jello gelatin, boiling water, cold water, light rum ; preparation:Bring water to a rolling boil, then remove from heat. Stir together boiling water and powdered gelatin in a mixing bowl. Stir constantly until gelatin is completely dissolved. Stir in cold water and alcohol. Pour mixture into, individual shot-size plastic or paper cups. To make the jello easier to consume, buy plastic cups that also have lids. Pour the mix into the cup, add the lid, then turn it upside down prior to refrigeration. Place shots on a tray in refrigerator. Chill until firm. Refrigerate until served. ; name: layered strawberry squares ; ingredients: strawberry gelatin, boiling water, cold water, fresh strawberries, sugar, whipped topping, graham crackers ; preparation:Dissolve gelatin in boiling water. Add cold water and chill until slightly thickened. Meanwhile, slice strawberries, reserving a few for garnish and sprinkle with sugar. Fold whipped topping into gelatin, blending well. Fold in strawberries. Place 9 graham crackers in bottom of 9-inch square pan. Spread half the gelatin mixture over crackers. Repeat layers. Chill until firm, approximately 3 hours. Cut into squares. Garnish with reserved strawberries. ; name: pineapple rice cream salad ; ingredients: lime jell-o gelatin, boiling water, crushed pineapple, pineapple juice, cooked rice, sweetened condensed milk ; preparation:Dissolve jello gelatin in boiling water. Add pineapple juice and refrigerate 1 hour to cool. Also chill the condensed milk for 1 hour. Beat the condensed milk till thick. Beat jello till light and fluffy, then add condensed milk. Fold in rice and well drained pineapple. Chill at least 1 hour. ; name: corned beef molded salad ; ingredients: lemon jell-o gelatin, boiling water, cider vinegar, mayonnaise, corned beef, eggs, celery, green peppers, onions, salt ; preparation:Dissolve jello in boiling water. Slowly blend the vinegar and mayonnaise together till smooth and then slowly add to the jello mixture stirring all the while. Chill till partially set. While waiting for the jello to set, break up the corned beef into small pieces in a large bowl. Add the eggs, celery, green pepper, onion, and salt. Chill till set. ; name: cranberry raspberry salad ; ingredients: jello gelatin, boiling water, cranberry sauce, lemon juice, red raspberries ; preparation:

name: quick pizza soup ; ingredients: ground beef, condensed tomato soup, water, spaghetti sauce, italian seasoning, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a soup kettle or dutch oven, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink. Drain. Add soup, water, spaghetti sauce and italian seasoning. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Simmer, uncovered for 15 minutes. Add cheese, cook and stir until melted. Garnish with additional cheese if desired. ; name: venison parmesan ; ingredients: steaks, parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, eggs, salt and black pepper, olive oil, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Mix together 3 tbsp. Parmesan cheese with 1 cup bread crumbs. In bowl, beat 2 eggs, salt and pepper to taste. Dip venison in eggs, then bread crumbs. Heat 6 tbsp. Olive oil in skillet till hot. Fry venison 5 mins. Each side till brown. Then place venison on a cookie sheet, spoon spaghetti sauce over venison and bake in 325 degree oven till tender, i usually bake 15 or 20 mins. Then add mozzeralla cheese and bake till cheese melts. ; name: mama s beef a roni ; ingredients: ground beef, green pepper, onion, celery, garlic powder, italian seasoning, small shell pasta, mozzarella cheese, pasta sauce ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain. While pasta is cooking, on medium heat brown ground beef in large skillet. Add onions, peppers, celery, italian seasoning and garlic powder, stirring until vegetables are tender. Drain and return to skillet. Stir in pasta sauce. Add pasta and mix thoroughly. Sprinkle cheese over top. Cover with lid and let cheese melt. Let sit for about 5 minutes then serve and enjoy. ; name: crock pot pizza ; ingredients: hamburger, rigatoni pasta, ragu pizza sauce, mushrooms, onion, pepperoni, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Cook hamburger until done and drain off the fat. Add mushrooms and onion and fry until translucent. Add pepperoni. Add in one jar of ragu pizza sauce, and combine thoroughly. Layer this in bottom of crockpot. Meanwhile cook rigatoni noodles until el dente. Lay noodles on top of hamburger mix in crockpot. Turn crock on low and leave 4-5 hours. Pour over the remainder of pizza sauce over the noodles. Top with the cheese. ; name: smoked sausage primavera ; ingredients: spaghetti, frozen broccoli florets, sweet red pepper, onion, smoked sausage, water, evaporated milk, butter, italian seasoning, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook spaghetti according to package directions adding the vegetables during the last 4 minutes. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, bring sausage and water to a boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 8 minutes or unti heated through. Add milk, butter and italian seasoning. Cook and stir until butter is melted. Drain spaghetti & vegetables and return them to the pan. Add parmesan cheese and sausage mixture to the pasta & veggies - toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: bow tiezanga ; ingredients: bow tie pasta, cooked ground beef, spaghetti sauce, cottage cheese, italian cheese blend, garlic, salt and pepper ; preparation:In the cooked beef add the sauce and garlic simmer on low. After the bow-tie are drained really well put the cottage cheese and one of the shredded chesses in and mix well. In a 13x9 bake dish layer first part if the sauce and then half of the bow tie mixture. Then repeat until all is gone. Top with remaining shredded cheese. Bake at 350f for about 20 until heated through and cheese is melted. Enjoy. I also think this would be good to add veggies such as grated zucchini and mushroom or any you would like. ; name: pepperoni pinwheels ; ingredients: pizza crusts, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, pepperoni slice, spaghetti sauce ; preparation:On a lightly floured surface, roll dough into a 16 inch x 10 inch rectangle. Sprinkle with cheeses and pepperoni. Roll up jelly-roll style, starting with a long side. Cut into 2 inch slices,. Place cut side down in a greased 15 inch x 10 inch x 1 inch baking pan, lightly press down to flatten. Bake at 400 degrees for 8-10 minutes or until golden brown. Serve with spaghetti sauce if desired. ; name: baked beef and ravioli ; ingredients: cheese ravioli, ground beef, spaghetti sauce, frozen spinach, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: tuna noodle broccoli casserole ; ingredients: wide egg noodles, butter, all-purpose flour, salt, milk, mild cheddar cheese, tuna in water, frozen peas, fresh broccoli ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Prepare a medium baking dish by spraying with cooking spray. In a large pot of water, boil noodles until al dente. Drain well. In a medium saucepan, combine flour, butter, and salt. Stir until butter is melted and ingredients are combined evenly. Add milk, and whisk until the sauce thickens. Add cheese to mixture, and whisk until cheese is melted and mixture is well blended. Stir in tuna, peas, broccoli, and noodles. Spread the mixture evenly in prepared dish. Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes or until the top noodles begins to turn golden brown. ; name: mama lu s broccoli casserole ; ingredients: white bread, frozen chopped broccoli, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, butter, sugar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Butter a 9x13 glass pyrex dish. Tear the bread slices into bite size pieces and cover the bottom of the pan. Layer the chopped broccoli on top of the bread slices. In a large bowl, combine the remaining ingredients and pour over the broccoli and bread, making sure all the bread pieces get a good soaking and that the cheese is distributed evenly. Cover with tin foil and bake for 35-40 minutes or until casserole is golden brown and set. Let rest 10 minutes and cut into squares and serve. ; name: tuna frenchee ; ingredients: tuna, white bread, mayonnaise, egg, milk, flour, salt, corn flake crumbs, oil ; preparation:Mix tuna with just enough mayonnaise to keep it together. Lightly spread each piece of bread with mayonnaise. Make 3 sandwiches spreading tuna not quite to the edge of the bread. Cut the crusts off the sandwiches. Cut each sandwich diagonally both ways, making 4 triangles. Combine egg, milk, flour and salt. Dip each triangle into egg mixture and then coat with the corn flake crumbs. Deep fry at 375 degrees until golden brown. ; name: tuna fish and spaghetti casserole ; ingredients: solid white tuna, spaghetti, cream of mushroom soup, milk, onion, green peppers, potato chips ; preparation:Boil spaghetti for 10 minutes. Drain. Spray frying pan with nonstick cooking spray. Saute pepper and onion until softened slightly. Season with salt and pepper. Mix together onion, pepper, tuna, spaghetti, soup, and milk. Add to greased casserole dish. Top mixture with chips. Bake at 375 for 35 minutes. ; name: tuna pita ; ingredients: tuna in water, celery ribs, green onions, fresh dill, plain nonfat yogurt, dry mustard, celery salt, whole wheat pita bread, tomatoes, lettuce ; preparation:Drain and flake tuna with a fork. Combine with celery, green onion and dill. Blend together yogurt, mustard, and celery salt, then mix with tuna. Cut pita bread in half and line with lettuce and tomato slices. Add tuna and serve. ; name: creamy tuna pasta salad ; ingredients: tuna in water, medium pasta shell, celery, onion, mayonnaise, dried parsley, lemon juice, salt, pepper, dry mustard ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package. Rinse with cold water and drain well. Meanwhile, combine tuna, celery, and onion in large bowl. In smaller mixing bowl, combine mayo, parsley, lemon juice, salt, pepper, and dry mustard. Add pasta to tuna mixture. Spoon mayo mixture over tuna and stir until well blended. Refrigerate 3 hours or until chilled. ; name: hot faux crab dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, albacore tuna in water, mayonnaise, old bay seasoning, garlic, onion ; preparation:Mix all. Pour into a heatproof dish and top with breadcrumbs or cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 15 to 20 minutes or until bubbly. Serve with crackers or thin slices of french bread. ; name: terrific tuna melt ; ingredients: solid white tuna packed in water, chive & onion cream cheese, pita bread, mild cheddar cheese, assorted fresh vegetable ; preparation:

name: ginger soy sauce ; ingredients: soy sauce, water, sugar, fresh ginger, sesame oil, green onions, garlic ; preparation:Whisk soy sauce, water, sugar, ginger, garlic and oil together in a small bowl. Let stand 10 to 15 minutes for the flavors to mix. Then wisk again. Sprinkle with thinly sliced green onion. Use as a dipping suace for ginger chicken or any asian dish. ; name: chinese sesame salad ; ingredients: napa cabbage, green onion, sesame seeds, ramen noodles, sliced almonds, butter, vinegar, sugar, vegetable oil, soy sauce ; preparation:Combine cabbage and onions. Refrigerate until ready to toss. Brown noodles, almonds and sesame seeds lightly in butter. Set aside. Bring to a boil in a pan the vinegar, oil, sugar and soy sauce, just enough to dissolve the sugar. Cool dressing completely. Combine all ingredients and toss just before serving. ; name: korean spinach soup ; ingredients: fresh spinach, green onion, garlic clove, sesame oil, ground beef, soy sauce, salt, pepper, water ; preparation:Wash the spinach thoroughly, then trim off the thick stems. Heat the sesame oil in a heavy-bottomed pot. Brown the ground beef, separating while stir-frying. Add the green onion, garlic, soy sauce, salt and pepper and stir-fry for 30 seconds. Add the water, then the spinach. Bring the soup to a boil, then lower the flame. Place a tight-fitting lid on the pot and simmer for 10 minutes. ; name: jenn s sesame chicken ; ingredients: olive oil, flour, pepper, boneless chicken breasts, soy sauce, sugar, sesame seed oil, sesame seeds ; preparation:Rinse, dry and cut chicken into chunks. Mix together flour and pepper. Coat chicken chunks with this mixture. Heat the olive oil in large frying pan. Toss in chicken and cook until no longer pink in the middle. Remove cooked chicken from pan and keep warm. In same pan combine soy sauce, sugar, sesame seeds and sesame seed oil. Cook until sugar is melted. Return chicken to pan and coat with mixture. Serve over rice and broccoli. ; name: sesame tofu with spinach ; ingredients: firm tofu, sesame seeds, dark sesame oil, soy sauce, hot pepper sauce, olive oil, garlic cloves, baby spinach, salt, pepper ; preparation:Slice the tofu lengthwise into 4 rectangular slabs, than half each piece to get squares. Spread the sesame seeds on a plate. Press all surfaces of each tofu square into the seeds to coat. Heat the sesame oil in a large skillet on medium heat. Arrange the tofu in a single layer and cook about 5 minutes carefully turn and cook 5 minutes on other side. Add soy sauce and tabasco, turn the squares over, and cook another minute. Transfer squares to a plate. Add the oil and garlic to the pan and saut for about 30 seconds, until golden. Add the still damp rinsed spinach and cook for 1-2 more minutes, stirring constantly. Cook until wilted but still bright green. Season to taste with salt & pepper. Serve the tofu on top of the spinach. ; name: garlic sesame t bones or porterhouse steaks ; ingredients: soy sauce, hoisin sauce, dark sesame oil, chili-garlic sauce, garlic cloves, steaks, parsley, toasted sesame seeds ; preparation:In ziploc baggie, combine first 5 ingredients. Add steaks, turn bag over and over to coat both sides of each steak well. Marinate in fridge for 30 minutes to overnight. Heat broiler, remove steaks from bag saving marinade. Place steaks on lightly geased broiler pan. Spoon half of the marinade on steaks. Broil 4-6 inches from heat for 4 minutes. Turn steaks over, top with rest of marinade, and broil 4-5 minutes longer for medium rare. Plate, and sprinkle with sesame seeds and parsley. Let rest 5 minutes before eating. You can also slice this thinly and serve over rice or make wraps. These can also be cooked on a grill. ; name: egg tomato leftover rice ; ingredients: oil, eggs, tomatoes, soy sauce, cooked rice, salt, pepper, chili sauce ; preparation:Heat oil, then scramble eggs until set. Add tomatoes and mix with eggs for 1 minute to steam. Add soy sauce. Cover and let steam for 1 minute. Mix in leftover rice. Add salt, pepper, chili sauce to taste. ; name: spinach with sesame dressing from japanese home cooking ; ingredients: spinach, sesame seeds, dashi, soy sauce ; preparation:

name: pesto elk meatballs ; ingredients: ground elk, pesto sauce, parmesan cheese, egg, plain breadcrumbs, garlic powder, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large bowl combine all ingredients and cup breadcrumbs. Mix all ingredients together by hand and place in refrigerator for 1 hour. Put remaining breadcrumbs in a bowl. Shape meatballs into round balls, roll in breadcrumbs and place on a non-stick cookie sheet. Bake for 20 minutes turning meatballs after the first 10 minutes. Remove from oven and enjoy. ; name: spicy buffalo glazed meatballs ; ingredients: ground beef, soft breadcrumbs, egg, onions, garlic, salt and pepper, hot pepper sauce, butter, honey, blue cheese dressing ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine ground beef, bread crumbs, egg, onion, garlic, salt and pepper in large bowl, mixing lightly but thoroughly. Shape mixture into 32 1-inch meatballs. Place on rack in broiler pan and bake 18 to 20 minuntes. Do not overbake for they will become dry. Meanwhile, combine hot pepper sauce, butter and honey in a small saucepan. Simmer, low, for about 5 minutes until sauce has thickened and has reduced by about half. Place meatballs into a bowl and pour sauce mixture over, stirring to coat well. Serve meatballs with blue cheese dressing. ; name: sloppy joes sandwiches ; ingredients: ground beef, ketchup, water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, prepared mustard, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, hamburger buns ; preparation:In a large saucepan, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink. Drain. Stir in the ketchup, water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, mustard, garlic powder, onion powder, and salt. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 30-40 minutes. Serve on buns. ; name: stuffed hamburgers ; ingredients: ground beef, soft breadcrumbs, onion, eggs, sugar, soy sauce, water, garlic clove, msg, ginger ; preparation:Combine ground beef with remaining ingredients. Mix well. Shape into 6 patties or 3 larger steaks. Broil 4 to 5 inches from heat for 10 minutes, turning once. These burgers can also be pan grilled. ; name: flounder bake ; ingredients: butter, onions, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, lemon juice, flounder fillets, salt, pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in a pan and cook onion for 2 minutes or until soft. Place fish fillets in a baking dish sprayed with cooking oil. Pour melted butter with onions over the fish. Sprinkle fish with italian bread crumbs and parmesan cheese. Top with lemon juice, salt and pepper. Bake for 15-20 minutes in 375 degree oven until fish is flaky and fully cooked. ; name: italian turkey meatballs ; ingredients: ground turkey, cracker crumb, italian seasoning, seasoning, egg, vegetable oil, instant minced onion, italian breadcrumbs ; preparation:In large mixing bowl, mix all ingredients except the italian bread crumbs. Vegetable oil. Form into 2 inch meat balls. For more intense italian flavor, roll each meatball in the italian bread crumbs. This is optional. If you are going to put the meatballs in sauce or soup do not roll in the crumbs. Place on a baking pan that is non-stick. Preheat oven 375. Cook on the middle rack for 30 - 35 minutes. Makes 25 to 30 meatballs. ; name: baked panko chicken parmesan ; ingredients: chicken tenderloins, parmesan cheese, panko breadcrumbs, italian seasoning, salt, black pepper, garlic powder, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Beat eggs in a bowl. Combine cheeses, bread crumbs and spices in a separate bowl. Dip chicken pieces in egg, then bread crumb mixture, then egg, then bread crumb mixture again. Place chicken on a cookie sheet and bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes. Serve over pasta with marinara sauce and mozzarella. Or place chicken on a hoagie roll with marinara and mozzarella for a chicken parmesan sub. Also great for dipping with marinara or ranch. ; name: turkey and hash browns pie ; ingredients: ground turkey, carrots, egg, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, frozen hash browns, butter, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: bread crumb cake ; ingredients: egg yolks, sugar, cold water, walnuts, soft breadcrumbs, baking powder, shortening, vanilla, egg whites ; preparation:Beat egg yolks until thick and lemon colored. Add sugar and water. Add the nuts, bread crumbs, baking powder, and shortening. Mix well. Add vanilla and fold in stiffly beaten egg whites. Bake in 2 greased layer cake pans in hot oven 15- 20 minutes. When cool, spread whipped cream, sweetened and flavored, between layers and on top of cake. ; name: nannys chocolate pie 5 star family favorite ; ingredients: egg yolks, sugar, cocoa, cornstarch, salt, milk, vanilla extract, pie shell ; preparation:Combine all accept vanilla and cook on low heat until very thick. Stir often to prevent scorching. Remove from heat- let sit a minute or two and stir in vanilla. Pour into pie shell. Top with meringue and bake as directed. I will be posting nannys meringue recipe. ; name: chocolate pots de creme ; ingredients: heavy cream, granulated sugar, semisweet chocolate morsels, egg yolks, vanilla extract ; preparation:Put heavy cream in top of a double boiler. Add sugar. Place over boiling water and scald. Remove from heat and add chocolate and stir until completely melted. Beat egg yolks and gradually beat them into the hot chocolate cream mixture. Place top of double boiler over boiling water again and cook, stirring constantly, until well thickened. Remove from heat, stir in vanilla, and then pour into 6-8 small custard cups. When cool, place in refrigerator to chill before serving. ; name: dairy free sugar free chocolate mousse ; ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, coconut milk, egg yolks, salt, vanilla ; preparation:Cut chocolate into slivers with a large knife. Place in a large bowl. Mix coconut milk, egg yolks, stevia, and salt in a saucepan. Heat over medium until steaming. Do not boil. Cook for 15 minutes until thickened. Pour milk mixture through fine meshed sieve to remove lumps into chocolate. Let mixture sit for five minutes. Stir chocolate and milk mixture slowly and constantly until fully mixed. Add vanilla and mix inches. Pour into container such as a bowl or individual cups. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving. ; name: strawberry cheese cake ice cream ; ingredients: cream cheese, milk, fresh lemon juice, sugar, salt, heavy cream, eggs, vanilla, strawberry ; preparation:Bring milk just to a boil in a heavy saucepan. Whisk together eggs, sugar, and salt in a bowl, then add hot milk in a slow stream, whisking. Pour custard back into saucepan and cook over moderately low heat, stirring with a wooden spoon, approx 2 to 3 minutes, the custard will coat the back of the spoon. Immediately pour custard through a fine-mesh sieve into a clean bowl. On very low speed, blend in cream cheese until thoroughly incorporated. Stir in cream and vanilla. Place plastic wrap directly onto surface of custard mixture and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or over night. Freeze completely cooled custard in ice cream maker.
