name: cranberry apricot chutney ; ingredients: cranberries, sugar, dried apricot, dried currant, golden raisin, balsamic vinegar, tangerines, pecans ; preparation:Sort the cranberries, discarding any bruised or decayed fruit, then rinse. In a 4-quart saucepan, over medium-high heat, bring the water, cranberries, sugar, apricots, currants, raisins & vinegar to a boil, stirring often. Reduce heat & simmer, stirring occasionally, until cranberries begin to pop, 5-8 minutes. Meanwhile, peel the tangerines, removing & discarding the peel & white fibers. Discard the seeds, then separate the segments & coarsely chop them. Add the chopped tangerines & the juice to the pan, & simmer to blend flavors, 2-3 minutes. Stir in pecans, then cool to room temperature & serve. Or chill & serve. Can be kept in an airtight container in the refrigerator up to 3 days, or frozen for up to 1 month. ; name: cinnamon sugared almonds ; ingredients: sugar, water, whole almonds, ground cinnamon, salt ; preparation:In a large, heavy bottomed, skillet place the sugar and water. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Add the almonds and cook, stirring constantly, until almost all the water has evaporated. About 5 minutes. Add the cinnamon and salt and cook until the sugar has dried on the almonds. About 2 minutes. Pour onto a large sheet pan and let cool. ; name: low fat carrot and fruit loaf ; ingredients: carrot, green apple, sultana, dried apricot, water, apple juice, raw sugar, cinnamon, self raising flour, bananas ; preparation:Place carrot, apple, dried fruit, water, juice, sugar and cinnamon in pot. Bring to the boil, simmer 15 minutes. Set aside to cool. Fold in sifted flours and bananas. Spoon mixture into greased loaf tin 10 x 20 cms. Bake 180 c for 50 - 60 minutes or until cooked when tested. Turn onto wire rack to cool. Slice and serve with butter. ; name: clementine cake ; ingredients: clementines, ground almonds, sugar, baking powder, eggs ; preparation:Boil the whole clementines for 2 hours in water. Yes, whole skin and stalk. Once boiled, place clementines, almonds, sugar, baking powder and eggs into a blender and mix. Place in a greased deep cake tin. Bake for 1 hour on gas 4. ; name: loz almond sweetmeats ; ingredients: ground almonds, icing sugar, orange blossom water, pistachio nuts, caster sugar ; preparation:Combine the finely chopped pistachio nuts and caster sugar, and set aside. Combine the ground almonds and icing sugar with enough orange-blossom water to form a stiff paste. Knead until smooth and allow to rest for about 10 minutes. Shape the paste into small balls the size of a walnut, and using a teaspoon handle, make a small hole in each ball and fill it with the combined pistachio nuts and caster sugar. Close the hole over the filling and reshape to a round shape. Roll the balls in icing sugar and place in small paper cups or on a serving plate. Decorate the top of each ball with a peeled pistachio nut. Serve with coffee. ; name: casserole cookies ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, dates, flaked coconut, walnuts, vanilla, almond extract ; preparation:Beat eggs. Add sugar gradually beating until fluffy. Stir in remaninig ingredients. Place into an ungreased 2 qt casserole. I use a 9 x 9 pyrex pan. Bake in oven at 350 for 30 minutes. Remove from oven and stir well. Cool. Form into balls and roll in granulated sugar. ; name: sugarplums ; ingredients: whole almonds, honey, orange zest, ground cinnamon, ground allspice, nutmeg, dried apricot, dates, almond oil, icing sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Place nuts on a baking tray and toast in the oven for about 10 minutes, then cool. Process nuts in a food processor until quite fine, but not to dust. Add remaining ingredients except the oil and the icing sugar. Pulse a few times to mix. Turn mix into a bowl and rub your hands with a little of the oil. Pinch of walnut sized pieces and roll into balls. Sift the icing sugar over the rolled balls, enough to coat well. Store in an airtight container. Refrigerate in hot weather. ; name: turkish apricot compote kayisi kompostosu ; ingredients: fresh apricots, sugar, water, almond extract, almonds ; preparation:

name: lemon krisp cookies ; ingredients: lemon cake mix, rice krispies, butter, egg, lemon, rind of ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine all ingredients in a large mixing bowl until well mixed. Shape into 1 inch balls and place 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes. Leave on cookie sheets for a minute or two and then cool completely on wire racks. ; name: mandarin orange coffee cake ; ingredients: orange cake mix, instant vanilla pudding, eggs, vegetable oil, mandarin oranges ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grease and flour 10-inch bundt pan. Combine cake mix, pudding mix, eggs, oil, and one-cup juice. Beat at medium speed with electric mixer for 2 minutes. Add mandarin oranges in the last 30 seconds. Pour in pan. Bake 38 to 43 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in pan 10 minutes. Invert onto plate. Dust with powdered sugar when completely cooled. ; name: chocolate tube cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, instant chocolate pudding mix, eggs, oil, water, powdered sugar, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Blend cake mix and pudding in a large bowl. Add eggs, oil and water. Start on low speed, then 10 minutes at medium speed once ingredients are throughly mixed. Turn batter into a 10 inch tube pan. Bake 50 minutes at 350 or until toothpick is clean. Cool in pan on rack do not turn upside down. Using a 2 tined fork, poke holes 1 inch apart in the entire cake. Prepare glaze mixing powdered sugar and milk til smooth. Pour glaze over cake immediately and allow to cool in the pan. ; name: cointreau melt in your mouth cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, vanilla instant pudding mix, eggs, vegetable oil, orange juice, cointreau liqueur, sugar, butter, fresh raspberries, orange rind ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine cake mix, pudding mix, eggs, oil, orange juice and cointreau. Beat well for 10 minutes. Pour into lightly greased bundt pan. Bake at 350 for 45- 60 minutes until done. Let stand 10 minutes. Turn out of pan. While cake is baking, boil sugar, butter, orange juice and cointreau for roughly 5 minutes. Pour over cake while cake is still warm. To serve, top each slice with fresh raspberries and a sprinkle of orange peel. ; name: triple lemon pound cake ; ingredients: duncan hines lemon supreme cake mix, lemon flavor instant pudding and pie filling, water, oil, eggs, white chocolate chips, powdered sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Mix cake mix, instant lemon pudding mix, oil, eggs, and water and set aside. Melt white chocolate chips in the microwave for 30 to 40 seconds until melted. Stir melted white chocolate until creamy and smooth and add to the cake batter mixing thoroughly. Pour batter into a greased or sprayed bundt pan or two medium loaf pans and bake for 35-40 minutes or until toothpick inserted comes out clean. Let cake cool, remove from pan and sprinkle with powdered sugar. ; name: lemon angel bars ; ingredients: angel food cake mix, water, lemon flavor instant pudding and pie filling, lemon frosting ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Beat cake mix and water in extra-large glass or metal bowl on low speed for 30 seconds. Beat on medium speed for 1 minute. Add lemon pie filling and mix well. Pour into ungreased 15x10 jelly roll pan. Bake 25 minutes. Cool and frost. ; name: orange almond cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, light olive oil, eggs, orange juice, orange zest, sliced almonds ; preparation:Mix first 5 ingredients with mixer for 3 minutes. Pour batter into greased cake pan. I use a 10 inch diameter silicone cake pan and make it in one layer. Sprinkle top of batter with sliced almonds. Bake at 350 degrees until done, about 40 minutes. ; name: lemon poppy seed bread ; ingredients: lemon cake mix, eggs, vegetable oil, instant lemon pudding, water, poppy seed ; preparation:

name: welsh salad dressing ; ingredients: egg, salt and pepper, butter, milk, warm water, sugar, mustard, flour, vinegar ; preparation:Mix egg, sugar, salt and pepper together. Add flour and mustard. Keep it a nice smooth paste. Add melted butter, milk, water and lastly vinegar. Cook over low heat until as thick as cream. Do not boil. Keep in refrigerator. ; name: baked lemon pudding ; ingredients: sugar, flour, salt, lemon juice, lemon, zest of, eggs, butter, milk ; preparation:In a medium mixing bowl, combine sugar, flour and salt. Stir in lemon juice, zest, beaten egg yolks, butter and milk. In a separate bowl, beat egg whites until stiff but not dry. Fold into lemon mixture. Pour into buttered 6 cup casserole dish. Place this casserole inside a large pan. Pour hot water into the 9x13 pan to a depth of about 1 inch. Bake at 350 degrees for about 40 minutes or until the topping is set and golden brown. During baking this separates into a cake-like topping with a lemon sauce beneath. ; name: jan s belgian waffles ; ingredients: eggs, vanilla, flour, salt, milk, butter, sugar, cinnamon, lemon juice ; preparation:Beat egg yellow until light. Add a small amount of melted butter and quickly stir to temper the yolks. Add the remaining melted butter, vanilla and lemon juice. Mix well. Combine flour, salt, sugar and cinnamon together in separate bowl. Add warmed milk to flour mixture. Add egg yolk mixture to flour mixture and beat well. Beat egg white until stiff. Gently fold into batter. Pour batter onto heated waffle iron and cook until lightly crisp and golden. Serve with hot syrup, fresh berries, whipped cream, or bananas and chocolate chips. ; name: rooster cookies sugar cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, salt, flour ; preparation:Cream together the butter and sugar. Beat in 1 egg, add salt and flour. Mix all ingredients are well blended. Chill dough for 3-4 hours before rolling. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Roll out and cut. Bake about 8-10 minutes or until barely colored. Cookies can be frosted and decorated or eaten just plain. ; name: cooked potato or pasta salad dressing ; ingredients: sugar, flour, salt, ground mustard, eggs, water, half-and-half, white vinegar, black pepper, mayonnaise ; preparation:In a medium saucepan mix all ingredients together. Bring to a light boil, whisking constantly until thickened. Remove from heat, cool slightly then whisk in mayo. Season with salt and pepper. Cool completely before adding to you potato or pasta salad. ; name: italian breakfast lemon loaf ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, vegetable oil, milk, lemon juice, lemon zest, flour, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grease and flour a 9x5x3 loaf pan. Put the eggs in a mixing bowl and beat with an electric mixer until they are pale yellow and thickened. With the mixer running, gradually add the sugar and then the oil in a slow, steady stream. In a small bowl, stir milk, lemon juice, and lemon zest together and add to batter. Sift flour, baking powder, and salt together and blend into batter until thoroughly mixed. Pour batter into the prepared pan, which should be about two-thirds full. Place in oven and bake about 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted near the center of the loaf comes out clean. Place the pan on a cooling rack for 5 minutes. Loosen loaf and turn out onto the rack. Turn loaf upright and let cool completely. Sprinkle with powdered sugar or you can make a lemon glaze and drizzle over. ; name: lemon thyme biscuit bites ; ingredients: flour, fresh thyme, sugar, lemon zest, baking powder, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, buttermilk ; preparation:In medium bowl, combine dry ingredients. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Using a fork, stir in buttermilk until dough just comes together. Fill each well with 1 tablespoon dough. Bake 4-6 minutes. ; name: dillsas dill sauce ; ingredients: butter, flour, chicken stock, fresh dill, vinegar, sugar, egg yolk, salt ; preparation:

name: hungry jack casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, salt, pork & beans, barbecue sauce, brown sugar, instant minced onion, flakey biscuits, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Brown ground beef and strain. Add next 5 ingredients and heat til bubbly. Pour into 2 quart casserole dish. Peel biscuits in half and lay across top. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes. ; name: original enchiritos from tyson ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, refried beans, green chili peppers, enchilada sauce, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 350f. Grease bottom of 9x11 baking dish. In a medium skillet, brown ground beef with onion. Stir in refried beans, green chili peppers and 1 can enchilada sauce and heat until warm. Spoon 3 or 4 tablespoons of meat mxture onto a tortilla and sprinkle with cheese. Fold tortilla around mixture and place in baking dish. Repeat with remaining meat mixture. Top with 1 can enchilada sauce and remaining grated cheese. Bake for 15- 20 minutes. ; name: sloppy joes for a crowd or oamc ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onions, worcestershire sauce, brown sugar, prepared mustard, chili powder, ketchup, salt and pepper, hamburger buns ; preparation:In several large kettles or dutch ovens, brown beef. Drain. In a large bowl, combine the next several ingredients. Divide evenly between pans. Simmer for 1 hour. Stir occasionally. Serve on buns with slices of cheese, if desired. ; name: hard chargin blue cheese stampede blue cheese hamburger ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, tabasco sauce, honey, garlic salt, crushed red pepper flakes, black pepper, blue cheese, roasted red peppers, portabella mushrooms ; preparation:Preheat grill to a medium-high heat. Combine ground beef, onion, tabasco, honey, garlic salt, red pepper and pepper in a bowl. Mix well. Cut the blue cheese into 1oz squares. Divide meat into 6 portions and form patties around the pieces of blue cheese. Grill 8-10 minutes or until done. Toast your buns and grill the portabella mushrooms. Place patties on bun and top with roasted red peppers and portabellas. Enjoy. ; name: quick taco bake ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, taco seasoning mix, tomato sauce, whole kernel corn, cheddar cheese, bisquick baking mix, milk, eggs ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Cook beef and onion until beef is brown, drain. Spoon into ungreased 13x9x2 inch baking dish. Stir in taco mix, dry, tomato sauce and corn. Sprinkle with cheese. Stir remaining ingredients until blended, pour over beef mixture. Bake 35 minute or until light golden brown. Serve with sour cream, chopped tomato and shredded cheese, if desired. ; name: sloppy joes sandwiches ; ingredients: ground beef, ketchup, water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, prepared mustard, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, hamburger buns ; preparation:In a large saucepan, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink. Drain. Stir in the ketchup, water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, mustard, garlic powder, onion powder, and salt. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 30-40 minutes. Serve on buns. ; name: oyster sauce beef ; ingredients: beef, egg white, oyster sauce, sherry wine, cornstarch, sugar, soy sauce, green onions, fresh ginger, oil ; preparation:Marinate beef in egg white, oyster sauce, sherry, cornstarch, soy sauce and sugar for 1 hour. Heat oil in frying pan until hot. Stir-fry green onions and ginger 1 minute. Add beef. Stir-fry 4 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: cranberry special meatballs ; ingredients: ground beef, seasoned stuffing mix, eggs, onion, salt, black pepper, whole berry cranberry sauce, chili sauce, light brown sugar, ground ginger ; preparation:

name: bette s daube marinara ; ingredients: light olive oil, chuck roast, garlic cloves, fresh parsley, bay leaf, dried thyme, italian stewed tomatoes, tomato paste, water, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil until hot in a dutch oven large enough to accomodate the roast. Season the trimmed beef with a little salt and pepper. Place the roast in the dutch oven and sear the roast on both sides. Once the roast is browned on both sides, turn down the heat and add the garlic, parsley, baf leaf, thyme, tomatoes, tomato paste and red wine. Cover with water. Cover and cook for one hour and check for liquid level. The roast not be dry, if so, add more water until it is covered, check again in anohter hour for tenderness. Again, if the roast is dry, add water to cover. The roast should be finished cooking and fall apart tender in a sauce in 3 hours. Serve with spaghetti. ; name: bacon and pepper pasta ; ingredients: bacon, onions, garlic cloves, green pepper, sweet red pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook bacon until crisp. Remove bacon with slotted spoon and set aside, reserving the drippings. Saute onions and garlic in drippings for 3 minutes. Add peppers, cook and stir for 3 minutes. Stir in tomatoes and heat through. Add bacon and mix well. Serve over pasta. Cooking time does not reflect time to cook pasta. ; name: garlic skillet red potatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, small red potatoes, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Stir in potatoes. Cover skillet. Cook, stirring, until potatoes are almost tender, about 12-15 minutes. Uncover, reduce heat to low. Stir in garlic, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring, until potatoes are tender, about 2 minutes. Sprinkle parsley and add salt to taste if desired. ; name: chicken in tomato sauce ; ingredients: chicken portions, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, red pepper, chopped tomatoes, basil, parsley, chives, green pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Saut chicken portions in 1 tablespoon of olive oil until browned. Remove with a slotted spoon and put in a casserole dish. Heat remaining oil. Add onion and garlic, and cook for 3 minutes. Add peppers and cook for a further 2 minutes. Add tinned tomatoes and herbs and simmer for 5 minutes. Spoon sauce over the chicken and bake for 45 minutes. ; name: herb roasted mediterranean vegetables ; ingredients: vegetables, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, dried rosemary leaves, salt, sugar, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Toss vegetables with oil, garlic, rosemary, salt and sugar. Place in 13x9x2 inch baking pan. Add a little water. Bake at 375 degrees f for 20 minutes. Stir and cover with aluminum foil. Bake another 20 minutes or until tender. Drain of any extra liquid before storing. Sprinkle with cheese. ; name: grilled potatoes with garlic ; ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, fresh parsley, grainy mustard, lemon juice, butter, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Cut potatoes into large wedges. Place on greased oven trays, bake for about 30 minutes or until just tender. Combine oil, garlic, herbs, mustard and juice in a bowl. Add potatoes and toss until potatoes are well coated with mixture. Return potatoes to oven trays and drizzle with melted butter. Cook under hot grill until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Serve sprinkled with salt if desired. ; name: fashoulakia greek green bean side dish ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, fresh parsley, of fresh mint, fresh dill, garlic cloves, green beans, salt, black pepper, stewed tomatoes ; preparation:Heat oil in a stockpot over medium-high heat. Add onion. Saut 3 minutes. Add herbs and garlic. Saut 4 minutes. Add beans and remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 30 minutes or until beans are tender. ; name: blt on croissant ; ingredients: shortcut bacon, croissants, tomatoes, butter lettuce leaves, mayonnaise, garlic clove, flat leaf parsley ; preparation:

name: layered torte appetizer ; ingredients: cream cheese, hidden valley ranch dressing mix, marinated artichoke hearts, roasted red pepper, salt and black pepper, garlic, fresh parsley, black olives ; preparation:Cream the cream cheese and salad dressing mix together. In separate bowl, stir together artichokes, peppers, salt and black pepper, garlic, and parsley. In a 3-cup bowl lined with plastic wrap, alternate layers of cheese and vegetables, beginning and ending with cheese layer. Invert onto plate. Remove plastic wrap. You may garnish the top with additional parsley or with sliced black olives, if desired. Serve with crackers or fresh veggie dippers. ; name: seafood pea ista salad ; ingredients: mayonnaise, italian salad dressing, parmesan cheese, black-eyed peas, corkscrew macaroni, crabmeat, broccoli floret, green pepper, chopped tomato, green onion ; preparation:Combine mayonnaise, italian salad dressing and cheese in large bowl. Blend well. Add peas, broccoli, pepper, tomato, and onions. Toss gently to mix. Cover & refrigerate at least 2 hours. ; name: crab spread or dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, imitation crabmeat, celery, green bell pepper, garlic clove, cracker ; preparation:Microwave cream cheese on high for 30 seconds until softened. Add mayonnaise and whisk until smooth. Add crabmeat, green pepper and celery. Add pressed garlic and mix well. Cover and refrigerate 2 hours so that the flavors will blend together. Serve on crackers. ; name: crab stuffed eggs ; ingredients: eggs, white crab meat, mayonnaise, relish, tabasco sauce, fresh chives, salt and pepper, mixed salad greens ; preparation:Spoon out the egg yolks and put them into a large bowl, keeping the egg whites on the side. Mash the yolks with a fork and mix well with the crab meat, mayonnaise, relish and tabasco. Adjust seasoning as necessary. Spoon the mixture back into the egg whites, piling it up. Sprinkle the chives over the eggs. Arrange salad leaves on a plate and place the eggs on top. Chill for about 1 hour until ready to serve. ; name: ranch deviled eggs ; ingredients: eggs, ranch salad dressing, cream cheese, salt & pepper, paprika ; preparation:Place eggs in sauce pan and cover with water. Bring water to a quick boil. Remove from heat and cover for 20 minute. Let eggs cool. Shell eggs and cut in half. Scoop out hard boiled yoke. Mash the yoke with a fork until smooth. If you add your salt now this will help. Add ranch salad dressing and cream cheese to the mashed yokes and mix well. You may need to add a little more ranch dressing to get your desired creaminess. Use a piping bag or spoon to fill the egg halves. Sprinkle with paprika. ; name: buffalo style chicken nachos recipe ; ingredients: cooked chicken, hot sauce, butter, tortilla chips, cheddar cheese, green onions, ranch dressing ; preparation:In a bowl, toss chicken with hot sauce and butter. Layer chips, chicken mixture and cheese in baking dish. Sprinkle with green onions. Bake nachos at 350f for 5 minutes or until cheese is melted. Splash on more hot sauce to taste. Serve with ranch dressing on the side for dipping. ; name: cheddar bacon log ; ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, cheddar cheese, cooked bacon, green onions, pecans, cracker ; preparation:Beat cream cheese, mayonnaise, worcestershire sauce and hot pepper sauce in large bowl on medium speed, scraping bowl often, until smooth. Stir in cheese, bacon and green onions by hand. Cover. Refrigerate at least 2 hours. Form cheese mixture into log shape or cheese ball. Roll in pecans to coat. Wrap in plastic food wrap. Refrigerate until serving time. Serve with crackers. ; name: seafood layer dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, ranch salad dressing, seafood cocktail sauce, cheddar cheese, imitation crabmeat, shrimp, green pepper, tomatoes, green onions ; preparation:

name: rotkohlsalat mit wallnussen red cabbage salad with walnuts ; ingredients: red cabbage, salt and pepper, sugar, red wine vinegar, sunflower oil, applesauce, cranberry jam, walnuts ; preparation:Put cabbage in a bowl and season with salt, pepper and sugar. Add vinegar and oil and mix thoroughly with your hands. Cover and refrigerate at least 3 hours. When ready to serve, mix applesauce and jam and stir into the cabbage. Adjust seasonings. Top with toasted walnuts. ; name: cukes and onions ; ingredients: cucumber, sweet onion, white vinegar, cold water, sugar ; preparation:Wash and peel cukes. Slice into bowl big enough for all ingredients. Peel onion and slice thinly into bowl with cukes. Mix vinegar and water with sugar. Pour over cucumber and onions. Put lid on bowl or cover tightly with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 1 hour. Serve cold. ; name: cool cucumber salad ; ingredients: cucumber, tomatoes, green pepper, onion, lime juice, red wine vinegar, dill weed, salt, pepper ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the cucumbers, tomatoes, green pepper and the onions. In a small bowl, combine lime juice, vinegar, dill, salt and pepper. Pour over cucumber mixture. Toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 15 minutes. Serve with a slotted spoon. ; name: cucumbers in dill cream ; ingredients: sour cream, fresh dill, cider vinegar, salt, hot red pepper sauce, white onions, seedless cucumber ; preparation:Mix sour cream, all but 1 t. Of the dill, the vinegar, salt, and red pepper sauce in small mixing bowl. Make 3 or 4 layers of onion, cucumber, and sour cream mixture in a 2-quart serving bowl. Refrigerate covered 1-2 hours, spooning juice from bottom of bowl over top several times. Sprinkle remaining 1 t. Dill over top and serve cold. ; name: marinated garbanzo salad ; ingredients: olive oil, yellow onion, dried thyme, red pepper, dark raisin, garbanzo beans, salt, white wine vinegar ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a saucepan. Add the onions and thyme and cook over low heat, covered, until onions are tender and lightly colored, about 25 minutes. Add chopped red pepper and cook for another 5 minutes. Add raisins and garbanzos and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Do not overcook the garbanzos or they will become mushy. Season with salt, transfer to a bowl, and pour the vinegar over the hot mixture. Let vegetables cool to room temperature, then cover and refrigerate for at least 24 hours before serving. Allow to return to room temperature before serving. ; name: swedish cucumber salad pressgurka ; ingredients: cucumbers, parsley, ground black pepper, salt, sugar, white distilled vinegar, caraway seed ; preparation:Cut cucumbers into the thinnest possible slices. Arrange slices in a bowl. Whisk together the white distilled vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper and parsley. Pour over the cucumbers. Place a plate with a weight over the cucumbers to squeeze out the liquid. Chill for 1 hour. ; name: jerk seasoning caribbean ; ingredients: green onions, scotch bonnet peppers, garlic cloves, white wine vinegar, brown sugar, ground allspice, dried thyme, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Seed the peppers, peel the garlic. Add everything to a blender or processor and blend well. Store in a covered container. Use for basting on pork or beef. Also see recipe of mine for beef jerk burgers. ; name: cucumber red onion and radish salad ; ingredients: cucumber, red onion, red radishes, vegetable oil, white wine vinegar, sugar, dry crushed red pepper ; preparation:

name: zucchini and carrots with garlic and herbs ; ingredients: olive oil, carrot, zucchini, garlic, salt and pepper, fresh parsley, fresh basil leaf, fresh oregano ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over moderate heat. Add carrots, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately. ; name: winter solstice soup ; ingredients: butter, onions, carrots, potatoes, milk, water, salt, dried parsley, thyme, bay leaf ; preparation:Saut onions in the butter in a large soup pot. Add carrots, potatoes, water, salt, parsley, thyme and bay leaf. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes. Discard the bay leaf. Puree soup in a blender in small batches or with a stick blender. Return to the pot. Stir in milk. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: green bean and basil salad ; ingredients: green beans, olive oil, vinegar, fresh basil leaf, garlic, salt, fresh ground black pepper, scallions ; preparation:Steam the green beans for about 10 minutes, until tender. You can also cook them in the microwave for about 4 minutes. Set aside in a bowl. Whisk together the oil, vinegar and seasonings. Pour this over the green beans. Add the scallions and toss gently. Cover and place in the fridge until cold. The flavor really intensifies if you let the salad chill for 24 hours. ; name: wicklewood s posh pork n beans ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, garlic clove, tomato puree, chopped tomatoes, vegetable stock, seasoning, lardons, white beans ; preparation:In a skillet, heat the oil and gently fry the onion and garlic for 5 mins until soft. Add the tom puree and cook for further 5 mins, stirring often. Add the chopped tomatoes and vegetable stock and bring to the boil. Reduce heat and cook out for 35-40 mins stirring occasionally. Meanwhile, in a saucepan fry the bacon lardons until crispy. Add the beans and sauce and stir together. Cover and gently simmer for 5-10 mins until thick and syrupy. ; name: lemon herb duck breasts ; ingredients: fresh parsley leaves, garlic, lemon zest, coarse black pepper, dried thyme, fresh rosemary, duck breasts, extra virgin olive oil, salt ; preparation:Combine parsley, garlic, lemon zest, pepper, thyme and rosemary in a bowl. Roll duck pieces in herb mixture to coat all over. Put oil in a large saut pan, and turn heat to medium-high. When oil shimmers add duck, and reduce heat to medium. Cook, turning once or twice, until coating browns and duck is medium-rare to medium, about 10 minutes. Season meat with salt, and let it rest for a few minutes. Serve. ; name: greek roasted beans in tomato sauce gigantes plaki ; ingredients: butter beans, tomatoes, garlic cloves, onions, tomato paste, olive oil, parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:Soak the beans overnight, the longer, the better. Preheat oven at 350 farenheit. Drain and rinse the beans and boil in water for about 40 minutes to an hour, until they are soft but not mushy. Make sure you boil them enough. Otherwise the beans will be too hard to eat even after baking. Sauce - saut the onion in a bit of olive on low heat until soft and add the garlic cloves whole. If you want a stronger garlic flavor you can mince the garlic. Add the tomato, the tomato paste, parsley, salt and pepper to taste and about cup olive oil. Let it simmer until sauce thickens, about 10 minutes. Once the beans have boiled, drain them and put them back into the pot, add the sauce and mix gently. Pour the mixture in a pan and spread evenly and then pour about another cup olive oil over the beans and bake for about 50 minutes until beans are tender. Accompany with feta cheese and bread. ; name: rice herbs ; ingredients: oil, long grain rice, onion, green pepper, chicken broth, salt, dried oregano, bay leaf, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place oil in a large saucepan coated with cooking spray. Place pan over med-high heat until pan is hot. Add rice and saut until golden brown. Add onion and pepper. Saut till tender. Add chicken broth, salt, oregano and bay leaf. Bring to boil and then reduce heat. Simmer 20 minutes. Remove from stove and let sit for about 5 minutes, or till liquid is absorbed. Remove bay leaf and stir in parsley. ; name: green bean and carrot soup vegan gluten free ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, carrots, green beans, vegetable stock, almond milk, salt, dried herbs, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: nanny s bourbon baked beans rachael ray ; ingredients: bacon, onion, dijon mustard, dark molasses, dark brown sugar, mango chutney, white beans, black pepper, bourbon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Heat a large skillet over medium heat and cook bacon until fat begins to render out. Add onion and cook 1 minute. Add mustard, molasses, sugar and chutney and heat through. Add pepper to taste. Stir in beans then pour mixture into a large, lightly greased baking dish. Bake 30 minutes covered. Remove from oven and stir in bourbon. Bake uncovered 15-20 minutes longer until beans are bubbly and thick. ; name: golden carrot potato soup ; ingredients: russet potatoes, carrots, onion, water, chicken bouillon cube, salt, black pepper, milk, sour cream, chives ; preparation:Place potatoes, onion, carrots, water, bullion, salt, and pepper in medium sized pot and boil until potatoes are done, about 15 minutes, depending on the size of your potato pieces, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat. Carefully mash contents of pot until only some potatoes remain in tact. Add milk and sour cream, reserving 4 teaspoons of sour cream for garnish, if desired. Return to low heat and stir until soup is warm and sour cream is broken up. Do not boil. Serve immediately, with dollops of reserved sour cream and chives. ; name: basket case deli s sweet potato sald ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, red onion, celery, mayonnaise, honey, dijon mustard, pecans ; preparation:Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add diced sweet potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 10 minutes. Drain and let cool. In a large bowl, combine sweet potatoes, onion and celery. In another bowl, stir together mayonnaise, honey and mustard. Stir into sweet potato mixture. Refrigerate until cold. Just before serving, top salad with chopped pecans. ; name: dutch style potato bake ; ingredients: potatoes, tart apples, sauerkraut, cooking oil, dijon mustard, salt, black pepper, bacon, green onions ; preparation:Toss together the potatoes, apples, sauerkraut, oil, mustard, salt and pepper. Transfer to a lightly greased 9x13-inch baking dish. Bake at 400f for 1 hour, stirring occasionally, until potato and apple are tender and just starting to brown. Scatter crumbled bacon and sliced green onion on top. Serve hot. ; name: simple roast veggies ; ingredients: potatoes, red pepper, yellow pepper, mushrooms, onion, zucchini, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, minced garlic cloves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Chop up potatoes. Put in microwave for 2 minutes while chopping rest of veggies. Place all veggies in bowl. Add oil, vinegar and garlic, and toss to coat. Spread out in roasting pan and cook for about an hour. ; name: bacon and cheddar potato salad ; ingredients: red potatoes, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, green onion, bacon, milk, apple cider vinegar ; preparation:In a 4-quart saucepan, cover potatoes with water and bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer uncovered 10 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Drain and cool slightly. While potatoes are cooking, combine remaining ingredients in a large bowl. Add potatoes and toss to coat. Season, if desired, with salt and ground black pepper. ; name: creamy dill pickled potato salad ; ingredients: red potatoes, pickle juice, mayonnaise, mustard powder, onion, fresh dill, dill pickle, eggs, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Put the potatoes in a large bowl. Sprinkle with the pickle juice and gentle toss. Mix 1 cup mayonnaise with mustard, onion, dill, pickle and eggs add to potatoes stirring in and season with salt and pepper. Adding more mayonnaise to the creaminess you desire. Serve room temperature or chilled. ; name: apple corned beef brisket for the slow cooker ; ingredients: red potatoes, onion, apple, corned beef brisket, cabbage, apple cider, brown sugar, dijon mustard, ground cloves, black pepper ; preparation:

name: old fashioned cream of tomato soup ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, milk, tomatoes, pepper, bay leaf, ground cloves, onion ; preparation:In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add flour and salt, blending well. Slowly add milk, stirring constantly. Cook until mixture boils and thickens. Set aside press tomatoes through a sieve or blend until smooth. In a soup pot, combine remaining ingredients and bring to a boil. Lower heat and simmer 10 minutes. Pour white sauce into soup, stirring constantly. Heat thoroughly before serving. ; name: vegetarian green chili ; ingredients: butter, garlic, onion flakes, flour, diced tomatoes, green chili pepper, salt, cilantro, water ; preparation:In a large sauce pan, melt butter or margarine. Add garlic and onion and cook until onion is re-hydtrated. Add flour and stir to make a roux. Add tomatoes, green chili, salt and cilantro. Add water. Simmer for 30 minutes. This can also be made in a crock pot. ; name: cheesy onion soup ; ingredients: onions, butter, cayenne pepper, flour, seasoning salt, half-and-half, colby, ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, crouton ; preparation:In a large saucepan saute onion and pinch cayenne pepper in butter until the onions are just lightly golden. Stir in flour and salt until blended. Gradually add half and half cream until blended. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Season with ground black pepper to taste. Stir in colby or monterey jack cheese until melted. Ladle into bowls, sprinkle with parmesan cheese and croutons. ; name: shrimp and chips ; ingredients: cooked shrimp, beer, flour, baking powder, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Mix all ingredients except shrimp in a mixing bowl to make batter. Dust shrimp in flour. Dip shrimp into batter. Fry shrimp in deep fryer set at 375 degrees or in a skillet with 2 inches of vegetable oil, until golden brown. Drain shrimp on paper towels or on brown grocery bags from the market. Serve with french fries and cole slaw or creamy cucumber salad. Also serve with cocktail sauce and tartar sauce. ; name: tagine of onions ; ingredients: red onions, olive oil, ground ginger, fresh ground pepper, cinnamon, sugar ; preparation:Place the onions in a shallow baking dish and spread them out evenly. Mix the remaining ingredients in a small bowl, then pour over the onions and stir gently to coat. Set aside for 2 hours. Preheat oven to 325f. Cover dish with foil tightly, then the lid and bake for 45 minutes, until the onions are very soft. Increase the oven temp to 400f, remove lid and foil and bake for 5-10 minutes more until the onions are lightly glazed. Serve with grilled meats. ; name: sensible linguine alfredo ; ingredients: water, all-purpose flour, garlic cloves, low-sodium instant chicken bouillon granules, ground black pepper, ground nutmeg, parmesan cheese, plain low-fat yogurt, fresh linguine, fresh parsley ; preparation:Combine water, flour, garlic, bouillon, pepper and nutmeg in large, nonstick skillet. Stir until smooth. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, for 8 to 10 minutes or until mixture boils and thickens. Remove from heat. Stir in cheese and yogurt. Prepare pasta according to package directions. Add pasta to skillet. Toss to coat. Sprinkle with parsley. Serve immediately. ; name: creamed pearl onions ; ingredients: white pearl onions, butter, flour, milk, pepper, nutmeg ; preparation:Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Add flour and stir until well blended. Add milk gradually. Reduce heat to low and cook, stirring constantly, until mixture has thickened. Drain onions and add to sauce. Season with pepper and nutmeg. Serve hot. ; name: kremidotiganites greek onion fritters ; ingredients: onion, flour, of fresh mint, oil, salt and black pepper, water ; preparation:

name: sherri s breakfast casserole ; ingredients: crescent rolls, hot sausage, onion, sliced mushrooms, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, eggs ; preparation:Flatten rolls in bottom of greased 9x13 baking pan or casserole dish. Brown sausage and drain. Add onion and mushrooms to sausage and pour mixture over rolls. Add cheese on top of sausage. At this point you may continue or casserole may be refrigerated overnight. Beat eggs and pour on top and cover with foil. Bake at 350f for 40-45 minutes. Brown last 10 minutes. Remove from oven and let set 5 minutes. If you are freezing, allow casserole to cool and freeze. To bake, place in oven directly from freezer but allow about 50-60 minutes for baking. ; name: mushroom cheese puff spirals ; ingredients: cream cheese with vegetables, mushroom stems and pieces, onion, bacon, hot pepper sauce, crescent roll dough ; preparation:Process first five ingredients in food processor til blended and chopped. Unroll crescent roll dough and separate into four rectangles. Press perforations together. Spread each rectangle with cream cheese mixture. Roll each up jelly-roll style starting with long sides. Cut each roll into 5 slices. Place on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake in 425 oven for 8-11 minutes. Makes 20 appetizers. Serve warm. ; name: bacon cheddar ranch pull apart bread ; ingredients: dinner rolls, cheddar cheese, bacon bits, ranch dressing mix ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Lightly spray a small baking tin with vegetable oil spray. Seperate dough into 8 inch rolls. Cut each roll into quarters. In a bowl mix cheese, bacon bits and ranch. Toss each piece of dough into mixture until coated. Place each piece, slightly overlapping into baker. Ae 22 minutes or until top is golden brown. ; name: bacon cheddar pinwheels ; ingredients: pillsbury refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, ranch salad dressing, bacon, cheddar cheese, green onion ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f unroll dough and separate into 2 long rectangles. Press each into 12x4-inch rectangle, firmly pressing perforations to seal. Spread dressing over each rectangle to edges. Sprinkle each with bacon, cheddar cheese and onions. Starting with one short side, roll up each rectangle. Press edge to seal. With serrated knife, cut each roll into 8 slices. Place cut side down on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 12 to 17 minutes or until edges are deep golden brown. Immediately remove from cookie sheet. Serve warm. ; name: creamy crescent roll cheesecake ; ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, sugar, vanilla, eggs, cinnamon, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls ; preparation:Beat cream cheese, sour cream, sugar and vanilla until smooth. Add eggs one at a time, beating thoroughly after each addition. Line a 9x13 pan with the crescent rolls. Pinch dough together to seal seams. Pour in filling and sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake at 350 for 35 minutes. ; name: blue cheese and apple canapes ; ingredients: crescent roll dough, cream cheese, blue cheese, granny smith apple, lemon juice, fresh parsley ; preparation:Unroll crescent roll of puff pastry dough and cut into matching triangles. Bake on a greased cookie sheet for 10 minutes then allow to cool completely. In a small bowl, mix together cream cheese and crumbled blue cheese. Peel, core, and slice apple. Toss with lemon juice to prevent browning. At the last minute assemble each piece by spreading a triagle with a small amoutn of the cheese mixture and topping with 2-3 slices of apple. Sprinkle with parsley for garnish. ; name: runza burgers ; ingredients: ground beef, cabbage, celery, onion, pepper, garlic salt, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together. Seperate rolls to make 8 squares. Put some meat mixture in each rolls. Then pull roll corners together and pinch shut. Bake 15 minutes or until brown according to instructions on crescent rolls. ; name: kraft bacon tomato cheese crescents ; ingredients: crescent rolls, cream cheese, tomatoes, bell pepper, bacon ; preparation:

name: gluten free gingerbread cookies ; ingredients: eggs, unsalted butter, fine sea salt, molasses, brown sugar, ground ginger, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, coconut flour ; preparation:With a mixer, blend together the eggs, butter, salt, molasses, sugar, and spices. Stir in the coconut flour and mix thoroughly. Batter will thicken slightly as the flour absorbs moisture. Drop batter by scant teaspoonsfuls onto parchment paper or silpat lined cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes. Watching carefully, as these cookies can easily burn. Remove from cookie sheet to a rack to cool completely and package in airtight container, separating each layer with parchment or wax paper. ; name: white chocolate oat cranberry cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, eggs, rolled oats, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, dried cranberries, white chocolate ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Witch a electric mixer, beat butter and sugar in medium mixing bowl until light and fluffy. Add eggs, mixing well. Combine the oats, flour, salt and baking soda in a separate mixing bowl. Add to butter mixture in several additions, mixing well after each addition. Stir in cranberries and the white chocolate chunks. Drop batter by rounded teaspoon onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: cranberry orange chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, baking soda, kosher salt, butter, granulated sugar, egg, orange zest, dried sweetened cranberries, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Line cookie sheets with parchment or silpat. Whisk together flour, baking powder, soda, and salt in a medium bowl. Set aside. In a separate large bowl, cream butter and sugar together with an electric mixer until light in color. Beat in egg and orange zest. Add flour mixture a little at a time with mixer on low speed, stirring until just combine. Fold in cranberries and chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoons onto prepared cookie sheets. Bake 9-12 minutes in preheated oven or until the edges of the cookies are just slightly golden. Cool for 3-4 minutes on pan, then transfer to a baking rack and cool completely. Adding coconut is an option as is adding nuts. ; name: creamy rich and decadent cranberry sauce ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, water, sugar, unsalted butter, salt, vanilla extract, sour cream ; preparation:In a 4-quart saucepan, combine the cranberries, water and sugar. Bring to a boil over high heat, and continue boiling until thickened, about 30-35 minutes, stirring occasionally. Toward the end of the cooking time, use a potato masher to mash all of the berries. Reduce the heat to low and add the butter and salt. Simmer until butter melts, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla. Cool to room temperature. Just before serving, fold in the sour cream and mix well. ; name: sugar coated molasses cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, molasses, eggs, flour, salt, baking soda, ground ginger, ground cloves, ground cinnamon ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar. Beat in the molasses and eggs. Separately, combine the dry ingredients, then slowly mix into the wet ingredients. When blended and smooth, roll the dough into small balls, about 1 inch around. Dip the tops in sugar and place on greased or non-stick baking sheets. Bake at 350f or 180c for 10-12 minutes. Cool on a wire rack, then store in a tightly covered container to keep the cookies soft. ; name: pina colada spritz cookies ; ingredients: caster sugar, brown sugar, unsalted butter, egg, lemon juice, lemon, zest of, almond extract, coconut extract, salt, all-purpose flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 deg f. Combine butter, caster sugar, brown sugar in a large mixer bowl. Beat on medium speed until light and fluffy. Add egg, mix until combined. Add the lemon juice, zest, almond and coconut extract. Combine well. Mix salt with flour. Add it to the butter mixture gradually. Put dough into cookie press. Press cookies onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for about 8 minutes. Very delicious tropical cookies that i bake for chinese new year. ; name: french beignets ; ingredients: flour, sugar, salt, water, butter, eggs, lemon, zest of, powdered sugar, jam, oil ; preparation:In a small mixing bowl, stir together the flour, sugar and salt. Place water and butter in a saucepan and bring to a boil. Add all of the flour mixture in the bowl, stirring briskly. Remove pan from heat. Using a large whisk, blend in eggs one at a time, until mixture is smooth and whites are well incorporated. Add the lemon zest and stir to blend. Heat enough oil to deep fry to a temp of 375f. Drop batter mixture by rounded teaspoonfuls into hot oil and cook 5-7 minutes, frequently turning beignets with chopsticks to cook all sides, and frying until nicely golden. Drain beignets on paper towels. When cool, dust with powdered sugar. Heat jam or jelly until melted using a small saucepan or microwave, stirring occasionally as it melts. Serve beignets with melted jam as a dipping sauce. ; name: cranberry ginger pudding ; ingredients: butter, caster sugar, eggs, self raising flour, gingerroot, orange, juice and zest of, ground ginger, fresh cranberries, dried cranberries ; preparation:

name: chili citrus chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, chili powder, ground cumin, garlic salt, cayenne pepper, vegetable oil, fresh lemon juice, fresh lime juice, jalapeno jelly ; preparation:In small dish, mix the chili powder, cumin, garlic salt, and the cayenne pepper. Rub the mixture on each chicken breast half. In frypan, place the oil and heat to medium temperature. Cook the chicken in pan, turning. Cook the chicken until juices are clear when pierced with a fork. Remove the chicken and keep warm. Combine the juices and jelly in the frying pan. Bring to a boil and cook for 2 min or so. Spoon sauce over the chicken. ; name: quinoa crusted chicken fingers ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt, garlic powder, fresh ground black pepper, paprika, quinoa, whole wheat breadcrumbs, egg whites, olive oil ; preparation:Spread out the quinoa on a piece of wax paper or aluminum foil. Sprinkle the breadcrumbs over the quinoa. With your finger. Sprinkle the chicken with salt, garlic powder, pepper and paprika. Place the egg whites in a shallow bowl. Dip the chicken in the egg and then into the quinoa mixture. Warm the oil in a large skillet over high heat. When the oil is hot, add the chicken and reduce the heat to medium. Cook each side 5 minutes or until the crust begins to brown and the chicken is no longer translucent. Transfer fingers to a plate and serve immediately. ; name: crock pot tex mex chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, taco seasoning mix, flour, green pepper, red pepper, frozen corn, salsa, four-cheese mexican blend cheese ; preparation:Spray crock pot with cooking spray. Place chicken with seasoning and flour in slow cooker. Stir in all remaining ingredients except the shredded cheese. Cover with lid. Cook on low for 6 to 8 hours. Stir well just before serving. Top with the shredded cheese and serve over rice. ; name: baked cajun chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, dried thyme, nonstick cooking spray, garlic salt, nonfat milk, white pepper, onion powder, crushed red pepper flakes, ground black pepper ; preparation:Spray a 13x9x2 inch baking dish with non-stick cooking spray. Arrange the chicken in the dish. Brush lightly with the milk. In a small bowl mix onion powder, thyme, garlic salt, white pepper, red pepper, and black pepper. Sprinkle over chicken. Bake at 375 for 45 minutes. ; name: cheddar chicken chowder ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast half, garlic clove, salt, pepper, flour, chicken broth, milk, frozen mixed vegetables, hot sauce, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Spray large saucepan with cooking spray. Add chicken and garlic. Cook and stir on medium-high heat 5 minutes or until cooked through. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in flour. Cook and stir an additional minute. Add broth, milk and vegetables and hot sauce. Stir. Reduce heat to medium. Bring just to boil, stirring frequently. Remove from heat. Stir in cheese until completely melted. ; name: cumin honey marinated grilled chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt and pepper, nonfat vanilla yogurt, honey, ground cumin, ground mustard, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Sprinkle raw chicken with salt and pepper and place chicken in a large ziplock baggie or a glass dish. In a small bowl, whisk together the yogurt, honey, cumin and dry mustard. Pour over chicken and turn to coat. Refrigerate for at least 6 hours or up to 24 hours. After marinating, grill the chicken for about 20 minutes, turning every 3-4 minutes or until done. Place on platter and sprinkle with the chopped cilantro. ; name: smoky mountain chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, ground black pepper, garlic powder, italian seasoning, barbecue sauce, bacon, monterey jack cheese, green onion, chopped tomato ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a baking dish large enough to hold the chicken pieces. Place chicken breasts in prepared dish seasoning with the pepper, garlic powder and italian seasonings. Bake for 25 minutes or until chicken is just done. Remove from oven and pour barbecue sauce over chicken covering completely. Evenly divide the crumpled bacon over chicken and top each piece with cheese. Return to hot oven and cook for 8 minutes or until cheese has melted. Remove from oven. Place chicken on a serving plate or individual plates-garnish with onions and tomatoes. Serve. ; name: baked chicken fajitas ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, diced tomatoes with green chilies, onion, green pepper, red pepper, canola oil, chili powder, ground cumin, salt, flour tortillas ; preparation:

name: tropical green beans ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh green beans, yellow onion, garlic cloves, salt, balsamic vinegar, hearts of palm, sun-dried tomato, pine nuts, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature. ; name: jamaican pumpkin soup ; ingredients: onion, pumpkin, chicken stock, scotch bonnet pepper, scallions, garlic cloves, bay leaf, fresh thyme, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:Saut onions in butter in a large pot until transparent. Add pumpkin and fill with stock. Add the remaining ingredients and bring to boil. Simmer for about half an hour or to desired consistency. Remove scotch bonnet pepper and serve hot. ; name: un refried beans ; ingredients: dried pinto beans, olive oil, onions, chili powder, cumin, salt, cayenne powder, oregano, water, vegetable bouillon granules ; preparation:In a large soup pot, saute the onions in the olive oil over medium-high heat until the onions are soft. Stir in the chili powder, cumin, salt, and cayenne powder, and continue sauteing for 1 minute or so - just until the spices are fragrant. Add the beans, oregano, and 1 to 2 cups water. Stir in the bouillon. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and allow to simmer, stirring occasionally and adding more water if needed to keep the beans from sticking to the bottom of the pan, until the beans are very soft - approximately 1 hour. Using a potato masher, mash the beans until most of them are mashed, and the texture is mostly smooth. ; name: sun dried tomato risotto ; ingredients: chicken stock, olive oil, diced onion, garlic, arborio rice, parmesan cheese, salt, fresh ground black pepper, sun-dried tomato ; preparation:Heat the stock in a saucepan and keep hot over low heat. Heat the olive oil over medium heat in a separate medium-sized pot. Add the onion and cook until it turns translucent, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and cook 1 minute more. Add the rice to the onion mixture, stir and turn the heat to low. Add about 1 cup of the hot stock to the rice mixture, and stir slowly until the stock is absorbed. Continue to add the stock 1 cup at a time, stirring slowly, letting the rice absorb the stock before adding more. The risotto is cooked when it is creamy on the outside and slightly firm in the center, about 20 to 25 minutes in all. Stir in half of the parmesan cheese and half of the sun-dried tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper to taste. If the risotto is too thick, add a little more stock until it becomes creamy. Divide the risotto into serving dishes and sprinkle with the remaining cheese and sun-dried tomatoes. ; name: pinto beans for burritos ; ingredients: pinto beans, kosher salt, chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, onion powder, black pepper, olive oil, chicken broth, water ; preparation:Sort the beans to make sure there are no small rocks, screws, etc. In them. And yes, i have personally found these things in dried beans before. Sort or hope you have good dental coverage. Put the beans, all the spices, and the olive oil in a large pot. Mix well. Add the chicken broth and water, and stir to mix well. Bring to a boil and then reduce heat to a simmer. Cook beans, uncovered, for 3 to 4 hours until done to your liking. ; name: unfried refried beans ; ingredients: onion, dry pinto beans, fresh jalapeno pepper, garlic, salt, fresh ground black pepper, ground cumin, water ; preparation:Place the onion, rinsed beans, jalapeno, garlic, salt, pepper, and cumin into a slow cooker. Pour in the water and stir to combine. Cook on high for 8 hours, adding more water as needed. Once the beans have cooked, strain them, and reserve the liquid. Mash the beans with a potato masher, adding the reserved water as needed to attain desired consistency. ; name: tex mex rice and beans ; ingredients: olive oil, yellow onion, green bell pepper, minced garlic cloves, rotel, pinto beans, white rice, chicken stock ; preparation:Heat olive oil. Add onion, peppers and garlic. Cook until transparent. Add rice and toast. Add chicken stock and rotel. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer covered for 20 mins. When 20 mins is up add beans. ; name: navy beans ; ingredients: dried navy beans, virgin olive oil, onion, garlic, bay leaf, fresh thyme, chicken stock, salt, black pepper ; preparation:

name: cranberry sauce with dried cherries ; ingredients: cranberries, dried cherries, shallot, red wine vinegar, fresh orange juice, orange zest, gingerroot, dark brown sugar ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a medium saucepan and cook over medium heat intil cranberries pop. Reduce heat to low. Cook, stirring occasionally, until cranberries release their juices, about 15 minutes. If the cranbgerry sauce becomes too thick, add water until the desired consistency is reached. Transfer to a bowl to cool. ; name: danish apricot filling ; ingredients: dried apricot, water, sugar, lemon juice, almond extract ; preparation:Put apricots, water and sugar into a saucepan. Heat and simmer until apricots are soft, plumped and have absorbed most of the liquid. Puree in food processor, transfer to a bowl and stir in lemon juice and almond extract. Scrape filling into a small container and cool to room temperature. Seal container and chill. Will keep refrigerated for two weeks. ; name: creamy fresh cranberry and fruit salad ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, sugar, crushed pineapple, green grape, apples, miniature marshmallow, macadamia nuts, heavy cream ; preparation:Mince the cranberries in a food processor. Do this in two batches. Stir together the cranberries and sugar. Let sit and chill for about 8 hours. After about 8 hours, drain the cranberries well and stir in the well-drained crushed pineapple. Add the grapes and apples and stir. Then fold in the marshmallows and nuts. Let sit overnight in the refrigerator. A few hours before serving, whip the cream until it is becoming stiff. Fold into the fruit mixture. Chill until serving. ; name: light cranberry pear sauce ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, bartlett pears, sugar, cranberry-grape juice, dried cherries, cinnamon ; preparation:In a medium-size, heavy-bottom non-aluminum saucepan, combine cranberries, pears, sugar, dried cherries, cinnamon and juice. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Reduce to a simmer and cook, stirring frequently to prevent scorching, until berries have popped and are tender, about 10 minutes. Cool to room temperature. Cover and refrigerate until chilled. ; name: cranberry kissed sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, orange juice, butter, fresh cranberries, brown sugar, orange, zest of, slivered almonds ; preparation:Combine sweet potatoes, orange juice and butter in a large microwave-safe bowl. Cover with plastic wrap and heat on high, stirring occasionally, 12 minutes. Stir in cranberries and brown sugar. Cover and heat on high until potatoes are tender and cranberries burst, about 5 minutes. Toss mixture with orange zest. Stir in almonds if desired. ; name: baked cranberry conserve ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, brown sugar, fresh lemon juice, orange marmalade, walnuts ; preparation:Set oven to 350 degrees. Grease a shallow baking dish. Place the cranberries and brown sugar in the baking dish. Toss gently to combine. Cover and bake for 1 hour, stirring the mixture after about 30 minutes of baking time. After 1 hour baking remove from oven and stir in lemon juice, marmalade and chopped walunuts. Return to oven and bake uncovered for another 15 minutes. Cool to room temperature. Store any leftover conserve covered in the fridge. ; name: winter fruit compote ; ingredients: sugar, water, fresh ginger, dried fruit, fresh cranberries, orange, granny smith apple ; preparation:In large saucepan, combine sugar, water and ginger. Bring to a boil over high heat. Add dried fruit and bring back to a boil. Immediately reduce heat to low simmer. Cook, uncovered, until fruit is not quite tender, about 5 minutes. Add cranberries and simmer, stirring occasionally, until cranberries pop. Stir in orange and apple. Remove from heat and allow to cool down. For dessert, serve warm over ice cream, or at room temperature over a plain cake, such as angel food cake or pound cake. Can also be served with yogurt. Makes a particularly nice breakfast. ; name: cranberry apricot truffles ; ingredients: dried apricot, dried cranberries, orange zest, dark chocolate ; preparation:

name: lemon chicken with olives ; ingredients: boneless chicken thighs, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, diced tomatoes, lemon, brown sugar, oregano, kalamata olive, salt & pepper ; preparation:Fry off chicken until browned, about 5 minutes. Put aside and keep warm. In the same fry pan, fry off onions and garlic. Cook til transparent or soft, about 3 minutes. Stir often. Add chicken back to the pan. Add tomatoes, lemon slices, sugar and oregano. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer uncovered 40 minutes. It is ready when the sauce is thickened and the chicken is cooked through. Stir in olives in the last few minutes. Season with salt and pepper, if needed. ; name: chicken in coriander cilantro sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, skinless chicken thighs, onions, dry white wine, fresh cilantro, garlic cloves, salt, black pepper, lemons ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large non stick fry pan. When it is hot, add the thighs in one layer and saute them over medium to high heat for 4 minutes on each side or until nicely browned. Remove the chicken to a platter. Add the onions to the dripping in the pan. Saut for 1 minute. Stir in the garlic, wine and coriander stems only and saut for 1 minute longer. Return the chicken to the pan, add lemon salt and pepper. Bring the surrounding liquid to the boil. Cover the pan, reduce the heat and boil gently for 15 minutes. Stir in the coriander leaves and serve 2 thighs per person. Serve with rice or cous cous. ; name: cilantro lime chicken ; ingredients: garlic, cilantro leaves, black peppercorns, sugar, limes, thai fish sauce, light soy sauce, sunflower oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Make the marinade of garlic, cilantro, ground peppercorns, sugar, lime juice, fish sauce, soy sauce and sunflower oil. Blend well. Place chicken breasts with marinade in a shallow dish or resealable plastic bag, coating them well, and set in the refrigerator at least 1 hour and no more than 2, turning them from time to time. Preheat a ridged griddle pan or heavy non-stick frying pan and cook the chicken for 7-8 minutes each side until the chicken is cooked through. Serve hot or cold, garnished with cilantro leaves. ; name: easy and basic boneless chicken breasts ; ingredients: vegetable oil, salt, boneless chicken breasts, garlic cloves, chicken broth, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:In a large skillet, brown the salted chicken pieces in oil. Cook over medium heat for 10 minutes or until browned. Crush garlic cloves and scatter over the chicken add the broth. Turn heat to low. Cover and cook for about 15 minutes each side or until cooked through. Remove cover, add salt and red pepper flakes. Add water and simmer over low heat until water is cooked off. ; name: smoky hot chicken stir fried with dried red chillies and green g ; ingredients: skinless chicken thighs, cornstarch, wine, peanut oil, dried red chilies, ginger, brown sugar, light soy sauce, black vinegar, garlic chives ; preparation:Combine chicken with cornflour and shao sing wine in a bowl. Cover, place in refrigerator and leave to marinate for 1 hour. Place 1st measure of oil and chillies in a cold wok and then turn heat to low. Cook for about 1 minutes or until chillies begin to darken slightly. Using a slotted spoon, immediately remove chillies and drain on kitchen paper. Leaving chilli-infused oil in wok, turn heat up to high and stir-fry half the chicken cubes for 3 minutes. Remove with a slotted spoon. Add extra oil to wok with remaining chicken and stir-fry for 3 minutes. Return all chicken to wok, along with ginger and reserved chillies, and stir-fry for 1 minute. Add sugar and stir-fry for 30 seconds. Add remaining ingredients and stir-fry for 30 seconds. Serve immediately. ; name: peanut butter chicken with chile ; ingredients: skinless chicken, olive oil, onions, garlic, natural-style peanut butter, ground coriander, red pepper flakes, tomato sauce ; preparation:

name: sweet potato latkes ; ingredients: sweet potato, potato, onion, flour, baking powder, eggs, salt and pepper, fresh parsley, fresh chives ; preparation:Coarsely grate potatoes and drain well. Place potatoes in a mixing bowl with all remaining ingredients and mix together. Cover and leave to stand for 1 hour. Heat oil for shallow frying in a frying pan and drop large spoonfuls of the mixture as for small pancakes and fry until golden brown on both sides and cooked in the middle, about 5 minutes. Drain well on paper towels and keep hot until ready to serve. Eat immediately. ; name: potato and cucumber soup ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, potato, chicken broth, water, cucumber, heavy cream, ear of corn, fresh parsley, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat and cook onions until they begin to soften, about 5 minutes. Add potatoes, chicken broth, and water. Cover and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 15 minutes. Working in batches, puree potato mixture with cucumbers and return to pot. Stir in cream. Meanwhile, heat a heavy skillet over medium high heat, and add the corn and cook until golden. Scrape corn from cob and add to soup. Stir in parsley, salt and pepper. If desired, chill soup in refrigerator before serving. ; name: mashed potatoes with corn and chives ; ingredients: potatoes, garlic cloves, corn kernels, buttermilk, salt & freshly ground black pepper, chives ; preparation:Place potatoes and garlic in pot, cover with water and boil until potatoes are tender, about 10 minutes. Remove with slotted spoon and place in large bowl. Add corn to boiling water and cook 2 minutes. Drain. Mash potatoes and garlic or put through a food mill. Stir corn into mashed potatoes with enough buttermilk to make a medium-firm texture. Season with salt and pepper and stir in chives. To keep for up to one day, refrigerate, covered. To serve, place in glass dish, cover with plastic wrap and put in a microwave oven for about 8 minutes on high, stirring once or twice while reheating. If potatoes become too dry, stir in a little buttermilk. ; name: roasted corn and red pepper chowder crock pot slow cooker ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh corn kernels, red bell pepper, green onions, chicken broth, baking potatoes, salt, fresh ground black pepper, evaporated milk, flat leaf parsley ; preparation:Heat olive oil in saute pan over medium heat. Add the corn, red pepper, and onions. Saute the vegetables until they are tender and lightly browned, about 7-8 minutes. Transfer sauted vegetables to slow cooker. Add the green onions, broth, potatoes, salt and pepper, and stir to combine. Cover and cook on low for 7-9 hours or on high for 4-5 hours. Thirty minutes prior to serving, add the milk and blend well. Garnish with parsley to serve. ; name: braised celery irish ; ingredients: celery, onion, fresh parsley leaves, bacon, chicken stock, salt and black pepper, butter ; preparation:Clean celery, cut into one-inch pieces and place in a casserole dish. Finely chop bacon and onion and sprinkle over celery along with chopped parsley. Pour on stock. Dot with knobs of butter. Cover dish and bake in a moderate oven for 30-45 minutes. ; name: chicken garlic soup ; ingredients: chicken, carrots, celery, yellow onion, fresh parsley, salt and pepper, garlic, butter, flour ; preparation:Make the chicken broth by simmering chicken, carrots, celery, onion, garlic, parsley, salt and pepper in enough water to cover. When the chicken is thoroughly cooked, remove it and skim the fat from broth. Simmer broth, reducing it until it is very rich. Add the flour and butter to a small amount of broth and mix with a wire whisk until velvety. Pour this mixture into the remaining broth. Tear chicken into bite-sized pieces and add to the soup. Sprinkle with fresh parsley and serve. ; name: leek onion and potato soup ; ingredients: leeks, potatoes, onion, butter, chicken stock, milk, heavy cream ; preparation:Melt butter in a large saucepan. Add leeks, onions and potatoes and stir. Cover saucepan and sweat veg for 10-15 minutes. Add stock and milk and bring to boil. Replace lid and simmer for 20 minutes. Blend the soup and return to the saucepan. Season and add cream to taste. ; name: parsley soup with chive cream ; ingredients: leeks, fresh curly-leaf parsley, butter, floury potatoes, chicken stock, double cream, salt & freshly ground black pepper, chives ; preparation:

name: lazy man s cabbage roll casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, cabbage, salt and pepper, condensed tomato soup, water, long-grain rice ; preparation:In a skillet, brown onion and ground beef. Place in the bottom of a medium casserole dish. Salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle rice on top. Spread shredded cabbage on top of the rice. Mix water and soup together and pour over everything. Do not stir. Bake for 1 hour at 325f. ; name: taco soup with beans ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, pinto beans, tomatoes and green chilies, tomatoes, tomato paste, ranch dressing mix, taco seasoning mix, corn ; preparation:Brown meat and onions in skillet. Drain. Add meat and remaining ingredients in slow cooker. Cover. Cook on low 4 hours or until ingredients are heated through. ; name: black eyed pea skillet dinner ; ingredients: ground beef, onions, green pepper, black-eyed peas, whole tomatoes, dried thyme, salt, pepper, hot sauce ; preparation:Add ground beef, onion, and green pepper to a skillet. Cook and crumble meat over medium heat until beef is browned. Drain well. Add the rest of the ingredients to the skillet. Bring to a boil, lower heat, and simmer 30 minutes. ; name: taco stuffed bell peppers cups ; ingredients: green peppers, lean ground beef, onions, kidney beans, tomato sauce, taco seasoning, cheddar cheese, tomatoes ; preparation:Cut peppers in half lenghtwise and remove seeds. Cook in boiling water for 5 minutes. Drain and set aside. In a large skillet, cook beef and onion over medium high heat until meat is no longer pink. Drain. Add beans, tomato sauce and taco seasoning, bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes. Place pepper halves in an ungreased 8 inch square pan. Fill with meat mixture. Bake, uncovered, for 10 minutes or until peppers are tender. Top with sour cream, tomato, and cheese. ; name: garden veggies and beef salad ; ingredients: lean ground beef, hot water, hamburger helper mix for beef pasta, garlic clove, head lettuce, green bell pepper, red onion, cherry tomatoes, italian dressing, italian seasoning ; preparation:In a large skillet brown ground beef, stirring occasionally. When browned, add hot water, uncooked pasta, sauce mix and garlic and bring to boil. Reduce heat, cover skillet and simmer 10 minutes. Uncover and simmer 5 minutes longer stirring occasionally. Let cool 5 minutes. Add remaining ingredients and beef mixture to large bowl. Toss and serve immediately. ; name: down home beef skillet ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, water, salsa, mexican-style corn, tomatoes in puree, quick-cooking rice, peas ; preparation:Brown beef and onion in a large skillet until no longer pink, drain. Add remaining ingredients except peas. Bring to a boil. Cook 2 minutes. Blend in peas. Cover and remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes. Serve. ; name: beef cabbage casserole ; ingredients: head of cabbage, lean ground beef, onion, tomato soup, salt and pepper ; preparation:Brown beef with onion. Boil cabbage 3 min, than drain. Alternate layers of beef and onion with cabbage in 2 qt casserole or crock pot. Pour soup, undiluted, over top. Bake uncovered 30 min at 350 f, or 6-8 hrs on low in crock pot. ; name: my stuffed bell peppers soup ; ingredients: lean ground beef, green bell peppers, onion, jalapenos, chopped tomatoes, tomato paste, beef broth, steamed rice, onion soup mix ; preparation:

name: coffee jello ; ingredients: unflavored gelatin, coffee, hot coffee, sugar, salt ; preparation:In a large bowl combine gelatin and cold coffee. Allow to sit 10 minutes to soften. Add hot coffee, sugar and salt. Stir until the sugar is completely dissolved and mixture is clear. Pour into individual serving dishes and chill till set. Serve with sweetened whipped cream. ; name: creamy orange gelatin ; ingredients: orange gelatin, boiling water, vanilla ice cream, orange juice, mandarin oranges ; preparation:In a large bowl, dissolve gelatin in boilingn water. Stir in ice cream and orange juice until blended. Chill until partially set. Fold in oranges. Pour into two 6 cup ring molds coated with cooking spray. Refrigerate overnight or until firm. Just before serving, unmold. ; name: berry margarita dessert ; ingredients: unflavored gelatin, water, mixed berries, margarita mix, tequila, orange liqueur, lime wedge, sugar, mint ; preparation:Sprinkle gelatin over cold water in a small saucepan. Allow 5 minutes and then heat gently just until dissolved. Meanwhile puree berries in a blender with margarita mix and orange liqueur. Strain, pressing down on the solids well, and return to blender. Blend in gelatin. Rub the rim of 4 or 6 martini glasses with the wedge of lime. Place sugar on a plate and dip edge of the glasses into the sugar. Divide the berry mixture between the glasses. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate a few hours or until set. Garnish with fresh berries and mint. ; name: jello fruit bars ; ingredients: gelatin, unflavored gelatin, boiling water, berries ; preparation:Mix first 2 ingredients in medium bowl. Add boiling water. Stir 2 minutes. Pour into a 13x9 inch pan sprayed with cooking spray. Stir in berries. Refrigerate 3 hours or until firm. Cut into bars. ; name: green jello ; ingredients: lime gelatin, crushed pineapple, cream cheese, whipping cream, walnuts ; preparation:Follow directions on gelatin box to prepare gelatin. Let set until syrupy. Add pineapple, cream cheese, whipping cream, and optional nuts. Mix all ingredients together in a mixer. Turn into a mold and let sit in refrigerator until fully firm. Turn out from mold onto plate. Cut into sections and enjoy. ; name: orange pineapple salad ; ingredients: orange gelatin mix, pineapple gelatin mix, mandarin oranges, crushed pineapple, cream cheese, cool whip, sugar, nuts ; preparation:Dissolve jell-o in 2 cups boiling water. Put oranges and pineapple with their juice in jell-o. Pour mixture into a 9x13 cake pan. Refrigerate until set. Beat cream cheese and sugar. Fold in cool whip. Spread over jell-o. Garnish with nuts. ; name: mountain dew salad ; ingredients: lemon jell-o gelatin, lemon pudding mix, cool whip, mountain dew soda, hot water ; preparation:Prepare pudding according to package directions and cool. Dissolve jello in 2 cups hot water and add mountain dew. Cool slightly. Whip jello and pudding together and fold in cool whip. Chill 4 hours. ; name: freezer orange sherbet ; ingredients: unflavored gelatin, orange juice, sugar, lemon juice, whipping cream ; preparation:

name: homestyle hot tamales ; ingredients: ground chuck, onions, chili powder, tomato sauce, water, salt, black pepper, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, cornmeal ; preparation:Mix by hand in a large bowl the meat, onion, 2 ounces chili powder, 1 can tomato sauce, water, salt, garlic powder, black pepper, cayenne and cup corn meal. Prepare two shallow bowls, one with water and one with additional plain corn meal. Take about 1 tablespoon of the meat mixture at a time and shape into a small log. Roll lightly in additional corn meal. Roll in paper that has been passed through water. Close one end and roll up, folding remaining edge under. Put tamales in rows in opposite directions in a large roaster that can be covered and used on the stove. Bring two quarts water to a boil and add remaining tomato sauce and 1 ounce chili powder. Cover tamales with mixture, adding more water if needed. Cover and simmer for 2 hours on stovetop. Serve warm with buttered crackers. Tamales re-warm well in microwave. ; name: kid pleasing simple chickpea snack ; ingredients: olive oil, ground cumin, garlic powder, chili powder, sea salt, ground black pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, chickpeas ; preparation:Preheat an oven to 350 degrees. Whisk the oil, cumin, garlic powder, chili powder, sea salt, black pepper, and red pepper together in a small bowl. Add the chickpeas and toss to coat. Spread into a single layer on a baking sheet. Roast in the preheated oven, stirring occasionally, until nicely browned and slightly crispy, about 45 minutes. ; name: vegetarian green chili ; ingredients: butter, garlic, onion flakes, flour, diced tomatoes, green chili pepper, salt, cilantro, water ; preparation:In a large sauce pan, melt butter or margarine. Add garlic and onion and cook until onion is re-hydtrated. Add flour and stir to make a roux. Add tomatoes, green chili, salt and cilantro. Add water. Simmer for 30 minutes. This can also be made in a crock pot. ; name: top secret recipes version of arby s sauce by todd wilbur ; ingredients: ketchup, water, garlic powder, onion powder, black pepper, salt, tabasco sauce ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in small saucepan and cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the sauce begins to boil, 5-10 minutes. Remove sauce from the heat. Cover and allow to cool. Pour into a covered container for storage in the refrigerator. Keeps for 2 months. ; name: popcorn with lime and chili ; ingredients: vegetable oil, popcorn, chili powder, limes, juice of ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large, heavy pan until it is very hot. Add the popcorn and cover with lid. Reduce the heat. Shake the pan occasionally so all the corn will cook and it will not brown.
