Combine the shallots with the sherry vinegarfor dip. ; name: three sister s mizithra native american greek fusion ; ingredients: spaghetti squash, navy beans, corn, red bell pepper, vegetable margarine, olive oil, mizithra cheese, fresh parsley, fresh basil leaves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Pierce squash a few times with a knife, wrap in foil, and bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes. Remove from oven and set aside until cool enough to handle. In a medium sauce pan, combine beans and corn and heat just until hot. Cut squash in half lengthwise and remove seeds. Remove flesh by scraping against inside of shell with a fork to form pasta-like strands. Place in serving dish. Add beans, corn, and bell pepper, and toss to combine. In a small saucepan, melt margarine. Stir in olive oil, pour over squash, and toss. Sprinkle top with cheese, parsley, and basil. ; name: hot spicey tomato oil for dipping ; ingredients: olive oil, san marzano tomatoes, garlic cloves, honey, kosher salt, chili flakes, french bread ; preparation:Heat oil over medium heat. Add garlic and cook until golden brown. 3-5 mins. Remove garlic and reserve. Add tomatoes, honey, salt and chilli flakes. Cook on medium 20 mins. Blend sauce until smooth. Add reserved garlic and blend until smooth. Serve with french or italian bread, toasted ravioli, fried zucchini or use your imagination. Mangia. ; name: herb roasted summer squash ; ingredients: zucchini, summer squash, grape tomatoes, dried rosemary, parsley, salt, pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Combine first 7 ingredients in large bowl. Add a bit of onion if you like. Drizzle with olive oil and toss. Place vegetables in a single layer in a greased baking pan. Baked, uncovered at 450 for 10-15 minutes or until lightly brown and tender. ; name: squash snackers ; ingredients: yellow squash, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh garlic, fresh basil, celery salt, asiago cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Coat the bottom of a casserole dish with olive oil. Line the bottom of the dish with the squash making sure that they are laid out evenly and sprinkle with vinegar. Top with even amounts of garlic, basil and celery salt. Bake uncovered at 350 for 20 minutes. Remove from oven and add about one cube of cheese per slice. Cook for another 15 minutes remove and let cool for five minutes and serve on crackers or eat by themselves. ; name: yellow squash and corn saute ; ingredients: corn, yellow squash, water, butter, fresh parsley, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Place corn into large pot and cover with salted water, bring to boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, 10 to 15 minutes. Drain and cool corn. Cut corn off the cobs. Place squash into a skillet and add water. Cook suash over medium heat until tender, 5- to 10 minutes. Drain any excess water fromskillet. Stir corn butter parsley salt and pepper into squash. Cook, stirring occasionally, until heated through, about 5 minutes. ; name: butternut squash and tomatoes for crock pot ; ingredients: olive oil, leek, butternut squash, salt, pepper, herbes de provence, navy beans, rotel tomatoes, lowfat mozzarella cheese, bacon ; preparation:

name: pudding au chomeur ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, milk, light brown sugar, boiling water, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Mix first 3 ingredients. Then add the milk. Pour into ungreased 9x13 pan. Mix final 4 ingredients. Let butter melt. Pour over back of wooden spoon over cake batter. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. ; name: chocolate chewy cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, unsifted flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a bowl, combine flour, cocoa powder, baking soda and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely. ; name: basic cupcakes ; ingredients: eggs, vanilla, sugar, butter, flour, baking powder, salt, frosting ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Place all ingredients in a bowl and beat together until mixture is smooth. Line muffin pan. Half fill each muffin paper with batter. Bake 18 to 20 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. Frost as desired. ; name: magical pie ; ingredients: butter, plain flour, milk, caster sugar, vanilla essence, desiccated coconut, eggs ; preparation:Place all the ingredients in a bowl. Beat until mixed well. Pour into a greased flan dish. Bake for about one hour at 175 degrees celsius. When baked it will surprisingly have a base, a custard centre, and a coconut topping. ; name: baked alaska ettes ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, light cream, vanilla, ice cream, marshmallows ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f and grease muffin pan. Sift dry ingredients together. Beat the egg and cream together. Add vanilla. Pour into the dry ingredients, beating thoroughly. Bake until cakes test done and remove to a cooling rack. When cupcakes are cold, hollow out center and fill with ice cream. Level off with the back of spoon and completely blanket the top with halves of marshmallows. Preheat broiler. Place cake under hot broiler for 30 seconds, or until marshmallows are puffed and brown. Serve at once. ; name: danish cookies press cookies ; ingredients: flour, granulated sugar, butter, salt, vanilla, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cream together sugar and butter. Add eggs which have been slightly beaten. Add salt and flour. Add vanilla. Mix well. Form into fancy shapes by using a cookie press. Place on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 8 to 10 minutes. ; name: lots of cinnamon coffee cake ; ingredients: sugar, flour, salt, baking powder, cinnamon, egg, milk, sour cream, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Mix first 5 dry ingredients together. Beat egg, add milk, sour cream, melted butter and vanilla. Combine with dry ingredients only until blended. Pour into a greased, floured 8 or 9 inch round or square pan. Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon. Bake in a 400 degree oven for 25 minutes. ; name: squishy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, flour, caster sugar, custard powder, vanilla, chocolate ; preparation:

name: edible cookie dough for ice cream no eggs ; ingredients: flour, brown sugar, white sugar, butter, vanilla, milk, mini chocolate chip ; preparation:In a medium bowl mix together both sugars and butter until smooth. Stir in vanilla and milk. Mix in the flour until well blended. Add in chocolate chips. Shape into a log and freeze for about 1-2 hours or until firm. Cut or break into small chunks. Mix into softened ice cream. Return the ice cream to freezer. ; name: gold medal chocolate chippers ; ingredients: butter, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, baking soda, salt, flour, chocolate chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Cream softened butter with sugars. Add eggs and vanilla and mix well. Add soda, salt and half of flour and mix until well incorporated. Add remaining flour gradually and mix until well incorporated. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop by rounded tablespoon full onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 12-15 minutes until edges are done and centers are still a little chewy. Cool on cookie sheet about 2 minutes. Remove to wire rack to cool completely. ; name: desperation cookies ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, baking soda, salt, eggs, flour, chocolate chips, nuts ; preparation:Melt the butter. Mix in the white and brown sugar. Add the vanilla, baking soda, salt and mix. Add the eggs and stir it all up. Then, add half the flour and all the chips and nuts. Stir well. Add the other half of the flour and mix. Drop by teaspoons onto cookie sheets. Bake at 350 f for 10-12 minutes. Allow them to cool for two minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to finish cooling. ; name: peach puffed pancakes ; ingredients: eggs, milk, flour, sugar, vanilla, salt, cinnamon, butter, peaches, brown sugar ; preparation:Beat eggs. Add milk, flour, sugar, vanilla, salt and cinnamon, blend well. Mixture will be a little lumpy. Melt butter in 9x13 pan. Add peaches to pan and place in 400 degree oven until butter sizzles, dont burn it. Remove pan from oven and pour batter over peaches. Sprinkle with brown sugar. Bake at 400 for 25 minutes until puffed and brown. Can serve with maple syrup. ; name: dutch mill sugar cream pie ; ingredients: brown sugar, white sugar, flour, milk, heavy whipping cream, vanilla, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:Beat or whisk the sugars, flour, salt and milk together until foamy. Then fold in heavy whipping cream and vanilla. Pour into pie shells. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake at 400f for 10-15 minutes. Turn back oven to 350f and continue baking 20-25 minutes or until just firm. ; name: chunky pecan pie bars ; ingredients: flour, butter, brown sugar, eggs, corn syrup, sugar, vanilla, semisweet chocolate chunks, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350deg. Grease 13x9 inch baking pan. Crust. Beat flour, butter, and brown sugar in small mixer bowl until crumbly. Press into pan, bake for 12-15 min until lightly brown. Filling. Beat eggs, cornsyrup, granulated sugar, butter and vanilla in med bowl with wire wisk. Stir in chunks and nuts. Pour evenly over baked crust. Bake for 25-30 min or until set. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. ; name: lazy gourmet s chocolate brownies ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, brown sugar, cocoa, eggs, flour, baking powder, vanilla, walnuts ; preparation:In a large bowl, sift flour and baking powder. Set aside. In a large saucepan, melt the butter. Add the white sugar, brown sugar and cocoa. Blend well. Beat in 1 egg at a time. Add flour and blend well. Add vanilla and walnuts, mixing well. Pour into prepared 9 x 13 pan. Bake for 30 minutes. Centre will be firm but not hard. ; name: butterscotch pie ; ingredients: dark brown sugar, flour, sugar, egg yolks, milk, butter, pie crusts ; preparation:

name: strawberry melon avocado salad ; ingredients: honey, sherry wine vinegar, of fresh mint, fresh ground pepper, salt, baby spinach, avocado, cantaloupe, strawberries, sesame seeds ; preparation:Whisk honey, vinegar, mint, pepper and salt in a small bowl. Divide spinach among 4 salad plates. Arrange alternating slices of avocado and cantaloupe in a fan on top of the spinach. Top each salad with strawberries, drizzle with dressing and sprinkle with sesame seeds. Add sesame seeds and stir constantly until golden and fragrant, about 2 minutes. Transfer to a small bowl and let cool. ; name: easy sweet and sour red cabbage saute ; ingredients: oil, onion, apple, red cabbage, apple cider vinegar, sugar, celery seed, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add in onion and saute until golden. Add in sliced cabbage, cider vinegar, sugar, celery seeds and black pepper. Mix to combine and cook until the cabbage if crisp-tender and the liquid is reduced to a glaze. Season with salt. ; name: ricotta spinach dip with chips ; ingredients: fresh spinach, ricotta cheese, scallions, radishes, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh dill, water chestnut, parsley, olive, cherry tomatoes ; preparation:Stem the spinach and clean it thoroughly. Dry completely using a salad spiner and mince fine. Place the ricotta in a medium large bowl. Use a wire whisk or wooden spoon to beat until quite smooth stir in the spinach and all other ingredients, except garnishes. Cover tightly and chill until very cold. Serve with chips, raw veggies, or good crackers. ; name: spinach and corn tortilla bake ; ingredients: fresh cilantro leaves, scallions, salt and pepper, baby spinach, corn tortillas, kidney beans, salsa, monterey jack pepper cheese, butter ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 425f. In a food processor, combine cilantro, scallions, salt and pepper with as much spinach as will fit. Pulse, adding the rest of the spinach in batches, until all is coarsely chopped. Coat an 8-9 inch square baking dish with butter or oil. Lay 4 tortillas in the bottom of dish, overlapping slightly. Layer with half of beans, salsa, spinach mixture and cheese. Repeat with remaining ingredients, ending with cheese and pressing in gently. Cover dish with foil, place on a rimmed baking sheet. Bake until bubbling, 25-30 minutes. Remove foil, and continue baking until golden, 15-20 minutes more. Cool for 10 minutes before serving. ; name: todd s broccoli salad ; ingredients: mayonnaise, sugar, vinegar, broccoli, baby spinach, red onion, bacon bits, dark raisin, golden raisin ; preparation:Mix mayonnaise, sugar, and vinegar in a bowl. Set aside. In a large bowl, mix broccoli, spinach, onion, bacon bits, and raisins. Pour the dressing over the mixture and mix thoroughly but gently. Allow at least 1 hour of refrigeration before serving. ; name: tarragon shallot egg salad sandwich ; ingredients: eggs, sour cream, shallots, fresh tarragon, white wine vinegar, salt, black pepper, whole grain bread, baby spinach leaves, tomatoes ; preparation:Cover eggs with cold water by 1 inch in a 2-quart heavy saucepan and bring to a rolling boil, partially covered. Reduce heat to low and cook eggs, covered completely, 30 seconds. Remove pan from heat and let eggs stand in hot water, covered, 15 minutes. Transfer eggs with a slotted spoon to a bowl of ice and cold water and let stand 5 minutes. Peel eggs and finely chop. Stir together eggs and remaining salad ingredients in a bowl with a fork. Spoon egg salad onto bread and spread evenly. Top with favorite garnishes. ; name: my favorite sweet and sour red cabbage ; ingredients: cider vinegar, brown sugar, caraway seed, celery seed, red cabbage, onion, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine vinegar, brown sugar, caraway and celery seeds. Set aside. Place cabbage and onion in a saucepan. Add a small amount of water. Cover and steam until tender, about 15 minutes. Add vinegar mixture and toss to coat. Season with salt and pepper. Serve warm. ; name: strawberry spinach salad with creamy poppy seed dressing ; ingredients: baby spinach leaves, strawberries, white sugar, salt, red wine vinegar, olive oil, poppy seed, feta cheese, red onion, candied pecans ; preparation:

name: bed and breakfast sausage egg casserole ; ingredients: sausage, eggs, milk, salt, dry mustard, bread, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown sausage and drain. Beat the eggs with milk, salt, and mustard. Layer bread cubes in the bottom of a buttered 9 by 13-inch casserole dish. Crumble the sausage over the bread and top with cheese. Pour the egg mixture over all. Refrigerate overnight. Bake in 350 degree oven for 30-40 minutes. When using a glass casserole, bake in 325 degree oven for 45-60 minutes. This is really good with a little bit of maple syrup on top. ; name: sammy s cheddar beer brats ; ingredients: cheddar bratwursts, hot dog buns, cheddar cheese, onion, beer, season-all salt, garlic powder ; preparation:Put your brats in a large pot and dump in the 2 beers, onion, season all and garlic powder. Add water until the brats are fully covered. Cook 20 minutes on medium heat, meanwhile, heat up your grill. Transfer your brats to the grill and cook 4-5 minutes on each side. Be careful not to pierce the brats with a fork or anything because this will let the good tasting juices out. Discard the beer & onion mixture. Place a slice of cheese in each hot dog bun and add your brats on top. Add desired condiments. ; name: taco hot dogs ; ingredients: hot chili sauce, hot chili peppers, hot dogs, hot dog buns, lettuce, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Combine chili sauce and chili pepper. Cook hot dogs in boiling water. Reduce heat. Cover & simmer 5-8 minutes. Place hot dogs on toasted buns. Spoon chili sauce mixture over hot dogs. Top with shredded lettuce and cheese. ; name: great brats when you can t grill ; ingredients: bratwurst, beer, onion, hot dog buns, mustard ; preparation:Slice onion and place in 9 to 10 inch skillet. Pour in bottle of beer. Add brats and simmer until onion is tender and brats are firm and cooked through. When beer has evaporated, allow brats and onions to brown while turning frequently, adding a little oil if the pan needs it. When the onions turn golden, remove. When the brats are browned on all sides, plate them. Wrap the buns in paper towels and microwave on high for about 30 seconds until soft and warm. Serve with baked beans and or chips. ; name: lobster rolls ; ingredients: lobster meat, mayonnaise, butter, hot dog buns, butter lettuce ; preparation:Combine lobster meat and mayonnaise in medium bowl. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Butter along outside surfaces of hot dog rolls. Heat medium skillet over high heat. Place rolls, 1 buttered side down, in skillet. Cook until browned slightly, about 2 minutes per side. Open rolls. Fill with lettuce, then lobster mixture, serve immediately. ; name: original tuna melts ; ingredients: hot dog buns, solid white tuna packed in water, pickle, onions, cheese, mayonnaise ; preparation:Drain and flake tuna in a medium bowl. Add pickles, onion and cheese and mix well. Add mayonnaise and mix well. Fill hot dog rolls and wrap each in tin foil, twisting both ends to close. Place on cookie sheet and bake at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes. Serve in corn-on-the-cob dishes with french fries and a salad. These can also be cooked on a grill, making them suitable for camping. ; name: ann s egg sausage casserole ; ingredients: little smokies sausage, spicy bulk sausage, white bread, milk, eggs, dry mustard, salt, american cheese ; preparation:Cut smokies in small pieces. Fry bulk sausage breaking into small pieces, and drain. Beat eggs, and add remaining ingredients. Mix all together and put in a 9x13 casserole dish. Cover with foil and refrigerate overnight. Bake covered for 55 minutes. Remove cover and bake 5-10 minutes more. Let set 5-10 minutes after removing, so eggs can set. ; name: kids breadstick snacks ; ingredients: hot dog buns, butter, parmesan cheese, sesame seeds ; preparation:

name: clamato caldo verde ; ingredients: onion, garlic clove, potatoes, clamato juice, chicken broth, chorizo sausage, collard greens, large shrimp ; preparation:Heat a large saucepanon medium-high. Saute the onion and garlic in a little oil for about 3 minutes. Add the potatoes and saute for another 2-3 minutes. Add clamato and broth, cover and let simmer for 20 minutes. While the potatoes simmer, hear a skillet over medium-high heat and saute chorizo for about 10 minutes. Drain fat and reserve. When potatoes are soft, mash them in the pan, then add chorizo and greens. Season with salt and pepper and let simmer for another 10 minutes. Add shrimp and let heat through. ; name: tender pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, garlic clove, salt, pepper, ground cumin, extra virgin olive oil, chicken broth, dry white wine ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. With the top of a sharp knife, make deep little slits all over the tenderloin and insert the garlic slivers. Season with salt, pepper and cumin. Place the oil in an oven-proof skillet and sear the tenderloin well over medium-high heat for about 10 minutes, turning the meat over as it browns. Add the chicken broth and white wine to the pan, and place it in the oven for 10 minutes. Remove it and let it rest, covered with foil, for 10-12 minutes before carving. It will continue to cook as it sits. Slice and serve immediately. ; name: vegetable couscous ; ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, green bell peppers, olive oil, couscous, water, tomatoes ; preparation:Saut onion, garlic and green pepper in oil in a large skillet until soft, then push to sides of pan. In the center of the skillet, pour in the couscous. Add the water to the couscous, stirring gently. Top this mixture with tomato wedges and the cooked green peppers. Cover pan for 3 minutes. Add a little water and cook longer, if needed. Couscous should be light and fluffy. ; name: venezuelan scrambled eggs perico venezolano ; ingredients: oil, onion, bell pepper, garlic cloves, tomatoes, eggs, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil in a skillet over medium-high flame. Add the onion, bell pepper and garlic and saute for 3 to 4 minutes, or until the onion is softened and translucent. Add the tomatoes and cook for another 3 to 4 minutes to reduce the liquid somewhat. Reduce heat to low, add the eggs, salt and pepper and cook, gently stirring the eggs occasionally to scramble them and just long enough to cook them through while keeping them soft. Serve with bread or arepas and a slice of fresh cheese. ; name: hamburger stoganoff ; ingredients: onion, garlic clove, butter, ground beef, flour, salt, pepper, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, mushroom ; preparation:Saute onion and garlic in butter over medium heat. Stir in meat and brown. Add mushrooms, flour, salt and pepper. Cook 5 minutes. Stir in soup. Simmer uncovered 10 minutes. Add sour cream, mix well and heat through. Serve over mashed potatoes, pasta or rice. ; name: pork spiedies ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, tomato juice, onions, garlic cloves, worcestershire sauce, fresh basil, salt and pepper, italian bread ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine first 7 ingredients. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Drain, discarding marinade. Thread pork on small skewers. Grill or broil for 15-20 minutes, turning occasionally, until the meat is no longer pink and pulls away easily from the skewers. To serve, wrap a slice of bread around about five pork cubes and pull off skewer. ; name: pickled tongue ; ingredients: beef tongue, vinegar, water, sugar, onions, pickling spices, mustard seeds, bay leaf, garlic cloves ; preparation:Boil tongue in salt water for 3 hours. Peel skin from the tongue. Mix remaining ingredients in a large, nonreactive pot and bring to a boil. Add meat and boil for 10 minutes. Cool and store in refridgerator for one week. Slice tongue thinly to serve. ; name: pulled pork barbecue slow cooker ; ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, water, barbecue sauce, salt and pepper, pork roast, onions ; preparation:

name: easy white cake ; ingredients: sugar, butter, egg whites, vanilla extract, flour, baking powder, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350, or 325 if you have dark non-stick pan. Prepare pan whichever way. In a bowl, cream together sugar and butter. Add the sifted flour and baking powder. Beat in eggs. Stir in vanilla. Finally, stir in milk until batter is smooth. Bake for about 30-40 minutes, until cake springs back at touch. ; name: farmer s old fashioned vanilla pudding ; ingredients: milk, sugar, eggs, flour, pure vanilla extract, butter, heavy whipping cream ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan, heat milk and sugar, over medium to low heat. When hot, stir in eggs and flour. Beat together well and boil until thick. Stir in butter and vanilla after it is cooked. Cool and served chilled. Before serving, whip up heavy cream and fold in to chilled pudding. ; name: magical pie ; ingredients: butter, plain flour, milk, caster sugar, vanilla essence, desiccated coconut, eggs ; preparation:Place all the ingredients in a bowl. Beat until mixed well. Pour into a greased flan dish. Bake for about one hour at 175 degrees celsius. When baked it will surprisingly have a base, a custard centre, and a coconut topping. ; name: world s most dangerous cake ; ingredients: flour, sugar, cocoa, egg, milk, oil, chocolate chips, vanilla ; preparation:Mix dry ingredients in large coffee mug. Add egg & mix thoroughly. Add milk and oil, mix well. Add vanilla and mix well. Microwave at 1000 watts for 3 minutes. ; name: vanilla pound cake ; ingredients: sugar, unsalted butter, eggs, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking powder, milk ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Combine sugar and melted butter in large bowl. Beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often, until creamy. Add eggs,, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Add vanilla. Beat until well mixed. Stir together flour and baking powder in small bowl. Gradually add flour mixture alternately with milk to butter mixture, beating at low speed until well mixed. Pour batter into greased and floured 10-inch angel food cake pan. Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 10 minutes. Remove from pan. ; name: vanilla hearts ; ingredients: butter, flour, sugar, vanilla essence ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 180 c. Sift flour into a big bowl. Cut butter into small pieces. Using your fingers work the butter into the flour until a crumbly dough has formed. Add sugar and vanilla essence and knead well. Roll out the dough and cut out hearts. Place on a lined baking sheet and bake for 10-15 minutes. Let cool and store in an air-tight box. ; name: easy chocolate souffle ; ingredients: butter, bitter chocolate, eggs, sugar, flour, vanilla flavoring ; preparation:Put the butter and the chocolate in ben - mari until its liquid. Beat the eggs with the sugar and the vanilla by hand. Add the flour and the chocolate mix. Butter the bowls and add sugar at the edges. Divide the mix and put in a preheated oven for 10-12 minutes at 320f. ; name: mimi s pound cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, cake flour, vanilla ; preparation:

name: low fat cherry loaf ; ingredients: milk, lemon juice, flour, brown sugar, baking soda, salt, non-fat vanilla yogurt, egg, vanilla, fresh cherries ; preparation:Mix together the milk and lemon juice. Set aside for 10 minutes. Mix together the dry ingredients. Lightly beat the egg, then add it, the yogurt, the milk mixture, and the vanilla to the dry ingredients. Fold in the cherries. Pour batter into greased 9 x 5-inch loaf pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 to 60 minutes. ; name: baked lemon pudding ; ingredients: sugar, flour, salt, lemon juice, lemon, zest of, eggs, butter, milk ; preparation:In a medium mixing bowl, combine sugar, flour and salt. Stir in lemon juice, zest, beaten egg yolks, butter and milk. In a separate bowl, beat egg whites until stiff but not dry. Fold into lemon mixture. Pour into buttered 6 cup casserole dish. Place this casserole inside a large pan. Pour hot water into the 9x13 pan to a depth of about 1 inch. Bake at 350 degrees for about 40 minutes or until the topping is set and golden brown. During baking this separates into a cake-like topping with a lemon sauce beneath. ; name: simple apple crisp ; ingredients: apples, cinnamon, nutmeg, water, lemon juice, butter, sugar, flour ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 350. Placed sliced apples in buttered 8x8 pan. Add spices, lemon juice and water. In separate bowl, mix butter, sugar and flour until crumbly. Sprinkle on top of apples. Bake for 1 hour or until top is golden brown and apples are tender. ; name: lemon passionfruit butter ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, butter, passion fruit, lemons, juice of, water, lemon zest ; preparation:In a heatproof bowl, whisk together the eggs and sugar until combined. Place over a pan of gently simmering water. Gradually add all remaining ingredients. Whisk over low heat 10-15 minutes, until the mixture thickens and coats the back of a wooden spoon. Do not boil. Pour into sterilised jars and seal. The bottles can be stored in a cool place but must be refrigerated once opened. ; name: quick lemon curd ; ingredients: white sugar, eggs, fresh lemon juice, lemons, zest of, unsalted butter ; preparation:In a microwave bowl, whisk together the sugar and eggs until smooth. Stir in lemon juice, lemon zest, and butter. Cook in the microwave for one minute intervals, stirring after each minute until the mixture is thick enough to coat the back of a metal spoon. It will be quite liquid but will set up somewhat overnight. Remove from the microwave, and pour into sterile jars. Store for up to 3 weeks in the refrigerator. ; name: sarah s apple pie filling ; ingredients: apples, salt, cornstarch, sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, lemon juice, water ; preparation:Pack 6-7 quart jars with apples, tightly. Mix the first 5 ingredients. Add water and lemon juice. Cook until it thickens and clears. Pour over apples, leaving an inch of head space. Process in water bath canner for 35 minutes. ; name: sour cream cherry cake ; ingredients: low-fat plain yogurt, sugar, eggs, flour, lemon juice, lemon rind, baking soda, salt, cherries ; preparation:Mix egg yolks, lemon rind and juice, sugar and yogurt together. Sift in flour, baking soda, salt and mix thoroughly. Mix in cherries or other fruit. Beat egg whites until stiff and mix inches. Pour into greased loaf pan. Bake at 350 for 40-50 minutes. ; name: lovely lemon fondue ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, water, butter, lemon juice, lemon rind, strawberry, shortbread cookie, cake, meringue ; preparation:

name: marinated cucumber salad on salad greens ; ingredients: olive oil, white wine vinegar, frozen orange juice concentrate, honey, red pepper flakes, kosher salt, cucumbers, grape tomatoes, green onions, mixed salad greens ; preparation:In a bowl combine first 5 ingredients, mixing well. Add salt to your taste. Add cucumber mix to bowl, tossing to coat. Set aside at room temperature to marinate 30 minutes. Arrange chilled prepared salad mix on plates. Spoon cucumber mixture on top. ; name: apple walnut salad with cranberry vinaigrette ; ingredients: walnuts, salad greens, gala apples, fresh cranberries, balsamic vinegar, red onion, honey, dijon mustard, vegetable oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Toast walnuts for 8-10 minutes in a 350f oven. In a food processor or blender, combine cranberries, vinegar, onion, honey and mustard. Puree until smooth. Gradually add oil and season to taste with salt and pepper. In a salad bowl, toss together greens, apples and enough dressing to coat. Sprinkle with walnuts. ; name: colorful wild rice salad ; ingredients: wild rice, carrots, green onions, olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt, raisins, pecans, honey ; preparation:Cook rice according to directions except do not add butter, oil or seasonings. Drain well and refrigerate until completely cooled. Add carrots and onions, mixing well. Mix oil and vinegar and then add salt. Pour dressing over rice, mixing thoroughly. Add fruit and nuts. Add honey and mix well. ; name: tossed greens with pineapple apple and feta cheese ; ingredients: apples, pineapple, red onions, feta cheese, salad greens, water, balsamic vinegar, sweet-hot mustard, garlic, salt and pepper ; preparation:Whisk together water, vinegar, mustard, garlic, salt, and pepper in a small bowl. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine greens, apples, pineapple, onion, and cheese. Pour dressing over the fruit and vegetables and toss gently to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: cider braised cabbage ; ingredients: butter, onion, green cabbage, apple cider, apple cider vinegar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in large pot over medium-high heat. Add onion. Saute until beginning to soften, about 5 minutes. Add cabbage. Saute until slightly wilted, tossing frequently, about 6 minutes. Stir in apple cider. Reduce heat to medium. Cover and cook until cabbage is tender, stirring occasionally, about 6 minutes. Uncover. Simmer until almost all liquid in pot evaporates, about 3 minutes. Stir in vinegar. Season with salt and pepper. ; name: delicious georgia pear relish ; ingredients: pears, vidalia onions, red bell peppers, green bell peppers, granulated sugar, kosher salt, apple cider vinegar, allspice ; preparation:Put through food grinder all the ingredients. When everything is ground up, mix all together. In a large canning kettle. Cook for 40 minutes. Put in jars and seal. ; name: white mountain coleslaw ; ingredients: green cabbage, red cabbage, red onion, carrot, sour cream, sugar, mayonnaise, malt vinegar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Grate cabbage. Add red onion and carrot. Toss in a large bowl. In a separate bowl, mix together sour cream, sugar, mayonnaise, and vinegar. Add salt and pepper to taste. Taste, adjust seasoning, taste, taste, taste. Add the mixture to the cabbage, toss well, refrigerate overnight or for several hours, and make sure its well and tightly covered. Serve very cold. ; name: red cabbage salad with apples raisins honey dressing ; ingredients: red cabbage, apple juice, salt, apples, golden raisin, cider vinegar, honey, oil ; preparation:

name: cheesy onion soup ; ingredients: onions, butter, cayenne pepper, flour, seasoning salt, half-and-half, colby, ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, crouton ; preparation:In a large saucepan saute onion and pinch cayenne pepper in butter until the onions are just lightly golden. Stir in flour and salt until blended. Gradually add half and half cream until blended. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Season with ground black pepper to taste. Stir in colby or monterey jack cheese until melted. Ladle into bowls, sprinkle with parmesan cheese and croutons. ; name: crunchy baked fish fillets ; ingredients: fish fillets, french dressing, lemon juice, salt, french-fried onions, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Thaw fish steaks if frozen. Cut into serving pieces. Place fish in a shallow baking pan. Combine french dressing, lemon juice and salt. Pour sauce over fish and let stand 30 minutes, turning once. Remove fish from sauce and place in a well-greased baking dish. Crush onions in plastic bag with a rolling pin. Add cheese to onions and mix thoroughly. Sprinkle onion mixture over fish. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 25 to 30 minutes or until fish flakes easily with fork. ; name: creamy french onion soup ; ingredients: butter, white onions, chicken stock, whipping cream, salt and pepper, french bread, stilton cheese, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Toast 6 thick slices of french bread in a 300 degree oven until crisp. Blend the stilton with a couple tablespoons of butter, then spread on the toast. When ready to serve the soup, pop one of these on top of each serving bowl and sprinkle with lots of cheddar cheese. Melt butter in a large saucepan over low heat. Add onions, cover, and cook until translucent, stirring occasionally for about 30 minutes. Add the stock and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes. Add cream and bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer to thicken slightly. Season generously with salt and pepper. Ladle into bowls, top with stilton toast, and run under the broiler until the cheese is melted and brown. Serve immediately. ; name: potato egg pie ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, fresh pepper, milk, mashed potatoes, hardboiled egg, crisp bacon, parsley, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Over medium heat melt butter then blend in flour, salt and pepper. Slowly mix in milk, stirring continually until mixture is thick and bubbly. Remove from heat- set aside. Line bottom and sides of a greased 9 inch pie plate with half the potatoes. Into the shell layer eggs, bacon, parsley, cheese and white sauce. Cover with remaining potatoes. Brush the top of the pie with 2 tablespoons of milk. Bake for 20 minutes or until top is browned. ; name: brussels sprouts extraordinaire ; ingredients: onion, butter, flour, sugar, tomato juice, salt, pepper, frozen brussels sprouts, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a skillet, saute onion in butter until tender. Remove onion and set aside. Blend flour into the drippings. Add tomato juice. Cook and stir over low heat until thickened and smooth. Stir in the sugar, salt, pepper and onion. Arrange the brussels sprouts in a greased 1 quart baking dish. Top with the tomato sauce. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. ; name: pytt i panna swedish fried hash with pickled beetroot ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, sunflower oil, onions, parsley, salt, pepper, roast pork, eggs, pickled beet ; preparation:Heat up a large frying pan and melt the half the butter. Add the diced potatoes and saute until the potatoes are golden brown and soft. In another smaller frying pan, add the remaining butter and melt. Add the diced onions and cook until golden brown and soft. Add the fried onions to the fried potatoes, then add the parsley, mix gently but well - cover and keep warm. Put the chopped meat into the onion pan and saute quickly and over a high heat. Add the meat to the potatoes and onion mixture. Heat up the sunflower oil and fry the eggs. Serve the pytta i panna immediately with a fried egg on top of the potato, onion and meat mixture. Accompany this dish with a bowl of pickled beetroot and rye bread. ; name: vidalia onion quiche ; ingredients: butter, vidalia onions, unbaked pie shells, swiss cheese, eggs, cream, salt, pepper, chives ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Melt butter in a large frying pan, and add sliced onions. Sautuntil transparent. Set aside to cool. Sprinkle 1 cup of cheese in the bottom of the pie plate. Add the cooled onions. Mix together eggs, cream, salt and pepper. Pour over the onions and top with remaining cheese and chives. Bake for 40 - 50 minutes, or until mixture is set. Allow to cool slightly before serving. ; name: turnip cream with caramelized onions ; ingredients: onions, butter, turnips, milk, french baguettes, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: ham and spinach rolls ; ingredients: frozen spinach, cornbread stuffing mix, sour cream, boiled ham, butter, flour, milk, sharp cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine spinach, very well drained, stuffing, sour cream. Spread mixture on ham slices and roll up with seam side down in baking dish. Melt butter in saucepan. Add flour and blend well. Add milk and continue to stir over medium heat until thick. Add cheddar cheese and remove from heat. Stir until cheese is melted. Pour sauce over ham rolls and sprinkle with parmesan cheese and paprika, if desired. Cover with foil. Bake 20 minutes covered and 20 minutes uncovered. ; name: no bake creamy coconut pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, milk, flaked coconut, whipped topping, almond extract, graham cracker crust ; preparation:Combine cream cheese, sugar, milk and coconut in blender. Blend at medium speed for 30 seconds. Fold into whipped topping. Add extract, spoon into crust. Freeze for about 4 hours. Sprinkle with additional coconut, toasted, if desired. Let stand at room temperature for 5 minutes before serving. Store in freezer. ; name: turkey enchilada casserole ; ingredients: ground turkey, taco seasoning, colby-monterey jack cheese, enchilada sauce, corn tortillas, sour cream ; preparation:Brown the ground turkey and add taco seasoning, following the directions on the package of seasoning. Get a two quart pan, pour a can of enchilada sauce on the bottom. Layer 6 tortillas over sauce. Spread turkey and cheese over layer and cover with another 6 tortillas. Spread the rest of the turkey and some more cheese on top then cover with the last layer of 6 tortillas. Pour the remaining cans of enchilada sauce over the top and cover with the remainder of cheese. Cook in oven at 350 degrees for 10-15 minutes. Let cool and serve with sour cream. ; name: cheesy stove top macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: butter, flour, milk, parmesan cheese, colby-monterey jack cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, dry mustard, pepper, salt, cooked macaroni ; preparation:Start cooking the macaroni while you prepare the sauce to save time. Melt butter in a medium sauce pan. Whisk in flour. On medium-high heat, whisk in milk a little at a time. Continue to whisk til thick and bubbly. Do not allow to burn, turn down heat if sauce is cooking to fast to keep from burning. Whisk in mustard, salt and pepper. Reduce to medium heat, stir in cheeses. When melted and blended pour over cooked and drained macaroni. Taste, add more salt if needed. Mix and cook 1 or 2 minutes on medium heat. Serve. ; name: caramel pecan cheesecake pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, unbaked pastry shells, pecans, caramel ice cream topping ; preparation:In a small mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese, sugar, 1 egg and vanilla until smooth. Spread into pastry shell. Sprinkle with pecans. In a small bowl, whisk remaining eggs. Graduall whisk in caramel ice cream topping until blended. Pour over pecans. Bake at 375 for 35-40 min or until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack for one hour. Refrigerate for 4 hrs or overnight before slicing. Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: zesty italian crescent casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese, sour cream, crescent rolls, parmesan cheese, butter ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. In large skillet, brown beef and onion then drain. Return meat to pan. Add spaghetti sauce. Meanwhile, in a medium bowl combine mozzarella cheese and sour cream. Pour hot meat into an ungreased 12 x 8 inch dish. Spoon cheese mixture over meat. Unroll crescent roll dough over the top of the mixture. Mix parmesan cheese and butter together, then spread over the top of the dough. Bake 18-25 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: impossible cheesebuger pie ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, salt, cheddar cheese, milk, bisquick baking mix, eggs ; preparation:Heat oven to 400. Cook beef and onion, drain. Stir in salt. Spread in greased 9 inch pie plate. Sprinkle with cheese. Stir remaining ingredients with fork until blended. Pour into plate. Bake 25 minute or until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Shirley j hedrick. 5-23-05. ; name: pumpkin shaped cheese ball ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, cream cheese, solid-pack pumpkin, pineapple preserves, ground allspice, ground nutmeg, pretzel stick, cracker ; preparation:

name: simple black beans ; ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, fresh thyme, dried black beans, bay leaves, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large pot, saute onion in oil over medium-high heat until the onion is soft, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and thyme. Cook until fragrant, 1 minute. Add the drained beans, bay leaves and enough water to cover beans. Bring to a boil over high heat, reduce temperature to simmer, cover and cook for 40 to 50 minutes or until beans are tender but not mushy. Check often and add from 1 to 2 cups additional water if beans start to cook dry. Drain beans, remove the bay leaves and fresh thyme springs, season with salt and pepper to taste. Please. If they are salted before they will not soften. When cool, divide into 1 cup servings and freeze in rigid container or vacuum pack in small bags. ; name: portuguese chicken with peas frango com ervilhas ; ingredients: chicken pieces, salt & freshly ground black pepper, olive oil, butter, onions, chicken stock, port wine, fresh oregano, green peas ; preparation:Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Heat the oil and butter in a large heavy baking dish over moderate heat and brown the chicken on all sides. Transfer the chicken to a plate and set aside. Saute the onions in the same baking dish until tender but not brown, about 10 minutes. Stir in the stock, wine, and oregano and return the chicken to the skillet. Cover and simmer over low heat until the chicken is tender, 45 to 60 minutes. Adjust the seasoning with salt and pepper and add the peas about 15 minutes before serving. ; name: perfect roast chicken ; ingredients: lemon, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, whole chickens, coarse salt, pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Heat oven to 450 degrees. Rinse and dry chicken and sprinkle with salt and pepper inside the cavity as much as you like. Place the lemon and ginger slices and garlic cloves inside the cavity. Place in a shallow roasting pan and rub on some olive oil. Season the outside with more salt and pepper. Roast 15 minutes then decrease heat to 375 degrees. Roast an additional 65 minutes. Do not open the door during this process. Remove from oven and let rest 10 minutes. ; name: thymed onions ; ingredients: olive oil, unsalted butter, onions, fresh thyme, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f degrees. Heat the oil and butter in large roasting dish. Remove outer skins off the onions but keep them whole. Add the onions to the dish and toss them in the oil and butter mixture over a medium heat until lightly sauteed. Add the thyme and seasoning and roast for 45-50 minutes, basting regularly. ; name: zesty lemon olives ; ingredients: olives, kosher salt, black peppercorns, bay leaves, rosemary, fennel seed, garlic cloves, dried red pepper flakes, lemons, olive oil ; preparation:If using brine-packed olives, drain them. In a medium bowl, combine the olives, salt, peppercorns, bay leaves, herb sprigs, fennel seeds, garlic and red pepper flakes. Zest the lemons in whatever size zest you like--a mix of finely grated zest for the brightest flavor and larger strips for color. Add the zest and oil to the olives and mix well. Pour and scrape into a covered jar and refrigerate overnight to let the flavors mingle before serving. ; name: speedy scallops with corn and sweet peppers ; ingredients: butter, garlic cloves, onion, orange bell pepper, sweet corn, red wine, chicken broth, salt, ground black pepper, sea scallops ; preparation:Pre-heat skillet with 1 tbs butter over medium-high heat. Add garlic and onion. Saute about 2 minutes. Add bell pepper and saute about 5 minutes. Add corn and saute about 3 minutes. Add wine, broth, salt and pepper and simmer until most of the liquid is evaporated, about 4 minutes. Remove vegetable mixture from pan and place on serving plates. Cover to keep warm. Add remaining butter to pan. When butter is melted add scallops. Saute until slightly golden and cooked thoroughly. Serve scallops on top of corn mixture. ; name: garlic piperade soup ; ingredients: garlic cloves, onions, sweet pepper, olive oil, tomatoes, beef stock, bread, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Blanch the garlic in boiling water for thirty seconds. Run under cold water and drain. Peel and slice the cloves of garlic. Cook the onions and peppers in the oil for ten minutes until the onions are golden and the peppers are soft. Add the garlic and tomatoes. Cover the pan and cook over low heat for thirty minutes. Pour in the broth and bring to a boil. Tear the bread into large pieces and add to the boiling soup where it will disintegrate and thicken the broth. Adjust the amount of bread and broth to the desired thickness of the soup and salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot with grated cheese if you wish. ; name: braised fennel ; ingredients: fennel bulbs, butter, garlic clove, thyme, salt & freshly ground black pepper, dry white wine, chicken stock ; preparation:

name: debbie s potato skins ; ingredients: baking potatoes, cheddar cheese, bacon, butter, sour cream, garlic salt, pepper, paprika, green onion ; preparation:Wash potatoes and microwave until done about 10 minutes. Cut in half lengthwise. Scoop out inside, leaving small amount of white. Brush with butter. Sprinkle with garlic salt and pepper and paprika. Bake on cookie sheet in 475 degree oven 8 minutes or until brown turn over and cook another 8 minutes. Top with cheese and crumbled bacon. Bake another 5 minutes. Serve with sour cream and green onions. ; name: spinach whipped potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, salt, cream cheese, butter, milk, frozen chopped spinach, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place peeled, quartered potatoes in a large saucepan. Cover with cool water and add salt. Bring to a boil over high heat. Turn down to medium-high heat and cook until tender, about 20 minutes. Drain potatoes well and return to saucepan. Mash the potatoes with an electric mixer. Add the cream cheese, butter, milk and whip with an electric mixer until smooth. Stir in the chopped spinach, salt and pepper. ; name: roasted potatoes peppers and onions with rosemary ; ingredients: baking potatoes, sweet red pepper, sweet green pepper, onions, garlic, olive oil, fresh rosemary, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Arrange the potatoes and the red and green peppers alternately in a spoke pattern in a shallow, 12-inch round baking dish. Pile the onions in the center. Scatter the garlic over the top. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with rosemary, salt and black pepper. Bake in the preheated oven until the vegetables are lightly golden and tender, or about 45 minutes. Garnish with fresh rosemary sprigs. ; name: broccoli potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, broccoli floret, low-fat sour cream, green onions, garlic cloves, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Prick the scrubbed potatoes and bake for about 1 hour. Cool on a rack for about 15 min. Meanwhile steam the broccoli for 5 minutes. Slice each potato in half and gently scoop out most of the flesh leaving the shells in tact. In a blender or food processor, using the metal blade, combine the potato flesh, sour cream, broccoli, green onion, garlic, salt& pepper. Process until smooth. Spoon the potato mixture into potato shells. Place on a baking sheet. Bake until heated through about l5 to 20 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: weight watchers twice baked garlic potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, bulb of garlic, low sodium chicken broth, fat free sour cream, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Pierce potatoes with fork several times and place on baking sheet. Wrap garlic in foil and place alongside the potatoes. Bake until potatoes are tender and garlic is softened and brown about 50 - 60 minutes. Let cool about 15 minutes until comfortable to handle. Halve the potatoes lengthwise and scoop the pulp into a bowl leaving skins intact. Cut the garlic bulb in half squeeze out the pulp and add to the potato. Add broth, sour cream and pepper. Stir and mash with fork to desired consistency. Spoon mixture back into potato skins and sprinkle with cheese and paprika. Return to baking sheet and heat until warmed through about 15 minutes. ; name: baked sweet savory mashed potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, salt, sweet potatoes in syrup, cream cheese, bacon, sour cream, chicken broth, pepper ; preparation:Bring potatoes, 1 teaspoon salt, and water to cover to a boil. Cook 30 minutes, or until tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Add sweet potatoes and cream cheese. Mush until smooth with potato masher. Stir in bacon, next 3 ingredients, remaining 2 teaspoons of salt. Spoon mixture into lightly greased 11x7-inch baking dish. Bake uncovered at 350f for 20 minutes. Garnish with the rest of the bacon. ; name: twice baked potatoes with bacon and ranch ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, ranch dressing, cheddar cheese, green onion, bacon, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Cut cooked potatoes in half and scoop out the insides, leaving the shell intact. Combine the potato with remaining ingredients, except extra cheese. Mash and mix well. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Fill potato skins with mixture and top with the extra cheese. Bake at 425 until cheese melts and is golden brown. ; name: basic potato salad ; ingredients: baking potatoes, eggs, salad dressing, onion, sweet gherkins, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: egg bhujia ; ingredients: oil, eggs, onion, green chili peppers, salt, skim milk ; preparation:Beat egg well. Add salt and milk. Heat oil. Add chopped onion and green chili. Fry to light golden brown. Add beaten egg. Cook for about a minute. Stir and mix egg mixture thoroughly and fry to light brown. Serve hot with paratha or rice and lentil. ; name: basic crepes ii ; ingredients: eggs, flour, milk, butter, salt ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a blender. Whirl one minute. Scrape down and blend 15 seconds more. Refrigerate at least one hour before making crepes. Heat a lightly greased 6 inch skillet. Remove from heat. Spoon in 2 tbsp batter. Lift and tilt skillet to spread evenly. Return to heat. Brown on one side only. To remove, invert pan over paper toweling. Repeat with remaining batter. ; name: frozen french toast oamc ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, salt, cinnamon, vanilla, milk, bread ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except the bread in a large bowl. Dip each slice of bread in mixture so it is soaked through. Brown on both sides in margarine over medium heat. Let cool on cooling racks completely. Once the slices have cooled completely, retuns to bread bag alternating with wax paper to avoid the slices sticking together. Freeze until ready to eat. Reheat in toaster when ready to eat. ; name: chicken fried corn on the cob ; ingredients: milk, egg, flour, seasoning salt, pepper, corn, oil ; preparation:Combine milk and egg in shallow dish and mix well. Combine flour, seasoned salt and pepper in shallow dish and mix well. Dip each ear of corn into milk and egg mixture, then roll in seasoned flour. Knock off excess flour. In a large skillet, heat oil to 350 degrees. Add corn and fry for 5 minutes or until golden brown. Drain on paper towels. ; name: baked custard cups ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, salt, nutmeg, vanilla, milk ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients, stir until blended. Slowly add scalded milk, stirring constantly. Pour into 4 custard cups. Set cups in 9x9 inch baking pan. Pour 1 inch hot water into pan. Bake at 350 for 35 minutes, or until knife comes out clean. Remove from pan, cool. Chill. ; name: eggs baked in potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, milk, salt, pepper, eggs, cheese ; preparation:Bake the potatoes. Scoop out the pulp, after cutting a thin slice from the length of the potato. Mash pulp to a creamy fluff with butter, hot milk, salt and pepper. Fill potato shells, leaving a dent in the middle of each to hold a raw egg. Break 1 or 2 eggs into each potato. Cover with cheese. Bake at 400f for 10 minutes until the egg is firm and cheese is browned. ; name: rumbled eggs ; ingredients: butter, eggs, bottled water, salt and pepper ; preparation:Put a saucepan of boiling water over a low heat. Put the butter in a bowl and stand it in the saucepan to melt, while you beat together the eggs, salt, pepper and water. When the butter is hot and clear, pour in the egg mixture and stir twice. They can then be left over the gently simmering water while you set the table. Give them an occasional stir as you pass by to prevent the eggs at the bottom from sticking. As soon as the eggs are the consistency of clotted cream remove the saucepan from the heat and the eggs will keep hot over the hot water until they are needed. Serve on buttered toast. ; name: basic omelet ; ingredients: eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: sticky spiced mushroom skewers ; ingredients: dark soy sauce, cooking wine, clear honey, vegetable oil, fresh ginger, garlic clove, chinese five spice powder, shiitake mushrooms ; preparation:Mix the first seven ingredients together in a large bowl. Add the mushrooms and stir well until they are coated in the marinade. Cover and leave to marinate in a cool place for at least 1 hour. Drain the marinade into a small pan and simmer for 1-2 mins until syrupy. Thread the mushrooms on to skewers then cook over hot barbecue coals or griddle or under a hot broiler for about 10 mins, turning frequently and brushing with more of the marinade. Serve hot. ; name: pork strips ; ingredients: sugar, soy sauce, pork, extra virgin olive oil, mushroom, whole corn, tomatoes and green chilies, water, white rice, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a mixing bowl add the sugar and soy together. Make it more of a marinade sauce than a paste. Add the pork strips and refrigerate at least one hour or over night. When ready to cook add the extra virgin olive oil to a large skillet brown the pork then remove from the skillet add the tomatoes with green chilli, corn and mushrooms. Let them get warm. In a sauce pan bring the water to a boil then add the rice. When the veggies are warm add the sauce in the skillet along with the pork. Put the rice on the bottom of the plate then add the mixture of pork and veggie. Salt and pepper to your liking. Enjoy. ; name: bahama mama pork chops or chicken ; ingredients: pineapple chunks, cornstarch, chili sauce, raisins, brown sugar, cinnamon, pork chops, vegetable oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:In medium bowl, blend reserved pineapple juice with cornstarch. Stir in pineapple, chili sauce, raisins, sugar and cinnamon, and set aside. In large skillet, lightly brown chops or chicken in oil and drain. Pour pineapple mixture over chops or chicken. Cover and simmer 20 minutes or until meat is cooked throughout. ; name: sum dum guy s pork noodles ; ingredients: vegetable oil, ginger, roast pork, bok choy, hoisin sauce, rice wine, green onion, thin egg noodles ; preparation:Heat oil in wok or heavy saut pan. Add ginger and pork and stir fry until pork begins to develop a crust. Add bok choy and hoisin sauce with splash of rice wine. Toss. Add noodles and green onions and continue stir frying until noodles are heated through. To serve, remove pan from heat. Using tongs, pull all noodles from the pan and then top noodles with pork, onions and bok choy. Serve immediately. ; name: tomato onion pork chop ; ingredients: corn oil, pork chops, onion, water, tomato basil soup mix, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:In skillet, heat corn oil over medium heat, add chops& onion, brown. Set chops aside. Add remaining ingradiants. Stirring constantly, bring to a boil, return chops to skillet. Reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes or until tender. Spoon sauce over pork chops. ; name: super saucy pork chops and rice ; ingredients: pork chops, crushed tomatoes, brown sugar, vinegar, garlic powder, sweet onion, molasses, chili powder, cooked rice ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except pork chops and rice in a slow cooker. Stir until well blended. Add pork chops. Cook for 6 hours. Serve over rice, or add cooked rice to mixture during the last half hour of cooking. ; name: thai pickled eggs ; ingredients: eggs, water, thin soy sauce, black soy sauce, garlic cloves, fresh cilantro, pork stew meat ; preparation:Hard boil the eggs, strain and let stand to cool. Mix the water, thin soy sauce, black soy sauce in a four quart pot. Press the 4 cloves of garlic with a garlic press and place in the solution. Finely chop the cilantro and place in the solution. Remove the shell from the eggs and place in the solution. Add the pork to the solution. Bring to a boil and then cook for another twenty minutes or so on high. For best flavor let cool and then place in the refrigerator overnight and then boil for another fifteen minutes. Serve with rice but best served with jasmine rice. ; name: taiwanese pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, soy sauce, garlic, sugar, white wine, chinese five spice powder, vegetable oil, cornstarch ; preparation:

name: eggs with cheese and olive oil ; ingredients: olive oil, eggs, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat a large skillet over medium heat. When hot, add 4 teaspoons of oil to pan and swirl to coat. Place eggs in carefully and cook until the white has become solid, about 1 to 2 minutes. Sprinkle the eggs with salt, pepper, and about a tablespoon of cheese for each egg. Swirl the remaining olive oil on the top of the cheese. Carefully turn eggs and cook until yolk is of desired doneness, about 1 minute. Serve immediately. ; name: garlic skillet red potatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, small red potatoes, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Stir in potatoes. Cover skillet. Cook, stirring, until potatoes are almost tender, about 12-15 minutes. Uncover, reduce heat to low. Stir in garlic, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring, until potatoes are tender, about 2 minutes. Sprinkle parsley and add salt to taste if desired. ; name: grilled moroccan chicken ; ingredients: garlic cloves, ground cumin, ground allspice, paprika, salt, turmeric, vegetable oil, chicken ; preparation:Prepare the chicken by washing it and patting it dry. Mix spice paste ingredients together in a small glass bowl. For a whole chicken, rub the paste on the outside and inside and chill in the fridge for a minimum of one hour. For pieces, place them in a large bowl and pour paste over them, mixing until all pieces are coated. Chill for one hour. Grill until done. For whole chicken, until the thermometer registers 175f in the thickest part of the thigh. ; name: linguine with sun dried tomato pesto ; ingredients: pine nuts, parmesan cheese, sun-dried tomato, garlic clove, olive oil, linguine, ground black pepper, basil leaves ; preparation:Put the pine nuts in a small non-stick frying pan and toss over a low heat for 1-2 minutes or until the nuts are lightly toasted and golden. Add the parmesan, sun-dried tomatoes and garlic, with pepper to taste. Process until finely chopped. With the machine running, gradually add the oil through the feeder tube until it has all been incorporated evenly and the ingredients have formed a smooth paste. Cook pasta according to packet directions, drain well, reserving a little of the cooking water. Serve immediately garnished with the basil leaves and parmesan shavings. ; name: cuban garlic sauce mojo cubano ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, onion, sour orange juice, oregano, salt, black pepper ; preparation:For the mojo, you will need a large bowl. In a large bowl, pour the sour orange juice or lime juice, oregano, salt, pepper, garlic and sliced onion into the bowl and stir. Heat the olive oil over medium-high for 2 minutes, then when hot, pour olive oil into bowl. Be careful not to get burned, since some of it might splatter out. Mix the mojo ingredients, then let sit for 30 minutes. ; name: lentils with onion and garlic ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, dried red chili, green lentil, water ; preparation:Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top. ; name: warm spinach and basil salad ; ingredients: spinach leaves, fresh basil, olive oil, garlic, pine nuts, prosciutto, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Combine the spinach and basil in a large salad bowl. Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic and pine nuts. Mix well. Saut until the pine nuts are brown. Add the prosciutto. Mix well. Cook just until heated through, stirring constantly. Pour over the spinach mixture, tossing to coat. Season with the salt and pepper. Sprinkle with the parmesan cheese. ; name: parsnip and herb crisps ; ingredients: parsnips, sunflower oil, salt, herbs ; preparation:

name: orange lemon parfaits low fat low sugar ; ingredients: sugar-free lemon gelatin, fresh orange juice, low-fat cream cheese, evaporated skim milk, vanilla extract ; preparation:Sprinkle gelatin over orange juice in a heavy saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium high heat, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Combine remaining ingredients in a blender. Add gelatin mixture and pure. Chill before serving in individual serving glasses. ; name: lemon cheese spritz cookies ; ingredients: butter, cream cheese, sugar, egg, lemon rind, lemon juice, flour, baking powder ; preparation:Cream butter, cheese, and sugar until fluffy. Blend in remaining ingredients. Cover and chill. Press out cookies on un-greased baking sheet. Sprinkle with colored sugars. Bake at 375 f 7-8 minutes. ; name: lemon tango frozen yogart for the less inclined ; ingredients: lemon yogurt, vanilla-flavored soymilk, heavy cream, honey, lemon zest, berries ; preparation:Blend yogart and soymilk at high speed until it comes together. Pour it into a freezer safe dish covered and freeze until hard. Scoop frozen yogart mix into the blender with heavy cream and honey and blend on high until smooth and combined. Put berries or fruit at the bottom of 2 large martini glasses. Pour frozen yogart mix on top of the berries and sprinkle with lemon zest. Top off the yogart with a few berries on top. ; name: vegetarian spinach cheese and sausage casserole ; ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, frozen spinach, mozzarella cheese, soy sausage, green onion, eggs, salt and pepper ; preparation:Thoroughly mix all ingredients. Pour mixture into a greased 9 inch pie plate. Bake at 350 for about 40 minutes or until center is set. Once out of the oven, i usually let it sit for 5 or 10 minutes. To serve, either cut into wedges, or squares, depending on what type of dish you used. ; name: cheesy lemon butter ; ingredients: eggs, lemon juice, butter, sugar, lemon peel, cream cheese, salt ; preparation:In heavy pan mix eggs, juice, butter, sugar and salt. Bring to a boil while stirring over low heat, then cook for 3 minutes more. Remove from heat and cool. Beat cream cheese and lemon peel. When egg mixture is cool, blend into the cream cheese until smooth. Store in the fridge. ; name: paula deen s coconut macaroons ; ingredients: shredded coconut, almond extract, salt, sweetened condensed milk, egg whites, cream of tartar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a medium bowl, combine coconut, almond extract, and salt. Mix in condensed milk to form a thick paste. Fold in egg whites with cream of tartar. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto greased cookie sheets, about 2 inches apart. Bake for about 8 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. ; name: vanilla fruit dip ; ingredients: light cream cheese, brown sugar, lemon juice, vanilla essence ; preparation:Beat cream cheese and sugar together until well combined and smooth. Blend in lemon juice and vanilla essence. Spoon into a serving dish. Refrigerate until needed. Serve with any fruit you choose. ; name: felicia s cheesecake ; ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, eggs, powdered milk, lemon juice, honey, vanilla, almond essence ; preparation:

name: easiest ever cookies ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, butter, eagle brand condensed milk, flour, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:Melt chocolate chips, butter and milk together in top of double boiler. Remove from heat and stir into same pan, flour, nuts and vanilla. Mix well. Drop by teaspoonful onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees for 7 minutes. Remove from cookie sheet onto wax paper to cool. These will still be a little soft and the wax paper will prevent sticking. ; name: chocochip coconut macadamia nut cookie bars ; ingredients: butter, chocolate cookie crumbs, sweetened condensed milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, flaked coconut, macadamia nuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f in a small saucepan melt butter. Stir in your crumbs, and combine thoroughly. Press mixture into a 13x9 pan. Pour the condensed milk evenly over the crumbs, and then scatter the chocolate chips evenly. Next, sprinkle the coconut and nuts evenly. Now, press down firmly over the entire mixture. Put into your preheated oven and bake for approximately 25-30 minutes until light golden brown. Cool completely in pan on top of a wire rack. ; name: green grape salad with pecans ; ingredients: cream cheese, milk, honey, ground pecans, light brown sugar ; preparation:Remove stems, wash and sort grapes. Place in a towel lined bowl to dry while you do the rest of the prep. Toast almonds. Set aside to cool. Whip together cream cheese, honey, and milk. Stir in pecan. Fold in grapes. Sprinkle top with brown sugar. Try not to eat it all. ; name: millionaires ; ingredients: caramels, milk, pecan pieces, shortening, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:In a saucepan, melt caramels in milk over low heat. Remove from heat and stir in pecans until well combined. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto buttered waxed paper. Chill until firm. Melt chocolate chips and shortening or wax in a heavy saucepan, double boiler or in microwave. Remove from heat. Dip chilled candy into chocolate, covering completely. Return to waxed paper and chill. ; name: layer bars ; ingredients: butter, graham cracker crumbs, coconut, chocolate chips, butterscotch chips, pecans, sweetened condensed milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Pour melted butter into bottom of a 9 x 13 inch pan. Sprinkle graham cracker crumbs and coconut over butter. Layer chocolate chips, butterscotch chips and nuts over crumbs and coconut. Pour condensed milk over all ingredients. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. ; name: missouri colonels ; ingredients: butter, pecans, green creme de menthe, powdered sugar, semi-sweet chocolate chips, shortening ; preparation:In large mixing bowl beat together 2 cups powdered sugar and the pecans, butter and creme de menthe. Beat or stir in remaining powdered sugar. Cover and chill 1 hour or until firm. Shape into 1 inch balls and place on foil or wax paper lined baking sheets. Chill 15 minutes. In small saucepan, melt chips and shortening over low heat, stirring constantly til melted completely. Dip one side of each ball into the chocolate. Return to baking sheet and chill til set. Cover and store in refrigerator up to 1 week or freeze up to 3 months. ; name: cheesecake pecan pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, egg, sugar, salt, vanilla, 9-inch deep dish pie crust, pecans, eggs, light corn syrup ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients. Beat at low speed until smooth. Pour into pastry shell. Sprinkle with pecans. Combine 3 eggs and remaining ingredients, mixing well. Spoon over pecan layer. Bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes or until set. ; name: cool cannoli pudding ; ingredients: ricotta cheese, semisweet mini chocolate chips, maraschino cherry, pecans, sugar, whipping cream ; preparation:

name: spiced cranberry and zinfandel sauce ; ingredients: zinfandel, sugar, orange rind, orange juice, cloves, ginger, cinnamon sticks, fresh cranberries ; preparation:Combine everything except the cranberries in a medium saucepan. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium and cook 15 minutes or until mixture begins to thicken and sugar dissolves, stirring occasionally. Strain the mixture through a sieve into a bowl, and discard the solids. Return mixture to pan. Add cranberries to pan. Cook over high heat 10 minutes or until berries pop. Reduce heat to low. Simmer 30 minutes or until mixture is slightly thick. Pour into a bowl and allow to cool. ; name: grandma s blueberry peach jam recipe ; ingredients: fresh blueberries, peach slices, liquid fruit pectin, cinnamon, sugar ; preparation:Clean and crush berries. Put in large saucepan. Cut peach slices into pieces and grind in food processor or food mill. Add to berries. Mix pectin and cinnamon into the fruit mixture and cook over high heat until mixture comes to a boil. Stirring constantly. Add sugar all at once. Bring to a full boil and boil hard for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Skim and stir to remove foam. Ladle into hot jars and seal. ; name: uncle bill s special cranberry sauce ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, frozen concentrated orange juice, cold water, granulated sugar, pineapple-orange marmalade, cinnamon sticks, nutmeg, lemon zest, orange zest ; preparation:Wash the cranberries thoroughly in cold water. If using frozen cranberries, thaw first. In a medium size saucepan, add cranberries, orange juice, water, sugar, orange-pineapple marmalade, cinnamon stick, nutmeg, lemon zest and orange zest. Bring mixture to boil. Reduce heat and simmer for about 10 minutes or until most of the cranberries pop, stirring occasionally. When cooked, discard cinnamon stick. Let cool and then store in a glass container with lid or a dish covered with plastic wrap. Keep refrigerated. Use as required. This is for adults only who accept liquor. This gives the cranberry sauce a whole new taste. This is yum, yummy good. ; name: cranberry maple butter ; ingredients: water, fresh cranberries, maple syrup, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, vanilla extract ; preparation:Combine the water and cranberries in a large saucepan or dutch oven. Bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer for 5 minutes or until cranberries pop. Place cranberry mixture in a blender or food processor, and process until smooth. Combine cranberry mixture, maple syrup, sugar, and cinnamon in pan. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Simmer, uncovered 25 minutes or until mixture is thick, stirring frequently. Stir in vanilla. Cool. Store in refrigerator up to 2 months. ; name: chilled cranberry soup ; ingredients: water, granulated sugar, cinnamon sticks, ground cloves, fresh cranberries, fresh lemon juice, orange zest, sour cream ; preparation:In a r4-quart sucepan, mix water, sugar, cinnamon sticks & cloves. Bring to boil over high heat, then add cranberries & return to a boil. Reduce heat & cook until cranberries pop, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat & stir in lemon juice & orange zest. Cool to room temperature, then chill about 4 hours in the refrigerator. When ready to serve, top each bowl of soup with a dollop of sour cream. Refrigerate any leftovers. ; name: creamy fresh cranberry and fruit salad ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, sugar, crushed pineapple, green grape, apples, miniature marshmallow, macadamia nuts, heavy cream ; preparation:Mince the cranberries in a food processor. Do this in two batches. Stir together the cranberries and sugar. Let sit and chill for about 8 hours. After about 8 hours, drain the cranberries well and stir in the well-drained crushed pineapple. Add the grapes and apples and stir. Then fold in the marshmallows and nuts. Let sit overnight in the refrigerator. A few hours before serving, whip the cream until it is becoming stiff. Fold into the fruit mixture. Chill until serving. ; name: quinoa with toasted almonds and cranberries ; ingredients: quinoa, blanched slivered almond, boiling water, salt, cinnamon, bay leaf, dried cranberries ; preparation:Over med heat stir and toast almond slivers until golden. Add the quinoa and toast until quinoa begins to darken. Transfer the quinoa and almonds to a 2 quart sauce pan. Add the remaining ingredients. Bring to boil covered. Reduce the heat and simmer for 20 minutes. Then let stand for another 5 minutes. To serve fluff gently. There is approximately 5 ounces in a portion. ; name: cranberry port sauce ; ingredients: ruby port, cinnamon stick, dried cranberries, fresh cranberries, water, sugar ; preparation:

name: the best no kidding buttermilk pancakes ; ingredients: eggs, buttermilk, baking soda, baking powder, salt, flour, sugar, unsalted butter ; preparation:Beat the yolks until pale and smooth. Beat in the buttermilk and then the baking soda and mix well. Sift in the dry ingredients mixing as you add. Make sure the batter is smooth. Add in the melted butter and mix well. Beat the egg whites in another bowl until stiff. Fold into the batter until no bits of white are visible. Let batter stand about 20 minutes before making pancakes. Make sure your griddle is really hot. Ladle batter onto griddle. Turn when bubbles form across the cakes and allow to lightly brown on the second side. Serve with warm maple syrup and sweet butter. ; name: pantry shortage pancakes for 5 ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, baking soda, sugar, salt, vegetable oil, egg, sour cream, milk ; preparation:Combine all dry ingredients in a small to medium mixing bowl. Whisk together all the wet ingredients in a separate bowl. Gently fold wet mixture into the dry ingredients, stir until the batter is slightly lumpy. Pour onto a hot greased griddle in small 3 to 4 inch circles. I find that butter flavored crisco gives them a delicious old fashioned appearance and taste. Garnish with berries and syrup. Serving size is approximately 10 or more pancakes. 2 cakes per serving. ; name: easy corn fritters ; ingredients: corn, egg, sugar, salt, butter, baking powder, flour, milk, canola oil ; preparation:Thaw frozen corn by placing it in a strainer in the sink and run cold water over it, stirring occasionally, until it is completely thawed. While corn is thawing, mix all of the remaining ingredients except oil in a large bowl. Add thawed corn to batter and mix well. Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet on medium-high. Drop spoonfuls of batter into skillet. Brown on both sides. Drain on paper towels before serving. ; name: hush puppies ; ingredients: flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, garlic powder, egg, buttermilk, onion ; preparation:Stir together to mix thoroughly flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt and garlic powder. Add egg, buttermilk and onion. Mix well. Drop batter by rounded teaspoonfuls into deep hot fat. Cook, turning frequently, about 3 - 5 minutes, until golden brown. ; name: quick chocolate chip scones ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, baking soda, egg, skim milk, lemon juice, butter, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Place wax paper on a large baking sheet. Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl. Combine other ingredients in a second bowl. Blend the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients. Add chocolate chips. Drop by large spoonfuls onto the baking sheet. Bake 15 minutes. ; name: oatmeal buttermilk muffins ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, quick-cooking oatmeal, buttermilk, flour, salt, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar. Add egg. Add oatmeal. Add buttermilk. Then add flour. Salt baking powder and baking soda. Mix well. Bake in greased muffin tin 350 for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: animal crackers ; ingredients: oatmeal, honey, salt, flour, baking soda, butter, buttermilk ; preparation:Blend oatmeal in blender. Add next 4 ingredients in bowl with oatmeal. Cut in butter and mix in buttermilk. Roll thin layer and cut in shapes. Bake at 400 10 minutes. Yum yum. ; name: cornmeal jambuster muffins ; ingredients: cornmeal, buttermilk, flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, eggs, margarine, jam ; preparation:

name: krispie candies ; ingredients: chocolate chips, butterscotch chips, chow mein noodles, salted peanuts ; preparation:Put chocolate chips and butterscotch chips in the saucepan. Put the saucepan on the burner and turn on the stove to low. Stir and stir until the mixture is melted and smooth. Remove saucepan from heat. Turn off the burner and quickly add the chow mein noodles and the peanuts. Mix and stir until they are evenly coated. Cover the cookie sheets with wax paper. Drop the candy by teaspoonfuls onto the wax paper-covered cookie sheets. Put the cookie sheets into the refrigerator to cool the candies. When they are cool, take them off the waxed paper. Put them in plastic bags. Keep them in the refrigerator. ; name: simple easy crispy rice candy kid favorite ; ingredients: crispy rice cereal, dry roasted peanuts, miniature marshmallows, crunchy peanut butter, white chocolate ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine cereal, peanuts, marshmallows and peanut butter. Stir until evenly mixed. In a microwave-safe bowl, or in a double boiler, cook chocolate until melted. Stir occasionally until chocolate is smooth. Stir chocolate into cereal mixture. Mixture will be slightly runny. Drop by tablespoons onto waxed paper. Let set until firm, 2 hours. Store in an airtight container. ; name: chocolate mousse the easy way ; ingredients: milk, chocolate chips, eggs, sugar, salt ; preparation:Pour milk in heavy saucepan and heat to boiling point. Combine remaining ingredients in blender container. Pour in the hot milk, then blend at low speed for 1 minute or until smooth. Pour into 6 custard cups, and chill for at least 2 hours before serving.
