Garnish with mint leaves, homeade chocolate leaves and fresh fruit. ; name: rice krispies treats with peanut butter chips ; ingredients: margarine, marshmallows, rice krispies, peanut butter chips ; preparation:Melt margarine or butter in large saucepan over low heat. Add marshmallows and stir until completely melted. Remove from heat. Add rice krispies cereal and stir until well coated. Add in desired amount of peanut butter chips and stir. Using buttered spatula or waxed paper, press mixture evenly into a 9x13 coated with cooking spray. Cut into squares when cooled. ; name: butterscotch oatmeal bites ; ingredients: miniature marshmallows, butterscotch chips, peanut butter, butter, cheerios toasted oat cereal, raisins, flaked coconut ; preparation:In heavy saucepan, combine marshmallows, butterscotch chips, peanut butter, and butter. Cook and stir on medium-high heat until melted. Remove from heat. Stir in cheerios, raisins, and coconut. Drop by bite size pieces onto wax paper. Let stand for 10 minutes. ; name: white chocolate party mix ; ingredients: small pretzels, cheerios toasted oat cereal, corn chex, salted peanuts, vanilla chips, vegetable oil ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine first 5 ingredients. Set aside. In a microwave-safe bowl, heat chips and oil on medium-high for 2 minutes, stirring once. Microwave on high for 10 seconds. Stir until smooth. Pour over cereal mixture and mix well. Spread onto wax paper-lined baking sheets. Cool. Break apart. Store in an airtight container. ; name: smudgy bars ; ingredients: margarine, marshmallows, vanilla extract, rice krispies, peanuts, raisins, chocolate chips ; preparation:In large saucepan over low heat, melt margarine. Add marshmallows. Stir until melted and well blended. Remove from heat. Stir in vanilla. Add cereal, peanuts and raisins, then chocolate chips, stirring until thoroughly coated. Using lightly-buttered spatula, press into buttered 3. 5 l pan. Cool. Cut into bars. ; name: ting a lings ; ingredients: whole wheat cereal, peanuts, butterscotch chips, chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: mexican cheddar skillet chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, oil, long-grain minute rice, whole tomatoes, chunky salsa, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook chicken in skillet in hot oil 4 to 5 minutes or until browned. Stir in rice, tomatoes and salsa. Reduce heat to low. Cover. Simmer 8 to 10 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Sprinkle with shredded cheese. Continue cooking about 3 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: glorious chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, margarine, water, ritz cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, mushrooms ; preparation:Roll chicken breasts first in the margarine, then in the crumb mixture. Place in a 9x13 pan sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Mix soup, mushrooms, water, and sour cream. Pour this mixture over the chicken. Sprinkle with remaining crumbs and drizzle on any leftover margarine. Bake at 350 for one hour or until done. ; name: lady and sons chicken in wine sauce ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, kosher salt, black pepper, swiss cheese, condensed cream of chicken soup, white wine, seasoned stuffing mix ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Add the chicken to a shallow buttered casserole and season with salt and pepper, to taste. Layer the cheese slices on top. In a medium bowl, add the soup and the wine, season with salt and pepper and pour over the cheese. Sprinkle stuffing mix on top and drizzle with melted butter. Bake for 45 minutes. Remove from the oven and serve. ; name: easy chicken almondine ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, ritz crackers, sliced almonds, butter, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Boil chicken on stove top until no longer pink. Dice or shred chicken and layer on bottom of 9 x 13-inch pan. In seperate bowl, mix cream of chicken soup with sour cream. Blend well. Spread soup sour cream mixture on top of chicken. Add shredded cheese, then layer with crushed ritz crackers. Pour melted butter over crackers. Sprinkle almonds on top. Bake at 350 degrees for approximately 25 minutes, until bubbly. ; name: crock pot spicy buffalo chicken sandwiches ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, buffalo wing sauce, dry ranch dressing mix, butter, sandwich buns ; preparation:Place chicken breasts in the bottom of the crock pot. Pour wing sauce and ranch mix over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 6-7 hours. Once chicken has cooked, uncover, add the butter, and shred chicken with 2 forks until mixed well. Serve on buns. ; name: creamy italian chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, italian salad dressing mix, water, cream of chicken soup, cream cheese ; preparation:Mix water and dressing. Pour over chicken in the bottom of a skillet. Cover and cook chicken until done and no longer pink. In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until no longer lumpy. Pour over chicken and heat through. Serve over rice or pasta. ; name: dukkah chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, natural yoghurt, lemon juice, ground black pepper, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, dukkah ; preparation:First, combine all of the marinade ingredients in a medium sized bowl. Marinate the chicken strips in this mixture for at least one hour. Preheat oven to 180c, and line a baking tray with waxed paper. Put all of the breadcrumb ingredients in a food processor, and give it a few quick pulses, to mix the cheese through evenly. Dip each piece of marinated chicken in the breadcrumb mixture, being sure to coat it thoroughly and evenly. Place the chicken pieces on the baking tray, and give them a quick spray of olive oil. Bake at 180c for 25 minutes, then turn them all over, and give them another 15 minutes. Serve with mediterranean fried cous cous, and herb, lemon, and garlic dressing. ; name: chicken reuben sandwiches in a crock pot ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, sauerkraut, swiss cheese, thousand island dressing, pumpernickel bread ; preparation:

name: quick easy awesome green bean soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, salt, thyme, bay leaf, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh green beans, egg, parsley, crouton ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients in a pot and bring to a boil. Reduce to a simmer. Press in garlic. Add beans. Simmer uncovered 10 minutes. Adjust seasonings. Beat egg well in a small bowl. Temper egg by ladling some hot broth into the bowl. Stir the soup while adding the egg to the simmering broth. Add pepper to taste. Top with croutons crostini if you choose. ; name: sun dried tomato risotto ; ingredients: chicken stock, olive oil, diced onion, garlic, arborio rice, parmesan cheese, salt, fresh ground black pepper, sun-dried tomato ; preparation:Heat the stock in a saucepan and keep hot over low heat. Heat the olive oil over medium heat in a separate medium-sized pot. Add the onion and cook until it turns translucent, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and cook 1 minute more. Add the rice to the onion mixture, stir and turn the heat to low. Add about 1 cup of the hot stock to the rice mixture, and stir slowly until the stock is absorbed. Continue to add the stock 1 cup at a time, stirring slowly, letting the rice absorb the stock before adding more. The risotto is cooked when it is creamy on the outside and slightly firm in the center, about 20 to 25 minutes in all. Stir in half of the parmesan cheese and half of the sun-dried tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper to taste. If the risotto is too thick, add a little more stock until it becomes creamy. Divide the risotto into serving dishes and sprinkle with the remaining cheese and sun-dried tomatoes. ; name: old fashioned split pea soup ; ingredients: oil, onion, carrots, celery, dried split peas, chicken broth, cold water, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil in a heavy 4-quart saucepan over med-high heat. Add in the onion, carrots, and celery. Cook, stirring, until the vegetables begin to soften, 2-3 minutes. Add in the split peas, broth, and water. Bring to a boil. Partially cover pan, decrease heat to med-low, and simmer until the soup is thick, about 45 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste. You can add fresh herbs. Fresh dill is recommended. Also can add meat and ham bones to make it richer. ; name: easy risotto with bacon peas ; ingredients: onion, olive oil, butter, streaky bacon, risotto rice, vegetable stock, frozen peas, salt and pepper ; preparation:Finely chop the onion. Heat the olive oil and butter in a pan, add the onions and fry until lightly browned. Add the bacon and fry for a further 5 minutes, until it starts to crisp. Add the rice and stock, and bring to the boil. Stir well, then reduce the heat and cook, covered, for 15-20 minutes until the rice is almost tender. Stir in the peas, add a little salt and pepper and cook for a further 3 minutes, until the peas are cooked. Serve sprinkled with freshly grated parmesan and freshly ground black pepper. ; name: ida s creamy kielbasa and potato soup ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, celery, beef broth, chicken broth, water, garlic cloves, kielbasa, condensed cream of chicken soup, ground black pepper ; preparation:Saute veggies and garlic in 2 t. Of olive oil for 5 minutes. Add remaining ingredients, and bring to a boil, then reduce heat, and simmer until potatoes are tender, 15-20 minutes. Season with pepper. Serve hot. ; name: easy vegetable rice medley ; ingredients: oil, onion, carrot, celery rib, red pepper, chicken broth, minute white rice, frozen peas, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a skillet. Add onion, carrot, celery, and red pepper. Cook 5 minutes or until tender. Add broth. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice and peas. Cover. Simmer 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. To save time, replace all the veggies with 3 cups frozen mixed vegetables or frozen broccoli florets and add them when you would have added the peas. ; name: mama amanda s black eyed peas ; ingredients: black-eyed peas, bacon, onion, garlic cloves, chicken broth, salt, pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:Take your bacon in a cast iron skillet and fry until crispy. You will have bits of crunchy goodness in bottom of pan. Take diced onion and cook in drippings until translucent. Add garlic and stir for just a moment or two. Pour in broth and de-glaze pan by scraping up all of the bacon yummies. Pour in peas and stir together. Season with salt and pepper to taste and add garlic powder. Cover and let cook for about 2 hours. ; name: hoppin john soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, kielbasa, black-eyed peas, navy beans, brown rice, chicken broth, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, thyme ; preparation:

name: apple pecan tart ; ingredients: unbaked pie shell, sugar, corn syrup, eggs, butter, pecans, vanilla, apples, lemon juice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place pie crust in a 9-inch tart pan and leave the sides long and free-form. Combine sugar and corn syrup. Add eggs and beat until smooth. Add pecans and vanilla, and teaspoon of melted butter and mix well. Set aside. Toss apples with lemon juice. Spread apples on bottom of pie crust and pour pecan mixture over apples. Fold edges of pie crust over filling. Bake pie until set, about 45 to 50 minutes. ; name: rhubarb pie ; ingredients: fresh rhubarb, egg, water, flour, granulated sugar, butter, unbaked pie crusts ; preparation:Mix egg, water, flour, sugar and butter together in a bowl. Add rhubarb to mixture and mix well. Pour filling into a pie crust and top with second pie crust. Cut air vents in top crust. Bake at 500 degrees for 5 minutes, then reduce heat to 400 degrees for 50 to 60 minutes, until it bubbles in the center. ; name: raisin pecan pie diabetic ; ingredients: unbaked pie shell, evaporated skim milk, sugar substitute, butter, eggs, cornstarch, salt, pecans, vanilla, raisins ; preparation:Prepare but do not bake pie shell. Combine milk, sugar replacement, butter, eggs, cornstarch and salt in heavy saucepan. Cook and stir over medium-low heat til well blended and slightly thickened. Remove from heat. Stir in pecans and vanilla, and allow filling to rest 10 minutes. Sprinkle raisins on bottom of unbaked pie shell and pour pecan mixture on top. Bake 375f 45-50 mins or til knife inserted in centre comes out clean. ; name: the camellia grill s pecan pie ; ingredients: eggs, salt, butter, light corn syrup, brown sugar, vanilla extract, unbaked 9-inch pie shell, pecans ; preparation:Beat eggs with a wire whisk or fork. Add salt, butter, syrup, sugar and vanilla. Mix well. Pour into pastry shell. Sprinkle with pecans. Bake at 350f for 45-50 minutes. ; name: aunt mable s buttermilk pie ; ingredients: sugar, flour, vanilla, margarine, eggs, buttermilk, unbaked pie shell ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix flour & sugar. Stir mixture into softened butter. Beat eggs into mixture one at a time. Stir in vanilla and buttermilk. Pour mixture into unbaked pie crust. Bake for 55 minutes. ; name: tasty applesauce pie ; ingredients: unbaked 9-inch pie crust, unsweetened applesauce, brown sugar, eggs, crisco, lemon juice, lemon, rind of, salt, nutmeg, cinnamon ; preparation:Heat oven to 450. Combine applesauce, brown sugar, eggs, crisco, lemon juice, lemon peel, salt, nutmeg and cinnamon. Mix well. Pour filling into pie shell. Bake for 15 mins. Reduce heat to 300. Continue baking for 45-55 mins or until knife inserted in the middle comes out clean. Coool thoroughly on wire rack before cutting. ; name: apricot pie ; ingredients: unbaked double pie crusts, ground almonds, fresh breadcrumbs, walnuts, fresh apricots, granulated sugar, egg yolk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. In a small bowl, combine almonds, breadcrumbs and walnuts. Sprinkle over bottom pie crust. Peel and halve fresh apricots. Spread apricot halves over nut mixture. Sprinkle sugar over apricots. Cut top crust into strips. Arrange in a lattice pattern over filling. Brush top pastry with egg yolk. Bake 30 minutes. ; name: favorite pumpkin pie ; ingredients: unbaked pastry shells, fresh pumpkin, milk, egg yolks, egg whites, salt, clove, cinnamon, sugar ; preparation:

name: chicken pasta salad with pesto ; ingredients: farfalle pasta, cooked chicken, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, bell pepper, zucchini, red onion, basil pesto ; preparation:Cook pasta per package directions. Drain, rinse with cold water, then drain again. In a large bowl, mix pasta, chicken, tomatoes, bell pepper, zucchini, and onion. Stir in pesto. Season to taste with salt and pepper. ; name: sun dried tomato and rocket pesto pasta ; ingredients: sun-dried tomato, garlic cloves, pine nuts, rocket, basil leaves, parmesan cheese, olive oil, cooked pasta ; preparation:Place the tomatoes, garlic, half of the pinenuts, rocket and basil in a food processor and process until smooth. Toast the remaining pinenuts until golden. Set aside. Slowly add the oil to the basil mixture while the processor is running. Turn the processor off and then stir through the parmesan. Stir pesto through the pasta then sprinkle with the reserved pinenuts. Serve immediately with salad and crusty bread. ; name: penne with zucchini and ricotta cheese ; ingredients: zucchini, olive oil, garlic, penne, fresh basil, ricotta cheese, salt and pepper, fresh parmesan cheese ; preparation:Boil the water, and add salt. Boil the zucchini for about 2 min, let it cool off. Cut it in pices of 1 cm. Heat the oil in a pan. Frie the garlic until soft, add the zucchini and let it fry on lowheat. Boil the pasta. When the pasta is ready drain it from water and add the zucchini, and basil. Mix it with the ricotta cheese. Serve with parmesan. ; name: tomatoes and macaroni ; ingredients: macaroni noodles, onion, butter, diced tomatoes, garlic, salt and pepper, parsley, basil ; preparation:Begin boiling the macaroni noodles. In another saucepan, add onion and butter or margarine. Cook on medium high heat until the onions are soft. Add the tomatoes, garlic, salt, pepper, parsley, and basil to the onions. Reduce heat to medium. Cook the macaroni noodles until they are 2 or 3 minutes away from being done. Drain the water from the noodles. Add the noodles to the sauce and continue cooking on medium heat until the noodles are done. Enjoy. ; name: warm spinach and basil salad ; ingredients: spinach leaves, fresh basil, olive oil, garlic, pine nuts, prosciutto, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Combine the spinach and basil in a large salad bowl. Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic and pine nuts. Mix well. Saut until the pine nuts are brown. Add the prosciutto. Mix well. Cook just until heated through, stirring constantly. Pour over the spinach mixture, tossing to coat. Season with the salt and pepper. Sprinkle with the parmesan cheese. ; name: spaghetti with summer tomatoes ; ingredients: cherry tomatoes, yellow cherry tomato, shallots, olive oil, red pepper flakes, salt, pepper, spaghetti, fresh basil ; preparation:In a large skillet combine cherry tomatoes, yellow cherry tomatoes, shallots, olive oil, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper. Bring to a simmer over medium heat. Simmer for 5 minutes or until tomatoes are tender. Remove from heat. Bring a pot of water to a boil over high heat. Add spaghetti and cook according to package directions. Just before pasta is done reheat sauce. Slice basil leaves and add to the sauce. Drain pasta and return to pot. Add sauce to pasta and toss. Serve. ; name: spaghetti with zucchini and garlic ; ingredients: zucchini, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, salt & freshly ground black pepper, spaghetti, parmigiano, salt and pepper ; preparation:Pile up 2 or 3 layers of paper towels on a work surface. Working on the paper towels, shred zucchinis using a grater holding the zucchini at an angle. Heat a large skillet over moderate heat. Add extra-virgin olive oil to the pan add chopped garlic to the oil. When garlic starts sizzling in oil, add shredded zucchini. Season zucchini with salt and pepper. Saute shredded zucchini 7 to 10 minutes. Add hot, drained pasta to the pan. Toss spaghetti with zucchini and garlic oil. Add a couple of handfuls of grated cheese to the pan. Adjust seasoning and serve. ; name: herb zucchini and lemon pasta ; ingredients: rotini pasta, light butter, red onion, zucchini, parmesan cheese, tomatoes, lemon juice, dried basil leaves, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: ham and peas casserole ; ingredients: milk, breadcrumbs, cheese, butter, onion, parsley, eggs, ham, peas ; preparation:Put peas and ham in a buttered casserole. In a saucepan, heat milk, add crumbs. Add cheese, butter, onion and parsley. Add beaten eggs. Pour sauce over peas and ham. Bake for 45 minutes at 325 degrees. ; name: crab stuffed bell peppers ; ingredients: breadcrumbs, crabmeat, celery, green onion, bell peppers, garlic clove, cayenne pepper, salt and pepper, margarine, cheese ; preparation:Saut vegetables, excluding bell peppers, in margarine. Mix with crab meat and breadcrumbs. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Stuff bell peppers and cover tops with cheese. Bake 350f for 30 minutes. ; name: baked stuffed lobster for two ; ingredients: lobsters, soft breadcrumbs, butter, salt, pepper, tarragon, vegetable oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f degrees. When lobster is cool enough to handle, split in half lengthwise. Remove dark strip if present. Remove the coral and liver to a medium bowl. To coral, add bread crumbs and butter, salt, pepper and taragon. Put mixture in cavaties of lobster, drizzle with vegetable oil. Bake for 25 minutes or until browned. ; name: chicken burgers ; ingredients: cooked chicken, breadcrumbs, onion, eggs, salt and pepper, oil ; preparation:Combine first 4 ingredients in a medium bowl and mix well. Season with salt and pepper. Refrigerate until ready to use and then form into 6 patties. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add patties to pan and fry until brown, turning once. Serve on hamburger buns with lettuce, mayo and tomatoes or as desired. ; name: new england scalloped oysters and scallops ; ingredients: butter, breadcrumbs, oyster, celery seed, salt and pepper, cream, scallops ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Mix the melted butter and bread crumbs together and put one third of them in a thin layer in the bottom of a buttered baking dish. Cover with half of the oysters and seasonings. Add some of the cream. Layer half of the scallops next, seasonings, and another third of buttered crumbs. Add the remaining oysters and cream. Top with the final half of scallops and top with remaining buttered crumbs. Bake for 30 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: baked okra etouffe ; ingredients: okra, olive oil, tomatoes, onion, green pepper, salt, pepper, cayenne, cracker crumbs ; preparation:Spread okra in a greased casserole. Sprinkle a little of the olive oil on and mix with okra. Cover okra with tomatoes, onion, green pepper and seasonings. Cover loosely with foil. Bake at 400f for 1 hour, or until tender, stirring occasionally. Uncover. Top with crumbs and brown lightly. ; name: super budget macaroni cheese ; ingredients: macaroni, milk, flour, salt, ground black pepper, cheese, fresh breadcrumb ; preparation:Cook pasta. Drain. Set aside. Warm milk in saucepan. When it is just warm to the touch, whisk in half the flour. Let the milk begin to simmer, whisking all the time. You be the judge of the thickness - we like it really thick. If you want it thicker, add the remaining flour and continue to whisk until smooth and thick. Stir through the cheese and the salt and pepper until the cheese is melted. Take off the heat. Pour into a baking dish and sprinkle the breadcrumbs over the top. Bake for 30 minutes at 180 degrees celcius. ; name: mum s monday macaroni ; ingredients: butter, onion, elbow macaroni, tomatoes, water, salt, pepper, breadcrumbs ; preparation:

name: my mom s corn pudding ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, creamed corn, sugar, milk, salt, butter, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Mix flour and corn. Then add sugar, milk, salt and butter. Add eggs and mix well. Pour corn mixture into a greased 1 quart casserole dish. Place casserole into a larger pan and fill the larger pan half way up with hot water. Bake for 1 hour in the 325f oven. ; name: shoo fly cake ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, margarine, sugar, salt, molasses, water, hot water, baking soda ; preparation:Mix all dry ingredients with margarine. Take 1 cup of mixture and reserve for topping and set aside. Dissolve baking soda in hot water. Add molasses, water and dissolved baking soda. Mix well. Pour into a greased 9x13 pan. Sprinkle with reserved topping mixture. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until knife inserted comes out clean. ; name: flaky butter crust ; ingredients: salt, cold water, unsalted butter, all-purpose flour ; preparation:Dissolve the salt in the water and refrigerate. Place the butter cubes and flour in the food processor bowl. Chill the bowl, ingredients and blade in the freezer until well chilled, at least 30 minutes. Cut the butter into the flour using the pulse until the mixture resembles flakes of oatmeal. With the machine running, slowly pour in the cold salted water, mix just until the dough forms a ball. Divide the dough into three equal portions and shape each into a disk about 6 inches in diameter. Refrigerate disks for at least 30 minutes. Roll out each disk into 11 inch circles, place in a 9 inch pie pan and return the pan to the refrigerator until ready to bake or fill. Make sure the crusts are cold when they go into the preheated oven at 375f bake until the edges are lightly browned, about 20 minutes. Remove the rice or beans and the parchment, prick each crust several times with a fork, and return the crust to the oven to bake an additional 5 - 10 minutes. Remove and cool before filling. ; name: syrian manoushi bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, dried yeast, salt, sugar, warm water, olive oil ; preparation:Sift the flour into a large mixing bowl and add the yeast and salt. Dissolve the sugar in the warm water and dribble it into the dry ingredients until they absorb enough to make a sticky dough, how much water is required will entirely depend upon your flour. Mix in the olive oil and use your hands or the dough hook on your electric mixer to knead the dough until it is smooth and silky. It will take about 10 minutes. Lightly oil the ball of dough and put it into a bowl. Cover and leave in a warm place to rise for 2 hours, by which time it should have at least doubled in size. Knock the air out of the dough, then. Cut the dough into12 portions, then lightly flour each one and put them on a tray, covered, for another 10 minutes. When ready to cook, roll each portion out to a 15 cm circle and cover with the topping of your choice. Bake in a hot oven until done to your liking. ; name: whole wheat beer bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt, brown sugar, beer, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix down with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Pour melted butter over top of dough. Bake in preheated oven for 50-60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean. ; name: wheat beer bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt, brown sugar, beer ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix dough with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 50 to 60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean. ; name: maw s corn fritters ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, cayenne, eggs, butter, creamed corn ; preparation:Blend flour, baking powder, salt, and cayenne. Blend slightly beaten eggs and butter. Add egg mixture to the dry ingredients and beat with fork until smooth. Stir in corn. Drop by spoonfuls into preheated deep fat at 375f. Fry 4 to 5 minutes. ; name: no egg no dairy pierogie dough ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, oil, water ; preparation:

name: super easy scrambled eggs ; ingredients: eggs, reduced-fat mayonnaise, salt, unsalted butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a small mixing bowl, thoroughly whisk together eggs, reduced-fat mayonnaise, and salt. Heat a skillet over low-medium heat. Melt butter. Then add egg mixture. As eggs cook, slowly but constantly move them around skillet. Cook only until eggs are set, yet still soft and moist--avoid overcooking. Transfer scrambled eggs to a plate and season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve hot. ; name: crisp fried beef cutlets ; ingredients: eggs, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, salt, pepper, boneless beef chuck, olive oil, unsalted butter ; preparation:Combine bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper. Dip each cutlet in beaten eggs, and then dip in crumb mixture. Make sure they are evenly coated. Heat oil over medium heat. Add butter and, when melted, increase heat to medium-high. When oil-butter mixture is almost smoking, place cutlets in skillet, and fry until crisp and golden, about 2 to 3 minutes per side. Drain them on paper towels and fry remaining cutlets in same manner. You can keep them warm in the oven as you cook the rest. ; name: easy low fat black bean soup ; ingredients: black beans, yellow onion, low-fat cream cheese, chicken broth, salt and pepper, low-fat sour cream, chives ; preparation:Using a food processor pulse the onion until minced. Drain and rinse the black beans. Add to the food processor with the cream cheese. Pulse until pureed. Dilute wtih chicken broth to your desired thickness. Transfer to a medium sauce pan and heat over low heat until thoroughly heated. Garnish with sour cream and chives. ; name: bleu cheese omelet ; ingredients: butter, eggs, water, black pepper, green apple, blue cheese, fresh chives ; preparation:To make filling, melt butter in a small skillet and cook apple over a low heat for 2-3 minutes or until just heated through. Remove pan from heat. Set aside and keep warm. To make omelet, melt butter in a small skillet. Place eggs, water and black pepper to taste in a small bowl and whisk to combine. Pour egg mixture into pan and cook over medium heat, continually drawing in the edge of the omelet with a fork during cooking, until no liquid remains, and the omelet is lightly set. Top half of the omelet with apple slices, cheese, and chives and fold in half. Slip onto a plate and serve immediately. ; name: quick easy frittata ; ingredients: butter, new potato, broccoli, eggs, water, parmesan cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in non-stick pan. Saut veggies over medium high heat until warmed through, about 3-4 minutes. While veggies are in pan, scramble eggs and water. Add cheese and scramble until foamy. Turn heat down to medium. Pour eggs over veggies in pan. Let eggs cook in pan until set-about 7-8 minutes. Run spatula around edge of pan, slide frittata onto serving plate. Season to taste with salt& pepper. ; name: onion in custard ; ingredients: onion, butter, eggs, cream, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Saute onions in butter until transparent, 6-8 minutes. Place in a baking dish. Beat eggs until they are light, mix in cream and seasonings. Pour mixture over onions. Sprinkle on parmesan cheese. Bake at 425, uncovered, for 15 minutes. ; name: baked cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: bread, butter, mustard, velveeta cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Butter both sides of bread. Lay 8 slices in a 9x13 inch pan. Spread mustard on top. Cover each slice with velveeta cheese. Cover with remaining bread slices. In seperate bowl mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Mix well. Pour over bread and place in refrigerator overnight, or for at least 6 hours. Bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. Cut into serving size pieces and serve hot. ; name: cream cheese scrambled eggs 309cals per serve ; ingredients: eggs, low-fat cream cheese, chives, milk, salt and pepper, vegetable oil ; preparation:

name: yummmmy crustless apple pie ; ingredients: apples, sugar, flour, eggs, vanilla sugar ; preparation:Pre-heat oven 350 degrees. Cut up the apples into small chunks and place them on the bottom of a lightly greased pie pan. Combine the sugar, flour, eggs and half of the vanilla into a bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture over the apples and sprinkle with remaining vanilla. Put into preheated oven for 20-30 minutes. ; name: banana apple brown betty ; ingredients: sugar, salt, cinnamon, apples, bananas, bread cubes, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix sugar, salt and cinnamon together. Combine with sliced apples and bananas. In a skillet, brown bread cubes in the butter. Fill buttered baking dish with alternate layers of bread cubes and fruit using bread cubes as top and bottom layers. Cover dish and bake 30 minutes. Remove cover and bake 15 minutes longer or until apples are tender. ; name: cinnamon applesauce easy microwave recipe ; ingredients: granny smith apples, sugar, fresh lemon juice, ground cinnamon, coarse salt ; preparation:In a 2 quart microwave- safe dish with a lid, combine apples, sugar, lemon juice, cinnamon, and a pinch of salt. Cover, and microwave on high until very tender, 10- 15 minutes, stirring halfway through. Mash apples with the back of a spoon. Serve warm. Or cover, refrigerate at least 1 hour, and serve chilled. Store, covered, in the refrigerator for up to 1 week. ; name: toffeed apples ; ingredients: apples, butter, caster sugar, maple syrup, cinnamon ; preparation:Thinly slice the apples crossways. Melt 30g butter in a pan. Cook the apple slices until they have browned on both sides. Add two tablespoons caster sugar, cook for 5 minutes. Add the maple syrup, stir until the apples and syrup have heated through. Serve the toffeed apples with cream or icecream or greek yoghurt. ; name: grandma solberg s apple brown betty ; ingredients: apples, brown sugar, flour, oats, cinnamon, nutmeg, butter, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Mix all ingredients except the apples and water together until the butter is broken up into small pea shapes. Alternate layers of apples and crumb mixture in an 8x8 greased baking pan, finishing with crumb mixture on top. Pour the water over the top. Bake for 30 - 35 minutes. ; name: fruit crisp ; ingredients: apples, granulated sugar, rolled oats, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, ground nutmeg, butter, coconut, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. If fruit is frozen, thaw but do not drain. Place fruit in a 2-quart square baking dish. Stir in the granulated sugar. For topping, in a medium bowl combine the oats, brown sugar, flour, and nutmeg. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in the nuts. Sprinkle topping over filling. Bake for 30 to 35 minutes or until fruit is tender and topping is golden. Cool slightly. Serve warm with ice cream if desired. ; name: cranberry apple sweet potato packet ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, granny smith apples, dried cranberries, brown sugar, butter, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 or a grill to medium high. Center sweet potatoes, apple slices and cranberries on 18x24-inch sheet of heavy-duty aluminum foil. Sprinkle with brown sugar. Combine melted butter or margarine and cinnamon and drizzle over brown sugar. Bring up sides of foil. Double-fold the top and ends of foil to make a large foil package, leaving room for heat to circulate inside. Bake 25 to 30 minutes on cookie sheet in oven or place on covered grill 20 to 25 minutes until potatoes are tender. ; name: creamy baked apples ; ingredients: granny smith apples, butter, cinnamon sugar, flour, sugar, milk, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:

name: no sugar freezer jam ; ingredients: lemon juice, water, fresh strawberries, sugar substitute, unflavored gelatin, cornstarch ; preparation:Combine lemon juice, water, gelatin and cornstarch in a saucepan. Heat slowly, stirring constantly, until gelatin and cornstarch dissolves. Add fruit to gelatin mixture. Heat to boiling point over low heat, stirring constantly. Boil berries 3 minutes. Remove from heat and add sugar substitute. Pour into heat proof jars and cover. Let set at room temperature until cooled. Store in refrigerator or freeze. ; name: low fat cherry loaf ; ingredients: milk, lemon juice, flour, brown sugar, baking soda, salt, non-fat vanilla yogurt, egg, vanilla, fresh cherries ; preparation:Mix together the milk and lemon juice. Set aside for 10 minutes. Mix together the dry ingredients. Lightly beat the egg, then add it, the yogurt, the milk mixture, and the vanilla to the dry ingredients. Fold in the cherries. Pour batter into greased 9 x 5-inch loaf pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 to 60 minutes. ; name: a sauce for a dull food ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt and pepper, sugar, hard-boiled eggs, milk, lemon juice ; preparation:Melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Add the flour and stir 1-2 minutes to make a roux. Add the salt, pepper, sugar and chopped egg, mixing well. Gradually add the milk and stir until mixture thickens, about 5 minutes. Stir in lemon juice and serve. This sauce can be used to give an attractive flavour and appearance to foods such as fish, old vegetables, and so on. ; name: two part lemonade ; ingredients: water, sugar, lemons, lemon juice, salt, ice water ; preparation:For the syrup, bring the water and the sugar to a boil in a medium-sized saucepan. Cook for 5 minutes, until sugar is dissolved. Add the lemon zest. Allow mixture to cool to lukewarm. Pour into a glass jar and store in the refrigerator. For the lemonade, combine the lemon juice, salt, syrup, and ice water in tall pitcher. Stir well and pour into tall, ice filled glasses. ; name: grape juice sherbet healthy easy ; ingredients: grape juice, lemon juice, salt, sugar, water, egg whites ; preparation:Pour the juices& salt into refridgerator tray, freezing until solid. Boil the sugar and water for about 3 minutes. Slowly, pour into the stiffly beaten egg whites. Beat constantly. Cool to lukewarm. Scrape thin layers of the frozen juice mixture, with inverted spoon. Put into the egg mixture, combining. Place back in the tray to freeze. After frozen, serve. ; name: old fashioned rice pudding ; ingredients: milk, salt, sugar, butter, vanilla, eggs, brandy, cooked long-grain rice, fresh lemon juice, cinnamon ; preparation:Mix all ingredients except the rice and lemon juice and cinnamon. Mix them well and then add the rice and lemon juice. Sprinkle a bit of cinnamon on top. Place in a 8 x 10-inch baking dish and bake at 325 degrees for 50 minutes, or until it is lightly brown and the custard is set. Test with a table knife. Stick it in the center of the dish, and if it comes out clean the dish is baked. This can be served with maple syrup as was done in earlier times or milk will be enjoyed also. ; name: strawberry cheese cake ice cream ; ingredients: cream cheese, milk, fresh lemon juice, sugar, salt, heavy cream, eggs, vanilla, strawberry ; preparation:Bring milk just to a boil in a heavy saucepan. Whisk together eggs, sugar, and salt in a bowl, then add hot milk in a slow stream, whisking. Pour custard back into saucepan and cook over moderately low heat, stirring with a wooden spoon, approx 2 to 3 minutes, the custard will coat the back of the spoon. Immediately pour custard through a fine-mesh sieve into a clean bowl. On very low speed, blend in cream cheese until thoroughly incorporated. Stir in cream and vanilla. Place plastic wrap directly onto surface of custard mixture and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or over night. Freeze completely cooled custard in ice cream maker. When custard is nearly done, add sliced strawberries. Complete freezing process and transfer to an airtight container. Place in the freezer to cure for about two hours. Allow to stand at room temperature 5-10 minutes before serving. ; name: vegan lemon curd ; ingredients: lemon juice, water, granulated sugar, cornstarch, salt, soymilk, margarine ; preparation:

name: fast fix gazpacho ; ingredients: cucumber, sweet red pepper, sweet onion, garlic clove, spicy hot v8, lime juice, tabasco sauce, salt, cilantro ; preparation:Coarsely chop cucumber, pepper & onion. Add half of the veggies to a food processor along with the garlic, 1 cup v8 juice, lime juice, hot sauce & salt. Puree till smooth. Pour into a bowl & add remaining 3 cups v8. Chill. Serve cold with remaining chopped veggies and cilantro as garnish. ; name: roast salmon with lime salsa ; ingredients: limes, red onion, cilantro, jalapeno, canola oil, sugar, sea salt, salmon fillets, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 425. Using a sharp knife, carefully peel the limes. Be sure to remove all of the bitter white pith. Working over a bowl, cut in between the membranes to release the lime sections into the bowl. Cut each section crosswise into quarters. Return the limes to the bowl and stir in the onion, cilantro and jalapeo. Add 1 tablespoon of the oil, the sugar and a pinch of salt and toss well. Heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of oil in an ovenproof skillet until shimmering. Season the fillets on both sides with salt and pepper and add to the skillet, skinned side up. Cook over moderately high heat until golden brown on the bottom, about 2 minutes. Transfer the skillet to the oven and roast the salmon for 5 minutes, or until just cooked through. Transfer to 4 dinner plates, spoon the salsa on top and serve. ; name: cucumber and avocado salad ; ingredients: english seedless cucumber, sweet red pepper, salt, lettuce, chili pepper, avocado, fresh lime juice, fresh parsley, onion ; preparation:Peel and slice the cucumber paper-thin. Season with salt, chili pepper and lime juice. Sprinkle with onion and red pepper slices. Arrange lettuce on 6 serving plates. Pile cucumber mixture in center of each plate. Add avocado slices and parsley. 6 servings. ; name: mixed greens with honey lime dressing ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh lime juice, honey, lime zest, salt and pepper, red onion, mixed greens, plum tomatoes ; preparation:Whisk first 4 ingredients in a small bowl to blend, season dressing with salt and pepper. Transfer 2 tablespoons dressing to another smaller bowl. Mix in onions. Let onion and remaiming dressing stand at least 1 hour and up to 3 hours. Toss onion mixture occasionally. Mix lettuces, tomatoes, and onion mixture in bowl. Toss with dressing, serve. ; name: christmas coleslaw ; ingredients: green cabbage, red cabbage, dried sweetened cranberries, green onion, canola oil, frozen orange juice concentrate, salt, ground black pepper, cilantro ; preparation:Combine cabbages, cranberries and onions in a large bowl. Whisk together oil, juice, salt and pepper. Stir in cilantro. Pour over cabbage mixture and toss. Refrigerate 24 hours before serving. ; name: tropical grilled tuna ; ingredients: fresh pineapple, onion, jalapeno peppers, fresh cilantro, lime juice, tuna steaks, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Grill pineapple slices, uncovered, over medium heat for 5-7 minutes on each side. Chill for 30 minutes. Dice the pineapple. Place in a bowl. Stir in the onion, jalapenos, cilantro and lime juice. Refrigerate for 1 hour or until chilled. Brush tuna steaks with oil. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Grill, covered, over medium heat for 5 minutes. ; name: grilled skewered sea scallops ; ingredients: fresh lime juice, olive oil, garlic clove, ground cumin, chili powder, salt, cayenne pepper, sea scallops, cherry tomatoes, lime ; preparation:Whisk lime juice, oil, garlic, cumin, chili powder, salt, and cayenne together in small bowl. Thread scallops and tomatoes alternately on 4 skewers. Place on platter and drizzle with marinade. Cover and refrigerate, basting once with marinade, about 30 minutes. Prepare charcoal for grilling or heat broiler. Grill or broil skewers, basting with marinade but not turning, just until scallops are cooked through, 5-7 minutes. Place lime wedge on each skewer and serve. ; name: seared sea scallops with tropical salsa ; ingredients: pineapple, mango, cucumber, red bell pepper, cilantro, fresh lime juice, jalapeno, salt, pepper, sea scallops ; preparation:

name: hootenanny pancakes ; ingredients: butter, eggs, milk, salt, flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degree f. Put entire stick butter into a 9 x 13 inch pan. Put pan with butter into the oven until butter is melted. Beat the eggs, milk, and salt until frothy. Add flour. Beat until mixed. Pour over melted butter. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes. Serve with syrup or jelly. ; name: to die for chocolate mud cake ; ingredients: unsalted butter, dark chocolate, sugar, hot water, plain flour, self-raising flour, cocoa, eggs, cream ; preparation:Melt butter & chocolate with sugar and cocoa in large pan. Heat gently till well combined. Stir in hot water. Cool. Sift flours together and stir in beaten eggs. Bake in a lined cake tin in oven at 170 degrees celcius for 1 hour. Stand 5 - 10 minutes before turning out from cake tin. Melt dark chocolate over gentle heat, stir in cream and mix well to make icing. Ice mudcake when cool. ; name: mini chip shortbread ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, flour, miniature chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a large mixing bowl, beat butter and sugar together until creamy. Beat in egg and vanilla. Add flour gradually and beat well. Stir in 1 cup morsels. Press on bottom of ungreased 9x13 baking pan. Bake for 30-33 minutes or until the top is lightly browned. Immediately sprinkle with the remaining chocolate chips and let sit for 5 minutes or so until the chips become shiny. Then spread evenly over top. Cool completely in the pan and then cut into squares. ; name: one bowl coconut chocolate cake ; ingredients: cocoa, butter, eggs, baking powder, all-purpose flour, desiccated coconut, sugar, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees celsius lightly grease a round 20cm cake tin. Melt the butter in the microwave or over low heat. Set aside. Sift the cocoa into a large mixing bowl. Add the rest of the ingredients, including the butter. Mix thoroughly. Pour into cake pan. Bake for 50 minute. ; name: can t be beat brownies ; ingredients: flour, sugar, cocoa, salt, shortening, eggs, vanilla, nuts ; preparation:Mix the flour, sugar, salt and cocoa in a bowl until they are blended well. Cut the shortening into the dry ingredients as you would into a pie crust dough. Add the eggs and vanilla and mix until dough is moist. The batter will be stiff. Pour into a greased pan and bake at 350 until a toothpick comes out clean. I use an 8 x 8 pan because i like thick brownies. I bake them between 25- 30 minutes. A 9 x 13 pan would bake between 20- 25 minutes. ; name: no cook eskimo cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, water, vanilla, cocoa, oats ; preparation:Beat butter until creamy. Add sugar, mix well. Now mix in vanilla, water, and cocoa. Mix in oats. Roll in to 1 inch balls and sprinkle with powdered sugar. Eat and keep refrigerated. ; name: melting chocolate cake from carnival cruise lines ; ingredients: semisweet chocolate, butter, eggs, sugar, flour ; preparation:Melt chocolate and butter together. Mix half of eggs and sugar and whisk for a few minutes. Add flour. Then add rest of the eggs. Add egg mix to the melted chocolate mix. Pour mixture in individual ramekin cups. Bake in oven at 390 degrees for 15-20 minutes. To serve, sprinkle top with powdered sugar and serve with a scoop of vanilla ice cream on the side. ; name: dawn s special brownies ; ingredients: butter, cocoa, eggs, sugar, flour ; preparation:

name: sliced steak with lemon and thyme ; ingredients: rump steak, thyme, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, juice of, salt, fresh pepper ; preparation:Cut away the fat from around the edge of the steak while you heat a griddle or heavybased pan. Brush the steak with oil to prevent it sticking to the griddle or pan, and cook for 3 minutes a side plus 1 minute each side turned again for desirably rare meat. The lemon in the post-hoc marinade cooks it a little more. While the steak is cooking, place the thyme leaves, garlic, oil, lemon zest and juice, and salt and pepper in a wide, shallow dish. Once the steak is cooked, place it in the dish of marinade for 4 minutes a side, before removing it to a board and slicing thinly on the diagonal. ; name: amazing rib eye steaks with marsala sauce ; ingredients: rib eye steaks, salt and pepper, olive oil, butter, garlic cloves, sliced mushrooms, flour, marsala wine, beef broth, dried rosemary ; preparation:Heat olive oil in skillet over high heat. Salt and pepper steaks to taste. Place steaks in hot skillet and immediately turn down heat to medium high. Cook steaks for 4 minutes on each side or to your taste. Remove steaks to a platter and cover with foil to keep warm. Remove skillet from heat and add butter and garlic. Return to heat and add mushrooms and saute until done. Add flour and cook for about a minute, decrease heat to medium low, then add wine and broth. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly until thick. Remove pan from heat and add rosemary. ; name: pork chops merlot ; ingredients: olive oil, butter, pork chops, red wine vinegar, dried rosemary, pepper, merlot ; preparation:In skillet, heat oil and butter. Add pork chops browning well on both sides. Add vinegar, rosemary, and pepper. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer 10 to 15 minutes. Remove pork. Keep warm. Add wine to pan. Heat until sauce is syrupy, about 5 minutes. Spoon sauce over pork chops when serving. ; name: sage and rosemary pork chops ; ingredients: pork loin chops, olive oil, dried sage, black and red pepper blend, dried rosemary leaves, salt ; preparation:Heat contact grill for 5 minutes. Wash chops and pat dry. In a small container, thoroughly mix the seasonings together. Drizzle half the oil over the chops, sprinkle with half the seasoning mix. Turn chops over and repeat with oil and remaining seasoning mix. Place on heated grill and cook until meat thermometer inserted in center reads 160 degrees. Serve immediately. ; name: pork tenderloin napoli ; ingredients: olive oil, pork tenderloin, roma tomatoes, green olives, dry white wine, fresh rosemary, garlic, salt, black pepper, heavy cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Heat the oil in an ovenproof skillet over medium high heat. Season the meat with salt and pepper and brown the pork on all sides in the skillet. Mix together the tomatoes, olives, wine, rosemary and garlic in a bowl and pour over the pork. Place skillet in the oven and bake for 30 minutes or until it reaches an internal temperature of 160. Remove pork from skillet and cover with foil to keep warm. Place skillet with remaining tomato mixture over medium heat and gradually mix in the cream. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly, then reduce heat to low and continue cooking for 5 minutes until thickened. Slice pork and drizzle with the cream sauce to serve. ; name: rosemary seasoned steak ; ingredients: beef tenderloin steaks, salt, pepper, garlic powder, dried rosemary ; preparation:Mix seasonings together in small dish. Trim fat from steak and rub seasoning mixture on both sides. Place the steak on rack of broiler pan. Position pan so that steak is about 3 inches from heat. Broil 10-12 minutes for a steak, turning once during cooking or grill as desired. Serve with baked potatoes, sour cream and chives, and steamed broccoli. ; name: pork tenderloin with roasted sweet potatoes and pears ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, sweet potatoes, bosc pears, spanish onion, extra virgin olive oil, fresh rosemary, garlic salt, dried sage, coarse black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Parboil potatoes to soften slightly. Spray baking dish with cook spray. Season the pork tenderloin on all sides with garlic salt and pepper. Add the pork tenderloins and surround with sweet potatoes and pears. Drizzle oil over vegetables. Sprinkle rosemary and sage over pork tenderloin. Cook in oven for 25-35 minutes. Let rest out of oven for 10 minutes before slicing. ; name: bbq pork steak ; ingredients: pork steaks, olive oil, salt, hot paprika, sage, garlic ; preparation:

name: buttered noodles with fresh sage ; ingredients: egg noodles, butter, onion, fresh sage leaves, salt, black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook noodles according to package directions. Drain. Melt butter in the empty pot. Simmer onion and sage leaves 5 minutes. Add salt and pepper. Toss with noodles. Top with parmesan cheese just before serving. ; name: yerushalmi kugel ; ingredients: thin egg noodles, eggs, salt, ground black pepper, sugar, oil ; preparation:Cook egg noodles according to package directions. Strain and set aside to cool. In a small 1 quart saucepan, dissolve the sugar and oil over low heat. Cook until sugar turns medium brown, stirring occasionally. Immediately pour carmelized sugar over cooled noodles, and stir with woden spoon to separate lumps. Let cool to room temperature so as not to cook eggs. Mix eggs with salt and pepper and add to nodle miter. Mix well. Pour into 9x13 pan. Bake in oven set to 350 degres for 1 hour. ; name: buttered noodles with eggs and parmesan cheese ; ingredients: noodles, eggs, parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, black pepper, butter ; preparation:Cook noodles in a large pot of lightly salted water until al dente. While the pasta is cooking, place the eggs, grated cheese, parsley, salt and pepper into a mixing bowl and beat with a whisk until well combined. When the noodles are almost cooked, melt the butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Quickly drain the pasta and add it to the skillet. Toss briefly to coat it with the butter. Add the egg mixture to the skillet and using a flat wooden spoon, mix quickly together for less than a minute until the eggs and noodles become creamy and thick. Do not cook the eggs too long or they will scramble and ruin the dish. Serve immediately. ; name: easy pork skillet ; ingredients: vegetable oil, pork tenderloin, pork-flavored ramen noodles, water, red bell pepper, broccoli floret, green onions, fresh parsley, soy sauce ; preparation:Preheat a 12 inch skillet or wok over medium high heat. Add oil and rotate skillet or wok to coat sides. Add pork and cook approximately 5 minutes or until no longer pink. Break apart ramen noodles adding to cooked pork along with seasoning packets and remaining ingredients. Heat until mixture comes to a boil and boil for 3 to 4 minutes stirring occasionally, or until noodles or completely softened. Serve immediately. ; name: spring onion and feta noodle cakes ; ingredients: fine egg noodles, egg, plain flour, milk, spring onion, feta, oil ; preparation:Break up noodles into shorter lengths and boil in lightly salted water for 3 minutes remove, drain and rinse in cold water. Mix egg, flour and milk to make a batter add the onions, feta and noodles and mix together. Heat some oil in a pan. Fry each cahe for about 2 mins each side giving them a press down after the first turning. Eat hot or cold. ; name: old time tuna bake ; ingredients: wide egg noodles, frozen sweet peas, condensed cream of celery soup, evaporated milk, dried onion flakes, seasoning salt, tuna in water, french-fried onions ; preparation:Cook noodles as directed on package, adding peas during last minute of cooking time. Drain. Meanwhile, heat oven to 350f in ungreased 2-quart casserole, mix soup, milk, dried onion and seasoned salt. Stir cooked noodles and tuna into soup mixture. Cover. Bake 30 minutes. Uncover. Stir mixture well. Sprinkle with french-fried onions. Bake uncovered about 5 minutes longer or until onions are golden brown. ; name: oriental ramen broccoli coleslaw ; ingredients: beef-flavor ramen noodles, broccoli coleslaw mix, slivered almonds, sunflower seeds, green onion, sugar, oil, white vinegar ; preparation:Before opening noodles, crush into 1 inch pieces. Open packages and set aside flavor packets. Place noodles in bottom of large serving bowl. Top noodles with broccoli slaw, then sprinkle with almonds and sunflower kernels, and green onions. In a separate bowl combine sugar, oil, vinegar, and flavor packets from noodles. Pour over slaw, cover and chill up to 24 hours. Toss before serving. ; name: ramen noodle egg drop soup ; ingredients: water, eggs, onion, celery, green bell pepper, chicken-flavored ramen noodles ; preparation:

name: broccoli cheddar muffins ; ingredients: eggs, butter, cheddar cheese, corn muffin mix, frozen chopped broccoli, scallion ; preparation:In a large bowl, beat eggs with an electric mixer until light colored. Add butter and cheese and mix on low. Add muffin mix, broccoli and scallions and mix at low speed for another minute. Coat a 12 cup muffin pan with cooking spray. Divide batter among muffin cups. Bake at 375 degrees for 15 minutes until light golden brown. Cool on a rack before turning muffins out of pan. ; name: four seasons enchiladas ; ingredients: green chilies, cream cheese, cooked turkey, flour tortillas, salsa, chili beans, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish. In a medium bowl, mix chile peppers and cream cheese. Stir in chopped turkey. Place the tortillas in a microwave oven. Heat for 1 minute, or until the tortillas are softened. Spread about 2 heaping tablespoons of the chile pepper mixture on each tortilla, and roll up. Place the rolled tortillas, seam-side down, in single layer in the prepared baking dish. In a medium bowl, combine the salsa and beans. Spoon the mixture over the enchiladas. Sprinkle the top with cheese. Bake 20 minutes or til bubbly and lightly browned. ; name: quick taco bake ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, taco seasoning mix, tomato sauce, whole kernel corn, cheddar cheese, bisquick baking mix, milk, eggs ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Cook beef and onion until beef is brown, drain. Spoon into ungreased 13x9x2 inch baking dish. Stir in taco mix, dry, tomato sauce and corn. Sprinkle with cheese. Stir remaining ingredients until blended, pour over beef mixture. Bake 35 minute or until light golden brown. Serve with sour cream, chopped tomato and shredded cheese, if desired. ; name: pepper cheesecake ; ingredients: cream cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, taco seasoning, sour cream, eggs, diced green chilies, red bell pepper, hot salsa, guacamole ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f. Beat the cream cheese, shredded cheese, and taco seasoning mix until fluffy. Stir in 1 cup of sour cream. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then fold in the chilies and the red pepper. Pour in a greased spring-form pan and bake for 40 to 45 minutes. Cool for 10 minutes on wire rack. Combine the remaining sour cream with the salsa and spread on top. Bake for 5 minutes more. Refrigerate over night. To serve, unmold and spread with the guacamole or avocado dip. Garnish with fresh tomatoes, olives, or cheese. Serve with taco chips. ; name: quick taco casserole ; ingredients: ground chuck, onion, taco seasoning mix, tomato sauce, whole kernel corn, cheddar cheese, baking mix, milk, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cook ground chuck with onion until chuck is brown. Drain off grease. Spoon into ungreased 9x13x2-inch baking dish. Stir in dry taco seasoning mix, tomato sauce, and corn. Sprinkle with cheese. Stir baking mix, milk, and eggs until blended and pour over beef mixture. Bake 35 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: mexican cornbread hamburger casserole ; ingredients: ground chuck, salt, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, mexican cornbread mix, eggs, milk, cream-style corn, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown meat with salt and bell peppers. Drain. Put into 13 x 9 baking dish. Pour cream corn over meat mixture. Sprinkle with cheddar cheese. Mix cornbread mix, eggs, and milk until blended and pour over casserole. Bake at 425 for 25-30 minutes until lightly browned. ; name: amy s chillequilles with eggs ; ingredients: corn tortillas, oil, eggs, cumin, tomatoes and green chilies, cheese, sour cream ; preparation:In a non stick skillet, fry tortilla strips in oil and then drain on paper towels and set aside. Beat eggs and cumin in a bowl. Pour into skillet with tomatoes and cheese and scramble. When eggs are almost completely done -- add cooked tortilla strips and mix together. Serve with a dallop of sour cream. ; name: breakfast enchilada eggs ; ingredients: corn muffin mix, diced green chilies, egg, water, cheddar cheese, red enchilada sauce, refried beans, eggs, cilantro, four-cheese mexican blend cheese ; preparation:

name: rachael ray s spanakopita burgers ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, butter, garlic cloves, red onion, frozen spinach, fresh oregano, feta, ground chicken, seasoning ; preparation:Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. To one side, add a little extra-virgin olive oil and a tablespoon of butter. When butter melts, add the chopped garlic and chopped red onion and cook 5 minutes. Transfer the onions and garlic to a bowl to cool. Return pan to heat. Squeeze all the water out of the thawed spinach. Separate the spinach as you add it to the bowl with cool onions, garlic and season with 1 teaspoon of oregano. Add in feta crumbles then chicken or turkey, grill seasoning and a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil. Mix and form into 4 patties, 1-inch thick. Raise heat on pan to medium-high. Add patties and cook 6 minutes on each side. ; name: super simple chicken soup ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, carrot, celery, shallot, garlic, chunk chicken, hot water, chicken base, cold water, cornstarch ; preparation:Place first 5 ingredients in a soup pot and saute for 5 minutes. Add chicken, stir. Combine hot water and base then add to your pot. Cook for 15 minutes or until carrots are done enough for you. Combine cold water and corn starch then add to your pot while stirring. Your soup will thicken and be ready to serve. You can add more cornstarch mixture if you would like it thicker. I like mine somewhere between a soup and a stew consistency. ; name: marinated herbed grilled chicken ; ingredients: lemon juice, olive oil, herbs, garlic ; preparation:In a gallon sized ziploc baggie take all the above listed ingredients. And thrown in any desired chicken pieces. You can use a whole chicken or drunsticks or thighs or breasts. I used about 6-8 thighs and marinate at least 4 hours overnight is better turning every 4 hours or so. Heat a grill on one side on medium high heat making sure to place the chicken on the side of the grill that doesnt have fire underneath as the oil will cause it to flame and burn cook untill 165 degrees or juices run clear. Cooking times will vary depending on the grill you use my grill is a charcoal grill and took about 20-35 minutes depending on breast size you will need to adjust accordingly also i prefer to let my chicken set just a minute or 2 before servig i also served this with my quick and easy mederterainian rice recipe. ; name: chinese style broccoli ; ingredients: canola oil, broccoli, low sodium soy sauce, garlic clove, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:Heat oil in a large wok or high-sided skillet over med-high heat. Add broccoli and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Add soy sauce, garlic, and lemon juice. Continue to stir-fry until broccoli is crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: bea s garlic potatoes ; ingredients: garlic cloves, pepper, salt, dried thyme, savory, olive oil, fingerling potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 475 degrees. Finely chop garlic, and sprinkle with salt. Mash into a paste with back of spoon. Place in bowl with thyme, savory and oil. Toss potatoes with garlic mixture. Place on foil lined baking sheet and bake until browned, about 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: easy black beans ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic clove, black beans, onion, sour cream ; preparation:Saute garlic in olive oil over low heat. Add black beans and bring the heat up to medium to begin cooking out liquid. Stir frequently and mash beans as you stir. Cook 10-15 minutes. Top with sour cream and chopped onions. ; name: angel hair pasta with basil tomato sauce and chicken ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, shallot, roma tomatoes, salt and pepper, fresh basil, whole wheat angel hair pasta, water, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Saut garlic and shallot in oil over medium heat until garlic golden and shallot wilted. Add tomatoes and season with salt, pepper, and basil. Chop cooked chicken into bite size pieces. Add pasta, water, and chicken to sauce, stir gently in to coat. Move to serving platter, sprinkle with parmesan cheese, and serve. ; name: oil poached garlic puree and roasted garlic oil ; ingredients: heads of garlic, water, canola oil, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:

name: chicken almond casserole ; ingredients: chicken, mayonnaise, cream of chicken soup, celery, sliced almonds, cracker crumb, onion, eggs, potato chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 deg. Mix all ingredients together well except for the corn flakes. Lightly grease a casserole dish and add mixture. Top with corn flakes. May drizzle a little melted butter over corn flakes if desired. Bake at 350 for 35 minutes. ; name: cheddar chicken chowder ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast half, garlic clove, salt, pepper, flour, chicken broth, milk, frozen mixed vegetables, hot sauce, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Spray large saucepan with cooking spray. Add chicken and garlic. Cook and stir on medium-high heat 5 minutes or until cooked through. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in flour. Cook and stir an additional minute. Add broth, milk and vegetables and hot sauce. Stir. Reduce heat to medium. Bring just to boil, stirring frequently. Remove from heat. Stir in cheese until completely melted. ; name: thalhimers chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken breasts, celery, lemon juice, mayonnaise, white pepper, salt ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine chicken, celery, lemon juice and mayonnaise. Stir to blend. Add pepper and salt and mix thoroughly. Chill before serving. 8 servings. ; name: smoky almond chicken ; ingredients: salted almond, white bread, ground black pepper, reduced-fat sour cream, barbecue sauce, boneless skinless chicken breast halves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. In food processor, pulse almonds, bread, and pepper until coarsely chopped. Transfer to waxed paper. In pie plate, mix sour cream with 1 tablespoon barbecue sauce. Dip chicken into sour-cream mixture, then into almond mixture to coat, firmly pressed so mixture adheres. Arrange on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake until chicken looses its pink color throughout, 12 to 15 minutes. Serve with remaining sauce. ; name: guacamole grilled chicken club ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt and black pepper, ciabatta rolls, mayonnaise, lettuce leaves, bacon, guacamole, mexican cheese, adobo seasoning ; preparation:Preheat grill. Season chicken with salt and pepper. Grill over medium for 5 to 8 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Spread chipotle mayonnaise on bottom half of each roll and top with lettuce, chicken breast, bacon, guacamole and crumbled cheese. Close each sandwich with top half of roll and serve. ; name: waikiki bbq chicken dish ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, flour, salt and pepper, oil, crushed pineapple, barbecue sauce, cornstarch, ginger ; preparation:Coat chicken with mixture of flour, salt and pepper. Brown in pan, drain. Combine remaining ingredients and pour over chicken in pan. Cover, simmer for one hour. Serve with rice and steamed vegetables. ; name: easy tuna melt casserole bake ; ingredients: tuna, onion, celery, mayonnaise, bread, swiss cheese, cream of chicken soup, half-and-half ; preparation:Set oven to 350 degrees. Toast the bread slices. Line the bottom of a greased baking dish with 6 slices of bread, set 6 slices of bread aside. In a bowl, mix together the tuna, chopped onion, celery and mayo. Spread the mixture on the bread in the baking dish. Place the remaining bread slices on top of the tuna mixture. Place the slices of cheese over the bread. Mix together the undiluted soup and the half and half. Pour over the cheese slices, spreading with the back of a spoon to coat evenly. Bake for 20-25 minutes. ; name: crispy cabbage and chicken wraps ; ingredients: chicken breast, coleslaw mix, fat-free mayonnaise, salt, pepper, tortilla ; preparation:

name: sauteed spinach with sesame korean ; ingredients: dark sesame oil, garlic, spinach, sugar, soy sauce, toasted sesame seeds ; preparation:Put 2 t. Of the oil in a large skillet over medium heat for one minute. Add garlic. The instant it begins to sizzle, add spinach and cook, stirring occasionally, until it is completely wilted. Turn heat to low. Stir in sugar and soy sauce. Cook for a few more moments. Turn off heat. Taste to see if you need additional salt or soy sauce. Serve hot, warm, room temp or cold. Before serving, drizzle with remaining sesame oil and spinkle with sesame seeds. ; name: asian beef skewers ; ingredients: garlic cloves, fresh ginger, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, sirloin tip steak, green onions ; preparation:In a large bowl, mix garlic, ginger, soy sauce, vinegar, oil and sugar. Remove the fat from the steak and cut the meat in dices of 1 inch. Add beef to the marinade and let rest for 10 minutes. On metal skewers or presoaked bamboo skewers, thread beef cubes by alternating with green onion. Set the barbecue to medium high. Brush the beef skewers with the marinade and put on a oiled grill of the barbecue. Close cover and cook about 10 minutes or until beef is grilled but still pink inside. ; name: spaghetti and fried eggs ; ingredients: salt, thin spaghetti, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, eggs, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Bring a pot of salted water to the boil. Start the sauce in the next step, and start cooking the pasta when the water boils. Combine garlic and 4 tablespoons of the oil in a small skillet over medium-low heat. Cook the garlic, pressing it into the oil occasionally to release its flavor. It should barely color on both sides. Remove the garlic, and add the remaining oil. Fry the eggs gently in the oil, until the whites are just about set and the yolks still quite runny. Drain the pasta, and toss with the eggs and oil, breaking up the whites as you do. Season to taste, and serve immediately, with cheese if you like. ; name: african pineapple peanut stew ; ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, vegetable oil, kale, canned crushed pineapple, peanut butter, tabasco sauce, cilantro ; preparation:In a covered saucepan, saute the onions and garlic in the oil for about 10 minutes, stirring frequently, until the onions are lightly browned. While the onions saute, wash the kale. Remove the stems. Stack the leaves on a cutting surface and slice crosswise into 1-inch-thick slices. Add the pineapple and its juice to the onions and bring to a simmer. Stir in the kale, cover, and simmer for about 5 minutes, stirring a couple of times, until just tender. Mix in the peanut butter, hot pepper sauce, and simmer for 5 minutes. Add salt to taste. ; name: spinach stir fry with garlic ; ingredients: peanut oil, garlic clove, fresh spinach, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sugar, sesame seeds ; preparation:Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium high heat. Add garlic and cook 1 minutes. Add spinach, soy sauce, vinegar and sugar. Stir fry 2 minutes until spinach begins to wilt. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve. ; name: greek rice casserole w feta and artichokes ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, chopped tomatoes, basil, oregano, red chili pepper flakes, salt, artichoke hearts, cooked white rice, feta cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet. Add garlic and saut for 2 minutes. Add drained tomatoes, basil, oregano, chili flakes and salt. Bring to a simmer. Cook for 10 minutes, stirring frequently and breaking up the tomatoes as they cook. In a medium bowl, toss artichoke quarters, rice and feta together. Pour into a medium oiled casserole dish when tomato sauce is ready, pour over the rice mixture, shaking the dish so the tomato sauce settles. Cover and bake for 20 minutes. Uncover and bake an additional 20 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: pasta with shrimp in garlic sauce fideos con gambas ; ingredients: olive oil, salt, spaghetti, garlic clove, baby shrimp, fresh lemon juice, veal, red chili pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Bring pot of water to boil with 1 tablespoon oil and salt. Add the spaghetti and stir occasionally with fork. Cook until tender, but still firm. Drain, return to pot, mix in another tablespoon oil, and keep warm. Heat the last tablespoon of oil in skillet and add the garlic. Just as the garlic starts to turn color, add the shrimp. Stir for about 2 minutes until the shrimps turn pink. Add the lemon juice, broth, red pepper, parsley and dash of salt. Cook for one more minute. Mix in noodles and serve once noddles are hot. ; name: anne s sesame noodles ; ingredients: pasta, garlic cloves, gingerroot, tahini, soy sauce, toasted sesame oil, onion, cilantro ; preparation:

name: spicy cod with tomatoes and spinach ; ingredients: cod, frozen chopped spinach, chopped tomatoes, tomatoes and green chilies, onion, shallots, garlic, tomato paste, cumin, olive oil ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a large pan over medium high heat. Add the onions, shallots, and garlic. Cook until the onion is translucent. Add all the tomatoes, the tomato paste, and the cumin. Stir and let it simmer 3-5 minutes or until it starts to thicken slightly. Add the spinach and stir until it is combined. Let it cook 2-3 minutes. Meanwhile chop the cod into small even pieces. Add it to the tomato sauce, stirring to make sure it is all covered with sauce. Let it simmer 5-8 minutes or until the fish is opaque and flakes easily with a fork. ; name: tarragon mayonnaise cod steaks ; ingredients: cod steaks, mayonnaise, tarragon, lemon juice, salt, dried breadcrumbs ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Grease broiler rack. Place cod steaks on rack, broil 5 to 7 minutes without turning. In a small bowl, mix mayonnaise, tarragon, lemon juice and salt. When fish is done, spread mixture over fish and sprinkle with bread crumbs. Broil for about 30 seconds or until crust is lightly browned. ; name: mayonnaise baked fish ; ingredients: fish fillets, mayonnaise, butter, onion, parmesan cheese, lemon juice, old bay seasoning, black pepper, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Place fish, in a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish. In a bowl, combine mayonnaise, butter, onion, cheese, lemon juice, old bay, and pepper. Mix until a thick paste is formed. Spread mixture evenly over fish filets, then top with bread crumbs. Bake for about 10 minutes, or until fish is flaky. To finish cooking, place fish under the broiler, for another 2-3 minutes, or until fish is golden brown. ; name: golden baked fish ; ingredients: fish fillets, pepper, egg white, salt, mayonnaise, dill weed, onion juice, fresh dill, lemon wedge ; preparation:Place fish in a greased 13-in x 9-in x 2 baking dish. Sprinkle with pepper. Beat egg white with salt if desired until stiff peaks form. Fold in mayonnaise, dill and onion juice, spoon over fish. Bake uncovered at 425 degrees for 15 to 20 minutes or until topping is puffed and golden and fish flakes easily with a fork. Garnish with dill and lemon if desired. ; name: crumb covered salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillet, plain breadcrumbs, garlic, fresh italian parsley, onions, cayenne pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small bowl, combine breadcrumbs, garlic, parsley, minced onion, cayenne pepper, and a little olive oil. Drizzle a little olive oil in a shallow, metal baking dish and place the salmon fillet on top. Sprinkle breadcrumb mix over the salmon. You do not have to use all of it. Any extra mix should keep in the refrigerator for a few weeks. Bake for about 15 minutes depending on thickness of the fish. Salmon should break apart easily when fully cooked. ; name: taramasalata ; ingredients: potato, codfish roe, fresh lemon juice, onion, olive oil, bread ; preparation:Place potato in saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until cooked through. Drain and set aside to cool a bit. Process potato, roe, onion and lemon juice thoroughly. The more roe that is mashed, the better the dip will taste. Gradually add in the oil until thoroughly combined. Transfer to a serving bowl. Can garnish with kalamata olives if desired. Serve with bread. ; name: whitefish with cilantro pesto ; ingredients: white fish fillets, fresh lemon juice, garlic, fresh cilantro leaves, olive oil, salt, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. Prepare a shallow baking dish with non-stick pan spray. Sprinkle the fish with lemon juice and place in the dish. Mince the garlic in a food processor or blender. Add the cilantro. Process until minced. Add the oil, salt, and pepper flakes. Process until well mixed. Spread the pesto evenly over the fish. Bake 10 minutes, or until the fish is opaque and flakes easily with a fork. Serve hot. ; name: tomato crowned cod ; ingredients: cod fish fillets, lemon juice, pepper, tomatoes, sweet green pepper, onions, dry breadcrumbs, fresh basil, oil ; preparation:

name: slow cooker cranberry tea ; ingredients: sugar, water, cinnamon sticks, cranberry juice, frozen orange juice, fresh lemon juice, orange slice ; preparation:In saucepan, combine sugar, 8 cups water and cinnamon sticks. Mix well and bring to a boil. Pour mixture into slow cooker with remaining ingredients. Cover and cook on high-heat setting for 1 hour. Reduce heat to low and serve slow cooker cranberry tea warm. ; name: persian lemonade ; ingredients: lemons, water, caster sugar, orange blossom water, ice ; preparation:Cut the lemons in half and juice half the lemons. Thinly slice the remaining lemons and place in a heatproof bowl. Combine the lemon juice, water and sugar in a large saucepan over low heat. Cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until sugar dissolves. Remove from heat and pour warm juice over the lemon slices. Cover with plastic wrap and place in the fridge for 4 hours to chill and develop the flavours. Stir through the orange blossom water. Divide ice evenly among serving glasses. Pour over the lemonade to serve. ; name: sparkling honey lemonade in citrus salt rimmed glasses ; ingredients: fresh lemon juice, honey, sparkling water, lemon, zest of, coarse salt, lemon wedges ; preparation:Combine lemon juice and honey in a saucepan. Heat until honey is completely blended with the juice. Chill until cold, then stir and pour into a large pitcher. Add cold water and stir to combine completely. Mix lemon zest with finishing salt in a small dish. Rub the rim of serving glasses with a wedge of lemon or lime. Invert glass into dish of salt and turn to coat rim. Add ice and lemonade. Serve immediately. ; name: sam s symple syrup ; ingredients: white sugar, water, mint leaf, lemon ; preparation:In a two quart stainless pot slowly bring water and sugar to a boil over medium heat, stirring the mix until the sugar is absorbed. Boil one minute until syrup is clear, cover and let cool on the stove. Store covered in the refrigerator and use in iced drinks to taste. To change up the flavor a bit you can add mint leaves or lemon peel or both if you are adventursome. Just strain them out before you use the symple syrup. ; name: ginger lime melon balls ; ingredients: fresh lime juice, water, crystallized ginger, lime zest, melon balls, of fresh mint ; preparation:In small saucepan, combine juice, water, ginger and zest. Set pan over medium-high heat and bring to boil. Boil 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until mixture reduces to 2 tablespoons. Strain mixture though fine sieve to remove zest. Place melon in bowl, toss with ginger-lime mixture. Let sit for 15 minutes. You can drain the sauce or serve it with the melon. Garnish with mint. ; name: black cherry iced tea ; ingredients: water, black cherries, sugar, lemon juice, star anise, black tea bags, mint sprig ; preparation:Bring water to boil in a medium-sized pot. Add cherries, sugar, lemon juice, and star anise. Simmer for 15 to 20 minutes, until the cherries are almost falling apart. Turn off heat, mix in black tea, and let stand for 1 hour to cool. Strain liquid through a fine mesh sieve, mashing the cherries with a wooden spoon to extract more liquid. Discard solids. Transfer liquid to a pitcher and refridgerate until ready to serve. ; name: grandpa s strawberry lemonade ; ingredients: water, sugar, lemon peel, fresh lemon juice, fresh strawberries, sparkling water, ice, strawberry ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, bring the water and sugar to a boil. Reduce the heat and simmer, stirring occasionally until the sugar dissolves. Add lemon peel and lemon juice, stir and remove from heat. Let cool completely, then strain into a clean pitcher.
