Run under cold water and drain. Peel and slice the cloves of garlic. Cook the onions and peppers in the oil for ten minutes until the onions are golden and the peppers are soft. Add the garlic and tomatoes. Cover the pan and cook over low heat for thirty minutes. Pour in the broth and bring to a boil. Tear the bread into large pieces and add to the boiling soup where it will disintegrate and thicken the broth. Adjust the amount of bread and broth to the desired thickness of the soup and salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot with grated cheese if you wish. ; name: leah s easy food processor salsa ; ingredients: roma tomatoes, diced tomatoes, garlic cloves, jalapeno peppers, onion, limes, juice of, fresh cilantro, fresh ground pepper, red pepper flakes, salt ; preparation:Put garlic cloves and jalapeo pieces in food processor, pulse a few time until coarsely chopped. Place roma tomatoes in a microwaveable dish and microwave for 1 minute or so on high, then remove skins. Add diced tomatoes, lime juice, pepper, salt, and red pepper flakes to food processor, pulse 3 or 4 times until everything looks well mixed. Add onion, roma tomatoes, and cilantro, and pulse just a few times until onion is at desire consistency. Adding onions at the end is very important, otherwise they will become pureed and make a gross texture for the salsa. If you want to remove the remaining metallic taste of the fresh tomato, cook over medium low heat in a non-reactive pot for about 15-20 minutes. For best flavor, refrigerate over night to let flavors mingle. ; name: marinated tomatoes with lemon ; ingredients: fresh tomatoes, fresh lemon juice, sugar, extra virgin olive oil, fresh savory, salt, ground red pepper, garlic clove ; preparation:

name: baked apricots with honey albaricoques al horno con miel ; ingredients: butter, apricots, slivered almonds, honey, ground ginger, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Lightly butter an ovenproof dish large enough to hold the apricot halves in a single layer. Arrange the apricots in the dish, cut side up. Sprinkle the apricots with the almonds and drizzle the honey over the top. Dust with the ginger. Bake for 12-15 minutes, until the apricots are tender and the almonds golden. Remove from the oven and serve at once, with ice cream on the side, if you want. ; name: aunt helen s green congealed salad ; ingredients: cottage cheese, crushed pineapple, evaporated milk, lime jell-o gelatin, cider vinegar, celery, nuts, boiling water ; preparation:Dissolve jellow in boiling water. Add vinegar. Chill til thickened. Whip evaporated milk. Fold into thickened jello together with remaining ingredients. Turn into buttered 8 cup mold and chill til firm. ; name: easter pascha a greek tradition ; ingredients: cream cheese, unsalted butter, sour cream, vanilla extract, powdered sugar, golden raisin, blanched slivered almond ; preparation:Place cream cheese, butter in mixing bowl and whip until smooth. Add powdered sugar and mix at low speed until well blended. Add vanilla extra and mix well. Fold sour cream into mixture. Place in decorative bowl and refrigerate over night. Decorate with raisins, nuts and any other edible fruit that you choose. Traditional this easter dish is decorated with a cross or other christian symbols. Serve with sweet bread. ; name: frozen pineapple salad good use for those muffin tins ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, brown sugar, crushed pineapple, pineapple yogurt, pecans ; preparation:Blend cream cheese and sugars, beating well. Add pineapple and yogurt. Spoon into cupcake liners placed in a muffin tray. Sprinkle with chopped nuts. Cover and freeze until firm. Remove from freezer about 10 minutes prior to serving. ; name: orange lemon parfaits low fat low sugar ; ingredients: sugar-free lemon gelatin, fresh orange juice, low-fat cream cheese, evaporated skim milk, vanilla extract ; preparation:Sprinkle gelatin over orange juice in a heavy saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium high heat, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Combine remaining ingredients in a blender. Add gelatin mixture and pure. Chill before serving in individual serving glasses. ; name: orange breakfast coffee cake ; ingredients: sugar, pecans, orange zest, reduced-fat cream cheese, refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, butter, powdered sugar, orange juice ; preparation:Combine first 3 ingredients in small bowl - set aside. Place about tsp cream cheese in center of each biscuit. Fold biscuit half over cheese, pressing edges to seal. Dip folded biscuit in melted butter, and dredge in sugar mixture. Place biscuits, curve side down in a single layer in curves of a lightly greased 12-cup bundt pan, spacing evenly. Place any remaining biscuits around center of tube pan filling in spaces if necessary. Drizzle any remaining butter over biscuits, sprinkle with any remaining sugar mixture. Bake at 350 for 35 to 40 minutes or until done. Immediately invert onto a serving plate. Combine powdered sugar and oj, stirring well. Drizzle icing over warm coffee cake. ; name: fluffy orange fruit dip ; ingredients: reduced-fat cream cheese, orange flavored yogurt, powdered sugar, frozen orange juice concentrate, vanilla, frozen fat-free whipped topping, fresh fruit ; preparation:In medium bowl, beat cream cheese with electric mixer on low speed until smooth. Add yogurt, powdered sugar, orange juice concentrate and vanilla. Beat 30 to 60 seconds on low speed until blended and smooth. Gently stir in whipped topping until well blended. Serve immediately or refrigerate up to 24 hours. Serve with fresh fruit. ; name: pineapple apricot cheese spread ; ingredients: crushed pineapple, dried apricot, mango chutney, apricot brandy, ground ginger, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, fat free cream cheese, reduced-calorie stick margarine ; preparation:

name: mexican cornbread hamburger casserole ; ingredients: ground chuck, salt, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, mexican cornbread mix, eggs, milk, cream-style corn, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown meat with salt and bell peppers. Drain. Put into 13 x 9 baking dish. Pour cream corn over meat mixture. Sprinkle with cheddar cheese. Mix cornbread mix, eggs, and milk until blended and pour over casserole. Bake at 425 for 25-30 minutes until lightly browned. ; name: jana s church enchiladas ; ingredients: flour tortillas, ground beef, onion, taco seasoning, cream of chicken soup, milk, green chilies, velveeta cheese, green onion dip ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Brown ground beef and onion. After meat is finished, add taco seasoning. In a saucepan, combine soup, milk, green chilies, velveeta and onion dip. Heat on low till creamy. Fill tortillas with spoonful of meat, roll and put seamside down. Pour creamy mixture over tortillas in a 9x13 pan. Cook at 350 for 20-30 minutes. ; name: special green bean casserole ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, sugar, pepper, onion, sour cream, french style green beans, swiss cheese, corn flakes ; preparation:Saute onion in butter. Add flour, salt, sugar and pepper. Mix in sour cream, beans and cheese. Pour into 9x13 baking dish. Top with cornflakes. Bake at 400 degrees for 20 minutes. ; name: nachos ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, taco sauce, refried beans, cream of mushroom soup, taco seasoning, salt, velveeta cheese, tortilla chips, sour cream ; preparation:Brown beef and onions in saucepan. Drain. Combine all ingredients except tortilla chips and sour cream in slow cooker. Cover and cook on high 1 hour stirring occasionally until cheese if fully melted. Serve warm with chips and sour cream. ; name: cornbread taco pizza ; ingredients: corn muffin mix, ground beef, taco seasoning mix, salsa, cheddar cheese, sour cream ; preparation:Prepare corn muffin mix as directed on box. Spread batter into lightly greased 12 inch pizza pan. Bake at 400 degrees fahrenheit for 8 to 10 minutes until slightly brown. In a skillet brown ground meat. Drain and add seasoning. Put salsa then meat on baked cornbread. Top with cheese. Put back into oven until topping is bubbly and cheese is melted. Top with sour cream if you please. ; name: mexi cheeseburger quiche ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, diced green chilies, eggs, mayonnaise, water, heavy cream, cumin, cayenne pepper, mexican blend cheese ; preparation:Cook ground beef in skillet until done. Drain. Add onions and chiles and cook for 5 minutes. Meanwhile, mix the rest of the ingredients in a bowl. Put beef mixture into a pie dish. Pour cheese mixture over it. Bake at in a 350 oven for 35-40 minutes or until cheese is puffed and slightly brown. ; name: cheeseburger chowder ; ingredients: ground beef, celery, green pepper, onion, potatoes, beef bouillon cubes, water, flour, milk, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown ground beef in large pot. Drain off grease. Add potatos, onions, peppers, celery, salt and bouillon cubes. Pour in water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat cover and simmer for 15 to 20 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Whisk flour into milk and slowly pour into pot with meat and vegetables. Stir until soup is thickened slightly. Mix in cheese and stir until melted. ; name: fiesta corn bake casserole ; ingredients: sour cream, flour, sugar, mexican-style corn, ground beef, onion, cheddar cheese, seasoning ; preparation:

name: broccoli cauliflower bacon salad ; ingredients: broccoli floret, cauliflower floret, cheddar cheese, bacon, mayonnaise, white sugar, white wine vinegar ; preparation:Place bacon in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown. Crumble and set aside. In a medium sized salad bowl, layer in order the broccoli, cauliflower, cheese and bacon. Prepare the dressing by whisking together the mayonnaise, sugar and vinegar. Drizzle dressing over top and serve. ; name: strawberry romaine salad ; ingredients: butter, sugar, sliced almonds, romaine lettuce, fresh strawberries, red onion, mayonnaise, milk, poppy seeds, raspberry vinegar ; preparation:In a saucepan, over medium heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter, stir in sugar and almonds and cook until golden brown. Remove from heat and allow to cool slightly. Combine lettuce, strawberries, onion and the sugared almonds. Mix dressing ingredients together and toss with salad. Chill for a short time and then serve. ; name: shrimp and broccoli stir fry spicy ; ingredients: broccoli, medium shrimp, rice wine vinegar, soy sauce, chicken broth, garlic, ground ginger, red pepper flakes, cornstarch ; preparation:In a large sauce pan. Add the vinegar, garlic, red pepper flakes, broth, soy sauce, and ginger. Bring to a slight boil. Add shrimp and fresh or frozen but thawed broccoli florets. Take some of the excess sauce and pour into a bowl. Whisk and return to pan. Bring to full boil and stir constantly. As soon as thickening begins, remove from heat and serve over white rice. You may also use one of them premade asian vegetable medleys in this recipe and pour sauce over it. Can be used for beef, chicken or pork as well. ; name: marinated garbanzo salad ; ingredients: olive oil, yellow onion, dried thyme, red pepper, dark raisin, garbanzo beans, salt, white wine vinegar ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a saucepan. Add the onions and thyme and cook over low heat, covered, until onions are tender and lightly colored, about 25 minutes. Add chopped red pepper and cook for another 5 minutes. Add raisins and garbanzos and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Do not overcook the garbanzos or they will become mushy. Season with salt, transfer to a bowl, and pour the vinegar over the hot mixture. Let vegetables cool to room temperature, then cover and refrigerate for at least 24 hours before serving. Allow to return to room temperature before serving. ; name: sweet sour turkey salad ; ingredients: peaches, cider vinegar, soy sauce, ground ginger, mixed greens, cooked turkey breast, mandarin oranges, broccoli floret, cauliflower floret ; preparation:For dressing, in a small saucepan stir together spreadable fruit, vinegar, soy sauce, and ginger. N cook and stir over low heat until bubbly. Remove from heat. Set aside to cool slightly. In a large mixing bowl toss together greens, turkey breast, orange sections, brocolli, and cauliflower. Divide salad among 4 plates. Drizzle with dressing. ; name: easy sweet and sour red cabbage saute ; ingredients: oil, onion, apple, red cabbage, apple cider vinegar, sugar, celery seed, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add in onion and saute until golden. Add in sliced cabbage, cider vinegar, sugar, celery seeds and black pepper. Mix to combine and cook until the cabbage if crisp-tender and the liquid is reduced to a glaze. Season with salt. ; name: classy spinach bundles with pistachio dressing ; ingredients: vegetable oil, vinegar, honey, orange zest, pistachios, fresh spinach leaves, green onions ; preparation:Blend oil, vinegar, honey and orange peel. Stir in pistachios and set aside. Place spinach in 2-quart microwave-safe container. Cover with plastic wrap and vent. Microwave at high for 3 to 5 minutes or until spinach is wilted. Rinse with cold water. Squeeze to drain. Divide into 4 bundles. Wrap each bundle with green onion tie. Drizzle with pistachio dressing. Serve warm or chilled. ; name: raw broccoli salad reduced calorie low fat ; ingredients: broccoli florets, red onion, artificial sweetener, cider vinegar, light mayonnaise, sunflower seeds, seedless raisins ; preparation:

name: pizza crust gluten free ; ingredients: olive oil, cornmeal, brown rice flour, millet flour, xanthan gum, salt, sugar, fast rising yeast, warm water ; preparation:Lightly oil pizza pan and sprinkle evenly with cornmeal. Put oven rack in lowest position and preheat oven to 425f. Mix flour mix, millet flour, xanthan gum, salt, sugar, and yeast in a large bowl with an electric mixer at medium speed. Add water and 1 teaspoon oil and mix until just combined, scraping down side of bowl occasionally. Mixture will be thin and more like a batter than a dough. Increase speed to high and beat until smooth, about 2 minutes. Spoon batter into center of pan and use wet offset spatula to spread to edges of pan in a thin layer. Loosely cover pan with an oiled sheet of plastic and let stand in a warm place until doubled in bulk, about 40 minutes. Bake pizza crust until golden, about 15 minutes. Remove from oven and cover crust with toppings of your choice. Bake until toppings are heated through, about 6 minutes. Transfer pizza on pan to a rack to cool slightly, about 3 minutes. ; name: woody s pizza crust ; ingredients: water, active dry yeast, sugar, olive oil, salt, pizza seasoning, all-purpose flour, cornmeal ; preparation:In a mixing bowl add yeast and sugar to hot water. Then add oil, salt and pizza seasoning and mix thoroughly. Add flour and mix up to 30 revolutions. Let rise in a warm and moist place for 20 minutes. When dough is done rising, begin preheating oven to 425 degrees. Punch down dough and kneed in hands and bowl. Keep moving. Sprinkle cornmeal in a thin layer over pizza pan and roll dough out on pan as thick or thin as you like. Add desired sauce, meat, veggies and cheese. Bake in 425 degree oven for 15-20 minutes. ; name: raisin bread not bread machine ; ingredients: flour, fast rising yeast, cinnamon, sugar, brown sugar, salt, butter, raisins, water ; preparation:Mix all dry ingredients in a bowl. Melt butter in the microwave, let cool it cool to lukewarm temperature. Add warm water or milk to dry mixture, then add butter. Mix all ingredients together and let stand for a minute. Add flour to the mixture and stir until it forms a ball. Flour countertop, dump out the dough and knead for at least five minutes or until dough no longer sticks to counter. Place in greased bowl and cover. Let rise for 1 hour, then punch the dough down. Let rise for 1 hour and 30 minutes. Place dough into breadpan and bake at 325 for 1 hour and 30 minutes. ; name: simple and standard pizza dough ; ingredients: active dry yeast, warm water, bread flour, water, salt, olive oil, honey ; preparation:Stir the yeast into the warm water to dissolve. Add the flour. Stir the remaining ingredients into the flour mixture. Knead with dough hook or by hand until smooth and elastic. Place dough in a lightly greased bowl and cover. Allow to rise in a warm place for 30 minutes. Punch down the dough and divide into portions. On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough into very thin rounds and top as desired. Bake at 400f until crisp and golden brown, approx 8-12 minutes. Rolled dough may be stored in the freezer. I have kept rolled dough in the freezer for several months with the only effect being a less puffy baked crust. ; name: spicy country pancakes ; ingredients: milk, brown sugar, salt, oil, yeast, water, eggs, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Scald milk. Add sugar, salt, and oil. Cool to lukewarm. Dissolve yeast in water. Combine yeast mixture, eggs, and milk mixture. Sift flour and spices. Add to liquid mixture. Beat until smooth. Cover and let stand one hour or more in a warm place. Batter will be light and bubbly. Stir down batter. Bake on greased griddle. ; name: bread machine apricot nutmeg bread ; ingredients: water, vegetable oil, lemon juice, brown sugar, salt, bread flour, instant nonfat dry milk powder, active dry yeast, dried apricot, ground nutmeg ; preparation:Put ingredients beginning with water through yeast in bread machine, in order given. Select sweet bread cycle, with medium crust color and loaf size if available. Check dough after 5 minutes of mixing and add 1-2 tbl. Water or flour, if needed. Just before final knead, at beep, add apricots and nutmeg. ; name: soft as wonder white bread ; ingredients: water, salt, margarine, honey, all-purpose flour, powdered milk, sugar, bread machine yeast ; preparation:Add ingredients in order given. Select dough cycle. When done, take out dough and on a floured surface, shape into loaf and place in loaf pan. Let rise in a warm place for approximately 40 minutes until doubled in size. Bake on centre rack of preheated 350 degree oven for 25-30 minutes. Cool on wire rack before slicing. ; name: fantastic cinnamon raisin bread ; ingredients: oil, warm water, honey, maple-flavor syrup, salt, cinnamon, oatmeal, bread flour, raisins, active dry yeast ; preparation:

name: baked rigatoni with sausage ; ingredients: rigatoni pasta, broccoli florets, hot italian sausage, onion, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta by following the package directions, adding broccoli during the last 2 minutes of cooking. Drain, then return to pan. In a large skillet, cook sausage and onion over medium heat until meat is brown and onion is tender. Drain. Stir in marinara sauce. Heat through. Stir meat sauce and cheeses into the cooked pasta. Transfer to a lightly greased 3-quart rectangular casserole dish. Bake, covered, at 375 for 20-25 degrees or until mixture is heated through. ; name: spinach sausage soup ; ingredients: bulk italian sausage, chicken broth, red potatoes, italian salad dressing mix, fresh spinach ; preparation:Brown the sausage in a skillet, over medium heat. Drain well. In a large soup pot, add the broth, potatoes, and salad dressing mix. Stir well. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer for 10-12 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Add in the sausage and spinach. Cook until well heated. ; name: end of the week sausage casserole ; ingredients: bulk sausage, onion, green pepper, zucchini, egg noodles, baby carrots, molasses, catsup, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Cook sausage, onion and green pepper in skillet until cooked and sausage is brown. While sausage is cooking cook the package of egg noodles with carrots for 10 minutes, following package directions. Drain well. Combine noodles, carrots and sausage mixture in 2 quart casserole dish. Combine molasses, catsup and worcestershire sauce in measuring cup and pour over noodles and sausage. Mix in well. Cook at 350f for 30 minutes or until hot. ; name: janie s hamburger soup ; ingredients: hamburger, onion, v8 vegetable juice, water, tomato soup, mixed vegetables, italian seasoning, salt, ground black pepper, pasta ; preparation:Saute onion. Brown ground beef with onion. Add remaining ingredients. Simmer on low until pasta is cooked. 2-3 hours. ; name: sausage florentine pizza ; ingredients: hot italian sausage, fresh mushrooms, garlic, pizza sauce, dried oregano, dried basil, frozen chopped spinach, salt and pepper, boboli pizza crust, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:In a big skillet, saute the sausage, mushrooms, and garlic until the meat is browned. Crumble the sausage while cooking. Drain off fat. Remove excess fat by patting meat mixture with paper towels. Add pizza sauce, oregano, basil, chopped spinach, and salt and pepper to taste. Cook, stirring frequently, until heated through. Place pizza crust on a lightly greased baking sheet. Bake at 400 for 5 minutes. Spread meat mixture evenly over pizza crust. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until cheese melts and pizza is heated. ; name: italian sausage and broccoli quiche ; ingredients: mild italian sausage, broccoli florets, italian cheese blend, eggs, heavy cream, black pepper, salt, rosemary, pie crusts ; preparation:Fry the sausage links in a skillet. When cooked through, slice thinly and set aside. Beat the eggs, cream, salt, pepper and rosemary in a bowl. Mix in the sausage, broccoli and cheese, stirring til all ingredients are coated. Pour into pie shell. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes, or until knife inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: zucchini mushroom and pasta skillet ; ingredients: onion, zucchini, fresh mushrooms, garlic cloves, bow tie pasta, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Saute onions, mushrooms and garlic until onions are clear. Add zucchini and cook until it is crisp-tender. Drain excess water from the skillet. Add mozzarella cheese and allow to melt. Meanwhile, cook pasta according to package directions. Drain pasta and add 1 jar spaghetti sauce to pasta. Serve pasta topped with veggie mix. I often make this recipe as three separate pieces -- pasta, veggies and cheese, and let each of us assemble our own. In addition, i also will marinade a chicken breast in italian salad dressing and then cook it up in strips or cubes and add to this delicious goodness. ; name: tuscan sausage vegetable soup ; ingredients: italian sausage, zucchini, summer squash, onion, tubettini pasta, water, pasta sauce, garbanzo beans, beef bouillon cube ; preparation:

name: comfort casserole ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, celery, garlic, pepper, fresh mushrooms, beef bouillon powder, boiling water, soy sauce, long grain white rice ; preparation:Scrambly-fry the beef, onion, celery, garlic, and pepper in a non-stick skillet until the beef is no longer pink. Drain. Add the mushrooms, saute for 5 minutes. Dissolve the bouillon powder in the boiling water. Add to the beef mixture. Mix well. Stir in the soy sauce and rice. Simmer, covered, for 30-40 minutes or until the rice is tender. ; name: korean beef ; ingredients: soy sauce, cayenne, garlic powder, vinegar, sesame oil, black pepper, sesame seeds, green onion, boneless beef cube, long-grain white rice ; preparation:Mix all ingredients in container to marinate. Cover and refrigerate overnight. To barbeque, bbq on high heat one minute each side. Or indoors, get skillet very hot. Toss in meat and cook over high heat 2 minutes each side. Quick fry the onions and add marinade. Serve over rice cooked as usual using two cups uncooked rice. ; name: heart chop suey 1952 ; ingredients: meat, flour, fat, boiling water, soy sauce, fresh mushrooms, onion, celery, bean sprouts ; preparation:Dip meat strips in flour. Heat fat in a heavy skillet and cook meat until browned. Add boiling water and soy sauce. In separate skillet, heat remaining fat. Brown mushrooms onions and celery. Add to meat mixture. Cover and simmer about 15 minutes. If using cabbage, cook 5 minutes and drain. Add bean sprouts or cabbage to meat mixture. Serve over rice. ; name: pork skillet supper ; ingredients: onion, vegetable oil, condensed cream of celery soup, milk, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, cooked pork, potato, frozen peas ; preparation:In a skillet, saute onion in oil until tender. Stir in soup, milk, worcestershire, salt and pepper. Mix well. Add pork, potatoes and peas. Heat through. ; name: easy skillet casserole ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, garlic powder, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, tomato paste, milk, butter, macaroni & cheese dinner mix ; preparation:Brown beef in a large, deep pot with onion, garlic powder, salt, pepper and worchestershire sauce. Cook macaroni separately according to package directions. When beef is cooked add tomato paste and prepared macaroni. Mix throughly. Cook over low heat until thickened. Add grated cheese on top, if desired. Cover and set aside for 5 mins before serving. ; name: chili with ravioli ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, lean ground beef, dried oregano, chili powder, salt, chili beans, crushed tomatoes, cheese ravioli, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat vegetable oil in a wide deep skillet or dutch oven. Add onion, and cook over medium-high heat for 5 mins until onion is translucent. Add ground beef and, using a large spoon or fork to break up, cook until the meat is browned. Add next 5 ingredients, rinsing out each can with a few tablespoons of water and adding the water to the pot. Cook for 15-20 minutes to let the flavors blend. Salt to taste. As the chili simmers, bring a large pot of water to boil and salt the water. When the water boils, add the frozen ravioli, and when the water returns to a boil, lower heat to simmer. Cook 4 or 5 mins until ravioli is cooked through. Place in serving bowls with chili over the top, sprinkled with grated cheese. ; name: spinach fried rice ; ingredients: spinach, garlic, dark sesame oil, white wine, celery, mushroom, long grain brown rice, scallion, low sodium soy sauce ; preparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the spinach and garlic in the oil for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Transfer to a platter in the same pan, heat the wine and saute the celery or bok choy and mushrooms, stirring constantly, for 3 minutes. Add the rice, scallions and spinach. Heat through. Season with soy sauce or tamari. ; name: beefy seitan log ; ingredients: vital wheat gluten, nutritional yeast, ground cumin, onion powder, garlic powder, mushroom stock, soy sauce, vegetarian worcestershire sauce ; preparation:

name: steamed broccoli italian style ; ingredients: broccoli, fresh lemon, extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, salt and pepper ; preparation:Rinse the broccoli and trim off the very bottom of the thick stem. You can either steam the entire head whole or cut it up into florets. Steam the broccoli. Lay out on a platter. Drizzle with lots of fresh lemon juice. Drizzle with extra virgin olive oil to taste. Add fresh minced garlic to taste. Add salt and pepper to taste. This can be served either hot or room temperature. ; name: creamy chickpea rosemary soup ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary leaf, crushed red pepper flakes, chickpeas, chicken broth, fresh lemon juice, sea salt ; preparation:In a large saucepan, heat the oil over medium heat and add garlic, rosemary and red pepper flakes. Cook, stirring constantly, until the garlic starts to brown, about 1 minute. Add chickpeas and cook 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Add chicken broth and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes. Let cool slightly. Transfer soup to a blender. Cover loosely, and puree until just smooth. Return to the saucepan and stir in lemon juice and sea salt to taste. Serve, garnished with a fresh rosemary sprig, or an additional drizzling of olive oil. ; name: tomatoe rice ; ingredients: olive oil, butter, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes, vegetable stock, long grain rice, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil and butter in saucepan until butter melets in a medium saucepan add the onion and garlic and saut for about 5 minutes or until onion is softened. Add the tomatoes, mix well, cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Add the stock, rice, salt and pepper, mix well and bring to the boil. Cover and simmer very gently for about 20 minutes. Serve hot or cold. ; name: basic aioli ; ingredients: garlic cloves, egg yolks, extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, salt and pepper ; preparation:Mix the garlic in a food procesor. Add the egg and process until well mixed. With the motor running, slowly pour in half of the olive oil. Stop the machines and add the lemon juice. Then, with the motor running, slowly pour in the rest of the olive oil and process until the mixture is thickened and the oil is emulsified. Add salt and pepper to taste. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes, covered, and up to 12 hours before serving. This will allow the raw garlic flavor to mello. ; name: caldo de hongos ; ingredients: olive oil, mushroom, onion, garlic cloves, jalapenos, water, salt and pepper, cilantro ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large stockpot over medium heat. Add onions and saute for about 2 minutes. Add garlic and saute for another minute. Stir in jalapenos and mushrooms and cover pot, reducing heat to low. Let vegetables sweat for about 10 minutes, or until softened and juices are released from the mushrooms. Add water or broth, salt and pepper to taste, and cilantro. Bring to a boil, then serve immediately. ; name: shakshouka ; ingredients: onion, olive oil, garlic cloves, eggs, sweet red pepper, tomatoes, sweet paprika, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Saut the onions and garlic until soft in about a tablespoons of olive oil, flavoured with a grind of black pepper. This will take about 8 minutes. Meanwhile, grate the tomatoes using the coarsest grater you have. Add the tomatoes, peppers, paprika and mix well. Season to taste. Cover and simmer on a very low heat for 25 minutes. After 25 minutes, break the eggs on to the surface of the tomato mixture. Cover and cook for 4 minutes or until the eggs are done to your liking. Some cooks like to break the egg yolks and swirl them into the tomatoes. ; name: stir fried spinach with garlic and lemon zest ; ingredients: spinach, olive oil, lemon zest, garlic cloves, kosher salt, ground pepper ; preparation:Carefully rinse the spinach in several changes of water. Discard the tough stems and any damaged leaves, drain briefly in a colander, shaking off excess water. Over medium-high heat, in a deep saut pan or wok, combine the olive oil, lemon zest and garlic. After about 30 seconds, the garlic should begin to sizzle. Immediately stir in the damp spinach and using tongs or 2 wooden spoons, toss and stir quickly until wilted, 2 to 3 minutes. Transfer the spinach to a warmed serving dish and sprinkle with a pinch of salt and a few grinds of fresh pepper. Serve at once. ; name: spanish garlic soup ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, chicken broth, salt, pepper, bread cubes, egg ; preparation:

name: potatoes gourmet ; ingredients: potatoes, cheese, butter, sour cream, green onions, salt, pepper ; preparation:Boil potatoes in skins and cool, peel and grate. Combine with 4 tblsp butter, melted. Stir in cheese until almost melted. Blend with rest of the ingredients. Put in a 2 quart pan sprayed with cooking oil. Dot the top with 2 tblsp butter. Cover and bake at 300 about 25 minutes. ; name: boursin mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, boursin cheese, sour cream, milk, salt & freshly ground black pepper, butter ; preparation:Wash, peel and cut the potatoes into pieces. Boil in salted water until tender. Mash and add the cheese, sour cream, the milk if needed for creaminess, and salt and pepper. Place in a large pan, top with butter slices and bake at 325 degrees until hot. Broil a few minutes to get the top nice a browned. ; name: grams secret 24 hour potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, onion, milk, cheddar cheese, sour cream, salt, dry mustard, pepper ; preparation:Par boil peeled potatoes for 5 minutes. Do not let potatoes get cooked all the way through, potatoes should remain firm. Grate potatoes into shreds with box grater. In a large bowl mix potatoes, milk, onion, cheese, sour cream, salt, pepper and dry mustard. Pour mixture in to a 9 x 13 glass baking dish. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Remove dish from refrigerator 1 hour before baking. Bake at 350 for 45-50 minutes or until top becomes golden brown. ; name: toasted onion and garlic potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, milk, butter, onion, garlic, salt and pepper ; preparation:Leave skins on potatoes, cut into quarters. Boil till tender. While potatoes are boiling, saut garlic and onion in butter till browned. Drain potatoes and place in large bowl. Mix all ingredients with potatoes and stir, slightly mashing the potatoes. This should have a more mashed consistency than potato salad, but not mashed like mashed potatoes. ; name: baked it my way potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, oil, salt, sour cream, parsley, cheese ; preparation:Prick potatoes all over with a fork. Rub all over with oil and then with salt. Put on plate, cook in microwave on high for 6 minutes, stand for 10 minutes. Slice top neatly off. Scoop out potatoe with teaspoon, leave shell intact. Mash it with sour cream and parsley. Spoon it back into shell. Put cheese on top. Cook on high for 90 seconds. ; name: the best baked potato casserole ever ; ingredients: potatoes, salt, pepper, bacon, sour cream, cheddar cheese, green onions ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 13 x 9 x 2 inch baking dish with nonstick pan coating or grease lightly with solid shortening. Cut baked potatoes into 1 inch cubes. Place half in a prepared baking dish. Sprinkle half of the salt, pepper and bacon. Top with half of the sour cream & cheese. Repeat layers. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 20 minutes or until cheese is melted. Sprinkle with chopped green onions to garnish. ; name: kicked up bacon cheese mashed potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, salt, half-and-half, butter, pepper, bacon, sharp cheddar cheese, sour cream, chives ; preparation:Place potatoes and 1 tsp salt in a saucepan, cover with water, bring to a boil. Reduce heat to simmer. Cook until potatoes are tender, about 20 minutes. Drain, return to pot. Add half and half, butter, remaining salt, pepper. Place pan over medium low heat, mash for 4-5 minutes. Add bacon, cheese, sour cream, chives and stir. ; name: sour cream and chive potato bake ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, cream, parmesan cheese, cheddar cheese, chives, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: orange almond scallops ; ingredients: orange juice, soy sauce, garlic cloves, sea scallops, green pepper, toasted almonds, cooked rice, orange zest ; preparation:Mix the orange juice, soy sauce and garlic together. Add scallops. Toss to coat. Put in the fridge for about 1 hour. Preheat the george foreman grill for 5 minutes. Drain scallops, discarding the marinade. Spray both sides of the grill with non-stick cooking spray. Place scallops and peppers on grill. Grill 3 minutes or until scallops or opaque. Remove scallops and continue grilling peppers about 1 minute longer. Mix the almonds and cooked rice together. Serve the scallops and peppers on rice garnished with orange peel. ; name: apple cheese salad ; ingredients: red apples, fresh lemon juice, celery, swiss cheese, mayonnaise, prepared mustard, salt and pepper, lettuce leaf, filberts ; preparation:Put apples in a serving dish. Sprinkle with lemon juice. Add celery and cheese. Mix mayonnaise and mustard. Season with salt and pepper. Add to apple mixture. Refrigerate 1 hour to blend flavors. Serve in lettuce cups sprinkled with nuts. ; name: macaroni chicken salad ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, cooked chicken, fresh broccoli florets, mandarin orange segments, honey mustard dressing, sliced almonds, lettuce leaves ; preparation:Cook macaroni as package directs. Drain. In a large bowl, combine all ingredients except almonds. Mix well. Top with almonds. Cover. Chill thoroughly. Serve on lettuce. Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: thalhimers chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken breasts, celery, lemon juice, mayonnaise, white pepper, salt ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine chicken, celery, lemon juice and mayonnaise. Stir to blend. Add pepper and salt and mix thoroughly. Chill before serving. 8 servings. ; name: cherry chicken salad sandwich ; ingredients: cooked chicken, dried cherries, pecans, green onions, mayonnaise, plain yogurt, lemon juice, fresh ground black pepper, lettuce leaf, plain croissants ; preparation:Combine chicken, cherries, pecans, and onion in a bowl. Mix mayo, yogurt, and lemon juice. Pour over chicken mixture. Toss to mix. Refrigerate salad for 1-2 hours. Split croissants and divide chicken evenly. Sprinkle with black pepper before serving. ; name: crunchy sweet and sour salad ; ingredients: walnuts, ramen noodles, unsalted butter, broccoli, romaine lettuce, green onion, vegetable oil, sugar, red wine vinegar, soy sauce ; preparation:Melt butter in skillet and brown walnuts & ramen noodles. Cool on paper towels. Combine browned noodles and walnuts with broccoli, lettuce, and onions in large serving bowl. Whisk remaining four ingredients together in mixing bowl. Dress salad when ready to serve. ; name: avocado open facers ; ingredients: mayonnaise, lemon juice, whole wheat bread, avocado, lettuce, tomatoes, cooked bacon, thousand island dressing, pickle, olive ; preparation:Combine mayonnaise and half the lemon juice. Spread on one side of each slice toast. Brush avocado with remaining lemon juice. Place leaf lettuce, tomato slices, and avocado slices on toast. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Crisscross 2 bacon slices atop each. Spoon on thousand island dressing. Garnish plate with pickles and olives. ; name: two sisters chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, celery, onion, salt, lemon juice, seedless grapes, mayonnaise, mandarin oranges, toasted almond, romaine lettuce ; preparation:

name: birthday cookie ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, sugar, egg, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips ; preparation:Cream butter and sugars. Add egg and vanilla. Mix on low speed, add dry ingredients. Mix well. Stir in chocolate chips or m&ms. Spray a 12 inch round pizza pan with pam and spread cookie dough evenly to the edges. Bake at 325 degrees f for 15 to 20 minutes, or until light golden brown. When cool, decorate as desired. ; name: gold medal chocolate chippers ; ingredients: butter, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, baking soda, salt, flour, chocolate chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Cream softened butter with sugars. Add eggs and vanilla and mix well. Add soda, salt and half of flour and mix until well incorporated. Add remaining flour gradually and mix until well incorporated. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop by rounded tablespoon full onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 12-15 minutes until edges are done and centers are still a little chewy. Cool on cookie sheet about 2 minutes. Remove to wire rack to cool completely. ; name: chocolate chip blondies ; ingredients: brown sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla extract, flour, baking powder, salt, milk chocolate chips ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine brown sugar, butter, eggs and vanilla just until blended. Combine flour, baking powder and salt. Add to brown sugar mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Spread into a a greased 13x9 pan. Bake at 350 for 18-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. Cut into bars. ; name: mother s scratch cake ; ingredients: eggs, vegetable oil, sugar, self-rising flour, vanilla, milk, cocoa ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease 13x9 inch pan and lightly flour. Mix eggs, oil, and sugar in large bowl with a fork. Add flour and milk in small amounts at a time. Add flavoring. Mix batter with a fork about 2 minutes. Pour batter into the pan. Bake for 30 to 40 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean or cake springs back when lightly touched in the center. ; name: absolutely best brownies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, cocoa, salt, self-rising flour, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease and flour a 9 x 9-inch pan. In a bowl, beat together the butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix well. Combine the cocoa, salt, and flour together. Stir into the sugar mixture. Stir in the walnuts. Spread evenly into prepared pan. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until firm. ; name: old farmer s almanac butterscotch icebox cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, salt, baking powder, nuts ; preparation:Cream together butter and brown sugar until light. Add egg and vanilla, and mix well. Stir together flour, salt, and baking powder and add to sugar-egg-butter mix, mixing well. Stir in nuts. Form dough into a 2-inch-diameter log and wrap in foil or waxed paper. Chill for 12 to 24 hours. Slice and bake on ungreased cookie sheets at 400 degrees f for 8 to 10 minutes. ; name: aunt georgia s shortbread cookies ; ingredients: butter, light brown sugar, sugar, egg yolks, vanilla, flour ; preparation:Cream together butter and sugars. Add in egg yolks and vanilla. Gradually add in flour. Roll teaspoon sized balls onto ungreased cookie sheets. Flatten with tines of a fork the way you would peanut butter cookies. Sprinkle with colored sugars or sprinkles if desired. Bake at 375 degrees for 8 minutes. ; name: milo choc chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla essence, self-raising flour, chocolate chips, milo ; preparation:

name: lemon marmalade cranberry sauce ; ingredients: cranberries, sugar, orange juice, lemon zest, water, lemon marmalade ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, combine first 5 ingredients and simmer over medium heat for 10-15 minutes until berries pop, stirring often. Reduce heat to medium low, stir in marmalade and cook for 5 more minutes. Set aside to cool, stirring occasionally. Transfer to glass bowl and refrigerate until chilled. Will keep refrigerated for up to 2 weeks. ; name: light cranberry pear sauce ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, bartlett pears, sugar, cranberry-grape juice, dried cherries, cinnamon ; preparation:In a medium-size, heavy-bottom non-aluminum saucepan, combine cranberries, pears, sugar, dried cherries, cinnamon and juice. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Reduce to a simmer and cook, stirring frequently to prevent scorching, until berries have popped and are tender, about 10 minutes. Cool to room temperature. Cover and refrigerate until chilled. ; name: triple cranberry sauce ; ingredients: frozen cranberry juice concentrate, sugar, fresh cranberries, dried cranberries, orange marmalade, fresh orange juice, orange zest, allspice ; preparation:Combine juice concentrate and sugar in a saucepan. Bring to a boil over high heat, stirring until sugar dissolves. Add fresh and dried cranberries and cook until dried berries soften and fresh berries begin to pop, stirring often. Remove from heat and stir in marmalade, juice, orange zest and allspice. Cool completely. Cover and chill at least 2 hours. Can be made 3 days ahead. ; name: pink chum pagne ; ingredients: water, caster sugar, pineapple juice, orange juice, cranberry juice, lemonade ; preparation:Mix the water with the sugar in a jug. Stir until sugar is almost disolved. Add the orange and pineapple juice. Stir for 5 seconds. Add cranberry juice. Fill to brim with lemonade. ; name: fresh banana berry shake ; ingredients: bananas, strawberry, fresh orange juice, low-fat vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Combine first 3 ingredients in a blender. Process until smooth. Add ice cream. Process until smooth. Pour into glasses. Serve immediately. ; name: slow cooker cranberry sauce ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, sugar, water, lime zest ; preparation:Combine the cranberries, sugar and water in the slow cooker. Cover and cook on high for 2 to 2. 5 hours. The cranberries will have popped open. Stir the zest into the hot sauce. Turn off the cooker, remove the lid, and let cool in the crock to room temperature. When cooled store covered in the refrigerator for up to 3 weeks. Serve chilled or at room temperature. If you use frozen cranberries, add 30 to 45 minutes cooking time. ; name: cranberry citrus vodka slush ; ingredients: cranberry juice, fresh orange juice, vodka, fresh lime juice, grand marnier, lime zest, orange slice, fresh cranberries ; preparation:In a plastic container with a lid, combine all ingredients. Seal and place in the freezer until frozen solid. Take out of freezer and let thaw. Drink when it has thawed and is slushy. Or put in blender and blend until slushy. Garnish with fresh cranberries, zest of a lime or an orange slice. ; name: white cranberry peach banana smoothie ; ingredients: cranberry-peach juice, banana, vanilla yogurt, ice ; preparation:

name: browned butter frosting ; ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, salt, milk, vanilla extract ; preparation:In a small saucepan over moderately low heat, melt 1 stick of the butter. Continue heating, swirling the pan to prevent burning, until the butter turns nut brown. Transfer the butter to a medium bowl. Using an electric mixer on low speed, gradually blend in the powdered sugar and salt alternately with the milk and vanilla, until the frosting is smooth. Beat in the remaining butter, bit by bit. Refrigerate until mixture is cool and thick enough to spread. Keep frosted cake or cupcakes refridgerated, since the frosting has a tendency to soften and drip off the sides if it gets too warm. ; name: cream cheese candy ; ingredients: pecans, butter, cream cheese, powdered sugar, vanilla ; preparation:Put pecans & butter in oven and toast about 15 minutes at 300f. Melt cream cheese over low heat until creamy. Add powdered sugar, vanilla and nuts. Mix very well. Put in fridge until set. ; name: sorority chocolate fudge ; ingredients: granulated sugar, margarine, evaporated milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, milk chocolate chips, marshmallow creme, nuts, vanilla ; preparation:Cream margarine and sugar with wooden spoon in 6 quart saucepan. Mixing thoroughly, stir in milk over medium heat. Evenly work from bottom of pan. Cook to full rolling boil. If using candy thermometer, cook to 230 degrees. If not, cook 7 minutes from start of full rolling boil, still stirring constantly. Remove from heat and add marshmallow creme, chocolate chips and vanilla. Beat until very think and creamy. Pour into an 11x16 tray which has been lightly and evenly buttered. ; name: granny s fudge ; ingredients: sugar, butter, evaporated milk, chocolate chips, miniature marshmallows, walnuts, vanilla extract ; preparation:Combine the sugar, butter and milk in large saucepan. Let boil stirring frequently at medium heat until soft ball stage. Add chocolate chips. Remove from heat. Stir until chips dissolve. Add marshmallows, walnuts and vanilla. Stir well. Pour into 9 x 13 pan. Put in refrigerator to cool. Cut when hard. ; name: can t fail fudge ; ingredients: sugar, butter, evaporated milk, marshmallows, chocolate chips, walnuts, vanilla ; preparation:Mix first 3 ingredients in a 2-quart saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil stirring entire time. Boil until candy thermometer hits 234 degrees, stirring entire time. Remove from heat and add remaining ingredients. Stir until chocolate and marshmallows are dissolved. Pour in buttered 8x8 pan. Chill 30 minutes, cut with buttered knife. Chill again until set. ; name: easy walnut butterscotch fudge ; ingredients: evaporated milk, marshmallow creme, sugar, butter, vanilla extract, butterscotch chips, walnuts ; preparation:Line an 8 inch square pan with nonstick aluminum foil, letting the ends entend over the pan on 2 sides. In a medium nonstick saucepan, combine the evaporated milk, marshmallow creme, sugar and butter. Bring to a boil over med-high heat, stirring constantly to prevent scorching. Reduce heat to medium and boil for 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from heat and stir in chips until melted. Stir in vanilla and walnuts until blended. Pour mixture into the prepared, foiled pan. Chill about 2 hours or until firm. Lift foil by ends out of the pan and transfer fudge onto a cutting board and cut into squares. Store in refrigerator. ; name: chocolate syrup sauce ; ingredients: sugar, cocoa powder, butter, salt, real vanilla, evaporated milk, half-and-half, cream ; preparation:Mix the cocoa powder, pinch of salt, and the sugar together evenly. Stir in the condensed milk. Put in a pan or double boiler along with the butter, and turn on the heat to medium. Bring to boil for a minute or so. Be sure to stir constantly, or else it will get scorched on the bottom. Turn off the heat and let it cool. As the syrup is cooling down, stir in the teaspoon of real vanilla. Great on ice cream, but this stuff is delicious enough to eat straight. ; name: noel pecan logs ; ingredients: powdered sugar, marshmallow cream, vanilla, caramels, margarine, pecans ; preparation:

name: silverbeet swiss chard and mushroom pie ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic cloves, mushrooms, silver beet, nutmeg, salt & freshly ground black pepper, eggs, thickened cream, low-fat swiss cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over a moderate heat. Saute the onion and garlic for 5 mins or until soft. Add the mushrooms and saute for another 2 minutes. Add the silverbeet, nutmeg and season. Cover the saucepan and cook until the silverbeet wilts. Remove from the heat, stir the silverbeet through the mushrooms and drain any excess moisture. Transfer the silverbeet mixture into a large 6 cup capacity baking dish. Whisk the eggs and cream together, season and stir through the grated cheese, then pour the egg mixture over the silverbeet mixture, swirl the egg mixture through the silverbeet using a fork. Bake the pie for 40 mins or until golden and set. Allow to cool slightly before slicing. ; name: best cream of broccoli soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, garlic clove, celery, chicken broth, broccoli, flour, milk, pepper, velveeta cheese ; preparation:Melt 2 tablespoons butter in medium sized stock pot, and saut onion, garlic and celery until tender. Add broccoli and broth. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Pure soup or mash with potato masher. Return to heat. In small saucepan, over medium heat melt 3 tablespoons butter, stir in flour and add milk. Stir until thick and bubbly, add to soup. Add cheese. Stir until melted. Season with pepper and serve. ; name: i did it my way creamed spinach ; ingredients: butter, garlic clove, unbleached flour, vegetable broth, half-and-half, baby spinach, salt, fresh nutmeg ; preparation:In a saucepan over medium heat melt the butter. Add the garlic and cook, stirring about 15 seconds. Stir in the flour using wire whisk until the flour is absorbed. Add the broth and half and half. Continue to cook and stir with whisk until no lumps remain. Add a pinch of nutmeg then the chopped spinach and salt. Cook, stirring frequently just until the spinach is wilted about 3 minutes. Serve with a smile. ; name: grilled brie sandwiches with greens and garlic ; ingredients: garlic cloves, olive oil, fresh spinach, brie cheese, whole wheat bread, margarine ; preparation:In a large skillet cook garlic in hot oil for 30 seconds. Add spinach. Cook over medium heat, tossing till spinach begins to wilt. Remove from heat and set aside. Divide the cheese among 4 slices of the bread. Top with spinach-garlic mixture. Cover with remaining bread slices. Lightly butter the outside of each sandwich. In a large skillet cook half of the sandwiches over medium-low heat for 5 to 7 minutes or till golden brown. Turn sandwich and cook for 2 minutes more or till golden brown and cheese melts. Transfer to a warm oven. Repeat with remaining sandwiches. ; name: garlic parsley frittata ; ingredients: milk, eggs, fresh parsley, garlic clove, dried chili pepper flakes, white bread, salt & pepper, olive oil, fresh parmesan cheese ; preparation:Beat together milk, eggs, parsley, garlic & chilli flakes. Add the torn bread and season with salt & pepper. Set aside for 5 mins so that the bread completely softens into the mixture. Heat the oil in a fry-pan & pour in the egg mixture. Cook for 3 mins or until golden & almost set. Flip the frittata & scatter with parmesan, cook until the underside is golden and the cheese has melted. ; name: sensible linguine alfredo ; ingredients: water, all-purpose flour, garlic cloves, low-sodium instant chicken bouillon granules, ground black pepper, ground nutmeg, parmesan cheese, plain low-fat yogurt, fresh linguine, fresh parsley ; preparation:Combine water, flour, garlic, bouillon, pepper and nutmeg in large, nonstick skillet. Stir until smooth. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, for 8 to 10 minutes or until mixture boils and thickens. Remove from heat. Stir in cheese and yogurt. Prepare pasta according to package directions. Add pasta to skillet. Toss to coat. Sprinkle with parsley. Serve immediately. ; name: tomato florentine ; ingredients: frozen chopped spinach, parmesan cheese, olive oil, japanese-style bread crumbs, onion, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, ground nutmeg, whole tomatoes ; preparation:Drain spinach well, pressing between paper towels. Combine parmesan cheese, 1 tablespoons olive oil, and 2 tablespoons breadcrumbs in a small bowl. Cook onion in remaining 1 tablespoons hot oil in a medium skillet over medium heat 5 minutes or until tender. Add garlic, and cook 1 more minute. Stir in spinach, and cook 2 minutes or until thoroughly heated. Remove from heat, and stir in salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Place tomatoes in a 9-inch square baking dish. Spoon spinach mixture evenly over tomatoes. Sprinkle with breadcrumb mixture. Bake at 400 for 25 minutes or until golden brown. Serve immediately. ; name: spinach cheese casserole ; ingredients: frozen spinach, onion, garlic cloves, butter, eggs, low fat cottage cheese, all-purpose flour, low-fat sharp cheddar cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: tropical green beans ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh green beans, yellow onion, garlic cloves, salt, balsamic vinegar, hearts of palm, sun-dried tomato, pine nuts, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature. ; name: wilted greens with garlic and balsamic vinegar ; ingredients: swiss chard, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Cut the greens into strips 1 inch wide. In a large saute pan over medium-high heat, warm the olive oil. Add the greens and using tongs, toss them until they are wilted but still retain their bright colour, about 3-4 minutes. Add the vinegar, garlic, red pepper flakes, salt and black pepper to taste and toss well. Transfer to a warmed serving bowl and serve immediately. ; name: lemon pepper capellini ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, light butter, garlic cloves, coarse black pepper, lemons, salt, capellini, basil leaves, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place water on to boil for pasta. In a large skillet combine olive oil and butter over medium heat. Add garlic, pepper and the lemon zest. Salt water when it boils then cook cappellini to al dente, 2 to 3 minutes. Add a ladle of cooking water to lemon pepper butter and stir in the lemon juice. Drain pasta and toss with lemon-pepper butter and salt, to taste. Add the basil to the pasta and serve a small bundle alongside your entree or serve as a delicate first course. ; name: slow cooked garlic and onions with toasted baguette ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, onions, anchovy fillets, fresh rosemary leaf, baguette, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add garlic and onion. Cook, stirring, for 6 minutes or until onion has softened. Add anchovies and rosemary. Stir to combine, then cover, reduce heat to low and cook for 20 minutes or until onion and garlic are very soft. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Preheat grill to high. Split baguette in half lengthways and cut widthways into 8cm pieces. Toast under grill until golden brown. Top with garlic and onion and serve. ; name: vegan white bean aioli ; ingredients: navy beans, lemon juice, salt, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil, garlic cloves ; preparation:Combine the beans, lemon juice, salt and pepper in a blender or food processor and puree until smooth, scraping down the sides of the bowl to get everything. Preheat a small pan over low heat. Cook the garlic in the olive oil for about 3 minutes. Add the garlic and oil to the mixture in the blender and puree. Taste for salt, pepper and lemon and adjust to your liking. Transfer to a container, cover and refrigerate until ready to use. ; name: garlic broccoli spears ; ingredients: fresh broccoli, extra virgin olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Set florets into a saucepan with a very small amount of water, cover with lid, and let steam until tender, about 5-10 minutes or so- it should still be bright green, but fork tender. Meanwhile, combine remaining ingredients in a small bowl. Drain broccoli and place in serving dish. Pour lemon mixture over broccoli and toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: chicken estufao ; ingredients: chicken, garlic cloves, onion, rice vinegar, salt, fresh ground black pepper, peanut oil, soy sauce, water ; preparation:Combine chicken, garlic, onion, vinegar, salt, and pepper in a bowl and mix well. Remove chicken, reserving liquid. Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat. Add chicken and cook 3 minutes. Reduce heat and add soy sauce, water, and reserved liquid. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes, or until chicken is falling off the bones. ; name: healthy spinach and cannellini bean dip ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, spinach, cannellini beans, lemon juice, balsamic vinegar, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: nora ephron s bacon hash ; ingredients: bacon, potato, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cut bacon into small pieces, then cook over low flame in skillet. Meanwhile, dice up the cooked potato and, after some fat is rendered from the bacon, add to the skillet. Cook until the potatos are crusty brown. Season with salt and pepper. Eat with an egg, if you like. ; name: tomato onion quiche ; ingredients: onion, tomatoes, eggs, yogurt, milk, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh basil, sharp cheddar cheese, pastry shells ; preparation:Spread onion and tomato in a 9-inch pastry shell. Mix eggs, yogurt, milk, salt, pepper and basil. Pour into pastry shell. Sprinkle cheese over top. Bake at 400 degrees ot 10 minutes. Then bake at 350 degrees for 35-40 minutes or until a knife comes out clean. Let sit for 5 minutes before serving. ; name: scalloped creole green beans ; ingredients: bacon, onion, celery, green bell pepper, diced tomatoes, salt, pepper, sugar, american cheese, green beans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Fry bacon until crisp and set aside. Saute onion, celery, and bell pepper in bacon drippings until transparent. Transfer onion mixture to a medium sauce pan and add tomatoes, salt, pepper, and sugar. Cook, covered over low heat for 1 hour. Add cheese to sauce mixture and stir until melted. Place green beans in casserole dish, crumble bacon over beans, and pour sauce over top. Bake, uncovered for 1 hour. ; name: ham egg cheese cups ; ingredients: eggs, ham, frozen spinach, cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Spray muffin tin with cooking spray. Press a slice of ham into each muffin cup. Evenly distribute spinach between muffins cups. Evenly distribute cheese between muffin cups. Crack 1 egg to each muffin cup. Season with salt and pepper. Bake for 25 min or until done. ; name: pan haggerty ; ingredients: bacon fat, potatoes, onions, cheddar cheese, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Melt the fat over low heat in a heavy frying pan and make sure that it covers the entire surface of the pan. Fill the pan with alternate layers of potatoes, onions and cheese, beginning and ending with a layer of potatoes. Season each layer with a little salt and pepper. Fry gently for about 30 minutes, then broil for 5 to 10 minutes until the top is well browned. Serve straight from the frying pan. ; name: panini with scrambled eggs and tomatoes ; ingredients: eggs, milk, salt, fresh black pepper, olive oil, pesto sauce, panini bread, tomatoes, provolone cheese ; preparation:In a bowl, mix eggs, milk, salt and pepper. In a skillet, heat oil at medium heat. Add the mixture of egg and cook, stirring often, until it makes big creamy pieces. Spread pesto in the panini, add scrambled eggs and garnish with slices of tomatoes and cheese. Heat another large skillet or a skillet with ridges at medium heat. Add panini and cook, pushing them, for about 8 minutes or until golden and crispy and cheese has melted. ; name: ted kennedy s favorite lobster salad ; ingredients: corn, lobster meat, tomatoes, avocados, mayonnaise, milk, fresh dill, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook the corn and then scrape off the kernels over a bowl and set aside. Put the tomatoes, avocado and corn into a bowl and add the lobster meat and toss gently. In a small bowl, combine the mayonnaise, with the milk and mix until smooth. Sprinkle the lobster mixture with dill, salt and pepper, then add the mayonnaise mixture and stir briefly so the sauce barely holds the rest of the ingredients together. Cover and refrigerate for a few hours before serving. ; name: salt cod with scrambled eggs ; ingredients: salt cod fish, bacon, green pepper, tomatoes, eggs, black pepper ; preparation:

name: spicy thai one pot ; ingredients: cold water, soy sauce, cayenne pepper, meat, red bell pepper, jasmine rice, green onions, cilantro ; preparation:Combine water, soy sauce and cayenne pepper. Heat large wok or fry pan over high heat. Add meat and stir fry for 4-5 minutes or until browned. Add bell pepper. Stir fry for one more minute. Mix in rice and soy sauce mixture. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. Mix in green onions and cilantro. Serve. ; name: spicy oriental chicken ; ingredients: chicken breast, green peppers, onion, flour, sugar, soy sauce, hot chinese chili paste, chicken stock, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cut chicken into a 1-2 inch size and season with salt and pepper. Place the chicken in a bowl and evenly coat with flour. Slice green peppers and onion into strips. Combine sugar, soy sauce, chili paste and chicken stock or water in a small bowl. Heat a saute pan with olive oil. Place chicken and brown both sides. Add green pepper and onion strips, put a lid and cook until chicken is heated through and the onion and pepper strips become tender. Add the seasoning mixture and cook until heated through. Serve immediately. ; name: roasted serrano salsa ; ingredients: serrano chilies, tomatoes, red onions, orange juice, yellow bell peppers, cilantro, rice vinegar, salt, sugar ; preparation:In a cast iron skillet over medium high heat cook the seranos until blackened. Remove half of the blackened skin and discard. Chop the chilies. Combine the chopped chilies with the remaining ingredients. Let stand 1 hour. Cover and refrigerate. ; name: southwestern pan seared corn ; ingredients: vegetable oil, corn, red bell pepper, red onion, poblano pepper, ground cumin, black olives, cilantro, fresh lime juice, salt ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add corn before oil smokes and saute 2-3 minutes until lightly browned. Place corn in a mixing bowl and set aside. Add peppers and onions to skillet and cook 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add cumin and cook another 1-2 minutes. Turn heat to low, stir in remaining ingredients. Toss with corn and serve. ; name: izakaya sakura avocado tofu salad ; ingredients: avocado, lime juice, tofu, green onions, sesame oil, soy sauce, tomatoes ; preparation:Chop green onion and mix with soy sauce and sesame oil. Mash avocado with fork. Add lime juice to keep avocado from turning brown. Cut tofu into bite-sized pieces and top with avocado, then mix in green onions. Serve with thinly sliced tomatoes. ; name: grilled skewered sea scallops ; ingredients: fresh lime juice, olive oil, garlic clove, ground cumin, chili powder, salt, cayenne pepper, sea scallops, cherry tomatoes, lime ; preparation:Whisk lime juice, oil, garlic, cumin, chili powder, salt, and cayenne together in small bowl. Thread scallops and tomatoes alternately on 4 skewers. Place on platter and drizzle with marinade. Cover and refrigerate, basting once with marinade, about 30 minutes. Prepare charcoal for grilling or heat broiler. Grill or broil skewers, basting with marinade but not turning, just until scallops are cooked through, 5-7 minutes. Place lime wedge on each skewer and serve. ; name: sweet pea guacamole ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh lime juice, cilantro, jalapenos, frozen peas, cumin, salt, red onion ; preparation:In a food processor, process onion until finely diced. Remove and set aside. Add oil, lime juice, cilantro and pepper until roughly pureed. Add peas, cumin and salt. Blend until smooth, there will still be a few lumps, leave them. Remove mixture to bowl and stir in onion. ; name: roasted eggplant dip with thai flavors ; ingredients: eggplant, palm sugar, soy sauce, salt, chili paste, lime juice, fresh cilantro, green onions, cilantro leaf ; preparation:

name: mushrooms paprika houby paprikas ; ingredients: butter, onion, mixed mushrooms, salt & freshly ground black pepper, paprika, cayenne pepper, sour cream, fresh dill, rice ; preparation:Heat a large saucepan over a low heat and add the butter. When the butter has melted, add the onion and cook until soft and translucent. Add the mushrooms, season with salt and pepper to taste, then increase the heat and stir. When the moisture from the mushrooms has been released, allow it to evaporate, concentrating the flavour. This might happen quickly or slowly, depending entirely on the type of mushrooms used. Add teh paprika and cayenne and fry for a few moments longer, until the paprika turns a shade darker. Finally, add teh sour cream or creme fraiche and dill, and allow it to bubbvle gently for a further 5 minutes or so. Serve immediately with rice, pasta or spatzle. ; name: warm chanterelle salad ; ingredients: chanterelle mushrooms, butter, salt, fresh ground black pepper, dill, romaine lettuce, lettuce, rocket, olive oil, white balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Clean the mushrooms, place them in a saucepan and sweat them dry. Strain them and allow them to drip completely dry through a sieve. Then saut them golden brown in butter and season them with salt and black pepper. Wash the lettuces and let them drip dry. Tear them up into a bowl and dress them with olive oil, salt and balsamic vinegar just prior to serving. Put the mixed salad in mounds on the plates and lay the mushrooms on them directly from the pan. Garnish with onion flowers, crown dill, dill sprigs or chopped dill. ; name: white asparagus with chanterelles ; ingredients: white asparagus, chanterelle mushroom, shallot, fresh lemon juice, salt & pepper, butter ; preparation:Boil asparagus on stovetop for 5 minutes, or microwave for 1 minute. In large saute pan melt 3 tbsp butter. Add shallots, saute 2 minutes. Add mushrooms, saute 3 minutes. Melt in additional butter, add asparagus, toss to coat. Sprinkle with lemon juice, season to taste with s&p, serve. ; name: asparagus steamed in a paper bag ; ingredients: asparagus, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, bay leaf, sea salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 with rack placed in the center position. Place asparagus in a brown paper bag large enough to hold the asparagus comfortably. Drizzle with oil to prevent the bag from burning. Add the lemon slices and bay leaf. Season with salt and pepper. Close the bag by folding it over several times and creasing the folds well to retain the steam in the bag. Place bag on a baking sheet, and drizzle with more olive oil. Bake for 20 minutes. Shake bag a few times before carefully opening. Transfer asparagus to platter. Drizzle with more oil. Serve immediately. ; name: easy baked asparagus ; ingredients: asparagus, olive oil, kosher salt, black pepper, lemon, juice of ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375-400f. Remove fibrous end pieces of the asparagus. Lay asparagus across shallow baking dish and add oil, salt, lemon juice, and pepper. Roll and toss to coat well. Arrange the oiled asparagus in the pan so they do not overlap. Bake in oven 20 minutes. ; name: asparagus with lemon butter ; ingredients: salt, fresh asparagus, butter, seasoned rice vinegar, lemon, zest of ; preparation:Heat salted water to a boil in a large saucepa. Add asparagus. Cook just until tender, about 5 minutes, depending on size. Drain well, shaking to remove all water. Transfer to a serving bowl. Lightly toss with butter, vinegar, lemon zest, and salt to taste. ; name: parmesan roasted asparagus ; ingredients: fresh asparagus, olive oil, kosher salt, ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, lemon wedge ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Wash and trim the asparagus stalks arrange asparagus in a single layer on a cookie sheet and drizzle with the olive oil. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Roast for 15-20 minutes until tender. Sprinkle with the parmesan and return to the oven for about one more minute. Serve with lemon wedges. ; name: roasted asparagus shiitake mushrooms ; ingredients: fresh asparagus, shiitake mushroom, extra virgin olive oil, coarse salt, balsamic vinegar, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: healthier no bake chocolate oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: sugar, cocoa, milk, salt, peanut butter, butter, vanilla extract, rolled oats ; preparation:Mix sugar, cocoa, milk and salt in saucepan. Boil for one minute. Add peanut butter, butter, and vanilla to hot mixture. Stir until combined. Stir in oats thoroughly and drop by spoonfuls onto waxed paper. Cool thoroughly before removing from paper. ; name: sweetened condensed milk coconut cookies candy ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, shredded coconut, vanilla extract, salt ; preparation:Heat oven to 375. Grease a baking sheet. Mix all ingredients. Drop by teaspoons, onto baking sheet. Bake for 15 minutes. While hot, remove from the sheet. ; name: gluten free no bake cookies chocolate peanut butter and oats ; ingredients: honey, unsweetened cocoa, salt, coconut oil, milk, peanut butter, gluten-free oats, vanilla ; preparation:Combine the first 5 ingredients in a saucepan. Bring to a boil and continue to cook over a gentle boil for 90 seconds. Remove from heat. Add peanut butter and stir to melt. Add oats and vanilla and stir thoroughly to mix. Drop by rounded tablespoon onto nonstick surface. Transfer to refrigerator and cool till set. May sub almond milk for milk for dairy-free version. May sub agave nectar for honey for vegan version. May sub sunflower seed butter or almond butter for peanut butter. ; name: cherry blossom fudge ; ingredients: evaporated milk, white sugar, salt, cherry gelatin, butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla extract, maraschino cherry ; preparation:Butter an 8x8 inch pan. In a medium saucepan over medium heat, combine milk, sugar and salt. Bring to a boil and stir in gelatin. Boil 4 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in butter, chocolate chips, vanilla and cherries. Pour into prepared pan. Chill 2 hours before serving. ; name: oatmeal porridge with raisins apricots and figs ; ingredients: water, quick-cooking rolled oats, raisins, dried apricot, dried figs, sugar, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, ground cardamom, salt ; preparation:Add water to a saucepan. Bring to a boil. Stir in the oats, raisins, apricots, figs, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, cardamom, and salt. Bring to a boil. Lower heat to med-low. Simmer, uncovered, for about 5-10 minutes or until the liquid is absorbed and the fruit softened. ; name: german chocolate sauce ; ingredients: butter, sweet baking chocolate, granulated sugar, vanilla extract, salt, evaporated milk ; preparation:In a small saucepan, melt butter and chocolate over low heat, stirring constantly until melted. Stir in sugar, vanilla, salt, and milk. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Cook 7 minutes, stirring constantly. Serve warm over ice cream or pound cake. The amount of time will vary with the amount of sauce being reheated. ; name: incredible granola bars ; ingredients: rolled oats, oat bran, brown sugar, sunflower oil, honey, salt, cocoa nibs, dried banana ; preparation:Mix all ingredients thoroughly,. Press into an oiled 9 inch square tray,. And bake for 20-25 minutes at 350 degrees. Allow to cool before cutting into bars. Will keep for weeks stored in airtight container in fridge. Also freezes well. ; name: coconut cream oatmeal ; ingredients: flaked coconut, morton lite salt, water, quick-cooking oats, fat-free sweetened condensed milk, coconut extract ; preparation:

name: chicken with orange and cranberry sauce ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, chicken broth, orange peel, dry white wine, dried fruit, dried cranberries, orange juice, cornstarch, water, green onion ; preparation:Place frozen breasts in 12 inch frying pan and add all ingredients except cornstarch, water, and onions. Bring to boil over medium high heat. Reduce heat and simmer until meat is no longer pink in center of thickest part - about 20 minutes total. Transfer chicken to platter and keep warm. Boil pan juices over high heat, uncovered, 3 or 4 minutes. Mix cornstarch with water and add to sauce. Stirring until it boils. Moisten chicken with sauce and serve over rice. Sprinkle chicken with minced green onions. ; name: chicken and watercress soup ; ingredients: chicken breast, shiitake mushrooms, watercress, chicken stock, salt, cornflour, rice wine, pepper, sesame oil ; preparation:Marinate chicken with salt, cornflour and rice wine, pepper and sesame oil. Bring chicken stock to boil in a saucepan. Add in the mushrooms and cook for 2 minutes. Add in the chicken and stir to separate the chicken slices. When soup starts to boil, add in the watercress and stir. Cook for 1-2 minutes. Remove and serve in a soup bowl. ; name: armenian lemon rice pilaf ; ingredients: butter, long grain rice, lemon zest, white pepper, chicken broth, lemon juice, fresh parsley, lemon ; preparation:Melt butter in a skillet. Add rice and stir, about 2 minutes, making sure grains are nicely coated with butter. Add lemon zest, pepper, and the broth. Simmer uncovered over low heat for about 40 minutes, or until the liquid has absorbed and rice in tender. Remove from heat. Add lemon juice and stir. Let stand 5 minutes. Garnish with lemon slices to serve. ; name: stir fried cashew chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, soy sauce, dry sherry, garlic granules, cornstarch, peanuts, fresh snow peas, carrot, cashews, rice noodles ; preparation:Thoroughly combine soy sauce, sherry, garlic and cornstarch, and set aside. Heat oil in a hot wok or large skillet until just smoking. Add chicken and stir-fry over high heat until browned on all sides. Add vegetables, and continue cooking until vegetables are just cooked and still crisp. Reduce heat, add soy sauce mixture, and continue cooking until sauce is thickened. Stir in cashews, and serve over hot rice noodles or rice. ; name: chipotle copycat recipe cilantro lime rice ; ingredients: long grain white rice, water, bay leaf, cilantro, olive oil, lime, salt ; preparation:Rinse rice well until water runs clear. Combine rice, water and bay leaf in a pot, cover it and bring it to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer about 18 minutes. Fluff with a fork and stir in cilantro. Add oil, lime juice and salt together, stir well. Taste and adjust- might need more lime or salt. ; name: coconut ginger rice ; ingredients: chicken broth, reduced-fat coconut milk, ginger, rice, fresh lemon rind, green onions, flaked coconut, lemon slice ; preparation:Heat broth, coconut milk and ginger to boiling in saucepan over medium-high heat. Stir in rice. Heat to boiling, reduce heat. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed. Add lemon rind and green onions. Fluff rice lemon rind and onions lightly with fork to mix. Garnish with coconut and lemon slices. ; name: saigon chicken cole slaw ; ingredients: cabbage, onion, carrots, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, fresh coarse ground black pepper, rice wine vinegar, lemons, juice of, fish sauce, sugar ; preparation:Toss all but last 4 ingredients in large bowl. Whisk together last 4 ingredients until sugar is dissolved. Pour dressing over salad, and toss. Slaw is best if refrigerated for 30 min. -1 hour before serving, but is still wonderful if served immediately. Most grocery store versions are mainly salt flavor. For best results, take a trip to the asian market if possible. ; name: chicken saffron risotto low fat ; ingredients: arborio rice, chicken stock, chicken breasts, leek, saffron strands, lemon, zest of, lemon juice, frozen peas ; preparation:

name: chicken and mushroom skillet ; ingredients: chicken breasts, cream of mushroom soup, mushrooms, broccoli florets, minute rice ; preparation:Cook chicken with cooking spray in skillet. When done, add cream of mushroom, mushrooms, and cooked broccoli. Warm. Seperately cook rice. Put chicken on top of rice when serving. ; name: herbed chicken en casserole ; ingredients: chicken breasts, butter, cream of chicken soup, sauterne, water chestnut, canned mushroom, green peppers, dried thyme ; preparation:Lightly season chicken with salt and pepper. Brown slowly in butter in skillet arrange browned chicken skin side up in baking dish. To dripping in skillet add mushroom soup and wine, stirring to combine. Add remaining ingredients and stir to combine. Heat to boiling. Pour sauce over chicken. Cover and bake at 350 degrees for 25 minutes. Uncover and cook for an additional 15 to 20 minutes or until chicken is done. Serve with hot, fluffy rice. ; name: chicken broccoli cheese casserole ; ingredients: chicken breasts, frozen broccoli, cream of celery soup, cream of mushroom soup, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, french fried onion rings ; preparation:Cut up chicken into small pieces and cook throughly. You may want to spice up the chicken with the spices of your choice in a bowl, mix the cream of celery, cream of mushroom and mayo together. Empty the bag of broccoli into a rectangular casserole dish. Spread the cooked chicken evenly over the broccoli. Spread the cream of celery, mushroom and mayo mixture over the chicken. Sprinkle shredded cheddar cheese evenly over the entire casserole. Cook at 350 for 30-35 minutes.
