Sprinkle the french onion toppings over the cheese and cook for another 5 mins. ; name: super easy chicken broccoli pie ; ingredients: cooked chicken breasts, frozen chopped broccoli, sharp cheddar cheese, eggs, bisquick, milk, dried onion flakes, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a greased pie plate, mix chicken, broccoli, 2 cups of cheddar, and onion flakes. In a separate bowl, whisk together eggs, bisquick, milk, salt, and pepper. Pour egg mixture over chicken mixture. Bake 30-40 minutes or until an inserted knife comes out clean. Sprinkle remaining cheese over the top and bake a few more minutes until it melts. Let cool slightly before cutting. ; name: jurassic chicken casserole ; ingredients: cream of chicken soup, cheese, mayonnaise, canned vegetables, chicken breasts, garlic, onion, olive oil, fried onions ; preparation:Combine the first 4 ingredients in a large bowl. Stir until smooth and set aside. Brown the onions with the garlic, using the olive oil. Add the diced chicken to the onions if you are using raw chicken. Mix the chicken and onions in the bowl. Put mixture into a baking dish. Top with a thick layer of the fried onions, chips, or crackers. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes or until hot and bubbly. ; name: chicken and mushroom saute ; ingredients: butter, chicken breasts, mushroom, onion, bacon, cream of mushroom soup, milk, parmesan cheese, noodles ; preparation:Melt half of butter in large skillet over medium-high heat. Saut chicken until no longer pink, about 5 minutes. Remove from skillet. Set aside. Melt remaining butter in same skillet over medium heat. Saut mushrooms and onion until tender and liquid is evaporated, stirring often. Stir in soup, milk, and cheese. Bring to boil. Return chicken to skillet and add bacon. Heat through, stirring occasionally. Serve over noodles. ; name: sweet tangy chicken ; ingredients: butter, boneless skinless chicken breasts, condensed tomato soup, water, brown sugar, vinegar, cooked rice ; preparation:Heat butter in skillet. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add soup, water, sugar and vinegar. Heat to a boil. Cover and cook over low heat 5 minute or until done. Serve over rice. ; name: chicken and cheese pie ; ingredients: chicken breasts, cooked rice, cream of chicken soup, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: quick lemon curd ; ingredients: white sugar, eggs, fresh lemon juice, lemons, zest of, unsalted butter ; preparation:In a microwave bowl, whisk together the sugar and eggs until smooth. Stir in lemon juice, lemon zest, and butter. Cook in the microwave for one minute intervals, stirring after each minute until the mixture is thick enough to coat the back of a metal spoon. It will be quite liquid but will set up somewhat overnight. Remove from the microwave, and pour into sterile jars. Store for up to 3 weeks in the refrigerator. ; name: vinegar pie ; ingredients: sugar, egg yolks, vinegar, flour, water, butter, lemon extract, pie shells ; preparation:In medium saucepan mix together sugar, beaten egg yolks, vinegar, flour and water. Cook over medium heat stirring constantly until thick. Remove from heat. Add lemon extract and butter. Continue to stir until butter has completely melted. Pour into baked pie crust. Top with meringue, made with left over egg whites, and bake in 350f pre-heated oven until golden brown. Let cool and serve. ; name: coffee and sour cream cake ; ingredients: butter, caster sugar, eggs, coffee, hot water, self raising flour, plain flour, milk, sour cream ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar, add egg, mix. Add coffee, mix. Add milk and flour alternately. Add sour cream. Bake 25 minutes 350. ; name: cauldron cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, eggs, fresh lemon juice, lemon zest, flour, pecans ; preparation:Cream the butter in a large cast-iron cauldron. Gradually add the brown sugar, beating well. Add the eggs, lemon juice, and zest and then beat by hand or with an electric mixer until the mixture is well blended. The next step is to stir in the flour and pecans. Cover the cauldron with a lid, aluminum foil, or plastic wrap, and refrigerate overnight. When ready, shape the dough into one-inch balls and place them about three inches apart on greased cookie sheets. Bake in a 375 preheated oven for approximately 8 minutes. Remove from the oven and place on wire racks until completely cool. ; name: my friend the friand ; ingredients: butter, icing sugar, plain flour, ground almonds, egg whites, fresh lemon rind ; preparation:Heat oven to 200 degrees c. Melt butter and allow it to cool. Use 1 tablespoon to coat 10 muffin tin moulds or individual oval baking moulds measuring 5 x 10 cm. Sift icing sugar and flour into bowl, mix in the ground almonds. Lightly beat egg whites with a fork, fold them into dry ingredients. Add cooled, melted butter and orange rind, mix well. Three quarters fill each mould with mixture and bake on the middle shelf of oven for 10 minutes. Turn tray around, and bake for another 5- 10 minutes, till tops are golden, and springy to the touch. Leave in the tins for 5 minutes, then gently unmould onto a wire tray and leave to cool. Dust the friands with icing sugar to serve. ; name: magic spread ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, citric acid, water ; preparation:Dissolve the citric acid and the water in a microwave proof bowl. Beat together sugar, eggs and citric acid in water. Stir in the melted butter. Mix well. Cook on high, stirring well ever 30 seconds until mixture thickens. Makes about 2 cups. Store in the refrigerator for up to two weeks. ; name: boiled chocolate cake ; ingredients: sugar, water, butter, bicarbonate of soda, cocoa, self raising flour, egg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. Place sugar, water, butter, bicarb soda& cocoa in a saucepan& bring to the boil. Once boiling, time for 2 minutes, then remove from heat. Grease& line base of a loaf pan. Once chocolate mixture has cooled, add the flour& egg. Mix well until smooth. Place in pan& cook in oven for 35 minutes. ; name: easy lemon sponge cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, self-raising flour, lemon juice, lemon, rind of ; preparation:

name: unstuffed bell pepper skillet ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, crushed tomatoes, green bell peppers, salt, pepper, garlic powder, dried italian seasoning, cooked rice, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Brown ground meat and onion. Drain. Season with salt, pepper, garlic and italian seasoning. Add crushed tomatoes and green pepper. Cover and simmer until peppers are tender crisp. Serve over cooked rice. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: spaghetti with tomatoes and pecorino romano cheese ; ingredients: thin spaghetti, red onion, thyme, extra virgin olive oil, cherry tomatoes, water, salt, pepper, pecorino romano cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, saute onion and thyme in half of the olive oil over low heat for 12 minutes. Add cherry tomatoes and water and simmer for 8 minutes. Season the sauce with salt and pepper. Drain pasta and toss with the sauce. Add cheese and remaining olive oil and toss again. ; name: johnny b goode casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, black olives, whole kernel corn, tomato soup, cheddar cheese, noodles, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Cook ground meat with onions in a large roaster and drain excess grease when meat is browned. Add the cooked noodles. Mix in the olives and corn. Add the tomato soup and water if desired. Add grated cheese. Place in large casserole dish and top with more cheese. Bake at 350 degrees about 30 minutes or until the cheese on top is brown and bubbly. ; name: yummy chili casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, celery, chili, diced tomatoes with juice, taco sauce, corn, egg noodles, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the beef and onion for 5 to 10 minutes, or until meat is browned and onion is tender. Drain fat. Add the celery, chili, tomatoes, taco sauce and corn. Heat thoroughly, reduce heat to low and allow to simmer. Meanwhile, prepare the noodles according to package directions. When cooked, place them in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour the meat mixture over the noodles, stirring well. Top with the cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f for 25 minutes, or until cheese is completely melted and bubbly. ; name: buttered noodles with fresh sage ; ingredients: egg noodles, butter, onion, fresh sage leaves, salt, black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook noodles according to package directions. Drain. Melt butter in the empty pot. Simmer onion and sage leaves 5 minutes. Add salt and pepper. Toss with noodles. Top with parmesan cheese just before serving. ; name: italian wedding soup with 5 ingredients ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, chicken broth, thin spaghetti, black pepper, meatballs, baby spinach ; preparation:In a large pot, combine oil and onion. Cook over medium heat for 1 minute, or until sizzling. Add broth, pasta, and pepper. Bring to a boil. Cook, stirring, for 5 minutes. Add meatballs and spinach. Reduce heat to low. Cook for 5 minutes or until pasta is tender. ; name: spaghetti cupcakes ; ingredients: spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, ground black pepper, pasta sauce, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 12-cup muffin pan. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, and pepper. Evenly press mixture into muffin cups to form a crust. Evenly top each cup with pasta sauce, then mozzarella cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until bubbling. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. ; name: super suppers beef and noodles ; ingredients: thin egg noodles, ground beef, onion, green pepper, garlic, crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: campbell s abc s vegetarian vegetable soup ; ingredients: vegetable broth, frozen vegetables, vegetable juice, tomato paste, dried thyme, dried oregano, dried basil, pepper, alphabet pasta ; preparation:Cook pasta according to directions. Meanwhile, in a saucepan, combine vegetable broth, veggies, juice, tomato paste, thyme, oregano, basil and pepper. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Drain pasta. Add cooked pasta to soup and simmer for an additional 15 minutes. ; name: chilli chicken with pasta ; ingredients: chicken breasts, peanut oil, garlic cloves, cracked pepper, fresh basil, red chilies, chives, penne, crushed tomatoes, parsley ; preparation:Bring water to boil in saucepan and add penne. Cook for 12 minutes. Heat oil in wok. Cook chicken in batches until lightly browned. Return chicken to wok. Stir in garlic, chilli, chives, tomatoes and cracked pepper. Bring to boil and reduce heat and simmer until sauce begins to thicken. Stir in basil and simmer until thickened. Stir in parsley. Serve over penne. Sprinkle with fresh parmesan cheese if desired. ; name: pasta spirals with shrimp peas and tomatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, shrimp, scallion, garlic clove, tomatoes, dried basil, spiral shaped pasta, peas, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a medium skillet. Add shrimp and saut over high heat, stirring, until pink and tender, about 3 minutes. Stir in scallion and garlic. Add tomato and sprinkle with oregano. Cover and set aside. Meanwhile, cook the pasta in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente, about 10 minutes. Add of the pasta water to the shrimp mixture. Drain pasta. Toss pasta, shrimp mixture and peas. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: rice herbs ; ingredients: oil, long grain rice, onion, green pepper, chicken broth, salt, dried oregano, bay leaf, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place oil in a large saucepan coated with cooking spray. Place pan over med-high heat until pan is hot. Add rice and saut until golden brown. Add onion and pepper. Saut till tender. Add chicken broth, salt, oregano and bay leaf. Bring to boil and then reduce heat. Simmer 20 minutes. Remove from stove and let sit for about 5 minutes, or till liquid is absorbed. Remove bay leaf and stir in parsley. ; name: basil chicken soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, garlic clove, all-purpose flour, chicken broth, potato, carrots, cooked chicken, fresh basil, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In a 2 to 3 quart pan, combine butter, onion, and garlic. Stir occasionally over medium heat until onion is limp and slightly tinged with brown, about 10 minutes. Stir in flour to coat onion. Gradually stir in broth, and bring to a boil on high heat. Add potato and carrots. Cover and simmer over low heat until potato is tender when pierced, 15 to 20 minutes. Add chicken. Cover and simmer just until chicken is hot, 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in basil. Ladle into bowl and offer cheese to add to taste. ; name: pasta salad with chicken and artichokes ; ingredients: pasta shells, oil, mayonnaise, lemon juice, parsley, dried basil, chicken, artichokes, tabasco sauce, toasted almond ; preparation:Cook pasta in large pot of boiling, salted water until tender, but firm, 8 to 12 minutes, stirring often. Drain well and rinse with cold water. Shake out excess water and toss pasta with oil. Combine mayonnaise, lemon juice, parsley and basil. Place pasta in large bowl. Add mayonnaise mixture, chicken, artichokes and tabasco. Toss well. Garnish with almonds. For a decorative presentation, serve in avacado halves, in tomato cups or on lettuce leaves. ; name: cheese stuffed italian style burgers ; ingredients: low-fat mayonnaise, dried basil leaves, lean ground beef, garlic cloves, five cheese blend, hamburger buns, lettuce leaves, tomatoes, pepperoncini peppers ; preparation:Heat grill to medium-high heat. Mix mayo and basil. Refrigerate until ready to use. Combine meat and garlic. Shape into 8 thin patties. Top 4 patties with cheese. Cover with remaining patties. Pinch edges together to seal. Grill 7 to 9 minute on each side or until burgers are done. Spread buns with mayo mixture. Fill with lettuce, tomatoes, burgers and peppers. ; name: noodles herbs ; ingredients: egg noodles, thyme leaves, basil leaves, parsley, chives, butter ; preparation:

name: light and fluffy flax pancakes ; ingredients: whole wheat pastry flour, flax seed meal, baking powder, baking soda, salt, nonfat milk, sugar, egg, egg whites, butter ; preparation:Mix the dry items first. Beat the egg and egg white until nice and fluffy. Combine the eggs and melted butter to the milk and slowly stir in the flour. Let sit at least 5-6 minutes while heating the pan. These will be high, but light and fluffy. ; name: almond poppy seed muffins ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, milk, vegetable oil, eggs, almond extract, poppy seeds ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease, spray, or placed liners in muffin tins to hold 24 muffins. Combine flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Add milk, eggs, oil, and almond extract. Whisk until smooth. Gently stir in poppyseeds. Fill muffin tins and bake for 25- 30 minutes. ; name: halva ; ingredients: olive oil, semolina flour, sugar, water, lemon wedges, cinnamon stick, almonds ; preparation:Heat the oil and cook the semolina in the oil until golden. Place the almonds to brown with the semolina. In the meantime, warm the water, but do not boil, and dissolve the sugar in it and throw in the lemon and the cinnamon stick. Pour the water into the semolina mix and stir well while pouring. Keep heating until the mixture becomes thick. Pour the mix into a bundt pan and garnish with sesame seeds and cinnamon. Let stand and serve at room temperature. ; name: easy soft breadsticks ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, milk, butter, sesame seeds ; preparation:Mix flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Slowly add milk to form a soft dough. Knead on a floured surface 4 times. Roll into 10 inch by 5 inch rectangle. Cut into 12 sticks. Put butter in 13x9 baking dish. Roll breadsticks in butter. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake at 425 for 16 minutes, or until golden. ; name: vegan apple pie pancakes ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, oats, cinnamon, baking powder, salt, soymilk, raisins, apple ; preparation:In medium bowl, stir together flour, oats, cinnamon, baking powder, and salt. Add milk, raisins, and apples. Stir gently till just mixed. Portion batter onto hot non-stick pan and cover. Let sit on medium heat until center starts to bubble and becomes sturdy. Flip and cook other side till golden brown. Repeat with remaining batter. Makes 2 large or 4 small pancakes. ; name: arabic almond milk ; ingredients: full cream milk powder, water, rice flour, almonds, ground cardamom, sugar, ginger powder ; preparation:Dissolve the milk powder in the water. Allow to come to the boil on low heat. Add sugar, almonds and rice powder. Stir continusly for 10 minutes. Add the cardamom. Pour into cups sprinkle ginger if desired. Serve hot. ; name: vegan jam almond cookies ; ingredients: almonds, brown rice flour, salt, cinnamon, maple syrup, oil, applesauce, jam ; preparation:Mix dry ingredients. Mix wet ingredients. Mix both mixtures. Flatten cookies onto a pan. Add a bit of jam on each cookie. Bake at 350 degrees for 15-20mins, until bottoms are lightly browned. Enjoy. ; name: cinnamon crackers ; ingredients: flax seed meal, almond flour, splenda granular, cinnamon, water ; preparation:

name: thai grilled chicken thighs ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, fresh basil, fresh coriander, ginger, garlic, chili, soy sauce, fish sauce, olive oil, brown sugar ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except chicken in a bowl. Mix thoroughly. Add chicken and leave to marinate at least one hour, preferably longer. Grill chicken on the bbq, hotplate or in the griller until golden brown and cooked through. Ususlly you would expect 12 thigh fillets to feed 4 to 6 people- in my family the kids eat 4 each so this recipe serves 3. ; name: garlic glazed chicken ; ingredients: chicken breasts, garlic clove, vinegar, soy sauce, honey, dried red peppers, oil, green onion, sesame seeds, rice ; preparation:Cube chicken into bite-seize pieces. Fry over high heat, stirring often for 3-4 minutes. Add all other ingredients. Cook on mediun-high 15 minutes or until syrupy. Sprinkle with garnishes. Serve over hot rice. ; name: teriyaki dump chicken oamc ; ingredients: soy sauce, sugar, red wine vinegar, vegetable oil, garlic clove, ground ginger, boneless skinless chicken breast, long grain rice ; preparation:Mix soy sauce, sugar, vinegar, oil, garlic, and ginger to make marinade. Freeze chicken in marinade in a 1-gallon freezer bag. When preparing to serve, thaw chicken. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Pour chicken and marinade into a baking dish that has been coated with nonstick cooking spray. Bake for 35 minutes. Prepare rice according to package directions. Serve chicken over rice. ; name: ginger hot thighs ; ingredients: chicken thighs, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, red wine, gingerroot, ground cumin, chili powder, fresh parsley ; preparation:In large, nonstick skillet over medium heat, heat oil. Add chicken. Cook 7 to 8 minutes on each side, or until browned. In small bowl, combine onion, garlic, wine, ginger, cumin and chili powder. Add mixture to skillet. Partially cover and reduce heat to medium low. Cook about 20 to 30 minutes, or until chicken is fork tender and liquid has been reduced to a glaze. To serve, sprinkle with parsley. ; name: green beans with garlic sauce ; ingredients: oil, green beans, soy sauce, garlic, honey, ginger ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: baked hoisin sauce chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, honey, hoisin sauce, warm water, salt, black pepper, garlic cloves, scallion, fresh ginger ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Marinate chicken wings for 15 minutes in a mixture of honey, hoisin sauce, water, salt, pepper, garlic, scallion, and ginger. Place chicken wings on a baking pan line with alum foil and bake for 30 minutes, brushing occasionally with marinade. Turn oven to broil and broil chicken wings five more minutes. Turn wings every two minutes to avoid burning. To serve, transfer chicken wings to a serving platter and serve hot or at room temperature. ; name: honey garlic roasted chicken drumsticks ; ingredients: chicken legs, milk, cornstarch, soy sauce, liquid honey, rice vinegar, fresh garlic cloves, green onions, toasted sesame seeds, hot chili sauce ; preparation:Set oven to 425 degrees. Butter a 13x9-in baking pan. Place the chicken legs in baking dish. In a bowl, gradually whisk milk into cornstarch. Whisk in soy sauce, honey, vinegar and garlic. Pour over chicken. Toss to coat. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring twice, until chicken is cooked, and until sauce is bubbling, and starting to thicken. Stir the green onions into dish, and sprinkle with toasted sesame seeds. Bake 10 minutes longer, or until the chicken is cooked. ; name: sweet bbq chicken thighs ; ingredients: chicken thigh, honey, garlic cloves, ginger, soy sauce ; preparation:

name: tarragon chicken casserole ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, onion, tarragon, poultry seasoning, salt, pepper, cream of chicken soup, milk, slivered almonds ; preparation:In 13 x 9 inch baking pan, place chicken pieces. Do not overlap. Place onion rings over top. Mix seasonings with cream of chicken soup and milk and spoon over chicken. Bake, uncovered, in 375 degree oven for 40 minutes. Sprinkle chicken with almonds, if desired. Bake 10 minutes more or until chicken is tender. ; name: curried chicken florentine ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, mild cheddar cheese, frozen spinach, lemons, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, mayonnaise, curry powder, butter, oil ; preparation:Squeeze juice from one lemon over chicken breasts and let sit for 15- 20 minutes at room temp. Heat butter and oil in a large skillet. Salt and pepper chicken breasts and cook in hot oil until lightly browned. Put spinach into bottom of a 9 x 13 casserole. Sprinkle shredded cheese on top of spinach. Place browned chicken breasts on top of cheese. Mix soup, sour cream, mayo, juice from second lemon, and curry powder. Pour over chicken breasts. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 45 minutes. Serve with rice. ; name: crunchy chicken cheese bake ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, swiss cheese, cream of chicken soup, tomatoes, margarine, herb seasoned stuffing mix, cooked rice ; preparation:In 3 quart oblong baking dish, place chicken, top with cheese. Stir soup and spread over cheese. Top with tomato. Combine margarine and stuffing, sprinkle over tomato. Bake at 375f for 25 minutes or until chicken is done and sauce is bubbly and stuffing is browned. Serve over rice. ; name: chicken quesadillas low fat ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, chicken broth, bell pepper, onion, garlic clove, salsa, taco seasoning, fat-free refried beans, light cheese, whole wheat tortillas ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Saute chicken in broth for 2 minutes. Add peppers, onions, garlic, salsa and taco seasoning. Cook until veggies are soft. Place tortillas on a baking sheet and spread refried beans onto half of each trotilla., top with chicken and veggie mixture and shredded cheese. Fold each tortilla over and bake at 350 degrees for 10-15 minutes. Serve with fat free sour cream and salsa. ; name: soy sauce marinated chicken breasts rice cooker ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, soy sauce, sugar, toasted sesame oil, garlic clove, fresh ginger, green onion, brown rice, chicken broth, vegetables ; preparation:Combine soy sauce, sugar, sesame oil, garlic and ginger with chicken breasts and allow to marinate. Pour rice and broth into rice cooker. Cover with lid and press brown rice setting. Allow to cook for 1 hour. Place chicken breasts and marinade on foil sprayed with nonstick cooking spray, top with slivered onion and make packet. Place vegetables in seperate foil packet. Carefully open lid of cooker and place steam tray into the rice cooker. Place chicken packet in tray. Close the lid and steam for 10 minutes then open lid again and place vegetables in allow to steam till cooker changes to keep warm. Carefully check chicken for doneness and using oven mitts carefully remove steam tray from the rice cooker and serve immediately. ; name: make ahead swiss chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, swiss cheese, reduced-fat cream of chicken soup, light sour cream, white wine, garlic powder, dry mustard, cayenne pepper, crouton ; preparation:Grease a 9x13 disposable foil pan with non-stick cooking spray. Place chicken pieces in dish. Sprinkle with swiss cheese. Mix together remaining ingredients and spread over cheese. Cover dish with foil. Place croutons in a ziploc bag and crush with a rolling pin. Tape bag of crushed croutons to dish. Freeze. When ready to bake, thaw in refrigerator overnight. Uncover dish and sprinkle with croutons. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 minutes or until bubbly. Cover with foil mid-way through cooking if croutons start getting too brown. ; name: spinach and cheese stuffed chicken breast ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, fresh spinach, sour cream, cream cheese, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, onion, whole wheat bread crumbs, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Prepare chicken breasts by cutting a slit or flap in the largest part of the breast. Mix all filling ingredients and spoon into chicken breast. Place stuffed chicken breasts into a glass 9x13 inch pan. Sprinkle with bread crumb mixture and parmesan cheese. Bake at 400 degrees for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. ; name: chic broc chee rice ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, frozen broccoli, onion, butter, instant rice, cream of chicken soup, milk, garlic salt, pepper, provolone cheese ; preparation:

name: garlic roasted potato salad ; ingredients: new potato, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, mayonnaise, creole mustard, parsley, scallions, lemon, juice of, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl, toss potatoes, garlic, and olive oil together to coat. Place potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet. Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Place in 350 degree oven for 15-20 minutes, or until tender, allow to cool for 10 minutes. Combine mayonnaise, creole mustard, lemon juice, parsley, and scallions. Add to potatoes. Add salt or pepper to taste. Serve cold or room temperature. ; name: potato egg casserole a la hot potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, hard-boiled eggs, green onions, parsley, mustard, fresh ground black pepper, low-fat sour cream, bacon, milk, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook potatoes in boiling water until tender. Drain and cool. Combine potatoes, eggs, bacon, parsley and spring onions in a casserole dish. Combine sour cream, mustard and black pepper and then mix through potato mixture, if mixture needs more moisture then add a little milk. Cover and bake at 180c for 15-20 minutes, then sprinkle with cheese and grill until golden. ; name: autumn two potato scallop ; ingredients: butter, sweet potatoes, small red potatoes, heavy cream, milk, garlic, salt, ground red pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 375. Butter a 13 x 9 x 2 glass baking dish. Arrange sweet and red potatoe slices, overlapping, in alternating layers in baking dish. There should be about 3 layers of each. Combine heavy cream, milk, garlic, salt and red pepper in a small saucepan. Bring to boiling and then carefully pour over potatoes in baking dish. Bake for 30 minutes and press with spatula. Spoon cream mixture over potatoes. Sprinkle with parmesan and bake 30 more minutes or until potatoes are tender and top is brown. Let stand 15 minutes before serving. ; name: cheese and sour cream potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, cheddar cheese, butter, onions, salt, ground black pepper, corn flakes ; preparation:In a 4-quart dutch oven cook potatoes in enough boiling water to cover for 20 to 25 minues or until just tender. Drain. Cool slightly. Peel and coarsely shred or finely chop potatoes. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl stir together sour cream, soup, cheese, melted butter, onion, salt and pepper. Gently stir in potatoes. Transfer to greased 3-quart rectangular baking dish. Sprinkle with cornflakes. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Uncover, bake about 15 minutes more until golden. ; name: super spuds ; ingredients: potatoes, mayonnaise, brown mustard, garlic clove, salt, pepper, hot dog ; preparation:Bake 6 potatoes. Cut in half. Scoop shells. Mash with mayonnaise, brown mustard, garlic, salt, pepper. Fold in hot dogs that have been cooked and sliced. Return to shells. Bake 20 minutes in 350 oven. ; name: baked potato with nuts ; ingredients: potatoes, cheese, roquefort cheese, dijon mustard, mayonnaise, garlic clove, tabasco sauce, butter, black pepper, mixed nuts ; preparation:Boil the potatos without peeling. Mix all ingredients in a bowl. Then pierce a little all potatos with a help of knife. Pour the sauce into the potatos. Then bake them for nearly 20 minutes. Service while its hot. ; name: spinach artichoke stuffed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, spinach, mayonnaise, sour cream, water chestnuts, water-packed artichoke hearts, black pepper, salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Steam chopped spinach for 1 minute, drain well and place in a large mixng bowl. Cut the baked potatoes in half lengthwise and scoop the insides into the bowl with the spinach. Add the remaining ingredients except the parmesan cheese and stir well. Mound the filling back into the potato shells and place them in a shallow baking dish. Sprinkle with the parmesan and place under the broiler until the cheese is bubbly and hot. ; name: red skin potato and dill salad ; ingredients: red potatoes, sour cream, mayonnaise, fresh dill, celery, onion, garlic, cracked black pepper, salt ; preparation:

name: greek roasted beans in tomato sauce gigantes plaki ; ingredients: butter beans, tomatoes, garlic cloves, onions, tomato paste, olive oil, parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:Soak the beans overnight, the longer, the better. Preheat oven at 350 farenheit. Drain and rinse the beans and boil in water for about 40 minutes to an hour, until they are soft but not mushy. Make sure you boil them enough. Otherwise the beans will be too hard to eat even after baking. Sauce - saut the onion in a bit of olive on low heat until soft and add the garlic cloves whole. If you want a stronger garlic flavor you can mince the garlic. Add the tomato, the tomato paste, parsley, salt and pepper to taste and about cup olive oil. Let it simmer until sauce thickens, about 10 minutes. Once the beans have boiled, drain them and put them back into the pot, add the sauce and mix gently. Pour the mixture in a pan and spread evenly and then pour about another cup olive oil over the beans and bake for about 50 minutes until beans are tender. Accompany with feta cheese and bread. ; name: shrimp in mustard sauce ; ingredients: butter, large shrimp, garlic clove, shallots, all-purpose flour, dry white wine, chicken broth, dijon mustard, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet, melt 1 tbs butter over medium high heat. Add the shrimp and garlic. Cook, tossing, until the shrimp starts to turn pink on the outside but is stil translucent on the inside, about 2 min. Transfer to a plate and set aside. Reduce the heat to medium and in the same skillet, melt the remaining butter. Add the shallot and cook until softened, 1-2 minute. Add the flour and cook for 30 secs, whisking constantly. Gradually add the wine, broth, and mustard - whisking constantly. Simmer until it is as thick as heavy cream, about 5 minute. Return the shrimp to the skillet. Bring to a simmer and cook until the shrimp are opaque throughout, about 2 minute. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: oven roasted dungeness crab ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, garlic, shallot, dry crushed red pepper, dungeness crabs, fresh thyme, fresh parsley, blood orange juice, orange peel ; preparation:Preheat oven to 500f melt butter with oil in heavy large ovenproof skillet over medium-high heat. Stir in garlic, shallot, and dried crushed red pepper. Add crabs. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Sprinkle 1 tablespoon chopped thyme and 1 tablespoon chopped parsley over crabs. Stir to combine. Place skillet in oven and roast crabs until heated through, stirring once, about 12 minutes. Using tongs, transfer crabs to platter. Add orange juice and peel to same skillet. Boil until sauce is reduced by about half, about 5 minutes. Spoon sauce over crabs. Sprinkle with remaining 1 tablespoon thyme and 1 tablespoon parsley and serve. ; name: grilled potatoes with garlic ; ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, fresh parsley, grainy mustard, lemon juice, butter, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Cut potatoes into large wedges. Place on greased oven trays, bake for about 30 minutes or until just tender. Combine oil, garlic, herbs, mustard and juice in a bowl. Add potatoes and toss until potatoes are well coated with mixture. Return potatoes to oven trays and drizzle with melted butter. Cook under hot grill until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Serve sprinkled with salt if desired. ; name: cowboy caviar tangy black bean dip ; ingredients: black beans, garlic cloves, onion, salt, pepper, parsley, olive oil, red wine vinegar, whole kernel corn ; preparation:Place all ingredients except corn in a food processor. Process in an on-off manner for about 1 minute. Transfer to large bowl & stir in corn manually. Refrigerate overnight to allow flavors to blend. Serve with chips, crackers or toast. ; name: hot white bean salad ; ingredients: butter, shallots, garlic clove, white beans, fresh parsley, white wine vinegar, dijon mustard, olive oil, salt, black pepper ; preparation:

name: crock pot beef marsala ; ingredients: olive oil, beef stew meat, flour, garlic cloves, marsala wine, chicken stock, cream of mushroom soup, baby portabella mushrooms, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add beef cubes and saute until browned. Add garlic. Saute until garlic is lightly browned. Add flour and stir until well coated. Transfer meat into the crockpot and add marsala, broth, soup and sliced mushrooms. Mix well. Cover and cook on low for 8 to 10 hours or on high for 5 to 7 hours or until meat is tender. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve with or over rice, egg noodles or mashed potatoes. ; name: asian chicken linguine ; ingredients: linguine, sesame oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, fresh mushrooms, garlic, ground ginger, cayenne pepper, hoisin sauce, soy sauce, green onions ; preparation:In a big pot, cook linguine according to package directions. Rinse and drain. Set aside. In the same big pot, heat oil over medium heat. Saute the chicken in hot oil for 5-8 minutes or until no longer pink, stirring constantly. Add the mushrooms, garlic, ginger, and cayenne pepper. Cook 5 minutes, stirring frequently. Add in the hoisin sauce, soy sauce, and cooked pasta. Toss to coat. Cook a couple of minutes or until pasta is heated through. Add the green onions, stir to mix. Serve immediately. ; name: heart chop suey 1952 ; ingredients: meat, flour, fat, boiling water, soy sauce, fresh mushrooms, onion, celery, bean sprouts ; preparation:Dip meat strips in flour. Heat fat in a heavy skillet and cook meat until browned. Add boiling water and soy sauce. In separate skillet, heat remaining fat. Brown mushrooms onions and celery. Add to meat mixture. Cover and simmer about 15 minutes. If using cabbage, cook 5 minutes and drain. Add bean sprouts or cabbage to meat mixture. Serve over rice. ; name: oriental wrap quick ; ingredients: chicken rice pilaf mix, oil, ginger, garlic, sliced mushrooms, tortillas, lettuce leaf, chicken, green onion, low sodium soy sauce ; preparation:Prepare rice mix according to package directions. While rice is cooking, heat oil in a small frypan. Saute ginger, garlic and mushrooms until tender. Fold into rice mixture. Lay tortilla flat and line with letuce leaves. Divide rice veggie mixture into 4 equal parts. Spreading on top of lettuce. Lay chicken strips and green onions on top of rice. Sprinkle with soy sauce. Wrap tortilla ends in and roll up. Serve immediately with a ginger conserve or your favourite fresh veggie salsa topping. ; name: sauted mushrooms with garlic and lemon juice ; ingredients: lemon juice, soy sauce, sugar, olive oil, butter, garlic paste, mushrooms ; preparation:Stir together lemon juice, soy sauce, and sugar. Set aside. In 12-inch nonstick skillet, heat butter, olive oil, and garlic over medium-high heat until butter melts. Add mushrooms and saut, stirring until golden brown and butter has been absorbed. Add lemon mixture to mushrooms, stirring until sauce is absorbed. ; name: basil fried rice ; ingredients: oil, garlic, red chilies, fresh mushrooms, onion, cooked rice, green bell pepper, long beans, soy sauce, basil ; preparation:In a wok or skillet, heat oil until hot but not smoking. Add garlic and chilis and fry until garlic is light brown. Add mushrooms and onions and stir quickly. Add cooked rice. Stir thoroughly. Add long beans, peppers, and soy and stir thoroughly. At the very end, stir in basil leaves and immediately turn into a serving bowl. ; name: low fat chinese omelet ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, red bell pepper, scallion, bean sprouts, fat free chicken broth, egg whites, low sodium soy sauce, white pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:In large nonstick skillet over high heat, saute all vegetables in chicken broth for 5 minutes. Stirring occasionally. Pour excess broth off vegetables and set vegetables aside in skillet. Meanwhile, in blender, mix egg whites, soy sauce and spices on high for 1 minute. Pour egg mixture over vegetables and return to heat. Cook on low heat until eggs have set to your liking. Serve with whole wheat toast and jam. ; name: shiitake mushroom soup ; ingredients: shiitake mushrooms, fresh ginger, olive oil, chicken stock, water, soba noodles, spinach, soy sauce, lime juice ; preparation:

name: ravioli with garbanzos and spinach ; ingredients: cheese ravioli, olive oil, garlic cloves, garbanzo beans, summer squash, roma tomatoes, fresh thyme, black pepper, fresh spinach ; preparation:Cook ravioli, drain, cover and keep warm. Meanwhile, in a large skillet heat oil over medium-high heat. Add garlic and cook, stirring constantly, for 15 seconds. Add garbanzos, squash, tomatoes, thyme and pepper. Sstir 4-5 minutes, until squash is tender. Add the cooked ravioli to bean mixture and toss gently to combine. Arrange spinach on plate and top with ravioli. Fresh ravioli may be used in place of dry, but you would want more by weight to feed the same number of people. ; name: one pan sausage tortellini ; ingredients: hot italian sausage, roasted garlic, onion, refrigerated cheese tortellini, tomato and basil pasta sauce, extra virgin olive oil, water, garlic salt ; preparation:Place onions, garlic and olive oil in large saucepan over medium-high heat. Squeeze sausage from casing into pan. Cook until meat is brown and no pink remains, stirring frequently and breaking meat up as it cooks. Stir in remaining ingredients. Bring to boil and cook 12 minutes, stirring occasionally, until pasta is tender and sauce thickens. ; name: baked gnocchi ; ingredients: gnocchi, olive oil, garlic cloves, frozen spinach, diced tomatoes, italian seasoning, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, sliced mushrooms ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 grease lagrge casserole dish. Cook gnocchi according to directions. Drain. Heat oil in large skillet. Add garlic, cook 30 sec. Add tomatoes and seasoning. Cook and stir 5 minutes. Add gnocchi to spinach mixture in skillet, stir gently. Transfer gnocchi mixture to prepared casserole dish. Sprinkle with cheeses. Bake 20-30 minutes or until bubbly and sheese is melted. Enjoy. ; name: artichoke and garlic dip ; ingredients: mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, oil, garlic cloves, round loaf italian bread ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. At the top of the loaf, cut a round section and hollow out the bread,. In a food processor, add the mayo, grated parmesan, drained artichokes and garlic cloves. Process until it resembles large flake oatmeal or to your liking. Fill the hollowed out bread and replace the round cut out section. Wrap in aluminium foil and bake in the oven for about 40 minutes. I cut up a bagette for dipping and serve them around the hot garlic dip. ; name: eggs carbonara with basil and parmesan ; ingredients: bacon, eggs, parmesan cheese, heavy cream, fresh basil, salt, black pepper, garlic, flat-leaf italian parsley, scallions ; preparation:Fry bacon in large nonstick skillet over medium heat, turning occasionally until crisp. When crisp remove from skillet and place on paper towels to absorb grease and let cool. Reserve 2 tablespoons bacon grease in small bowl and discard remainder. Wipe skillet clean with paper towels and set aside. Finely crumble bacon when cool. Vigorously whisk together eggs, parmesean cheese, cream, basil, salt and pepper in a bowl until foamy. Pour reserved bacon grease back into skillet and cook garlic and parsley over medium heat for 1 minute but do not brown garlic. Add scallions and cook stirring occasionally until soft about 3 minutes. Add egg mixture to skillet and cook, stirring occasionally to scramble eggs and form large curds, lifting up cooked egg around edges to let raw egg flow underneath. Cook until eggs are just set. Top with crumbled bacon and serve immediately. ; name: italian baked chicken ; ingredients: butter, italian salad dressing, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, chicken breasts, salt and black pepper ; preparation:In a saucepan combine the margarine, italian salad dressing, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, and crushed garlic. Cook, over medium heat, stirring, until the butter melts. Place the chicken in a 12 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish. Sprinkle with the salt and pepper to taste. Pour the sauce over the chicken. Bake, uncovered, at 325-degrees for 1 hour or until tender and cooked through. ; name: spaghettini verdi ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, garlic cloves, italian parsley, spaghettini, ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, salt ; preparation:Heat butter and oil in a saucepan. Saute crushed garlic until golden. Discard garlic. Stir in the parsley and simmer 4 minutes. Cook the pasta according to package directions. Drain well. Place in a large bowl. Add pepper, parmesan cheese, and salt, and toss well. Add the parsley sauce and toss again. Serve immediately. ; name: sausage and summer squash ; ingredients: italian salad dressing, garlic cloves, polish sausage, summer squash, italian bread, oregano leaves, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: green beans with mushroom cream ; ingredients: fresh green beans, butter, mushrooms, garlic, heavy cream, salt & freshly ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place a large covered pot of lightly salted water on the stove and bring it to a boil. In the meantime, melt butter in a small skillet, increase heat to high, add mushrooms and stir fry until golden brown. Reduce heat to low, add garlic and cook 1 minute. Add cream, salt and pepper and heat through on low. Add beans to boiling water and cook until just tender, drain. Place beans on a serving plate, spoon the mushroom cream across the middle of the beans, sprinkle with parmesan and parsley and serve. ; name: winter solstice soup ; ingredients: butter, onions, carrots, potatoes, milk, water, salt, dried parsley, thyme, bay leaf ; preparation:Saut onions in the butter in a large soup pot. Add carrots, potatoes, water, salt, parsley, thyme and bay leaf. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes. Discard the bay leaf. Puree soup in a blender in small batches or with a stick blender. Return to the pot. Stir in milk. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: creamy cheddar potatoes ; ingredients: butter, potatoes, salt, fresh ground black pepper, milk, cheddar cheese, parsley ; preparation:In large, nonstick skillet, melt butter. Add potatoes and cook over medium heat until almost tender and lightly browned. Add salt, pepper, and milk, continuing to cook until milk is absorbed and potatoes are tender. Sprinkle with cheese, heating until melted. Stir well, sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve. ; name: potato and cucumber soup ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, potato, chicken broth, water, cucumber, heavy cream, ear of corn, fresh parsley, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat and cook onions until they begin to soften, about 5 minutes. Add potatoes, chicken broth, and water. Cover and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 15 minutes. Working in batches, puree potato mixture with cucumbers and return to pot. Stir in cream. Meanwhile, heat a heavy skillet over medium high heat, and add the corn and cook until golden. Scrape corn from cob and add to soup. Stir in parsley, salt and pepper. If desired, chill soup in refrigerator before serving. ; name: onion beer soup ; ingredients: oil, onions, sugar, flour, dark beer, chicken stock, salt & freshly ground black pepper, crusty bread, fresh parsley, gruyere cheese ; preparation:Heat oil. Add onions& sugar, cover and cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, for 20- 25 minutes or until the onions are slightly coloured. Sprinkle flour over onions& stir in. Slowly add the beer, pour in chicken stock and season to taste. Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Place toast slices in ovenproof soup bowls. Pour broth into each bowl, sprinkle with some parsley& top with grated cheese. Place under broiler for a couple of minutes to melt cheese. ; name: seafood bisque ; ingredients: green onion, butter, all-purpose flour, milk, hot sauce, salt, pepper, fresh lump crabmeat, shrimp, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a large saucepan, saute the green onions in melted butter until the onions are tender. Add in the flour. Stir until smooth. Cook for 1 minutes stirring constantly. Gradually add in the milk. Cook and stir constantly over medium heat until mixture is thickened and bubbly. Stir in hot sauce, salt and pepper to taste. Add in crabmeat and shrimp. Cook and stir over low heat until shrimp turn pink. Add in parsley and stir to combine. Serve. ; name: old fashioned split pea soup ; ingredients: oil, onion, carrots, celery, dried split peas, chicken broth, cold water, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil in a heavy 4-quart saucepan over med-high heat. Add in the onion, carrots, and celery. Cook, stirring, until the vegetables begin to soften, 2-3 minutes. Add in the split peas, broth, and water. Bring to a boil. Partially cover pan, decrease heat to med-low, and simmer until the soup is thick, about 45 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste. You can add fresh herbs. Fresh dill is recommended. Also can add meat and ham bones to make it richer. ; name: parsleyed rice with peas ; ingredients: butter, onions, rice, water, bay leaf, salt & freshly ground black pepper, hot pepper sauce, frozen peas, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: balsamic baked onions and potatoes jamie oliver ; ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, butter, fresh rosemary, bulb of garlic, red onions, balsamic vinegar, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. Put the potatoes into a pan of boiling, salted water and cook for around 8 minutes, then drain and return to the pan. Chuff them up a bit by shaking the pan. Get a roasting pan, into which you can fit the potatoes in 1 layer, and heat it on the stove. When hot, pour a glug of olive oil into it and add the butter, rosemary and garlic. Add the potatoes and toss them in all the flavors. Add the onions and all the balsamic vinegar and season with salt and pepper. Cook for 5 minutes on the burner to reduce the balsamic vinegar a little. Place the pan on the top shelf and cook for around 50 minutes, until the potatoes and onions are dark, sticky and crispy - removing the pan to toss the onions and potatoes halfway through. ; name: yellow squash with basil ; ingredients: olive oil, yellow squash, garlic, water, salt, black pepper, basil ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet over medium-high heat. Saute squash until browned, about 5 minutes. Add garlic. Saute 1 minute. Add water, salt and pepper. Simmer until squash is tender, 6-7 minutes. Stir in basil. ; name: country yellow squash bake ; ingredients: yellow squash, onion, sour cream, salt, dried basil, ground red pepper, soft breadcrumbs, cheddar cheese, butter, paprika ; preparation:Cook squash and onion in boiling water 10 or 15 minutes or until tender. Drain well, and mash. Combine squash mixture, sour cream, salt, dried basil and red pepper, stirring well. Spoon mixture into a greased 2 quart casserole. Combine breadcrumbs, cheddar cheese, margarine and paprika and toss well. Sprinkle over squash mixture. Bake, uncovered, at 300 degrees for 30 minutes or until thoroughly heated. ; name: sardine and vegetable saute ; ingredients: olive oil, balsamic vinegar, garlic granules, salt, collard greens, yellow squash, onion, water, tomato paste ; preparation:Place seasonings and vegetables into 1 gallon zip lock bag and tumble until all the vegetables are coated thoroughly. Empty coated vegetables into large skillet and saute 5 - 7 minutes over medium heat. Add sardines, tomato paste and water. Stir thoroughly breaking sardines into small pieces. Saute 5 - 7 more minutes or until vegetables are tender. Serve and enjoy. ; name: roasted sweet potatoes potatoes and carrots ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, potatoes, baby carrots, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, oregano, rosemary, bulb of garlic, black pepper ; preparation:Peel and cut in bite size pieces all the vegetable. Peel and squash the garlic but do not cut it. Mix the vegetables, garlic and all remaining. Ingredients. Spread on a parchemin lined pan. Broil until nice and golden about half an hour. ; name: sweet potato salad with rosemary honey vinaigrette ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, olive oil, honey, white wine vinegar, fresh rosemary, garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Line a 15- x 10-inch jellyroll pan with aluminum foil. Coat foil with vegetable cooking spray. Toss together sweet potato and 1 tablespoon oil in pan. Bake at 450 for 35 minutes or until tender. Whisk together remaining 1 tablespoon oil, honey, and next 5 ingredients in a large bowl. Add sweet potato. Toss well. Cool. ; name: grilled summer squash ; ingredients: summer squash, onion, fresh ground pepper, garlic powder, salt, butter, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat grill. Arrange veggies on a piece of aluminum foil large enought to form a packet. Sprinkle pepper, garlic powder, & salt over veggies. Slice butter into desired pieces and place on top of veggies. Drizzle with olive oil. Seal packet leaving enough room for veggies to steam. Place on grill for approximately 20 minutes or until veggies are soft and flip packet as necessary for even cooking. ; name: weight watchers ww roasted squash risotto ; ingredients: butternut squash, fresh rosemary, red onion, risotto rice, vegetable stock, garlic cloves, light cream cheese, balsamic vinegar, cooking spray ; preparation:

name: frozen peanut butter pies ; ingredients: peanut butter, cream cheese, powdered sugar, milk, whipped topping, graham cracker pie crust, peanuts ; preparation:Mix all ingredients except pie crusts. Divide mixture equally between the three pie crusts. Top with chopped peanuts or graham cracker crumbs, if desired. Freeze. Leave out or refrigerate to soften a bit before cutting. Store leftover in freezer. ; name: no bake creamy coconut pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, milk, flaked coconut, whipped topping, almond extract, graham cracker crust ; preparation:Combine cream cheese, sugar, milk and coconut in blender. Blend at medium speed for 30 seconds. Fold into whipped topping. Add extract, spoon into crust. Freeze for about 4 hours. Sprinkle with additional coconut, toasted, if desired. Let stand at room temperature for 5 minutes before serving. Store in freezer. ; name: cheesecake pecan pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, egg, sugar, salt, vanilla, 9-inch deep dish pie crust, pecans, eggs, light corn syrup ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients. Beat at low speed until smooth. Pour into pastry shell. Sprinkle with pecans. Combine 3 eggs and remaining ingredients, mixing well. Spoon over pecan layer. Bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes or until set. ; name: granny s coconut pie ; ingredients: frozen pie crusts, milk, flaked coconut, sugar, vanilla, eggs, butter ; preparation:Put coconut in a bowl. Pour milk over and set aside. Cream butter and sugar, add eggs one at a time till mixed well. Add vanilla. Stir in coconut and milk. Poke thawed crusts well with a fork. Pour batter evenly into the two crusts. Bake at 350 for 30 to 40 mins or till center is almost set and pie is golden brown. ; name: reese s cup pie ; ingredients: graham cracker pie crust, peanut butter, milk, chocolate pudding mix ; preparation:In medium mixing bowl with mixer on low. Cream peanutbutter until soft. Gradually add milk while continuely to mix. When all milk is mixed with peanutbutter, add pudding mix and continue to blend until ingredients are smooth and combined well. Pour mix into baked shell, chill at least 4 hours. ; name: the realtor s black forest pie quick and easy ; ingredients: cheese, milk, instant chocolate pudding mix, graham cracker pie crust, cherry pie filling ; preparation:In a mixer bowl, beat cream cheese until fluffy. Gradually beat in cold milk, then instant chocolate pudding mix. Beat on low speed with an electric mixer for 1 minute, then on medium speed for 30 seconds, scraping the bowl often. Pour into graham cracker pie crust and chill until firm. Just before serving, spoon cherry pie filling on top. ; name: chocolate cheesecake pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, butter, powdered sugar, vanilla extract, milk chocolate chips, frozen whipped topping, chocolate cookie pie crust ; preparation:In large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, butter, sugar, and vanilla. Beat in melted chocolate. Fold in whipped topping. Spoon into crust. Cover and chill until serving. ; name: chocolate turtle pie ; ingredients: eggs, sweetened condensed milk, butter, pecans, milk chocolate, graham cracker pie crusts, caramel ice cream topping ; preparation:

name: coconut lentil soup ; ingredients: red lentils, fresh ginger, onion, garlic clove, oil, turmeric, chicken stock, crushed tomatoes, coconut milk ; preparation:Rinse and drain lentils. Finely chop ginger, onion and garlic clove. Heat oil in a pot and saut chopped ginger, onion and garlic until softened. Add turmeric, hot chicken stock, crushed tomatoes and the lentils. Bring to boil and allow to simmer for 20 minutes. Puree the soup in a blender until smooth and return to the pot. Add coconut milk and heat gently. ; name: tomato lentil stew ; ingredients: lentils, onions, oil, chopped tomatoes, water, oregano, basil, black pepper, salt ; preparation:Cook lentils in the water. Meanwhile, chop the onions. Saut onions in a little oil. Add the tomatoes when the onions are translucent. Cook 5-10 min then add the lentils. Cook 5 more minutes. ; name: steak pizzaiola ; ingredients: chuck steaks, coarse salt, black pepper, olive oil, garlic cloves, dried oregano, dried thyme, crushed red pepper flakes, tomato paste, whole tomatoes ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 325 degrees fahrenheit. Season the meat on both sides with salt and pepper. Heat a large ovenproof skillet over high heat and swirl in the olive oil. Brown the meat on both sides. Remove the meat from the skillet and take the pan off the heat. Stir into the pan the garlic, oregano, thyme, red pepper akes, tomato paste and whole tomatoes. Mash up the tomatoes with the back of a spoon, return the meat to the pan, spoon the sauce over it, and cover tightly. Braise in the oven for at least 2 hours, stirring occasionally. Uncover and cook for an additional 30 minutes, until the sauce has thickened up. ; name: warm chorizo and thyme lentils ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, chorizo sausages, celery, garlic cloves, thyme, green lentils, chicken stock, salt and pepper, red wine vinegar ; preparation:Heat oil in deep frypan. Add onion and chorizo, cook about 8 minutes till browned. Add celery, garlic and thyme, cook further 5 minutes. Add lentils, stock, salt and pepper, cook 25 minutes till lentils are tender. Remove from the heat, stir through vinegar. ; name: mushroom barley casserole ; ingredients: onion, butter, fresh mushrooms, garlic cloves, water, barley, onion and mushroom soup mix, dried thyme, salt ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook onion in hot, melted butter over med heat until tender. Add in mushrooms and garlic. Cook about 5 minutes or until mushrooms are tender, stirring occasionally. Transfer mixture to a greased 3-quart baking dish. Stir in the water, barley, dry soup mix, thyme, and salt. Bake, covered, at 350 for about 1 hour and 15 minutes or until barley is tender and most of the liquid is absorbed, stirring once or twice. Let stand, covered, for 15 minutes before serving. ; name: lentils with onion and garlic ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, dried red chili, green lentil, water ; preparation:Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top. ; name: beef tenderloin steaks with creole spice rub ; ingredients: beef tenderloin steaks, dry mustard, garlic powder, sage, dried thyme, salt, cumin, ground red pepper, ground black pepper ; preparation:Combine rub ingredients. Rub evenly over steaks. Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Coat pan with cooking spray. Add steaks to pan. Cook 4 minutes on each or until desired degree of doneness. Remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. ; name: ranch style lentils ; ingredients: dry lentils, salt, water, lean ground beef, garlic cloves, onion soup mix, ketchup, prepared mustard, vinegar, pepper ; preparation:

name: scalloped potatoes and vegetables ; ingredients: cream of onion soup, milk, frozen diced potatoes, frozen mixed vegetables, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Stir together soup and milk in a large mixing bowl. Stir in potatoes, mixed vegetables, and 1 cup cheese. Pour into a greased 13x9 casserole dish. Bake, covered at 350 degrees for 45 minutes. Uncover and bake for 30 more minutes, until potatoes are tender. Remove from oven and sprinkle with remaining 1 cup cheese. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. ; name: chile scalloped potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, green chilies, cream of celery soup, milk, bacon, cheese sauce mix, bell pepper, onion ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Mix the potatoes with chiles, soup, milk, bacon, and cheese sauce. Saute the bell pepper and onion in bacon drippings until tender. Add to potato mix. Cover and bake 1 hours. ; name: kielbasa and potato bake ; ingredients: condensed cream of mushroom soup, onion, milk, kielbasa, salt, ground black pepper, russet potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, mix together soup, onion, milk, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir, in potatoes and kielbasa. Spoon into a 7x11 inch casserole dish. Place casserole on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 90 minutes or until potatoes are tender. ; name: chicken baked in a spinach cream sauce ; ingredients: vegetable oil, whole chicken breasts, frozen chopped spinach, sour cream, mayonnaise, dry vegetable soup mix, onions, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Add oil to a large fry pan and turn the heat up to med-high. Brown each chicken strip until each side is lightly golden brown. Remove chicken and place in a 9 x 13 baking dish. Set aside. In a 2 qt mixing bowl mix the next 5 ingredients until smooth. Spoon this cream sauce over the top of the previously browned chicken in the baking dish and smooth it out and then lightly sprinkle the parmesan over the top of the cream sauce. Place the baking dish in a preheated 350 degree for 20-30 minutes until heated through. Serve over pasta or egg noodles or with mashed potatoes on the side. ; name: jurassic chicken casserole ; ingredients: cream of chicken soup, cheese, mayonnaise, canned vegetables, chicken breasts, garlic, onion, olive oil, fried onions ; preparation:Combine the first 4 ingredients in a large bowl. Stir until smooth and set aside. Brown the onions with the garlic, using the olive oil. Add the diced chicken to the onions if you are using raw chicken. Mix the chicken and onions in the bowl. Put mixture into a baking dish. Top with a thick layer of the fried onions, chips, or crackers. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes or until hot and bubbly. ; name: mashed potatoes extraordinaire ; ingredients: potatoes, cream cheese, sour cream, butter, onion powder, salt, pepper, paprika ; preparation:Cook potatoes as usual in salted water until tender. Drain. Push through potato ricer. Add cream cheese in pieces. Add next 5 ingredients. Beat until smooth and fluffy. Scrape into a 2 qt casserole. Place dabs of butter here and there over the top of the potatoes. Sprinkle with paprika. Cover and heat in 350 f oven until heated through. ; name: 1 potato 2 potato ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, sour cream, cheddar cheese, garlic cloves, salt and black pepper, frozen potato wedges, bacon, green onions, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. Spray a quiche dish with nonstick cooking spray. Mix mashed potatoes, sour cream, cheddar cheese, and garlic in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Stir to blend. Spread mashed potato mixture evenly into the quiche dish. Arrange the frozen potato wedges in a spoke wheel fashion on top of the mashed potatoes. For curly fries, make a random pattern, breaking in half any large fries. Sprinkle with bacon bits, green onion and parmesan cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes. Cut into wedges and serve. ; name: kilasara potato bake ; ingredients: potatoes, condensed cream of chicken soup, sour cream, cheddar cheese, butter, onion ; preparation:

name: grilled shark to die for ; ingredients: soy sauce, shark steaks, catsup, orange juice, lemon juice, fresh parsley, garlic cloves, pepper ; preparation:Combine soy sauce, orange juice, catsup, chopped parsley, lemon juice, pepper, and minced garlic. Add fish. Cover and marinate in refrigerator for 2 hours. Remove fish from marinade, reserving marinade. Grill fish over hot coals 6 minutes on each side or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork, basting frequently with marinade. ; name: tuna with pineapple and peppers ; ingredients: tuna steaks, pineapple ring, low sodium soy sauce, garlic, fresh ginger, red bell pepper, green bell pepper ; preparation:In small bowl stir together the soy sauce, garlic, pineapple juice and ginger. Place the tune steaks in a shallow dish and pour half the marinade over them. Flip to coat both sides. Place the peppers and pineapple in another dish and cover with remaining marinade. Toss lightly to coat. Cover both dishes and marinate in refrigerator for at least an hour. Coat broiler pan with non-stick cooking spray. Place the tuna steaks, pineapple and peppers on pan and broil for approximately 4-5 minutes per side. You may use the marinade from the pineapple and peppers to baste while cooking. Do not use the marinade from the tuna. ; name: simple grilled pork chops ; ingredients: lemon juice, soy sauce, olive oil, brown sugar, fresh rosemary, salt and pepper, pork rib chops ; preparation:Combine all the ingredients except the pork chops and whisk together. Pour into a re-sealable bag or a covered glass dish. Add the pork chops and toss to coat. Marinate for thirty minutes in the refrigerator. Remove the pork chops from the refrigerator and allow to come to room temperature. Grill over high heat for three minutes on each side. This will sear the meat. Allow to cook for six to eight minutes over medium heat. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and serve immediately. ; name: hraimeh spicy libyan fish ; ingredients: olive oil, water, lemon, juice of, tomato puree, garlic cloves, salt, ground cumin, ground caraway, paprika, tuna steaks ; preparation:Mix oil, water, lemon juice, tomato puree, garlic, salt and spices. Pour into a wide shallow pan and simmer for 10 minutes. Add the fish and turn it over on both sides so it absorbs the sauce. Cover and cook on a low heat for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with parsley or coriander and serve. ; name: south american style steak ; ingredients: rib eye steaks, orange juice, fresh lemon juice, fresh lime juice, garlic, vegetable oil, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Place steaks in shallow baking dish. Pour orange, lemon and lime juices over steaks. Add garlic and turn steaks to coat. Marinate steaks, covered, for 4 hours or overnight in refrigerator. Heat oil in a heavy skillet over high heat until almost smoking. Season with salt& pepper, and cayenne. Fry steaks until brown on both sides, turning once, about 4 minutes. Transfer to plates and serve. You can grill if you prefer. ; name: glazed pork chops and apple bake ; ingredients: pork steaks, salt & pepper, apples, water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350. Spray a pan large enough to hold the chops in a single layer with non-stick spray. Season the pork steaks or chops with salt& pepper. Arrange them in single layer in the prepared pan. Cover and bake for 30 minutes. Remove the chops from the pan and pour off the fat. Place the apples in the pan and top with the baked chops. Combine the water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce and lemon juice, and pour over the pork and apples. Bake uncovered, basting occasionally, for 45 minutes or until pork is tender. ; name: thai chilli swordfish ; ingredients: swordfish steaks, olive oil, of fresh mint, fresh coriander, chili sauce, nam pla, fresh ginger, sea salt ; preparation:Sprinkle a little sea salt over the fish. Heat the oil in a very hot skillet. Cook the fish in the skillet for about 4 minutes each side, or until cooked to your liking. Meanwhile, put remaining ingredients in a screw-top jar and shake vigorously. Serve the fish with a little of the sauce drizzled over. ; name: caribbean grilled tuna ; ingredients: tuna steaks, lime juice, olive oil, jamaican jerk spice ; preparation:

name: barbecue ribs ; ingredients: spareribs, brown sugar, catsup, soy sauce, dry mustard, chili sauce, dark rum, worcestershire sauce, garlic, pepper ; preparation:Wrap ribs in double thickness of foil and bake for 2 hours at 300 degrees f. Unwrap and drain drippings. Combine all ingredients and pour over ribs. Marinate at room temperature for 1 hour. Bake at 350 degrees 30 minutes, basting with sauce, or grill 30 minutes, 4 inches above coals turning and basting. ; name: awesome baked beans ; ingredients: pork and beans, tomato sauce, mustard, worcestershire sauce, white onion, green bell pepper, deli ham, brown sugar ; preparation:Set pork-n-beans in a collander to drain while you mix together the rest. In large bowl stir together tomato sauce, mustard, worcestershire sauce. Stir in onion, bell pepper and ham. Once it is well mixed stir in the brown sugar til it is dissolved. Now add beans to the mix. Bake at 425 for one hour. This is always a crowd pleaser. ; name: hungry jack casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, salt, pork & beans, barbecue sauce, brown sugar, instant minced onion, flakey biscuits, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Brown ground beef and strain. Add next 5 ingredients and heat til bubbly. Pour into 2 quart casserole dish. Peel biscuits in half and lay across top. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes. ; name: best western beans ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, baked beans, brown sugar, vinegar, ketchup, salt and pepper ; preparation:Brown beef with onions seasoned with salt and pepper until no longer pink. Drain. Mix in 2 cans of beans, sugar, vinegar and ketchup. Put in an ovenware dish, cover and bake for 1 hour at 350. I usually make this the day before and reheat to serve. ; name: beans and bacon ; ingredients: bacon, baked beans in tomato sauce, onion, green pepper, brown sugar, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, liquid smoke, salsa, mustard ; preparation:Cook bacon until crisp. Drain well. Turn into slow cooker. Add remaining ingredients. Stir. Cover and cook on low for 6 to 7 hours. ; name: french canadian baked beans ; ingredients: white pea beans, onion, dry mustard, ground black pepper, pure maple syrup, salt pork, salt ; preparation:Pour the beans onto a plate, and pick-over looking for bad beans, or stones. Place beans in bowl, cover with water by at least 2 inches, and soak overnight. Preheat oven to 250 degrees f. Drain beans and place in 4-quart bean pot. Add onion, dry mustard, pepper, salt, and maple syrup. Add water to cover. Cut salt pork into 1-inch pieces and place on top of beans. Bake covered, approximately 8 hours. Check each hour to see if water needs to be added. You can add more maple syrup in place of water for flavor, if desired. Serve the beans with brown bread, franks, or ham. For breakfast, serve with eggs, bacon, and home-fries. ; name: apple baked bean casserole ; ingredients: onion, baked beans, granny smith apple, prepared mustard, brown sugar, salt, bacon ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Coat a 2-quart baking dish with nonstick cooking spray. In a large bowl, combine all the ingredients except the bacon and mix well. Pour into the baking dish and lay the raw strips of bacon on top. Cover and bake for approximately 45 minutes, or until thick and bubbly. Uncover and bake for 5 more minute. ; name: margaret lefever s wonderful baked beans ; ingredients: dried navy beans, brown sugar, catsup, barbecue sauce, dry mustard, bacon ; preparation:

name: sticky balsamic tomato salad ; ingredients: balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, tomatoes, feta cheese, basil leaves, salt and pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Place vinegar and sugar in saucepan over medium heat. Bring to boil, cook 8 - 10 minutes till thickened. Watch carefully though. Set aside to cool. Arrange tomato, feta and basil on serving plate. Drizzle with oil and dressing, season. ; name: sauteed pear salad ; ingredients: boston lettuce, olive oil, bosc pears, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, sugar, salt, black pepper ; preparation:In large serving bowl, place lettuce. In 12-inch nonstick skillet, heat oil on medium-heat 1 minute. Add pears and cook 10 to 15 minutes or until they begin to soften and turn golden. Meanwhile, in cup, stir vinegar, dijon mustard, sugar, salt, and pepper. Add vinegar mixture to pears in skillet, and cook 1 minute or until liquid begins to thicken. Pour pears and liquid from skillet into bowl with lettuce, toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: marinated cucumber salad on salad greens ; ingredients: olive oil, white wine vinegar, frozen orange juice concentrate, honey, red pepper flakes, kosher salt, cucumbers, grape tomatoes, green onions, mixed salad greens ; preparation:In a bowl combine first 5 ingredients, mixing well. Add salt to your taste. Add cucumber mix to bowl, tossing to coat. Set aside at room temperature to marinate 30 minutes. Arrange chilled prepared salad mix on plates. Spoon cucumber mixture on top. ; name: roasted kumara sweet potato salad ; ingredients: kumara, olive oil, sea salt, romaine lettuce, cherry tomatoes, radishes, feta cheese, pine nuts, balsamic vinegar, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Pre-heat the oven to 350f. Place the kumara in a baking dish and drizzle with 2 tablespoons olive oil. Sprinkle on a pinch of salt. Roast for 25 minutes or until soft. Set aside to cool. Divide lettuce, tomato halves and radish slices between two chilled plates. Top each with half of the cooled kumara. Sprinkle on crumbled feta and pine nuts. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Sprinkle with freshly ground black pepper. ; name: broccoli salad with gouda ; ingredients: broccoli florets, red onion, grape tomatoes, slivered almonds, gouda cheese, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, sugar, black pepper, salt ; preparation:Cook broccoli in boiling salted water for 1 minute. Drain well. Rinse with cold water. Drain well agin. Combine the broccoli with onion, tomatoes, nuts and cheese. In a small bowl, whisk together oil, vinegar, sugar, pepper and salt. Pour over salad mixture and toss to coat. ; name: crunchy red cabbage slaw salad ; ingredients: red cabbage, carrot, red apple, green onion, mayonnaise, wine vinegar, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Using a large knife, shred the cabbage. Place in a large bowl with the carrot, apple and green onions. Whisk the mayonnaise, vinegar and oil. Season. Toss with the salad and serve. ; name: champagne chicken salad ; ingredients: mayonnaise, sugar, champagne, white vinegar, cooked chicken, red apple, pear, lettuce, feta ; preparation:Combine the mayonnaise, sugar, champagne, and vinegar. Whisk together until blended. Combine the salad dressing, chicken, apples, pears in a bowl, and mix well. Serve over lettuce. Sprinkle with feta cheese. ; name: tangy avocado orange salad ; ingredients: oranges, red leaf lettuce, avocado, white balsamic vinegar ; preparation:

name: crock pot creamy chicken fettuccine ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic powder, onion powder, pepper, condensed cream of chicken soup, process american cheese, sliced ripe olives, fettuccine ; preparation:Place the chicken in crock pot and sprinkle with garlic powder, onion powder and pepper. Top with soup. Cover and cook on low 6-8 hours or until chicken juices run clear. Stir in cheese and olives. Cover and cook until cheese is melted. Meanwhile, cook fettuccine according to package directions and drain. Serve chicken on top of fettuccine. ; name: best baked chicken breast ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, dried parsley, salt, pepper, lemon juice, garlic powder, butter ; preparation:Preheat your oven to 350. In a large bowl mix the breadcrumbs, parmesan, parsley, salt, pepper and garlic powder. Dip the chicken breasts in the melted butter. Dip the chicken in the breaded mix. Brush lemon juice onto the tops of the chicken. Place chicken on a baking sheet and bake at 350 for one hour. ; name: chicken cordon bleu nuggets ; ingredients: eggs, dried thyme, salt and pepper, swiss cheese, boneless chicken breast, breadcrumbs, flour, deli ham ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f. In a small mixing bowl, beat the eggs with a splash of water. On a plate combine breadcrumbs and thyme. Then on another plate combine flour with a pinch of salt and pepper. Lay ham strips on work surface, top each slice with cheese then place chicken chink toward the end of the strip. Rollup lightly, and coat with flour, eggs and breadcrumbs. Cook for 20 mins or until done. ; name: simple saucy scrumptious chicken cordon bleu ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, margarine, swiss cheese, ham, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Cut chicken breasts in half to butterfly them into cutlets. Sprinkle with some salt and pepper melt margarine in skillet and brown chicken in margarine and transfer to a 9x13 pan. Pour soup and sour cream into same skillet and whisk till smooth and warm. Place ham on top of chicken and top with a slice of swiss cheese. Pour soup mixture over top and bake uncovered for 40 minutes. ; name: baked panko chicken parmesan ; ingredients: chicken tenderloins, parmesan cheese, panko breadcrumbs, italian seasoning, salt, black pepper, garlic powder, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Beat eggs in a bowl. Combine cheeses, bread crumbs and spices in a separate bowl. Dip chicken pieces in egg, then bread crumb mixture, then egg, then bread crumb mixture again. Place chicken on a cookie sheet and bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes. Serve over pasta with marinara sauce and mozzarella. Or place chicken on a hoagie roll with marinara and mozzarella for a chicken parmesan sub. Also great for dipping with marinara or ranch. ; name: nif s quick and tasty parmesan chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, milk, garlic powder, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, paprika, salt and pepper, grapeseed oil ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Pound the chicken breasts to an even thickness with the side of a mallet. Mix milk and garlic powder together in a shallow dish. Mix breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese and paprika in a separate shallow dish. Add salt and pepper to taste. Heat frying pan on medium heat and add oil. Coat the chicken in milk and press into the breadcrumb mixture. Brown both sides of the chicken in the hot pan, about 4 to 5 minutes on each side. Place chicken on a baking sheet. Bake until cooked through, about 20 minutes. ; name: easy authentic tasting chicken parmesan parmigiana ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, salt and pepper, eggs, milk, italian style breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, provolone cheese, spaghetti sauce, vegetable oil ; preparation:Combine eggs, milk, salt and pepper in a shallow bowl or pie plate. Combine bread crumbs and parmesan cheese in a shallow bowl, plate or pie plate. Dip each chicken cutlet in egg mixture and then coat completely with bread crumb mixture. Heat half inch of oil in a pan over med-high heat. Fry each cutlet and turn over when golden brown. Heat oven to 400 degrees. When cutlets are crispy and golden on both side and juices run clear, place them on a baking sheet. Place a slice of provolone cheese on top of each cutlet and place in the oven. In the meantime, heat sauce in the microwave or on the stove top. When cheese is melted, remove cutlets from oven and spoon some sauce nicely over each one. Sprinkle with grated parmesan cheese. Serve with your favorite pasta and remaining sauce. ; name: crock pot chicken cordon bleu ; ingredients: chicken breasts, swiss cheese, deli ham, cream of chicken soup, milk, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, garlic powder, onion powder ; preparation:

name: sunshine rice ; ingredients: olive oil, celery, onions, water, orange juice, lemon juice, hot sauce, long-grain white rice, slivered almonds ; preparation:Heat oil in medium saucepan. Add celery and onions and saute until tender. Add water, juices, and hot sauce. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice and bring back to boil, let stand covered until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed. Stir in almonds, serve immediately. ; name: irish lemon cauliflower broccoli ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, fresh ginger, salt, cauliflower, broccoli, fresh lemon juice, lemon, zest of ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet, add onions ginger& salt.
