With mixers on low, gradually add flour mixture, beating just until combined. Fold in chocolate chips. Drop dough by tablespoons onto two baking sheets, 2 inches apart. Bake until cookies are no longer shiny - 10-12 minutes. Let cool two minutes and transfer to wire rack. ; name: copy cat mrs fields chocolate chip cookie with toasted pecans ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, pecans, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300f. In a medium bowl mix the flour, baking soda, and salt together. In a large bowl cream the butter and sugar together with a mixer set at medium speed. Beat in the eggs and vanilla until just mixed together. Add the flour mixture, chocolate chips, and pecans. Mix in at low speed until just mixed together. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoons 2 inch apart onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes depending on your oven. Bake until the cookie is golden. Wait 1 minute and transfer the cookies to a wire rack to cool. ; name: classic chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, butter, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a medium mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time, then vanilla. On low speed gradually add flour mixture and mix just until blended. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 9 to 12 minutes. Transfer cookies to cooling racks to cool. ; name: funfetti cookies from scratch ; ingredients: flour, salt, baking soda, butter, sugar, pure vanilla extract, egg, milk, candy sprinkles ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix together with a whisk the flour, salt and baking soda. Using an electric mixer, cream butter and sugar in a large bowl until light and fluffy. Beat in vanilla and egg. Add flour mixture and beat until smooth. Blend in milk. Mix in sprinkles until evenly distributed. Drop by teaspoon about 3 inches apart onto greased baking sheets. Flatten with bottom of glass that has been dipped in sugar. Bake for about 8 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. Cool on rack. ; name: baby ruth cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, baby ruth candy bars ; preparation:

name: dad s singing hinnie ; ingredients: flour, salt, baking soda, cream of tartar, lard, golden raisin, candied orange peel, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Sift flour, salt, baking soda, and cream of tartar into mixing bowl. Rub in the lard with finger. Stir in raisins and candied orange peel. Stir in milk, adding enough to make soft, slightly sticky dough. Turn dough onto floured board and shape into round loaf about two inches thick. Work dough lightly or it will be tough. Turn loaf floured side up and set on lightly greased baking sheet. Bake at 400 degrees until browned and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Cool on a rack. Just before serving, slice and spread with butter. ; name: moist banana walnut bread ; ingredients: butter, sugar, bananas, eggs, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, buttermilk, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Grease and flour a loaf pan. Cream the butter and sugar thoroughly. Add the bananas, eggs and vanilla. Beat well. Sift together the flour, baking soda, and salt. Stir flour mixture into the banana mixture, alternating with the buttermilk. Add walnuts and mix well. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan. Bake at 325f for 1 hour and 15 minutes. Let the bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes before turning it out onto a cooling rack to cool completely. ; name: quick chocolate chip scones ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, baking soda, egg, skim milk, lemon juice, butter, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Place wax paper on a large baking sheet. Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl. Combine other ingredients in a second bowl. Blend the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients. Add chocolate chips. Drop by large spoonfuls onto the baking sheet. Bake 15 minutes. ; name: kathy s strawberry bread ; ingredients: flour, sugar, eggs, oil, baking soda, salt, frozen strawberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Grease and sugar two 9 x 5 loaf pans. Set aside. Beat eggs in small bowl. Set aside. Mix oil and sugar. Add eggs. Add flour, soda and salt. Add thawed strawberries and mix. Pour into loaf pans. Bake for 1 hour or until tests clean. ; name: orange and almond cake gluten free ; ingredients: orange, eggs, caster sugar, almond meal, baking powder, icing sugar, butter ; preparation:Place orange in boiling water for 2 hours. Remove and allow to cool. This can be done ahead of time. Preheat oven to 180c. Break eggs into a blender. Add caster sugar and blend together. Cut up orange and place into egg mix, and blend together to a smooth consistency. Add the almond meal and baking powder and blend. Grease baking pan and dust with caster sugar. Pour batter into the pan and sprinkle caster sugar on top and bake for 1 hour or until top is golden brown. Dust with icing sugar to serve. ; name: big moist banana bread ; ingredients: sugar, shortening, eggs, milk, banana, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, walnuts ; preparation:Mix together sugar, shortenign and eggs. Stir in milk and bananas. Sift together and stir in flour, baking powder, soda and salt. Blend in chopped nuts. Pour into well greased 9 x 5 x3 inch pan. Let stand for 20 minutes before baking. Bake at 350 degrees until it tests done. ; name: never fail banana bread ; ingredients: flour, margarine, bananas, nuts, salt, sugar, eggs, baking soda ; preparation:Mix sugar and margarine till creamy. Then add eggs and mix well. Add all other ingredients. Bake at 350 for 1 hour. Also makes beautiful muffins. ; name: orange bread ; ingredients: oranges, cold water, sugar, egg, milk, salt, nuts, baking powder, flour ; preparation:

name: thai chicken and noodles ; ingredients: rice noodles, sweet chili sauce, chicken fillets, chicken stock, red capsicum, brown sugar, fish sauce, coriander ; preparation:Heat a wok and spray with olive oil spray, add sweet chilli sauce. Add chicken and cook 3- 4 minutes until cooked. Add chicken stock, capsicum and noodles. Toss over low heat for 8- 10 minutes, then add sugar, fish sauce and coriander. Heat through. ; name: ann s chicken oriental ; ingredients: chicken breasts, rose wine, salad oil, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, paprika, garlic powder, pepper, oregano ; preparation:Place one cut up fryer or 4 breasts in a casserole. Combine all other ingredients. Pour sauce over chicken. Place in 350 degree oven. After 1 hour turn chicken. Back another 30-45 minutes. Serve with white rice. ; name: vietnamese dipping sauce vegan nuoc cham alternative ; ingredients: soy sauce, rice wine, garlic, lemongrass, ground cinnamon, bird chile, peanut oil, sugar, salt ; preparation:Combine soy sauce and rice wine in a small bowl. Place garlic and lemongrass in a mortar and pound into a paste. Add garlic mixture to soy mixture. Stir in cinnamon and chile. Stir in oil, sugar and salt and mix well. Store refrigerated in a tightly-covered container for up to 3 days. ; name: garlic glazed chicken ; ingredients: chicken breasts, garlic clove, vinegar, soy sauce, honey, dried red peppers, oil, green onion, sesame seeds, rice ; preparation:Cube chicken into bite-seize pieces. Fry over high heat, stirring often for 3-4 minutes. Add all other ingredients. Cook on mediun-high 15 minutes or until syrupy. Sprinkle with garnishes. Serve over hot rice. ; name: grilled short ribs ; ingredients: soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic cloves, sesame oil, beef short ribs, lettuce leaf, sticky rice, red miso ; preparation:Whisk together marinade ingredients in a 15 x 10 inch pan and add ribs to marindade, turning to coat and let marinade for 30 minutes to 2 hours at room temperature. Prepare grill to medium high heat. Brush grill with oil. Grill ribs until cooked through. Remove meat from bones. Wrap meat in lettuce leavs with a small amount of miso and sticky rice. ; name: vegetable curry microwave ; ingredients: onion, green curry paste, vegetables, chickpeas, light coconut milk, lemon juice, soy sauce, nuts ; preparation:Place onion and curry paste in 3 ltr casserole dish. Cook on full power 2 minutes. Add vegetables, chick peas, coconut milk, lemon juice and soy sauce. Cook full power 6-8 minutes. Sprinkle with chopped nuts. Serve with jasmine rice. ; name: yakitori japanese grilled chicken skewers ; ingredients: chicken breast, green onions, soy sauce, chicken stock, sake, sugar, mirin ; preparation:Bring yakitori sauce to a boil for 5 min then set aside. Thread the chicken alternately with the green onions onto the skewers. Grill chicken in a preheated griller, turning every now and then and basting at the same time to keep it moist. Drippings can be returned to baste the chicken until it is cooked. Baste the yakitori again and serve with left over sauce. ; name: thai green chicken curry with spaghetti ; ingredients: chicken breast, coconut milk, sweet basil, eggplants, green curry paste, fish sauce, sugar, thai chile, kaffir lime leaf, spaghetti ; preparation:

name: st urho s day fish stew ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, salt, allspice berries, water, fish, cream, milk, unsalted butter, fresh dill ; preparation:In a large kettle, place potatoes, onion, salt, allspice and water. Cover and bring to a boil then reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Cut fish into bite-size chunks and add to potato mixture. Simmer covered for another 15 to 20 minutes or just until fish flakes easily. Do not boil the soup. Stir in cream, milk, butter and dill. Heat through and serve. ; name: garlic mashed red potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, garlic cloves, butter, nonfat milk, salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place potatoes and garlic in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Stir in parmesan cheese. ; name: kicked up bacon cheese mashed potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, salt, half-and-half, butter, pepper, bacon, sharp cheddar cheese, sour cream, chives ; preparation:Place potatoes and 1 tsp salt in a saucepan, cover with water, bring to a boil. Reduce heat to simmer. Cook until potatoes are tender, about 20 minutes. Drain, return to pot. Add half and half, butter, remaining salt, pepper. Place pan over medium low heat, mash for 4-5 minutes. Add bacon, cheese, sour cream, chives and stir. ; name: emeril s sweet potato mash ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, water, unsalted butter, salt & freshly ground black pepper, ground cinnamon, honey ; preparation:In a large pot over high heat, bring the sweet potatoes and water to a boil. Cook for 10 to 15 minutes or until the sweet potatoes are tender. Drain well and return to the pot. Add butter, salt and pepper to taste, cinnamon and honey and mash until all ingredients are combined. Serve immediately. ; name: creamy mashed potatoes with chives ; ingredients: yukon gold potatoes, nonfat milk, salt, light cream cheese with chives and onions ; preparation:Place potatoes in a dutch oven, and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer for 10 minutes or until tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Add the milk and salt. Mash the potato mixture with a potato masher to desired consistency. Add the cheese, and stir just until blended. ; name: baby new potatoes with creamy parmesan sauce ; ingredients: new potatoes, butter, flour, milk, salt, black pepper, ground nutmeg, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cover potatoes with water, bring to a boil, lower heat, cover and simmer until tender, about 8 minutes. Drain and cover to keep warm. In saucepan over medium high heat, melt butter, whisk in flour, then milk, stirring constantly until thick. Season sauce with salt, black pepper and nutmeg. Stir in cheese. Pour sauce over potatoes and stir to coat. ; name: buttered potatoes ; ingredients: new potatoes, butter, lemon zest, lemon juice, chives, fresh parsley, salt, pepper, nutmeg ; preparation:Wash potatoes, peel, and quarter. To cook heat 1 inch of salted water to boiling, and add potatoes. Cover and reduce heat to medium and cook potatoes until tender, 20 to 25 minutes. In small saucepan, heat the rest of the ingredients to boiling and keep warmed on low heat to wait for potatoes to cook. Drain potatoes in colander and put into a serving dish. Stir in lemon butter and mix throughly with potatoes. ; name: smashed loaded potatoes low fat ; ingredients: new potatoes, smart balance light butter spread, nonfat milk, nonfat sour cream, bacon bits, fresh chives, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: chicken noodle soup ii ; ingredients: chicken pieces, rosemary, hot water, pepper, celery, salt, carrot, thin egg noodles, dried basil ; preparation:In a 5-qt casserole combine chicken, 4 cups hot water, celery, carrots, basil, rosemary, pepper and salt. Microwave at high 30-40 minutes, or until chicken falls easily from the bone, stirring twice during cooking. Remove chicken from the bones. Discard bones and skin. Dice meat and return to caserole. Add 2 cups hot water and noodles. Cover. Microwave at high 8-10 minutes, or until water boils. Then, microwave at high 7-10 minutes, or until noodles are tender. ; name: chicken penne with basil chilli parsley ; ingredients: penne pasta, chicken breasts, olive oil, chili, mushroom, baby spinach, asparagus, sun-dried tomatoes, basil, parsley ; preparation:Cook penne pasta following packed directions until tender. Drain. Heat olive oil in large, deep fry pan. Add chicken breast and fry until golden. Add mushrooms and gourmet garden chilli to pan and cook until mushrooms are tender. Add penne pasta, baby spinach, asparagus and semi sun-dried tomatoes to pan and squeeze in gourmet garden basil & parsley. Toss to combine and serve with grated parmesan cheese if desired. ; name: smoked sausage and bean soup ; ingredients: dried beans, water, smoked turkey sausage, onion, carrot, dried basil, dried oregano, pepper, bay leaves ; preparation:Rinse beans and drain. In a large saucepan, combine beans and 6 cups of the water. Bring to a boil and reduce heat. Simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes. Drain and rinse beans. In slow cooker, combine smoked sausage, onion, carrot, basil, oregano, and bay leaves. Stir in drained beans and remaining 6 cups of water. Cover and cook on low heat for 8 to 10 hours or on high for 4 to 5 hours. Discard bay leaves. Season to taste with salt and pepper. ; name: pasta spirals with shrimp peas and tomatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, shrimp, scallion, garlic clove, tomatoes, dried basil, spiral shaped pasta, peas, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a medium skillet. Add shrimp and saut over high heat, stirring, until pink and tender, about 3 minutes. Stir in scallion and garlic. Add tomato and sprinkle with oregano. Cover and set aside. Meanwhile, cook the pasta in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente, about 10 minutes. Add of the pasta water to the shrimp mixture. Drain pasta. Toss pasta, shrimp mixture and peas. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: old style sunday meatballs ; ingredients: ground meat, eggs, minced garlic cloves, dried parsley, dried oregano, dried basil, garlic powder, parmesan cheese, italian breadcrumbs ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, mix all ingredients except cheese and breadcrumbs. Once mixed, add cheese and breadcrumbs, mix until even. Coat a roasting pan or high sided pan with extra virgin olive oil. Roll meat mixture into balls about the size of a golfball and line oiled pan with them. Bake at 350 degrees for about 20 minutes or until done. ; name: hot sausage and noodle bake ; ingredients: egg noodles, onion, hot italian sausage, frozen chopped spinach, cream of mushroom soup, garlic clove, dried tarragon, dried marjoram, egg, low-fat ricotta cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cook noodles for 5-7 minutes. Drain noodles. Cut sausages into bite-size pieces. Sautee onion and sausage in skillet until brown. Remove sausage and onion and get rid of drippings. Stir together noodles, onion, sausage, spinach, mushroom soup, garlic, tarragon, and marjoram. Transfer to buttered casserole dish and spread evenly. Combine egg and ricotta in bowl and mix with noodle mixture. Bake for 25-30 minutes. ; name: savory consomme rice ; ingredients: onion, butter, fresh mushrooms, long grain rice, beef consomme, water, salt, pepper, dried parsley, garlic powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Saute onion and mushroons in butter. Add rice, consomme, water, salt, pepper, parsley, and garlic powder. Pour into greased two quart pyrex dish. Cover and bake one hour at 350 degrees. ; name: campfire spaghetti ; ingredients: hamburger, whole mushrooms, onion, dried basil, dried italian seasoning, garlic powder, chicken broth, tomato paste, water, spaghetti noodles ; preparation:

name: 20 minute huckleberry muffins ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, huckleberries, eggs, milk, sugar, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f grease a standard 12-muffin pan or line with paper cups. Thoroughly mix the flour, baking powder, salt and huckleberries together in a large bowl. Set aside. In another bowl, whisk together eggs, milk or cream, sugar, butter, and vanilla. Add the wet ingredients to the dry and mix together with a few light strokes just until just blended. Do not overmix. The batter should not be smooth. Divide the batter among the muffin cups. Bake for 15 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in 1 or 2 of the muffins comes out clean. Let cool for a few minutes, and serve warm. ; name: banana cardamom muffins ; ingredients: butter, sugar, bananas, eggs, buttermilk, vanilla, salt, baking powder, ground cardamom, flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f, spray muffin tin with non-stick cooking spray. In a bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add the bananas, eggs, buttermilk and vanilla and mix well. In another bowl, mix the salt, baking powder, cardamom and flour. Add the flour to the banana mixture and mix until just combined. Fill muffin tin and bake for 19 minutes. ; name: buckingham palace scones ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, butter, egg, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Sift together flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Chop in the butter until the particles of butter are the size of coarse cornmeal. Add the egg and milk. Stir quickly and lightly, only until no flour shows. Add more milk if needed to make dough soft. Turn the dough out on a floured surface and knead gently about 15 times. Cut the dough in half. Shape each half into a ball, press each down into a round and cut into 8 wedges like a pie. Place the wedges on a greased cookie sheet without allowing the sides to touch. Bake until golden brown about 12 minutes. ; name: calas fried rice balls ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, vanilla, rice, eggs, nutmeg, cooking oil, powdered sugar ; preparation:Mix together the flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and vanilla. Thoroughly mix the rice and eggs together in a separate bowl. Add the dry ingredients to the rice and egg mixture. When thoroughly mixed, drop by spoonfuls into the hot deep fat and fry until brown. Drain on paper towel. Sprinkle with powdered sugar and serve while hot. Other variations are to serve with honey. ; name: never fail biscuits ; ingredients: flour, salt, sugar, baking powder, milk, butter, egg ; preparation:Mix dry ingredients. Cut in butter. Beat egg and milk slightly in separate bowl. Milk together. Kneed on floured surface. Roll till desired thickness. Cut out with a glass or cookie cutter. Bake 350 for till golden brown. ; name: pear cardamom bread ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, ground cardamom, pears, vegetable oil, milk, eggs, cardamom ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease bottom of loaf pan. Mix all ingredients, except topping, in a large bowl. Pour into loaf pan. Mix topping ingredients and sprinkle on top. Bake 55-65 minutes, until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean cool 10 minutes. Remove to wire rack to cool completely, 1 hour. ; name: betty crocker peach pancakes ; ingredients: egg, flour, milk, vegetable oil, sugar, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, peach ; preparation:Beat egg with hand beater until fluffy. Add rest of ingredients. Grease griddle and heat. Pour about 3 tbsp batter onto hot griddle and cook until edges of pancake puff and look dry around edges. Flip, and cook opposite side until golden brown. ; name: olive bread ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, egg, milk, walnuts, stuffed green olive, chopped pimiento ; preparation:

name: cream puff dessert ; ingredients: butter, flour, water, eggs, instant vanilla pudding, cool whip, chocolate syrup ; preparation:Bring butter and water to a boil. Add flour and mix until it forms a ball. Cool to room temperature. Add eggs one at a time, mixing after each. Spread in an ungreased 11x15 pan. Bake at 400 degrees for 30 minutes. Cool. Mix puddding according to directions on package. Pour over the base. Top with cool whip. Drizzle with chocolate syrup. Refrigerate. ; name: a different chocolate eclair cake dessert ; ingredients: club crackers, vanilla instant pudding mix, milk, cool whip, chocolate squares, butter, light corn syrup, vanilla, powdered sugar ; preparation:Arrange club crackers on the bottom of a 9 x 13 pan, to completely cover bottom in a single layer. Mix pudding and milk, then fold in cool whip. Pour pudding mixture on layer of club crackers, then add another layer of crackers, to completely cover top in a single layer. Refrigerate 30 minutes. Melt chocolate and butter together. Once combined, add remaining ingredients, stirring until all combined. Pour frosting over chilled cake and refrigerate at least 3 hours before serving. You will have club crackers left. ; name: farmer s old fashioned vanilla pudding ; ingredients: milk, sugar, eggs, flour, pure vanilla extract, butter, heavy whipping cream ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan, heat milk and sugar, over medium to low heat. When hot, stir in eggs and flour. Beat together well and boil until thick. Stir in butter and vanilla after it is cooked. Cool and served chilled. Before serving, whip up heavy cream and fold in to chilled pudding. ; name: peanut butter pie iii ; ingredients: chocolate sandwich style cookies, butter, creamy peanut butter, cream cheese, powdered sugar, non-dairy whipped topping, vanilla ; preparation:Blend cookies and butter in food processor. Spread in pie plate & freeze. Mix together remaining ingredients. Blend well & pour into frozen chocolate cookie crust. Chill well and serve. ; name: chris awesomely easy ice cream dessert ; ingredients: vanilla ice cream, vanilla instant pudding mix, milk, crackers, margarine, sugar, whipped topping ; preparation:In large bowl, using electric mixer, combine softened ice cream, milk, and sprinkle in the dry instant pudding mix. Place mixture in refridgerator while preparing crust. Crush crackers into a 9x13 pan, add sugar, and pour melted margarine over all. Mix well and spread into crust at the bottom of the pan. Spread ice cream mixture over the crust and top with the whipped topping. Refridgerate at least 2 hours before serving. ; name: pistachio squares ; ingredients: flour, butter, sugar, nuts, icing sugar, cream cheese, cool whip, instant pistachio pudding mix, milk ; preparation:Mix first layer and press into 9 x 13 pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Combine ingredients for second layer and spread on first layer. Mix pudding and milk. Spread over second layer. Spread remaining cool whip over third layer. Sprinkle with chopped nuts. Place in refrigerator until ready to serve. ; name: kissey face cream cheese cookies ; ingredients: butter, cream cheese, granulated sugar, all-purpose flour, egg, vanilla extract, hershey chocolate kisses ; preparation:Cream butter and cream cheese. Gradually add sugar, beating until light and fluffy. Add flour. Beat well. Stir in egg and vanilla. Shape dough into 1-inch balls. Place 2 inches apart a lightly greased cookie sheet. Bake at 375 f for 8 minutes. Remove the cookies from the oven and place one unwrapped hershey kiss in the middle of each cookie. Return to oven and bake 5 minutes. Cool 2-3 minutes on cookie sheets before removing to a wire rack to cool completely. ; name: oreo pudding ; ingredients: cream cheese, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla, cool whip, oreo cookies, butter, instant vanilla pudding ; preparation:

name: can t fail fudge ; ingredients: sugar, butter, evaporated milk, marshmallows, chocolate chips, walnuts, vanilla ; preparation:Mix first 3 ingredients in a 2-quart saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil stirring entire time. Boil until candy thermometer hits 234 degrees, stirring entire time. Remove from heat and add remaining ingredients. Stir until chocolate and marshmallows are dissolved. Pour in buttered 8x8 pan. Chill 30 minutes, cut with buttered knife. Chill again until set. ; name: 1900 park fare bread pudding disney ; ingredients: eggs, granulated sugar, heavy cream, salt, ground cinnamon, butter, white bread ; preparation:Place cubed bread in loaf pan. In a mixing bowl, combine eggs and sugar. Mix well. Add cream, salt and cinnamon. Mix well. Pour custard over bread cubes. Press down so custard soaks in well. Place soft butter on top of bread. Bake in a water bath at 325 degrees for approximately one hour until golden brown and custard is firm. Serve with vanilla sauce. ; name: no bake cookies made with chocolate chips ; ingredients: butter, milk, sugar, chocolate chips, peanut butter, oatmeal, vanilla ; preparation:Put oatmeal, optional peanut butter, chocolate chips and vanilla in a mixing bowl. Combine butter, milk and sugar in a saucepan and heat over medium high until boiling. Let boil for 1 minute. Pour hot mix into the oatmeal mix and stir well. Drop spoonfuls onto wax paper and let harden before eating. Freeze to harden faster. ; name: easy chocolate souffle ; ingredients: butter, bitter chocolate, eggs, sugar, flour, vanilla flavoring ; preparation:Put the butter and the chocolate in ben - mari until its liquid. Beat the eggs with the sugar and the vanilla by hand. Add the flour and the chocolate mix. Butter the bowls and add sugar at the edges. Divide the mix and put in a preheated oven for 10-12 minutes at 320f. ; name: remarkable fudge ; ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, marshmallow cream, vanilla, nuts ; preparation:Butter side of heavy 3-quart pan. Combine sugar, milk & butter. Cook over medium heat to 236f, stirring frequently. Remove from heat & add chocolate, marshmallow cream, vanilla & nuts. Beat until chocolate is melted & blended. Pour into pan. ; name: coconut and white chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, vanilla extract, egg, plain flour, self raising flour, desiccated coconut, white chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees celsius. Place chopped butter, sugar and vanilla in a bowl and beat until light and creamy. Add egg and beat well. Using a flat knife, mix through flours and coconut until a soft dough forms. Mix chocolate chips into the dough. Using your hands, mould two tablespoons of dough mixture into a flat round. Place rounds on a baking tray that is lined with non stick baking paper. Repeat until all the mixture is used. Bake for 10 minutes or until light golden. Allow to cool on trays. ; name: frozen french toast oamc ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, salt, cinnamon, vanilla, milk, bread ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except the bread in a large bowl. Dip each slice of bread in mixture so it is soaked through. Brown on both sides in margarine over medium heat. Let cool on cooling racks completely. Once the slices have cooled completely, retuns to bread bag alternating with wax paper to avoid the slices sticking together. Freeze until ready to eat. Reheat in toaster when ready to eat. ; name: choc chip bread butter pudding ; ingredients: butter, bread, eggs, caster sugar, vanilla essence, chocolate chips, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:

name: steak and penne salad ; ingredients: penne pasta, boneless beef chuck steak, red onion, mayonnaise, sour cream, prepared horseradish, salt, black pepper, broccoli florets, plum tomatoes ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain, rince, and cover to keep warm if serving warm. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon oil over medium-high heat. Add steak and onion and cook 4 to 5 minutes, or until steak is browned, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat. In a large bowl, combine mayonnaise, sour cream, horseradish, salt, black pepper and remaining 3 tablesoons oil. Mix well. Add cooked pasta, beef mixture, broccoli, and tomatoes. Toss until well combined and serve. ; name: bacon and mushroom penne with sun dried tomato pesto ; ingredients: penne pasta, bacon, mushroom, sunflower seeds, sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, garlic cloves, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh basil leaf, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook the pasta as directed on the package. Drain and reserve 1 cup of the cooking liquid. Chop bacon, fry gently in a frying pan. Add mushrooms. Blend the sun-dried tomatoes and their oil, garlic, and basil in a food processor and blend until the tomatoes are finely chopped. Transfer the tomato mixture to a large bowl. Stir in the parmesan. Add the pasta, mushrooms and bacon to the pesto and toss to coat, adding enough reserved cooking liquid to moisten. Season the pasta, to taste, with salt and pepper and serve. ; name: alfredo chicken pasta toss ; ingredients: rotini pasta, frozen sweet peas, carrot, vegetable oil, boneless skinless chicken breast, alfredo sauce, dried basil leaves ; preparation:In 4-quart dutch oven, cook and drain pasta as directed on package, adding peas and carrots during last 5 minutes of cooking. Drain, return to dutch oven. Meanwhile, in 10-inch nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Add chicken, cook 9 to 11 minutes, stirring frequently, until chicken is no longer pink in center. Stir chicken, alfredo sauce and basil into pasta mixture in dutch oven. Cook and stir over medium heat until thoroughly heated. ; name: valentines day tomato basil soup ; ingredients: roma tomatoes, tomato juice, fresh basil, heavy whipping cream, butter, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place tomatoes and juice in a stock pot. Cover and simmer for 30 minutes. Puree tomatoes, juice, and basil and return to stock pot. Put the pot over medium heat and stir in the cream and butter. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve with freshly grated parmesean cheese. ; name: fettuccine with roasted red pepper sauce ; ingredients: red peppers, whipping cream, italian dressing, fresh basil, salt and pepper, fettuccine, parmesan cheese ; preparation:On broiler rack or over open burner, place peppers. Cook, turning occasionally, 20 minutes or until peppers turn almost completely black. Immediately place in paper bag. Close bag and let cool about 30 minutes. Under cold running water, peel off skin, then removed stems and seeds. In food processor or blender, process remaining ingredients until blended. Toss with hot fettuccine and serve with cheese. ; name: quick fettuccine carbonara ; ingredients: bacon, dry fettuccine, eggs, parsley, dried italian herb seasoning, parmesan cheese, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Saute the bacon in a small skillet until crisp. Remove with a slotted spoon and drain well on a paper towel. Cook fettuccini noodles according to package instruction until firm and tender. Meanwhile, beat the eggs thoroughly in a large bowl suitable for serving. Have the cooked bacon and the chopped parsley ready at hand. When the pasta is done, drain it immediately in a colander, and pour into the bowl of eggs and immediately begin tossing it. As the strands of pasta become coated with the beaten eggs, their heat will cook the eggs. Sprinkle the bacon, italian seasoning and parsley on, and serve immediately. Top with lots of freshly grated parmesan cheese and freshly ground black pepper. ; name: tuna alfredo casserole ; ingredients: rigatoni pasta, sun-dried tomato pesto, alfredo sauce, milk, solid white tuna, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and return to the pan. In a bowl, mix together pesto, alfredo sauce, and milk. Add to the pasta, stirring to coat. Fold in the tuna. Add salt and pepper to taste. Pour into an ungreased 2 quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Bake at 425 degrees for 10-15 minutes or until thoroughly heated and cheese is melted. ; name: bacon and sun dried tomato alfredo pasta ww recipe ; ingredients: multi-grain penne, low-fat alfredo sauce, sun-dried tomato, bacon, fresh basil, black pepper ; preparation:

name: remarkable fudge ; ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, marshmallow cream, vanilla, nuts ; preparation:Butter side of heavy 3-quart pan. Combine sugar, milk & butter. Cook over medium heat to 236f, stirring frequently. Remove from heat & add chocolate, marshmallow cream, vanilla & nuts. Beat until chocolate is melted & blended. Pour into pan. ; name: sorority chocolate fudge ; ingredients: granulated sugar, margarine, evaporated milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, milk chocolate chips, marshmallow creme, nuts, vanilla ; preparation:Cream margarine and sugar with wooden spoon in 6 quart saucepan. Mixing thoroughly, stir in milk over medium heat. Evenly work from bottom of pan. Cook to full rolling boil. If using candy thermometer, cook to 230 degrees. If not, cook 7 minutes from start of full rolling boil, still stirring constantly. Remove from heat and add marshmallow creme, chocolate chips and vanilla. Beat until very think and creamy. Pour into an 11x16 tray which has been lightly and evenly buttered. ; name: granny s fudge ; ingredients: sugar, butter, evaporated milk, chocolate chips, miniature marshmallows, walnuts, vanilla extract ; preparation:Combine the sugar, butter and milk in large saucepan. Let boil stirring frequently at medium heat until soft ball stage. Add chocolate chips. Remove from heat. Stir until chips dissolve. Add marshmallows, walnuts and vanilla. Stir well. Pour into 9 x 13 pan. Put in refrigerator to cool. Cut when hard. ; name: punky s chocolate peanut butter fudge ; ingredients: evaporated milk, sugar, butter, peanut butter, marshmallow creme, vanilla extract, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Grease an 8x8 inch dish. In a medium saucepan over medium heat, combine milk, sugar, and butter. Bring to a rolling boil, and let boil 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in peanut butter, marshmallow creme, semi-sweet chips and vanilla until well blended. Spread into prepared dish. Let cool completely before cutting into squares. ; name: lemon coconut tartlets ; ingredients: white sugar, all-purpose flour, eggs, lemon peel, lemon juice, sweetened coconut, miniature tart shells ; preparation:In bowl, combine sugar & flour. Beat in eggs, lemon peel & juice by hand. Divide the coconut among the tart shells. Pour lemon mixture over top of coconut. Bake in 375 degree oven for 20-25 minutes or until filling is set. Cool before serving. ; name: mrs margaret s chocolate fudge ; ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, butter, salt, milk chocolate candy bar, chocolate chips, marshmallow whip, walnuts, vanilla extract ; preparation:Butter a 9 x 13 glass pan. Set aside. Boil sugar, milk, butter and salt in a medium pan over medium heat 6 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. In a large glass or metal bowl, break up hershey bar. Add chocolate chips and marshmallow whip. Pour bowling sugar mixture into the bowl and mix until the chocolate is melted. Mix in chopped nuts and vanilla. Pour mixture into the 9 x 13 glass pan. Let cool. Invert cooled mixture onto waxed paper and cut into squares. ; name: can t fail fudge ; ingredients: sugar, butter, evaporated milk, marshmallows, chocolate chips, walnuts, vanilla ; preparation:Mix first 3 ingredients in a 2-quart saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil stirring entire time. Boil until candy thermometer hits 234 degrees, stirring entire time. Remove from heat and add remaining ingredients. Stir until chocolate and marshmallows are dissolved. Pour in buttered 8x8 pan. Chill 30 minutes, cut with buttered knife. Chill again until set. ; name: cherry ripe crackles ; ingredients: desiccated coconut, rice bubbles, glace cherries, dark chocolate chips, margarine, golden syrup, coconut essence ; preparation:

name: 3 cheese manicotti ; ingredients: manicotti, mozzarella cheese, chive & onion cream cheese, spaghetti sauce, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook shells according to the package directions. Rinse well in cool water and dry. While the pasta is cooking, mix together the cream cheese and 3 cups of mozzeralla cheese. Stuff shells with cream cheese mixture put a thin layer of sauce on the bottom of a 13 by 9 baking dish. Place manicotti in dish and cover with remaining sauce. Sprinkle 1 cup of mozzarella over the top. Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes at 375. Uncover, sprinkle with parmesan cheese, and bake for 15 minutes more. ; name: french fried cauliflower ; ingredients: cauliflower, bisquick, egg, pesto sauce, italian seasoning, pepper, parmesan cheese, crisco ; preparation:Use a deep pan or a regular fryer. Heat oil until you think it is hot enough. You can check with a cube of bread. Drain the cauliflower and let cool. Mix together in a bowl the bisquick, pesto, italian seasoning, pepper and cheese. Dip the cauliflower pieces into the egg and then coat with the batter. Fry until golden brown. As soon as you remove it from the fat, sprinkle it with more cheese. ; name: four cheese pasta ; ingredients: butter, flour, half-and-half, mozzarella cheese, fontina, provolone cheese, parmesan cheese, pepper, parsley, fresh fettuccine ; preparation:In 3 quart saucepan, melt butter, stir in flour until blended. Cook 30 seconds. Gradually stir in half and half- cook, stirring, until mixture boils and slightly thickens. Stir in all cheeses, salt and pepper. Boil fettuccine till al dente. Drain and pour into large bowl or round casserole dish. Mix in cheese sauce along with parsley, until well blended. Serve immediately. ; name: stuffed crust pepperoni pizza ; ingredients: pizza dough, mozzarella string cheese, pizza sauce, pepperoni, mozzarella cheese, butter, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Grease a 13x9x2 inch pan. Unroll dough. Press in bottom and 1 inch up sides of greased pan. Place pieces of string cheese along the inside edges of dough. Fold the 1 inch of dough over and around the cheese. Press dough edges to seal. Brush edge with melted butter and parmesan cheese. Top the crust with sauce, pepperoni and cheese. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 15 to 18 minutes or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted. ; name: ricotta stuffed potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, ricotta cheese, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, pepper, egg ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees. Bake potatoes about 1 hour, until tender. Cut thin lengthwise slice from each potato. Scoop out inside, leaving a thin shell. Mash potatoes in a large bowl until no lumps remain. Mix in remaining ingredients and blend well. Increase oven temperature to 400 degrees. Place potato shells on ungreased cookie sheet. Fill shells with potato mixture. Bake uncovered 20 minutes until filling is hot. ; name: calzone with three cheeses ; ingredients: pizza crusts, romano cheese, ricotta cheese, fontina cheese, prosciutto ham, basil, pepper, garlic clove ; preparation:Roll dough into a 14-inch square and cut into quarters. Sprinkle each quarter with 1 t romano cheese. In a bowl combine the remaining ingredients and spoon one quarter of each mixture onto center of each dough square. Bring corners of dough up over cheese. Pinch seams to seal. Place on ungreased cookie sheet lined with parchment paper. Bake 15 minutes at 450 degrees. ; name: three cheese spinach lasagna ; ingredients: ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese, pasta sauce, baby spinach leaves, lasagna sheets ; preparation:Pre hear oven to 180c. Grease lasagne pan. Spread some of tomato sauce on bottom of dish. Lay lasagne sheets on top of sauce. Spread half riccotta cheese on top. Spread a third of the mozzarella and a third of the cheddar cheese. Lay half of the spinach on top of cheeses. Spread some more of the tomato sauce on top and repeat. Finish with lasagne sheets and top with remaining mozzarella and cheddar cheese. Bake in oven for 40 minutes. ; name: ma s gnocchi ; ingredients: ricotta cheese, flour, eggs, tomato sauce, parmigiano-reggiano cheese ; preparation:

name: chocolate french silk pie copycat bakers square s french silk ; ingredients: butter, fine sugar, unsweetened chocolate, vanilla, eggs, whipped cream, frozen pie crust ; preparation:Bake a pie crust or use a mrs. Smiths frozen crust and make according to package directions. Beat sugar and butter until sugar is not grainy. Add chocolate and vanilla. Add eggs, two at a time, beating 5 minutes after each addition. Pour into cooled pie crust. Chill 2 hours or until firm. Before serving, top with whipped cream and a little grated chocolate. ; name: pecan pie award winning ; ingredients: pie crusts, eggs, sugar, light corn syrup, dark corn syrup, butter, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:Defrost frozen pie crust. Combine eggs and next 5 ingredients. Stir in pecans. Pour into pie shell. Bake 350 degrees for 50 minutes. Cool on a rack. 1 frozen deep-dish pastry shell may be substituted. ; name: wild blackberry or dewberry pie ; ingredients: sugar, cinnamon, cornstarch, butter, fresh lemon juice, fresh blackberries, pastry for double-crust pie ; preparation:Heat oven to 425 degrees. Prepare pastry. In a large mixing bowl, add the blackberries and sugar & cinnamon. Toss to coat. Next add the cornstarch & lightly mix. Place filling into pastry lined pie pan. Sprinkle lemon juice over filling & dot with butter. Cover the filling with the top pie crust. Trim the excess crust off around the pie and seal. Cut slits in top of pie crust. Bake 50-60 minutes or until crust is golden brown & juice begins to bubble through the slits in crust. Cool completely before slicing. ; name: the camellia grill s pecan pie ; ingredients: eggs, salt, butter, light corn syrup, brown sugar, vanilla extract, unbaked 9-inch pie shell, pecans ; preparation:Beat eggs with a wire whisk or fork. Add salt, butter, syrup, sugar and vanilla. Mix well. Pour into pastry shell. Sprinkle with pecans. Bake at 350f for 45-50 minutes. ; name: nanny s southern pecan pie ; ingredients: eggs, pecan halves, light corn syrup, vanilla extract, sugar, salt, pie crusts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine eggs, corn syrup, vanilla, sugar, and salt in a large mixing bowl. Arrange pecans evenly in the bottom of the pie crust. Pour egg mixture over pecans in the shell. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes or until puffy and crust is golden brown. ; name: chocolate nut kentucky pie ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, flour, salt, bourbon, pecans, chocolate chips, pie crusts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cream butter and sugar. Add beaten eggs, flour, salt, and kentucky bourbon. Add chocolate chips and nuts. Stir well. Pour into partially baked pie shell and bake for 30 minutes, or until center is set. Serve with whipped cream or vanilla ice cream. ; name: chocolate ecstasy pecan pie ; ingredients: semisweet baking chocolate, butter, 9 inch pie shell, eggs, brown sugar, light corn syrup, vanilla extract, pecan halves ; preparation:Preheat your oven to 350 degrees farenheit. In a large, microwave-safe bowl, microwave 4 squares of chocolate and butter on high power until melted. Meanwhile, brush the bottom of the pie crust with beaten eggs using a pastry brush remove the bowl from the microwave and blend in eggs, brown sugar, corn syrup and vanilla. Add the pecans and chopped chocolate, combining evenly. Pour the mixture into the pie crust and pop the pie in the oven bake for 55 minutes or test for doneness by inserting a knife 2 inches from the edge-it will come out clean if the pie is done. Cool the pie on a wire rack before slicing. ; name: amish cream pie ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, salt, half-and-half, butter, brown sugar, vanilla, 9-inch baked pie crust, ground cinnamon ; preparation:

name: roasted pears with brown sugar and vanilla ice cream ; ingredients: apple juice, dark brown sugar, unsalted butter, bosc pears, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. Arrange the pears cut side up in an 8-inch square glass baking dish. Whisk the apple juice and sugar in a small heavy saucepan over medium-high heat until the sugar dissolves. Whisk in the butter. Pour the sauce over the pears. Bake until the pears are crisp-tender and beginning to brown, basting occasionally with the juices, about 35 minutes. Spoon the pears onto plates. Top with ice cream. Drizzle with any juices and serve. The pears can also be served frozen. To do so, cool the pears, then place them in the freezer until frozen solid, about 8 hours. ; name: baked vanilla peaches ; ingredients: butter, peaches, vanilla bean, honey, white wine, ice cream ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 160 c. Grease small baking dish with the butter. Cut a cross in the bottom of each peach. Place cross side up in dish. Top each peach with vanilla seeds. Drizzle evenly with honey. Pour wine into dish around peaches. Bake 45 minutes or till tender. Serve with ice cream. ; name: chocolate mousse ; ingredients: evaporated milk, vanilla extract, sugar, chocolate chips, salt, heavy whipping cream, chocolate curls, fresh strawberries ; preparation:In blender, combine the milk, vanilla, sugar, chocolate and salt. Cover and process until smooth, about 1 minute. Transfer to a large bowl. In small mixing bowl, beat cream until soft peaks form. Fold into chocolate mixture. Spoon into dessert dishes. Refrigerate until serving. Garnish with chocolate curls and strawberries, if desired. ; name: baked blueberries ; ingredients: blueberries, sour cream, vanilla, brown sugar ; preparation:Spoon the blueberries into 4, 4 oz oven proof ramekins. Mix the sour cream with the vanilla. Spoon over the blueberries. Top with the brown sugar. Broil 3 to 4 minutes, watching carefully. The brown sugar should melt and caramelize- do not let it burn. This is the original recipe as i copied it from the web site. See above explanation for adjustments i made. ; name: peach sauce for the microwave fat free ; ingredients: water, white sugar, molasses, lemon juice, vanilla, fresh peaches ; preparation:Peel, pit, and slice the peaches. In a microwave safe dish with a lid, mix all the ingredients but the peaches. Microwave on high for 6 minutes or until boiling. Add the peaches and let it sit. Serve cold. ; name: easy and fast fruit n cream waffles ; ingredients: waffles, cream cheese, canned peaches, brown sugar, whipped cream ; preparation:Toast waffles. Cover with a layer of cream cheese. Add a layer of fruit. Sprinkle with brown sugar. Cover completely with whipped cream. ; name: peach honey almond omelette ; ingredients: peaches, liquid honey, vanilla extract, eggs, butter, sliced almonds, icing sugar ; preparation:Combine peaches, honey and vanilla in a small bowl and set aside. Whisk eggs in a small bowl. Melt butter in a 15 cm non-stick skillet over medium-high heat and swirl to coat pan. Pour in eggs. As mixture begins to set, lift edges with spatula to allow the uncooked egg to flow underneath. Cook until bottom is set and top is almost set. Spread peaches and almonds over half of the omelette. Fold the other half over the peaches, using the spatula, and tilt the skillet so that the omelette slides out of the pan. Sprinkle with icing sugar. Serve immediately. ; name: creamy peach freeze ; ingredients: vanilla ice cream, fresh peaches, brown sugar, salt ; preparation:

name: hot mushroom and bacon dip ; ingredients: bacon, butter, onion, garlic, mushrooms, plain flour, cream cheese, worcestershire sauce, dry sherry, sour cream ; preparation:Place bacon in shallow dish, cover with paper towel, cook on high in a microwave for 3 minutes or until bacon is crisp. Remove bacon from the dish, then add the butter, onion and garlic to the dish, cook on high for 2 minutes. Stir in the mushrooms, cook on high for another 2 minutes, then sprinkle the mushroom mixture with the flour. Next, top the mushroom mixture and flour with the cream cheese, worcestershire sauce and dry sherry. Cook on high for 5 minutes, stir halfway through this cooking time. Stir in the sour cream and the chopped bacon. Spoon into a serving dish. Serve as a hot dip with raw vegetables such as sliced carrots, capsicum, beans and celery. ; name: sausage stroganoff without mushrooms ; ingredients: bulk pork sausage, onion, chicken broth, worcestershire sauce, pepper, all-purpose flour, sour cream, parsley, cooked noodles ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium heat, add sausage and onion, cook until meat is no longer pick and onion is tender. Add 1 cup broth, worcestershire sauce, and pepper. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Stir together remaining broth, and flour, until smooth. Stir into skillet, and bring to a boil and stir for 2 minutes. Reduce heat and add sour cream. Stir until heated through, do not boil. Add parsley if using. Serve over cooked noodles. ; name: grandpa parker s french onion soup ; ingredients: butter, onions, beef bouillon, salt and pepper, worcestershire sauce, french bread, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat butter and then add onion and simmer for 10 minutes. Add bouillon and bring to boil and then simmer for 20 minutes. Season to your taste with salt, pepper and worcestershire sauce. Pour the hot soup into earthenware cups. On top of each, float a slice of sauteed french bread and sprinkle with grated cheese. ; name: lamb ribs ; ingredients: lamb rib chops, apricot jam, ketchup, garlic powder, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Add jam, ketchup, worcester sauce in a bowl and pur over riblets. Drain riblets during cooking time. 350 degrees for approximately 1 hours and 15 minutes. Drain and cut ribs. This is so simple, but yet really delicious. Serve on a hot tray a rose wine goes very well with this or a sparkling rose. ; name: another hot crab dip recipe ; ingredients: cream cheese, cheddar cheese, sour cream, worcestershire sauce, dijon mustard, backfin crab meat, green onion ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a medium bowl, beat the cream cheese, cheddar cheese, sour cream, dijon mustard and worcestershire sauce. Gently stir in the crabmeat and most of the green onions. Reserve some green onions for garnish. Spoon the mixture into a 1-quart buttered casserole dish. Bake for 20-30 minutes until top is set and mixture is hot. Garnish the top with remaining green onions. Serve dip with tortilla chips or crackers. ; name: baked beans and hamburger casserole ; ingredients: worcestershire sauce, ground beef, onion, ketchup, salt and pepper, yellow mustard, butter, sugar, pork and beans ; preparation:Brown ground beef and onion. Drain. Remove from heat. Add all other ingredients and stir well. Place in a casserole dish and bake, covered, at 325 for 45 minutes. ; name: sausage and pepper frittata ; ingredients: pork sausage, red onion, red bell pepper, butter, eggs, heavy cream, water, muenster cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place the eggs, cream, and water in a bowl. Add salt and pepper to taste. Beat the egg mixture until thoroughly combined. Set aside. Melt butter in a 10-inch non-stick skillet with a tightly-fitting lid. Add onion and bell pepper and saut over medium heat until onions are translucent. Add crumbled sausage and cook for another minute or two. Distribute mixture evenly in pan and pour the egg mixture over the top. Sprinkle the grated muenster evenly over the eggs and pat down with a wooden spoon so cheese is completely covered by egg mixture. Reduce heat to low and cover pan. Cook 25-30 minutes, or until set in the middle. Remove from heat and let sit about 5 minutes before cutting into wedges. ; name: easy braunschweiger party spread ; ingredients: braunschweiger sausage, cream cheese, green onions, milk, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder ; preparation:

name: shakshouka ; ingredients: onion, olive oil, garlic cloves, eggs, sweet red pepper, tomatoes, sweet paprika, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Saut the onions and garlic until soft in about a tablespoons of olive oil, flavoured with a grind of black pepper. This will take about 8 minutes. Meanwhile, grate the tomatoes using the coarsest grater you have. Add the tomatoes, peppers, paprika and mix well. Season to taste. Cover and simmer on a very low heat for 25 minutes. After 25 minutes, break the eggs on to the surface of the tomato mixture. Cover and cook for 4 minutes or until the eggs are done to your liking. Some cooks like to break the egg yolks and swirl them into the tomatoes. ; name: crisp roasted broccoli ; ingredients: broccoli, olive oil, coarse salt, cracked black pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven and a baking sheet to 375. Cut broccoli into florets, the smaller the size the quicker it will cook and crispier it will be. Toss florets with olive oil to coat. Add remaining ingredients and toss well. Spread into a single layer on the hot baking sheet. If desired sprinkle additional parmesan cheese and black pepper on top. Bake for 10-12 minutes for small florets or 15-20 for larger pieces. ; name: potato cakes with goat cheese petites galettes de pommes de ; ingredients: potato, fresh thyme, garlic clove, scallions, salt & freshly ground black pepper, olive oil, sweet butter, goat cheese ; preparation:Squeeze all of the liquid out of the potatoes with your hands, then add the thyme, garlic, scallions and seasonings. Heat half the oil and butter in a non stick frying pan. Drop two large spoonfuls of the potato mixture in the oil, press down with spoon. Fry for 2-3 minutes on each side. Remove and drain. Repeat with rest of mixture, keeping the others warm. Preheat the broiler. Cut the cheese into 4 slices. Place on potato cakes and broil until the cheese is golden. Garnish with sprigs of thyme and salad greens. Serve immediately. ; name: zesty oven fries ; ingredients: baking potatoes, fresh parmesan cheese, olive oil, sea salt, garlic powder, paprika, fresh coarse ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Peel potatoes & cut into thick fries or wedges. Spray baking sheet with cooking spray or cover with rapid release foil. Combine salt, garlic powder, paprika, & pepper and place in large ziploc bacg. Drizzle olive oil over potatoes and coat evenly. Place potatoes in bag and shake to coat. Arrange potatoes in single layer on baking sheet. Bake 35 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: buffalo potato wedges ; ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, salt, pepper, garlic powder, butter, hot pepper sauce, bleu cheese salad dressing ; preparation:Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray. Arrange potato wedges on sheet and drizzle with olive oil sprinkle with salt, pepper, and garlic powder. Bake at 375 for 30 minutes until tender. Remove pan from oven. Combine the hot sauce and butter in a microwave safe bowl and microwave on high until melted. Stir to combine. Drizzle mixture over potato wedges and return to oven for an additional 15 minutes. Serve with salad dressing for dipping. ; name: simmered black beans ; ingredients: onion, green bell pepper, olive oil, garlic, ground cumin, chili powder, black beans, diced tomato, dried thyme, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Cook and stir onion, green pepper and olive oil in medium skillet over low heat until vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes. Add garlic, cumin and chili powder, cook 1 minute. Add beans, tomatoes and thyme. Stir to combine. Cover and cook over very low heat about 10 minutes. Uncover and cook, stirring until beans are thickened, about 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. ; name: boneless pork chops with spicy rub ; ingredients: olive oil, chili powder, paprika, garlic, salt, dried oregano, ground cumin, ground black pepper, pork chops, lime ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine olive oil, chili powder, paprika, garlic, salt, oregano, cumin and pepper. Rub the mixture evenly over the pork chops. Cover and refrigerate for 15 minutes. Heat broiler. Broil pork chops for 5-6 minutes on each side, until browned and cooked through. Or you could also bake the chops at 375 degrees for 20-25 minutes or till done. Serve immediately, with 2 wedges of lime for each chop. ; name: tortilla campesina potato pudding ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, smoked bacon, garlic powder, potato, cream, paprika, salt and black pepper, eggs ; preparation:

name: yummy apple cake ; ingredients: apples, eggs, sugar, vegetable oil, flour, cinnamon, baking soda, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven 350 degrees. Grease 9x13 pan. Beat eggs, sugar and oil, together. Add flour, soda and cinnamon. Mix well. Add apples and walnuts, mix together. Pour into prepared pan. Bake 40 to 45 minutes. ; name: fudgecake ; ingredients: biscuit, eggs, butter, caster sugar, cocoa powder, walnuts, sultana, vanilla, chocolate icing ; preparation:Put biscuits in to a plastic bag and seal end, with a rolling pin crush them till they are broken in to small pieces. Lightly beat eggs. In a small pot gently melt butter and stir in the sugar and cocoa. Remove from heat, cool to lukewarm and stir in the eggs. Return to the heat and stir until the mixture is smooth and thick and just starting to boil. Remove from heat and stir in walnuts, sultanas and vanilla. Then stir in biscuit crumbs. Mix well and press lightly into a lightly buttered sponge roll tin. Set aside in a cool place for a couple of hours. Ice with your fav chocolate butter icing and cut into bars. ; name: d s potato chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, margarine, granulated sugar, brown sugar, egg yolk, flour, potato chips, walnuts, vanilla ; preparation:Cream sugar and butter until creamy. Add all other ingredients. Make into balls, the size of small walnuts, flatten with fork and place onto greased cookie sheet. Place about 3 inches apart, as they spread while baking. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minute. I do not have the quantity for this recipe. If you know, please post. I am guessing. ; name: banana walnut buttermilk bread ; ingredients: sugar, unsalted butter, eggs, bananas, vanilla, baking soda, buttermilk, unbleached flour, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large bowl cream together the sugar and the butter. Add eggs one at a time, beating after each addition. Beat in mashed bananas and vanilla and continue beating until mixture is smooth. In a large measuring cup stir baking soda into the buttermilk and add it to the banana mixture along with the flour and chopped nuts. Stir the batter until it is just combined. Pour batter into a greased and floured 9x5 inch loaf pan and bake for one hour or until tooth pick inserted in the center comes out clean. Transfer the bread to a rack and let it cool in the pan for 10 minutes. Turn it out onto a rack and let it cool completely. ; name: old fashioned walnut bread ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, shortening, milk, vanilla, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Sift flour, sugar, baking powder and salt into large bowl. Add egg, shortning, milk and vanilla. Stir until all is moistened. Stir in the walnuts. Bake in a 9x5 loaf pan for 1 hour, 20 minutes, or until toothpick comes out clean. ; name: the albertson s chocolate chip cookie recipe ; ingredients: brown sugar, granulated sugar, eggs, butter, vanilla extract, flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Cream together sugars and butter until light and fluffy in large bowl. Add eggs one a time, beating well after each. Add vanilla, beat well. In a smaller bowl, combine flour, salt, and baking soda. Add gradually to wet ingredients until completely combined. Stir in entire package of chocolate chips and nuts if you desire. Drop by rounded tablespoons onto a greased baking sheet. Bake at 375 f until browned, about 12 minutes. ; name: big moist banana bread ; ingredients: sugar, shortening, eggs, milk, banana, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, walnuts ; preparation:Mix together sugar, shortenign and eggs. Stir in milk and bananas. Sift together and stir in flour, baking powder, soda and salt. Blend in chopped nuts. Pour into well greased 9 x 5 x3 inch pan. Let stand for 20 minutes before baking. Bake at 350 degrees until it tests done. ; name: easy bisquick bread ; ingredients: bisquick, granulated sugar, egg, milk, walnuts ; preparation:

name: boneless pork chops with spicy rub ; ingredients: olive oil, chili powder, paprika, garlic, salt, dried oregano, ground cumin, ground black pepper, pork chops, lime ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine olive oil, chili powder, paprika, garlic, salt, oregano, cumin and pepper. Rub the mixture evenly over the pork chops. Cover and refrigerate for 15 minutes. Heat broiler. Broil pork chops for 5-6 minutes on each side, until browned and cooked through. Or you could also bake the chops at 375 degrees for 20-25 minutes or till done. Serve immediately, with 2 wedges of lime for each chop. ; name: campbell s abc s vegetarian vegetable soup ; ingredients: vegetable broth, frozen vegetables, vegetable juice, tomato paste, dried thyme, dried oregano, dried basil, pepper, alphabet pasta ; preparation:Cook pasta according to directions. Meanwhile, in a saucepan, combine vegetable broth, veggies, juice, tomato paste, thyme, oregano, basil and pepper. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Drain pasta. Add cooked pasta to soup and simmer for an additional 15 minutes. ; name: grecian green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, sweet onion, olive oil, tomatoes, dried oregano, salt, pepper ; preparation:Place the beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Cook for 3-4 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain. In a small skillet, saute onion in oil for 3 minutes. Add the beans. Saute for 5 minutes or until tender. Reduce heat. Add the tomato, oregano, salt and pepper. Cook 1 minutes longer or until heated through. ; name: chickpea garbanzo bean and mint soup ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, onion, celery, chickpeas, mint, vegetable broth, tahini, black pepper ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan and fry the garlic, onion and celery for 4-5 minutes. Add the chickpeas to the pan and cook for a further 10 minutes. Now add the finely chopped mint, stirring well, and then pour over the vegetable broth and tahini. Bring to the boil, reduce heat to low and simmer for at least 30 minutes. Season to taste with salt and freshly ground black pepper. ; name: tomato and macaroni dinner ; ingredients: onion, vegetable oil, ground beef, diced tomatoes, cooked macaroni, paprika, dried oregano, chili powder, garlic powder ; preparation:Cook macaroni according to package directions. Cook onion in vegetable oil. Add in ground beef and cook until meat is browned. Stir in tomatoes, macaroni, and spices. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer, stirring often for 10min. Uncover and boil if not thick enough. ; name: cajun grilled corn on the cob ; ingredients: dried oregano, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, dried thyme, black pepper, ground red pepper, corn, butter ; preparation:Prepare grill. Combine first 8 ingredients in a small bowl. Set aside. Pull husks back from corn, and scrub silks. Brush butter over corn. Sprinkle with spice mixture. Place corn on grill rack. Grill 12 minutes or until done, turning occasionally. ; name: potato and cucumber soup ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, potato, chicken broth, water, cucumber, heavy cream, ear of corn, fresh parsley, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat and cook onions until they begin to soften, about 5 minutes. Add potatoes, chicken broth, and water. Cover and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 15 minutes. Working in batches, puree potato mixture with cucumbers and return to pot. Stir in cream. Meanwhile, heat a heavy skillet over medium high heat, and add the corn and cook until golden. Scrape corn from cob and add to soup. Stir in parsley, salt and pepper. If desired, chill soup in refrigerator before serving. ; name: a quinoa pilaf that you ll love ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, carrot, dried oregano, quinoa, chicken broth, salt, frozen peas, lemon juice, black pepper ; preparation:

name: shepherd s tater tots casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, green beans, mushrooms, cream of mushroom soup, milk, brown gravy mix, frozen tater tots, cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Brown meat with onion until cooked and onion is transparent. Salt and pepper to taste. Drain green beans and place in a 9x13-inch baking dish. Spoon meat over beans. Drain mushrooms and spoon over meat mixture. Combine onion soup, milk and brown gravy mix. Pour over top of meat and vegetables. Arrange tater tots over top of mixture. Sprinkle potatoes with cheese. Bake at 350f for 45 minutes or until gravy juices bubble. Place in a 375f oven for 15-20 minutes or until meat is cooked. If a couple of pounds are browned at one time, place the extra pound in a freezer bag and freeze for later use. ; name: spicy buffalo glazed meatballs ; ingredients: ground beef, soft breadcrumbs, egg, onions, garlic, salt and pepper, hot pepper sauce, butter, honey, blue cheese dressing ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine ground beef, bread crumbs, egg, onion, garlic, salt and pepper in large bowl, mixing lightly but thoroughly. Shape mixture into 32 1-inch meatballs. Place on rack in broiler pan and bake 18 to 20 minuntes. Do not overbake for they will become dry. Meanwhile, combine hot pepper sauce, butter and honey in a small saucepan. Simmer, low, for about 5 minutes until sauce has thickened and has reduced by about half. Place meatballs into a bowl and pour sauce mixture over, stirring to coat well. Serve meatballs with blue cheese dressing. ; name: bow tie bake ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, sliced mushrooms, green pepper, salt and pepper, bow tie pasta, condensed tomato soup, mozzarella cheese, cream of mushroom soup ; preparation:In a skillet, cook beef, onion, mushrooms, green pepper, salt and pepper over medium heat until the meat is no longer pink. Drain. In a greased 3-quart baking dish, layer half of the pasta, half of the meat mixture, all of the tomato soup and 1 cup of cheese. Top with the remaining pasta and meat mixture. Spread evenly with mushroom soup. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 30-45 minutes or until heated thoroughly. ; name: tre s shepherds pie ; ingredients: ground beef, frozen mixed vegetables, condensed cream of mushroom soup, milk, onion powder, black peppercorns, mashed potatoes, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet, combine all the ingredients except the potatoes and cheese over high heat. Mix well. Cook for 5 to 8 minutes, or until heated through, stirring frequently. Remove from the heat and and put into a deep cassarole dish. Dollop with the potatoes. Bake at 375 for 35 minutes. Cover with grated cheese last 10 minutes of cooking. Serve immediately. ; name: buffalo meatballs gravy ; ingredients: ground buffalo meat, egg, ritz cracker, onion, garlic powder, pepper, beefy mushroom soup, flour ; preparation:Combine the first 6 ingredients. Mix well. Using a large scoop,. Scoop into balls and place on large jellyroll pan. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes. In a large skillet, combine the soup and flour. Cook over medium heat until thickened. Add cooked meatballs, and simmer 10 minutes. Serve over mashed potatoes, or egg noodles. ; name: stuffed hamburgers ; ingredients: ground beef, soft breadcrumbs, onion, eggs, sugar, soy sauce, water, garlic clove, msg, ginger ; preparation:Combine ground beef with remaining ingredients. Mix well. Shape into 6 patties or 3 larger steaks. Broil 4 to 5 inches from heat for 10 minutes, turning once. These burgers can also be pan grilled. ; name: greek cocktail meatballs keftethes ; ingredients: ground beef, soft breadcrumbs, salt, cinnamon, garlic clove, onion, parsley, dried spearmint, egg ; preparation:Combine all ingredients -- you will have to mix this with your hands. Roll into balls. Refrigerate 1 hour, or overnight. Heat equal amounts of olive oil and butter. Flour and brown until dark golden brown. ; name: beef patties in gravy ; ingredients: ground beef, dry breadcrumbs, cheddar cheese, garlic powder, egg, mushroom soup, mushrooms, salt ; preparation:

name: pork n tater skillet ; ingredients: vegetable oil, boneless pork, onion, green pepper, seasoning salt, ground black pepper, water, milk, potatoes ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium heat, add oil, pork, onion, and green pepper. Sprinkle with seasoned salt and pepper. Cook until onions and peppers are slightly tender and pork is lightly browned. Add water and milk to skillet, then add potatoes and seasoning packet. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and cover. Simmer for 20 minutes or until potatoes are tender, stirring ocasionally. ; name: braised lettuce with peas and lemon ; ingredients: olive oil, shallots, boston lettuce, chicken broth, dried thyme, sugar, frozen peas, lemon zest, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large skillet over moderate heat. Saut the shallots until tender, about 5 minutes. Add the lettuce, chicken broth. Thyme, and sugar and simmer covered over low heat for about 5 minutes, until the lettuce is tender. Add the peas and cook an additional 5 minutes. Add the lemon zest, salt, and pepper, and serve immediately. ; name: aunty diane s yummy burgers ; ingredients: lean ground beef, ground pork, onion, garlic powder, rolled oats, salt & pepper, egg, cold water ; preparation:Mix first 6 ingredients together. Then add the eggs and cold water. Get your hands in there and mix it real good. Roll into balls then flatten into patties. Bbq for 10-15 minutes. Be sure not to press down and squeeze them while they are cooking. Enjoy. ; name: romanian mousaka ; ingredients: potato, olive oil, onions, canned tomatoes, ground pork, beef stock, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large pan or wok and use to fry the potatoes for about 10 minutes or until just softened. Add the onions and fry for a further 10 minutes. Transfer the mixture to an oven-proof casserole dish then top with the meat and tomatoes. Season with salt and black pepper then stir to combine. Pour the beef stock over the top then transfer to an oven pre-heated to 170c and bake for about 60 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: pork chops in mushroom gravy ; ingredients: pork chops, flour, salt and pepper, butter, onion, garlic, fresh mushrooms, milk, dry red wine, dried thyme ; preparation:Combine flour, salt and pepper and dredge pork chops in the mixture. Melt butter in large skillet and brown pork chops on each side. Remove chops from skillet. Saute onion, garlic and mushrooms in same skillet. Add leftover flour that was used to coat chops, then add milk, wine and thyme. Simmer until mixture starts to thicken. Return chops to pan and cover. Simmer for 30 minutes or until chops are done. ; name: egg fried rice ; ingredients: frozen peas, eggs, sesame oil, peanut oil, cooked rice, salt, pepper, spring onions, fresh bean sprouts ; preparation:Thaw frozen peas. Drain in colander. Combine eggs and sesame oil in a small bowl and set aside. Heat a wok over high heat until hot. Add the oil and when it is hot and slightly smoking, turn the heat to medium and add the eggs. Stir fry the eggs for 2 minutes, then add the cooked rice and stir fry for 3 minutes, mixing well. Then add the peas, salt and pepper. Stir fry 5 minutes over high heat. Add spring onions and bean sprouts and stir fry for 2 minutes. Turn onto a platter and serve at once. ; name: pea and lettuce soup ; ingredients: unsalted butter, onion, chicken stock, baby peas, romaine lettuce, milk, cream, of fresh mint, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook onion gently in butter. Add stock and peas, simmer until peas are tender. Add lettuce and cook until wilted. Add milk and puree until smooth. Reheat in pan, season with salt and pepper. Serve with a swirl of cream and chopped mint. ; name: jug jug barbados ; ingredients: water, pigeon peas, meat, pork, seasoning, fresh thyme, fresh marjoram, cornflour, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:

name: south african chicken kurma ; ingredients: fryer chickens, oil, onion, curry powder, garlic, sugar, salt, cayenne pepper, water ; preparation:Place all ingredients into a large stock pot with a lid. Bring to a boil on high heat for 15 minutes. Lower heat to medium. Simmer for one hour. Serve over rice. ; name: cauliflower with caramelized red onions ; ingredients: butter, red onions, balsamic vinegar, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, heads cauliflower, pine nuts ; preparation:Put butter in a heavy bottomed skillet over medium heat. Add onions and cook, stirring periodically, until the onions are a deep golden color, about 20 minutes. Add balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper. Cook until most of the moisture evaporates and onions are deep brown, about 5 minutes. Meanwhile, steam or microwave the cauliflower until tender but still firm. Put cauliflower on a platter and top with caramelized onions. Sprinkle with pine nuts. ; name: crock pot curried chicken rice ; ingredients: curry powder, green onion, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, olive oil, cayenne pepper, chicken, minute rice, chicken broth ; preparation:Combine curry, onion, ginger, oil and cayenne in a medium mixing bowl. Stir in meat, working spice mixture into meat with fingers. Place in ziploc and refrigerate 1 24 hours. Brown meat mixture and place in crock pot. Add rice and broth to crock pot and mix well. Cook on low 3-4 hours or until chicken is cooked through and all liquid is absorbed. ; name: yellow chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, granny smith apple, raisins, light mayonnaise, curry powder, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Cut the apple into bite sized pieces. Put shredded chicken into a bowl with the apple and add raisins. Add mayonnaise. Add curry to taste. Top with a bit of black pepper. ; name: curried papaya chutney ; ingredients: papayas, white vinegar, water, brown sugar, mustard seeds, salt, garam masala, curry powder, onion ; preparation:Put a heavy bottomed pan over medium heat and add vinegar, water, sugar and mustard and bring to boil. Cook until liquid becomes syrupy. Add papayas and curry powder, salt, garam masala. Cook 2 minutes more, stirring constantly. Remove from heat and mix in onion. Cool to the room temperature. Pour in jar and refrigerate for 5 days before using. ; name: spiced couscous ; ingredients: butter, oil, onion, curry powder, cumin, cayenne pepper, couscous, chicken broth, salt ; preparation:In a small saucepan, heat butter and oil over medium heat. Saute onion until softened, about 5 minutes. Add curry, cumin and cayenne, stirring constantly, for 1 minute. Adjust heat to medium-high, add couscous, blend well and cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. Add chicken broth, stir to incorporate, and bring to boiling point. Cover pan, remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Fluff with fork, season with salt if needed, and serve hot. ; name: sweet and sour cabbage with apples ; ingredients: butter, onion, fresh garlic, red wine vinegar, unsweetened applesauce, sugar, salt and black pepper, green cabbage, apples, apple juice ; preparation:Melt the butter in a large pot over medium-low heat. Add in onions. Saute for about 8-10 minutes, adding the fresh garlic the last few minutes. Add in the red wine vinegar, applesauce, brown sugar and cabbage. Cook for about 7-8 minutes, or until the cabbage starts to wilt, stirring often. Season with salt and pepper, cover and simmer until the cabbage is tender stirring occasionally. Uncover and add in the sliced apple and apple juice. Cook for another 5-6 minutes or until the apples are crisp-tender. Season with more salt and pepper if desired. ; name: south african curried eggs ; ingredients: butter, onions, curry powder, cake flour, salt, fresh ground black pepper, sugar, apple cider vinegar, water, hard-boiled eggs ; preparation:

name: jane and michael stern s broccoli casserole ; ingredients: white bread, eggs, milk, butter, cheddar cheese, salt, sugar, broccoli ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Butter an 8-inch square pyrex baking dish. Cover the bottom of the dish generously with the torn bread. Combine the eggs, milk, melted butter, cheese, salt and sugar in a bowl. Mix ntil combined. Stir in the roccoli and pour the mixture over the read. Cover with aluminum foil and bake for 35 minutes. For a chewier top, remove the foil during the last 10 to 12 minutes of baking. If you want a crisper crust, run the casserole under the broiler. ; name: bay scallops shells ; ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, lemon juice, fresh dill, bay scallops, celery, green onion, italian dressing, jumbo pasta shells ; preparation:In a blender, combine cottage cheese with lemon juice and dill. Blend until smooth. Pour cheese mixture into a bowl. Add celery, onions and the steamed scallops. Mix well. In a separate bowl mix the drained pasta with italian dressing. Spoon the scallop mixture into the pasta shells. Serve as a salad or optionally arrange shells on a bake sheet and sprinkle shredded cheese on top. Melt cheese in the oven and then serve hot. ; name: crab meat tacos ; ingredients: olive oil, sweet onion, fresh tomato, cabbage, crab delights imitation crab, eggs, milk, salt, corn tortillas, ranch dressing ; preparation:Heat large non-stick skillet over medium heat. Add olive oil. Add the chopped sweet onion. Cook until light brown. Add the diced tomato, shredded cabbage and crab meat. Stir. Meanwhile, beat the eggs together with the milk and salt. Add the beaten egg mixture to the skillet. Stir and cook until the eggs are done, cooked and seasoned with 1 tablespoon ranch dressing. Heat the tortillas in a skillet. Fill with the cooked crab meat. Pour the remaining ranch dressing on top. ; name: chicken cordon bleu nuggets ; ingredients: eggs, dried thyme, salt and pepper, swiss cheese, boneless chicken breast, breadcrumbs, flour, deli ham ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f. In a small mixing bowl, beat the eggs with a splash of water. On a plate combine breadcrumbs and thyme. Then on another plate combine flour with a pinch of salt and pepper. Lay ham strips on work surface, top each slice with cheese then place chicken chink toward the end of the strip. Rollup lightly, and coat with flour, eggs and breadcrumbs.
